item.text: rgyagar skad du/ maN+DakI nas tAs pa ramAn+danasaM gI ti/ bod skad du/
'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa// 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// gdul
dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/ dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// rdo rje
dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal// rnam rgyas pad+ma dka po'i spyan// pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i zhal// rang gi
lag gi rdo rje mchog/ yang dang yang du gsor byed pa// khro gnyer ldan pa'i rlabs la sogs// lag na
rdo rje mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po// dpa' bo 'jigs rung gzugs can dang//
rdorje rtse mo rab 'phro ba// rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa// shes rab thabs dang snying rje cha// 'gro don byed pa rnams kyi mchol
dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can/ khro boT lus kyi gzugs ltar pa/ sa ngas rgyas 'phrin las byed pa'i mgon// lus btud rnams
kyis lhan cig tu// mgon pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te// thal mo sbyar ba byas gyur nas//
spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang// bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra bas
mngon rdzogs pa'i// byang chub ji ltar bdag thob bgyi// nyon mongs pas ni sems da krug cing// mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ sems can kun
bya// la sman pa dang// ba mad 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir// bcom ldan ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro ba'i bla mas bshad du gsol
dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa rig pa mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yags sku// gtsug tor chen po tshag gi bdag/ 'jam dpal ye shes
sams dang 'a yi// ye shes skas rang byung ba// don zab don ni rgya che dang// don chanamtshungs med rab zhi ba// thog ma bar dang mthar dag ba// mtshan yang dag par
brjod pa mchog/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang yang yang yang
gsung ba gang// rgyud chen sgra 'phrul dra ba 'dir// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang// dpag med rnams kyis dgas pa yi// gang yang yang dag rab gsungs pa//
bdag kyang 'di ni gzung bar bgyi// bsam pa brtan pos nges 'byung bar/ mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi// gsang 'dzin ji ltar bdag 'gyur bgyi// nyon

shu mongs ma lus gsal ba dang// mi shes ma lus spang ba'i phyir// sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yi// khyad par ji bzhin rab bshad 'tshal// gsang dbang lag na rdordzayis// da bzhin gshegs la de skad du[#]
gsol btab tha ba mo sbyar byas te// lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/ da nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang dge rang gi yangs pa

brkyang mdzad de// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing// bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa// 'jig rtan rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis//
'jig rten gsum po kun bkang ste// lag na rdorje stobs po che// gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa// legs so dang la ldan rdo rje 'chang/ lag na rdordzakhyod lags so// 'gro la phan pa'i don du khyod/
sAng rje chu dang ldan gyur to// 'jam dpal ye shes sku ya mchon// yang dag brjod pa don che ba// dag par byed cing sdig sel ba// nga las nyan par brtson pa ni/gsang dme 'dapag po khyod legs so//
de phyir 'drin ngos bshad bya// khyadani rdo gcig yod kyis nyon// bcom ldan don legs zhes gsol// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// gsang sngags mtha' dag rigs chen po// gsang
sngags rig pa 'chang ba'i rigs// ragis gsum las ni rnam par gakhrigs// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang/ thag rgya chen po'i rigs
[Y ]@#/// mchog dang/ gtsug tor chonapo'i rigs cha no// gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing// gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang// skyes ba med pa'i chos can 'di// tshag gi bdag
pos tshigs bcad gsungs// a A/ a A/ u U/ a kyis/ o so// oM a/ sI ti srid/ dz+nyAn mAn+tir haM bud+d+ho bud+d+hanaM/ du d+hu ba'i no/ oM badzra tI ka du khats+tshad/ pradz+nyA dzAnamu rta ya/
tshon kA ya/ wA gIhAr/ a ra pa tsa na ya te nam/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a yig byung// a yig yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen 'gyur med dam pa yin//
srog chen po sa med// tshag tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed//

mchod pa chen po zhi snang che// nyon mongs kun gyi dgra chub// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gtimug blo ste gsug sel// mchod pa chen po khro ba che// khro bachen po dgra chab// mchod pa chen po chags pa che//

chags pa thams cad sel bar byed// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che// dar/'a pa chen po ma gub che// gzugs che lus kyang ra ba ste// kha dog che zhing lus bong tshe// mang yang chazhing rgya che ba// dkyil 'khor chen
po yangs pa yin/ shes rab chen po mtshon 'chang ba// nyon mongs lcags kyu cha ba'i mchog/ grags chen snyan grags chen po ste// snang ba chen po gsal ba che// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang//
na dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can jisnyad pa de dag thams cad rdo rjesams
pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ dbazhin gshags pa nyus cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gaphrugs 'di/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis da kyis brlabs so// byin gyis brlabasam phyag tu/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid zhal gsum pa lta bur/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ ched du
brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni rab byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang// rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rjel/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sos pa de kho
rnam bcu dbang ldan chab po// thog mamed pa spros med bdag/ de bzhin nyidadag dag pa'i bdag/ yang dag sla zhing tshig gzhan med// ji skad smos pa de bzhin byed// gnyis su med pa
gnyis med smras// yang dgamatha' la rnam par gnas// bdag med seng ge 'i sgra dang ldan// mu stags ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed// kun tu 'gro ba don yod bgrod// da bzhini gshegs pa yid ltar mgyogs//

rgyal ba dgra rgya la rnam par rgyal// 'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che// tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso// tshogs dz+dzatshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste// tshul chen gzhan gyi 'dun

pa min// tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa/ tshig la dbang ba tshag mtha' yas// tshig bden bden par smra ba dang// bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// phyir mi ldog pa phyir ma 'ong// nges ru so sor 'dren pa ste//
ngas 'khyung sna tshogs nges 'byung ma// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pa// dge slong dgra bcom thag pa zad// 'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul// bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob// bsal bar gyur pa gos pa
yod/ rigs pa dang ni rkang par ldan// bder gshegs ra jage rten rig pa mchog/ bdag gir ma 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar gnas pa// bya ba byas
pa skam sar gnas// yashes 'ba' zhig nges byung ba// shes rab mtshon chas rnam 'joms pa// dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa mchog/ bang phyugachos kyi rgyal//
0/ legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po// don grub grub pa'i kun rtog ni// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// rnam par mi rtog dbyangs mi zad// chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes// bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams
tshogs// ye shes yo shes 'byung gnas cha/ 3a shes ldan pa yo da medagos// tshogs gnyis tshogs dang yang dag ldan// rtog pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can// bsam gtan bsam gyis blo yi bdag/ sa
so rang ragi ma g.yo ba// mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang// sas rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// khyab bdag yashes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang/
sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po// sangs rgyas sras po dam pa mchog shes rab srid 'byung skyo gnas te// chos kyi skyo gnas srid mthar byed// gcig pu sra mkhregs rdorA'i bdag 'phral du bskyod pa 'gro
ba'i bdag/ nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba/ shes rab a shas ma bo che// 'o da chen rnam par snang par byed// ya shes snang ba lam ma kha// 'gro ba'i mar ma yo shes smon/ gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal/
ba ras pa'i rgyal mchog sngags dbang po// gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gatshug/ nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po mchog/ 'gro ba
da 'a ba'igadang ldan// sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po// mchod 'os rjod 'os drang srong che// rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngagasaldan// dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin// gtso bo dkon
@#// mchog gsum 'dzin pa// lpag pa mchog gsum ston pa po// don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal// 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags// rdorje lcags kyu zhags pa che// rdordza' jigs byed/
'jigs par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// mag drug lag drug stobs dang ldan// keng rus mchab gtsigs pa ngo// da la dadal gdong brgyal// gzhan rdzomathar byed bgegs kyi rgyal//

doN+Dashugs can 'jigs byed pa// jordzogrags pa rdordza snying// sgyu 'phrul rdordzagasus po cha// jong sku gnas rdoN+Di'i dbang/ 'josnying po mkha' 'dra ba/ mi g.yo ral pa gcig bsgyings pa// gang chen lcag
pa rmon pa 'chang// drag chan hA zhes sgrogs pa// dihi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// gdamo chen po gad rgyangs can/ rordzogad mo cher sgrogs pa/ rdorje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/
jorje rgyal po bdebache// rdo dum bo dga' ba che/ dordzahA mdzad haM gi gzugs// rdo rjem da' yamachon 'chang ba/ jorje ral gris gcod mdzad pa// rdordza kun 'chang rordza can// jorje gcig pu
g.yul sal ba// rdordzab bar ba gtsigs pa'i mge/ mgo skyes rdzo'abar bas// rdo'abab pa 'bebs pa che// mag brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mge rjordza'i snga ni myu gu lus// rdo rje'i rtsa ri lus gcig pu//

dorjertsa mo san mos brtsams// jordzasAng po pags pa mkhregs rdo 'phreng thogs dpal dang ldan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// gad rgyangs hA hAnges par sgrogs/ yi ge drug pa rdorje'i sgra// 'jam

nga'i dbyang sanisgra chob// 'jig rten gsum gcig sgra chen bog nam mkha'i khams kyis mthar thug sgra// sgra dang ljon pa rnams kyi mchog/ yang dag med de de bzhin nyid// yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med// stong nyid

smra ba'i khyu mchog ste/ thab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi dung sta sgra chen po// chos kyi gat+ti sna bo che// rab tu mi gnas mya ngan kha das// phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che// gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste//

snatshogs gablugs can yid rang bzhin// gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal// gakhrugs banan ma lus 'chang ba po// snang bamed tsang che bar grags// khams gsum dbang phyug chen po su// 'phags lam yin/
tu mtho la gnas// chos kyi tog ni cher byung ba// 'jig rten gsum po gcig gzhon lus// gnas bstan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ gsum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes//

pa ye shes 'tsho// marige sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po// nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol son// ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can// yang dag rdzogs pa'i
pa'i sangs rgyas brgyan// sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi// gsum mtha' mtha' yas grol gsum pa// sgrib pa thams cad nges par grol// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid la gnas// 'onamongs dri ma
@#// kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtog par gnas// sems can kun gyi gru chen po// yon tan thod can rnams kyi thog/ lhag ma kun las rnam grol ba/ nam mkha'i lam la zab
gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang// khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyus pa ste// bum pa bzang po tsha ba'i mchog/ byed pa soms can kun don byed// pan thogs sems can
mnyes gshin pa// bzang ngan shes pa dus shes pa// khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan// dus shes sems can dbang po zhes// rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa ngo// yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes//

chos shes rab bzhi bkra shas 'byung// bkra shas kun gyi bkra shis pa// grags pa dpalamo stan pa dge/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che// dga' ba chen po rol pa che// bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs//
ya rab tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal// mchog ldan mchog spyan gtso bo ste// skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os// rab mchog 'jigs pa chen po'i dgra// 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po/ gtsug phud phud pu ral

pacan// ral pa mgo ra cod pan ldan// gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan// zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i thod// mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang// chongs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/ dka' thub mthar

phyin dka' thub che// khrus ldan go'u ta ma mchog/ bram ze tshangs par tshangs pa rig/ chongs pa mya ngan 'das pa thob// grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid// myang 'das zhi mya ngan 'das//
legs par nges 'byung mthar byed pa// bde ba sdug bsngal mthar byed gnas// 'dod chags bral ba brtags pa zad// thub pamed pa dpa med pa// gsal man mi snang gos par mad/ cha mad kun 'gro khyab pa po////
tha mo sa bon zag pa med// rdul med rdul bral dri ma med// nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa/ ban tu rab sad rnams sad bdag/ thams cad ye shes kun rig mchog/ rnam par shes pa 'i chos 'du 'ongs/ 2 shes
gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog ma tham med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rigs mad pa// ya bsamig gcig dri ma med//

ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi dbang phyug smra bache// smra ba'i skyes mchog sa khaM'i rgyal// smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// smra pa'i sing ga thub pa med// kun tu lta ba mchog dudaka ba bi
brjid 'phrang ldan blta na sdug/ 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u/ snang ba gsal bor byed pa'i 'od// sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste// zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// sman rnams m lus ljon pa'i gange//

nyon mongs nad kyi dgrache ba// sdug gu 'adzrag rten gsum gyi mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa// chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgrung// 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig

yangs pa ste// khyams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ khyab bdab/chen po rin chen gdugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal pache// sa ngas rgyas kun dga' dngosangos[R 1///]
sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig/ nordzan chen dbang bskur dpal// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug sku// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/

rdo rje kun 'chang mnga' bdag ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas//sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chab// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtshodang ldan// rdotsho nyim snang ba che// joji zla ba drimad 'od/

chags bral dang po chags pa che// kha dog sna tshogs 'a bar ba'i 'od// jordzaskyal krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes// kun mkhyan a shes mdzod 'dzin

pa rgyal po skya 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang// che ba sangs rgyas rig pa 'chang// rdo rnon po ral gri rma// rnam par dag pa 'gyur mda mchog/ theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod/ mtshon cha chen po rdodzachos//

la jo zab mo dzan dzika/ dorlablo gros don bzhin rig/ pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa// sa rnams thamasacad rnam par brgyan/ rnam dang dag pa bdag med chos// yang dag ye shes zla sIng 'od// sgyu'aphrul dra ba

rnal 'byor che// rgyud kun gyin bdag po mchog/ ma lus rdorje skyil krung lta// yashes sku rnams ma lus 'chang// kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang// sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi lha de po
sna tshogs sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'chang// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dngos po kun kyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye med chos de sna tshogs don// chos kun ngo bo 'di 'chang ba// skad cig gcig la shes

kha che// chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang// chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste// thub pa blo mchog yang dgamatha'/ mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang// sangs rgyas kun
gyi mngon sum pa// ye shes che lce 'od rab gsal// 'dod pa'i don sgrub dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba// mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can thams cad rab grol byed// nyon mongs
g.yul du gcig dpar ba// mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms// blon sgrig 'char dang la dang ldan// dpa' bo ma sdug gzugs 'chang ngo// lag pa'i dbyug pa brgya bskyod cing// rkang pa bskyod pas gar byed
pa dpal ldan lag pa brgyus gang la// nam mkha' khyab par gang byin pa// rkang pa gcig gi mthil gnon pa// sa yi snying po mthil la gnas// tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i rtse mo gnon// rkang mthob sonamol gnas
pa// don gcig gnyis mdachos kyi den// dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med// rnam rig sna tshogs rang bzhin don// soms dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan// dngos po ma lus don dga' ba// stong pa nyid dga'
mchog gi blo// srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs 'das// srid pa gsum po dga' ba che// dag pa sprin dkar nyin du dkar// 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od// nyi ma 'char ka'i dkya la ltar mdzes//
'dod chags chen po sen mo'i 'od// chur pud bzang po mthon kha mchog/ smra mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang// nor bu chen po 'o da chags dpal// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ 'jig rta/
khams brgya kun bskyon pa/ (rdzu 'phrul rkang pa stobs chen ldan// de nyid dran pachen po 'char// dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal// byang chub yan lag me tog dga'//
de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtsho// lam gyi yan lag brgyud tshul rig/ yang dag sangs rgyus lam ge pa// sems can kun la shasacher chags// nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems/
can kun gyi yid las skyes// sems can kun gyi bde ltar mgyogs// sems can kun gyi dbang don rigs// sems can kun gyi yod 'phrog pa// phung po lnga don de nyid shes/ rnam dag phung po
la gang ba/ khams cad nges 'byung mtha' la gnas/ thams cad nges par 'a byang ba mkhas// thams2/ nga na// gdag
bton// dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang// bdan bzhi tshul gyi rnam pa can// zhes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang// bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig/ rnam pa nyi shus byang
'byug pa sa gnas// thams cad ngos par 'byung ba mkhas// thams cad nges 'byung lam la gnas// thams cad nges 'byung ston pa po// yan lag bcu gnyis sing tsa
chub pa/ rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ dpag med sangs rgyas sprul pa yi// sku yimatha' na rnamasgom pa// skadacig thams cad mngon par rtogs// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna

byed pa// chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las ltung// nyon mongs na nyon kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas ba rab spangs ba// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa//
'du shes thams cad rab sangs don// rnam shes don ni 'gog pa 'chang// sems can kun gyi yod kyi la// sems can kun gyi yod na pa// sems can kun gyi yodanang gnas// de dag sems dang mnyamanyid
son// sems can kun yid tshim par byed// sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba/ grub mtha' 'khrul nga ldan pa yin// 'khrul pa thams cad rnam par spangs// don gsum tha tshom mad pa'i blo// kun don
yon tan gsum gyi bdag/ dus gsum phung po lnga yi don// skad gcig thams cad rnam sgom pa// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang// lus med sku sta sku
ya mchog//ni bya ba rnam par 'gyed// gzugs rnams ma lus kun tu ston// nor bu chen po rin chen tog// sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// gsang sngags spyi gnas yi
ga med// gsang sngags chen po ragis gsum pa// gsang sngags don kun skyes pa po// thig le chen po yi ge med// stong pa chen po yi ge lnga// thag le stong pa yi ge drug/ rnam pa thams cad rnam pa mod//

bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can// chamed tshaldan las 'das pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang// bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing// ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa// ting 'dzin sku ste sku yi mchog
longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rkul// sprul ba'i sku ste sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// jibazhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa//

lha yi dbang po lha yi lha// lha min dbang po sbyin byed bdag/ lha yi bla ma 'chi med dbang// rab 'dzoms rabo 'joms dbang phyug po// srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba// ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla// 'jis//
rtan phyogs bcur rab grags pa// chos kyi sbyin bdag chab po// byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste// snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel//
dba' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa mthar byed pa// bdud dpung thams cad pham par byed// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren// mchod 'os bstod 'os sdug gi gnas// rtag tu
rim gro bya ba'i 'os// bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog/ phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i mchog/ 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod// nam mkha'i mtha' med rnam par gnon// gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste//

mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das// zhes rad pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab kyin de nyid thob// bdag rig gzhan rog thams

cad pa// kun la phan pa gang drag mchog/ 'jig rten dpa las 'das pa ste// shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin pa'i bdag/ phyag rgyabazhi po'i don ston pa// 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas
kyi mchog/ nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi// don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal// 'jig rten gsum gyi bskal bzang che// dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ mchog/

sAn rdo chag khyod 'dud// yang dag mkhar gyur khyod la 'o dud/ stong nyidi ngo po khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud//
sangs rgyas dpo na la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas snang la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung ba khyod la 'dud/ sangs rgyas

khrugs laphyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos med las byung khyod la 'dud// sangasargyus 'byung ba khyed la 'dud// nam mkha' las khyung khyod la 'dud// ma shes las byung khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud//
sangs rgyas kho ra'adzad khyod la 'dud// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ya shes ma khyod la 'dud do// lag rdordorje 'chang 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yashes kyi sku dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi gshis gyi sku dang/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa yongs su dag pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o// khyod kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang/ rab tu dang ba dang/ mgu ba chen po yang
dag khar 'byed pa'i don dang/ sku dang/ ba lung dang/ thugs kyi gsang g.yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang/ yongs su ma dag pa'i sa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsod

nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ yongs su dag pa'i phyi'i dang/ zla na med pa'i don lhag par ma rtogs pa lhag par rtogs pa'i phyi'i dang/ thob pa thob pa'i phyir dang/ ji srid de bzhin/

gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba'i don du yang bdag gas bstan pa dang/ yang dag par rab tu bshad pa dang/ rnam par bkrol ba dang/ rnam par phye ba dang/ rab tu gsal bar

byas pa dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa'o// kha na rdo rje rdorje 'chang 'di ni ngas khyod kyi rgyud la sngags kyi chos nyid thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo dang po'i rjes su bsngags pa'o//

gzhan yang lag na rdorjodorje 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di'i shan tu yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// de bzhin

a gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi

chos kyi dbyangs rtogs pa'o// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdud kyi stobs thams cad pham par byed pa'o// stobs bcu dang ldan pa thamasacad kyi stobs bcu'i stobasasu gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnams kyi thams

cad mkhyen pa'o// chos thams cad kyi lung ngo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par kun chub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs

[z/]yongs su rdzogs pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu skyas ba'o// lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing ngo/ 'theg pa chen po'i rab tu gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa re/

'byung khung ngo// 'phags pa'i lam yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o// rnam par grol ba rnams kyi brtag pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi skyod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o//

byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rigs dang rgyud rab tu 'phel ba'o// phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'o// mu stegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'joms pa'o// bdud bzhi'i stobs dang dpung dang sde rnams kyi pham

par byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi yang dag par sdud pa'o// nges par 'byung bas bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su smin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa rnams kyis dang nge 'dzin no//

sems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no// lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid mngon par skor m+ma rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro// yang dag par sbyor ba thams cad kun tu sbyor ba dang srol ba'o/ nyon mongs pa dang na ga'i

nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi stong ba'o// sgrib pa thams cad kyi nye bar zhi ba'o// 'ching ba thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'o// lhagam thams cad kyi thar pa'o// sems nye bar 'phro ba thams cad kyi lta ba'o/ /
'byar pa thams cad kyi 'byung bzhas so/ rgud pa thams cad kyi rab tu 'joms pa'o// ngan song gi sgo thams cad kyi 'gabs pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam dam pa'o// 'khor ba'i ka ra/
lo'i rab tu mi 'jug pa'o/ chos kyi 'khor lo'i ri ba tu bskor ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa'i gdugs dang// rgyu la mtshan dang/ ba dan rab tu bsgreng ba'o// dam pa'i chos ston

pa'i lhag par gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi sgo'i spyod rnams kyi gyur du grub pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyis sgom par lhag par rtogs pa'o//

gnyis su med pa so sor rtogs pa sgom pa mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi ston pa 'di so sor rtogs dgo/ kha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad kyi bskyed pa'o// yongs su dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams
cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'o// yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po rnams kyi chos thams cad gcig pa'i sems so sor rtogs pa'o// mtshan yang

tsha sha dag par brjod pa 'din rnga srid sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ro// 'di ni 'khor lo gnyis pa'i rdzas su bsngags pa lnga bcurtsa gnyis so// gzhan yang lag na rdordo rje 'chang mchen yang

dag par brjod pa 'a da na sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang/ mad kyis kun tu spyad pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'o// ngan 'gro

thams cad bzlog pa'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o// mi khom pa brgyad du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad mi rgyu bar byed pa'o// 'a jigs pa chen po brgyadanye bar zhi bar byed pa'o/

rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par sol ba'o// mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad rnam par se la der byed ra'o// ltas ngan pa dang ba gegs thams cad na bar zhi bar byed nga 'o/ khadud kyi dgra'i las thams cad thag/

rir du byed pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'phel bar byed pa'o// tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// rgyags pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ dregs pa
dang/ ngar 'dzin pa thams cad reg par 'joms par byed pa'o// sdug bsngal dang yad mi bde ba thams cad mi skyo bar byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o// byang chub samA
dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur pa'o// phyag rgyu dang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad brjod du med pa ra ba
rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o// bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o// nad med pa dang/ stobs dang/ dbang phyug phun sumatshogs par byed pa'o/
dpa' dang/ dag nga dang/ zhi ba legs pa rab tu 'bal bar byed pa'o// grags pa dang/ sman pa dang/ tshigs su bcad pa dang bstod pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o// nad dang 'jig

pa chen po thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// shin tu dag pa rnams kyi gan tu dag pa'o// shin tu gtsang ba rnams kyi nga shan tu gtsang ba'o// shin tu 'byor ldan pa rnams kyi shin tu 'a byor ldan no/
na tu bkra shis pa rnams kyi shAn tu bkra shis pa'o// skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs so// gnas 'dod pa rnams kyi gnas so/ skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o// dpung

gnyanamad pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no// gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling du gyur pa'o// rten 'dod pa rnams kyi bla na med pa'i rten du gyur pa'o// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi grur gyur pa'o// nad

khams cadu ngas par 'joms pa'i phyir sman pa'i rgyal po chen por gyur pa'o// blang bar bya ba dang dor bar bya ba'i dngos po rnam par dbye ba'i phyir shes rab tu gyur pa'o// lta ba ngan pa'i mun pa'i smag rum thams cad

bsal ba'i phyir ya shes kyi snang bar gyur pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur pa'o// 'jam dpal gyi ye shes kyi sku rab tu

thob pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa'o// sman lngarab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa'i ye shes garlags par gyur pa'o// zang zang dang/ mi 'a jigs pa dang/ chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba

nyid kyis pa rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'o// bsod nams dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs dang/ ting nge 'dzinani yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi sa bcu rab tu thob par gyur pa'o// gnyis kyi chos dang bral

ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid do/ lhag par sgro 'a dogs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi par de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shas kyi sku yongs su dag

pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yang dag pa'i rang bzhin nyidi do// lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing ma lus pa nges par sel ba nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'din/

'di ltar gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi don dang ming yang dag par 'dzin ba dral tu gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis chos thams cad brjod du med par gyur pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa
gnyis so// gzhan yang lagan rdorje rdorje 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa spyad pas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i la shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi a shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'dimatha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa/ ma tshang ba med pa// dum bu ma yin pa// tshigs su bcad pa dang/

tshig dang/ yi ge 'di rnams 'di kyis nyim so sor dus gsum du 'dzin par byed pa dang/ rjod par byed pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ rab tu 'don par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin yod la byed pa dang/ gzhan

rnams la'ang dus ji lta bar rgyas par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang/ mtshan gyi don gzhan dang gzhan re re zhing yang 'a rngam dpal ye shes kyi sku mngon du byas te yid rtse gcig pas sgom par byed pa dang/ lhag

par mos pa dang/ de kho na yade la byed pa dag gis kun nas sgo'i gnas las gnas pa dang/ chos thams cad so sor rtogs pa dang/ mchog tu gyur pa dang/ rnyog pa med pa dang/ shes rab kyis rjes su 'phags pa dang
dad pas yang dag par bgrod pa de lani dus gsum du dus med par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad yang dag par 'dus te yang dag par gshegs shing yang dag par byon nas chos thams

cad kyi sgo rnams nye bar ston par 'o gyur ro// bdag nyid sgom pa nye bar ston par byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kyang lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi rgyudal yang dag pa ra byin gyis

lharlob par byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjes su 'dzin pas kyang 'dzin par byed do// chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i sdongs pa rang ra bar sgrub par byed do// dgra bcom pa dang/ nyan thos

dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i chos la sdug pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis bdag gi dngos po'ang zhe bar ston par byed do// gdul dka' ba gdul ba po rnams kyong khro po'i rgyal po chen po dang/ rdordza'achang

tsha chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba yongs su skyob par gyur pa gzugs sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sku rnams kyisamadangs dang/ stobs dang/ gzi brjid thal gyis mi gnon pa nyid dang/ sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ mngon
par rdzogs pa dang/ dkyil 'khor rnams che bar ston par byed do// sngags dang/ rig pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ bdud dang/ dgra phyir rgol ba dang/ gzhan gyis me

thub pa chen po thams cad kyang mtshan ma nyanimor bcas par skad cig sosor spyod pa thams cad dang/ lam rnams su'angasrung ba dang/ grub pa dang/ skyed par byed do// chongs pa dang/ dbang po dang/ nyadabang
rang/ drag po dang sred med kyi bu dang/ kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ smin drug gi bu dang/ nag po chen po dar dga' byed dbang phyug dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ lus ngag

dang/ 'brog ma dang/ phyogs batshu'i 'dzage rten skyong ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun du ma chen mo dang nyin mor bcas pa 'gro ba dang/ gnas pa dang/ nyal kha dang/ 'dug pa dang/ gnyid/

log pa dang/ gnyid sad pa dang/ mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang/ gtsagi pur gnas pa dang/ skya bo mang po 'i nang du song ba dang/ ji srid grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/

longs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang na gnas pa dang/ dbang rol phur pa dang/ sgo khang dang/ lam srung dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dang/ grong khyer gyi bar dang/ tshong khang gi nang du gnas
pa dang/ ji srid khang stong dang/ ri dang/ dgon pa dang/ chu klung dang/ dur khrod dang/ nags tshang tshing du nye bar son pa dang/ 'bogs pa dang/ ma 'bags pa dang/ myos pa dang/ rab tu myos pa rtag

chu thams tsad kyi rnam pa thams du mchog tu srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ smod pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyin mo dang mtshan mo mchog tu bde legs su byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang lha dang/ klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dag mi dang/ mi ma yin ta rnams dang/ gzhan yang gang dag gza'i dang/ rgyu skar dang/ ma mo dang/
tshogs kyi bdag po rnams dang/ gang yang mno bdun bo rnams dang/ gang yang gnod sman mo dang sranamo dang/ sha za mo rnams te/ de rnams thams cad lhan tsag 'thun par sna dang
bcas ba 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis sbyor lam dang lam rnams su'ang mchog tu srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ smra ba byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang do'i lus la mdangs dang stobs rab tu 'jug par byed

do/ nad med pa dang/ stobs dang/ rtsi'aphel ra' nga zhabar sgrub par byed do// 'di'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rjes su bsngags pa khacu dgu pa'o// gzhan yang lag na rdorje rdorje 'chang mchonayang dag par brjod

ba gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di 'am so sor ma nyams pa yang dag par blangs te mgrin pa ra gnas pa lan gsum du kha ton du byed pa dang/ glegs bam du chud pa klog par byed pa dang/ rab tu 'don par byed
a pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te/ de'i gzugs kyi rjes su sems par byed pa dang/ yang de'i gzugs kyi rjes su bsam gtan byed pa de nyid sprul
pa'i sku yis mun tsharing ba nyid las gdul bya'i dbang zhu bar gsung nas mthong bar gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i gakhrugs kyi sku dang lhan cig
gnas pa nam mkha'i mthil na bzhugs pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyuro/ sems dpa' chen po de'i skye ba ji ltar gyur kyang ngan 'gro dang nga' kholtang ba'i 'jigs pa byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs ngan
du skye bar mi 'gyur/ yul mtha' 'khob kyi skye bor skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dbang bo dman par mi 'gyur ro// dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyu/ log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/

sangs rgyas ma bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang/ des bstan pa'i chos skyong ba dang lkog tu gyur pa mi 'gyur// lha tshe ring bo rnams su skye
bar mi 'gyur ro// chu ge dang nad dang/ mtshon gyi bskal pa rnams la skya bar mi 'gyur ro/ snyigs ma lnga'i dus rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang/ chom rkun dang/ dgra'i 'jigs/
pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgud pa dang dngul ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mi bsngags pa dang/ skur pa 'i dngas pa dang/ smod pa dang/ mi snyan pa dang/ grogs ra ngan
pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// skye ba bzang po dang/ rigs dang/ rus phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ kun nas mdzes par gyur pa dang/ gzugs dang/ kha dog yang dag
par ldan ba ra'agyuro// 'jigs rten pa rnams kyi sdug pa dang/ yid dang kha 'babs pa dang/ 'gro ba gna mchog tu bde ba dang/ mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'a jig rten pa rnams kyi mdzes pa dang/

skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa dang tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// longs spyod che ba dang/ 'khor mang ba dang/ longs spyodami zad pa dang
'khor mi zad par 'a gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog du gyur pa'i smon lam dang ma shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin gyis kyang ba rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan
dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur tshas pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas par 'gyur dran pa dang/ bshes bzhin dang/ thabs dang/ stobs dang/ smon lam dang/ ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/
bstan bcos thams cad la 'jags pa med pa dang smra mkhas par yang 'gyur ro// tshig gsal ba dang/ blun po ma yin pa dang/ blo gsal bar 'gyur ro/ mkhas pa dang/ le lo med pa dang/ chogazhes pa dang/
na chab dang/ srid pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba dang/ slob dpon dang/ bla ma bkur bar bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sngon ma thos pa'i bzo dang/ rtsis dang/
shes pa dang/ bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang gzhung lasarab tu gsal ba yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ro// shani tu yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ kun tu spyod pa spyod pa
dang ldan par 'gyur ro// legs par rab tu 'byung ba dang legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub kyi sems rab tu brjod pa med par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dgra bcom

pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa dang bgrod pa la gnas par nam yang mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'a khor lo lnga pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig go/ lag na rdo rdo rje 'chang de ltar yon tan dpag tu med pa dang yang

dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzhan rnams dang yang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdodzardo rje 'chang don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang

dag par 'a dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zagazhi ring po mi thogs par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs por bsags te/ 'an tu myur bar sangs rgyas kyi yon tana rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas bla na med yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa mang por yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos kyis soms can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i chos ston pa podang phyags bcu

chos kyi rje bo cha lhag par gnas pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'di ni'i khor lo drug pa'i bsngags pa dpag tu med pa'o// oM sarba d+harmAb+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+hA badzra tsak+Sha/ a A / oM A/ pra kr-i tri

ba ri shud+d+ha/ sarba d+haraH ya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ rnon kA ya/ many+dzashI/ pa ri shud+d+hitA/ mu parwa la ti/ a A/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hU~MhU~M/ b+ha ga ban/ dzAnamAn+ti/ wA gI

shA ra/ mahApa tsa/ sarba d+harmug gnam la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+hamAnA tu dz+nyA na gan+d+ha a/ de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// mgon po bcom ldan de bzhan gshegs//
rdzogs sangs rgyus la phyag 'tshal nas// rnam mang mgon po gzhan rnams dang// gsang dbang lag na rdots+tshade/ khro bo'i rgyal por bcas rnams kyis/ gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol// mgon po
bdag cag rjes yi rang// legs so legs so legs par gsungs// bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzod// 'gro bamagon med rnams dang ni// rnam

grol 'bras bu 'chol ba yi// rnam dag legs pa'i lam 'di ni// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa// rlab cing angs la rgya che ba// don chen kha gro po'i don byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'dinaM// rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad// rnal 'byor chen po 'a rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa'i dang nge 'a dzin dra ba'i le'u las byung ba/ 'jam dpal gshes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i machon yang dag par bar pa
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa rdzogs so///thun mong dang thun mong ma yin nga 'a gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor pa'i bdag nyid chen po zla ma'am

pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs pa sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba blo gros brtan pas/ bsam gtan gling gas dben gnas su bsgyur zhing dag par byas pa 'o// sngon gyi sgra bsgyur chen po de dag gis//
rgyud 'a de bsgyur zhing kun la grags lags mod// 'on kyang spro don gtsug lag ji bzhin du// rgyud 'di blo brtan gnyis pas legs par bsgyur// @#// rgya gar

skod du/ mAyA dzA la mahAtan rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom

ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng na/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po bkod pa// rdorje'i ka bas brgyun nga/ shin tu mdzes pa'i rin po che bkod pas rnam par bkra ba/ rdorje dril bu 'khrol/

ba yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par chen ngo sa brgyanapa// rdordza'i 'khor los smras pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i cha byad snatshogs 'chang pa rnams kyi don gyi bya ba byas pa/ rnam par snang mdzod
kyi sAng las yang dag par 'byung ba'i grod pa bskyod nas/ zhal bzhi'i sgo'i gi skabs nas byung ba sna tshogs dang/ rdoN+Da dang/ rin po che chen po dang/ 'od dpag med dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i tshogs dang/ rig sngags kyi lhamo rnams kyis brgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgya la po dang/ bran dang/ bran mo dang/ pho nya dang/ pho nya mo rang/ phyag brnyan dang/ phyag bar n mo du ma'i 'khor
gyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi yi shes kyi bde ba'i bdag nyid dang dmigs pa dang bral ba/ thugs rje chen pos mnyes gshin pa/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba la brtson
bar mdzad pa/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am cidang/ lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang/ mi ma yan pa la sogs pa mang pos
brgyan pan/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdodza de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so// des de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbusan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
phyag na rdo rje 'dug pa la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'dzum pa mdzod ma thag tu byang chub sanas dang ra sems dpa' chen po phyogs rdos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
'gying bag can du bltas nas rdo rje gsor te/ dus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
dgongs pa ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'a das kyis dgongs pa gang gi slad du gzigs pa dang 'dzum pa mdzad/ des na bdag dang 'khor rnams ngomatshar du gyur pa lags na/ de'i slad
du bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge chen po'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdordzas de skad du gsol ba btab ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis rgyud kyis rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba yashes rnam par bsgyings pa// rgyud thams cad kyi phyi mo 'i yang phyi ma'i thabs bad ba jordzo'i yi shes sgrub pa rol pas mnyes par bya ba'i thabs de kho na nyid thams cad

kyi 'byung gnas stang stabs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs dang/ shes rab bde ba chen po'i rdorjes sgrol ba rol bas bzhad cing bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ ri mo'i gzugs dang/ sgom pa dang/ bzlas brjod dang/ stang stabs dang/ sbyor ba dgod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang
dbab pa dang/ bsad pa dang/ dbrog pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ brdag pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ nyam thag par bya bdang/ gcad pa dang/ bsreg pa dang/
bsad pa dang/ bstan pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ sbyin pa dang/ slob dpon dang/ slob ma gzung ba dang/ gsang sngagasamang po'i 'jo tshul rnams ngas bshad par bya'o// de'i phyir khyod
kyis kyang tAng nge 'dzin mchog la snyoms par zhugs la nyon cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ gzhan yang gang dag 'khor du 'dus
pa de dag thams cad kyis chos kyi 'brel ba'i gtam mnyan par brtsams so// de la re zhig dang po dngos grub ni slob dpon chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pas/ slob dpon med par gyur na ni// dngos

grub thob par mi 'gyur bas// slob dpon mchon nyid bshad par bya// ya shes snying po khyod nyon cig/ brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu med// gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor
shes pas// dkyil 'khor bri pa'i las bya'o// de nyid bcu'i yongs shes shing/ sems can kun la ma 'jigs sbyin// theg pa chal rtag dga' ba// doni slob dwipon yin par gsungs// phyi rol
bstan bcos yongs shesashing// nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro dang// gsang ba de nyid bsdu ba dang// thog pa chen po'i mi shes pa// sAng rje yod pa ma yin dang// dad med brtson 'grus mi ldan la//
rtag tu ngan pa'i tshul spyod dang// bstan bcos rnams la smod pa yin// gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang// ldan n slob dpon yin par gzung// de yis dkyil 'khor bri ba dang//

de nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams bstan// de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags dag/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dge dang sdoms la dga' ba dang// rtag tu bla ma la gus dang// rgyun du lha rnams mchod byed po'i/

yon tan ldan na slob ma yin// slob dpon ci 'dra blta zhon// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nyid rtag tu rorje 'chang// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ de ni ya shes rgya mtshor// yid bzhin nor
[“ ]du rin chen bzhin// slob dpon gyin yon tan gzung/ skyon rnams nams kyang ma yin no// yon tan bzung bas dngos grub cing// skyon rnams kyis ni dngos grub nyams// de yi grali ma'ang mi 'gom ste//

mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs// rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang ba yi// dam pa gang yin spangs par 'gyur/ slob dpon smod par byed pa dag/ rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya// slob dpon smod pa gang yin te//
bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis gzung// ngan pa gtum po las khyad pa/ mkhas pas rtag tu spang bar bya// mnar med shin tu skyi g.ya' ba'i// dmyal ba bstan sa gang yin pa// der ni slob dpon smod
byed pa// gnas par 'gyur zhes rab tugasungs// de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrams te// bsam yas 'bras bu sman byed pa'i// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod byed pa'i// sems can dad pa ldan pas mchod//

rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'din 'i jug pa 'chi bar phye ba'i le'u ste dang po'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad dang

ljon pa'i 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gziges nas/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po ye shes bsgyings pa gsang ba'i byin rlabs kyi mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas kyang

derdza'achar la bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdordza rgyud kyi rgyal bo chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal bo chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma ye shes chen po 'i ye shes snying po 'bar ba rdorjesnying kur

byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur na dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur bas/ phyaga' rdo rje sems can gang la las tshon rtsi mthong ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thamA cad la phyag byas pa

dar mtshon pa byas pa par gyur ba la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas nyid kyi grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyon cig/ dang po kho nas yongs su bachung bar
byas te/ slob dpon gyi sa lha nyid kyi stang stabs su 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas bsgrims te rotsho gsor zhing/ lag pa g.yon pas dril bu gsal nas ro kha gros kyis longs su bskor bar bya'o// rgyan

thams cad kyis brgyan pa khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis hU~M zhes brjod tsang dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi brjid pa tha nga gas pa skor nas kyang khro bo'i skur bsgoms nas sdang ba'i lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ gsang ba pa rnams
0 @#// latshig 'dirab du brjod bar bya'o// slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad bla namad pa'i ye shes

thob bar bya ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'di'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal bo 'di 'dri zhes bya ba khri yis/ lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ yid dgas dang/ sha za dang// brjod byed dang//
'byung po dang/ mkha' 'grom dang/ gnon po dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ rig sngags grub pa dang/ rgan po dang/ rgan mo g.yo ga dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod ba rnams

dngas shagi/ 'di ltar rdo 'char ga khaka' thos samyur ba nyid du dengs shig/ gang dag mi 'gro ba de dgan phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i pa zhin 'bar ba can gyi yo shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu 'bar
aA las mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro// zhes lon gsum brjod nas/ stang stabs la gnas bzhin dus gzhi noNi'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gnas brkyang ba dang/ g.yon brkyang
kha dang/ sung go'i 'dug stangs dang/ smug po'i 'dug stangs dang/ ra thun ba'i rkang stabs dang sa yul gyi rkang stabs dang/ rdoNo gdeg bdang/ rdordza'ajo tshul dang/ rkang pa ya gcig gi stangs
dang/ seng ge stabs dang/ seng ge glal ba dang/ bung ba 'phur ba'i stabs dang/ do sgrog dang/ rdordzogasol ba dang/ rdoNi'i sku ra stabs dang/ jorje dgug pa dang/ rdordzogar dang/ rdorje 'jigs su

b.rung ba dang/ rdo rje ro langs ma dang/ rdorje tho ba dang/ rdoN+Da'i byin rlabs dang/ rdo rje'i ba du bu dang/ bu med kyi sgyu 'phrul stang stabs dang/ rdo'i dra ba dang/ stobs po che'i 'degs pa dang/ rdordzamacha
ba dang/ rdorje ba/na mo dang/ rdo sgra dang/ ra la grwa bla bas dang/ rdorje'i thabs dang/ 'khor lo'i thabs dang/ gtun shang gi thabs dang/ ba dan gyi zabs dang/ zhags pa'i thabs dang/ bamAre
tshul dang/ ba con gyi skabs dang/ mi 'jigs pa'i tshul dang/ lcags kyu'i thabs dang/ bkral bu'i tshul dang/ mdung thung gi thabs dang/ gzhu'i thabs dang/ mda' bzung ba'i thabs dang
mda' kha pang ba'i thabs dang/ thog mdung bskor ba'i zabs dang/ mchog sbyin ba'i tshul dang/ mdung gi thabs dang/ mtshon rtsi gag pa'i thabs dang/ phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang/ doNi'i 'a dug
stangs drang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dug stangs dang/ jo skyil mo krung dang/ pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang/ sems dang 'i skyil mo krung dang/ dpa' mo'i 'dug stangs dang/ bzang po'i 'dul stangs dang/
tseg pu'i 'dug stangs dang/ rtse ba'i 'dug stangs dang/ mdun du dgu ba dang/ phyir dbye ba dang/ mtha' yas dang/ rnam par rgyal ba dang/ smin sgra dang/ gsus pa chadang/ rgyal po'i
bur dus gnas pa'i bcing ba dang/ phur bu brdung ba dang/ dra ba dang ra bas mtshams bcad pa dang/ phyogs bcing ba de lta bu s sa gzhi rdo'i rang bzhin 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs par bsgoms te gtan
dal dbab par bya'o// rang gamang nas smos te/ hU~M zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi sgra brjod nas 'khor lo thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur ro// ra nas sa'i lha mo sta gon du ba nas
par bya ban/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod dpang du gyur// dngos grub thams cad thob bya'i phyir// kha dag
las dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas sangs rgyas dang byung chub sems dpa' thams cad lta lo na du gnas par bya ga thugs brtser gnas pa'i dgongs pa can/ sangs
rgyus bdag la dgongs su gsol// sras dang lhan cig gshegs nas kyang// sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar mdzod// de nas 'khor lo'i dbus su spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la// mtha' kun tu yang mtshon

nas smos tethig ler bya'o// de ltar spyan drangs te mchod pas mnyes par byas nas phyir byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sminano/ de nas sems can sta gon du gnas par bya sta sgos chus de bor bsang gtor byas nas//
lag pa snying kar bkram nas su lcomo lnga pa rgya gram bya// g.yas ba srung skud bcings nas su/ lag mthil so shing ku sha spyin/ de nas 'dug ste gsum la skyabs su gtangab dang/ sdig pa kun tu ba shag
pa dang/ bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bdag nyididabul ba dang/ byang chub tunasems bskyed par bya'o// de la 'di ni skyabs su 'gro ba yin te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi//
sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'gro ba'i dag la yi'i nga// sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung// zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas ci nus kyis ci 'dod pa'i chos bshad par bya'o// de nas

sngar rangashad pa bzhin dum zhes par 'gyur ba'i mchod pa'i chog ba drang po bya sta/ slar yang gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ de nas nang du zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhir glo g.yas pa sa nyal tA/ rmi lam bzang

ngan bltas nas phyi de nyid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ tshon dang thig la sangs rgyas lnga'i ngo bo dag kyang sla la bar bya// 'di'i chos dbyings dag pa ste// sems can rnams ni rnam grol mdzod// de ra chen gseg
ba kun gyi gnas// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal bdag so// nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs ba'i// tshon rtsi dgya ba brtsam par bya// dang por slo ba daro na nyid kyis ngagya// de nas kun tu slob mas bya//
dang po sa gzhi yongs gzung ba// gnyis pa sta gon gnas pa ste/ nub gsum pa ni 'jug pa yani// tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu yis// khru stong pa 'am lnga brgya bar// dkyil 'khor dam pa thag ga da ba go/
khang na khru lnga khru do pa 'ag/ khru gang pa la bar du bya'o// zla bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba// rta babs bzhis brgyan pa yi// dbus su 'khor lo'igs par dkyil du rnam par snang mdzod gzhag/
shar phyogs su ni mi 'khrug pa// lho phyogs sun ni chen 'byung/ nub phyogs su ni 'od dpag med// khyang phyogs su ni don grub rnams// 'khor lo'i gar ni lha mo bzhi// dngos grub sbyin par mdzad
bar gi/ dbang bdag gi phyogs suni spyan go/ ma'i phyogs sunimA ma kI'o// bden bral gyis phyogs su ni gos dkar can no// rlung gi phyogs sun lha mo sgrol ma'o// rdoN+Di shugs kyis/

phyir phyur nas rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogs suni rdo rje sems ma/ lhor rdo rje rin chen m/ nub tu rdo rje chos ma/ byang du rdordzalas ma rnams bri'o// ga rnams su skul byed ma dang/ rin chen sgrol ma dang/ khro
gnyer can dang/ rdza lu gu rgyud rnams so// de nas ya ngal gyi de bag tu langs te/ rdo rje shugs kyis phyir phyung nas rim ba gsum pa la shar phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ 'jam dpal

ny+nyo dang/ sos kyi glang bo dang/ mi shes tog rnams bri'o// lho phyogs su bzang skyong dang/ blo gros rgya mtsho dang/ blo gros mi zad pa dang/ slobs pa brtsegs pa rnams bri'o// nub phyogs su ni mthu chen thob

dang/ ngan song thams cad spong ba dang/ mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges bar 'dzoms pa'i blo gros dang/ dra bcan gyi 'od rnams bri'o// khyang phyogs su zla 'od dang/ 'od dang ga med dang/ nam mkha'

mdzod dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sol ba rnams bri'o// gar sgoman gshin rje mthar byed do// lho sgor yi shes rab mthar phyed do/ nub sgor ni pad+mamathar byed do// byang sgor ni bgegs kyi gshed/

mthar byed do// grwa rnams suzhi g.yo ba dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyal bo dang/ brten sngon po dang/ stobs po che'o// zur rnams su'i rdorje bri'o// sgo'i ngan logs su'ang rdorje bri'o// 'khor loni tshon rtsi dkar

bsangos bri'o// gnyis pa ni tshon rtsi dkar po dang/ sa ra ba dang/ sngon po gsum gyis bri'o// gsum pa ni sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor chen po yin no// danas dbang bskur ba'i don du
dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi dang ldan pa rim pa gnyis par bya'o// dbus sun pad 'dab ma brgyad pa snying po dang bcas pa bri'o// snam bu gnyis pa la shar phyogs su na jo'o// lho phyogs su zhi
rin po cha/ nub phyogs su na pad+ma/ byang phyogs su na ral gri ste/ de lta bur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ da nas slob dpon gyi lus legs par bkrus te/ gros kyis bskus nas legs par brgyus pa'i
ma tog gi 'phreng ba mgo la bcings nas/ mgul ba dar gyis bcings pa la// ldum bu gis ni kha bkab pa// rin chen sna na 'byung sna lnga dang// sngos chu yis ni bkang ba dang// bum pa mngon par
bsngags par bya// rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi// bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi// lha rnams kun gyi bum pa bzhi/ las kun byed pas bzlas brjod do// sems can kun gyis bsang
gtor bya// yang na ku la'i chun pos bya// de nas bum pa mngon par bsngags te lha bshos dang gtor ma phul nas ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ mchod yon dang/ zhib
bkru ba la sogs pa dbul lo// de rnams phul nas bum pa rnams grwar gzhag par bya'o// rnam bar rgyal ba'i bum pa ni dbus su spyan drangs par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyal
'khor gyi lha rnams sman drangs nas gsal bar bya ste// gzhug pa dang/ bsdams pa dang/ dbang du bya ste/ phur bu dang/ ra ba dang/ dra bas phyogs bcing ba dang mchin
bcad pa byas la/ mchod yon dang/ zhabs bsal dang/ gdon dang/ ma tog dang/ bdug pa la sogs pa'i ng bsngos te phul nas phyag rgya'i tshogs rang rang la bstan par bya'o// bstod pa dang/
dorje'i glu dang/ dril bu gsil ba'i sgra dang/ sal stan dang/ gling bu dang/ rgyud kyi sgri'i khyad par yang dbul lo// rol mo'i khyad par gzhan rnams kyis kyang ba stod par bya'o// bstod nas bzod par
gsol te dngos grub thoms kyi phyir gsol ba gdab po// de nas slob dngon bdag 'di zhugs te/ de'i 'og tu slob ma gzhug go/ de nas sems can thams cad snying po 'di dang phyag rgyus gnas lngar bsrung

ma zhing gnas lngar tshog bya'o// hUM/ dzin dzika/ oM A ro la ke/ hU~M badzran+d+hika/ sA rat+taMhU~Mka/ tapradz+nyA hU~Mka/ de nas tshigs su ba cad pa 'dis gzhug par bya ste/ rdorje ye shes thob byed pa'i/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// tha brang dkyil 'khor snying po 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya// dosams mas ma tog gtor bar bgyi ste/ pra tIts+tsaM badzra ho/ tshigs su bcad pa
'dis gdong g.yogs 'grol lo// de rari dad pa'i shugs kyis ni// dkyil 'khor deng 'dir blta bar gyis// sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su 'khrungs// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis
sangarlabs// dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs// dam tshig mchog tu grub par byed// jorje par rol pa'i mchog/ sngags kyi bdag nyid khas par bya// de yi snying po 'di yin ta// nga bya badzra/
gang lam tog bab pa de de'i lha yin no// de nas dbang bskyar sbyin bya ste// dri dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// gos dang rgyan gyis legs par brgyan// stong du bla re bre bar bya// gdugs dang rgyal/
mchon bdan dang// lha dang chongs da 'i skud pa dang// gdu bu dag dang ska rags dang// bkra shis yo byad rnams kyis klubs// slob ma sdig dang bral ba la// slob dpon gyisan dbang bskur ro//
dang por rnam rgyal bum pa yis// de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang/ lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po yis// bkra shis tshags bcad glu sgra dang 'jorja hral du gsil ba yis// skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum
du til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i// rgyal ba bum pa bzung nas ni// de nyid la ni dbang bskur bya// dkyil 'khor de nyid rigs par bsam/ 'di lta bur na bsams nas kyang// chos kyi mtshan nyid
bstan par bya// thur ma ma long 'khor lo dang// dung dang rdordza glu gas bam dang// gser dag dang ni dngul rnams kyis// mi shes rab rob la sogs pa/ cinus par ni bsal bar bya// thur ma la
sogs med na yang// phyag rgya'i gzugs rnams bstan par bya// de nas dam tshag bstan par bya// de ring phyin chad bu khyod kyis// srog dang lus la bab gyur kyang// dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sa//
slob dpon lani ban mi bya/ rdordzaskruna rnams bkur sti zhing/ sdang la byams shing chags bral ba// nams kyang bya ba ma yin no// de ltar byas na sangs rgya sa si// khyod ni
dmyal ba'i nang du 'dor// danas bla mas yon blangs// sa dang yid 'ong chung ma dang/ rin chen gsar dang nor bu 'bar/ mu tAgi byu ru la sogs dang// lus kyang dbul du gzhugs par bya// bla ma la

ni gus pa yi// slob mas de bzhin kho nar bya// bla ma danamagu bar bya// kham mgu ba dngos grub kyi// gzhan du min zhes thub pa gsung// de nas slob ma bsang g+ha/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar mchod/
thob bya ste spyan srog gi las bya'o// de nas ta cho ga mthong bas las byas nas// sbyin srag bzlas brjod mchod pa dang/ de bzhin sgom pa'i rami pa'i tshul// zhi dang rgyas pa'i rim pa yis// las rnams
bska thams cad tshim par bya// de nas dus gsum gshegs pa yi// rgyul ba thams cod gshegs su gsol// bsgoms te tshon rtsi rnams bsdus nas// chu klung chen por bskur nas kyang// ba yi lci bas
byug par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun// slob dpon nyid kyis bskur bar bya// slob mas cung zad ma bskur tA// de ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs par//
bdag nyid 'a dod pa spyad par bya// rgyudakyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni dkyil 'khor rim par phyi ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod

jorje de bzhin gshegs pas yang gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i rdorje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas phyag na rdorje la bka' stsal pa/ phyagan rdo gsang/
sngags kyi sAng por yo ga rnams nyon cig/ phyagazhardo rjes gsol pa/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa sa bshad du gsol/
oM las rnam par snang mdzad do// oM hUM// mi 'khrugs pa'i 'o// so/ rin chen 'byung gnas so// oM b+hi/ 'od dpag med do// oM khaM/ don yod grub pa'i 'o// o ga gan le tsa na daM/
sman gyi'o// oM ka ri karaM/ mA ma kI hU~M/ mA ma ki'o// oM ka Ta bi ka To ka TaM ka Ta ka TakI sAhA/ gos dkar mo'igo/ o tAre tut+tA re ture swAhA/ sgrol ma'i 'o// o sa tA badzi/ dedzi soms mi'

so orat+tA paN+DihU/ rdodzarina chen ma'i 'o/ oM d+harma'i u0f97hU~M/ rdorje chos mi' 'o// oM karma badz+dzidaM/ dordzalasama'i 'o// o tsa la tsa le hU~M de swAhA/ skul byed ma'i 'o// oratA le ka rat+tA dzu lin
sAhA/ rin chen sgrol ma'i 'o// oM b+hi kush+tsa/ khro gnyer ma'o// oM badzrakhri kha le hUMphaT sAhA/ rdoN+Da lu gu rgyud ma'i 'o// oM ma/ byams pa'i 'o// oM ma/ 'jam dpal gyi'o// o san b+ha dra huM/
kun tu bzang po'i 'o// o gan da sa ni hUM/ spos kyi glang po'i 'o// o dzAn ke tu po ti hU~M/ ye shes tog go/ o b+ha dra pa ti b+ha dra pA le hU~M/ bzang skyong ngo// oM sA ga re mahAsA ga re hUM/
blo gros rgya mtsho'o// oM A kA ya hU~M hU~M/ ak+ShaakA A karma A pa ra Na pa ri sho d+ha na sAhA/ blo gros mi zad pa'o// oM pra ti b+han pra ti b+ha na ku Ta daM/ spobs pa brtsigs pa'o//

o sprum ma hA spu ma ba ti sAhA/ mthu chen thob pa'o// o saa pA ya dza te sa cha dA paM sho d+ha haM/ ngan song thams cad klong ba'o/ oM sa cha ko ka ta mo ni rnam te daM/ mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges pa ra

'dzoms pa'i blo gros so// oM dzA lon gsA dzA lan daM/ dra ba can gyi 'od do// oM su d+ha na khri yaM kaM/ nor bzang ngo// u0f00 tsan+datsan tsan+d+ra bya ba le ka te swAhI/ zla 'o da do// oM a mr-i ta pra b+ha a ma d+hAhU~M
'od dpag mad do// oM ga ga na ga ga na ba ra lo tsan hUM/ nam mkha' mdzod do// oM sar ni ba ra Na bat+taMb ni hU~M/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o// oM ya mAn+ta krita/ gtan rje gshed do// so
pradz+nyAn krita/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// o pad+ma nA TitaM/ rnamagrin no// oM a mi ta kuN+Dal ba gnakrita/ bdud rtsi thal sbyor ro// oM a tsa la tsAhaM/ mi g.yo ba'o/ saM kaM hU~M/ 'dod

pa'i rgyal po'o// oM nA la daN+Da mahA d+hak+Sha hU~M/ ba con sngon po'o// u0f00 kro d+ha hUM// stobs po tsha'i dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge de dag go/ 'di dag la brten nas ting 'dzin gyi
khyad par las nges par 'byung ba'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag du ma gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad ni lcags kyus spyan drang ngo// byang chub sems dang 'a rnams na doNA'i phyag

rgyas so// rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni rags kyi yum rnams kyis so// khro bo rnams kyi ni zhal gyi phyag rgyas so// bran rnams ni zhags pa'i phyag rgyas so// pho nya rnams n lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so//
de dag la sogs pa na sman drang ba'i sbyor ba'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'din gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ki//de nas bcom ldan 'das

rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdordza' de bzhin gshegs pa ya shes chen po'i stobs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'dirje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa ra zhugs nas/ phyag na rdoT+Thal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to[']
phyag na rdo rje ras sam rtsig pa la sogs pa la brgyugs brnyan bsgrub pa dmags pa gang gis gsang sngags 'chang rnams kyi ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur zhis/ ya shes rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nyid bde blag tu/
thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos da ra gsar sngogs kyi tshogs thams cad kyi dang re 'dzin gsang chen bla na med pa bshad par bya yis nyon cig daoM gyi ye shes kyis bsgrabs pa/
rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad ni// gas rab yongashas rab rgyas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gas mchod// zhi ba thor tshugs cod pa na 'chang// zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ gsar
gyi mdog can phyag drug pa// dang po bsam gtan phyagargyu can// bgrang 'phrang ldan zhing mda' yis brgyan// g.yon gyis lha mo'i nu ma 'dzin// 'khor lo dang ni gzhu thogs shing/ lha rnams byed
[SI VOI , ]/cing khams rnams 'dzag/ 'a ngar ba'i 'od da kyil brgyan pa la// sangs rgyas kun gyi sprin 'a bro ba// rang tu byung zhing legasa' khyud pa// de nyid spyod yul can bsgoms ta
gsang sngags nang gis bzlos brjod bya dade nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rdzogs par byed pa'i yo shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin do// a zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam/ 'jig rten dbang phyug
'od chen bsam// thor tshugs cod pan 'chang ba'i lha// dbu rgyan thams cad mkhyen pas brgyan// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ gtso bo zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra/ zhal gsum spyan
gsum 'bar ba la// phyag drug 'dug stangs bzhi pa can// phyag gnyis pad+ma'i 'jo tshul can// g.yas na bgrang 'phrang rdo rje 'chang// g.yon pas nu ma 'dzin pa la/ ril ba spyi blugs gsum pa ni/
gzugs rnams thams cad 'phro mdzad cing// kun nas 'od zer 'phreng ba can// lag nasa mtshon shor 'jigs 'khrugs pa'i// bgegs 'gyel ba la lta byed pa// de 'dra'i tshig gis lam bsgoms
na ring po mthigs sangs rgyas 'thob// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog yangs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chos kyi rgya la po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zla ba'i gzugs la hU~M zhes bya/ sems kyi
do rje bsgom par bya// mthing shing bzang po lta bu'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rab klubs pa// nod pan la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs// rin chen rnams kyis yongs su brgyan// zhal ras gsum ldan/

smra na gsum pa/ dazhung brad bzhad cing 'jo sgeg can// phyag brgyud kyis ni brgyan pa la/ rdordzi dang por gsar ba dang// gnyis pa na ni ral gri gdangs/ lcags kyu bslang po gsum pa na// bzhi pa yis ni
mda' yang gsor// de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams// de bzhin gnyis pas nu ma 'khyud/ gsum pa nani zhags pa ste// bzhi pa lha rdzas ga zhu yang 'dzin// rol pa'i spubs su legs par bzhugs//
du bzhin sangs rgyas smin gyis 'bar// 'di 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom pa// de yi rdo rje sams bstan zhig/ ring por mi thogs byang chub thob// ga rnams kyi pha rol 'gro// sems can gyi stobs mtha' yas
pa rdzogs par byed pa'i dang nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po rdorje shugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ ga ya bshes las bsgrabs pa/ rin po 'byung ba'i bdag nyid de// zhal ras la/sum ldan spyan gsum pa//
thor tshugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan// bde ba chen po kha dog dmar// ting 'dzin phyag rgya rnam par bzhugs/[” ]/sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas pa sa// phyag g.yasanani rdo rje dang// g.yon pa ran chen
yongs su 'dzin// 'od zer ser po 'thu ba las// rin chen 'byung ba'i sprin chen nam/// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyis/ rin chen char gyis rgyas par byas// rin chen mngon par thob pa'i ma shes

dordzi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// khaM gi ye shes las bsgrungs pa/ don yod rdo rje bsam par bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgya legs bzhugs pa// margad ta yi 'od ltar 'bar// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri dang//
[53 ]@#/ g.yon pa yis ni lcags kyu nyid// sangs rgyas kyi ni spron 'phro zhing/ legs par sgrub par slar yang sdod// 'od zer chen pos rab gsal zhing// ye shes rgya mtsho' 'od dang/
mtshungs/ 'di 'dra rtag tu sams byed pa// nam mkha'i snying po thub pa che/ 'du byed thams cad sbyangs pa yi// mkha' dang mnyam pa de 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snang bar byed pa'i ye shes rdorje zhes bya
pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// la ya ye shes las bsgrubs pa// rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang brgyan// lha mo spun gsum phyag brgyud pa// kho la gsum gser gyi mdog dang mtshungs// sgog pa'i cha lugs legs
'chang ba// cung cha da bzhad pas 'dod chags mo// dang po'i phyag mchog sbyin mdzad// de bzhin gnyis pa mi 'jigs sprin// phyag gsum pa ni rdo rje ste// bzhi pa na nimada' yang gsor/ g.yon pa
sdogs mdzub zhags pa can// rin chen snya ma gnyis pan// gsum pa nan bgrang 'phrang sa/ khazhi pa la zhu yas legs par brgyan// 'od dmar 'od zer 'phreng ba can// lha rnams 'jigs pas sams myos
ta/ lag bzal mo sbyor bas byed// sangs rgyus rnams kyi sprin la bro bar// ye shes sde skya nam bam/ khyur chub yan lag 'bras brgyan pa'i// lha mo 'di 'dra ba sgom par bya// ye shes spyan
gyis snang bar byed pa'i rdoNi 'aN+Datshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ma yi la shes las bsgral ba// rto gin can nA ma kI// lhamo zhal gsum phyag drug ma// dgodacing zhalaras khro dang bcas/
ut+pal sngon po 'di mdog 'dra ba// 'od dmar yon tu ba bar ba can// dang po ma 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag/ gzhas pa legs par rdo rje bsdams// gsum pa yisanamada' yang gsol// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i
mdzum mo ste// gnyis pa zhags pa legs par bsnams/ gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin// dordzogs can ma sku gsum 'chang// dngos med ngo bo mtshan nyid can// sangs rgyus kyi ni mi na 'phro ba// 'di 'dra

sgom pas bsgom par bya'o// sgyu 'phrul kha byung ba'i stobs kyi ya shes zab mo zhes bya ba'i dang nge 'dzin to// kha yi ma shes las bsgrubs pa// zla ba'i mdog dang ldan pa'i yum// ming ni gos dkar can zhes
bya// spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan// zhal ras gsum pa dga' mdzad m// phyag drug ma 'jigs sbyin mdzad ma/ gnyis ba nani rdoNoska// gsum pa ma 'a yis rnam bar brgyun/ g.yon/
pa pad+ma bsnams par bya// ga nas pan ni bgrang nor 'phreng// gsum pa na ni gzhu bsnams shing// rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs// sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'bro bar mdzad// pa'i sprin

gyis rgyas pa ra bsgom// gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/ rin chen skur na bsgom par bya// padi'i gzugs kyis 'jo tshul sangs rgyas kyis rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes rdordzazhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/
da ya la shes las bsgrabs pa lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul che// 'ango sgog tshalugs la gnas pa// zha la ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil mo krung// bzhad pa margad 'od dang
ldan// dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag// gnyis pa na ni rdo rje bsnams// gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sngags pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa na ni ut+pal
'ad/ gsum panan gzhu yang 'dzin// 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba can// sangs rgyas 'phro bas rgyus mdzad pa/ dwaga' mdzod sems can kun gyi ma// rtag par rgyun du bsgom par bya// sems can thamA
cad dbang du 'gro zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// skyes mchog rgyal bas gsungs pa yi// sems ma bzhi ni brjod pa'i ming// sems ma dang ni rig chanam/ chos ma
ny+nyo roN+Dalas ma so/ rol pas rjes su mnyes mdzad ma// de dag ji ltar rigs par sgom// de dag kyang na bsgoms pa yis// ring por mi thogs byang chu ba klong// sems can rab tu dga' byed pa'i//
'apa gas ma bzhi yi ting 'dzin to// tsug yi ga las bsgrubs pa// ming nistsal byed ces ma'i gzugs// sku gsum rgyal ba bye ba phug/ bdun gyis gsang sngags glu yis bstod/ yi ge dgu pa
thabs dgu can// lha dgu rnams kyi gnas kyang yin// zhal gsum ston ki'i 'dam bu mdog rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ na chung skal ldan dar la bab// rig sngags thams cad sgrol
mdzad ma// dang po'i zhal ni cung zad tsam// bzhad cing spyan gsum ldan pa ste// g.yas kyi zhal ni rnam gdangs pa// ut+pal sngon po 'dang me'i 'od// mche ba zla ba tshes pa bzhin// lce ni glog
bzhin lci ba par mdzad// g.yon pa kha dog dmar bo ste// tshoms kyis sgros ni rnam par mnan/ rol ba'i stabs su legs par bzhugs/ gdu bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i phyag zhi shu rtsa drug
la phyag gnyis rtsa ba'i phyag rgyus snying ka'i gnas rnam par brgyan pa'o/ gags pa gnyis pa ma 'jigs pa smin pa'o// gsum pa na ral gri'o// bzhi pan rin po che smin pa'o// lnga ba na shing
thog 'i dza du ra/ drug pan mda' gsol ba'o/ khadun ba na dgra lta'o/ khargyud panadabyug to'o/ dgu pan tho ba'o// bcu pa na lcags kyu'o// bcu gcig pan jo'o// bcu gnyis
pa nas gol ga tog bko/ bcu gsum lan bgrang 'phreng go g.yon pa gzhis pan yadi bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no gsum pan padA'o// bzhi pa na ril ba spyi blugs so/ lnga pa na zhags
pa/ drug pa na gzhu'o// bdun pa na mdung thung ngo// brgyadapan 'khor lo// dag pa na rlung ngo/ bcu ba na sdigs pa'i mdzub mogo/ khacu gcig pa na bum pa bzung ngogro/ bcu gnyis
ban thag mdung ngo khacu gsum pa zhes bgyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ khod we dmaralo dkyil 'khoran// khar kha bzhugs bsgom par bya// la yi zhing dung bsgos pa laM/ g+hong du bla
gos gyon pa ste// sna tshog satsheg gu na bzar gsol// tsho'aphrul rnam pa sna tshogs dang// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugasa'aphro// sum cu'i lha rnams khyur ba dang/ khagegs rnams shin tu
'jigs skrag par// thal mo sbyor bar byed pa ste// 'di 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom zhing// bsgoms nas gsang sngags brjod pa des// sangs rgyas nyid du thob 'gyur na//
dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig gos// ting 'dzin ngo bo thob 'gyur zhing// sdig pa kun las rnam par 'grol// rgyal ba mtha' yas pa'i e shes skul bar byed pa'i stobs kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin to/ rayi ya shis las bsgrubs pa/ rin chen sgrol ma zhes bya'i gzugs// zhal sa gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag drug gsar gyi mdog dang ldan/ na chung dar la bab ra'i
zla chod// zholan cung zad bzhad pa ste/ phyagani rin chen gdu bus gtams// phyag gnyis rin chen thal mo si/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'phreng ba 'khrug/ g.yas nga 'i phyag na mi 'ja gas sbyin/
gsum pa mdu'i ni rnam par gsor// g.yonamadzub ma rungs rnams las sogs// gsum pa yis ni ga zhu yang 'dzin// 'od zer dmar po legs par 'bar// rol sta bas thabs kyi 'bras kyis

gnon// sa ngas rgyas sprinani 'phro zhing sdud// chos 'dzin yid du 'ong ba yi// lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rin chen sprin gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
b+ha ya la shes las bsgrubs pa// 'jig sa las sgrol ba khro gnyer can// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// phyag drug par u0fb1la pa zhugs pa// rol pa'i
stangs la brtson pa sku// zhal ni khro dang bcas par bzhad// legs par 'bar ba'i rtser lha can// g.yas pa'i phyagan rdo rje ste// gnyis pa brtson 'dzin par bshad// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsog
g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo can// gnyis pa li ba spyi blugs bsnams// gsum pa nani mtshon cha gzhu// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngun 'phro zhing// de bzhin gzhan dag legs sdud pa'i// nyal dang

'gre nga dang 'dug pa dang/ lha mo 'di 'dra rtag tu bsgom// 'jigs pa thams cad dmigs pa med par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hU~Mgi ga shes las bsgrubs pa ming ni rdo rje lu gu
rgyud// thams cad 'chang ba bskyod pa ste// soms can ma rungs phung bar byed// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum ga phyag drug sngo bas gzugs bzang ma// zhal nicung zad bzhad par mdzod// lag pa
g.yas na rdorje ste// gnyis pa rdorje lu gu rgyud// gsum pa nani mda' yang bstsams// g.yon kha snogs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa na ni zhags par gsungs// gsum pa gzhu yang thogs par brtson//

sangs rgyas rnams ni spyin 'bro ba// rdo rje lu gu rgyur bsgoms na// byang chub skad cig gis 'thob// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ 'jorje slog gi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mi
gi ye shes las bslabs pa// thub pa'i skyes mchog ca mas pa ni// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// de yi 'og na padag+ho/ sems dpa'i dkyil mo krung du bzhugs// phyag bzhi dag gis rnam par brgyan//
phyag gnyis chos 'chad phyag rgyas brgyan// g.yas pa yi ni phyag gnyis pa/ sems can skyob pa mchog sbyin mdzad// g.yon pa lha rdzas klu shing gi/ ma tog za 'bru'i mgo lcogs bsnams//

sas rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// sprinachan de bzhin 'phro bar mdzad// byams pa'i stobs kyi shes kyis rdo rje rnam par brgyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// tshu gyi ya shes las bsgrubs pa// gzhon nu 'jam pa
tshig gi lam// shes rab ye shes mchog thob pa// khrab mo tshulani ston pa po// zhal gsum spyan gsum zur phud gsum// gzhonanu rgyun gyis brgyan pa ste// cod pan bzang po mi 'khrugs can// me tog sna
tshogs rnams kyis klubs// 'og na pad+ma chen po la// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// 'jo sgrig thabs kyis rol pa ste// zhal na cung chad bzhad pa la// dpa' bo chen po phyag drug pa// dang po ma
'jigs sbyin par bya// gnyis pa nan ral gri nyid// gsum po nani mda' yang gsor// de bzhin g.yon pa shes rab 'chang/ gnyis pa ni ut+pal thogs// gsum pa nani gzhu nyid do// shes rab legs

mchog gis klubs// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin gyi bsnams// 'phro bar sangs rgyus 'dod pas bsom/ ]'jam pa mchog gi shes rab dang ye shes kyi roN+Di snang ba zhes bya ba'i taMng nge 'dzin to// spos kyi gung

po ya shes tog/ de bzhin dun bzang skyong dang// blo gros rgya mtsho blo gros ni// mi zad pa dang spobs brtsegs nyid// ngan song kun slong mthu chen thob// mya ngan kun mun 'joms pa'i blo// nor bzang dang ni dra
ba'i 'od// de bzhin zla 'od 'od dpag med// nam mkha'i mdzod dang sgrib kun sel// de ltar rdo sogs grangs med pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa kun// sa bon yig 'bru rnams las 'khrungs// sa ga

phyag rgyu'i sbyor ba can// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// sna tshogs thabs kyis rol par mdzod// byang chub sems dpa' 'di yi rgyu// gsang sngags zlos par bsgom par bya// mdog ldan 'du tshwang ra phro mdzang pa

rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsam// hU~Mg yi shes las bsgrubs pa// gzi brjid ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi// gshin rje'i dgra zhes rnam grags pa// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste// char sprin gyi ni 'od dang/

'dra// zhal drug pa la phyag drug pa// de bzhin zhabs drug mi'u thung 'dra// gsus khyam shin tu che ba ste// denaM drag po chen po yin// ljags 'dril rdoN+Dimache ba can// sbrul gyi rgyun gyis brgyan pa ste//
stag lpags kyi ni sham thabs bgos// rol pa'i stabs can ma de bcibs// de yi 'og tu pad byas/ mi thod 'phrang can ska 'khyil ba// agatsom sar la sgra chen 'byin/ mgo yi steng nam 'khrug sa pa//
sku gsum la ni rnam par bzhugs// 'jam pa'i dpal gyis rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad// g.yas pa lcagasan 'dril ba ste// g.yon pa'i tshems kyis sgos mnan khro// g.yas pa'i
phyag na ral gri ste// gnyis pa nani jorje nyid/ gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis na nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa gzhu ni bdungs pa yis// gzhi
tu legs par rnam par brgyan/ lha mo yis ni g.yas nas 'khyud// gnyis panani ut+pal thog/ g.yon pa zla ba ltar snang ba// pad+ma dkar po thogs par bya// 'og tu lha dang bgags
kyi rnams// sngar ma byed nas phyug kyang 'tshal// 'od zer dmar po 'bar dang bcas// sangs rgyas sman rnams 'phro zhing snad// rnal 'a byor ngag gi sgo nas su// bsgoms nas gsang sngags bzlas pa de//
zla 'dug dang nyal dang 'chag pa na// legs par bsams te kun zos shing// 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod kyang// nam mkha' lta bur gos mi 'gyur// gshed byed thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i ye shes
jorje gshin rje gsod pa'i 'dul ba 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pra yi ye shes las bsgrags pa// khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ phyag drug gis ni rnam par/
brgyan// mdog sar ma 'u thung gzugs can la// 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can// par la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa la// dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ de bzhin
g.yas pa rnam par bsgyur// g.yon pa tshams kyis sgros kyang mnan// sna tshogs tshul gyis 'bar ba ste// lag pa g.yas pa rdoN+Di thogs// gnyis pa nani dbyug pa ste// gsum pan ni mda' yang thogs/
g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yasaninu ma 'dzin// gsum pa gzhu can yin par gsungs// spyi bo'i steng na mi 'khrugs pa// rim bzhin 'phro zhing stad pa ste/ 'di 'dra goms ]
[j]ras bsgom par bya// zlos pas sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tshong nge 'dzin to// rayi a shes las bsgrubs [' ] par ma
zhal sa gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ kha dog dmar po phyag brgyud spyan// skun sbrul gyis dkris pa ste// pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs/ khro bo lta bas gabrigs mdzad nga// dang pa ra hU~M rnam
bzhad// g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste// g.yon pa chems kyis sgros mnan pe// stag lpags gsol zhing khro ba la// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo ji ste// gnyis pa ni smyug to pa su/
na lcags kyu ste// bzhi pa nani mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa yis ni num 'dzin// gsum panani pad+ma ste// bzhi pan na ga'u 'ir do// de [$]
'khrugs pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni mang po dag 'phro zhing 'du bar bsdoms byas na// 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min// rta mchog gi yashes rdorje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ ( ge ya25 ka
