bsgrubs pa// mang ni khro bo bgegs kyi gshed// mi yi dkyil bzhugs sgrub pa sbyin// lag na rdo rje'i rjes 'brangs pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// bgegs rnams 'dzoms mdzod
drug can// dang po'i zhal ni gzhad pa ste// de bzhin g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pa// g.yon patshems kyis sgros mnan khro// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra'i mdog zhabs kyis bge san mnan
dpa ste// gnyis pa pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs// g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri ste// gzhus pa nani dgra ltar gsungs// gsum pa yi ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub
zhags pa can// de bzhin gnyis pa nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa nan gzhu yang gsungs// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bar// ye shes mkhas pas bsgom par bya// bag gas rnams thams cad 'dral
ba'i yo shes kyi ros rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hU~M ga yashes las lasnabs pa// ma ga yo bus pa'i gzugs dang ldan// zhal ras gsum pa spun gsum pa// gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis
brgyan pa la// dang bo zhal ni bzhad pa ste// de yi g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pas// khrag gis ban ba'i lcags kyang 'dril// g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro// aMgs snying ka'i phyogs kyang bka'

mthon kun gyi ni mdog can te// rin chen ra stongs par sprul// rol pa'i zhapas kyi stabs su bzhugs// thub pa bgegs kyi chu 'dzing 'joms// phyag drug 'bar ba 'phro ba yi// 'od bzang dmar po'i dkyil 'khor
na/ dgayas pa'i phyag na ral gri ste// gnyis pa nani jorjer gsungs// gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor// g.yon pas sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni num 'dzin// gsum pa gshuni bdungs

ba la// chang pas bzung ste lta ba dang// sna tshogs me tog gis bcings pa'i// cod pan dang ni dbu rgyan thogs// zur phud g.yon pa khung ba'i mdog/ mi 'khrugs pa yis rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas rang bzhin

sprin dag gis// cho'aphrul chen po du ma 'phro// de ltar rtag tu rnal 'byor gang// sgom pas sgom par byed pa de// bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi// khrom skas la ni 'dzog par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa mi g.yo ba'i ye shes rdordza bsgrungs pa zhes bya ba' ting ngeng 'dzan do/ hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ ming ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste// zhal ras gsum pa spun gsum pa//

byam drug pa zhes bya bar bsgrags// dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i// thor tshugs rtsom na ba bring po can// dang po'i zhal ni btsad pa la// g.yas ba yis ni rnam par bsgyur// ga yon pa tshom kyis
sgos mnan khro// dpral ba khro gnyer rami la can// 'bar ba char sprin lta bu'i mdong/ dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba can// phyag gnyis 'dod pa'i phyag rgyar ldan// gang pa nani rjer gsungs/ gsUm pa
mda' yis rnam par rol// g.yon nga las ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa'i phyag na gzhu yang bsnams// par la khazhugs rol pa'i thabs/ 'og tu bag kyang rnam par mnan/ sangs rgyas lang long kha phro rnapa/

dang nge 'dzin gyis bsgom byas na// bla na med pa'i ye shes 'thob// snying thams cad 'gugs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo tshe rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya dang nga 'dzin to// hUM gi sha sa 'a sa bsgrubs pa/ kho /
po can// zhal ras gsum pa spun gsum pa// phyag drug gis ni rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni 'jo sgeg nad de bzhin g.yas pa rnam da ra gdangs// g.yon pa tshoms kyis spros kya 2
chu 'dra ba ste// lus ni sbrul gyis rnam par brgyan// sa tshogs lcang lor 'khyil ba ste// dbu rgyan la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs// bdal bzhugs rol stabs can// g.yas pa'i phyagan rdo
sa/ dganyis pa na ni be chen nyid// gsum pa mtshon cha mda' dang ldan// g.yon pa sngags mdzub zhags pa ste// gnyis pa yis nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa ni gzhu nyid bsnams// dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar

pa can// sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis bskrun pa'i// sangs rgyas sprinani rtag tu 'gro// bags kyis rtogs pa'i ye shes rdoN+Dis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin to/ daM zhes gsungs pa'i khro bo ni// ya shes

paN+NaM dam pa stobs po che// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag brgyud kyisani rnam par brgyan// sngon gyi kha dog 'dra ba ste// sbrul gyi brgyun gyis rnam par brgyan// mig dmar sku 'bar gyen du brdzes//
mgo bol 'khrugs bzhugs// dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad// de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs// g.yon ba choms kyis sgos mnan te// par la bzhugs 'gyong bag can// drag pa'i chemarngam
stang stabs can// phyogasalatsu'i lhan ms phung bar mdzod// 'bar ba rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nang na bzhugs// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdorje ste// gnyis pa be con thogs
bar mtshon// gsum pa yisan ral gri gdengs// bzhi pa mda' yis rnam par brgyan// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pon ni tho ba nyid// phyag

0 bzhi pa ni ga zhu can la// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro ba// sgom pa mchog gis bsgom par bya// gnol ba med pa'i ye shes rdordza'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nga' dzin to// hUM gi ye
shes las bslabs pa// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ste// sku gsum ldan pa zhal ras gsum// gser gyi mdog can 'od bzang ba// 'dom gang 'od kyis rnam par brgyan// ting 'dzin phyag rgyar rnam por
gnas// rin chen ri stengs pad la// rdorje skyil mo krung du bzhugs// rigs kyi yuman bzhi po rnams// gzugs dang yan lag kun mdangs can// zhal ras 'jo sgrig tshul gyis brgyan// gos dang rgyan gyis

klubs pa ste// chags phyir spro ba'i rtsol ba can// phyag rgya rin chen sna ma dang// rdo rje pad ut+pal ldan// lha mo so so'i phyogs na bzhugs/ gtsug tor 'od zer lnga pa can// kun tu 'khor lo'i 'phreng
ba dang// 'khor lo'i bar na rdo rje gnas// 'od zer 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bas/ nam mkha' thams cad 'gengs par mdzad// byang chub sAng po don gnyer

bas// 'di 'dra 'khor lo can bsgom zhing// bsgrims nas rnal 'a byor bsgoms pa yis// ring po ma thogs 'dod pa 'thob// byang chub snying po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya pa'i dang nge 'dzin to//
dza gyi yi shes las bsgrubs pa// gnod sbyin gnod gnas sku gsum can// zhal ras gsum pa phyag gnyis na// bI dza pu ri ne'u le can// padA'i la/ dan la bzhugs pa'i m// yang na barmang po' 'i dug sbyangs
gnas/ dngos na rgyan rnams thams cad kyis// brgyan pa'i gnod sbyin o bzhi dag/ rin chen charapa 'bebs par byed// mgo bo'i steng na sangs rgyus lnga// de yi cod pan bzang
po yA// g.yon phyogs rtse phran rgyan yang chags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi smin 'phro zhing// rin chon char pa ra phebs par mdzad// gang zhig nor rdzas 'dod pa yis// gnod gnas 'di 'dra bsgoms byas na//

de yis sa chen mor rdzas kyis/ rang por mi thogs gang bar 'gyur// lagan rdoN+Dis bdur rtsi yi/ chu ang drug tu 'bul bar bya// rin po che smin sbyin pa'i char 'bebs pa'i yashes kyi roNi zhes bya ba'i tang

sgyu nge 'dzin to// ma yi yashes las bsgrubs pa'i// nyima'i 'od ltar 'od tsher can// rta bdun ldan pa'i shange nga pa zhugs ka/ 'a bar ba'i lag 'khyor snang mdzod pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum ldan//

phyag drug kha dog ser por h+phung// phyogs bcu bsrung bar brtson pa ste// 'jo sgeg tshul du nyal yang bzhad// na chung rgyanani g.yo ba kun// cod pan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga// thor tshugs ma tog rnams kyis
'kha brgyan// g.yas pa'i lcagan jorje ste// gnyis pa nanikhab skud bsnams// gsum pananamada' yang gso ra// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa a shA'i yal ga ste// gsum pan na
gzhu nyid do// gzugs brnyan mang po 'phro ba yis// sdong po'i sems can bting ba dang// mgi dang khani 'jug par byed/ gsang sngags bzlas brjod 'bad pa dag/ gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na//

lha mo yA mdzad bsgom par bya// 'di ni sgom par byed pa yin// dbang du sems can rab tu 'a gro/ spang ba rnams kyisami tshugs par byed pa'i rdo rje mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinati/ nga yi ye shes las
bsgrubs pa'i// rig pa'i ri khrod shang lo can// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// zhal ras bzhad cing khro dang bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// na chung gzhon nu phyag drug ma//
g.yes pa'i phyugan jorje ste! gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid/ gsum pa mda' yang rnam par gsor/ g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa shing lo'i bam po ste// phyag gsum pa na gzhu
nyid do// thor tshugs ma tog 'phreng bas brgyan// de steng kha dog lnga po dag/ jab tu 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/ mdog ser pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// dkyil 'khor dmar po cher 'bar
bad dakhro bo' sprin 'phro sdud mdzad cing// gnod gang spyod dgu'i nang gnas pa// de dag khro ba'i mas kyang grog// phyir yang bsags nas sangs rgyas kyis// kha rog bdud rtsi char 'bebs mdzad
de 'dra rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms nas// mi ngas thams cad zhi bar mdzod// nar thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdoNi 'apar bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dza yi yashes las bsgrubs pa//
rig sngags mtsho ni dug sel ma// sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs kacan// nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa ste// zhal ras gsum paspyan gsum pa// gzhon nur mtshan ni 'bar ba can// bzhad cing [H]
khro dang bcas pa ste// sbrul gyi ska rags dag gis brgyan// phyag drug rol pa'i stang stabs can// mag yi steng na mi 'khrugs bzhugs// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste//
gnyis pa ral gri thogs par brtson// phyag gsum pa ni gar thabs kyis// stang stangs tshul gyis mda' yang gsol// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa drug gi me tog can// phyag
gsum pa ni ga'u nyar ro// dbu rgyan me tog rnams kyis brgyan// gser mdog pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'od ni dmar po dkyil 'khor can// dza rnams 'phro bas bskor ba ste// kun nas 'bar b rnamA
kyis khebs// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'a bro ba can// phyag bzang bum pa zla 'dra ba'i// kha na dza yis rnam brgyan pas// dug gis phog pa rnams la lcags// rtag tu sku gsum dug sel ma//

maN+Da/ dug gas phog pa rnams la bsgom/ de ltar bsgom pa byas pa yis// ring por mi blogs byang chub 'thob// nyon mongs rnams kyi dug sel ba// gdengs ka'i dbang po doN+Di ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i
teng nge 'dzin to// trayi a shes las bsgrubs pa// sku chen ha la bul sta/ zhal ras gsum pa can gsum pa// blor tshugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan// klu batshos pa bsnams pa'i lha// dbu rgyan
thod pa dag gis brgyan// thor tshugs rgyal po'i sku gzugs bzhugs// rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// pad+ma dkar po lta bur snang// sems stobs ldan pa'i 'jo tshul can// phyag brgyad zhal yang
0 bzhad pa ste// smad g.yogs stag gi phags pa mnabs// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdorje ste// gnyis pa bgrang nor 'phreng ba can// gsum pa yas ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa pad+mas rnam par brgyan[']
gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do// g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa la/ sbrul gyis yongs su dkris pa ste// g.yon na thod pa dri zhim pa'i/ ma tog sna tshogs kyis bkang ba//
par dmar po la bzhugs pa// rol pa'i stang stabs tshul du gan/ zhi chen ri phug nang bzhugs par// rnal 'byor sems dpas bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rang bzhin gzugs dang ni// cho 'phrul chen
bo sna tshogs 'byung// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis// kha thas thams cad bskyed cing/ nang gis sngags pas sngags brjod cing// rim bzhin rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na// byang chub myur du thob
'gyur zhing// bla na med pa'i bde ba 'a dran// 'dod pa thams chad ka ma nga/ phal pa la sum ka par byed pa'i yashes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sa yi ya shes las bsgrubs pa/
stong chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa'i// lha mo nad kun 'phrog ma sta// sdang ba'i sems can 'joms mdzod ma/ phyag stong ldan zhing dbu stong la// smyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan// nga rtsan chen phyag
brgyad khro ba dang/ stag pa'i 'thabs kyis dbakongs pa can// phyag ba yas mas sgyu lha rdzas kyi/ ral gri lcags kyu mda' dang ldan// phyag g.yon pado roN+Nanor// zhags pa gzhu dang sta re can//
mdog dmar zhal ras bzhi pa ste// bgegs stong 'joms par mdzad pa yin// rang gi rnal 'byor la brtson pas// nam mkha'i mthar gtugs 'jug cung smra// glang po rta
dang skyes pa dang// zla bar mdzad ma 'phreng ba can// de yi las kyis bskul ba yi/gsang sngags dpa' bos gdon par bya// rnal 'byor dbang phyug las 'dod pas// 'di byas pas ni srung bar 'gyur//

dpung chen po la rnam par lta ba thams cad srung ba stobs kyi mchog stong chen po rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge ra dzin to// hU~M zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i sdigs pa'i
mdzub mo'i phyag rgya can drag mo chen mo zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum dang phyag brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa la// ral gri dang/ gtun shing dang/ 'khor lo dang/ mda' bstsams pa/ mdung rtse ba sum pa
dang/ rdoNA dang/ gzhu dang/ chom rkun mdzub mas sdigs pa ste// rdorje ro langs 'byung ba dag/ mthong bas dang nga rnams bcom gtor pas// lha mo rtag tu bsgoms nani// ring por mi thogs byung
chub 'thob// 'a jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms pa la mkhas pa mchog gi rtse mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pra yi ya shas las bslabs pa// stobs mo che pha rol gnon par mdzang ma snyan
gsum dang phyag brgyud kyis rnam par brgyan pa// phyag g.yas na ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang/ mdung rtsa gsum pa dang/ mda' dang/ phyag g.yon na rdoN+Di dang/ zhags pa dang/ dgra sta dang/
gzhu bsnyams pa dang/ sdang ba'i bgags rnams ltung bar mdzad par bya'o// bu mi 'tsho dang mo gsham dag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcug nas su// lha rnams kun gyi bum pa yase// slob dpon
gyis ni dbang bskur zhing// de yi mngal du byas pa ni// 'jam pa'i gzugs can 'jug par bsam// zhugs pa'i phyag rgyas mtshan ngananas// skyes pa gzugs can 'byung ba dang/ dran pa yis//
ni bral nas kyang// mngal ni bsod nams dag gis sprul// mngal thams cad rnam par lta ba so sor 'brang ma'i yo shes kyis rnam da ra rgyal ba'i rdo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// kha ye ye saral pas/
bskrun// lha mo nor gyi blo gros ma// gzi byin gser gyi mdog can la// phyag drug lang tsho dar la bab// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// 'jo sgrig thabs bcas 'bar ba ste/ da ye phyag g.ya/
mchog sbyin mdzad/ gnyis pa 'bru ya swA ma can// gsum pa yos nimada' ya nga gsor// phyag g.yon yid bzhin nor bu dang// rin chen char 'babs gzhu yang 'dzin// grogs mo'i spyi bos yongs
bskor cing// mngag gzhug gnod sbyin mo yi gzugs// rin chen char pa 'babs pa dang// nor kun gyi ni char pa dag 2lobs par byed pa bsam par bya// nor gyi blo gros chen mo 'daM// da ltar
sngags pas bsgoms na de// dpag tshad bdun ni rgyas par yang// nor gyi char gyis khyab par mdzod// byang chub sbyin mchog dam pa na// de ltar rnal 'byor bangag [?]da sgom/ nor gyi rgyan gyi cha
rab tu 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdorje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// kha yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// srin mo 'bar ba'i glog 'phreng can// mang ni dngul dkar las skyes/
mod d+hastobs mo che la pha rol gnon// gsus 'phyang mo la mchogatsagasam// ska sar mo 'am kham pa gyen du brdzes pa// thor tshugs dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ spyi bo la mi 'khrugs pa bzhugs/
ba/ haphyag bco brgyud pa/ mgo bcu gnyis pa/ snun gsum gsum can/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba dang ldan pa/ drag mo la gan khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa thogs pa/ smad g.yog sang ga'i
klu pags pas g.yogs da/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/ ral gri dang/ lcags kyu dang/ 'khor lo dang/ gtun shing dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ dril bu dang/ ba dan dang/
ltag dbyug dang/ mdung dang mchog sbyin pa dang/ gzhu dang/ mda' dang/ mdung thung dang/ ba con dang/ zhags pa dang/ dgra sta dang/ tho ba thogs pa/ lus kyi rgyun thams
cad kyis brgyan ba/ mdog gnag pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la rol pa'i stabs su bzhugs pa/ sdong ba dang 'dul ba zhes brjod pa 'di lta bu/ rtag tu hU~M gis hU~M mdzad pa// brgyus brjod yang
dag ldan par bsgom// sems can kun don tshogs pa yi// byang chub ring por mi thogs 'thob// sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i mchog ring byang chub kyi snying por rnam par rgyal ba'i
stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ kI zhes bya bas bsgoms pa'i gzugs/ rgyun rnam kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ na chung gzhon nu 'jo tshul can// mgo bo skra tshugs phyad du gzung//
de bzhin du ni stod g.yogs kyang// la dkar song ba bgos pa ste// de la kha dog lnga pa yi mo tog 'phul ba rnams kyis brgyan// gser gyi mdog can bzhin 'dzum pa/ pyad bzung
bas ni rnam par rol// dpag bsam shing gis brgyan pa yi// rin chen ri la legs par bzhugs// 'jam pa'i khro bo rdorje yas// de yi mgo bo mnan nas bzhugs// tha ma thog thag
gnod sbyin mos// nam mkha' gang bar bsgom par bya// gnod sbyin mo thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ 'asngab/sa la a A/ hU~M/ yi ga gsum pa mig gsum gzug/
khyab 'jug lha chen ma po ste// gdong gsum rang gi mtshon thogs la// roNi hU~M mdzad kyis bskul cing/ do ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na// mod la dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten
thams cad grub pa mag gsum rnam par rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tang ngo 'dzin to// gzhan yang gsang sngags yi ge yi/ sa bon gang gis sbyar byas te/ 'jorje yag 'bru rnams bsgoms sa
de dag ma bsgrims bzhin du sgrub// 'thog ma 'phrog byed las skyes pa'i// bun lnga brgya po rnams dang// lnga rtse na dang ni dpalo can ma// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// rgyud kyirgyal po/
sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rim par bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'dasa rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs
bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la zhi khar lta ba rdul dang bral ba'i mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum las sna tshogs

kyi ye shes bskyod par mdzad pa 'di dam tshig gsum gyi rdoT+Talas byung ngo// o b+ha ga ba ti ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsan sarma a sA rdzu ni sAhA/ de nas las thams cad rab tu rdzogs par byed pa
'di gsungs datsam gyis/ sangs rgyas rnams na thams cad dang// byang chub sams dpa' mkhas rnams dgyas// bdudakyi dpung rnams 'a nas 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rdorta chos par byed// zhi ba
sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum// rdo rje dmatshig gis bsul na/ sha ba rnams la sgrog sbyin mdzad// ma grub pa rnams grub par stsol// da nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po

rdo rjed bzhin gshegs pa sku gsum rdo rje 'bar ba'i mcho ga dmatshag rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje chang mchog thams cad bskyod ba'i yum rdo rti dkyil 'khor thams

cad kyi dngos grub zamacad rab tu sgrub par byed pa 'di phyung ngo// u0f00 shrI kare/ An+ti ka ri glu Ta spu Ta spu Tin glu ta ya g+ha ta ya h+phu Teni sAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje gsum las skyes gyur pa//tham

cad kyi ni mig phya nas// jo ts+tsha shugasani rjes dran gyur sgrub pa thams cad srung mdzad ma// de bzhin las rnams sgrub pa yi// sAg pa thams cad 'joms ma ste// zhi dar rgyas dang 'phel mdzad ma'o//de nas

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snanga mdzad kyis 'dod chags chen pos nyen pa pad garagyi stang stabs zug kyis rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par 'thor ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyomA par zhugs s//

chos tham cad 'dzin pa mchog gi yum 'di rdo rje gsum rnams las phyungango// oMka rnga bka Tani kaT ka [”]gat+taDi sA/ de nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan mchog/ dam pa 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// dang nge 'dzin gyi sog

bya nas// rdo rjes d+ha rjes dran byed// rgyas pa chen po yum yin te// chos mdzod ga par 'tshal mdzad ma// pasmims tshang bstan te 'khrus brjod na// rgya cher srung bar n dzad pa yin// de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis khag cad dbang du bya ba khong du chud pas rdo rje gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pas zhugs nas// ye shes la 'jug par byed pa sna tshogs

yacad 'chang ba'i yum gyi sgrol ma 'di gsungs so// oM tA re tut+tar chu ra sAhA// da nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun dang sras kyis rnams// spyan bya rnam par gdangs nas su//la shes rdo rje
ldan pa dran// lha mo bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis// skye dgu rnams ni mngag gzhug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi mchog gi ye shes la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// 'di rdorje ra/sum las phyung ngo/ de nam sa man bud+d+hA naM / oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sacha dultas tA dam ka a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA shA hasU/

tsa tur mu ka kha/ tsa tur b+hu dze/ 'byAr Na/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sarba dusU pA/ a pa ha ri Ni/ mahA b+hAgi g+ha ta ka/ bi kr-i ta Anan/ sarba b+hu ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ Ab+hUt+tA hA/ san din/ byu g+hA tsarman dA/

san/ ku ru ku ru/ sacha kacha Ni/ tsan+da ts+tshin+da/ sarba man na/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ pa ra mu drun/ A karA ya/ A kar ya/ sa rA b+hU tan/ tha ma tham/ nirma thanaMrmatha/ sarma du'u/ pra desha ma pra be sha ya/
maN+Da la ma skye ba bshAta/ dzI pi tAn kar/ ku ru kuru/ mam kAr+ya/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi laM bamA bi laM ba/ sa ma ye mnu smar/ hUM/ phaT phatwA/ ba so Na ya ba so Ta ya/ sarba nAyahA
ya ri rI/ ka ra ka ra/ bsnyen sarma A sha ba ri pU ra ka/ red de b+ha ga ban/ ki+i rA ya si ma ma sarba arAsA d+ha ya swAhA/ de nas khro bo bodri gsungs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems mkhas kun//
banar zhing 'jigs pa skyes gyur nas// gtso bo rdo rnam snang mdzad// rdotshor ba dra ba yi// ye shes sna tshogs can la lta// srubs gcig pa 'am srubs gnyis pa'i// thod pa bzang po med pa dang//
rkang rjes pa yi cho gal/ lha mo bzhi yi sbyor ba dang// sangs rgyas lnga yis byin brlabs te// sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms nas su// myur bar khugs kyi bar du ni// rkang pas mnan te bzlas brjod bya/ 3

zhes bcom ldan 'das rdordzo rnam par snang mdzod chen pos bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes kyi rdorje gdon mi rnga pa'i mchog sbenachen po nam mkha' rdo rje'i teng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas

rdordza gsum rnams las sAng bo 'di gsungs so// na ma/ sa man bud+d+hanaM na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ mahA daM twa ta ka za b+hi ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ pa ra shu pAsha has ya/ oM a mr-i tra kuN+Da la/ kha kha khA hi

tA hi/ tiSh+Tha ta/ ban d+hA khan n+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gasmyu gaN+Da/ ri spo Ta ya bi spo Ti ya/ sarba b+hi g+haM pinA ya kAn/ mahA ga Na pa ti/ dzI ba tAn+ta ka ra ya sAhA/ khro bo chen po gsungs pa
yis// grags chen sang sa rgyas thams cad ni// yid phyung nas ni skrag par gyur// log 'dren rnams dang bge gas rnams 'dud// sku gsum ye shes mchog mnga' ba'i// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad po dran/
de yi rkang rjes sa dang ni// rlung gis gtsu ka pa'i shang la la// khro bo'i 'khor lor gza'i nas su/ tshogs bdag rkang pa'i drung du gzhag/ hUM dang phaT kyis bskul nas su// bskrad pa'i sbyor ba byas

na ni// sangs rgyas rdorje can yang spyod// de nas bcom ldan de das de bzhin gshegs pa rdorje rin chen gyis rin chen 'phro ba'i ye shes rdorje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdorje zhes bya

pa'i khro bo chen bo sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo// na mas+sa sa man kA ya pA katsit+ta badzra/ o hU~M dzin ri NIT hU~MhU~M/ phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas khro bo'i 'di brjod pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
(dpa' rnams// 'jigs par gyur cing skrag gyur nas// gtso bo rnam snang mdzad pa dran// srin po 'byung po dang mkha' 'gro/ gam byed gdon rnams gzer ba la//
joT+Ta gzer ba'i sbyor ba yis// hUMtsam gyis kyang las byed do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mtha' yas kyis yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa kun nas sdud pa'i rdo rje zhes bya

pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje pad+ma'i khro bechen po 'di sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo/ nam tsa sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ o hUM hUM hUM ta ru la/ bi ru laM/ sarma ba u0f8bga ta ka/ dza li ta

du sprulaM ga/ a/wA hA sa nA dinaM/ ka ra sa Ta to pa Taka ra/ badzrakhur/ rin glu ta na/ tsa la ta pa su d+ha ta la ni shu sa ma ru to ta kIpA d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra/ b+hUr na ab+hAb+hA ta snga Ta Ta hA sa a pa ri mi tA/

bal pa ra kra ma/ Ar+ya ga Na b+hi ta dzI ta ga/ ah+phu lita/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha hA ya grwa ba/ khAn tA da/ pa ra man na/ sminats+tshin/ sid+d+him+me A be tA A ba kha ya/ badzra sarba dza ra ba shA tsA na/ sarba gra re
tAa pra ti ha to sna ba/ badzaphon ki+ir ya si/ i daM dulcagra na/ dutwA sacha ma bA/ rdzun rgyu na/ tha ma tha ma/ mar da mar de mar da/ pA Na ya pA Na ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/

khaM h+pha khaM rba/ bud+d+ha d+harmasaM g+ha/ anu dz+hAu0f10karma kuruhUM hUM ha ya gi tA ya pa/ dadzaya phaT badzra g+ha ta ya phaT/ badzran t+'a ya paT/ brjod Mwaya phaT/ badzra khu rA pa'/ badzrakhu ra rin

[j]gru ta nA ya paT/ pa ra man bi sha nA ya phaT/ badzra dri lokya b+ha a laM kA raM phaT/ rba karma su pra ti ha tu kha paT/ badzra ku la sa sanA ya phaT/ hUM hUM hUMphaT phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas khro chen byung ba
yis// roN+Di pad mchog las byung rnams// yade ni 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur// 'khor bcas 'jigs pas rnams 'khrugs nas/ byang chub tshogs ni dran byed cing// ye shes rdo rje dran
gyur pa// lag pa la ni bang dang// zhes bya ba mchog 'a bar bsam// khro rgyal ting 'dzin la gnas nas// jorje gsum yig 'dzin pa yis// khams gsum dag kyang khyab byed pa'o//

mi bzad dugani drang bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis don yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po pe con sngon po can 'di rdorje gsum las phyung ngo// nam sa man bud+d+hA naM/ a ti ahi/ b+ha ga b+ha nA/ nI la badzradaSh+Tha/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu swAhA gu lu
gulu/ gu lA pa ya/ gu lA ba ya/ kra ma kram/ b+ha ga ba na bA yu be ge na/ b+hu tAn shI hU~M/ da had ha/ da ra da ra/ ba ha ba pa// pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ bA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta//

mo tsA pa ya mo tsA pa ya/ sarba kArANi/ ts+tshin dats+tshin da/ b+hakA la lhakA ya/ a spyi mi de i bya ru d+hi har mang tsha mi daM bi shAmad tsha/ ru d+hi ra/ dri ya a bye hi d+ha ga bA na/ sarba bgIn/ sarba man+ta Nis
ulakarma Ni kr-i ti ma Ni/ sarba gro hAn/ han han/ b+hazla sma3 ]mar da mar da/ i daM ma/ kAr+ya sA d+ha ya/ hUM nA la ya ni la badzra dan ya/ tu ru tu ru/ bag+hAn
bai'abad ka A yanas yahur ru/ dpA tsan+d+ha ya/ sarba sha tra nI hrid yin dI la ya/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin/ pa ra bat+tanAm/ ts+tsha da ka hU~M bid+d+haM/ nAm silaka/ sam yA a nu sbyar/
brjod+har btsanatsa/ mar nam ni kaM/ rnyi gnad na// da ha ra sha/ pa tsa pa tsa/kuru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ guru suru/ phaT phaT/ hUM haM kr-i tan ya/ de ba ri 'i ba rlu ba ya ka/ nga na badzra nganAn

ts+tsa sAtA/ khro bo chen po mchog gsungs ma thag tu bdud kyi ris thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rab tu g.yos te sku gsum gyi mchog gtso bo rnam par snang mdzod dran par gyur te/ sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs bsal na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la khro bo chen pos gsod par byed do// danas bcom ldan 'das rdo rdzo'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'a khrugs pas bkod

itapa kun tu rnam par 'phro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stobs po che rdo 'di sku gsum las phyung ngo// nam sa man pud+d+hanaM/ o hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ u gra
kU la pA Ni hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT oM tsho tinaMri nA da hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ o mahA bA la ya sAhA// de nas khro bo gsungs tsam gyis// gdengs ka yis ni bskor ba kun da ni shin tu
'jigs skrag ste// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dran gsang sngags rgyal pa bzlas pa yis// las kun rab tu grub par byed// char pa chen gcod gyur la// char pa chungan rab tu 'bebs//

de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po rdoNazhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo chen po 'dod pa'i khro bo 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo// na ma/ sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/
bak+ki hUM dzaM/ de nas khro bo gsungs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'dar/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang skrag/ bdud kyi dpung rnams lung bar gyur// rkang g.yas sna tshogs rdoN+Di/
mi/ tasbyorakhas mchonan mnan nas su// sku gsum la shes stobs ldan pas// khro gnyer rim par bstar byas te// gsang sngags kun gyis bkug nas nos su// sems can thams cad dbang du bya/

de nas bcom ldan 'a das rnam par snang mdzod chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje rab tu 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i ye shes rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje khro bo
mi g.yo ba gtum po 'di rdo rje gsum rnams las phyung ngo// na ma sa man bud+d+hA naM/ atsa la kA Natsa NaDa/ na DanaDa/ many+dza ma3/ saT sat+tA/ ta3 tawA/ tan tan/ da ha da ha/
mo ha mo ga/ mo ha kar/ has pa sa/ badzra has ku ra/ lha sa klu sa dA sa/ ma ra ma ra Ta ma ra Ta gaNA gats+tshA/ han pan/ ban d+ha ban dA/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi sha A bi shA man pa la ka
@##// rgyan d+hu na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ pig na/ mA rayamA ra ya du// lhak+Sha b+hakA/ sa na ku ru ku ru/ ki ri kI raM ma hA 'am badzra spo Ta ya sA ya/ hUM
hUM/ khri ba lnga tA raM gnarta ka/ I A I AyA/ a tsa la tsa tre/ so za ya spo Ta ya/ g+haM/ a sa men ka Ta Ta mahAb 'a ga ta ya/ par mnan/ oM oM haM/ maMshudatuM tu lo ki/
tu tsha tu badzra/ na mo tu sku a pra ti ha ta pa le sgyu/ lA ya/ dru// a sa ha na ma swAhA/ de nas khro bo mi g.yo ba// khro kho stobs chen 'di gsungs pas lha dang klu kun mnga' gzhug byer//

u gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin M// 'jigs pa tho ba nas brgyal bar 'gyur// bdud kyi sa rnams lhung nas su// tshig cing rab tu zhum pa batshan// gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran khro bo'i rgyal po du ma
yis// bcug pas 'jigs pas nyin bzhin du// gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad nyid// sna tshogs las rnams myur du mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par sbyang madzod chen po dzardzab da bzhin gshegs

pas sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis 'a jigs pa chen po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal po chen po/ gnad mdza sa 'di gsungs se/ o sumani/

sum+b+ha hU~M/ gro d+hA shrI b+ha hU~M/ gro rgyu pa ya gro d+hA pa ya hU~M/ AnA ya ngod// b+ha ga bAn/ ba rA dzA hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas/ lha yi bu mo thams cad ni// sku tshugs zhag ci'i ba/ ra
bur gyur/ mig rtsa rig rig byed pa dag/ sku gsum rdo rje mchog mnga' ba'i// zhal gyis nu ma gnyis mnan pas// gtso bo rje tshe rnam par mdzad// ye shes kyis ni ba joms dran gyur/ lcags/
kyu yis ni rnam dral te// rdo rje zhags pas bcings nas su// bumo thams cad dgugs bya ba// bu mo dgug pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shas chen pa rnam par 'gyings pa'i

dga' ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsum gyis mchog rdo rje 'chang bskyod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di rjes su dran par mdzad do// 'khor lo chol rnams
gnas nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngon dag dang// de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba'i sngon/ rdo rje lcags kyu zhags thogs 'byin// kun mkhyenayazhes las 'byung gtso// gsang sngags skyes bur
bdag bsgomasan// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgug byed na// rdo rje 'chang sogs ci zhig smos// bud med lhachen bu mo dag/ rlung la rkang pa gzhag nas su// lcags kyus snying la drangs nas ni//
sems can kun yang 'gugs 'gyur te// 'di la dpyad pa cung zlad med// rdorje rnam par snang mdzad ni// sku chen zla ba'i kha dog yin// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi
'babs bas ma ste// lan grangs bcu ni brjod pa yis// de ni gdon mi za bar khugs// rdo rje dkyi la 'khor las byung ba// rdo rje lcags kyu chen po yis// 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yis//
gzhon nu ma dag nges par 'gugs// rdo rje gsum 'khrugs khro bo na// rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa ste// lham yin kun nges srog cing// lhamin bu mo rdzis chags pas//
gsalashang gis ni bskyal nas su// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis// drangs nas lhaman bu mo 'gugs// btsag dang thod le kor dang ni// ba bla 'byor par 'gyur na ni// gzas zinatshon khar bcug
sa rdzas rgyal rdo rje lcags kyus 'a grub// drag kho rlung dang khyab 'jug dang// lha mo gnod sbyin gnod sbyin ma// mngag gzhug bcas par 'a jigs skrag ste/ ming bris kun nas rtag tu 'gugs//
( sangs rgyas 'khor lor legs zhugs te// 'jam pa'i rdo rjer rnam par sgom// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// lag na rdo rje lcags kyu thogs// khros shing 'bar ba 'phro ba yis// gnod sr-in bu
mo ba ku gnas spyod// phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba dang// bsam gtan 'khor lo sbyor ba yis// 'a gug par bya ba'i tshig gsungs pa// gzhan du byas na grub mi 'gyur// rgyal po'i zhabs drung
ga kun gnas pas// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// kun gyis srams rab rdzogs byed pas// yang dang yang du skul bar byed// da nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos rdo rje'i da

bzhin gshegs pas ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rgyal mo chen mo rnam par bsgyur ba'i rdordza'adi rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo//
tshau0f00pasku li ni sAhA// de nas 'di'i bdabusungs tsam gyis// klu mo dbang chen grags pa dag/ gos dang bral zhing tshig bzhin du// gtso bo rdo rnam snang dran// gsang sngags rig sngags 'di yis ni//
ku rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed// bsam gtan rdo rje mthu dang ni// gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pa yis// gsar gdub bya ni gsol ba yi// klu mo'i mig yangs bku gnas ni//

'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chags pa'i// klu mo nyi pa ra sprod par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho 'phro ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms nga ra
zhugs nas skul byed mche na mo 'i gzungs kyi rig sngags chen po rid gsungs so/ na ma a man dut+tA naM samyakas bud+d+ha ka TI nan/ tad+ya thA/ otsa le tshu le tsu'u sAhA/ de nas rig sngags cha
gsungs pas// sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus// ting ngo 'dzin las g.yos par gyur// bdud rnams brgyal zhing tshi gnas su// thams cad chongs
'debs par byed/ sa yi 'og gi bu modang// lha min bu mo klu mo dang// gsang dbang bu mo rnams 'khrugs nas// gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran// rig sngags 'di'i bzlas pa dang// sgom pa yi ni sbyor ba
las// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur zhing// bkug nas rab tu longs spyod byed/ ded nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdoji zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas chos bdud rtsi'i dam tshigs gi rdoN+Da'i khro gnyer 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las byung ngo// u0f00 lha ya nA shani tA sa ni trA sa tu sa ya/ ba ra Ti b+haM ga/ Ti ti TaM/ ba Na Ti ba bkaM/
te/ grwa to/ dza wani swAhA/ de nas 'din gsungs tsam gyis// rig sngags 'chang dang lha rnams ni// g.yos shing 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur// bdud rnams 'jigs pas rnam 'khrugs te// gtso bo
jo tsho rnam snang mdzad// yid gcig tu ni dran par byed// nor bu'i gdub rnams g.yo ba yis// rig sngags 'chang ma klu mor bcas// lha min bu mo gsang ba yis// bumo bkug nas spyod par byed// 'dis na
las kun byed pa dang// mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'jigs pa yin// yang na gsang sngags thams cad ni// skyakho med pa'i nags raMl du// sngags pas bye ba bzlas nas su// las rnams thams cad bya bar
gsungs// gang gzhan slob dpon spyod pa dang// theg pa chen po sun 'byin dang/ mi gang gsang sngags rgyud dag gi/ sbyor ba la ni 'phyi byed pa// de yis dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// da ni rtag tu gnod/
kyis zan// bsgrims nas gsad par bya ba 'am// yang nalus nigazhigapar bya// sngags pas 'di ltar byas nas ni// byang chub dngos grub legs par 'thob// phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad ni//
sku gsum la shes las 'byung ba'i// khyad par du ni bsgom par bya// dgra la 'di ni the tshom med// khrag 'thung chu yis brlan pa ram// dur khrod thal ba'am bshang gci yis// brlan pa'i gos ni bgos/
nas kyang// rkang pas mtshon mamanan nas su// khro bo'i rgyal por sbyor byas tA// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/ chus brlan pa yi gos bgos te// khro
po'i mdun du bcings nas su// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan na ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig/ bshang gci yis ni smugs pa'i gos/ rul ba'i dri can smad pa dag/ bgos nas gsang sngags
bzlas brjod na/ mod la 'chi ba'am bsams par 'gyur// dur khrodapal bas bsdus pa 'a gos// bgos nas khro bo 'khrugs nas nas/ lan grangs stong du brjod na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par
'jig/ sgra ni lhug par bkaMg nas ni// kha bzhin rnam par bsgyur byas te// dang pas mchon ma mnan nas ni// nam mkha'i khams kyang 'jig par 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam// khang stong

dam ni bzhi med 'am// mtshon ma gcig pa'i m shing gcig tu// drag shul spyod pa rtsam pa ra bya// de yi rkang rjes sa lani/ mi rus las byas pur bu dag/ sor brgyud rtsam gyi tshod tsam la// lan grangs brgya
rtsa brgyud brjod pa'i// phur bu yis ni btab nas su// dgra yi khyim sgor bskos te bzhug/ sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// shes dang mi shes sbyangs pa yang// zla phyed na yi nang rol du// 'ching
ba'am yang na 'jig par 'gyur// mkhas pas thod pa yongs tshang ba/ khyad par can ni rnyed pa dang// de lags ng sngags tshig bris te/ rdoN+Datshig gis bzlas brjod nas/ ngagu yi sgo 'am yang nani//
grong du smras na nges bar sgod// ta la'i 'dab ma'am gzhan la'ang rung// khro bos gsang sngags legs bris tu// dgra yi khyim mam sgo karani// sgyus na'achi 'am bsnyams par 'gyur//

zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snangam tshad khos bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsum rdo rdzo'i phur bu'i la shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs te/ las gsum thams cad kyi yi shes kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo'i phur bu zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang/ ga gung dang/ thugs rdo ma rnams las phyung ngo// u0f00 grwa

@# g+ha/ g+ha ta ya gtam/ sawadun paN paT/ kil yaki la la/ sarba pA paM phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la/ badzra d+ha ra AdzA pa ya ti/ kA ma kA ka tsit+taMbadzra/ kI la ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas 'od
ni ga sungs tsam gyis/ 'do'i dbang chen grags ba kun// khargyalanas 'jigs pa skyes gyur te// no rnam snang mdzad pa dran// mi ya rus pa'i khur bu 'am// yang na seng lcer las byung ba 'am lcags/
las byas pa'i phur bus ni// rdo sams dpa' rnam par 'jig/ rdo rje sams dpar mnyam bzhag ste// khod bzangam stag 'khrug pa can// sku gsum rdo rje mtha' gtugs pas// gzugs brnyan pa ni bas/

gasbyar rnam snang phyag rgya chen po 'am// yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can// phyag rgya chen po gshani rje gshed// 'dod pa'i khro bo nyid du ni// rdo rje phur bu bsam par bya// bdag nyid chen po stobs po che//

abadud rtsi zab sbyor rdoNo dang// rdordzayini rnal 'byor gyis/ sdang dang gtum po gcad par bya// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po gang// klugs nas zhabs la thug bar du// rdo rje phur bus rnam par bsgoms//
nga 'a dzin sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang ngas par gnon// 'din phur khu'i mthu rlabs te// stong 'og lha yi dam tshig yin// rgyal chen rdo rjesams dpa' dang// sangs rgyas thamasacad gan pa yi//

ting 'dzin skyor ba 'di yis ni// myur du 'chi 'am bskams bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo tshe rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ya shes rnam par 'gyings pi'

rdzo[E]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo tsho'i sku gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi phur bu'i gsang sngal/sa 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo/ o ts+tshin da

na ra/ ha ra ha ra/ dIpA badz+dzatsakrahU~MpaT/ phan tshun bats+tshas pa'i tshul gyis ni// mthe bo'i ngos kyi drung du bdugs// snang mdzad zhabs kyis mnananas su// rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya// btab pa tsam gyis/
soms dpa' che// sku gsum ye shes las byung ba// dam tshiga mchog gi bzhengs par mdzad// gzhan du byas n rlag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro'i thugs kyi ye shes chen po rnam par

'gyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lasnyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i stang stabs kyilur bu zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs rnams las phyung ngo//
oM badzra rA dz+dzahUM/ rtse mo lnga pa bcings nas su// ma sta ba 'a bro ba bsgoms byas te// rdoN+Di thugs kyis zhabs kyis mnan// rdorje phur bus gdab par bya// btab pa tsam gyis/
rgyal bo che// sku gsum ye shes las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis bzhes mdzad do// gzhan du byas na rlag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig mchog rnam

par 'gyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung gi dam tshig gi stang stabs kyis phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo//
glu o Di o sgyu ba/ joN+Disor mo banum pa yis// pad+ma kha bye 'khor ba yis// 'dod chags rdo zhabs kyis mnan// doNi phur bus nges par gdab// btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che// sku ga sum ye shes las
byung ba/ dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod// gzhan du byas na rlag par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyis chags pa yin// chog bzang po tsam gyis ni// jo mkha' dbyings maMthas bzhugs pa//

as+sa mnan 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje phur bu'i tshig rnams bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyus sku gsum mchog/ sems can khams la phan bzhed rnams//

dgyes shing mgu ba brnyes nas su// rdordzad byings kyis 'di skad gsungs// kye ma'o gsang ba'i tshig gi mchog dkya ma'o gsang ba kun 'dus pa// kye ma'o zhi ba chos kyi tshag/ yashes rdo rje phur bu rmad//
gsang sngags kun gyi phur bus 'di/ bde gshegs ba 'a yi rjes su byed// 'di dag sangs rgyas kun gyi ste// phur bu de nyid rnams las byung// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chom rkun thams cad/

gdongs par byed ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'a dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyalam chen mo 'od zer can 'di gsungs so// oM mA rI tso de ba tA yi sAhA/ rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni//
dbang chen drag pa'i sangs rgyas kun// thugs na dgyes shing mgu bar gyur// sras rnams kyis ni sman yang phye// 'di ni las rnams thams cad ma/ chom rkun snang ba 'ching mdzad m/ 'di yi
sbyor ba la gnas ni// 'gro ba'i tshon mthong mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snanga mdzad chen po rdo rje'i dbazhin gshegs pas sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa sems can zams cad

sgrol bar byed pa'i ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stong chen bo dag tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungasaso// omahAs ha sra ra
martan bar si dmige ma Ni dzo NihUMphaT sAhA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas// sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang// bdud kyi ris rnams g.yos par 'gyur
gtso'o do snang mdzod la// thamasacad tshig bzhin brkun nas su// khacom ldan rig sngags mthu stobs kyis// gnod bgyidaThams cad ga khrir lags so// gang ni rig sngags skyo bas mo cha// ba rel
gnon pa 'di zlos pa// der ni bdag cag mi 'chi zhing// der ni bsrung ba dag kyang bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas brgya

byin mngon par mtho ba'i stobs lha ma yin rnam par 'joms pas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rgyal mchon gyi rtsomo'i dpung rgyan gyi gzungs chen po 'di gsungs

so/ o b+ha ga ba ti d+hu dzaM gra ke yu re pa ra si rgya/ bi d+ha na sa na ka sA sa rtsa pa ri la ni/ u la kA mu khi/ kha kha khA hi khA hi pa ra spyi rgya ma/ a nan+ta b+hu khaM/ a nan ta mu khe pra bar pra sa ra hUM phaT phaT sA/
de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas// sangs rgyas zhing rnams g.yos par gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rab g.yog shang// bdud kyi sde rnams tshig par gyur// gnod sbyin srin po gos bral nas// 'jigs
shing skrag par gyur pa yis// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis tshag la gas te/ bdag cag dam tshig la gnas par 'tshal lags na/ mgon mdzad/

cing lus thams cad rab tu bsgrubs tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pasamangal thams cad yang dag par skyes pas khyab pa'i rdo zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo so so 'brang ma 'di gsungs so// om Ni d+ha ri badzra Ni mahA pra tis re swAhA/ rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa dang// rig sngags rgyalayo'i

bsamathu yis ni// mi yi skye dgu 'tsho byed pa// mthu ches mang pa ni 'phrog pa dang// log 'dren kun dang snang ba'i rnams// mi bzad m lces tshig gyur nas// 'a jigs pa dang ni skag pa yis// rdo rje snang
mdzad drung lcags te// zhabs la gtugs te chig smras pa// bdag cag dam tshig gnas par 'tshal// rig sngags dam tshig rtag gnas pa// gang gis mngal yang ma 'phrog cing/ rtag tumangal ni stsal/

bar mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo ts+tsha'i de bzhin gshegs pas nor gyi rgyun gyi yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdorje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal/

so chen mo nor gyi rgyun 'di gsungs so/ oM ba su d+hI ra ma hA ba su d+ha ra waMt+ta ni da na ba su sAhA/ nor gyi rgyunaces bya ba yi// rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dag/

yidi ni 'jigs shing skag gyur nas// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi // drung du zhu bar 'ongs nas su// dam bcas pa yi tshig smras pa// bcom ldan nor rgyun ces bya ba// mtshan ni mi mchog stsogs bgyid na//

de la nor gyi char 'bab cing/ nor chen dang ni ldan par bgyi// da nas bcom ldan 'anas kyis gnon par byed pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i taring 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas srin mo glo ga

'khar ma bsgyur ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// are du tre ni pra ka ra tatsaN+Di/ ma hA re ga d+hA ri skyid glu dzi tra/ ma had ri/ ro dI ka pA la ma la d+hA ri Ni dza Ta ma ku Ta/ man te/ nA nA pra sa ra Na/ d+ha ri hU~M
khaT laT/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ru ku ru ku/ hAkaM/ tsacha d+hi ma sarba sha tu t+ti/ sho na ta bi ba/ pra tsaNA/ ba ga d+ha ri/ pa tsa ta pa tsa ta/ ba ki ra ta sa ta ya
hU~M tad had ha/ sarba sha taM// sarba duSh+Than/ mi'i/ pa sa da ya hU~M/ ma hA bA ga ba te/ dzA la dzA la hA kA cha ge mo zhig ma bshamanaya swAhA/ de nas srin mo 'bar ba'i glog/ rig sngags
na mo gsungs pa las// bdud kyi gnas rnams tshig par gyur// dgra rnams kyi ni snying yang bsams// dur khrod kyi ras la srin mo btsag gis bris nas legs par spras te gu gul gyi bdug pa spagaci'i

brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ ma tog dmar po dang/ dri dmar po dang/ gtor ma dang lha bshos dmar por byas pa byin nas dur khrod du bsko bar bya'o// de'i steng du min gnas smos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
brjod byas pa'i khungs kar gyis gtor to// khanos pa'i mod la phyi'i rgol ba dang dgra thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// mnan pa dang rmos par byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma'i

dga' ston gnod sbyin mo'i tshogs dga' bar byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rje chen po 'brogama'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM hAri khyimahAyak+shi ta ye/

har ha ra/ sarba yakI Ni phra be sha nisAhA/ de nas 'phrog dga' 'a brogamani// gnod sbyin chen mo gsungs pa dang// gnod sbyin ma kun g.yos nas su// dngos grub phyir ni mngon phyogs gyur// khro mo'i 'khor
bya lo gnod sbyin m// brgyud dbus 'phrog mas brgyan byas te/ lcags kyu 'bras bu na le can// gnod sbyin brgyad kyis klubs nas su// gnod sbyin m kun bsgrub par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad/

chen po thams cad las rnam par rgyal pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mi ras chen po ni bar mdzad pa'i rig sngags ri khrod kyi shing latson ma 'di gsungs so// o pApahAtsi brta sha ba

san+nAmAr bra sha mni hU~M phaT/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas// sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// gnod byed nan 'gro srin po dang// sdang ba rnams kyi sAng yang thogs// yang shing 'o ma can dang
dil// kho mas du ba zhi bar 'gyur// nam mkhar kun nas rig sngags kyi// rgyal mo legs par bkang nas su// bdud rtsi char 'bebs bsams na ni// mod la gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po
chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags kyi ye shes rnam par bsgyinges pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po roN+Di de bzhin

gshegasaM pas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sku gsum ye shes kyi rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba lag pa'i phyag rgya tha dad pa rnams mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis nyon cig/ gang zhig
bcings pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa kun las rnam 'grol zhing// 'di lus ni byin brlabs te// rang gi gzugs su rnam bsgoms na// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci
dgos// lag pa ba zhus khu tshur bcangs pa las ma sme bong gnyis btag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sta/ sku byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yon pa'i mash+tsa/

bong nang du bcug ste g.yas pa'i mthe bong bteg pa ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ste/ gsung byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa'i mtho bang nang du bcug ste g.yon pa'i mthe bong btog pan/

rdo rje 'chang ga ste/ thugs rgyan gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgong ba'i thor to g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba ni rdo rje rnam par snang mdzod
tsho chen po'i phyag rgya'o// sems dpa'i skyale mo krung du 'dug nas lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag ste/ g.yas pa sa la g.yon pa ni ma 'khrugs pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa mchog sbyin par

byas pa ni rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o// de 'di las lag pa gnyis bsam gtan gyi tshul du byas pa ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// nga nyid las g.yas pa'i mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byas pa ni gdon mi

@# tha bar grub pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdoNo bcing bar byas pa las gung mo gsha sa te bsgreng ban rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo'i tshigs dang po bkug ste/ rin po che'i

tshul du byas pani rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar gdu bu'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje chos ma'i rgya'o// de nad las gung mo nang du bskum pa ni rdoN+Di las ma'i phyag rgya'o//

lag pa gnyis thal mo khong gong du sbyor ba las mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te mthe bo'i rtse mor mig gi tshul du byas pa ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo bsgreng ba' tshigs

gsum par mdzub mo gnyis rdo tsho'i tshul bzung ba nimA ma kI'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyor te pad+ma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni gos dkar can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo
khong stong du sbyar ba las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pas gung mo'i sen mo mnan te/ mthe bong gnyis dbus su bzhag nas cung zad bkug pan sgrol mi' ut+pa la'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar

te mdzub mo dang gung mo'i tshig dbu mar gdu bu'i tshul du byas nas mthe bong gnyis glor bzhag pa 'di ni skul byed ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje bcings pa byas pa las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i

rtse mor bkug pa 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis brkyang ste mthe bos so so'i mthe'u chung gsan mo mnananas lhag ma rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa 'di'i khro gnyer can ma'i phyag rgya'o//

lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings pa 'dani rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las gung mo dang srin lag
gnyis bsgrengs te rtse mo'i tshul du byas la gung mo'i rgyab tu srin lag bsnol la/ mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas pas dkris pas mthe bong gnyis mdun du bzhag pa las cung zad bkug ste kha'i
tshul du byas pa 'di ni gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying kar bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yas pa thal lcag gi

tshul du byas pa ni khro bo bzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgyu'o// jorje khu tshur gnyis la mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud ltar mdun la mdzub mo gzhangs te bsgrengs pa las bzlog ste dpral bar bzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi phyag

rgyago/ lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bos srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi sen mo mnan la ral gri shubs nas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur

bcangs pa las rgyab sprad de mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pa las zhags pa'i tshul du byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub

mo sAng kar bzhag la/ g.yas pa khro bo'i sor mo be con gyi tshul du phyar ba ni bcon sngon po can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa rdordza snying kar bzhag la/ g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas par

tsakhu phyar ba ni stobs po che'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs la/ mdzub mo dang gung mo bsgrengs te sprad nas ma tog ga tshul du byas pa ni byams pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong
stong du sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas/ ut+pa la kha bye ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag pa/ lag

[j]pa g.yas ba gung po che'i sna ltar byas pa ni chos kyi glang po che'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur nam mkha' la bsgrungs ba/ lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo kha dan gyi tshul du byas pa ni ye shes tog gi phyag

rgya'o// bzang po'i 'dug stangs su 'dug ste/ thal mo khong stong du sbyar te snying kar bzhag ba ni bzang skyong gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis chu rlabs kyi tshul du brkyang ba las sor mo rnams chu rlabs/

drang ba ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur snying kar bzhag la/ g.yas pa mchog sngon pa ni blo gros mi zad pa'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur pang du bzhag la/ g.yas pa sa gol

gtogs pa'i tshul du byas pa ni spobs pa btsugs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis pad+machung blad kha bya ba ltar byas pa ni mthu chen thob kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ma rtog 'dor ba'i tshul du byas pa na ngan

song thams cad spong ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sar babs bstan pa'i tshul du byas pa ni mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gzhis

brkyang nas 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yas ba mchog sbyin par byas la/ g.yon pa zla ba'i tshul du byas pa ni zla 'od kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bum pa'i tshul du byas

nas dbang bskur ba ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdorje khu tshur byas la g.yas pa'i khu tshur nam mkha' la kun tu bskor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa
sal brkyang nas lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong sad nas zhi ba'i tshul du byas pa ni sgrab pa thams cad nges par sal ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur/

las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying kar bzhag la rgyu zhes bya zhinge/ lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas pa phyar bani ri khrod lo ma can gyi phyag rgyu'o// lag pa g.yon pa sor mo bskyang ba
las mdzub mo dang mthe bong skam pas 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas l/ lag pa g.yas pa khab kyi tshul gyis 'tsho bar byed ba rnams kyi kha mgi 'drab pa ni 'od zer can ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis

zla spyi bor sbrul mgo gdengs ka'i gdugs ltar byas nas bud ces brjod pan dug sol ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pani rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgyu'o//

de nyid las g.yos pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu yis jo zhes byas pas dgugapa ni rdo rje khro bo lcags kyus dgug pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zams cad spyan 'dren pa sta rdo rje khro bo'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o//

a rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung mcha ba'i tshul du byas pa las bstol te 'gram pa gnyis su bzhagal/ lce 'jib cing khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya ba ni rdo rje mchi ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las/

mthe'u chung gnyis bskum/ mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i chol du byas nas kha'i grwar bzhag ste h+pha zhes bya zhing khro be'i lta bas lus gcu ba ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyis
rdorje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang sta bsnol nas gyen du brtag pa ltar byas pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las khrig ma gnyis bsnol te bstod cing btog pani sgo dbye
ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bsnol nas mchan khung du bsnams te khro bo'i lta bas 'gyur ba dang bcas pa ni gdon thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon brkyang
sta kha sprub pa la de'i skor du gams pa bzhag nas lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo bskyod pa nelha maman gyi sgyu dang/ 'khrul 'khor 'byed pa dang/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo slar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya'o//

lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings te bzhag la/ lhag ma ba dan rtsa gsum pa'i tshul du byas nas stang stabs dang bcas par sti zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rjes 'og

gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi khro bo'i mdzub mos sdigs pa ni dordzi bdag mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang sta phur bu'i tshulaM du byas pa ni rdo rje phur bu'i

phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i rdo cha khu tshur brdung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo tho pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje mdud pa dor ba'i tshul du byas pa

ni de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi rdoN+Di bcing ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te sog le drang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rdoNA sog le'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal
chozla ba'i tshul du byas te gdong g.yogatsang brkyang la khro bo'i tshogi du byas nas a la la zhes bya ba'i tshordzasrin mo'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings pa madzras/
mo nang mthe bong gnyis pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni sman thams cad gtub pa'i char pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te skam pa'i tshul du
dpur pa brkyang bani 'khrul 'khor gyi phur pa dbyung ba'i skam ba'i phyag rgyu'o// lag pa gnyis kyimathe bong lag mthil du bzhag ste/ lhag ma rnams 'dab ma ltar g.yab cing rkang pa ya
rgyu gcig sa la btsugs la/ gcig rgyab tu brkums nas khro bo'i lta bas lce 'jib cing hU~M phaT ces bya bas rim gyis bskyod pani rdzoN+Di nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya'o// 'di bcings pa tsam gyis
khams gsum khyab pa'i dug kyang skadapog gis stsal bar byed do// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mda' gzhu dag gi tshul gyis phyogs bzhir mda' bkang ste 'phangs pas pha rol dpung gzhig pa nimanyes
par byed pa'i rdo mda'i phyag rgya'o// khu tshur gnyis las gung mo la bzhibs te bsgreng ba las rin po che'i tshul du bkug la/ mah+pha khong brkyang ba'i stong du mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas

pa nisangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi phyag rgya g.yul las sgrol bar byed pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos sor mo mnan te gangamo bsgangal g.yas pas pad+ma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni ha la ha la'i phyag

[bal]'o// khu tshur gnyis kyis mtha'u chung gnyis dkris la mdzub mo gnyis gzhi'i sa te bag rasan khazlogakha 'bral bar bzhag bani rdo rje khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya ste/ dur khrod du 'jug pa namakha' 'gro ma rnams
'jigs par byed pa'o// g.yon pas thod pa bzung la g.yas pas mdung rtse gsum pazogasanas ral pa bcings te zla bas brgyan cing mtshan bsgang la/ mgi gsum pa gang byed pa ni gur thabs kyi phyag rgyu

ste// bden bde byed kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa mi 'jigs par byas pa las sor mo rnams cung zad phye ste mthe bong lagamaler gzhag/ de bzhin du gams ba'i khu tshur dbyug to 'dzin pa ltar byas pani khyab

'jug gi phyag rgyu'o/ lag pa gnyis brkyang nas par 'i tshul du byas pa ni chongs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te ma tog ltar byas ni ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdorje khu tshur
gnyis kyi ni// rgyab tu 'o dud pa ltar 'dor zhing// rjesams ma la sogs pa'i// rin chen cod pan 'phrang dbang bskur// tang nge 'dzin gnas pas 'khor lo can// 'khor lo mnga' ba'i lha rnams
la sangs rgyas sani rab bgengs ba'i// gsang ba'i mchod la 'byung bar bsam// 'gyur zhing cung zad 'jo tshul can// sgeg mo la ni phyag rgya yis// gar gyi tshul du bkod nas kyang// ha zhes
bya ba glur blangs shing// de nas sangs rgyas kun rargyas pa// rdo'i rgyud nisbyang bar bya// danas wang tshul 'phreng ba las// lha rnams kun la bcing bar bya// 'jo sgrig thabs la spro ba yis//
lag gzhis bskor zhing grol ba dang// g.yas nas g.yon du bskor ba yis// gor thabs byas la mgo la gzhag/ ma rtog dngul ba'i tshul dun// gang gi ma rtog zal mo
sbyar// bdug spos rtse mo sbyar ba yis// gung mo gnyis ni bzlog ste bsgang// bskor zhinge bsgyur ba byas pa yis// mthob gnyis mar mo'i tshul du gzhag dung gi tshul du lag bsgyur nas// dung
phor lta bur mchod yon dbul// de nas lha rnams kun la yang// lag pa'i gar gyis phyugargyal bya// de nas sale snyan tshul rgyas su// lag gnyis sil snyan legs par brdung/ dung dang gling bu bur/
pa dang// lag pa gnyis ni rnga yab g.yob// bsal yab tshul gyis bsil yab dang// sor mo gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan bya// chon 'gyed tshon lcug phran ltar// bskyod cing tshon gyis 'phrong ba dgye//
lag g.yon snod kyi tshul byas la// g.yas pa yis ni lha bshos dbul// khang pa brtsegs pa bzhag nas su// gos kyi tshul gyis gos rnams dang// gdu bu sku rags rkang rgyan dang// rna cha do shal sna
lnga gzhag/ de nas gdugs kyi tshul gyis su// lha rdzas gdugs ni legs par gzugs// bsam gtan tshul gyis lag pa dag/ nam mkha' la ni mdzes bskor na// sangs rgyas zhing rab 'gengs
byed pa'i// bla re rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur// grwar ni pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan// gsang sngags 'di ni cho ga bzhin// rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis// sgo 'phar dag

00/ kyang dbya bar bya// oM badzaMg+ha naN+DaraNi tu// pra ra ta/ saM pra ra Ni ta/ sa buN+DakA tu/ pra tsa li ta/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ nA da sa chu be badzrad+harma shrI da ya ha'o NigaM hU~M hU~M/ lag g.yas rdoN+Di gsor
bya zhing// sna tshogs khugs su 'gyur ba yi// rdo rje glu yis bstod pa bya// rdo rje theg pas mnyes byed pa// 'di ni don dam mchod pa yani/ gang gis rnam rtog rnam spangs te// byang chub sems
rnam bsgoms pas// lus ngag sems ni rnam dag nga// de yi mchod pa gla na med// sems can gang gis dbu ma yi// theg pa gong ma ma bsgoms shing// theg pa dman palcag mos pa///
de yi mchod pa kun rdzob pa// sangs rgyas dbang chen grags kun gyis// mchod pa de dag gsan pa dang// ngo mtshar byung ba'i spyan phye nas// legs so zhes ni rab tu gsungs// a ma no sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi// byang chub sangs rgyas thabs sku ste// rdo rje bsgom pa byas pa yis// nyon mongs med par byang chub 'thob// jotheg chen legs pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa legs/
zabatsang rgya chalegs pa ste// jo rin chen kun 'dus legs// de nas ye shes kyi sku gsum las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rdo rje theg pa bsngags pa
thos nas// dga' bas spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ gtso bo rje snang mdzad la// dga' ba'i yid kyis bstod par byed/ thog ma med cing skye ba med/ 'gyur ba med cing gnas ba med//
mkha' bzhin rnam rtog las grol ba// rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags// thabs su brtags pa gang yin des// ye shes kyisani sras po kun// rdoN+Di thog pa bsgoms/
pa yis// sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur// zhes smras so// bde ba las 'khrungs rdorje 'chang ba yis// dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen// dang po gang du rnam par snang mdzad//
dag cing dri med zlos ni o du sprul// gzugs mang tshul gyis 'thung bas bskor ba yi// sku 'phrul dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshol lo// gsung snyan yi ge kun la khyab pa yi// spros med gsung du 'jig rten
ba/ dbang phyug bzhugs/ mig gsum lha mo dang bcas 'dul mdzad pa// sgyu 'phrulatshul mngo ldan pa 'ga' ma mchis// gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa// na chung dam dang lhan cig bzhada mdzad
cing// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor nas su// g.yon pa'i phyag gis dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol// lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor 'gyur ba yi// dam tshig rnams kyis bya ba byas par 'gyur// gcig
kha gi lag pas kun nas 'khyud pa ste// gnyis pa rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu// gsum pa ma bzod ma rtog 'phreng ba 'thor// bzhi pa bde ba yis ni mda' yang 'phan// gang zhig gru 'di len
par byed pa dag/ bde ba'i rdo can dang mnyam par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glu yin no// oM a nut+tar saThapA NA ma g+ha ud ga te/ sba ra Na i maM ga gan

maM hU~M phaT swAhA/ 'di lan gsum brjod pas mchod pa'i sAn rab 'byam thams cad byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni phyag rgyu'i mchod pa rim par s+ya
ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//da nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdoNA'i ra bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gas gsol ba btab pa// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// ye shes gces pa dri med pa// byang chub
sems ni rin po che// bla na med pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'a das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems ni lus kyi rnam yin la// lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin// sems kyang tshig gis brjod pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag
gse de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi rnam par sbyor ba thos nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ma kun tu bzang po ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje/
can// chos rnams skye ba med pa ste// g.yo ba med cing gnas pa med// rtog pa'i drom spangs pa 'di// bskyod par bya zhes rab tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
@#// pa mi 'khrugs pas gsung spos pa mad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di dag ma skas da/
chos can med cing chos nyid med// nam mkha' bzhin du dmags med pa'i// byang chub sems 'od brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdorje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas
gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'a byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/
nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di dag dngos med de// chos kyi mtshan nyid slangs pa yin// bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i// byang chub sams 'di
brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'in chen tog gis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sa rdo rje ma lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting ngo
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po skya ba med pa ste// dngos po ngo bo yod man pas// nam mkha'i go 'phang thob bo zhes// dngos rnams rab
tu brjod pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla maM'i yang bla ma
[j]yashes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// sems can/
med cing srog kyang med// sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med// rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yazhi// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod
grub kyis gsungs so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs kyi rdo rje da bzhin
gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sams rnam par dag pa mthong nas ngo mchor rgyas par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// kye ma'o sangs rgyas kyi ma'o dag/ kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams//
bdag med chos las le gas byung ba// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems ni sgom pa yis// mi g.yo yi ga las byung ba// rtsilam sogs ltar ma skas pa// byang chub
sems la phyag 'tshol lo// gnas dang stanani rnam bsams te// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dang por rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes// dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas//
yad kyis hU~M byas rdo rje can// rdoN+Di sems mas byin gyis brlabs// rin chen lus su nga rgyal bya// lag pa bstod de bskor ba yi// lcags kyu yisani spyan yang drang// byon nas dang por
phyogs bcings te// dam tshig yang dag dbul bar bya// gdan rnams so sor phul nas su// mchod yon dbul ba'i sbyor ba bya// dbang bskur mchon chago cha sogs//
sal snyan mchod so gas ngo bo bya/ rnam pa kun gyis mnyes par bya/ rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis brtag/ rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya sta// byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang//
gzugs gnyis rdzogs par gyur pa ni// rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs// sngags kyis byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed// rnal 'byor byin brlabs yon nga ra gsungs/ byung chub sems
ni dag pa dang// gsang sngags sa bon bskyod pa che// phyag rgya'i tshogs su brtags pa yin// ma gyis gzugs ni rdzogs byas nga// de ni brtag par brjod pa sta/ rnal 'byor cho ga yin par
gsungs// bsdu dang spro bar byas pa las/ rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dag/ skadatsag ye shes kyis rdzogs pa// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do// dang po ra dam tshig byin brlabs par 1
rnal 'byor spyod pa bdag gis brtags// rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor cho gar bshad// nyon mongs dri mar byas pa'i sems// byang chub sams kyis dag byas te// de ni
rang bzhin dag pa 'o zhes// brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyar// dag gyur de nas blo yis ni// sems la so sor brtag par bya// sems la so sor brtags nas kyang// phyi rol rang bzhin
stong par bya// sems tsam la ni gnas nas su// byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags des// bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag/ zla ba'i gzugs su rnam par brtag/ lag pa'i pad+ma la gnas
pa'i// o gyi myu gus bskrun pa yis// yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs// rdo rje skur ni bsgom par bya// AH zhes bya ba smros med gsung// sems ni hU~M zhes bya bar sprul// yi ge gsun/
gyis byin brlabs las// snying la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs// de la rang gi yi gon// mdog gzugs 'od ni byed bsams te// nga rgyal bskyed nas de la ni// rdo rdzo'i bdag nyid bdag yin
brjod// rgyan kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa// cha shas kyi ni dra ba can// yashes sams dpa' rdzogs par brtag/ de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis//
go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas ltar dbang bskur te// cod pan 'phrang ba rnams kyis klubs// de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi// sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma spro// yan lag bzhi/
pa'i dbus ldan pa'i phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dgu dang// bsAms pa dang ni rtogs ldan ma// mtshon cha mda' dang rtsa mo can// sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam mang po// rnam por 'phrul par byin gyis
brlabs// kun la khyab par byed pa yi// sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni// de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas// phyogs bzhi 'okhor la khyab byas te// dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang
spro/ ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la// longs par spyod pa'i sngagA pa yis// 'khor lo lan rdzo'i gzugs// pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni// 'khordza lo kun las
pad+ma yi// ngo bo yin rol pa dang// sa zhes bya ba 'phos pa las// mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugs su bya// mdzes pa'i rgyun nyid kun ldan pa// nyid kyi stan la bzhugs par blta//
sgog mo glu dang gar rnams dang// rgyal mtshan la sogs tshon dgya dang// sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pani// sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod par bya// rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni//
bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas// myur chos pa dang bul ba dang// mi gsal gug skyed nyams pa dang// rtog pa ngan pa rnam sbyangs nas// de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya//
bzlas pas skyo na lag g.yas kyis// bsgoms te rdo rje gsor nas kyang// g.yon pas rdodril gsol zhing// doN+Diglu tshul sna tshogs dang// ba dan tshul du bya bas mchod// bzlas pa'i
mjug ni brtul nas kyang// gshegs sugasol te bdag nyid bsrungs// lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te// brtan por ci bder 'gro bar bya// bar chad du ni gyur na yang// yi ge brgya
pas byin gyis brlab// de ltar sgom pas sgom byed pa// rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i// byang chub des ni myur thob nas// lca nyi'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang/ sna tshogs las kyi thog
ba/'dren cing/ rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// chogs chen par 'i gdung brgyud can// gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur// dpal ldan rogi sngags kun gyi gtso// dga' chen rdo
lcags kyur 'gyur// sgyu ma bshig pa kun shes shang// dregs pa 'joms byed khro bor 'a gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'dir byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa
gi par phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i do bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'i
'khor lo rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya pa'i dang nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyi nang gi 'khor lo thams cad rab tu sgrub pa'i ya shas kyi las kyi sbyor ba rab 'byam 'di bka'
stsal to// lha ni gang yang rung ba nage/ 'khor lo'i dbus su bzhag na ni// de yi ming smos rdoN+Di yi// dkyil 'khor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs// zhi dang rgyus dang drag shul dang/
rang gi las la sbyor ba na// 'khor lo'irgyal po rnam bsgoms nas// bdag po nyid kyis rab tu bya// zhi ba spyan dang skul byed mas// rgyas la ni chen gos dkar mar// dbang la sgrol ma/
lu gu rgyud// yams dang gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir// 'od zer can dang ri khrod mas// drag shul spyad la mA ma kI// khro gnyer can ma dag gis bya// 'di dag shes rab rol pa ste//
chags pa'i jorjes rjes chags pa/ (gsang sngags de nyid kyis bskul na// gdon mi za bar 'phrin las mdzad/ spyan dang lhamo skul byed ma// dbang po zhi ba zla
'dra ba// phyag gnyis na ni bgrang 'phrang dang// thal ba spyi blugs kyis brgyan pa// dang por dang 'dzin gyis sngal nas// bum pa zla ba'i mdangs ldan pa// bdud rtsi'i 'o mas rab bkang
sto/ lag gnyis pad+ma'i gdub mchog gis// rnam par snang mdzad zhabs drung du// nad pa la ni bdugs par bsam// rin chen ma dang gos dkar can// sku rma kha dog sa ra po ste//
lha mo sor mo snang ba la// phyag na rin chen pad+ma can// dang po tang 'dzin gyis smral nas// yid 'ong rgyal ba'i 'dod pa yis// rAni chen 'byung ba'i zhabs drung du// bdud rtsis rab tu
ba dgang ba dang// bla med rin chen khar bab na// rgyas pa mtshungs med mdzod par 'gyur// lha mo sku chen mdog dmar ba// sgrol ma de bzhin lu gu rgyud// kun nas 'od dmar 'bar ba can//
saTha lha rdzas lcags kyu zhags thogs pa// rab tu bzhad cing spyan phye bas// 'od dpa ga med pa'i zhabs drung du// bsgrub bya rgyugs pas myos pa dag/ bkug ste mda' yis bsnun nan/
skad cig nyid la dbang du mdzod// mi ngas gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir// sku chen nam mkha'i kha dog can// 'od zer can dang ri khrod mas// rdo rje don yod zhabs drung du// mkhaMs pas
sngar bshad tshul du ni// bdud rtsi yisakyang rnam par bzlog/ lha mo khro gnyer ma kI// margad lta bu 'amadog can ma// hA zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa// rdo rje sngags par brtson pa yis//
rdo rje mi 'khrugs zhabs drung du// khros nas rdoNi'i mi yi char/ 'babs par rnam par bsam par bya// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba des// bsgrub bya tshig nas mo gces byed/ sbyor ba 'di yi bod
la ni// de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am// yang na lus ni 'jig par mdzod// byin brlabs dam tshig dbang bskur la// doN+Dis mas ma rin chen dang// chos dang rdo rje las ma bzhi// sbyor ba
rnams ni rab tu sbyar// sems dpa' chen po bcu drug kyang// bla med 'khor lo khyed ba ste// rang gi phyogs nas las byas na// 'bras bu don bod smin par byed// khro bo'i lus la legs gnas
te// khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya// dam tshig la sogs cho ga bzhin// der ni nordzi bsomasanas bskul// rkang pa'i chos kyi sa bslangs la// dur khrod thal ba dag dang bas// de yi ras
blangs mi rus dang// tshu'agramaganyis kyis da ni// btugs nas lung bong btsan gyis sku// de las dgra bo'i gzugs byas la// de tshe gzugs brnyan bcang bar bya// dug dang sa tshe lan
tshudang// 'bru mar tsha ba rab bsras te// dgra bo rmo bskyur ba'i phyir// de yis luganang rab tu dgang// de nas rnam shes rlung 'dra ba// lcags kyu yisan bkug nas kyang// srani bu
[c]glu// ma khyer 'dra bcug ste// zhigs pa yis ni dam du bsrung// de ni rdo rje slog tu gzhug// bsgoms nas de yi ming smos te// dgra bo'i lus ni ma lus par// po so cha
yi tsher mas dbug/ ma rus las byas phur bu 'am// yang nas nig ldeng las byung bas// dpral ba snying mgrin dpung mgo gnyis// gnas lnga dag tu bsgrims te gdab// nam pa'i shing la sngar
ba yis// ma sngar bo la bsal bar bya// mkhas pas rkang pa nas brtsams te// mtshonacha rnon pos gtubs nas ni// 'bar ba'i lus can khros pa yis// de yi dum bu sbyin srag bya//
zla las 'di lani lhag par yang// rus sbal gyi ni rkang thabs sbyar// zhi ma'i gung ngamanam phyed na// las ni 'di nyid bsgrub par bya// las 'di byas nas nges par ni/ gang zhig rgyal bas
bsrungs na'ang des// nges par 'chi na khyab 'jug dang// lha chen tshangs pas ci zhagi smos// phyi rol gyi drag shul spyod pa'i cho ga'o// gsod pa'i ya4shes las sprul te// nang gi yang ni/
! bshad par du// bslab bya yid kyis bsrungs nas su// cho ga bzhin du dgagug par bya/ ]lag na thal gyi mtshon cha dang/ dbacon rdo rje gtun shing zhags/ la gnas 'khor lo mda' gzhu can/
khro bo sna tshogs bsnams pa des// bsgrub bya zhags pas bcings nas su// rdo Ti ya ni khro bo yis/ lho yi phyogs su khrid pa dang/ 'jo rdzo gzhan gyis brdeg pa dang// de ni ral gris gtub pa dang/
rgyu ma lang long nar bar bsam// oM hUM badzranAkAs/ b+hakA ya tha baT/ rdo sran mo bsgoms nas kyang// bya rog wa dang bya rgod kyis// kun nas yongs su bskor nas su// de dag zang thob byed
par ni// sgom zhing mang nas skul bar byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// rdo rje mo rnam bsams te// bsgrub par bya bar yongs brtags pas// de yi rgyab tu zhon nas su// rdo rje khro bos
gabrir bzhin du/ lho phyogs su ni bkri bar bya//de yi rkang rjes sa la ni// rlung gis rtsabs pa'i shang la la// de yi mang nas brjod byas te// jo sna yon drung du sku// de lta bur ni sbyor ba'i las//
sgom zhing cho ga bzhin byas na// brgya byin nyid kyang brgyud 'gyur na// sa stong skye bo smos ci dgos// de ming gsang dang sngags spel te/ 'ug pa'i sgrol bris nas ni// dag sbyong bram ze'i sbras
dgras te// sa yi 'o ga tu bsgos nas gzhug/ rdo rje khro bo gnyis kyis ni// 'a thab mo 'gyed du 'jug par bya// de ltar bsams pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'dod pa bzhin du 'byo bar 'gyur/
hU~M zhes bya bas gang ba yi// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas nas// na pa'i rtse mo nas bton te// bsgrub bya'i lus ni dgang bar bya// lus kyi tshogs ni thams cad du// sna tshogs rdo rje bcings nas
sudaM/ rdo rje'i bar ba 'phros 'gyur ba// des ni lus kyang bsam par bya// rdo rje mkha' 'gro mo bsgoms te// kun nas kyang ni gzhog par bya// oM badzra TA kin/ a mu ka su ra A
kar tsa sha ma hUMphaT/ sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ bsams 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// mkhas pas rlung gi phyog song ste// dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas
ni/ d+haspos kyi thig le bdun byas te// de dag kham pa'i phor pa dgab// de ni ri si ba thams cad nas/ gtsa mo brgyad par sngal byas te// dordzu 'phra bas brgyan pa yis// de dag rnams ni
mnan par bya// yaM zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i rlung 'dun rnams// laM zhes bya bar mtshan ma dbang chen gyi// nang du rlung rnams nges par rgud par bya// de lta'i sbyor bas 'jig pa'i rlung yang
bcings// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgoms nas de'i 'dab la// klu brgyad bkod dbus mi tshogs 'bar ba can// rdorje khro bo'i sku yi zhabs mthil gyis// klu rnams mnan na char sprin char pa 'babs//
h+pha zhes bya ba gnyis dbus klu rnams kyi// snying po yongs bcug sngal mas gzir nas su/ hU~M zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas nas su// 'jigs dus char pa lta bu char pa 'bab// nyi ma'i mdog
ltar dmar po'i bod bzang zhal// nam mkha' khyab par rnam par gdangs nas ni// kun nas char chus yongs su gang ba'i smin// hU~M zhes bya ba'i 'bar pa'i lce yis bldag/ dbugs rngub pa yis
bkug nas dbyung ba yis// shang bal bzhin du rab tu gtor bar bya// yang na rang gi phyag rgyu'i tshogs 'bar ba// btang bas skad cig lan bcad gtubs te// hAzhes bya bas bsdigs pa
byas nani// nam mkha' dag kyang ston ka'i dus ltar snang// ma yi dkyil 'khor la gnas snang mdzad kyi// zhabs drung dpal 'byas nas byung mi g.yo bran// bdud las rnam rgyal phyag drug
mda' gzhu zhags// ral gri 'khor lo rdo chara'abobs la// khro bo grangs med pa yis yongs bskor nas// bgegs rnams srog mdzad hU~M gi sgras bkang nas// 'jig rtan gsum po gang
pa'i ng rnam par 'jig/ rkang rjes sa dang mi yi brag dag las// mi yi gzugs byas tshe rus phur bu la// 'od zer can gyi gsang sngags bsgrags pa yis// lan grangs nyi shur mngon bsngags
mig tu gdab// tshogs kyi bdag po'i kharamang bcu gnas // phyi bzhin rdo rje gtun shing drag gis brdung// o sum badzomu sa le na/ rtsacu ya na ra big+hAn hU~M phaT/ las 'ad bsams/
pas mod la ni// ma yi bgegs kyar bzlog par 'gyur// star zil kha dog lta bu nam mkha' ldang// lus la sprul stong dag gis brgyan byas pa// mkha' la 'a dug nas gdengs ka stong ldan/
pa'i// klu brgyad dug dang char sman rnams la bsgo// brgya byin baka' nidi dag gis thos nas// natshogs bum pa'i char gyis mi mang gsod// nam mkha' lding gis 'dab mas bkabab/
na/ mchus brkos chu klungags ni mchog kyang bcad// o kharlonA ra ya// nir kha ta ya/ dab ma sum g+ha hU~M/ zhal ras gsum pa ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog/ phyag bzhi 'od dmar
sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// lha mo bzhi pa bsnyams ma byams ma dang// chu sprin rgyal mchaname tog rol pas bskor// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo le gas gsor zhing//
g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu skag par gzhag/ lcem bag 'jo sgeg tshul gyis rol ba sta// sams dang/'a 'a byung ba'i sde na rnams rnam bar 'phal// rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan cing// rin chen
cod pan dbang bskur bas// nam mkha' la ni 'bab pa yi// thog thog rnam par klog par byed// o mahA puk+ka badzra/ chag mo rje zhes bya ba dang/ h+pha zhes bya banas/ pA raT ban d+hu hU~M
la phaT/ sbyor ba 'di ni byas pa yis// bla med byang chub rgyas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i/mi 'khrugs rin chen 'od
dpag med// don yod gsang sngags rgyal rnams dang// bzang po rnam pa bcu drug po// kun dang drag po'i ting 'dzin la// gnas pa yisan khro bo dang// gosang sngags rdzogs mdzod
rig rgyal ma// rnam pa kun dang ldan pa dag/ rims bral rang gi ting 'dzin gnas// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la// gzigs pa chen pos rnam gzigs nas// sku gsung
thugs kyi rdo ts+tsha can// smin ma mdzes par bskyod nas su// yan lag 'phrog pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// thugs kyi sems ni dga' bar mdzad// dga' bar mdzad pa'i mod la ni//
sangs rgyas mchog kun gyis mchod pa// shes rab chen po'i thog 'dren pas// bsgoms te so sor gsor nas des// bde chen ting 'dzin la gnas te// ldem phag 'jo tshul gyis bltas
