nas// lag gnyis pad+ma'i tshul gyur te// spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas// ye shes lam ni rab ston pa// rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad la// lag na rdorje stobs po che// yod rgyus
pa yis chog gsal ba// ci sad rnam pa thams cad du// zur gyis rnam par gzigs pa dang// snan ma bsod byas 'dzumamadzod pa// yashes rnam par bsgyings pos gsung// byang
chub chen po'i rdo rje can// lag na rdo rje gsol mod la// brtan zhing zab pa'i gsung gis ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol pa bshad// sgom pa'i lam la legs byung ba// rdo rje yashes rnams
kyi thabs// bde bas byang chub thob 'gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas kyi// rjes su 'brang ba'i 'khor nyon cig/ gang la dngos rnams dngos mod cing// mtha' gnyis kyi ni mtshan
mamed// dbus la'ang spyod pa med pa dag/ dus gsum 'das pa nam mkha' 'dra/ thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa// de la byang chub ji ltar rtogs// rtogs par 'dod pa de dag ni//
thabs rnams nga yis bshad par bya// phung po dngos po yod med pa'i// byang chub sems ni grogs gyur pa// spro pa dang ni btung ba yis// sku gsum mchog ni mchod par bya// sems/
kyis sku ni 'thob 'gyur zhing// sems kyis chos rnams bstan pa yin// sems kyis byang chub 'thob 'gyur bas// de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par sgom// sems zhi
sbyama'i rnam pa ste// byang chub kyang ni sbrum 'dra// dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas// phyogs molta ni sngags bzlas te// legs par byas pa'i gakhrugs dag la// sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na
na/ rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gakhrugs// zhen ba'i sems la sbyang bar 'gyur// de bzhin bsod nams la shes las// byung ba'i tshogs kyis sgom pa'i sems// sems can rnams kyi
bsam pa la// bla med byang chub snang bar byed// dngos po don dmam zhes pa// phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pas// ngan par rtogs pa'i rnam rtog gis// rin chen sems 'di dri mar byas/
'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams dang// dngos po thams cad ldan zhes gsungs// de la gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs// mi shes pa yis yongs su brtags// bdag tu 'dzin pa mngon zhen pas//
don dam phyi rol byas pa yi// thag pa dman pa pa rnams kyis// bla med byang chub ji ltar 'thob// byang chub rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// lhag ma dang bcas lhagam med// lhag bcas phung po'i
ngo bo ste// nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su bsregs// lhag med bag chags med pa ste// mkha' ltar dri mamed pa yin// bla med byang chub 'di lta bur// sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam par bshad
de yi byang chub sel ba'i phyir// las kyi tshulani sna tshogs ni// rnal 'byor can gyis gsang sngags gang// ye shes sems dpa'i zhabs drung du// rtag tu mnyes byas ma grub pa'i// lhag ma
nga yis bshad bya ste// don bde blag thabs kyis su// tshar chad nas ni sgrub pa bshad// jorje lcags kyu rgyal po che// jo zhugs pa rab tu byed// jo khu tshur gzi brjidiche// rdo phur bu rnam 'dril
byed// rdorje tho ba rdung ba ste// jonag tsho char 'bab pa/ lha rnams kun la 'jigs pa spyad// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs 'di// bsgoms nas las la sbyar nani// dmatshig rgyal bas bstan/
pa'i phyir// mtshungs pa med pa'i las byed do/ gsang sngags rag bas hU~M zhes pa'i/ lcags kyu gtung nas zhabs drung dgug/ 'di ni gal te sangs rgyas sam// rdo rje 'chang ba'i snying las
'gugs// dam tshig gas ni zhugs pa dang/ rdo bcing bas bcing bar bya/ u0f7c/ rdo khu tshu'u gyis bzung nas/ rdoN+Dim ga mos kun tu bsdigs/ rdoN+Diyini phur bu yis// gzugs brnyan gyin
gnas lnga po// dpral ba mgrin pa snying ka dang// de bzhin dpung pa gnyis su bgadab// jo'i tho mas brdung bar bya// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par gnon//
sdogs la sogs pa'i sbyor pa yis// gzugs brnyan mi g.yor gyur pa dang/ sangs rgyas myur ba lnga ba rdzogs pa'i/ dngos grub de tsho sbyin par mdzod// 'di ni mthu yis grub pa po//
sbyor ba gcig pu gsang chen yin// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis gsang ba'i sgrub pa thos nas mgrin gcig tu thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba gsol to//
gtso bo rdordzogs rnam snang mdzod// dpa' bo chen po legs so zhe// zab mo chos kyi mchog gyur pa// dam pa ba shad nga mdzad pa logs// sems can phan phyir thugs rdzuyi// lcags kyus kun nas 'khar
ba legs/ bdag med chos rnams sgrub pa yi// ye shes snying ka 'bar ba legs/ gsang chen thams cad bstan pa yi// jorje theg pa nges par gsungs// theg pa'i tshul 'di la gnas na//

bla med byang chub bde bar thob// oM badzra aM ku sha A kar ya hUM/ oM badzrapAn ban daM/ oM badzA Tak+kirA dzA ya hUM/ oM badzomukhri gro g+ha hUM/ oM phaTA kI la ya kI la ya hU~M/ oM badz+dzomud ga ra/

A ko Ta ya haM/ shes kyi snying kas snying po can du gyur pa'i gsang sngags da ga pa mchog tu gyur pa don yod phyir las 'di dag su la'ang bstan par mi bya'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba
las 'di ni hUMr ba'i thabs kyis sgrub pa'i tsham par bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// 4/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rmo'i da bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gang mdzod pos skor ba
las thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rdo ts+tsha zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbab pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba 'di bshad do// oM zhes bya ba mgor bzhag ste// ani bzhin gyi
bar la// hU~Mni bskul nas snying kar gzhag/ yaMni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ bzhag nas bsgoms te gdag byas nas// ba gro ba dang ni gnas pa la// 'gro ba thams cad dbab par 'gyur/
dbab snod skul byed gatshugs de yi// gzugs kyi ngo bo bsams nas su// ro'achang ba'i nga rgyal gyis// gsang sngags bsnyams dang bcas par bklag/ brjod par bya ba thogs pa mad pa'i
'brang ba ni/ na ma sa man+tanaM/ samyaka saM bu ko Tanan/ tad+ya thA/o tsa le tshul rusAhA/ brtson 'grus chen mo klogs pa med jar 'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ pha rol gnon pa chab/
cagan ral gri dang/ tho ba dang/ dgra sta dang/ zhags pa bsnamasam khro mo chen mo khri mon dbang phyug ma/ drag po'i gasmugasacan ma/ zhal ras mtha' yas pa// phyag stong ma/ ma pham
cha/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod pa/ gdul bar dka' ba mig sbyong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod
la rab tu grub ma/ rdo rje'i sen mo can/ dordo rje 'dren ma/ rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo tsho'i sku can ma/ rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stang stabs can/ drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can

gyi gzugs can du bsgyur bar snang ba/ sku rdo rje dang bo (ras brgyan ma/ o b+ha ga ba ti tsan+d+ra dri ru du ru/ kr-i sr-i/ ngur/ gru sru/ ru ru/ gro sgyu gro rgyu/ A be sha ya A ba sha ya/ gro rgyu pa ]
ya kr-i hu ba ya/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ya ma ra ya/ ha ra sur/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya ma ra ya/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha/ gro sgyu gra sgra/ snang ba'i
gdon dang/ rimis zhag gcig pa dang/ zhag gnas pa dang/ zhag gsum pa dang/ zhag bzhi pa dang/ rtag pa'i rims dang/ ud tsam pa dang/ 'byung po dang/ ro langs dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ grul bum gyi gdon dang/ mngal nas skyes pa dang/ las las skyes pa 'gro ba dang/ gnas pa 'di dag dang/ snang ba gang dag bdag la 'tsho ba thams
cad/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha a/ mar da ya mar da ya/ go kha ya sho ShA ya/ ta pa ya ta pa ya/ u pa d+ha ya u pa d+ha ya/ han han/ badzra Na sa ra sa ra raNAn/ ma ra ma ra/ khang+ga na sI daM/
tshu/ ji ji ti/ o tsa le tsuN+Di sarba sA d+ha ya sAhA/ de ni rdo rjes bskul nas su// rdo rje dril bu gsal bya zhing// rdo rje bcing ba bskyod par bya'o// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas so//
dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad dang// 'brel ba'i par bzhag nas su// A zhes bya ba brgyad kyis brgyan// dbus su bsgrub bya bzhag nas su// hUM bzhi yisan mdzes par bya// kham por
kha sbyar nang bcug ste// steng du rdo rje 'chang bas mnan// sgom zhing gsang sngags bskul tsheg gas// bzlas brjod dag ni bya ba dang// ba zhes bya ba'i theg pa yis// kun nas kyang ni
bkri bar bya// 'di ni sku gsum las byung ba'i// lha dang mi kun manan par 'a gyur// sngags la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid ni// kha dog dmar po rdo tsho can// 'dod chags chadang ldan pa'i gzug/
'dod ba'i lha dang lhan cig bsam// sku gsum ldan pa mdung thogs shing// g.yon pa yis ni gzhu yang gzung// o hU~M bud med spyi bor bsam na ni/ bdod pas snyang zag dregs/
bdo ba// mdog dmar thal mo sur nas ni// bdud bzhin du ni ma ngun khanag so/ do mda' yis bsnan na ni// bad+ma dag nas rbal pa 'tshog/ mda' yi sbyor ba yis// 'dod chags
can m 'jog dar ba gyur// rnal 'byor can gyis dbang bya'i phyir// 'dod chags rdo can yang sgom mo thod las byas cang te'u la// sa bu'i pags pa g.yogs nas ni// ngos nyid la
ni bar thi// bud med khrag gas 'dzag par bya/ de yi dkyil du phro bris te/ mi yi sgra yis btags nas ni/ mthing ril gyi ni rkang rus kyi// waM hAmang nas brjod cing brdung//
lam gyi bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor ni// rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos bris gar ni bumo zas sbyin ma// gugs par btson pa'i lcags kyu bya// gtso bo khrag 'thung chalugs kyis//
gzugs can gyis ni stong pa brdung// 'dis ni khams su sa tshas nga mo chas sbyin 'gugs par 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i gzugs ban la// gnas pa yis ni
ra rgyal gyis/ rnal 'byor 'khor lo rdzogs gyur na// tshig gi rnam pa tsam gyis kyang// lha dang lhamani mi la sogs// rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad byed//
gang tshe dbang nyi'u la gnas pa// de tsho thams cad mnga' gzhug 'gyur// bltas pa tsam gyis 'chi ba 'am// de tsam gyis kyang gcod pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i yanas kyis bskul nas//
rnal 'byor can gyis glu dang gar// ji lta ji ltar bsgom byas pa// de ltar 'gro ba rang tu byed// sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas pa'i/ tha yi lhani bal yin bas// sna tshogs los rnams
grub byed pa'i// sbyin srog las ni rab tu bshad// sbyin srog gis ni lha rnams tshim// tshim par gyur nas dngos grub ster// gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa// thams cad sbyin
srog dag gis sgong/ de phyir sku gsum mkhas mchog gis// sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzod// gtsub shing las ni byung ba'i ma// dge ba yi ni las rnams byed// gdol pa'i m dur/
ka khrod las byung ba'i// ma yi las rnams rab sgrub pa// thab khung zlum po gru paMzhi pa// zla gam dang ni rjer gsum pa// dkyil 'khor zur gyi kha khyer ba// rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyun//
sbyin srog ro nyid tshul rig pas// thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni// pad+mo steng gnas gtsug tor dang// rdo rjerin chen pad+mo gzhag/ ji ltar rigs par 'dug nas su// lag gnyis pus mo'i
[0f10 ]bar bzhag ste// dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas nii// blugs gzar bkang ste de bzhin srog/ sbyin srog la dgos g.yas su gzhag/ g.yon du chu yi snod dag go/ las kun byed pa bzlas nas
su/ bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya// ku sha'i rtse mos mnon pa yis// thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya/ ma ni 'bar bar shes pa dang// g.yas pas mi 'jigs mtheb bskyon cing//
gsang sngags 'disani cho ga bzhin// ma yi lhani sngan drang ngo// tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po cha/[0f8b]lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog/ sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang// 'di nyid du ni/
bzhugs su gsol// o ah+pha ya/ dI pa di phya/ A bshamahA pakhro ye/ rma bya ka bya ka/ ba hanA ya swAhA/ lag g.yon rdo rje bsang gtor te// mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga dbul//
ma yi phyogs nas bod pa ni// gsus po che la mig gsum pa// gdong bzhi lag pa zhi dang ldan// 'od dmar ral pa'i thor tshugs can// ma yi dkyila 'khor la gnas shing/ las kyi
'od zer rnams kyis brgyan// lag pa dang po mchog sbyin la// gnyis pa nan sngags nor 'phreng// g.yon na ril ba spyi blugs te// gnyis pa nani bertson nyid// mdog dmar rgyanani mad pa
drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// 'di lta'i gzugs ni bsamasanas kyang// thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol// da laspyan srog la dgos pa// kun nas lan gsum srog blugs dbul/
gang nas 'thor 'thung byas nas su// 'bar ba'i rnam da bsgyur par bya// rim pa 'ad yi tshul byas na// mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya// legs par tshom byas
bzod gsol te// 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab// bum pa rgyal mtshan ro gdugs// pad+ma lcags kyu'i rnam pa dag me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang// 'khyil ba'i mtshan ma mkhas
pas brtag/ de nas myur du 'grub 'gyur bas// sgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni// oM zhes pa dang sAhA mthar// dbyangs kyi rgyun ni bsring ba dang// bar chad
pa mad pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyor// zhi ba'i soms kyis zhi ba'o/ 'byor pa rgyas pa mngon par stsal// dregs gdong stabs tshul bcas pa dang// dbang du gyur pas dbang bya'o// drag shul spyod tshul
la gnas pas// hU~M zhes pa dang paT dang bcas// lus n ma lce 'bar ba dang// 'jig rten gsum po bzar bsam nas// bskul ba'i tshig dang sprul ba yi// gsang sngags yi ge nges par sbyar/
sngags grub cho ga shes pa yis// sbyin sral cho ga thams cad la// sna tshogs las dang ldan pa'i lca// gang dag yin pa mchod par bya/ sbyin srog de nyid kyis bskul cing// dang po dgang blugs
bsreg cing dbul// phyis ni rim bzhin rnam par stsal/[·]zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams la// dag ba rdzas rnams sbyin srag bya// bshang gci khrag rkang rus pa dang// sha chen dag kyang sbyin sreg
bya ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal/ mi gtsang ba yis bkang na go/ ji ltar sdig pa mi skye 'gyur// gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang// sems can mi shes pas rmongs te// thams cad
shes rab rnam spangs shing// phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa// rnam rtog dra bas blun byas gang/ 'dre dag gso ni dge sdig gi/ phung po ga'os su rnam par brtag/ chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dog ste//
sa ba mad cing gnas pa med// sems can shes pa sprul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs kyis bstan/ 'dam nga 'i don du dag spang na// bsod nams med la ci zhig smos// dper na
chus gang chu klung gi/ nga rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag/ rtswa dang shing la sogs bsdus te// chu las rgal ba'i gzangs byas nas// de la 'jus talegs rgyal na// bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar
de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi// chos kyis lam ni bskyed byas kyang// chos dang chos man rnam spangs nas// byang chub bde ba thong pa bzhin// de phyir rnam rtog dra slongs la/ 'khrab ma ya ni
chos spel te// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs lam la/ sngags ragi rnam rtog ma byed cig/ rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste// 'khor ba'i rgyu mtshor ltung byed pas/ nam mkha' lta bur dri med
pa'i// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin mnos// dbang po gnyis namanyam sbyar te// lus dang ngag dang sams bsdams nas// pa'o snyam pa'i gzi bskyod gzugs// rnam pa kun gyis rnam par
brgyan// rnal 'byor ldan pa tsho'adi la// ya shes rtogs pa nyid du gyur// las las byung bar rnam bstan pa'i// skyes pa bud med gzugs mang la// brnyas
nyid du mi bya 'dis// rdo rje lus nyan dam tshig yin// ngan rtog bathang rtog dra ba yis/ sa mas kyis sems can rnams la ni// sna tshogs gdung bas sun mi dbang/ rdo rje sems ldan dang
chag ya na srad pas bskyed rtsub phra ba yin// tshig dag rnam par mi sazhing// mnyan na bde bar byed pa 'di// jo ngag can dam tshig yin/ b+hU ma par snang mdzad cher 'khrugs mchog/ sha
yo rams la gnas pa yis//rkang la mi 'khrugs rgyal po sa/ 'khrag la rin chen 'byung ba gtso sa mas can rnams kyi rus phung gi/ rus gong lani 'od dpag mad/ rtsa yi tshogs rnams
rnam 'dun pa thub pa skad mchog don yo da la dam tshagang ces pa rnams la ni// gsang chen nga yis bstan pa 'di// blo ldan rdo rje sams kyis ni// rtag tu bstan zhing bsgom par bya//
tsha 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin rmongs// srid dang de ba nyin rnam spel ba'i// chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'ad// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// ro shang gci khu ba mchil na khrag/
'dzaM ga pa 'byung ba bzhin bsdus pa// sgom pa'i blo gros rdzogs pa yis// dam cho ga bstan par bya ba ste// rtag tu bza' zhing btung bar bya// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/
[4]rad na sngon srag ram par phye ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos

grub dam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya nga'i rkang nge 'dzan la snyoms nga rang zhugs nas/ dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i mchog dngos grub 'di bka' stsal to// lag na rdo = gsang sngags sgom pa'i rnal
'byor gyi chogs yang dag par bskul nas smyug thams cad kyi dngos grub bsang pa'i thabs gsang chen 'di nyon cig/ rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin la/ gnas kaMng sku gsung thugs
nga sboms te// mdun du 'khor lo lags par gzhag// sku gsum rdo rje can gyi gzugs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug pa'i 'od// 'khor lo'i nang du zhugs gyur par// bsgom zhing 'khor lo
bsgrub par bya// ma yi 'od ltar 'bar ba'i 'od// 'khor lo chen po 'phags par 'gyur// spyan ni bzlos brjod byed bzhin du// bla med 'khor lo byang bar bya// rgyalachen 'khor lo 'grub
ra dag/ 'od ni rnam par snang mdzad bzhin// lan gsum 'khrug po la sems can la/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur/ ma 'khrugs par ni rnam bsgom zhing// rdoNA mdun du bzhag nas
ni ram pa bzhin du bskul na 'das// sku gsum rnam par 'phal 'gyur zhing// 'bar ba'i 'phreng chan mnyam pa'i 'od/ rdo chen po 'phags pa ra 'gyur// mA ma ki ni zlos lan/
[f/ ] rdo rje bla med blang bar bya/ 'doN+Di rgyal po rlangs pa yis/ gtso bo rdo rje 'chang gnyis 'gyur// gtso bo chen ngo sangs rgyas dang// byang chub sems dpas yongs
bskor nas// sems can sems la gnas pa yi// lag na rdo rdo rje 'chang// 'jig rten khams su rnam rgyu zhing// kun gyi bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed/ rin chen 'byung ba bsgoms nas
ni/ rin po che ni mdun bzhag ste// sbyor ba'i rim pas rnam snga' na// rin chen chen po 'phags par 'gyur// rin chen sgrol ma zlos bzhin du// khod bzang gabri bde 'bar ba can//
phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yi// nor bu'i rgyal po byang bar bya// lha rdzas nor bu blangs pa yis// rin chen 'byung ba gnyis par 'gyur// de ni sems can thams cad kyi// yod brnyan
nor bu rin chen bzhin// rin chen char pa rab 'abebs shing// sems can kun gyi dbul po 'dzoms// gtso bo yid bzhin nor bu can// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par rgyu// 'od dpag
med par rnam bsgoms nas// par chen po mdun bzhag ste// ram bzhin gangaNid gzengs bstod na// 'dab ma bye bas rnam brgyan pa/ 'a'od bzang gser ltar 'bar ba can//
pad+ma chen po 'ang gas par 'gyur// gos dkar can ma'i gsang sngags kyis yod las byung ba'i pad+ma blang// pad+ma'i rgyal po blangs pa yaso// 'od dpag med pa gnyis par 'gyur
chos mdzod rnams kyis thog 'dren cing// sems can rnams la bdud rtsi stsol// sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang byed gtso// bad ba can gyi rgyan du gyur// don yod grub pa rnam bsgoms/
nas// ral gri mdun du rnam bzhag sA// rnal 'byor rim pa 'di yis ni// sgom pa de nyid kyis bskul na// rje 'bar nga lta ba'i 'od// ral gri chen po 'phags pa ra 'gyur/ sgrol
ma'i gsang sngags zlos bzhin du// ral gi bla med blang bar bya// de ni ral gri mchog blangs nas// don yod grub pa gzhis par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas zhing du rnam zhange/ sems can rnams kyi
mi shes gcod// rtag tu dri mad snang gyur te// chu yi nang gi ston zla bzhin// N+Das kyi dngos grub bstan nas ni// phyag rgya chen po bslab ra ra bya// rnal 'byor che la rnam gnas pa/ de bzhon
gshegs kyi btsun mo che// zhe sdang rigs ni 'dren mdzad na// rdo rje gdan can mA ma kI// rin chen 'byung ba'i lha mo dang/ lha mo 'gro ba dbang mdzod ma// mkha' la longs spyod spyod mdzad
ma/ ram pa bzhin du nga yis bshad// de nas bu mo mig yangs ma// lo na bcu drug lon pa la// gakhrugs dang mdangs dang lang tshor ldan// gsar gyi rna cha g.yo ba can// gcig cig
bsgrims te btsal nas su/ lha mo bya dor legs byas te// grags lnga ya ni tshogs can ma// las kyi rjes su bsgoms byas nas// bzhag ste sprad pa'i sbyor ba yis// pad+ma lani rdo rje
gzhag/ slad pa dang ni 'khyud pa yis// rdo rje dang ni pad+ma bskul// gar gyi tshul du gyur ba dang// de bzhin spro dang bsdu ba yas/ mod la sgyu mas dregs myos nas/
jo rdzalas ni bdud rtsi 'byung// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i shes rab lag/ nga rwa lanas bdud rtsi btung// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i kha yis ni// 'thungs pas de bzhin gshegs ldaye/ sku ni yongs su 'gyur
ba 'thob// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos kun las// thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'phel// 'di'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi snying po sgrub pa ste// 'dod lta'i yon tanaN+Dis 'jug pa'i/
klu byang chub bde bas bsgrungs na ni/ jo Ni pad+mabyani brlabs nas// rjes su chags pa sa 'thob par 'gyur// grub chen gsang ba'i dngos grub// sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba'i thabs//
N+Nasasu chags pas bde ba yi// jon+ti theg pas mnyes par 'gyur// sbyor ba'i khyad par 'di yis ni/ lan gsum 'khrug pa'i gsang sngags dang// las kyi phyag rgya ngas bshad de// de dag
lag pa'i phyag rgyu dag// ye shes phyag rgyu rab bskul pas// d mchog mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// thub chen sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba// sna tshogs 'phrin las mdzodapar 'gyur//
denas phyugan rdo tshos khams gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang// gsung dang// thugs las byung ngo// sa ni spyan du brjod pa ste/ chu khams nA ma kA zhes bshad// sgrol/
ma rlung zhes kun tu brjod// gos dkar can ma mo ru bsgrags// rdo rje dmatshig nam mkha'i dbyings// ston pa rdo rje 'chang bas bshad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa'i dbang phyug bcom
ldan 'das rdoN+Di sems dang 'a chen pos gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdordzob de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo tshe'i sku dang// gsung dang// thugs de bzhin gshag
pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khyer gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas cang mi gsung bar/
gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi
lags/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis 'di na dordza'i byang chub kyi sems su blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi sam
dang rdo rje slob dpon 'di gnyis gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar nas/ rigs kyi bu mdor bsdusanas yang bshad par bya'o// phyogs nga cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang/
khyad chub sems dpa'i bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i bar de dag thams cad dus gsum du byon nas/ slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pas mngon par
mchod nas 'ad skad ces bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha yin no// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma lanobadag cag rab zhin gsheg ba baAcad kyi ston pa yanano zhes rdo rje'i yi

shog khu phyung nas slar mda'ang nga gis sargyas kyi zhing gsheg par 'gyur ro//rig kyi bu dpar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i bar de dag gas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi doNi'i
sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni// rdo rje slob dpon de'i spu'i khung bu gcig bsod nams kyi phung po chos khyad par du 'phags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'i bar nas/ thams ca dam khyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yan no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i
chen po byams pa 'jigs shing skrag pa'i yad kyis cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa dang// rin chen 'byung ba dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa 'od dang ga med dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzod rnams rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la ngosanas shes ldan byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyon cig/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdorje slob
dpon gyi drung du byon nas mchod par mdzad tsang phag 'tshal bar brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa yin pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das rdo T+Tha'achang de nyid ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dang 'a thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de
dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje'i sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi dngos grub gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ doN+Di'i sku dang/ gsung dor/ thugs kyi gsang ba gsum ni rdo slob dpon gyi lus dang/ ngag rang/ yod la ga nas so// byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad kyis gsol pa/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang/ jag dang/ sems kyi gsang ba gang la gnas/ nam mkha' la gnas so// nam mkha' gang la gnas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi sems
la gnas so// sems gang la gnas/ gang du'ang ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dang ra sams dpa' chen po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do// dkyil
@#// 'khor dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang phyag rgya dang/ stang stabs dang/ 'dug stangs dang/ bzlas brjod dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ mchod pa dang/ las la sbyar ba dang/
slar bsdukha rnams ni gsang sngags kyi tshul de kho na nyid bcu yin par gsungs so// dus gsum du 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thugs rje'i ro gcig pa rnams kyi gsang ba dag dang/ gsang chen dang//
ye shes rnamab pa gsum gyi sAng po bstan pa dga'i slob dpon gyi kha nas du ma la gus pa'i slob mas shes par bya'o// bla mas dam tshig ji ltar lta ba bzhin gyi dbang du byas nas bshad par bya'o/
sgyu bsams nas sems can rnams la rnal 'byor dang/ rnal 'byor chen po dang/ lhag pa'i rnal 'byor rnams go rims bzhin bshad par bya'o// 'di mtha' dag ni rgyud thams cad kyi
spyir shes par bya'o// de kho na nyid kyi dngos po mtha' dag yongs su mi shes par gsang sngags smra ba nga yin no zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'chad par byed na dam
paN+Da tshig thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro// dam tshig las nyams na bdud kyis gzung par 'gyur ro// skyes bu shi nas dmyal ba'i gnas mi bzad pa chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sams
can rnams la brten te byang chub thob par 'gyur bas sems can la bsu bar mi bya'o zhes shes par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam de nyid la sems can de dgaM sbyar bar bya'o//
gang zhig yod la brtson par ma byas pa de dag gis ni lag pa dang rkang pa dang/ mig sbyin pa'i dka' ba spyad pa dang/ dka' thub Ni lta bu s kyang sdug pa gzhom pa 'am/ bdud rtsi'i
ro thob par mi nus so// rnal 'byor gcig khong du chud nas dban par song ste bsgom pa byas na sdig pa las 'grol zhing rmo 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams dang/ chos bdag
med par bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen nga ra rnal 'byor khong du chud par bya'o// shes rab dang ye shes kyi 'jo tshul gyis gsang ba lnga'i bdag nyid kyi gtso bo la mchod par bya'o//
dngos po thams cad dngos ma da ra ra ga ni bcu'i don ni rtogs pa dang/ rdo rje nga ngas dbang bskur bas// bdud rtsi ltas na dga' bar byed// gsang bar bya ba'i chos gsang ba//
gsang zhing sbas te gzhag par bya// 'dod yon lnga ya rnam pa ni// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya sogs// rnal 'byor soms dpa' sprad bya zhing// de bzhin bza' dang btung byas na//
bltas dang khu tshur rnam pa yis/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las cho ga thams cad bstan pa rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs ta
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba theg pa chen po'i yang theg pa chen po'i tshul zab mo gsang ngo bas
chas gsang ba chen po rdzogs////bod kyi lo tsa ba rgan po dge slong rin chon bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/// @#// rgya gar skad du/
sarma ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ki ba tsit+ta ka ya ma ri nA ma tan/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa khams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rjes gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 'phags pa 'jam
dang la gshin rlu ga bad la phyag 'tshal 'o/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i btsun
mo thams cad kyi b+ha ga rnams la btsugs te/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang/ phra ma rdo rje gdaMn rje gshed dang/ 'dod chags rdo rdzu gshin rje gshed dang/ phrag dog rdo N+Di gshin rmi gnyid
@# dang/ zhe sdang rdo gshin Ne gshed dang/ tho ba ga hin rje gshed dang dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dang/ pad+magahin rje gshed dang/ ral gri gshin rje gshed dang/ mchims rnams su
doNi tsachu ka dang/ rdo rje pag mo dang/ rdoN+Di dbyangs can ma dang/ rdoNA go ro ste/ de rnams mtshams su'o// de dag la sogs te gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen po dang bsacig tu
[4/]bzhugs so// de nas phyag na rdos/ bcom ldan 'das rdorje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba btab pa dang// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi bdag po sa bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge la dbang ba 'dzin 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las nges par bton to/ zla ba rdoN+NasAr ba yi// gau0f00na rje mtha'/
byed bsgom par bya// bdud rnams zhi bar bya phyir dang// zhe sdang thams cad gsal ba'i phyir// 'od zer lnga yis 'a khrigs pa yi// noN+Di srung ba'i don du sgom/ phyir mtshams rdoN+Dis
gzhi dang// ra ba dra ba de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa bskyod pa po bdud 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gti mug rdo rje gshAn rje
gshad la so gas pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las ngos par phyung ba/ dbus su ya dang kA ma ma da ya tsA na rA dza sa do ru Na yon ra'o// ya sogs yi ga
dang po las// gnyan rje gshad du'agyur ba yin ya ga kA ni gtu mug brjod// yi ga ma ni phra ma ra gsungs// yi ga ma ni 'dod chags nyid// yi ge da ni phrag dog 'gyur//
gshaMn rje gshed sogs lnga ru grags// yi ga ya las tho bar 'gyur// yi ge /las dbyug pa'i gtso// lag na pad+ma ni yig las// lag na ral gri rwa las yan// dza las tsa rtse
@#// ka zhes brjod// yi ga sa las phag gdong ma// yi ge rdo las dbyangs can bsags// yi ge ru las go rI dran// Na yo ni ro mchims kyi ba'i/ 'jor pa/
bzhi ru 'dod pa yin// sna tshogs rdo 'jigs rung ba// nam mkha' rdo rdzu dkyil du bsam// de dkyil bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed// gnag cing 'bar ba bsgom par bya// shar du gta
mug rdo rjes// lho ru de bzhin pha ma yin// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ste// de bzhin byang du phrag dog go/ mtshams kyi rdo rje rtse bzhi la// tsartsaka sogs rnam par sgom// sgo yi rdoN+Di rtswa
bzhi la// tho ba la sogs rnam par sgom// sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru/ mi yi mgo bo bzhi dag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po gzhan
rje gshed po rdo zhes bya pa'i dang nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ zhe snang chen po'i rigs kyi sngags gsungs nga/ oM hAny+tsewi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje chen po'i sngags gsungs pa/ o dzin dzaka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phra ma
rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa// o ratA naMg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'dod chags rdoN+Di'i sngags gsungs pa/ o A ro lika de nas ]
[48. ]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdoNi'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM pradz+nyA d+ha ka/ da nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
pos rdorje the ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM muN+Da ra hU~Mka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos roNA dbyug pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ o daN+Da hUM ka/
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje pad+ma'i sngags gsungs pa// oM pad+ma d+hika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bdag pos rdo rje ral gri'i sngags gsungs pa// o khany+dzadz+haka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdoNe tsatsi ka'i sngags gsungs ba/ oM mo ha ra ta
nga nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag posajon+ti pag mo'i gsang sngags gsungs pa/ o sde kha ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ o rA ga ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje go rA ma'i sngags
gsungs pa// o badzra ra ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bat+taM
swa b+hA ba At+makodahaM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+hAka badzra swa b+hu ba AtA kohaM oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra sAb+hA ba AtAkod[é, ]/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos zhe sdang chen po'i sku ngas pa bstan pa/ zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la// an nA ma 'dra ba'i mdog/ phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa nyid//
gshen rje gshed ni bsgom par bya// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba la/ gsal ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba'i 'od// phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa nyid// gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom
byu// zhal gsum phyag drug rgyas gyur pa/ gser gyi rnam pa'i 'od dang ldan// phyag na rin chen bsnyams pa nyid// phra ma rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// zhal gsum phyag drug dbang/
byed pa// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa nyid/ 'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// zhal gsum phyag drug thams cad la// rin chen margad 'od dang
sma ldan// phyag na shubs can bsnams pa nyid// pra ma rdorje rnamaM bsgom bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ mngon par
rtogs par rim par phye ba ste lo'u dang po'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dang 'chan po
la bstod pa// gshin rje gshad po rab 'jigs pa// gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// joN+Di sku la phyag 'chol bstod// gshin rje gshed po mang
'jigs pa'i// phra ma rdoN+Di'i ngo bo khyod// rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa// rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa//
rdo rje gsung dang rab mtshungs pa// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// phrag dog ngo bo'i rang bzhin khyod// ga b+hAn rje gshed po las kun pa// rdo rje chags dang rngub tu mtshungs/ phyag
na ral gri phyag 'chol bstod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pas// sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso// dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag
'tshal bstod// rdo rje mgi dang/ rdoNi rna ba dang/ joN+Di sna dang/ rdo rje lce dang/ rdo rje lus dang/ rdo rje thugs zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni mig la sogs pa byin gyis
brlab pa'i cho ga'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'dod pa'i don grub grub byed pa'i// gi na rje gshed po nyid mtshungs pa// gshin rje gshed 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor lo/ skad
pa gsar pa legs bsgoms la// legs par tshad la mdzes pa yis// sad pa shes pas thig gdab bo/ gshin rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor lo/ mchon rnams thams cad rab rdzogs6shing//
bar chad thams cad rab nyams pa// zhi ba la sogs rab 'khrug pagi/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i cha byad la// rtse mo lnga dang ldan manyam pa'i// las kyi rnoT+Thade la bri//
don bar ba 'khrigs pa yi// rdo rjer yi dbus su bri// ral gri byang gi phyogs su bri// 'khor lo'i 'od kyis bskor ba yi// 'khor lo shar gyi phyogs su bri// 'od kyi 'phror ba mnyam 'dra
ba/ rin po che ni lho ru khri// par rA ga'i mdang badra'i 'od// pa ra nub kyi phyogs su bri// 'od zer lnga dang mnyam ldan pa'i// shar gyi mtshams su 'khor lo bri// 'o ru rdo rje bri bar bya//
nub tu pad+marim tog ni/ yu ba dang bcas kha ce gsal// 'od kyi 'phreng ba mnyam 'jo ba'i// ut+palani byang nub bri// shar gyi sgor ni tho ba ste// dbyig pa de bzhin lho yi sgor// 'dam
las skyes pa nub kyi sgor// byang du rdo rje ral gri 'o// shes pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la// mchod pa khyab par 'phags pa ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis// 'jigs pa med par mngon/
kharamad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gagane rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i rami bar bya ba sta le'u gnyis pa'o//skad
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa yi/ 'jigs pa'i gshin rje 'joms
dkyil 'khor/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gtso bo// mgon po da kyil 'khor bri bar mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdorje 'dzin chen pos nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rnams las bdud rtsi myang/
ba'i cho ga nges bar phyung ba/ o A/ hU~M/ rje ma rtse sbyor ba yis// rdo rje can kun mnyes pa dang/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs// ya shes 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid//
dgug pa dang ni gzhug pa dang// bcing dang re bzhin dbang bya nyidi// tho ba la sogs sngags bzhi yis// mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par bsgom// ma hardoNi rnam bsgoms la// dkyil/
'khor gtso bo rnam bsgom bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// gti mug doNo rnam bsgom bya// rta bdun ldan pa'i dbus gnas pa// phra ma zhes bya rnam bsam bya// dkyil 'khor
dam pa'i dbus gnas pa// ba dod chags rdorje rnam bsgom bya/ las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// de rje las ni bsgom par bya// zhi ba'i gti mug rdordza sta// rgyas pa de bzhin phra ma yin//
'dod chags rdo rje dbang du bya/ rdo rje las kyi thams cad du'o// rdo rje las kyi sbyor ba las/ mi chil mi yi thod par gzhag/ de bzhin mi sgras sdong bu bya// dur khrod dag tu du ba sgrub/ mig
snya na dag ni de bzhin du// mig sman las kyi sgom pa dang/ las kyi bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yasi// mgi sman 'di ni 'grub par 'gyur// khrag dang gur kum bzung byas nas// sgrib pa byug pa
bsgrub par bya// las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yi// rkang pa byug pa 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga ni mnyam pa la// sha lnga dang ni ldan pa yis// lcags gsum du ni bcug byas/
na/ las kyi sbyor bas 'a grub par 'gyur// kan ta'i lcags kyi ral gri ni// las kyi sbyor ba bslab par bya// las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yis// las kyi ral gri rab 'grub 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs
ba thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gi na rjegashed nag po'i rgyun las/ las kyirim par phye ba ste lo'u gsum pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom
ldan 'das rdoN+Di 'tshon chan po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ las kyi dbye ba'i bya ba las// sems can 'jug pa ji ltar 'gyur// rdoN+Di chen pos bshad du gsol//
yon tan rgya mtsho rnams nyan lags// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// las ni thams cad rab sgrub pa// nyes kun gsol ba'i bdag nyid kyis// bod skad kyi ni tshig gsungs so// bcom
cha ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs rdo rje nyid kyi mthus phyag 'chol zhing mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang du phyag byas nas bcom
ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// dbang du bya ba'i 'khrul 'khor bstan// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo mchog/ ma byung 'byung par mi 'gyur// bud med dbang du bya ba
dang// srung ba'i don dang de bzhin du// zhi ba'i ro tsa nas bzung ste// gro ga'am de bzhin lcag kun la// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris nas/ don ma na mas rnam stan la// gnag dang yu can
ma yin pa'i// kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar te/ ma ra dang sbrang rtsis bkang bar gzhug[”]/skud pa dkar pos kham phor bcing// shar du mngon par phyogs pa yis/ ma tog dkar pos
dus gsum gtor/ gan rje mthar byed chu shel 'dra// bdag nyid bsgoms nas mdun bkod la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas// bslab bya bltas nas dbang bskur bya// bdud
rtsa lnga yis gang ba yi// bum pa dkar po zla ba 'dras// rdzogs sangs du mas khrus byas te// bltas nas sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam// oM na mahIk+ki/ wi kri tAnan hA hUM phaT phaT/
de ba dat+ta ya wAn+ti ku ru nA ma swAhA/ shi ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// skyes pa zhi ba'i gur kum gyis// bri bya de bzhin rgyas pa yang// 'khor lo gnyis ni kha cho yi// sAhAs mi ni brgyan pa yi//
bsgrub ba'i ming ni bris byas la// mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang nas na// kham phor kha sgyur nang du gzhug/ skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni// ma tog ser po dus gsum gtor// byang du kha
bltas mdog ser ba'i// gshin rje gshed du bdag nyidi bsam// bslab bya zla ba sor nag la// bum pa ser pos bskur bya zhing// dbang bskur ba ni bsgom byas la/ spros las
rgyas pa'i bzlas pa bya// o si khi wi kri tAnan hu hU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ de ba rak+ta puN+Ti ku ru swAhA/ oM hitwA wi wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bo 'aT re ba dat+ta s+ya pa/
dung ku ru bo 'aT sAhA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ gro ga'am ras largya skyegs kyi// khu ba'am tsan dan dmar po 'am// srin lag gi ni khrag kyang
rung// ya gi go yis brten pa yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri// 'khor lo nag po sogs bral ba'i// kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar du// mar dang snang rtsis bkang ba
gzhag/ skud pa dmar po bcings byas la// nub phyogs su ni kha bltas nas// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa// kha dog dmar po che 'bar ba//
zla ba dmar po la gnas pa'o// bsgrub bya yang ni rnam bsam bya// rang gi lus las byung ba yi// 'od zer dmar po'i lcags kyu yis// bsgrub bya 'gug par bya bar bsam// sngags
kha nilo zhing khri bzlas bya// des ni bsgrib bya nyams gyur nas// rkang pa gnyis su lhags gyur nas// gos bral sgra ni bshig gyur pa// rnam par bsam la bzlas pa brtsam// gal te dbang
du ma gyur na// mar la sogs pa bral byas la// du ba med pa'i seng ldeng mas/ 'khor lo de ni sgrub pos bsro// oM hIlaHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT paT swAhA// ho de ba dataM ba shi ku
ru ho/ oM b+hit+ti wi kri tAn na hUM hAhU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ bo shAT de ba dat+ta skya ya baa ma na ya bo kha rnga/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang du bya ba'i cho ga gsungs so// dur khrod gos
sam yang na ni// rang byung gis bses ras la ni// khrag dang rgya skyags pasres pa yi// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris la// yi ga dza dang yi ge bris// mang ni rnam pa brten byas la//
btsun mo yi ni pad+ma'i snod// kha sbyor zhing du btsud byas te// skud pa dmar pos bcings byas la// ma tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid ga kaMn rje mthar byed pa// nub ka'i
nyim dang 'dra dmar// lcags kyu dmar pos bkug pa yi// bsgrub bya dag ni rnam bsgom bya// snying la lcags kyus brgyab nas ni// ska nas zhags pas bcings byas te// gcer bu
sa ni ma bcings pa re// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// seng ge dmar po'i steng 'dug la/ rdzas lnga yas ni bkru bya zhing/ khongs pa ru ni bsam par bya// gal te bsgrub bya mi
'ong na// sang ldeng gan mi ma dag la// der ni bzlas pa brtsam par bya// brtul zhugs can gyis 'khor lo bsro// oM hri liwa kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ a mu kaM AkArA ya
g+hi// o hi/ ke wi kri tA na na hU~MhU~M phaT phaT tsho/ de ba dat+ta A kArAya dzA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dgug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// dur khrod gos la mkhas pas ni/ g.yung ba yi ni/
khu ba gis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri// yi ga laM gyis brten pa yi// bslab bya'i ming yang bri bar bya// kham por kha sbyor nang du ste// kham phor ge ra po'i stong
du gzhag/ de la mkhas pas re khu gli ra lwa bdun nam yang na bani// mnyam par bzhag pas bri bar bya// ri rab lcog brgyad ces grags pa// de yi steng du mnyam par bya// yi ge hUM dang yi ge bo/
rirab de ni brten nga ra bya// de yi steng du laM yig las// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// sna tshogs rdo rje mnan pa la// skud pa ser pos btsangs nas ni// gangagIn rje gted po mdog ser po//
dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// bslab bya ser po rnam bsam la// ri rab kyis ni mnan byas pa// phyag na rdo rjes mnan byas pa// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi 'og tu// man da ra sogs
ri bo dag/ sna tshogs ri bo rnams kyis kyang// bsgrub bya mnan par bsgom par bya/ de la gnas nas bzlas pa bya// o sikili kr-i tA na na hU~MhU~M phaT phaT/ laM de ba daMt+ta sna ne stam+b+ha ya ku ru
pa laM// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// ngag ni rings pa ra 'dod pa yis// de bzhin 'khor lo gnyis bris la// bsgrub bya'i ming yang bri bar bya// der ni

sngags kyang spros la bzlas/ o b+hiriwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ lo de ba rak+ta s+ya ya k+Sha spar cha/ kor krit+ta nan+ti ba ra ya b+ha a bi ru pa kaM de ba dat+to/ ya dz+nyA data ya s+ya pAki stam+b+ha na ku ru laM
bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga de skad gsungs so// shAn tu legs par sbos pa yas// 'di las gsungs bzhin dgongs pa dag// gshin rje gshad nag sbyor ba yis// nyam
gcig gis 'grub pa ra 'gyur// sngar bzhin dur khrod kyi ras la/ 'khor lo gnyis bris brtul zhugs can// sku tshe dang ni tshwa dang yang// dug dang gzhan yang rnam pa dang// tsho ba gsum dang
tsha ba'i mar// dur khrod kyi ni sa la ba dang// da du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba dang// tsan da li 'brasaM mdzub mo khrag/ chosgo can gyi sa blangs te// gdol pa'i rdza ma'i dreg pa dang// rab tu legs pa'i
sA gu yis// bcu bzhi la bris brtul zhugs can// khros pa'i sems kyis nyin phyed na// gdug pa can rnams gsan pa'i phyir// sa mas can gnod pa byed pa'i mang// yi ge hUM gis brten
byas la// bdag nyid gan rje mthar byed pa'i// sbyor bas lho phyogs kha bltas te// khro chen rab tu drag po'i gzugs// rus pas mgo bo rnam brgyun la/ ma pa la bzhugs lce phyung 'dril
gsus pa che la rab 'jigs dang// skrag byer sku 'bar gyin du 'gror// sma ra smin ma de bzhin sor// g.yas na rdo rje chen bo dang// gnyis pa nanaM ral gri dang// gsum pa 'i phyag na gri gug go/
ra ni g.yon pa'i bri bar bya// 'khor lo dang ni par che// thod pa 'di ni g.yon na 'o// rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu gnag/ g.yas pa'i zla 'od bzang po 'dra// g.yon pa'i dmar po yin par brtag/
rdo rje rgyan kyis rab tu brgyan// ba spu khung nas 'jigs chen po// rang gis bdag po rab 'a rtsa pa// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor stang nani/ zhabs ni g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas/
mche ba gtsigs shing rgyags pa yis// bskal pa'i 'bar ba ma dang mtshungs// 'di lta bu yi bdag nyid kyis// bsgrub par bya ba mdun du dgod// gdug pa'i mtshon gyis rgyas pa yis//
dri ma can la nad kyis gzir// gos med 'dar zhing nyam chung bas// don 'dod pa yi tshig sna zhing/ mtshon gyis gzir ba byas pa yis// gnag gi thum pos las gang ba// grang ba'i
rlung gis gtses 'gyur zhing// ma yin ng du zhugs pa la// ma he dang ni stag dag dang// khyi dang mchu rangs can dag gis// sangs rgyas sna ni mngon 'jog pa'i// sdig po che dag bri bar byed//
mthar byed pa yi lder gnas pa/ tsher mas lus ni bkang ba dang// rkang pa shang lcags sgrog gis bsdams// de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas// pags pa dag ni bshus byas nas//
de la tshwa dang sku tshe bskus// hU~M zhes zer ba bsgom par bya// de yi lus srung la sogs pa// cod pan dag ni mdun du dgod// de ya go cha'ang med byas nas// stong pa'i lus ni mdun du
bsam// rang gi lus byung khro bon// gshin rje gshed sogs bdag nyidi 'dras// de yi lus la brgyab nas ni// tshol bu rkang dag 'thung bar byed// de yi mdun du gshaMn zla bsgoms/
la ga na dbyig pa stobs po che// gdug pa can des rje ga par byed// nga yi rgyu ma'i 'phreng ba sogs// bya rgod kyis khyer mkhar la 'gro// sa yi 'og nas klu dang ni/ lha ma yin la sogs
pas brdug/ 'di ltar bslab bya nyams bya ba// snying rje la gnas sems kyis ni// byed pas 'khor ba'i gnas bton nas// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyad par can gyi 'ad lta bu'i gsung phyung bar mdzad do// a ma do bsad pa'i yang dag bsad// bsad pa ma yin sdig las bsol// dzi srid bsad kyang
ma bsad de// snag pa stong phrag byas pa yis/ mnar mdal sogs ma spyi bar// e ma'o sangs rgyus che ba'i bdag/ bsad pas byang chub thob par byed// sems can gsod pa
bsad pa nyide/ sAri rje chen po nyid kyis byas// e ma'o snying rje stobs kyi mchog/ snying rje dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur// oM hIwi wi kri/ tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM de ba dat+tan
ra ya hUM phaT/ oM hrit+ti wikra tA na na hUM hUM phaT paza de ba dat+ta mA ra ya phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par rtog pa gsod pa'i rdo rje 'khrus 'khor dang/ sngags dang
snya na gyis gsad pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las rami par phya ba bzhi pa'o//
nas 'khor lo gnyis bras la// yi ga phaT kyis brten pa yi// bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri byas la// thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ skud pa sngon pos bcings byas te/
nyi ma phyed kyi dus su ni// dur khrod sa yi nang du sba// gshAn rje bshad kyi sbyor ba yis// rta ring ma he zhon pa yis// lag na mtshon thogs bsgrub bya gnyis/ mdun du bslab bya dgod

par bya// khros pa'i lus la sprul pa'i tshogs// gnyis ka'i phyogs su bsam par bya// kha nyis kas 'thab mo mang po byed/khrog pa ngag dag pa'i sim ldan pa'i stobs ldan khros pa bsgom par byo/ bsgom pas

brgyus pa brtsam par bya// o aM k+ki wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+taya dzA dat+tA bi rwa ra ya hU~M phaT/ 'dan bcom ldan 'das kyis dbye ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// cho ga ngag na snga ma
klobazhin/ 'khor lo gnyis ni dri byas la// yi ge hUM phaT kyis brten pa// thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhugaM/ skud pa nug pas bcings byas la// sha za'i tshul du spu bar bya// gshAni rje'i
sbyor ba la gnas pas/ mdun du bsgrub bya bsgom par bya// yaM byung gzhu ya dbyibs 'dra ba'i/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po la// de stong mdog sngon ja mo bsgom// de la gdug pa//
can bskyon la// lho yi phyogs su kha bstan te// khro bo'i tshogs kyisaM du brdeg pa// sangs rgyas yin yang bzlog pa dka'// o shIwi wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ b+haM paT de ba
dat+ta u Ta ya ni hUM phaT/'dazhibcom ldan 'das kyis bskod pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'i// khros pas rnal 'byor lhor bltasal// ra khrag ma btsugs thal ba dang/ dug bo tsAdang ska cho dang//
mar khu smon pa'i khu ba yas// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis/ ram pa 'di bzhin bri bar bya// gsad pa gshani rje'i lus la gnas// dbye ba rta dang ma de yi// bslad pa rdza mo'i lus la
gnas// zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// rgyas pa zla ba sar po la// btsun mo sIng khar dbang du bya// ra la skyon pas 'gugs par byed/ ri bo'i dkyil du rongs bya gzhag/ sha ra ba 'am/
seng ge s 'gug/ de bzhin gzhan yang mtshon par bya// ro tsa na dang rgya skyegs dang// kha che ya ni khyad par gyi// dang nga du bya ba gro gar bri// dge ba'i sems kyis bzung byas na// 'grub par
'gyur te the tshom med// kham phor kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ khwa yi sgo yi sku gu yis// nyi ma phyed na dri bar bya// par le kha sbyor ro bsags sa ra// gshin rje'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis//
oM la sogs gsang sngags bzlas// lce phyogs gnas de tshor gtsad bya// mtha' ya a bor zhi ba la/ yi ge na de gnyis ka dang// phyi gnas dkyi la gyi ya spangs ta/ yag lhag
tsa bya/ di ra bris nas gnas pa dang// 'khor lo bris nas gnas pa yi// khyim der 'thab mo rtag tu 'byung// de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshAn DA ga sheng nag po'i
rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor gyi go rims bri ba zhes bya ste rim bar phyi pa ljapa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'das gsol ba btab pa// gang

gas rdo rje can mazhes pa// zhe snang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor gyis// doN+Di'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas// dngos grub rgya chen thob par byed// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// 'di lta bu yi gsung bsgrags
so/ dkya la 'khor gyi ni lha kun gyi// dbu la gshin rje gshed po bsgom// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// rtag tu sbyin srag gis kyang dgang// rtag tu dam tshig dag kyang gzung// sdom pa dag

kyang yang dag gzung// dang po la ni cod pan dbang// gnyis pa thab grwa spyin par bya// gsum pa rdzoNi dril bu dang// zla ba bza' ba bzhi pa ste// bsha bo 'di ni dbang chen po// nag po zhalas byung ba
rtsayis// dbang 'di dag gis bye brag gis// rgyal ba'i sras kyis byang chub thob// 'byung po kun gyis gtor ma'i lus// sngags 'di de nas rab bshad bya// sngags chen bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/
'byung po thams cad 'dar 'gyur ba// a in ya hA/ ya ma ya n+ti ba ru Na ya wiku bar ya kaM/ IshAn ya tA/ ag ga nA/ ni ri ti ya na/ ba ya ban/ mon ya daM/ A k+kArA ya hU~M/
khraraNi phaT/ ba su d+ha ri rdzi phaT/ bi matso Di NasA sarba b+hu te blo hA/ ha da hi hi/ hAhA// pho lo phaT phaT swAhA/ bi Ta mu tra chu bsregs pas// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni// lha rnams
kyang na tshim par byas// ha ha zhes kyang dran par bya// dkyil 'khor rim gsum bya ba ni// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug pa'i// dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bris pa la// sngags ni kun tu dgod par bya//
brtul zhugs can gyis bcu gnyis par// grub pa'i sngags rnams dgod pa ra tsa/ rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jagi rten gsum// ma lus lus pa med par 'gro// oM ya ma rA dza/ sa do ma ya/ ya ma do ru
Na yi da ya// ya da yo ni rnga yakA ya/ ya k+She yatsA ni/ ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ dkyil du ya byas shar du ke// lho ru 'jam po'i rdoN+Di sa// yi ge pa ni nub tu bri// byang du dan 'da' ba na//

bsgrub bya'i mang ni sbyin bya ba// mchims kyi stob pa dag tu so// hU~M gnyis kyis ni brten byas la// dgos pa tham sa cad sgrub par byed// ya tsani ra dzes do ru// na phyogs na ra la sogs pa// phyi rol
rim par g.yon brtsams bri// don kun rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir/ rami pa gsum pa de la ni// kun tu cha re bor ba la// shar nas brtsams nas bri bar bya// oM wI la sogs pa'i sngags//
de yi bar dag thams cad kyi// cha brgyad bor ba dag la bri// a mu kaM ku ru 1 uts+tsha Ta ya ba liM ku ru ba de kha5/ shAn+taM ku ru/ paN+NaM ku ru/ 'di ltar g.yon nas ni// las dang rjes su mthun
par ni// phyag 'tshal na ma tha ma'i bar// tha mar bo kha Ta dang// daM phaT dang ldan sa bon gyis// zhi dang rgyus dang mthar dpang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo rnam par bri ba zhes bya ba ste rim par bya ba drug pa'o////khrag dgug pa yi sbyor ba ni/ zhal gsum phyag drug
skom pa yi// phyag na 'khor lo zla 'od badra'o// mkhas pas tsartsi ka bsgom bya// chang dag dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug phag gdong ma// rab sngo phyag na rdoN+Da bsnams// mkhas
pas phab mo bsgom par bya// shes rab bskyod par bya ba'i phyir// zhal gsum phyag drug dmar ba la/ bzhi ba phyag na par bsnams// dbyangs can brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom// khu ba dang lag pa
sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug ral gri bsnams// nor bum rmad 'dra ba ni// go ri mkhas pas bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdoN+Dagashin Tu gshar ngo gsad ba dang dgug pa zhes bya ba 'a

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ jo Na tsartsi ka'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM tsa/ kAsid d+henA nI la bar M NaM rat+na tra ya a pa kar No ru ji ra A karA ya dzaM/ sngags 'di dag ni dran byas na//
kha bgadungs pa dag byas pa yin/ 'jig rten gsum gyi ltag chen ngo// ragugs par 'di la thecom mod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdorje gshin rje gshed chen po chang la gdugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting
mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas// bum pa kha mdzes nyer byas la// rkun ma'i sku ni rten bzhag sta// sngags ni rjes su dran par bya// sngags 'ad che ba'i bdag nyid 'di// ba rta mchod rten dag tu bstan//
dal gyis dmigs nas 'dab par bya// chang ni 'gugs par rab tu grags// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i gshin rje gshed rdo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags gsungs pa// o pa tshu pa hUM pradz+nyA ban+dani/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma rgyu bar ni/ d+hi ri ni raM/ bud d+hi ban+d+ha ni swAhA/ tshes kyi dang po nas bzung ste// kun
tu zla ba nya yi bar// sbyor ba'i skad ni smra bar bya// ji srid zla ba'i sa 'jug pas// rtag tu tshags bcad brgya zin 'ad// ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur// khams gsum ma lus pa dag ni/
ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das ga na rje gshed rdo rjes khu ba 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khu ba 'gugs par byed pa'i go rI'i

sngags 'di gsungs so// oM A ka u0f9f Ni ArA u0f97Ni go ri gI duT+Ta ya duT+Ta ya/ u kra ma A kar ya dza dza dza hUM hUM hUM swAhA/ bad+ma kha dang roN+Dadang// dril bu lcags kyu'i rlung sbyor gyis// bzlas
dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba ni// khu ba'i tshog ni 'gugs par byed// nags kyi nang ngam dben pa ru// las 'di dgono bskul byas nas// nub bdun tsam du sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the
@#// tshom med/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed chen po rdoN+Dinag po 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dbang bskur ba mchog
gi dam tshag 'ad nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdorje rnams las phyung par mdzad do// u dum ra raman da ra// ba ri tshe da ka rang dang// karan ka yi 'phreng ba ni// bu khyod rlung la byin gyi sa rlobs//
ral gri chen pos khams gsum pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa// 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed// las kyi ral gri dam pa 'di// brlung na bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur//
shes rang thabs kyi ngo bo nyid// rdo dril bu sgrub pa 'di// klong la skyob ma yang dag gzung/ btung ba rin po che 'dis ni/ 'jo lus ni rab tu sgrub// kun du yengags du khyod kyis// 'byung 'ge la
shes las byung pa// slob ma'i khar yang blugs bya ba/ ba dan rje bshad kyis bsgrubs pa yin// rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid chas/ shin tu dga' ba'i sems su bya/ de bkaMn gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'gugs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// pa//de nas rdorje 'dzin rgyal po/ srung ba'i
'khor lo sbyor ba'i byed/ pagegs dang log par 'dren pa dang// dug pa can dag bsal phyir gsungs// dar la ldan ral gri 'chang ba'i bdag/ srung ba'i 'khor la sbyor bar byed// ral gri
'bar ba'i bdag nyid kyis// rig pa gsum las mchod par byed// sems can thams cad skyod pa yi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod naM dpang du gyur//
gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor ni// slob dpon dag gis dkyil 'khor bra'agos kyis gdong ni bcings byas la// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun sgor gzhag/ khyod su zhes kyang 'di skad bri// skal
brdang bdagaces chog tu brjod// gsol btab pa yi blo bzang la// yol ba'i nang du sbyin par bya// dbang bskur don du gus chen pos// de nas lan gsum ched du brjod/ ji ltar sangs rgyas
chos chen pos// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ltar// bdag kyang mgon pos dbang bskur zhing// mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol// de bzhin glu dang rol mos mchod// de bzhin khrus

dang byug pas kyang// slob ma dad pas blug por bya// de la pasod pas kun kyang bya// de nas rdorje 'chang gi rgyal pos stong pa'i sngag+ha gsud+ma pa/o hU n+ya tA dz+nyAn badzahA b+hA ba AtAko'agaM/ oM du dzaM badz+dzasu rgyu ba a kob/
o d+ha b+haM tu ra dzaM swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ zhi ba la sogs byed pa yi// sbyin srog de nas bshad par bya// sbyin sreg gang gis grub pa yi// las rnams thams cad rnab sgrub pa// zhi bzhi ba'i
sams kyis te// rgyas pa rgyas pa'i sems kyis so// dbang yang der gtan sems kyis te// gsad dang bsad pa la yang ngo// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa ste// rgyas pa yi ni rdzing bu 'dra//
dbang du bya ba zla gam ltar// nam mkha'i khams 'dra bsan gsad// zhi ba khru gang chod du ste// de bzhin rgyas pa'i khru do pa// ji ltar rgyus la de ltar dbang// sad pa la ni sor/

u zhu// zhi ba steng du khru phyed chod// rgyas pa la ni khru tsam ste// so lnga gnyis na gsad pa la// dbang la ji ltar de bzhin dkrug/ tshes gcig la ni zhi ba bya// chu ba la rgyus pa [' ：]nu pa la ni mngon
spyod do// dbang gi las ni tshes brgyad la'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las// sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phya ba ste brgyud pa'o//
bak+ku//rgya mtsho'i sa ni blang byas la/ klu yi gzugs shig brtsams byas te// ya gi daM du snying khar ni// hi la so gas bzlas pa bya/ 'char na mi 'bab dus dag tu// bslus pa khri byas 'babs
par 'gyur// sbrul nag po yi sha dang ni// nam pa'i lo ma dang bsres la/ 'di la ril bu byas nas ni// brtul zhugs can pas rgya mtshor gzhung/ sngags kyi brdzus pa dri byas na/ tshorlabs rings byad
mchog yin no// tsan dan 'bras bu brgya blangs la// 'bras dang mar shas bsras byas te// 'bum phrag brgya ni rab bzlas la// sbyin sug byas na lha mthong 'gyur// dur khrod ro bsregs yol/ pa'i shing//
brtul zhugs can gyis gzugs su bri// spong ba'i khu bas bsku byas la// sngags khri bzlas pas maNos thobs 'gyur// grub paM'i yungs kar blangs byas na// 'a bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas byas na/
sprul gyis bzung nas 'gal ba la// gtor na 'tsho bar thatsom mad// ji gshong chu yi sa blangs la// sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bum byas nas// mgo la bskus pa tsam gyis ni// mgo yi nad ni nyams par/
byed// sngags ni lan bdun mngon bzlas pa'i// lag pas mgo bo mnyes nas ni// mgo ni zug gzer 'byung mi 'gyur// de ni 'di ltar rje tsam med// bram ze yi ni sha dag la// dur khrod sa dong thal
ba las// gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs byas te// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig nga la// do na po g.yas pa na// de bzhin mi mgo g.yon pa na'o/ mdog ni dkar po cher 'dzagis pa// de yis
gdug pa 'joms pa ra byed// bdud rtsi lnga ni shalnga yis// nyin re ba zhun du gtor ma sprin// bdag gi dgra bo choms shagi ces// rnal 'byor pas bdag gsol ba gdab/ nub mo de skad brjod pas
'al/ dgrani tho rangs 'chi bar 'gyur// chu 'gugs la sogs pas gzir zhing// yar na nad kyis thebs par 'gyur// dgra yi bo ro tsa na blang// ma yi rkang sbrabs yongs bkang ste// rab tu
bkang nas 'bum basmras na// shang rtsor rgyu ba'i yi dgas mtshungs// lha rdzas dongs grub kun byed cing// dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
gshin rje gshedanag bo'i rgyud las/ 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed ces bya ba'i ma par phye ba ste dgu pa'o////ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs ni// de nas yang dag bshad par
bya sgrub po bzang po kun byed cing// dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub pa'i// bzang po ma gong rma mad la// shing la sbyangs pas bsdus byas la// nga ba la legs par bkru
bya ste// der 'dug sngags bzlas brtul zhugs can/ dae ma ho ngo mtshar sngags kyi mthu// bsam pa chen po'i 'o dod 'bod// gshin rje gshad rnal 'byor ldan pa'i// yid kyis cung zad
'jigs mi bya/ rnal 'byor lam ni gang 'dod nga// da kun thams cad ster bar byed// ma de dang ni ku bar/ stag dang de las gzhan pa dang// rom dang/ 'u dag la ni// khyo dag gi ni khyad
par dang// dug dang ske tsho tshwa dang ni// de bzhin cho gsum so ban dza// 'di dag legs par sbyar gzugs bya// gshani rje gshed po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// de la rnal 'byor pas gsol
gdab// hAT+Thi la sogs sngags kyis ni// cha ge mo de bdag la stsol// de yi phu yis stor bar byed// gal te rnal 'byor phram phyin// rmi lam gshin rje gshed brdag cing// lce ya
phyogs su khyer bar byed// sad nas de yi pha yis ster// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa la// in+d+ra ni la 'dra ba'i mdog/ tho ba 'dzin ba'i brtul zhugs can// phyag tu tho ba dgod
par bya// zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la// mdog dmar po ste khros pas 'jigs// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jags par mdzad// mkhas pas phyag tu dbyig pa dgod// zhal gsum phyag drug
0 dmar ba la// 'jigs pa chen po bsdigs pa yi// phyagan pad+ma dmar po bsnams// pad+ma zhes bya mkhas pas bsgom// zhal gsum phyag drug ljang khu sta// phyag na ral gri bsnams pa yi
las kun byed par gyur pa'o// ral gri zhes bya rnam bsgom bya// b+ha gar lang ga rnam bsgom nyid// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par bsgom// zhe sdang rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// gtamug rjes dran
bsgom par bya// gti mug rjes dran la dmages nas// phra ma rjes dran bsgom par bya// phyi ma rjes dran rnal 'a byor gyis// 'dod chags rjes dran bsgom par phya/ 'a'ador chags rjes dran rnal 'byor
gyis// phrag dog dran bya brtul zhugs can// so so'i rigs kyi sprin rnams ni// ba spu'i khung nas spro bar bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gtum po'i khro ba bsgom par bya// zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// lha mo bzhi po rapa bsgom bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ rjes su dran pa rami par byed pa ste bcu pa'o/
zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// zhe sdang gshin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan gshAn rje'i dbang du mdzad/ zhe sdang thams cad zad par byed// gti
mug gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// gtamugagashin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan gshin rje gshed dbang mdzod/ gti mug thams cad zad nga ra mdzad/ 'gro ba phra mas mnan mthong
nas// phra ma gshin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan snying DA can gyis mdzad// phra ma thams cad zad par mdzad// 'dod chags kyis mnan 'gro mthong nas//
'dod chags gshIn rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan snying rje can maNod nas// 'dod chags thams cad zad par mdzad// phrag dog gas mnan 'gro mthong nas// phrag dog gshin rje gshed/
gzugs su// ngacom ldan snying can mtshor nas// phrag dog thams cad zad par mdzod// byams pa tsartsi kar gsungs te/ snying rje de bzhin phag mo'o// dbyangs can ma ni dga' ba ste// btang
snyoms go ri'i gakhrugs so// bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyis// rdzogs par byas nas dkyil 'khor gyis// rnal 'byor snying kha'i sa bon spro// 'grub par 'di la the tshom med// de nas da ni
bshad bya ba// spyod pa yi ni mtshan nyid mchol/ gshin rje gshed po 'jigs gzugs kyis// sku dang gsung dang thugs su 'grub// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs su// ma ha mchog ni bkug la zhon//
sbrul nag gis ni brgyan par bya// lcags kyi rdo rje gzugs par bya// sgra yang ser po dag tu bya// gyen maNos pa yi khyad par gyis// mgo la thod pas yang dag bskor// sma ra lkog spu ser por bya
hi/ N+Dil sogs sngags brjod cing// lcags kyi rdo rje mkha' la gsor// rdo rje gahin rje gshed sbyor bas// seng ge 'i sgra yang de la bya// nus pa cung zad skyes pa na// rol cing grong du 'jug
par bya// gar dang bde ba'i cha kun gyis// drug las skyes sogs glu blang bya// de nas rgyal mchin khams mthong na// dar ni 'o ma rab bsgrub bya// 'o ma lasams gcig goms pas// phyag rgya chen po
rab bsab bya// phag mo yi ni gzugs gzung ba'i// btsun mo kun la 'khyud pa yis// dpa' bo sa ya ge bzhin du sbyar// 'dod pa' don kun rab tu 'grub// de nas da ni bshad bya ba// phyag rgya ma
narab sgeb thabs// gsang sngags chen po yi ge gcig/ de yi bzlas pa mngon bshad bya// yi ge hri las byung ba yi//mahayang dag bsgom bya ste// rdo rje dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ ma ha stong du bsgom
par bya// gang yang cung zad gcod cing 'bogs// mtshon cha sna tshogs gzugs de na// ma sna tshogs sgrub pa yi// blo dang ldan pa'i phyag na bsnams// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dbyig pa gshin rje
gshen sgrub thabs// yi ge hrin gsang sngags che// ma de chen mo la bcibs pa// phal ni 'bum phrag rdzogs pa'i phyag/ sku ni mi ro'i thal bas bskos/ ri rab dang ni mnyam pa'i lus// gser gyis
sa gzhi thug par mnan// de nas yang dag bshad bye ba// bye ba'i phyagacan sgrub pa'i thabs// yi ge hri las byung ba'i gtso/ we kri tA na gsang sngags che// o shI/ wi kri tAn na hU~MhU~M phaT phaT ha

hAhi hi hu hU he hi ho ho ngo ha phaT swA hA// dgos pa thams cad sgrub pa yi/ dam tshig sgrub thabs ba shad par bya// sngags kyis dub pas kha zas bza'// ngan pa dang bral rnyed bkad min// sha chen dang/
ni rta dang ni// glang po che yi khyad par dang/ ba glang gi dang khyi dang ni// bong bu rnga mo cisbyang ngo// sngon po dang ni bsras pa yi// snum chen gyis ni lus byugs na// lus la byugs pa
tsam gyis ni// 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur// snang mdzad saM du ba ra dang// de bzhin bil ba'i lo ma dang// so phag phyam bsras pa dang// gsor shing lo ma'i khu ba rnams/ 'di yis drale phyas
byas gyur na// khams gsum pa ni dbang du 'gyur// dug dang chu bur de bzhinematshe// dral phyis byas pas nyams par byed// gci bachen po btung bar bya// rngo rje bdud rtsi de khazhin du// 'di ni rnal

T+Tha 'byor mchog gtso bo// rang byung me tog bdung ba bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ spyod pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rim par phye ba bcu
gcig pa'o// so//de nas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig rdoNi sems dpa'i ngo bo tsar tsi ka'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing// pha ga ma'i rnam pa'i

tsha ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ dbyangs can gyisa rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ go ri ma'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par zhugs te/ mchod pa'i glu 'di dag
brjod pa ra mdzad do// a kyi kyi gshin rje gshed nag bla// srin po'i gzugs can rang bzhani khyod// bdag gis khyod mthong shani tu 'jagis// khros pa'i rang bzhin 'di thong mdzod// mtho ris sa
steng sa 'og bcas// khyod kyi gar gyis g.yos par mdzod// an tsa nag po bcag 'dra ba'i// khro khyod ro langs zhi gar mdzod// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul zhing// mdangs nag chad ni thung ba la//
bde chen ngo bo bro gar gyis// rdo rabyangs can ma gsol 'debs// d+hI wi sngags dang gar gyis khyod// srid pa gsum gyi 'phrul pa mchod// snying rje khros pa'i dang grol gar// 'gro bas dad ni ngo
mchor 'gyur/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bzlas pa yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ bzlas pa gang zhig rab bzlas na// dngos grub yangs pa thob pa ni// myur bar ma yin dal bar min// ring du
ma yin thung du min// sngags ni cung zad thos par bsgyus// ga sprin rje slob dpon mi mchog gi/ ma ho me dang so gnyis dang// ba lang dang ni rta dag dang/ dbong bu ja mo'i rus pa las// bzlas
pa'i 'phreng ba rab bsgrub bya// zla ngo gcig ga bcu bzhi la// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// sha lnga dag ni bsdu byas nas// pazlas na dngos grub 'grub pa'i mchog/ ril bu dag ni so sol// rnal
'byor pa yis gshin gshed bsgom// mkhas pas ni yang mi mgo ste// khrag gis bkang pa'i mgo bsgom bya/ khri tsam gyis ni 'byung po rnams// mkha' 'gro ma rnams stong phrag dag/ bdud
dang yi dgas tshogs kyang 'chi// gshin gshed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'bum bzlas pa// des ni las kun byed pa yin// bya ba bzlas na dngos grub ster// bya ba la bzlas
smos ci dgos// nyin re 'am yang na zla re 'am// de bzhin lon ri re 'am// gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi sbyin// dbyug gu drug cu tsakhari shes// rtag tu cung zad ci za dang/
de bzhin cung zad 'thung ba dang// gzhan yang bza' ba thams cad kyi// phunani gshin rje gshed la dbul// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bla ma la ni yon dbul ba'o// lasani thams cad sgrub
pa dang// bdag 'di zhi bar byed pa'i phyir// bdag nyid kyang ni dbul ba dang// rta dang ba dang glang po dang// gsar dang de las gzhan pa dang// rang gi rlungam de bzhin du// ma dang sring mo
T+Tha cho mo dang// de bzhin dun spun zla dang// na bza' sna tshogs dag dang ni// gdugs dang rdul yab mdzes pa dang// khyim dang gdan dar dri zhim dang// de bzhin glu dang rol mo dang// ral gri
dang ni rgyan dag dang// brtul zhugs can gyis bla mar dbul// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshAn Dugashen nag po'i rgyud las/ nye bar mkho ba'i las kyi khyad par
h+pha thams ces bya ste rim par phye ba bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas sems can thams cad kyi// sdig pa dag ni ji snyan sa// de dag gcod pa'i gri gug// gzhi dang gcod
pa'i shubs can no// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ring ba'i zlos pa sgrub pa'i phyir// rdorje mkha' 'gro ma sgrub thabs// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gtogs par// nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor mchog bsam bya// gnas der rtse lnga pa yang sgom// de yi steng du gnas dgod bya// mthing mdog nag po 'jigs tshul la// phyag drug 'jigs su rung ba ste// phyag na rdo rje bsnamA
bsgom bya// phyag gzhan dag la gzhan dag dgod// shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma// phyag drug gti mug rdoN+Damachongs// lag na nga khor lo 'aN+Dags par byed// bsgom bya sbyor ba'i
dkyil 'khor du// lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro ma// phyag drug pha ma dang mtshungs pa// phyag na rin chen rab 'bar ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// nub tu pad+ma'i mkha' 'grom/
phyag drug pad 'dzin pa'o// byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// ral gri 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor ram pa'o// me la sogs pa mchoms bzhi ru// lha ma bsgom bya brtul zhugs can//
lA s+ya mA le de bzhin grwar// glu ma yo ni khyad par ro// las kyi cho ga mthong ba des// der ni sgong skyes bsgom par bya// tho ba dbyig pa dang pad+ma// de bzhin gzhan ni ral gri'o//
so ba dzA[']ki nI/ o tun+d+ha DA ki nI/ oM rat+na TA ki nI/ o pad+maNA kini/ oM karma TA ki nI/ lo naM ga maM/ mchims su'o// oM mud ga ra dza/ o rANA hA/ o par u0f97paM/
o khak+ka ho/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdorje can gyis rdo mkha' 'gro mi'i sgrub thabs gsungs pa'o// ring po'i thos pa sgrub don du// rdorje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya// de ni gsang sngags
dkyi dngos grub ba grub par 'gyur te/ oM A kA sha tsa ra badz+dzoTak+ki nI sAhA// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rnoN+Di sa 'og sgrub thabs so// sa 'og rnam par bsgyur don du//
gnod mdzes rdo rje bsgom par bya// phyag drug mdog sngon 'aTaMgs pa yi// phyag tu gtun shing dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyal dag tu// 'di ni rab tu dgod par bya// shar du spyan ma
dgod par bya// de bzhin lho rum ma kA// nub tu lha mo gos dkar mo/// sgrol ma byang bag phyogs su dgod// ma tog spos dang de bzhin dri// mar me la sogs mtshams su dgod// tho ba la sog
sgo drung sta/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags byas// las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni// dkyil 'khor 'di ltar bsgom par bya// rdo rjes 'og sbyor ldan pas// rmi lam du ni lam mthong 'gyur/ 'danas
ya nga dag bshad bya ba// bdun pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te// mkha' spyod nyid ni rab sbrab phyir// rta yi mchog ni rab tu sgrub// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcage pa// sku mdog ljang khu 'jigs
par byed// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du gzhag/ rta yi gdong nga rab mdzes pas// g.yas pa srad du khu tshur bcas// phyag g.yon pa ni thod pa'o// o 6 phu paM hAhi/ gsang sngags 'di ni
mkhas pas bzla/ rta yi mchog tu gyur par grags/ shar du ba Da bang bsgom bya// lho phyogs su na rim gro ma// nub tu bdun dang rgyal bo ste// bdag po'i phyag dag ji lta dang/ thams cad
[+/]de dang 'dra bar bsgom// sngags 'di yis ni thams cad du// gshegs su gsol bar rab tu grags// smyug ma'i gling bu pi wang dang/ rdza blum rje bran mchoms su gzhag/ ban glang sna dang glang po'i
sna// de bzhin gdong bzang gdong nga na te// gtun shing dang ni sta re dang// lcags kyu dang+gan zhags pa dang// gar la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sgo bzhi ru ni rtag tu sgom// sngo chags g.yon par
bsgom par bya// rang gi phyag mtshan na bzhin g.yas// dziltar rta mchog sngags kyis ni// rdzoN+Di sa 'og gi yang gter// rta mchog rnal 'byor nyid kyi sa ni// khams gsum nam mkha'i khams su 'gyur//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje ga yid nag po'i rgyud las// dngos grub nges par bstan pa ste rim par phye ba bcu gsum pa'o/// de la 'di ni srid

bu brgyung ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ste/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NaM a d+ya nutAnA tAta oM A/ hU~M/ dpal ldan gany+tsani rje gshed bsgoms la// slob ma rnam snang mdzad du sgom// ye shes thage mchog
rtse mo rtse// shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas gdab// de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig go/ oM AhUM/ dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur rnam par bya// de yi sgo yi nyi shu'i chod/ bzhi pa'i rnam
lnga mnyam byugs pa'i// skud pa sangs rgyas kyis rab brtags// de la 'di ni jorje chen po'i gsol ba btab pa'i dam tshig go/ a ma do sangs rgyas slob dpon che// e ma ho chos dang tshogs kyi gtso//
dam tshig dam tshig bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang thadar la stsol// de la 'di ni sa chen po yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga ste/ rdo rje se'i lha mo bsub la// lha mo khyod ni/
dpang du gyur// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa yi ni khyad par dang// sa dang pa rol phyin pa la'o// sgo na ga la 29oMr chachargyar de// khyams chen ran mo/ 1 1 ( pa nyin chen pos

shes par bya// yid du 'ong zhing le gas smras pa'i// mu khyud sgom tsam shes par bya// lha yi snam bu'ang de tsam mo// rdo rje lha mo ldan pa yis// glu dang rol mo gar du dgod// mchod snam so yi phyed

nyid de// 'gram dang ngos kyang de tsam mo// doshal samo dodang ni// nyi ma zla ba ma tog 'phrang/ de la gos dang ra dzan dal lo// rtsa ba sa yi thagi rgya ba tu/ tshon rtsi'i sna bu de yi phyud// sAng po
chen po 'dis// bdag nyid 'khor lo rnam par dgod// dar ni rang gi phyag rgya'ang partan// dam tshig ye shes gzhug pa ste// de ltar dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// bdu da kar pa chen po ste//

ma lhor ni sar po dang ldan pas// nub kyi charani dmar pa 'o// lcang du ljang khu dang ldan pa// in+danI la 'od 'dra ba'i// dbus kyi char na yang dag pri// de la phyag rgya dgod par bya// las kyi cho ga mthong

nas ni// rtag tu phyag rgyamakha' mnyam pa/ phyag rgya de nyid rtag tu bri// de yi dkyil du rdoNi bi// shar du 'khor la yang dag bri// de lta bu la sogs pa blta// phyag mtshan kun tu zhal dang mtshungs

[p]de la 'di yi dgang gzar na// de yi u ba'i tshad bya ba// khru gang dang ni ldan par bya// de yi dkyil 'khor rtsa mo ni// sor bzhi pa la zlum por bya// gting du sor gnyis zab pa la// de la sor phyed ma chud/
byas nga 'o/ blugs gzar pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra ba'i// khani mthe bo'i lto gang la// de la sor gcig tsam zab pa/ rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu bsngags// dkyila 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang// mtshams med lnga/
ni byas pa dang// sems can srog ni gcod pa dang// 'a dang shani mngon za dang// chang la mngon par dad pa dang/ [”]chad lta'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa dang// mngon par dbang ni ma bskur dang/
kun tu 'khyam nang ljom pa dang// grong gi gla mi byen pas kyang// gshin rje gshed rgyud mngon gzhol na// nag po'i tshig ni ji lta bar// grub pa 'di la the tshom med// de nas byams pa la sogs

kyis/ roN+Di ngas nga 'di mthong nas// rdoNi byang chub sams dang/ 'a kun// mi sna bar M ni sdod par 'gyur// de la 'di ni rnaN+Da dbab pa 'i cho ga'o// 'byung bzhi'i sa bon chen po yas// 'khor lo bzhi
ni rab bsgrub bya// gnas bzhi rab tu sbyor bas bsam// nam mkhar lani g.yo bar byed// rkang pa dag gi 'og tu yaM// lte bar raM ste snying khar laM// mgo bo la ni yi ge paM// yi ge ya na rdeg
chen po/ drag la rngam pa la 'gyur ba'i// gru gsum srog pa'i ma ltar 'bar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur dmar// rdo rjes gzhi 'dzan bzod pa'i// ser po chen po gru bzhi pa// ri rab
ri yas mnan pa yi// nor 'dzin de ni bsgom par bya// dkar po zlum po bsal chen po// sprin bzhin du ni char pa 'dzin// sgyu mtsho du ma chus gang ba'i// gangs kyir bo ltar//
bsil ba'i// gnas bzhi ru ni sbyor bas na// khar ni snang ba mtha' yas te// slob ma rdo rje bsgom par bya// myur ba ru ni 'bebs par byed// de la 'di ni dri ba'i cho ga'o// rdoN+Di chos ni mgon chen
pod d+hasnang ba mtha' yas bde ba che// gsungs shag 'dod chags chos chen po// dge dang mi dag legs par dri khru gang nas ni brtsams nas ni// ji srid khruni stong gi bar// slob ma chen po
bapar bar 'gyur// de ni 'bab pa'i cho ga'o// 'jigs gzugs ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni/ de nas yang dag bshad par bya// sa ni 'dzam po blang byas la// brtul zhugs can gyis bzlas pa bya/
sran gye'u 'o ma ra bzhin sha// bu ram tin nan la sogs// snum dang nam pa'i lo ma dang/ na ti de bzhin dza ga sa/dang por dkar por bri bar bya// kha dog gzhan gyis de nas bsgom/
khag jo rgyus dang ni btsag dag las// rgya skyegs lta bu'i mdog tu 'gyuro// yung ba de dag rnams dag las// de bzhin kha dog ljang khur 'gyur// sngon po dag ni rams kyis bya// de bzhin du bas
nag po yi// ldeng ngos kyis ni ser po ste// dmar po de bzhin mtshal gyis so// de la bal ba'i snying po gzhug/ sa cang nyung dang mang ba yin// mangs na nag por 'gyur ba ste// nyungos
na de bzhin 'thul bar 'gyur// gzugs ni khro dang zhi ba'o// mtshan nyid dag ni bshad par bya// rol ba zhi bar gsungs pa ste// khro bo sbom la byung bar bshad// sna ni sor bzhi bya ba ste// dpral
ba ko so mchu de bzhin// mgrin pa 'gram pa de bzhin mtshan// sor bzhi dag tu bya ba yin// zhi shu rtsa bzhi lag pa la/rgyan du sar ni nyi shu yin// lag pa rkang pa gdong ji ltar// mig ni mthe
yang gang tsam ste// rna ba gnyis la sor gnyis bsgrugs/ 'bras bu gnyis pa de bzhin bzhi// mchu na sor gnyis bsdoms pa'o/ lte ba sor gcig thob pa yin// lus ni mgrin pa bor ba
yod dgadong ni sum 'gyur lus la dgod// ral pa cod pan de yi tshad// rin chen cod pan sor drug pa'o// ral pa gcig ma rab sgrub thabs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gnod sbyin
mo ni sgrog 'dod pas// ral pa gcig ma rab sgrub thabs// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig ste// gri gug dang ni thod pa la// shin tu sbom la mdog sngo ba/ dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom
par bya// dzaM b+ha la na shar du sgom/ ba su d+han lho phyogs su// chu dbang nub tu dgod par bya/ byang du rna chag rkos rko 'phyung// ma la sogs pa'i mchoms dag tu// gnod sbyin mo bzhi rnam
bzhi bya// ku ta la kye de ni rgya haM// sun d+ha ri cho ga bzhin dgod// der ni sgo ba rnams bsgoms te// tho pa la sogasamanyam par ro// 'khor lo snga ma mthong ba bzhin// de bzhin mdog
ni zab sbyang bya// phyag mtshan bdaguni ltar 'dzin pa// mkhas pas phyi nas sngags bzlas te// o a ka dza Ti ba su d+ha ra Ni swAhA/ puk+ka si ni rab sgrub thabs/
de nas yang dag bshad nga ra bya// gang zhig bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum la 'tsho nus pa// sku mdog ser po zhal bzhi pa// phyag bzhi bong bu la bcibs pa//
puk+ka sa yi lus bsgom bya// zhags pa tho ba mda' dag dang// brtul zhugs can gyis gzhu bcas sgom// o puk+ka si saM zhes sngags brjod do// 'jam nga 'i joNa'i dkya'i
'khor ni// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// de yi mod la mi snang bar M/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje grags 'gyur ba// 'bar ba'i gser 'od 'dra ba yi// sar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/
gzhon nu'i gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mgon// mi mthong bya ba'i don du sgom// shar du mdzes ma dgod par bya// de bzhin lho ru sku can ma// nub du ser po bsgom par bya// byang
du nye ba'i ska can ma// thams cad phyag na ral gri dang// 'khor lo la sogs gzhan la dgong// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// sa bon
ya ga maM las byung/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus na bzhugs// thams cad zhabs ni g.yon brkyang bas// ri bong can gyi gdan la bzhugs// 'od zer can dang ri khrod ma// de bzhin
nor 'dzin skul byed ma// ma la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru// bsdus pa dgod bya snying po la'o// mya ngan med dang yal 'dab dang// 'bras kyi snyam dbyig pa'o// ser dang ljang dang yang
sar po// dkar po'i lus ni bsgom par bya// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ dkyil 'khor dag tu gdab par bya// tho ba la sogs sgo ba bzhi// bsgoms na mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud pas/ 'jam pa'i rdo sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste rim par phye ba bcu bzhi pa'o//
'phags pa 'jong gu la'i sgrub thobs// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// gang zhig bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// chu yi steng nas 'gro 'gyur po// ser po zhal gsum phyag drug nga// sa bon du
las yang dag byung// sku chen phyag na sprul bsnams po// rma bya la ni zhon par dgod// shar du rma bya dgod par bya// de bzhin lho ru khro gnyer can// nub tu ri khrod lo ma can/ 'byong du rdo rje
lcags sgrog ma// rma bya'i sgro dang spyi blugs dang// lo ma dang ni lcags sgrog ma// de dag rnam par bsgom par bya// ser dang dmar dang de bzhin lcang// kha dog sngon po dbye ba nyid// mkhas
