'khor lo'adir ni bcug pa gang// sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/ dam chos smod pa 'ang de bzhin shi// 'khor los sbyar ba'ang dbang du 'du// lha min phra ti'ang zhi bar byed// dgra bcom gsod
pa'i ng de zhil// brgya byin nyid kyang dbang du nges// de lta bu yi 'khor lo de// thog mar bris te de 'og tu/ byin brlabs mo nor de nyid la// mchod pa gus par bdag gis bya// mchod min las rnams
byed pa la// 'bras bu 'byung min 'khrul pa la'ang// 'bras med ngal ba nyid yin no/ yang lha mo longs ma nyid stan las langs te mchod pa chen po byas te 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// 'khor lo
'dri ba'i snag tsha gang// bri gzhi sku gu ji lta bu// gcig gam 'on te de tha dad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// khacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs so legs so// de'i
par legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// ji ltar las rnams bye brag yod pa ltar/ 'khri ba'i gnas dang bzhugs pa'i gnas// bla dang de bzhin 'khor lo sgrub// snag che ba dang 'bru/
rnams bzhin// grong khyer chen po bsrung 'dod dam/ skyes pa bsrung bar 'dod na yang// gro ga de bzhin u b+hishun// zla gor zho sha'i shun pa 'am// ras la kha chos 'khor lon// bskul ba'i chig
dang ldan par ro// so ma btang ba'i kham phor du// sgrung mar dag dbus 'khor gzhug/ skud pa dkar pos legs par dkri// nang par shar du kha bltas te// ma tog dkar po dag gis mchod//
0 @#// bdag nyid dkar po'i mdog tu bsam// mdun du skyes pa zla ba la// mtha' dag gnas pa mdun du bsam// sangs rgyas phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yis// bdud rtsi lngas gang
[+ ]bum pa yis// chu rgyun dag gi dbang bskur te// de 'og bzlas pa brtsam par bya// swAhA'i ston du bskul tshag ldan// bud med lani gi'u wang ste// phyi rol mchoms bzhir phur pa yis// bgegs bskrad

steng du bla re bre// kye ma skyes pa'i ji bzhin no// bye brag tu yang skyes pa 'am// bud med zhi bar 'dod na yang// ga bur tsan dan dag gis ni// shAr sha shing gi shun pa la// 'khor lo ya ga legs bris te/
shar du nang par bltas te mchod// las kun byed pa'i thab la yang// sngon gsungasazhal ldan dgod par bya// phyi rol mtshams bzhir phur pa yis// bgags bstan stong du bla re bre// bum pa kha
rgyan dang ldan zhing// ran chen 'khru dang sman du ldan// dri zhim chu dang ldan par bya// gos bzang gis na mgrin pa dkaM// phyogs bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya// thang ka 'am dkyil 'khor la mchod do//
dri 'am chu dang ma tog dang// bsras pa'i skyor mos chu yang blugs// gzar bu stong gas sbyin sreg bya// chu das gzhan yang gtor bar bya// bar ma chad par nyin bdun du// ra ltar rgyun du gtor/
ma sbyin// phyi nas 'khor lo rin chen de// bum pa'i nang nas rnam phyung ste// rgyal mtshan rtse la btags nas su// gnas mthon por yang gzhag par bya// zhi bar byed par the tshom mde//
sngar ba shad pa yi shing kun dang// dur khrod ras la sgrub po yis// yung ba'i khu bas 'khor lo bri// so ma btang ba'i kham phor du// sgrub pa'i rkang rdzes sa dag dang// snang mdzad chungogs sa dag/
dang// ri dang lam sa btags nas ni// ldong ros dngo ni yung ba yi// khu bas sbrus te gzugs byas la// 'khor lo gnyis dril yung ba dang// ldong ros kyi ni khu bas bsku// snying khar bcug/
ste gzhug par bya// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pas// lus la sogs pa gdab par bya// dgra rnams 'ong ba'i lam du yang// khung bur brkos te gzhug par bya// laM los dbang chen gyis
mnanatsang// su las skyes pa de stangs na// sna tshogs las kyis mnan pa yi// kham phor skud sar dkri bar bya// rgyal chen dgan sar po yang// dbang chen la gnas lhor bltas te// bsgrub
bya ser po'i ris mnan par// bsams nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya// smAsAmed par sam+b+ha ya// laM gyi mtha' can lnga stong bzlus// gtor ma rgyun du sbyin par bya// rengs pa chen po'i las 'od
yas// dmag gi dpung yang nges par rengs// 'ga' tsam la na smos ci dgos// sranan lan gsum bsngags pa yis// dur khrod las la 'khor lo bri// rams dang dug gis zin pa ste// de yi
steng du gzhag par bya// bdag nyid dkar por rnam bsams te// cho gas byab cing ga don par bya// de na de nas zhi bar 'gyur// ngag dag rengs par 'dod na yang// smyo byed khu ba dur khrod sol////
bya@#// btsag rnams bsdus te so ma btang// kham por gnyis la 'khor lo 'di// pho dang mo yi bskor phyogs gnyis// mnor bris te kha sbyar la// ro bsregs sa dang thal//
bas g.yogs// stong du bzlas shing spel bani// sta na dang u ru laM// sAhA med pa'i sngags 'di Asi// kha bcing ba ni nges par 'gyur// gang zhig gsad par byed pa la// snying N+Dar ldan pi'
gar thag gsi// gtug byed las 'di byed pa la// gshin dgra lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// zhes gcig gis ni 'grub par byed// bcu bzhi nyi ma phyed pa na// bya rog sgro rtsa'i sku gu yis//
dur khrod kyin pas dag la// dug dang tshwa dang skya tsho dang// nim pa tsha ba gsum dag dang// tsho ba'i mar khu dur khrod sol// so byed mdzub mo'i khrag gis bri// ro bsregs pa yi thal ba dang///
bsgrub bya'i rkang pa'i chos kyi sa// ma ya rus phya la so gas la// gzugs byas de yi snying khar gzhug/ dur mo dag la dri bsro zhing// khros pa'i sems kyis khri bzlas na// skad cig tsam
gyis 'chi ba ni// de yi khyim mam dur du sa// de lta'i las kyi de 'grub ste// mchonamo phyad na kha lhor blta// bdag nyid 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te// zhal sogs sngon du gsungs pa ltar//
ma re'i steng na mche ba gtsigs// gsus khyomi chal gyen sgra 'bar// spu so gas gzhan yang de 'dra 'o// ba spu dag gi bu ga nas/ 'jigs mtshon sna tshogs thogs pa yi// khro bo mang
@#/po 'phro ba ste// bdag nyid bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// bsgrub bya mdun du bsam bya ba// mtshams med rdzogs pa'i sdig dang lhan// dri ma can de phyogs gos 'chang// grong khyer/
skya bas 'tsho ba can// grang ba'i rig pas lus la rgyas// mtshon gyis btab pa byas pa la/ gcan gzan sogs bla mdun du bsam// gang du'ang de ltar yang yang brjod/ lcags kyi khyud
mos yan lag bsdams// tsher mas dbug pa byas pa ste// lus ni pags pa med par bsam// sku tshe lan chos lus byugs te// u chu ba yo sla byin bsam// de yi mgon skyabs bsal
byas nas// gshin rdzu'i lte ba'i mtha' mar gzhag/ bcon thogs pas de ba'o// 'di ltar bsad pas sangs rgyas kyi// sras su de ni skye bar 'gyur// las kyi sdug las de grol lo//
gsod pa'i sngags de spel bani// hU~Mcha ga momA ra ya hU~M/ bsgrub bya nang dag dbu ban/ ma ha rta yi pags pa dag/ yang na ro dang dur khrod ras// rta dang ma ha bya la 'am// khyo dang nim pa'i
'dab khu dang// khyim bya'i khrag dang skache bas// naroni 'khor lo 'di bris te// rnam par 'gras pa bskul dang ldan// rta sbal dag gi nang bcug ste// ma ha'i rmag pa'i nang bcug la// stong
phrag bcu ni tshang bar bzlos// rnam pa'i shing bsros de nang sa// de nang 'gras pa nyid dang ni// dpag tshadaM brgyas chos 'bab par 'gyur// a mu ki dang a mu ki/ bi dro kha ya phaT/ rims
kyis thebs par bya ba la// dur khrod ko ba che ba la// arga shing gi lo ma dang// tsi tra ka dang sku tshe dang// khrag gse 'khor lo grwa bar bya/ bi ba brkos la ri mo dag/ sang
ldeng mdagam du med la// bsro zhing khros pas lnga brgya bzla// khyim dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang// dur khrod sbasan rims kyis 'dzin// rgyas pa'i las kyis rgyas 'dod na// ga'u wang gos ni gro ga la//

'khor lo la/nyis ni rnam bris te// bskul tshags ldan par yi ge bri// zla drug thad kyimadun dag tu// gnod sngon dang ni gnod sbyin mos// rin chen charani 'bebs pa dang// gshin nagra serapo zla sor la//
ts+tshA gnas par bsams te khri bzlas na// 'phags pa nor 'dzin 'dra bar 'gyur// o che ge mo ru ku ru o/ gro ga sogs kyishegashog l// gi'u wang dang ni rang byung gi/ me tog dag gis bri ba ste// yang

na tha dag khrag dang ni// bal ba'i lo ma'i khu ba dang// ras dmar ngo yi khu ba dang// rtsi rnams bsros la bri bar bya// smra tshil gyis ni 'khor lo cha la// bum pa mar sbyang ldan par gzhag/ dus bzhi dag tu

mchod pa ni// me tog dmar posamachod pa'o// de tsho bzlas patshul ragani// hob kaM ku ru rdo// da ma thag tu lha rnams kyang// dbang du byed par des 'gyur ro// gro ga dag la bri ba ni// zla ba gzas tsan dus

nag gam// rgyal gyi nyin par bri bya ste// skud pa dmar pos 'khor lo dak+khi// me tog dmar pos mchod pa bya// thod pa kha sbyar nang gzhag sta// bal+las pa khri ni brgya byin gyi// bu mo'ang rnyed par res 'gyur/
ro// dur khrod kyi naras dar la/gur kum sogs kyis 'khor lo bri// yi ge thig les rnam bskor te// a mu ki dang mA ma kI// mo sa na dang rnam stsal la// bsgrub pa'i gos kyi mtha' ma la// legs btags/
chos kyi dbyangs nyid du/ bsgoms nas blos shing 'gro na yang// lha dang lha min gyisam mthong/ bdag nyid gshin dgra nyid bsgoms nas// chu yi steng nas 'gro 2 dod na/ rdul phran lnga ya rnam par te/
orgyan du ni bdag rang nyid// nges par steng 'gro gzhan dag kyang// bu mosazhags kyi ras bal la// skad pa bkal ba gzhon nu mas/ sum sgril du yang de yis bya// gdug sngags stong du chong bar te//
bslu tshul sngon du gsungs pa bzhin/ skar ma rgyal gyi dus la bzla// dri ba'i nyin mor nga rte 'a 'o// da kyalaM 'khor gyi na myur pa Na9// g.yon gyis mdun byas gzhan gdags/ ma lus mtshon dka rongs
byed de// gcer bu la yang rengs par byed/ me tob la sani gzhan du min// gsal sogs kyi ri la kun// legs par grang/ da la skom sa lcags gsum dpa/ sa dkri bar bya// bzlas shing mchod
pa khyen pa'i tshe// dngul dag gan rings bzhin bya// 'bar bar gyur pa nyid na yang/ mchod pa legs par rnam byas te/ bskor ra b+hArgya phrag du ma bya// de nas blo ldan sgrub pa pos// khar bcug tsam
gyis 'dod pa sgrub/ 'phyung na sngon ltar rnal ma nyid/ gso ba 'dra bas 'o mas kyang// nges par 'khrul 'khor bkru bar bya// rig sngags 'khrul 'khor las grol te/ rnal ma nyid la gnas pa yin//
snum ltar dag gi sa bon la// nya lcibs dang ni byi tang ka/ khu bas yang de byugs pa la// thod pa sas ni rnam bkang bar// sngas te ra smras pa grangs med bya// de chomachod/
dang gtor ma dag/ yongs rgyas 'bras bu rnams blangs te// khar bcug mkha' 'gro byas 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// zhus dang 'das byung gdug ra dang// mngon par rtogs pa'i tang
nga'adzin// dkyil 'khor rnam par spos pa dang// thog gis gzhal yas mtshan pa dang// rdul tshon phyogs las rnam par brtags// yang dag byon gyis brlabs pa dang// bdud rtsi myang bar
bya ba dang// chongs pa'i gnas bzhi sgom pa dang// sngags kyi dngos med de bzhin mtshams// chos 'byung dang na sgrub po dang// bzlos dang de yi grangs tshad dang// 'a khor lo dang ni yi ge
ny+nyo/ gnyis// nges par zhus dang mchod pa dang// 'khor lo 'dri pa'i mtshan ma dang// 'byung ba bzhi dang bsdu sogs dang// sdom pa 'khor lo'i yi ge bri// gzhi dang de bzhin sAg tsho dang// so so
las kyi bye brag ste/ bsdus te nga yis bstan pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po rnams la gtor mas tshim par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// sku dang/

gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las sngags 'od phyung ngo// o siSh+Tha wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ 'byung po rnams dang rnam sprul te// tha mar sbyar pa byas pa na// hi hi hA yaM pho pho sAhA//
ba/ dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam bzhugs pa'i// zhe sdang gshin gshed rdo rje'i// spros med nam mkha' lta bu las// sAng rje thabs kyis sku sprul pa// ye shes khro rgyal ra pa 'jigs pa'i// dur kha mun/
chen sku la 'dud// gar dgu nyams dang ldan pa yi// gti mug rdo rje gshin N+Di gshed// sumed don dam ngang nyid las// thabs kyis sgol pa'i skur bstan pa// 'jigs byed drag po'i cha lugs
can/ zla ba nya 'dra khyod la 'dur// bskal pa'i ma ltar 'bar ba yi// ser sna gshin rje tshani// 'dzin pa po las grol ba yis// gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo'i sbal// gter 'chang sar sna grol
mdzad pa// bco ma gsar 'dra khyod la 'dud// chags pas ma lus dbang mdzad pa'i// 'dod chags g.yaMn rdo rjeni// skye med rnam dag chos dbyings la/[0f38]khams gsum pa dag khro bar
smral// ma chags smyan ldan thugs rje can// ban du lta bu'i sku la 'dud// shes rab thabs ldan he ru ka/ phrag dog gshAn rje rdo rje ni rnam rtog dang dang bral ba las// thugs rje sprul pa'i khro
khor ni// 'gro don brtson pa'i ral gri can// sna tshogs mdog can khyod la 'dud// thams cad bskyed pa'i lha mo che// dbang po lta bur bsgyur mdzod nga// khams gsum gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan//
rnam snang can gyis bdud bzhi 'jigs// bde ba chen pos rtag tu dgyes// ye shes spyan can khyod la 'dud// kun sdud lha mo ran po tsa/ rnam rtog skyon las rnam grol yang// dus gsum bde
gshegs bdag gire byed// rin chen tog can mdzes pa'i sku// don dam thugs chud 'khor ba sel// ma lus kun gyi bdag la 'dud// 'dus byas ma lus srog byed pa//
rnam rtog zhi ba'i rang bzhin las// khams gsum ma lus sgrol bar byed// 'od dpag med kyis rab mdzes pa// ma chags phyag na bsnams pa yi// 'phrin las dag byed can la 'dud// thugs
rjes g.yo ba'i rang bzhin can// 'dzag rten gsum da ba sgrol bar byed// gnyis med bde chen ngang nyid las// 'phrin las grub pa'i rang bzhin can// btang snyoms zhugs par 'gro ba 'dul//
kun tu las kyis rgyal la 'dud// ces gzugs rdoN+Dal sogs pa la so sor yongs subastod do// de nas yang thams cad kyi bdag pos legs so zhes rtsa ba byin talha mo rnams kyi sku la
btsud de/ gdug pa 'jigs pa'i ye gni// bcu bzhi pa la dmigs pa yang// 'khor bar dmigs par bya ba'am// nyi ma'i steng na skyes pa ltar// dmigs te ma yengs brjod pa mod//
bzlas pa nyid ni de ltar bya/ bye la tshang bar bzlas pa las// rab 'byams las la mi 'grub ba// med de de yis thams cad 'grub// 'bum dang sa ya bablas pas kyang// phra mo'i las
rnams 'grub par byed// gzhan du mi 'gro sems kyisan// de lta'i tshul du bzlas pa bya// yul gzhan blon 'gro ba yis// bskal par bzlas kyang 'brasam 'byin// mi 'phro sems kyi sa'adi
0/ zlos shing// lam du zhugs pa'i skyes bu la// lta ba sogs chu yis mi 'jigs so// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// dbang gis blo sbyangs rab ldan pas// 'bras thob de mdami 'grub ste// de bas don/
bshad par bya/ bum pa'i dbang gis thog mar sbyang// gsang ba'i dbang gis gnyis par te// gsum par bya ba de nyidani// shes rab yeshas de yin te// de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yin// brtan g.yo ngos
po ma lus pa// bsgom par bya ba'i rus nyid la// blos na yongs su mi sgom ste/ kun gyi mtshan nyid ma shes na// sgom pa kho na de min te// thams cad dngos nyid yongs shes na/ da ni sgom par yongs
su bsgrags// de nyid bla ma'i kha yis te/ 'a bod pas mnyes bya de mi smad// de la thams cad 'byung ba ste// bla ma la smod g.yo sgyu can// nges par de ni dug dang yang// gdon chen dgan ma lus
pas// 'chi zhing rlabs par de gyur nas// dmyal ba dag tu yun ripaskang// bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal te// rtag tu cho nges 'debs par byed// de bas blo gros chen po la// nam du'ang mi smad gzhan
du na// bkur sti phu dud 'gro ba la// phan pa'i sems kyis de ltar bya// gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba nyid// gang dag dbang lo'i lam 'gro ba// de yi ngo bor bdag gis bya// bsam gtanam byed de blo yA/
kun tu blo yis bsgom par bya/ bcom ldan bdag po chen po yis// gsang dbang lagan rdo rje la/ bos nas gsang ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs// gzugs sgra la sogs drug po rnams// dngos med mkha'i
dang 'dra ba las// longs spyod yul du du mar snang/ shel la tshon ni ji bzhin du// 'dod pa lnga dang chos rnams la// rtag tu rnal 'byor spyod par shog/ a la la ho rol du
sol// mnams par mdzod/ mi 'dzin sgyu ma lta bu la khar rgyas dgyes pa'i rol pa mdzod// rig bya dgag pa med pa la// mi g.yo bzhin du rol par mdzod// hong chags pa med pas chags par
mdzod// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ sngags dang phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i// de yi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i phyir// gsung ni 'di skad la ka' stsal to// lce la sgom pa'i rdoN+Din// rdo rje gnod mdzes

nag po// kha ni kun tu rgyas pa ni// lag gnyis thal mo nges sbyar te// gung mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs nyid la// mthe bong nges par sbyar bar bya// mdzub mo gung mo'i rkyab rtser sbyar// 'di ni dam tshig phyag/

ts+tshA rgya ste// snying kha dpral ba lkog ma dang// spyi bor byin gyis brlabs par bya// o hi wi wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phatra a d+hi ting sAmaM/ gzhan yang rdo rje sems ma sogs// phyag rgyas dbang bskur/
dbu rgyan brtag/ gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa/ so so'i bdag po dbu rgyanacing// dbang bskur chon bum pacho// phyag gis bsnams te dbang bskur ro// 'khor lo las kun byed pa la// gsang dbang
lag na rdo rje yis// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod// gdug pa sgrog byed 'khor lo me ltar 'bar// dus gsum khro rgyal sa ru ka yi thugs// las rnams dag byed phrag dog rdoNo sta// ma lus tshems/
[}]gcod gsol bas sku yi dang// sUdang laT kyi gdug rtsub spyor bas gsung// kun gyi rang bzhin khyod kyi gshin rje yi// ltar 'dzud bka' las des kyang mi 'da' zhing// phyogs bcu'i sprul pa'i gnas nas
'gugs mdzad pa// ma lus kun khyoda 'khor le tsha mchog la// gzhan gyi don rdzogs gus pas phyag 'tshol le/ khyod ni dpa' bo thub chen kun gyi bdud// nga yis lam bstan bdud rnams mi phyed kyang// dam

las 'da' zhing log pa kun skyod la// khyod kyang bka' las ma 'dar las rnams sgrubs// tshodang srog bsdus yan lag rnam par btsangs// bdud rtsi chu rgyun rnal 'byor nga la 'dod sgrub na// ngas ni sbyin bya khyod/

dam las ma 'da' zhig/ ces dpal gshin rje dgra nag po'i 'khor lo gzhan gyi lte ba la gnas 'cha' bar 'dod pa'i gtan 'bo ba ma yin pa'i tshe bya'o// 'khor lo snying khar lta ba'i tshe// sakhen tshul taste ba la// yi ge ma lus

'dod pa yang/ mtshan nyid ngan pa'i rtog pa las// grol te mtha' gsum ngo bo las// klani zad pa'i bdag nyid la// un hU~M gi bdag nyid de// dan sams kyi rang bzhin nyid// dga' las 'das pa'i ye shes te//thabs

shes rab ldan pa las// sa thabs bsten pa'i bdag nyid kyis// 'thob ste gzhan du de mi 'thob// chu'agram chen po bsamatha' dang// dur khrod yang drung dgon pa ste// dben pa'i yul dang ma mo'i khyim// der ni mgon

po 'di la 'bad// gzhan du bsgrubs kyang del 'grub// skadatsagi de la rang bzhin kun// des par mi snang rig pa yi// lam du gyur ba med par shes// 'bras bu don rgya chen te// mtha' yi 'thob pa de yin no// de nas yang
thamasacad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pas rdo rje sa'i cho ga gsungs pa// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin m la// lha mo khyod

mi repang du gyur// srung ba'i dkyil 'khor rab gnas pas// sdang ba'i log 'dren skyo kho dang// bgegs rnams bsal ba 'di skad gsungs// napal ldan bdag ni rdo 'dzin// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas//

bdag gi ya shes rdo rje yis// lus ngag yid du bcas pa dgas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid na// khro bo gshin rje nag po'i bdag/ slob dpon gyisan dkyil 'khor bri// zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o//

dkyil 'khor gyi ni drung nyid du// dar gyis gdong ni bkab pa la// sgo drung gnas pa khyod gang yin// slob dpon gyis ni rab brjod do// des bdag skal ba ldan par brjod// ji ltar bla med dpa' bo yis// mgon la dbang

rgyu ni bskur ba bzhin// bla med byang chub gnas bya'i phyir// bdag la'ang mgon po dbang bskur gsol// ma tog sogs te mchod pa'i mchog/ rab 'byams rgya mtsho ma lus pas// slob dpon dang 'a bo de nyid la// yang yang

mchod cing bstod pa'i tshogs// rgyas par mnyes de 'og tu// dpa' bos de la dbang rnams sbyin// de nas rgyal po bde chen po// dpa' bo longs spyod kun ldan pa// 'gro don brtson pa'i sku gsum bdag/ nyid kyis

'di skad bka' stsal to// sbyin sreg che don 'bras mi 'byin// de bas bdag nyid dam pa yis// de yi las la 'bad par bya// gos nag rgyan gyis rnam brgyan la// gshaMn rjer rnam bltas rnal 'byor pas// khro bo'i

skyil krung bcas pa yis// sran ti'i stan la bdag 'dug nas// las rnams bsgrub par bya bani// mtshan mo 'am nyi ma phyed nyid la// rang 'byung ma yi dkyil 'khor du// hUM phaT mtha' na yod pa yi// sngags kyis shog/

ma bar mtha' mar// sbyin sreg bya ste de mini// dur khrod me 'am rus pa 'am// rje nyid lasan byung ba 'am// tsaN+Dali yi khyim nyid nas// thab khung gru gsum can der na// chor ma can gyi bud shing rdzas// rlung yab sbar te hUM/

dza la raM// dza la hU~M brjod ma sbyar brjod// lag g.yas kusha bcas pa yis// mthe bong srin lag rtsa ru gzugs// oM a de gi mahA t+tA ti de ba ra Ni dI dza sa rta ma gra hI tA A hUMti A hA ri a smin sa ni ha te b+ha ba/

zhes brjod la spyan drang ngo// 'bar ba ma yi dbus nyid du// ming de zad byed ces bya ba// khro bo me ltar du na sum tshogs// ba spu kham po de pazhin du// nu ba'i mdog can zur mig steng du gzigs// sgra chen macha
ba bzhi ldan stobs po che// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// bzhugs nas drag ro 'i yi ge brjod// spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa// ram pa'i gnas la legs par bzhugs// zhal bdun rnam gtsigs ma ga

la/ bcibs pa du ba'i 'phreng rnams 'khrigs// phyag gnyis mdung dang rdo rje 'dzin// gnyis kyis ral gri gri gug 'dzin// de yi g.yas kyi phyogs nyid du// bde bzhin bdun gyi phyogs nyid dam// spyan drangs
byin rlabs ldan pa la// an+d+hu sogs kyis mchod pa bya// oM AhUMpra tIts+tsha swAhA/ lag g.yas mdzub mo mthe bong dag/ skam pa lta bur rnam byas pas// chublangs bskyod pas dbul bar bya// o tar
bya/ dam mthar ni sngon gyi brjod// zhabs bkru ba la shes pa yin// dgang gzar yu ba sor bcu drug/ de min sor bzhi zabs sor gnyis// zur gsum dbus su sor gnyis chod///
rtsa gsum 'a phung pos yongs su bskor// de yi dbus su'ang mtshan ma ste// stag sbrul gang 'dod pas mtshon bya// khu bcug 'dzag pa sor gcig go/ khro bo rdo rjes mchu yi dbyibs// byin brlabs
sor gcig tshad can no/ blugs gzar yu ba sor bcu bzhi// zabs su sor gcig gru gsum dang// yu ba'i mthar na rtse gsum pa// gdengs pa byin brlabs mngon spyod kyi// gzar bu yin par
nga yis bstan// gnam lcags tsher ma can sogs shing// de la de bas sangs rgyas 'jigs// bsreg rdzas gakhrugs brnyan la sogs srog/ stong du tshong bas 'bras bu ni// nges par 'byin par
byed pa yin// g.yon gyi rtsa der dgang gzar la// g.yas pa blugs pa'i gzar ba yi// khan pad+ma'i 'dab ma yin// sor mo gnyis par de rgyas so/ rdo rje bar gyi thod pa dag/ bsreg rdzas kyi
ni snod yin la/ rdzas rnams rdo rje rin chen dpa'// hUM phaT kyi ni mtha' can gyis// bsreg bya sa chu ma dang rlung// nam mkha' lta bu'i dbus su gnas// kha phye gnas pa rtag tu'o// kun tu'ar
kha phyi bskor bar bya// bzhi gnyis 'dab ma'i steng du ste// lte ba dang ni yang dag ldan/ lhan cig rnam par shes pa'i lha// nam mkha' nyid du nges par 'bar// de yi mtshan mar shas bya ba// rdul
gyi rnam par de nyid ro// shig le yi ge med pa ste// rgyun mi 'chad par 'od kyis gnas// brgyar/ shags sku yi tshad kyis so// argas rab tu sbyar bar bya// sngar gsungs 'byung ba rnam bzhi dang/ rnam/
mkhar yang dag ldan pa yi// sor mo lnga dang nges ldan pas// gang gi sbyin sreg des bya'o// gzhan dag sor mo gsum gyis bsus// dmigs pa thams cad 'gags par 'gyur// stong med stong pa nam mkha'
'dra// shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi// phyag rgya chen po dbang du 'gyur// khaMde gshegs kun dang mnyam 'gyur ba// shes rab rang ni snying rje chos// 'gags pa med pa'i chos 'gyur ro// bde chen nam

mkha' lta bu ste// rnal 'byor pa yi dmigs pa yin// mdog gnag 'dab brgyad lta bu la// rgya dang thabs su sor mo na// nyi shu de bzhin bcu pa'i thab// byang du rtse mo bstan pa la/ karoN+Di tho ba'i mchin

ma med// soran bzhi par sri bar bya// de steng sor mo gsum bor bar// kha khyer yang ni de yi tshad/ sa nag bong bu ja mo'i spangs// ma rus 'bras kyi phub ma dang// sel ba'i phyi mas rnam phyugs la/ mi na mi
dri dang bdug pas mchod// dur khrod shang ngam bong bu dang// rnga mo'i sbyangs bskams bud shing ngo// sor gcig gis ni dma' ba yin// man pa de bzhin sang ldeng dang// sa ba de bzhin pasashing dang//

dur khrodashing bu sor bcu pa// rtsa ba'i cha las rnam byung ba// dur khrod mar khu rnams bsgugs la// de yis yag shing bya ba yin// r+ya rog 'ug pa'i gshog pa dang// nim pa'i 'dab ma thal ba dang// rkang
rjes sa dang dong bu dang// rnga ma sogs kyi sbyangs dang ni// spa dang zhag dang bshang ba dang// gci ba mi rus yungs kar dang// yungs mar khrag dang lan tshwa dang// de la sogs pa ra re 'ang

ji ltar rnyed pa'i rdzas rnams ni// dug dang khrag dang smyo byed kyi// 'dab khu thal ba sol ba dang// 'bras kyi phur ma la sogs la// dgra bo da ga ga gzugs byas la// mgo nas brtsams te ral gri yis// dum bur/

btub cing lcags phor du// khrag dang chu dang mi rnams dang// bong bu'i gcin la paT ldan pa'i// gdung ba 'i yi ba rnam bzlas pa'o// rdzas la bsang ga skyor byas nas kyang// slob dpon la sdang rmongs pa 'ad/

brjod tsang sbyin sreg dngul bar bya// de la ra da skad ces bya ste// 'byung po tsham bya gtor ma dang// bstod bzlas mnyes par bya ba dang// dbang gi dbye ba bstan pa dang// dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya ba dang//
de yi sa la mchod pa sogs// cod pan dun bde gshegs gzhag/ mngon spyod sgom gyi cho ga dang/ bsdus nas bar du rnam pa brgyad// pad+ma dkar 'dra mgrin pa ring// gzugs mdzes ha cang ring ba min//

pa la lus la rngul 'byung yid 'phrog ma// drin shin du'ang zhim pa yin// lta stangs mig sogs ri dgas 'dra// mgrin dang lte nga'ang ri dgas kyi// skal bzang rgod pa 'angari dgas kyi// glang chen dri ldan bzhin

'phel che// myos shing nu ma rab tu rgyas// gzhan yang kun rdzob bden pa ni// bong thung de yi sgra yang thung// rkang lag ring zhing bzhin ring ma// zha ya dri bro bong rang mo// lha 'dra skye gnas rab tu ring//
sku gnas chung zhing yan lag rtsub// khong rang de bzhin nu ma mkhreng// sku srab ral sa yan lag chung// sngo bsangs ri mo ma/ma na de gsang ba shes rab rnam gnyis la/ rig mar nga yis bsngags pa yin/

ngang pa'i 'gros can skra 'khyil ma// bzhin zlum nu rgyus lus kyang rgyas// shin tu rang mon dal bar smra// dbus gnas rna 'phyong gnyer gsum can/ mtshan nyid ngan zhing le lo che// yan lag gnag cong sgra/

('khyul ma// khang par gnas shing lus rtsub ma// sa la'i dri 'byung sa la'i bro// zhu spangs de ni skyes bu pazhin// chang bas myos pa'i dpa' mo sta// chang la shin tu chags pa yin// de gnyis de lagis
pa yin// bla ma bla mar nges par yin// 'chi ba'i bsam gtan de nyid ni// bde ba dam pa kho bos 'dod// 'di la'ang bde pa de nyid yin// ka sogs spangs pa'i A li ni// bcu drug yon ta phrag gnyis
po3 'khor la sogs pa'i sa bon yan// zla ba de dag sum cu gnyis// a sogs sbyangs pa'i kal sku// bcu bdun gnyis pa de stongs su/ ya sogs spangs pa man pa nyid// gsum pa'i gsum/
dang dazhi pa'i gzhis// bcu phrag bzhi ste de phyag gnyis// sam mo bzang sogs sa bon te// nyi mar rnam bsgrags de dbus gnas// hU~M dang a yi rang bzhin las// rdorje tho sogs so sor rtog/
thim pas nan tan ye shes te// chod kyi dbyings nyid dag pa ste// gshin dgrar bdag nyid 'dod pa yan// rgyan gyi bye brag lus la gnas// de ni 'di skad bya ba ste// ragi pa shes rab bstan pa dang//
bskyed pa'i rgyu yi bye brag ni// mtha' mar bstan te sdom gsum mo/ mtshon par byed pa'i bdag nyid de// mtshon bya sngon bstan nyid yin no// gshin rje gshed nag po'i las thams cad/
grub par byed pa'i 'khor lo'i rgyud// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badza b+ha ra bA kal tanArAdzA/ bod skad du/ dpal

doN 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshol lo// de nas 'di ni bshad bya ba// ji ltar 'gro rnams zad byed pa// sdug bsngal rnams mthar byed pa yi// bsgrub bya'i tha/

kha chen mchog gyur pa// gsang sngags de las 'a byung bar 'gyur// dang po rnam par snang mdzan do// de dang nye bar ngag dbang phyug reN+Da 'khor lo sgyur ba'o// gdon gyi bdag dang 'khyung po ya mgo dang mtha'

bla ma gnyis ldan bya// mchod rten sreg byed mtha' dang bcas// gzhan du shes par mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje can gyi mtha' la gnas// yi ge 'bum phrag khri brjod na/ nyams pa thams cad sol byed cing// zhi dang

rgyus dang dbang mngon spyod// gsod dar skod na gug dbye rengs dang// dman par byad dang rgyal sa da sogs// thob pa nyid lathe tshom med// dur khrod chang tshong khrod rogs rtsub/ shang gcig khang stong mchin
gcig dban// gang 'dod gnas su bsam gtan bstsam// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la khyab pa ma long lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang ya shes thams cad
la khyad par bya ba'i phyir/ sku mdog dkar po zhal dang ldan par byas nas/ 'jig rten pa thams cad la gu wa/sa nas/ rang gi re/ kyi yi ge nyid paN+Did ras sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs dang/ yon
tan dang/ 'phrin las dang/ yi shes kyang gcig gis ngo bo sprul pa'i skur gyur to// kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje che// don rnams bskyod la yang nyid do// mkha' dkyil 'od kyis 'gangs 'gyur ba// mar zhing
kha dog lnga ldan pa// sa bon sngags kyis bskul ra yi// 'od kyi rtsa phran thub pa'i sku/ kun skyar sangs rgyu ba/ lus 22 tsA sa/ rang la zhugs pas sku rdzogs gyur// zhal drug khro gnyer rab brjod
pa3 ma ha'i zhal ldan stong gnas pa// 'jam dpal zhal ni 'dzum bcas bzhugs// lhag ma dkar dang ser dang dmar// dur ba'i mdog mtshungs rkyen sbyar ldan// thod pa skam rlon rgyu ma sbrul//
rus pa rdordzo' 'phrad pas brgyan// glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni// hUM phaT gyur le na gad mo can// nam mkhi'i lus can kho bo'i sngon// yang dang yang du so byed pa'i/ phyag drug rab tu brjid
pa yani// dbyug pa zla ba gtun shing dag/ g.yas pa'i phyag gis rim bzhin 'dzin// dpa sta dang nalcayas dang/ [“]ga// pa g.yon pa'i phyag gas 'dzin// par zhu ma ma de dang// gshin
rje'i steng na 'gying bag can// zhabs drug g.yon brkyang gar gyis gnas// 'jig rten bdag po mthar mdzad pa'o// de ltar gong zhal dang ba dang// blo ldan gso sgyu rab sbyangs shing/ legs dar/
dbang rnams thob byas nas// rdo slob dpon mnyes byed ras// yang nas yang du dran byed na// bstan pa chen po thob par 'gyur// lha yi dge 'dun nga la nyon// dang po chang la

rab dga' zhing// sha chen rtag tu mur byed na// las rnams de yis myur du 'grub/ skun du ma 'phro byed cing// sku la sku rnams nges thim byed// thams cad sgyu ma nyid shes pas// 'jigergan rnams su yod sad

byed// khong stor kha dog dkar ba ste// rgyun du rlung ni 'dzag par byed// chu skyes dmar po kha sbyar gnyis// yan lag gnyis kyis legs par bcun// shes par de la bag dang rlung// zhim zla pa thabs ldan dang/

shes rab ldan par shes par bya// gnyis po de nyid rnam spangasan// khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro// chu skyes kha sbyor la brten te// gsum gnas pa yi ting 'dzin la// rdoNi chos kyis btab pa yi// thabs dang

shes rab grel pa'i rgyu// blo ldan 'das pa shes par 'gyur// de phyir de la brtson par bya// chos rnams chos nyid dbyer med pas// stong pa 'dikyi ye shesache/ mi shigs rtog bral mtshan ma mad// bde chen ye shes

partsa/ jorje sku// ye shes ma rtog rtog pa srol// rtog pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad sreg/ sos pa'i mchinam mtha' dag ni// ji sAr sgyu ma'i rnam par shes// de nyid shes nas grol ba'o// ma shes pas ni phyir zhing 'khor//

'jig rten skye bo blo ldan 'gas// nges par rtogs pa thabs kyi mchog// sdug bsngal chen pos rab 'jigs nas// bde ba 'dod pas nan tan bya// dang la rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ thabs dang
[zo/ ] shes rab kyi bsam gtan bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o///de nas yang dag bshad skya pa// sngags grub pa las byung ba yi// las rnams 'dir ni shes bya ste// der ni lha yi sku yang ra//

zhi chogs bzlas pa'i rim pa la// rdo rje'i dbus su rdoN+Din// nyi zla la brten yi ge yi// 'phreng ba kha dog lngar shes pa// skyon bul stangs nas klog pa ni// mkhas pas bzlas pa'i rim pa'o// drag po'i las rnams sgrub

pa la// nyon mongs gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni// sngon po rtsartsibs bcu pa la// 'od zer sna tshogs 'gro bar bsam// zhi bar 'dod pa'i skyes bu des// sems yang dag mnyam bzhag nas// sngags kyi 'od kyang 'gro

gzhan la// phan pa'i yide dang ldan par bya// gro ga ras dang shing kun la// gur kum gi'u waM dri rnams kyis// mchod rten rim pa lnga ldan zhing// gdugs dang 'khor lo ldan par bya// sgrub pa po yis ming dang dus//

de yi bum pa'i nang du bri// rten 'brel snying po la sogs pa'i// sngags kyis g.yon nas la spyor ba/ cing kos g.yas ras g.yon du bri// de la sgal tshig med pa 'am// yang na 'khor lo'i bar du gzhug/ 'khor
lo kun la kha sbyor gnad// rab tu gnas par byas nas kyang// lus sam mgul lam gang bder bzhag/ des ni gdon dang byad stoms dang// rims dang yams rnams sel bar byed// gang zhig sul rnams gzhom

'dod na/ tAM ga sa bon dang ldan par// ming yag tsam po bri bar bya// so phag phye ma ldeng ros dang/ ba bla ma de'i khrag gis brdzis// zla gam gnyis pa'i gzugs byas te// bar du gang 'dod sgrub pa yi// gzugs
brnyan sor brgyud pa yi chod// byas la gan kyal du bzhagal// ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis// khri phrag gcig tu sngags bzlas nas// dum bu dum bur gtubs byas te// chu bo'i gzhung du gtor

byas na// skad cig de la de dbang 'gyur// bya rog 'ug pa'i gzugs byas te// ma nu ma li ro tsa nus// khyo shug bsgrub bya'i ming bris te// gshin Do'i phyogs bltas gsang sngags gdon// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan

nas ni// mi yi rje ngar pur bus gdab// skad cig tsam la de dag dbye// de nas 'daron bsad pa yi// cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya// zhal drug phyag drug zhabs drug pa 'am// yang na zhal ba'i phyag bzhi pa 'am//

zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yang rung// ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba yasi// khrag rnams sna tshogs tha dad dang// bsgrub bya'i rjes dang dug gi rigs// rta dang ma de bong bu'i chus// smras pa'i bslab bya'i ling ga bya//

lus la tsher mas gzugs bya zhing// kaul mar gyis kyang bsku bar bya// yang na shing lo h+phe ga 'am// dur khrod ras som shun pa la// rang nyin gcer du sgo bshage nas// lus ni thalo bas byugs pa ste// mngon sum

khros nas sha chen bza'// rab tu zhim pa'i chang btung zhing// nag po'i chos kyimtshan phyan nus// 'khor lo bri bar brtsam par byas// mo bcu gnyis 'khor lo ni// rgyud nga gi / dbus su dgod// Na yo nar rtsibs

mchan la// yungs kar dal dang skar chu dang// rta dar ma dakhyi lag khrag/ bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro yisakhri// yi ge ya yi lte bar yang// ming dang rus su ldan pa bris// phyogs bzhir yi ge bcu pa ni// mang dang bcas/

[z/]pa bri bar bya// brgyad ro dag la rim pa bzhin// yi ge 'di dag bri bar bya// sa ya marA NaM kA la ru pa a mu kaAr yahUM hUM phaT phaT swA/ yi ge rnams la bskor nas// bslab bya gzugs dang ldan pa bri//

de yi mu khyud dag la ni// yi ga bcu pa ming bcas bris// phyogs bzhi rtsa gsum rdo rjes mtshan// de bzhinats+tshas rnams m laMsaM pas// 'khor lo lte bar ldan pa bri// gshin rje'i gzugs ni ral gri dang// dbyig pa

'dzin pa byas nas ni/ de dang de nyid lto sbyar la// mtshan ngan thod pa'i nang du ga zhug/ cha gsum skatsho dug mu tha/ ro zhes bkang nas dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum dbus su gzhag par bya// yungs dang bra bo sA lu nag
dza lha bra bo sogs rnams la// gsang sngags rgyal po brjod byas te// dro 'am du ba 'a thul bar 'du// rims dang rims kyi khrag rnams ni// ma lus zad par 'thung ba yi// ma yengs par ni bsam gtan bya//

yang na bslab bya za bar mthong// zhange tsag rtsarani rangs pa dang// mal 'og tu ni na shing lags// chu mdor 'byed cing gi rtse laskad/ gsad pa ma thabs 'og tu sbra// dbug pa la ni sgo khang 'og lha 'am 'khor lo

sgyur ba'o// bde gnas rnams kyis dbang du 'gyur// mar khu chen po thod pa mi/ nang du bluges nas bskol byas te// bzhar pas mgi la khyug byed na// mngon shes de nyidimyur du 'thob// rigs ldan rgyal po//

los rnyed cing// mdog ldan lang tsho gsang ba kug la// tsan dan lde gu mang byas te/ las kyi sbyor bas de nyid bcing// yang na me lagadung bas 'grub// oM badzra kro d+ha ya ma rA dzaM// badzra kIli kI la ha na nyan/
mA ra ya phaT/ ces bya'i gsang sngags brjod byas la// rus pa'i phur pa gdab par bya// gsal shing la btsugs skyes bu yi// rdzas la brten te bsgrub par bya// tAl mar byugs
la thod pas bzhar// maram byas pa'i dud pa yis// mig rnon dgan 'grub par 'gyur// gsang sngags rgyal po thogs med la// bstan pa sa thob bya mang yod kyang// 'di ni brjod pa ci zhig dgos//

yang na 'di ltar shes bya ste// rang nyid sngags dang ting 'dzin ldan// brtson chen gzhan du ma yengs pas// gang du brtsams pa de 'grub 'gyur// smad 'tshong rang byung nyid kyis ni// sngon bstan tsakra
legs bris te// lang ga'i snying khar bcug byas la// rang mdun khrag gi zla gam ste// khrag gis byugs pa'i steng du gzhug// mi 'am rgyal po'i bu mo nag/ dgug dang dbang gi yi ge yis// de nyid du
ts+tsha ni nges par 'gyur// nyal bi' 'og tu mnan par bya// mi glang ra khyi bas phag khrag/ 'khor lo bsi nas lare ga ya// mgrin par bcug nas bya rog gi/ khrag gas khrag skyugs sngags bris nas//

yi ge re ldan thod pa rung// bcug nas gsang sngags mang bzlas te// dur khrod ma thab 'og bzhag na// khrag skyug pa la the tshom med// bsros na tsha ba'i nad kyis 'chi// sngal khrag pha wang klad pa yis//
'khor le de nyid legs bsanas// long ga'i mchan khung g.yon bcug la// g.yas g.yon stsal khrag chang khragatsugs// leng ga'i phyogs su rang nyid kyi// rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mnan// da
bzlas pa mang byas nas// rgya gram lam du mnan la gzhag/ de nas bzlog pa bris nas ni// shing gcig khong par sbas na rongs/ ja mo bya rog rgan po'i khrag/ 'khor 'a brasi nas nga ga yi// rkang gzhase//
bar bcug rang mdun du// khrag gis rnga mo gzugs bris te// de yi stong gzhag rang nyid kyis// rang gi bsam pa/rtan nges ldan na// bskad pa nyid du the tshom med// ri bo'i rtse la 'dzegs te sde// na'u
le sprul rnam dang// bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag gis ni// khyo shug rkang pa'i rjes smras pa'i/ ling gsor brgyad par byas te// khrug des bris pa'i 'khor lo dag/ snying khar bcug pa gnyis byas te//
ne'u li gzugs byas steng du gzhag/ lag gnyis rta dang ma de yi// rus pas brdung zhing gsang sngags bzlas// rtse drud shing khar sbasan 'byed// tsan dan dkar pos legs bris nas// gsar sogs rin chen/
rdzasasu grol// mdun du zla ba'i gzugs stangs su// gzhag pa nyin re bskor ba ni// ji srid byas n bsrung bar nges// spyi bor btagasanagayul las rgyal// rkang par btags na chu stongs 'gro// ba yi 'o
mas khrus byas te// kungasha ba mar sogs mchod nas// gsol btab nad rnams thams cad bsrung// de nas bcom ldan 'das las phra ba thams cad las rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

nas/ las thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sngags 'di sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// mar [“]ya paT/ ces pa gsad pa'i'o// ba re kha ya/ dbya ba'i'o// uts+tsha Ta ya/ bsad pa'i 'o/ mo
[zs]rgya// sAya/ rmongs pa'i 'o// wangashi ku ru/ dbang du bya ba'i 'o// stam+b+ha ya/ mnan pa'i 'o// a karA ya dzaM// dgug pa'i 'o// oM hU~MswAhA/ kha dar lag pa bshal pa'i sngags so// oM hU~M

g+ha wa kri tA na na hUMsachas skrun nAyasha ya stam+b+ha ya phaT phaT swAhA// snying po'i sngags so// oM hri/ kA la rU pa hUM khaM/ nye ba'i snying po 'o/ o siM krubru su rje hUM ga #/ snying po dam pa'o// oM hri/ hA/ rdo ma hA kro d+ha ga

gats+tshasma klu dzo pri ti grosnyadzra sA daM de bi mA ku ru swAhA/ spyan drang ba'o// o gi wi/ yon chab bo// oM hUM phaT phoT zhabs bsol/ oM sarma duwA satra da ma ka ga ba// zhes pa dri chab kyi sngags so/ oM ku mA ra chu

pi tadza/ dze hUM phaT/ me tog 'bul po'i sngags so// oM hIhar paT/ bdug pa'i 'o// o kA la ru pa sarba duShAs tu de ma kaM ma hAb+hu ta pha ti amaM ba ling griny+tsa grisU pa ya swAhA/ gtor ma'i sngags so//

o hita lo tsa na bi kri tAn na mahA t+tha t+tha hA sa nA dInaM nIpA ya hAhA/ mar mo'i sngags so// oM dza ya dza ya su dza ya bi shwa ru pa dz+hA ri gats+tshagats+tshas sbyan kri taM te na ta thA ga ta@# ba sardza ya ma ma kA ku ru swAhA/ zhes pa gshegs/

su gsol ba'i sngags so// de nas rdo rje'adzin pa nyid chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang log pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang sngags yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'phrin las 'di nyid
bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// hUM las yongs su rdzogs pa yi// rdoN+Da 'jigs byed bsam par bya// dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// srin po rab tu khros pa 'dra// dbyug

pa thod khrag phyag na 'dzin// ma ha pad+ma zhe ma la// g.yon brkyang ba yi tshul gyis sgom// oM ya mAn+ta krita hU~M paT/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di bzlas na// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams car 'byung// nam mkha'i

dbyings su dbus gnas par// ya yig sngon po las skyes pa'i/ khro bo rdo rje 'dzags byed ni// pad+ma'i mi ba/dan stongs na// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa'i// gri gug bi tsi pa la dang// dgra sta dang ni

khrag dang// phyag bzhi pon rim pas 'dzin/ ma de nag po'i zhal stong na// 'jam dpal zhal ni ser zhing 'dzum// dang rda bo chen por nga nyid sgom// rab tu zhim pa'i chang btung zhing// sha chen dag kyang mur bar
bya// mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu byed cing// rtag par gsang sngags bzlas par bya// thag le 'dren pa'i rnal 'byor ni// bslab bya'i phyogs su bsam par bya// las rnams myur du 'dis 'grub po/ rang
na 'di ltar shes bya ste// ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis// sku yi kha dog so sor shes// khyad par du na bsad pa la// nag po mi de'i zhal can na// rtse gsum lcags kyu 'dzin pa ste// ma sa sha stong bsam
byas na// khrag 'dren pa yi mchog tu gsungs// res 'ga' sku la khro bon// lcags kyu 'dzin pa grangs med spro// zla ba spyang kis zin dus su// tsa la'i ster mo ra snying dang// phye ba'i khrag dang maM
rus bsro// gang la phog pa smobar 'gyur// dpal rdo Ne 'jags byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sbyor ba'i le'u ste gzhos pa'o//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//
sgrub par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dur khron las sam dod 'a bo'i gos// yang na mchon gyi khab ma la// rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje chu// dpa' bor khrag dang chang dang dug
go ritsa nas ras chos bya// log par dam por drud byas te// lus ngag yid kyi gnas su ni// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chus// yi ge o dang A/hUM bri// sa spyod dur khrod sol ba dang// khrag chen
ldong ros kha bla yis// dbang thob dam tshag srung byed cing// shin tu gsang la dam pa yis// ri mo mkhan ni brtson ldan des// rgyud kyi don la mkhas byas nas// nag po'i dus kyi mtshan phyed dus//
ma gsang ba'i gnas su rab zhugs nas// bcom ldan rdo rje rajigs mdzad ba// rtsa ba ma de khros pa'i zhal// de ste ras 'jam dpal 'dzum pa'i zhal// lhag ma dkar dang ser dang dmar// dur ba'i

zla/ mdog mtshungs rkyen sgra can// rab tu brjide cing khro ba'i zhal// drug dang ldan pa'i sku lus che// thod pa skam rlon rgyu ma sbrul// sa pa rdoN+Di'i 'phrang bas brgyan// glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni//
par nyin ma de la// gshin rje mnan nas zhabs drug gis// g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum gar gyis 'gyings// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na// rtse gcig gnyis pa tho ba ste// gsum pa gtun shares khar
la 'phyar// dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa ni// ga yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin pa khri// nam mkha'i mdog can thal bas byugs// sku la khro bo du ma 'bro// snatshogs mchod pa'i lha mos bskor// legs par
[zs ]de ltar bris pa yi// sgrub dang phyogs rnams thams cad du// dur khrod chen pos bskor ba bri// mgo dum rgyu ma mkha' la khyer// rkang dum lag dum rolangs nang// wa dang spyang ki gtus ro dang/
ma kha' 'gro jo mo sha za'i tshogs// bya dang gcan gzan sna tshogs bri// skyi khur rab tu 'jigs bris nas// der ni sgrub pa po yang gi/ gri thod bzung nas[“]sha chen mur/ Dogos nag gyon nas khrag
chan 'thung// rta dang ma ho'i rus pa yi// 'phreng ba bzung nas gsang sngags 'don// bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dris// de ltar bris nas chang dang khrag/ sha chan go ro tsa nas mchod// mnyam
gzhag lha yi dge 'dun des// dus gsum rgyun du mchod byed na// rdo Ni 'dzin pa myur du thob// sku narar tu s+sazhing gsang// phan yon dam pa 'di la 'byung// dpal rdo rje'adzugs byed kyi rtog pa'i
rgyal po las/ bris sku'i li'u sku gsum pa 'i///de nas yang dag bshad nga ra bya// rtog pa ma lus srad byed cing// las rnams thams cad 'grub 'dod pas// blo ldan sar

sna rnam spangs te// brtul pod g.yeng ba rnams spangs nas// snyan srog las la rab brtson bya// mtshal dang ba bla ldong ros dang// shan pa'i go thal dur khrod sa// mi dang ma ho'i khrag gis rdzi// khru

ro pa la khru phyedartsig/ gru bzhi'i steng du zlum po ni// rdorje rgya gram ldan byas la// de stong 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// mtshan ma drugan dgon bar bya// lte bar ma yi dkyil 'khor ni// mtho gang tshad du byas/
pa la// ma po'i khrag gis legs par byug/ bdag nyid lho yi phyogs bltas te// ma de zhal gyi sbyor ba yis// thab kyi nang gi lte ba la/ ma yi sa bon mngon bltas la// bskal pa'i ma

chen lta bur sgrom// der ni malha bsgom bya ste// zhal gsum phyag drug nag la rtsub// phyag gnyis rang 'dra'i yum la 'khyud// g.yas pa'i phyag gis 'gro rnams la/ skyabs sbyin mdzad cing bgrang 'phrang 'dzin//

g.yon pas ril ba mchog stsol brtson// zhabs drug rigs drug mchan ma brdzes// zhal nas ma rnams rab 'phro zhing// 'od rnams sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// de ltar shes nas rab bsragasan// 'dod pa'i don

rnams rab tu 'byung// dgra bo'i gzugs rnams shachen dang// chang dang ma ra'i khrag bcas pa// stong phrag gsum du bsrags byas na// bsgrub mya khrag tu skyags nas 'chi// glang po rta bor khyi sha la// stongs/

gsum gyis dbang ba byed// mya rog 'ug pa kyi shachu// pasrogs na ma lha 'byed par 'gyur// til dang nas gro sA lu/ g.yung ba go'u waM so phago rnams// stong phrag drug tu bang bsregs pa// longs spyod bsam

can rnyed da ra 'gyur// rta dang rdza mo bya rog sha// mi sha rdo rje chung bcas pa// gsang sngags rnal 'byor ldan byas te// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis nges par skyod// rasha daN+Da ut+pa la// chang dang ma ho'i chur bcas pa//

gang 'dod brgya rtsa brgyud kyis zhugs// nug rang khra lag dang sgog pa dang// shachen til mar rab sngags te// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs byas na// pha rol gzhan gyi gsang sngags gcod// tsan dan dkar po 'bras/
dkar dang/ [']til can 'bras can yungs kar nang// ut+pal ka ra ga bur dang// shar du bltas te brgya rtsa brgyad// bsregasan dus rnams kun tu srung// gang zhig bya ba'i rigs sogs dang// sngags rnams

bsam gtan nges ldan pas// snying rdzob yod ni ma bralan// 'dod pa thams cad 'dir bsgrub bya// gzhan du rmongs pa'i byas pa bsu// blo gros med gang shesarab 'chal// sngags dang dam tshig dman gyur cing/

dang nge 'dzin la mngon g.yal nga// brtson pa chung zhing lhod pa ra gis// bskal pa stong du bsgyur byas kyang// 'bras bu yod pa ma yin te/ sha thang chad pa nyid du zad// dper na blo zhan byis pa rnams// 'ga'/

zhig 'bras 'dod rakhrul gyur nas// phub ma rlung khar byed pa la// 'bras yod nam lang mi 'gyur zhing// ji ltar sbyin dang chu bla dang// dbang po'i gzhu rnams rnag min te// thar pa 'dod pa'i bya ba yang//

skya ma nyid la sbyam rol/ ye shes gcig pu rnam grol rgyu// stong pa dang ga par blos mi nus// de la spradacing gzhal bzod na// brtags pa'i snying po de la med// de la dngos rnams ma grub na/ sgrub pa'i ri

mo gzhan smos ci dgos 'acu ba dang ni byed pa dag/ nges par de la brtag mi bzod// ngos grog g.yang sar ltung yang bla'i// chad par rtog pa 'di mi bzod// rtag pa nyidakyang rigs min te// dngos po yod par ga la

'gyur// dang ra na myos pa rnams la mas// sa 'dir sdod dang ma nyid kyis// 'bras bu shing thog mar blangasaM la// khyod la med pas sprin zhes brjod// de bzhin rnam pa du ma yang// 'jig rten rtog pa tha dad pas//
de dag drang bar bya phyir bshad// bcom ldan lha yi lha mdun du// sha chen mo yi zhal zas dang// chang dang til mar ma reda'i khrag/ rab tu zhim pa'i thas mchog rnams// dus rnams
rtag tu dbul bar bya// gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge bcu// bdag gis rgyun du 'don bya zhing/ khasam gtan rtag tu brtson par byas// de ltar shes shing sgrub byed pa'i// skyes bu blo ldan de yis// sangs

rgyas nyid kyang myur 'grub 'gyur// zhi sogs las la smos ci dgos// grong khyer dkrugan sngags pa des// khyi sha sbalasharus sbal sha// rngamo byis pa'i go rnams l/ stong rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya//

rta sha dri chen rabo sbyar nas/ ral bu byas nas bdag mdun du// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas byas nas// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs pas ni// rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur// bud med dbang du byed 'dod

na 2 nyasha chang dang sha chen rnams/ rdo rje chu yas sprugs byas te// brgya rtsa pargyad du bsag par bya// tha mal dbang du skyed 'dod na// sha chen glang po sha dang bcas// byung chub sems dang rab bsros te//

stong pra bo brgyad du bsreg par s+ya// dgug pa dus rnams thamasu du// khyi sha nya sha bdud rtsil/ cha mnyamaral bu byas nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregasan 'gugs// sbyin sreg rnams thams cad kyang//
ma gzhal gyi sbyar bas ni// gsang sngags rgyal pos 'dod pa sbyar// ma yengs rtse gcig sogs kyis skya// gsungs dang ma gsungs mtha' dag kyang// ji lta ba yo ram pa yis// rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid nyer
gnas// sangs rgyas 'bras bu myur du thob/ zhi la zhi ba'i sams kyis te// rgyal po lta bur rgyas pa la// sdang bral chags pas dbapal 'o// drag po'i las la khro zhing rtsub// rab tu gtum pa'i yid kyis/

ni d+hagasod pa'i sems dang ldan par bya// gang zhig ltos pa med pa'i mi// grub pa myur du chol byed na// sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag ras// rdorje'adzin par de 'grub 'gyur// dngos po gang dang gang spyod

yul/ de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro// mnyam gzhag nyams par mi bya la// dus rnams rtag tu rnal 'a byor pas/ kaMn tu mnyam par gzhag par bya// de ni thar pa nyid kyi rgyu// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di la ni/
'dod pa'i dngos grub myur byed de// dka' ba med pa'i thabs 'ad na// dka' spyod brtul zhugs rnam spangs te// shin tu bde bar sgrub pa'i thabs// dul 'dzigs med bdud rtsi'i ro// blo ldan legs par
blang bya ste// shAn tu la rad pas bsgral nga// mi shes blo gros rmongs pa 'gar// rtog pa'i dra bas bswebs pa'i tshe// bsod nams dang ni sdig pa ye// phung po rnam pa gnyis su bzhugs// 'on kyang

'dod pa thams cad ni// rgyud mchoga'adi las 'byung 'gyur phyir// dmar zhing brtson pa chung ba 'ga'// 'di la zhugs na myur du 'grub// de bas ngo mtshar rgyud 'di ni// rnyed dka' khyad par mchog gyur pa//

yi ge'i ta res kyang mi bstun na// bshad cing 'grol ba smos ci dgos// dbang rnams nges par ma blangs shing// bla ma mnyes par ma byas tshe// bstan kyang thos par mi 'gyur te// rmo ba la sogs 'khor bar
'khor// de skad ston pas bshad pa'i tshe// de rnams chos shing brgyal rmongs te// kun kyang 'dud cing mgo bo skad// 'jig rten 'di ni shin tu g.yos// gang zhig rgyud 'di nyan pa/
dang// shes nas 'chang bar byed pa dang// dus rnams kun tu 'don byed na// tshe 'dir 'jigs pa kun bsal te// shi nas mtho ras myur du 'thob// gal te gzhan du rgyud mchog 'di// bstan nam bshad

'a/ dam gsal phya na// de ni sdug bsngal mang myong nas// shi nas myur du dmyal bar 'gro// rang gis shin tu bcang bya zhing// dngos grub nyid bzhin mngon byas na// sdug bsngal mtha' dag nges thadanas/ 3
pa myur du bla mad thob par 'gyur// dpal rdorje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyun kyi rgyal po las/ sbyin sreg gi rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////namalaldan rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog/
ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las kyi dngos grub brtag pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so////paN+Di ta chen po a mo g+ha'i zhabs nus pa can dang// bod kyi lo tsA ba mar pa ban rje chos kyi dbang phyug
grags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// slad kyis grub thob chen mo kar khri'i zhal snga nas mnyan te// bar pa lo ts+tsha ba nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
ka@#// rgyugar skad du/ shrI rak+ta ya mAraM tan rA dzonA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po/
la phyag 'tshol lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so//
der bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi snying po gsang ba las shin tu gsang ba'i mchog/ a ma'o/ phyag na rdo rje legs so/

legs so// snying rje chen po myur chub sems dpa' chen ngo bo rdoN+Di zhe sdang rdorje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying mo gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sku nyon cagi/ phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa

gshin rje 'joms pa po rnams ji snyed lags ra 'dir bshad du gsol// gti mug rdo rje g.yaMn rje gshed dang// phra ma rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang/ 'dod chags rdoNo gnyani rje gshed dang/ phrag dog rdo rje gzhi/

rje gshe narang/ zhes pa ste/ rdo rje tsartsi ka dang/ roN+Di phag mo dang/ rtsoNi dbyangs can ma dang/ rdorje gori'i yang ngo// zur du bum pa bzhi rnams so// de ltar rab tu bskor ba'i gshin rjegashed kyi tshogs
chen po rnams so// de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bos par gyur to// de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags

ba thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/ bdun thams cad nges par 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga'adzin gcig nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje rnams la nges par phyung bar gyur to// sngags kyis dgug
bya@#/// dang dbang chen dang/ de bzhin nus pa rnamamar po// ral gri sgrub thabs rgyal srid dang// pha rol sde ni rnam 'joms dang/ mi snang mig sma na bcud nyid dang// nges par grib la 'phrog

par mkhas// ro langs gnod sbyin sgrub pa dang// sprul dang gdug pa'i tshogs bsrung dang// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor las rnams dang// byang chub sems ni rnam spyod dang// nyer mkho thams cad spyod pa dang//

pha rol klong du rab 'jug pa'o// 'od zer lnga ni mnyam 'khrigs pa'i// rdortosrung ba'i don bsgom sbya// sa yi cha yang rdo rje yis// de bzhin ra ba dang ni gur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams/

cad bskyod pa lo bdud thams cad rnam par ra ngoms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ta gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa 'di thams cad kyi sa bon nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang//

thugs rnams las nges par phyung ba/ dbus su ya'o// kAm ma da yats+tshani ra rdzas de ru Na yo nar ya yig la sogs pa gshin rje radzoms par 'gyur ro// gti mug ke yig la larjod bya// khram nyid brjod ma yig

la'o// 'dod chags nyid kyang ma yig la// ra yi ga la ya nga phrag dog yin// lnga rnanas gshin rje 'dzoms par sgrags// rdzogs yig rtsartsi ka ra ba brjod// sa yag la ni phag mo sta// dbyangs can ma brjod ro yig
lan da ru yig lan go rir 'dod// Nayo nar thur bzhi ru// mi yi thod pa bzhi rnams so// de nas nges par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag gshin rje rdo zhes bya ba'i tir re
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhe stang chen po'i rigs 'di sgom pa'i rnal 'byor 'di gsungs so// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod par ldan// blo bzang sems can don dang gcig/ byams sogs yon tan yang dag

rdzogs// dad dang mos pas rnam par brgyan// brtse ba'i bdag nyid can snga dro// thog mar kha sogs dgo byas te// skye bos dben phyog dur khrod sogs// bde ba'i stan la rang brtsam bya/ rang nyid pad+mar nyi
ma la// rnam bkod shin tu gsal bar blta// de 'og rnams kyis sems can don// phun tshogs byas nas spyan drangs te// bla ma rdzogs sangs rgyas bsgom bya/ ma lus mkha' dkyil rnams khyab pa//
dmages te de rnams la ni phyag/ lus kyi chogs kyis rnam par brtson// tsor tsi ka sogs rnams kyis mchod/ de nas sdig pa rab ba shags byu// lus ngag yid kyis yang dag sdog/ byas dang byed 'gyur de
bzhin du// gang yang rjes su yi rang ba// mgon po dus gsum byas de gshegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang mtshungs rnams kyi// bsod nams tshogs la rjes yi rang// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus dam
chos bcas// tshogs mchog rnams la skyabs su mchi// yon tan rgya mtsho khyod rnams slar// rang lus dag ni dbul bar bgyi// dam chos thams cad ston mdzad cing// gIn tu mthar thug mdzes par
zhugs// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas dam chos// de nyid sbyin sogs rang bzhin la// sku gsum ye shes thob phyir du// rab tu dang bas gnas par bgyi// sems can rnams kyi don sgrub phyir// rdzogs
[ng]// pa'i byang chub sams bskyed bgyi// bsod nams yang dag nyer sgrub gang// rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs bsngo/ dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed du// gyur nas bdag gis
'go ban bgyi// smon lam 'di ni btang byas te// de dang de rnams blos gshags bya// brtse bas cho ga bzhin bltas te// sna tshogs stong par rnam bsam bya// sbyor ba bral ba'i rang bzhin te//

zla sku nyid kyis dang mchan ma med// rnam par rtog dar bral nyid phyir// smon pa rnam par spangs pa 'o// oM hU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa AtAkoTahaM/ yaM raM baM laM dkyil 'khor bzhi// bsdus pa'i hUM yig
las skyes ba'i// khang pa pa rtsa gas pa bsgom par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste// do shal de shal phyed pas spras// lha dang lha mos legs par mdzes// sbatshogs
rtse mo rlung bskyon pa'i// ba dan dril bu mnyam par ldan// de yi dbus gnas pa yig gis// sna tshogs pad+ma rnam bsam bya// deran lte ba'i dbus gnas pa'i// sna tshogs rdo rje dbyug par bcas//
mtshan mo mtha' dag yongs gyur nas// zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par sgom// mar chem mnyam mnanacing/ ma he dmar po'i star bzhugs pa// g.yon brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni// bdud rnams thams/
can nges 'joms pa// zhi ma bye ba'i 'od ldan lha// ro langs ma yis mgron 'khyud cing// dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa klu ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ sbyan gsum dmar po 'jigs pa

ste// khrag ldan mgo bo'i 'i drang bcan// g.yas na rdo= dbyug pa dang// g.yon na thod pa 'dzin pa'o// khro bo zhal dang mnyam ldan zhing// ljags 'dril mche ba gtsigs pa can// khro gnyer ldan zhing sku/
rgyas la// stag gi pags pas rked pa g.yogs// thung zhing gsus raphyang 'jigs par byed// dri med dag pa'i 'od zer 'bar// ro langs ma yi g.yas pa na// gri gug g.yonan thod pa can//

spyan gsum ldan zhing skra grol ba// phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan// mgo yi 'phreng ba mnyam ldan zhing// gtso bo'i mchu la myur ba mo// shar gyi 'a dab ma la gti mug rdo rje dkar po rdo Nitsar tsi kA dang
snyoms par zhugs so// lho'i 'dab ma la phra ma gshin rje gshed sar lo rdo rje phag mo dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o// nub kyi 'dab ma la 'dod chags gshAnaN+Dagashed dmar po rdoNA dbyangs can ma dang/
snyoms par zhugs pa'o// byang ga 'dab ma la phrag dog ga ni rje gshed ljang khu rdo rje go rA dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o// tsar rtsa kAnag mo/ phag mo ser mo/ dbyangs can ma dkar mo/ go ljang zhu/
g.yon na thod pa g.yas na gri gug ste// phyag dang/ zhal dang/ dbyibs ni dpa' bo ji lta bzhin no// ma'i zur du mu man gyi bum pa bzhi mnyam gyis gang ba'o// bden bral du gsar gyi bum pa/

gla rtsis gang ba'o// rlung du byu ru'i bum pa sabs gang ba'o// dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa ga pur gyis gang ba stathod pas kha bcad pa rnam nga ra sgom pa'o// khro bo 'ching ba'i sngags gsungs pa//

gtso bo dpa' bo'i ni/ o hI wi wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ snying po'i sngags so// oM haM hUM kA yaka rA ya/ gracu griny+tsa hU~MhU~M phaT phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so// o ma

g+ha ya kA sa nA d+hi pa ta ye mahA rur nAn ta ma kA ya/ nAsha ya nAshA ya/ bi dA pa ya ba ra pa ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ 'phreng ba'i sngags so// o de'ar tinu ra nu da tu Ta spu Ta hU~M dza/ rje btsun ma'i sngags so//

a mo da an dkr-ita hU~M hU~M phaT/ o pi shunaM an kr-i te hUM hUM phaT/ o rA ga an ta kr-ita hUM pA pa'/ o Ir bya an kr-ita hU~M hU~M phaT/ dpa' bo bzhi'i sngags so// o no haratihUM dza/ o pagun ra tihUM dza/
oMrA ga ra ti hU~M dza/ o Ar gyur NihU~M= dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma bzhi'i sngags so// oM ma ma bi g+ha te/ o badzatsartswa ke/ go ra ra ra/ bukaMA ra ya// a mu kA a paM/ o glo naN/ su g+ho Sha/ brjo

mA ma kI/ snar ther/ saM g+ha rasaM b+ha ra hA/ oM ma mam+ma klo b+baNi badz+dzas ra sA ti/ da ra da ra/ thar thar 1 pha ra pa ra/ kaM pa kaM pa/ rgyun skrun/ g+haM a mu kaM dzaM// oM ga g+hi re/ baN+Da karti kegru gyurak+ta sho Na'i
pa la go ri ya a nu kaM dza// gdengs can mtha' yas sngon po yis// sku bcings shin tu 'jigs par mdzod// klu na'ajog po dmar po yis/ rna bar drag pos rna brgyan byas// rigs ldan sna tshogs dpung de 'a

rgyan// gdengs can ser po dung skyongani// lag gdub dag tu 'dzin pa ste// pad+ma dkar po do shalamadzes// ka Tani sngo bsangs kyang// mchod phyir thogs pas mdzes pa ste// gdengs can nor rgyas bdud rtsi ye//

kha dog lta bu'i ska rags byas// mad rtsa lta bur dkar ba'i mdog/ par chen pos rkang gdub byas// thams cad dud kyi rnam pa sgrog/ lce gnyis 'phreng ba'i mche ba can// zhes pa 'khor ba myang 'das kyi// gzugs

can gshin rje gsod pa ste// rnam rtog thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir// sngags kyis yang dag byin brlabs bya// rang nyid sa bon lcags kyus dgug/ zhal nas zhugs te thams cad du// mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sa ngas

rgyas kun// zhal nas zhugs pa snying khar zhu/ der ni sa bon byung byas te// rdo rdzo'i lam nas zhu ba ste// rang 'od par 'i nang gnas pa// sa bon rang bzhin can blta skya// sa bon de rnams kyis byin brlabs//

'od zer mi bzad 'phro ba ni// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin bsgom bya// bltas te sAng khar zhu myos la// rdo rje'i lam nas nges phyung ste// rang gi rig ma'i par yi// the 'brur lha mo'i tshogs bltas bya// ma tog sna
tshogs nyer spyod sogs// lag pa'i yal gas gzung ba dang// yid 'phrog glu yi mchod pa dang// sna tshogs gang gi rang bzhin nyid// bde ba chen po rab ster ba/ rol bcas de rnams kyis mchod bya// kye kyi

gshin rje gshed dmar bo// bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin// khyod mthong kho bo rnam par 'jigs// bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs// khyod kyis gar mdzad sa stangs dang// sa bu dang ni sa 'og g.yo/ chags

pas brgyan pa'i khro bo yadi// gor mdzad khyod ni ro langs lags// sku na dmar zhing thung ba ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul pa/ rdo rje dbyangs can mas btud che// gar mdzad khyod ni bde ba che// hi/ cha gsang
sngags dag gis khyod// sa gsum po yi 'khrul pa sel// snying rje'i khro mo rje btsun khyod// gar mdzod 'gro ba rnams la gzigs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu rdzogs padzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ka'agaM//

sgra yi tshogs rnams thams cad ni// sgra brnyan dang mtshungs rnam par blta// 'khor lo'i gtso la bstod byas te// de yis de rnams de lta bzhin// gti mug rnoN+Di'i rang bzhin khyod// shin tu 'aN+Digs pa gnyan rje

gshed// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// sku yi rdo khyod phyag 'tshal// tham rdo rje'i rang bzhani khyod/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje gshed// thugs kyi rdo rje rab gsal ba// bani chan rdoNi khyod phyag

'tshal// 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang ra zhin khyod// khyab bdag chags pa'i chos 'byung gnas// dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'chol// phrag dog rdo N+Di'i rang bzhin khyod// las

kun khyen pa'i gshin rje gshed// skya ya rdots+tsha rab gsal ba// phya gnamal gri khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// sangs rgyas kun rab mchog gi
mchog/ dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal// a yagalas skyes pad+ma'i snod// mi mgo gsum gyi stong gnas pa// dag par rnam par bskyod byas te// der ni 'bog tu ma dkyil 'khor// zur gsum
raM yig las byung ba'o// der ni 'og tu rlung dkyila 'khor// sngon mo g.yo ba gzhu lta bu// ba dan gyis mchon yaM las byung// der ni de'i ming dang po las// bskyod de rnam snang la sogs pa/ bu yig
sogs las yang dag byung// glang lo chal sogs pa lngas// hUM skye rdo'i kha chod kyis// bka' pa mkhas pas bsgom par bya// mo la rlung gis bskyod pan// der ni zhu ba rnam bsam bya// rdo rje'i ro nas
dag gyur cing// shin tu dri ma med bltas te// tAM yig 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams// spyan drangs ye shes rang bzhin can// sngags kyi gzugs kyis rab gzhugatsang// mchog gi bdud rtsi ltar bsams/
de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs bya// dkyil 'khor bdag po tshim bya ste// lce la rdo rje gtsang ma nyid// hU~M yig yang dag byung blta der// de 'od spu gu'i rnam pa la// yang dag bkug pa de yis kyang//
rdzogs sangs rgyas kun sna tshogs gnas// dkyil 'khor ba rnams de bzhin gzhan/ ye shes 'od kyis snying khar bkug/ kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// thog ma tham dbus bya bas// der yang
gzung ba gcig yod min// de nyid kyis ni 'khrul gzugs med// gang la 'khrul pa gnyis la gnas/ thams cad tshon sams 'khrul med// lus ni sbri dang snud ra 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs gshin gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ las kyi dbye dang rab dbye las// ji ltar sems can rar tu 'jug rdo chen pos bshad du gsol/ ye
shes rgya mtsho rnams nyan 'chol/ de nas rdotsA'achang rgyal po// zhes pa thams cad gsol ba'i bdag/ las kun rab tu sgrub pa pos// gsung ni 'di dag bka' stsal to// de nas bcom/
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdoN+Di'i mthu mnga' ba la mchod pa byas te phyag ratshol bas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing// bcom
ma ldan 'das kyi gsung mnyan to// de nas rdo 'chang rgyal po// dbang byed 'khrul 'khor rab gsal byed// gshin rje gshor nag 'khrul 'khor rnams// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bud med dbang

[– ]byed phyir de bzhin// bsrung ba'i don du bya ba nyid// ge'u dzang gzung bya zhi ba la// gro ga de bzhin stsag kun la// 'khor lo gnyis ni mngon bris te// na ma/ mang ni nang du spel// nag po rtsa ba sogs/
slangs te// kham por gnyis ni kha sbyar la// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag ste// srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya// me tog dkar pos thun gsum du// shar du khabaltas mchod par bya// gshin
rje mthar byed zla shel 'od// bdag nyid bsams te 'du 'god bya// bslab bya zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// zhen pa bltas te dbang bskur bya// bum pa dkar po zla 'dA ba// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang rnams/
la/ dardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khrusakhyed pa// bltas nas bzlas pa brtsom par bya// o wi wi kr-i tAnan hUM hUM phaT phaza nam/ lha sbyin gyishAn ti ku run ma/ zhi ba'i dam tshig gsungs pa'o//
skyes pa rnams kyi zhi ba la// gur kum gyis bri rgyas pa la'ang// kha che rnams kyi 'khor lo gnyis// swAhAming gi nang du spel// bsgrub bya'i ming ni blangs nas ni// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag
nas// kham por kha sbyar du bzhag ste// srad bu ser pos dkri bar bya// ma tog ser bos thun gsum du// byang du kha bltas mchod par bya// gshin rdza 'joms pa skumadog cil// bdag nyid nges
par blta bar bya// bsgrub bya ser po zla bar gnas// bum pa ser pos dbang bskur bya// dbang bskur ba ni bsgoms nas su/ rgyas par byed 'dod yang dag bzlas// a g+hi/ wa wi kr-i tunan hUM hUM

phaT phaT swAhA/ lha sbyin gyi durmi ku ru swAhA/ bo kA Ta/ oM d+hANaSh+Thad+hAwi kri tAnan hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ bo 'aT/ lha sbyin gyi dut+taM kuru bo khaT/ ces pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyas pa'i dam tshig
go// gro ba 'am yang na ras la lang// rgya skyegs khu ba lam tsan dan dmar/ mang mdo khrag dang bsres pa yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te// yag gsi ni nang du sprul/ nag pa la sogs spangs

'khrul 'khor// kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar te/ mar dang sbrang tsus yongs gang bar// srad bu dmar ro sa dkri bar bya// nub tu mngon par phyogs byas te// ma tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin

rje 'dzoms pa mo/ sku mdog dmar po cher 'bar ba// bsgrub r+ya zla ba dmar po la// zhon pa nyid kyang rnam bsam bya// rang lus las 'phros 'od zer ni// dmar mo lcags kyu'i dbyibs rnams kyis// bsgrub bya
ba kug bar nasam nas ni// sgyu ma'i sngagasan khri bzlas bya// de yis bsgrang bya brgyalar gyur zhing// rkang pa dag la de bzhin bgyel// gos dang bral ba'i sku grol ba// bsam te bzlas

pa brtsam par bya/ gal te dbang du ma gyur na// dud ched seng ldeng ma lani// mar sogs dor bcas brtul zhugs can// 'khor le rin gdung bar bya// o hA wi kr-i tAn na hUM phaT phaT/ ho/ lha sbyin gyi mchod

sbyin ba gAng ku ru ho// o hIts+tshAwi wikr-i tanan hUM hUM phaT phaT bo kha Ta lha sbyin gyi ra AmA na mchod sbyin bo khaT/ ces pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig go/ dur khrod ras sam yang
nani// rang byung bskus pa'i ras dag la// rgya skyugs wa rlon khrag bsras pas// 'khor lo gnyis namanyam bris te// raM yaMg dang ni wayig gis// bsab bya'i mang nanang sral bya// btsun mo'i pad+ma'i
yaM snod du na// kha sbyar bzhag ste mchod par bya// srad bu dmar pos dkris nas nii/ ma tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po na// 'choms kyi nyim ltar 'bar ba// lcags kyu la rol/

tsha dmar lo yis// bsgrub bya bkug pa nyid bsgom bya// lcags kyu rnams kyis snying pu ga cing// zhags pas rnyed pa la bcings te// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ma las/ seng ge dmar po mnyamazhon pa// rdzas lnga

yis ni gsad khya ste// de ni 'ong bar rnam bsam bya// gal te bsgrub kyi ma 'ongs na// seng ldengasham 'bar ba la/ ka'akhrul ba khor de bsros brtul zhugs can// der na bzlas pa yang dag partsam// oM hri'i

0 wi kri tA na phaT phaT hi/ A mu ka A karA ya hi// o Ti'i wi kri tAn na hUM hUM phaT phaT dzaM/ lha sbyin A karlu ya/ zhes pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bkug pa'i dam tshig go/ blo ldan dur khrodarasam la/

khung ba yi ni khu ba yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris te/ la tshig gis ni nang du sprul// bsgrub phyir ming ni yang dag blang// kham phor kha sbyar du bzhag ste// kham phor ser po steng bzhag nas// der ni mkhas

pas ri mo bris// dang por ri mo bzhi bcu bdun// mnyam par bzhag ste mnyam bri mya// lcog brgyad du grags ri rab ni/ de la steng du ya nga da ba ci// hU~M yig dang ni khaM yig ste// de yis ri rab nang du sprul// de yi nang
dulaM yig gas// dbang chen dkyila 'khor dgod par bya// sna tshogs rdoN+Dis mnan pa la// srid bu ser pos dkri bar@// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po na// sku mdog ser po rnam bsam@/ lho ru mngon phyogs
rnal 'byor pas// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa// bsgrub bya ser po rnam bsam nas// ri rab kyis mnan myur dgod bya// sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam mnan la// dbang chen dkyil 'khor las 'og tu/ man

da ra sogs 'jigs rungari// gangs ri g.yo med mtshungs rnams kyis// bsgrubaskya mnan pa bsgomabya ste// de nyin bzlas pa bya ba zhade// o h+phawi wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/[0f38]lha sbyin sA g+hAn hUM b+ha ya waM swAhA/
zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ngas pa chen po'i dam tshig go/ ngag ni ras par 'dod pa yis// rang bzhin 'khor lo gzhis bris nas// bsgrub bya'i ming rnams nang sprul te// de nas sbos shing sngags

[z ]@#/// khazlas mya// o hit+ti wi kr-i tAnan hUM hUM phaT paT laM/ lha sbyin ya b+ha pra b+hA kAr+ya s+ya kri te/ tAMni ba ra ya to ba ra pakaM/ pa ra Na a to bi rU pa kaM bar da ya dzA data ca na ga sgo g+ha na ku ru laM/
zhes pa gsungs te// bcom ldan 'das kyi ngag rengs pa'i dam tshig go/ de lta dgongs pa gsungs pa 'di// nang du shanatu legs sbas pas// ga4shin rje gshed dmar rab sbyor las// zhi ma gcig gis 'grub par

'gyur// dur khrod las la 'khor lo gnyis// sngar bzhin bri bya brtul zhugs can// skye tshe dang nilan tshwas kyang// dul dang nim pa yis kyang ste// de bzhin lan tshwa tsha ba gsum// dur khrod sol ba nyid dang na// smyo byed/

ra dab ma'i khu ba dang// de bzhin gtum pa'i sa bon 'di// mdzub mo'i khrag ni glang byas te/ tsi tra ka yi khu ba 'am// tshe sgo can gyi sa blangs te// gdol pa'i rdza ma'i drag pa dang// ltogs pa can gyi snyu gu yis//
la/ gdug pa'i sams kyis bcu bzhi la/ shi phyir na dri brtul zhugs can// ma rungs pa rnams bsad rgyu yi// sna tshogs sems can rnam 'joms pa'i// hU~M yag gis ni rnam snyal mya// lce ru nangon
phyogs rnal 'byor la// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed po na// gtum po chen po khro bo'i gzugs// thod pa'i dum bus rnam par brgyan// ma de la bzhugs lcags 'gyur ba// gsus pa che zhing 'jigs

su rung// gtsigs shang gyen du 'bar ba'i sgra// de bzhin snar sminam sar// g.yas pa rdoN+Di'i dbyug pa cho// g.yon pa thod pa nyid kyang ste// rnam 'gyuramacha ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// khaskal ra 'i ma ltar
yang dag mtshungs// de ltar bdag nyid cha ma bsams te// de mdun bsgrub bya myur dgod bya// dri ldan rims gzir nad rnams kyis// gdug pa'i lus la gzir ba dang/ gos dang bral bas 'dar ba dang//
na chur lus ni rma dang ldan// 'bras kyi 'phrang bas yan lagabaskor// mtshon cha yis ni gzir bar bya// grang ba'i rlung gis nye bar gtsos// ma yi dbus su yang dag gnas// ma de dag dang stag/
dngani// khyi dang mchu rings can rnams kyis// sangs rgyas ston rnam 'joms pa'i// ma rungs chen po za byed cing// mthar byed lte ba'i nang na gnas// tsher ma rnams kyis lus gang ba// gnos
dar sgrog gis rkang pa ra bsdams// de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas// sngags pa med par byas bsams te// sku tshe dang ni lan tshwas khyug/ sAd yig brjod pas bsam par bya// de yi lus kyi srung ba sogs//
bca da nas bdag mdun dgod par bya// de yi go cha bgos byas tA// stong pa'i lus bzhin bsgom par byas// bdag lus las byung gshin rje gshed/ khro bos bdag nyid sku rnams kyis// de ni gdung bar
bsgom bya zhing// zhag dang tshil dag 'a chung bar byed/ de mdun gshin rje bsamapya sta// lag na dbyug pa stobs po cha// gdug pa de yis gdungs pa ni// ma rungs del rnam bsgom bya// de yi nang khrol
khangs bya zhes// bya rgod kyis khyer mkha' dkyil 'gro/ klu rnams kyisan sa 'og 'chugs// dran mod la sogs rnam par gzir// de ltar bsgrub bya rnam bsams te/ sems ni snying rje ngas 'khyud pas//
'khor ba lasazhi bton byas te// sangs rgyas zhing rnams su skye 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs rab tu dbyas tatshig 'di gsungs so// a ma'o
gsod pa 'di ni bzang// gsod pa gsod pa ma yin te/ ji srid sdig pa las grol ba'i/ 'chi ba 'chi ba nyid ma yane// sdig pa stong phra ga rnams byas nas// mnar med sogs par gnas 'gyur ba//
ma'o sangs rgyas bdeb 'di che// gsod pa byang chub thob par mdzad// sar yang sAng+ge rdza rnam mdzad nas// gsad 'os sems can gsod par mdzad// a ma snying mchog gi stobs// snying rje dman pas

mi 'gruba'o// o hi/ wi kr-i tAnan hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hU~M de ba dat+taM mA ra ya hU~M/ o hIts+tshaTi wi kri tAn na hUM hUM phaT phaT hU~M phaT/ de ba dat+taM mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ces pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam par

rtol pa chen po bsod pa'i rdo tshe/ 'khrul 'khor sngags dar rgyud kyi gsod pa la sogs pa 'a dmatshag go/ de nas 'khor lo gzhas bse te/ khaT kyi yi ge rnam spel bya// bsgrub bya'i mar ni blangs byas te//

thod pa kha sbyar du dgod bya/ srad khu nag pos yang dag dkri/ sdang ba'i sems kyis nyin phyed na// dur khrod rnams su sba bar bya// gshin rje mthar khyed du yang dmigs// mdun du bsgrub bya dgod par bya//
rna dang ma ro mnyam zhen pa// lag na mtshon thogs de nyid dang// khro bo la dus pa rnams kyis bskor// gnyis ka'i phyogs su rnam bsam bya// khra bos dkris pa yi sems kyis// gnyis po de dag dbyug

ba 'a byed par// bsgom bya 'thab mo'i bsam pa can// bsgoms te bzlas pa brtsam par bya// o ni/ wi kri tAn na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+taM ya dz+nyA dat+taM bi rIkA ya phaT/ ces gsungs te// bcom ldan/

'das kyi dbye ba chen po'i dam tshig go/ sngar bzhin cho ga de nyid kyis// 'khor lo gzhisani shrI bya ste// hUM dang phaTakyi rnam sprul bas// thod pa kha sbyar du bkod de// srad bu nag pos yang dag dkris ma

mo'i tshol rnams su sba bya// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gzung// mdun du bsgrub bya rnam bsgom bya// yaM byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni// nag po gzhu yi rnam pa la/ rnga mo chen po mdog sngon po// de yi skong/

du rnam sgom bya// de la ma rungs cha bskyon te// lho yi phyogs su de khyer la// khro tshogs rnams kyis brdungs pas na// nges par sangs rgyas rnams kyang skyod// oM hA/wa kr-i tAn na hUM hUM phaT phaT/

de ba datu u ts+tsha ya hU~M phaT/ ces pa gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bskang pa chen po'i dam chog go/ khros pa gangashani N+Nar bltas rnal 'byor// khrag bcas ro bsregs thal ba dang/ dug dang lan tshwa
sku tsho dar// tal mar spo byed 'dab de bzhin// dur khrodaras la 'khor lo gnyis// de ltar rim pas khri bar bya/ gshin rje'i lus gnas gsad pa la// rta dang ma ha dag las dbye// rnga mo'i lus
gnas kha skad pa la// zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ rgyas pa zla ba ser po la// btsun mo'i snying khar dbang du byed// zhugs pa ra yi lus la gnas// lhun po'i dbus su ri ras pa ste// seng le
shar lha gnas dgug/ de ltar gzhan rnams las mtshon bya// gi'u wang rgya skyags nyid dang ni// kha chayi ni bye brag gis// gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris dbang// 'dir ni 'grub
'gyur the tshom med// kham phor kha sgyur du gzhug ste// dge ba'i sems kyis yang dag bzung// bya rog sgro yi sku gu yis// zhima'i gung la nges par brtsam// ro bsregs pad+ma kha sbyar la// gshin
tsha rdzogashed bdag rnal 'byor las// o mi/ sogs kyi sngags brjod cing// lho ru gnas pa'i tshar gcod bya/ gzhi la mtha' yi ya le ya/ dbye ba ni gnyis kyis kyang ngo// phyi nas dbus kyi ya yog
gas// lhag ma'i yi ge ci bde ba'o// sngon du bsnyan pa khri bzlas te/ las 'dir rab tu sgrub pa ni// gshin rje gshed dmar rab sbyor las// ye shes rdo Na yis bya ste// drag po chen po'i 'khor lo/
'di/ khris pa gang du gnas pa dang// yi gi bris pa'i khyim du yang// rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs gshin rje gshed
am dmar po'i rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor gyi dbang du byas pa'i le'u lta gnas pa'o////ri po skye bos dben phyogs dang/ legs sbas yid dba'i khyim rnams so// thang sku
bkram ste rnal 'byor bdag sngags kyis dbug pa yang dag brtsam// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa mo// khrag 'gugs pa yi rab sbyor la// tsa rtsi ka sgom
rnal 'byor pas/ da nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje chen po 'joms pa'i rdo rje khraga' gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo tsaN+Di ka'i sngags de dag gsungs so//
oM badz+dzAtsar kri sid d+hen+d+ha nIl hA ri Ni ratA tra ya/ a pa kar Noru d+hiraM A kar ya Di/ khani rab tu gdang bya sa// sngags 'od rjes su dran par bya// khams gsum pa ya khragachen po// 'dir ni
'gugs par the tshom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed pos char dgug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje phag mos chang dgug pa'i dam pa 'di

gsungs so// oM g+ho Ni su g+ho te badzra mA ma kI/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra/ tu tu ka ma r+ya A k+kAr ya dza/ rdzo mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas// bum pa byas te kun nas bsgribs// rkun po'i
sku yi gzhir bzhag ste// sngags ni rjes su dran par bya// pa tani ya mtshod rten du// sngags 'di bdag nyid cha ba blta// 'bad pas brtan par dmigs byas nas// chang dgug pa ni rab tu 'grub//
de nas bcom ldan 'das gshen rje chen po 'joms por rdo ts+tsha shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// dbyangs can ma'i sngags 'di gsungs so// o li tsu

pi tsu pradz+nyA badz+dzan/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ mi n+d+ha ban+dani/ d+hi ri d+hi raM/ bud ji brnanaM swAhA gzung nas ji srid tshes gcile nas/ kun nas zla brdzogs pa'i bar// legs sbyar byed 'dod brtsam bya ste//
ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug las// ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur// de na tshigs bcad brgya byed cing// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa// ma lus lus pa med par
'khrugs// de nas bcom ldan 'dasamathar byed chen po 'dzoms pa'i jo 'i khu ba 'gugs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// khu ba 'gugs pa go ri'i sngags 'di gsungs
so/ dao a kar na a karani/ go rAdzagi dukha gya du ya/ shu kra A karAya dza b+hUhA swAhA/ mkha' sgo rdo rje lam dang rlung/ 'dra'i bulcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// bzlas dang sgom par rab sbyoralas//
khu ba'i tshog sa rnams 'gugs par byed// dben pa'i nags khrod rnams su yang// las 'ad rab tu bsgrub bya ste// mtshan mo bdun gyi rab sbyor gyis// 'dir ni 'grub par the tsom mad// de nas M bcom ldan

'das gshin rje gshed chen po dus 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par shugs te// dbang bskur ba mchog gi dmatshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las nges par phyung bar gyur
tsha u dum ba ra mnar// pa ri dza hA kaMA li ka/ kar ni kara'i 'phreng ba yang// bu khyod zung la byin gyis rlobs// khams gsum pa yi ral grichi/ sangs rgyas thams cad phyag mdzod nga/ bzung nas

bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// las kyi ral gri dang mtshungs mchog/ shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni// ro dral bu'ang sgrub pa'i phyir// ma' zhing gsang pa'i rdo rje zung// khyod ni slob ma bsdu bar gyis/

'di ni btung ba rin chen te/ 'grub pa'i lus ni rab sgrub byed// skyes bu byung ba'i chu 'thungs shige/ mnyes shing kun tu ye shes 'di/ slob ma'i kha yis btung bya ste// gshin rje gshedan rab sgrub phyir//
rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid che// sems ni shin tu dga' bor mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs gshin rje gshed dmar rdo'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi dgug pa'i rab tu sbyor
ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o///de nas dpal ldan rdo rje chang/ ral gri'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya// khab le na lcags kyi rang bzhin lasaM// ral gri yang na dngul chu yis//

phyin byas khru gang ched kyisani// ral gri rnam bsam brtul zhugs can// bcu bzhi yang na brgyud pa la// dur khrod dbus su gzung bar bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// thun gsum khri phrag bzlas/
par bya// zla ba so so'i bcu bzhi la// gtor ma mchod pa sngon 'gro bar// zla ba gcig gis 'bum phrag pa klus// 'bum phrag lngas ni 'grub par 'gyur// sgrub nas ral gri rab tu 'bar// snang ba chen
po'i 'od zer la// da ni gzhung bya 'grub par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal ma/ 'jigs byed pa shin rje gshed sbyor las// gang tshe ral blo grub rnal 'byor// rtsed mong sa ni sgrub byed do//
g.yul nu de yi bzod par dka'// rkang pa gnyis dang rkang bzhi dang// blta phyir phyogs bcu rnams su 'gro/ lha dang lha min rnams mi bzod// mi yi 'jig rten smos ci dgos/ rgyu mtsho'i 'jim pa/
na/ @#//// blang byas te// zla ba gcig gis yang dag sgrub// oM phuwa'i yi ga snying khar dgod// gi[R]/ la sogs sngags bzlas bya// char pa mi 'bab dus rnams su// khri phrag bzlas pas 'grub/
par 'gyur// sbrul nag dag gisha rnams dang// shis pa'i lo ma pasras byas te// de yis ri lur byas nas ni// rgyamachor zhugs byas brtul zhugs can// khri phrag tsam zhig rab bzlas pas// chu rlabs rengs
pa'i mchog yin no// gtum mo sa bon brgya blangs te// sra ma 'bras dang bsdus pa ni/ 'bum phralag bdun du rab bzlas pas// lha ni sngon srog las garmis 'gyur// dur khrod kyi ni gso ma blangs// gzugs/
brnyan bya ba brtul zhugs can// smyo byed khu bas byug pa yis// khri phrag gcig gis ra gugs par khyen// 'bum phrag bzhin bzlas pa yis// don grub sa bon kun bsags pas// gnyid log langs te bya
ba dang// tshor bas yang ni the tshom yod/ rgyun lam gyi nis blangs te// sngags ni 'bum phrag bzlus pa las// spyi bor rab tu byugs tsam gyis// spyi bo'i nad ni rnam par 'joms/ lan bdun mngon
par bsngags byas te// lag pas spyi bor mnye bar bya// nad kyis nyams pa med 'gyur te// 'dir ni the tsom yod ma yin// bram ze yin sha dag dang// dur khrod thal ba sa de ni// gshin rje gshed kyi sku
kha gzugs bya// phyag gnyis dar ni zhabs gcig nga// g.yas pa rdoNi chan po ste// de bzhin g.yon nami mgo 'o// sku mdog dkar po 'jigs byed che/ de yis ma rungs 'joms par byed// ka dang bdud
