gsum de rmad byung bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags byed do// bag chags mtshams sbyor rnam grol bas// nam mkha'i rin par 'gro 'ong byed/ lha yis rtag tu mchod byed de// mchod par byas pas shin tumachod/
sams dpa' chen po 'gro 'dug kyang// bde byed kun gyis bdag nyid dam// gnas dang zas dang btung la sogs// nam mkha'i las ni skad cig rnyed// bud mad rin chen mchog mkhas las// bsams pa tsam gyis
'grub par 'gyur// las kyi dbyings ma ma lus pa// de yis khams gsum thob par byed// rnal 'byor sbyor ba dngos grub kyi// rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog par 'gyur// 'di las brtul zhugs drag pa med// dka'

thub 'di dang 'dra mad do// bud med mchog tu bde ba las// 'dod pa'i legs spyod spyad pas 'a grub// dge ba'i pad+mo'i rigs kun tu// sams dpa' chen po ngag dbang 'gyur// gachu lags ma kun gyi bde chen po//

rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro// gsung thams cad kyi rdorje dpa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rdo rje shin tu dgas pa chen po'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa/ khams gsum kun tu snang bar grags pa pad+mo'i rigs kyi tshogs
zhal gyi gsung gis dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o////o bcas mi byed tha mar te// rab tu sams ni bde ba ste// rdo rje rab dges bde byed che// dbus su mingan sbyar bar bya// phyag

rgya 'di yis dngos grub che// byang chub sems ni rab bsgrubs pa// 'di yis khyon gyis brlabs ma thag/ bdud rtsi'i mchog ni chud par 'gyur// thams cad 'dod pa ldan byas nas// de ste thams cad sanas kya ngarung/

bde ba chen pos sems thams cad// sngags mkhan reg pa'i rgyas btab na// 'di yis rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang// rdo rje dpa' bo nyid du yang// lha mo'i phyag rgyas byin brlabs pa// skad cig tu ni 'thob par 'gyur/ lcamo/
rnams dang gar byed cing// de ni rab dgas bdag lto khrir// pho brang dga' byed rab dgas byed// rab tu chen po bde thob tu// sa ga'i gdan rab 'jog byed do// kha'i dang ba'i yi mchog//

nyid kyi// rdo rje pad+mo sbyor ba yis// deni khridi nas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdzogs 28dngas tshe dpag med// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che// yod dang med pa'i 'dod spangs pa// de la phyag ni byed par 'gyur rdo rje

sam sa mchog 'jog byed de// rang gi spyad pa'i tshul gyis ni// pha rol phyin pa yis kyang da nga sa/ byor a na du bskor// sa gsum thams cad kun tuni// sems dpa' chen po sa ston byed pa//res 'ga' shani

du dga' sprod pa// res 'ga' khab nas 'byung ba dang// res 'ga' byang chub res 'ga' lhams/// ras ri ka sku dang re a 'ga' 'pho// res 'ga' spyod chen rol pa dang// res 'ga' bdud las rgyal bar mdzad// nges 'ba'
wi[' ]/byang chub mngon byang chub// res 'ga' 'khor lo skor mdzad do// res 'ga' snyatsholas yaM 3 / na dus su shin tu mdzes// res 'ga' bud mdams pa dang// ngas 'ga' lha dang skye dgu'i bdag//

res 'ga' 'dod dpang rgyal po ste// res 'ga' 'dod la rgyab kyis phyogs// res 'ga' zhi la ras dam 'a drag/ res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzod de// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btang

pa ci dgar dngos grub 'dod pa la// bdag gi ngo bor ston par byed// mi phyed cho ga sbyor pa yis// 'dren la phud la byas tu// phan tshun reg pa chen po yis// rdo rje can gyis de 'a bges te// gzung mamang po tshog sakyi

babs rnams// bde byed chen po gzhan ci smos// spyod bcas mi spyod bde dam pa// 'bad pa mi dgos thob par 'gyur// brjid pas byang chub snying po ru// rtag pa ru ni gnas 'gyur te// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// sbyor ba rjes/

sdud ldan pas so// thams cad cha ni rnam bral ba// byang chub sems ni mchog bzhin du// yi ge 'dis ni sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen mo tsham pa'i yid la skyes pa depa mad

pa dang ldan pa zhes bya pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya se// las thamasacad grub par byed pa'o////dang por oM ni sbyor ba ste// thamar gnyis po rdza rje'i sgra// rab dgas rdo rje byin brlabs pa'i// lha mo ded byed
dbus gzhag/ 'din sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rab dges thob pa rmongs byed ma// rdo rje yashes thugs gnas pa// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sngags mkhan yi ge phyag rgya'i des// bdag gam

gzhan l rgyus btab ste// rjeN+Di 'dam skyes btul byas na// de nas de myur dngos grub bo// thams cad las byed dpal dang ldan/ tshe dang lang tshoskal ldan pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra 'thob ste// rdo rje sems dar/

rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo yis// sangs rgyas kun dang rtson byed cing// sde dpang rnams dang lha rnams kyi// 'phrul gyi khud med 'phrog byed do// rdo rjerab tu dgyes pa chen po dngar byed kun tu
myang ba med pa rtog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba las thams cad byed pa rganamo gdong mi za ba'i gzhan gyi mi phyad ma'o//
gsung gi nga ror bcas// thamar hril bu'i ra ror gnyis// dbus su ming mi la thug pa lta// yi ge 'di ni chu 'dzin mchog/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yod kyi dngos grub 'thob byed/
de 'dod pa yid ni thams cad rnams// yi ga skad cig 'grub par byed// 'di yis rgyas btab bud med rnams// bdag dang rang gi slob ma'ang rung// de nyid sbyor bas bstan byas na// rdo rje'adzin dpal 'dra

tsho bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag por ni/ myur du mkha' la 'gro byed de/ tshangs pa la/khor sa rwa sdod dpang chen dang// lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur// lcamo tshogs dar rtson byed cing// lha mo kun
gyi bdag por 'gyur// 'phrog byed la sogs bdag po che// 'jig par byed dang rkubyed pa// sems can kun gyi mchog dam pa// sems dang 'a chen por de 'gyur ro// stag po'i tshogs kyi dbus su ni//

brjid la sogs pas spyod pas 'gro// brjid bco chanam la//thamasacad kun tu paN+Did pa yis// bde byed chen po myong byed de// rab tu dgyes pas sgrog pa bzhin// rab tu skal ldan mgrin 'khyud pas// rnal 'byor

chen por de gnas te// 'di ni snying la bris pa yas/ ci 'dod par mi 'dor ba 'thob// phyag rgya chu skyes btas byas te// de ltar byas na phyag rgya dgyes// rdo rgyu shin tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dri ma med pa'i mdog dang pa
khya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste// thams cad las byed pa dge ba'o/// dang po nyid du o bya ste/ thig le'i rgyal pos nye bar brgyan// chog drag bcas la 'dren pa gnyis// ldan pa mtha' mar bzhag byas

da//rdoN+Dar ba las brgyan byas pa// rdo rje ston ka dbus su bsam/ 'dinas nigs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes snang ba rab sgrub pa/ yi len yin phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying khar rgyas btab na// sangs rgyas ye shes

mchog byed pa// de yis ston ka ma dngos grub// sna dbang lhar bcas lha rnams dang// gnod sbyin srin por bcas pa dang/ sbruladang ma 'am ci gnas pa// thams cad bad yi g.yog tu 'gyur// 'di ni bod zer rab tu

'a bar ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs ldan de 'gro ste// sna tshogs rab 'byung yang dag khyab// chos mchog dam pa byed pa ga tong byed cing// spyod bcas mi spyod 'jig rten snang byed de// sprin dang khral pa'i zla ba'i
od mchog byed// mkha' dbyings rnam par pasims pas rab tu dga'// A li kA li paro mchog la// myong zhing mchog byas bskal par gnas par 'gyur// 'di yis snyeg pa'i phrog byed de// 'di yis myur du dga'

bar 'gyur// 'a des na bde ba'i ngo bo de// 'di yis dngos grub grub par 'gyur// skye ba'i sdug bsngal rgyab phyogs pa/// chord nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shun tu dgis pa/

gshes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen mo snga thams cad mkhyan pa ye shes 'grub par byed pa'o////dar po o dang yang dag ldan// tha mar dges pa'i yi ge gnyis// rdo rje hAn tu dgyes
la che// dbus su gsal ba'i ye ge khasam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro// snatshogs chen mo 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo// sngags mkhan/
nyid kyis byin brlabs pa// sna tshogs sna tshogs bdag chen 'gyur// sdig pa'i yan lag kun spangs te// bsod nams kun gyi yan lag dge// kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grubani// 'di

nyid kyis ni rab tu 'khrul// sna tshogs sgyumaM'i bde chen gyis// sna tshog sachen po'i bskal par gnas// rdo rje'i bdag nyin brgyan pa yi// bud med kun dang rtsen par 'gyur/ de nas de yichos dbyings nas// dbang

sgyu phyug mchog gi dngos gru la bo// paro'i mdun du thog ma'i lha/ 'byas te rdo rje bsgrub par khyu// mthe bong srin lag de phyung ste/ kha yin ng du gzhag par bya// chang khazhani myang bar byas na ni// mod la 'dod pa'i
gzugs su 'gyur// A likAli rab sbyor las// bud med rnams dang tshan par byed// blo ldan rdo rje sams dpa' yi// 'di ni shin tu dgyes zhes bya'o// lasil ba dga' byed chen mo ste// sna tshogs 'dis/

'gro la gnas// dang po o na gnas pa ste// zla ta dang ldan thamar bya// rdo rje shun tu dgyes che ho// sgeg mo dbus su bskul pago/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sgag par bya ba sprul pa yin/ 'di dag mnyam

par sbyor ba yis// sgeg mos ye shes bskyed par bya// rdo rje blo ldan brtag mo yis// bde bar 'a dod pa'i padon gzugs// 'dod pas 'dod pa spyad par bya// myur du 'dod pa se dngos grub bo// de nas rdo rje

'ded dpal te// bde byed thams cad lta bar sgrub/ sems can kun gyi 'dod skyed pa// bde ba chen por de 'gyur ro// mthu yis pha rol phyin pa'i mchog maro'i tshul du sgrog pa yis// rdo rje sbyor thabs la gnas ]
pas// nornachan po de dngos grul// ci dgar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis// rtag pa'i lam dang yang dal/ ldan// rtag pa'i chos kyis rjes mthun spyod// bsgrub na rtag pa rtogs par 'gyur// 'di yis kun tu
bzang zhes bya// de ni dngos po kun yin te// 'dod pa med cing nyon mongs med// nga rgyal mdatsang 'dzinamad pa// sangs rgyas mchog tu rtag pa yis// sangs rgyas chen po de yi dngos// dpal ldan lkog ma
tham men// chos rnams kun gyi rjes su mthun// 'dis ni dngos po thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas padapa lor bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang// 'a di la khyad par cung zad med//
u0f00na tu ragyes pa chen po rje nga bdag po'i dpal shin tu dgyas pa sgog mo dal mad pa dang ldan pa'i ya ga mchog gi sku'o////dar po o bcas lha mo yis// tha mar tshog dragami khyad gzhig

ra gnyis dbus kyi phyogs nyid du// ha zhes bya ba rnam brgyan te/ gAn tu dgyes pa'i rdo che cha// bzhad pa nyid ni rab i tu sbyar// yi ge yin phyag rgya 'dis// shin kyi snying la rgyas btab na// 'phrang ba'i

rtson gyis rnam brgyan pa// dpal ldan dam thalag tu 'gyur// yid kyis ji ltar bsams pa bzhan// de ni sang sa rgyas yul du 'gro// nga ni spyir sangs rgyas mthong/ chu skyes de dang rtsen par byed// de nas

'dus pa dgyes 'gyur te// sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde khache// dngos grub rnal 'byor de la sbyin// khyed pa dang ni klog pa dang// bde bachen po 'phrog pa yis// rnal 'byor
gsang ba'i dbang phyug la// gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed// blabs bcas shes rab chen po la// rgyal po nyid kyis stobs byed de// A li kA la mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba/

chen po mgu bar byed// bde ba thabs kyi dngos grub rnams// sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya'adi// shani tu dngos grub mchog tu brtag/ ro shin tu dge sa pa'i bde ba'i 'phrang ba rgyas
sgyu pa dpa med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyu sta/ las thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin pa'o////o ni dang por gtsug tor bya// de te skad snyan tha mar te// dbus su de dga' zhes bya

la// bde chen dga' ba rdo rje dbyangs// rdo rje shani tu dgyesache yi// phyag rgya 'di'i rab dgyes 'brel// bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang// dran pa yis kyang dngos grub stag/ sdig pa kun las krol byed cing//
bsod nams thams cad nye ba 'gro// mi dge thams cad ma lus spong byed cing// sems ni phyag rgya'i yi ge rgyun da 'gro// 'jig rten thams cad kun tu bkur sti byed// rigam stong gis mngon par mchod byed
cing// rig 'dzin mu sman bud med rnams kyis ni// g.yag rnga dkar po'i tshogs kyis g.yang byed pa'i// 'jig rten dbang po bde mchog 'brel ba 'thob/ blo ldan nam mkha'i ngos ni thams cad du//

ro rje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma// yid du 'ong ba'i spyan ni rgyas pa dang// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bde su 'bigs pa yis// mgul nas 'khyud pa'i rtsen pas rol par byed pas rol par byed wang gling bu

ya mtshan sgra snyan gyis// klu blangs dngos grub rgya che thob par byed// ji nyid yid du 'ong pa'i glu da gzhi// 'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba dag/ bde cha'i sgra yi sa bskyed par rnam bsgyur ba'i// de dang mthun pa'i

dpyangs 'dis smra ba par byed// kha Ta ka da bar ji'i ra byaras/ glu ru blangs pas bdo gnas// dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed// 'di yi byin rlabs dag pa dang// 'di yi byin rlabs bde ba'i rnams// sbyor ba/
'di gis sbyar ba yis// 'dod byed thams cad 'thol bar 'gyur// gaun tu dgyes pachen khordo rje sems dpa'i mchog tu dgyes ba chen mo'i dbyangs dpa med pa dar ldan pa zhes bya bar yi ga'i phyag rgya'o//
de bzhin o na dang por te// dbus su red dgyes bde ba che// rdo rje gar byed dam pa gnyis// 'di ni thams cad bde byed de// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ram dbye sa shad// rnal 'byor yas ni rgyas btab na

bde dang ldan par byed cing 'gro// 'og min gyi gnas chen du// sangs rgyas rnams dang thabs cig 'gro gas// bde byed chen po'i dbang chen dang// chos kyi rgyal po bde chen 'thob// ji snyed gar gyi gtsug lag

las// sbyar ba byed pa bshad pa dang// ji sAd phyag rgya'i rnams// gnyis min 'dus pas 'di sa dngos grub// kye ma'o dgyes pa bde byed che// kye ma'o bde ba bde chen po// kye ma'o 'a dod pa 'dod chags che//

kyi ma'o sna tshogs bdag nyid che// de la sogs pa tshad med pa// 'jig rten gyi ni yo byad rnams// pado gsal ba gar tshano// rnal 'byor gar byas dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'di// sna tshogs
ba byabya/ dgar ni ston byed pas/ myur du gar ni mar byas pas// gar gyi gtsug lag dngos grub bo// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i dpal bde ba chen po dga' byed gang zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag

rgyu phan tshun bzhu pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gsum pa'o// j]bcu gsum yi ge dang po rnyed// joN+Dashin tu dgyes pa che// rdo tsho'i skun sna tshogs che// thamar 'bar dang 'dra ba'i rje// nam mkhar zla ska
'dra ba yi// phyag rgya'i la shes rmad byung ba'i// 'di yi thabs kyis mnyam bzhag sa// gzur ba gsal bar bzung ba yi// che ba'i gser gyi gzi brjid 'dzin// ye shes snying khar bsam par bya// nam

'a ]mkha' nyi ma bum 'dra bar// de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dan sangs rgyas thams cad nyad/ gshin tu rmad byung thob par 'gyur// rnal 'a byor kun gyi bde 'a bral ba// joN+Da blo mchog dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas

rdo rje 'dzin dge yi// snatshogs chen po blo ba 'gyur gnas// 'dod pa'i chos kyis mi pags blo// 'dod pa chen po ston par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shAn tu dgya sa pa chen po dpal rdo rje
sams dpa'i ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i rdo'i sku dpa man pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin o ni gzhigas+ya ste// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// rdo rje'i sgra ni bed
'a bral ba// tha mar khro bcas sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste// bar bcad pa yang thos par 'gyur// khams gsum ngo bo thams cad na// sgra yis thos pa dngos grub bo// 'di yis sangs ]

rgyas thams cad nyid la dngos grub ste// bud med paro u t+pal dang// ma lus rgyal ba'i rnams dang rtsen// rdo rje paro sbyar bas na// dga' byed myur du dngos grub bo// rab tu dgyes pa chen po dang la rdo rje sams

dpa'i tshad mad pa'i yon tan gyi sgra depa med pa dang ldan ba zhes bya ba don gyi dpal thams cad grub par byed ma'o/// o ni spyi gtsug thage ler babs// rab dgyes chen mo rdo rje can// rdo rje dra bdar
khris pa yis// tha mar gnas shes rab sbyar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro// snatshogs chen mo 'di yis ni// sna tshogs yo shes grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid

rdo ts+tsha brgyan pa yis// da ni mtshan ldan kun dang rtsan// de nas chos dbyings gnas pa des// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byas na// dbang phyug dam pa dngos grub 'gyur// 'di na
rdoN+Di sems dpa' yis// blo ldan rab tu dgyes zhes bya// rje'i dri ba la med pa ldan ma zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag rgyal// o mchog gtsug tor rnams byas te// shin tu dgyes che dbus nyid du//
rdo rjeron sbyor ba cha/ tha mar des thig le gnyis// 'di yi rab tu dgyes par 'gyur// dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba sna tshogs bdag/ sangs
rgyas kun gyi rol pa yis// mchod pa mi zad byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas thams cad// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid thob bo// rab tu dgyas pa'i dbang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro mchog/
ge rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad grub pa'o// de bzhin gshags pa thamasacad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rdzo'i bdag po zla gsang
thig le bshad pa'i rgyal po las/ chos kyi 'khor lo staganyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das shan tu dgyes pa chen po dpalardo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/

thugs rdo rje las/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdonami za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'a khor chen po bshad nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul phran dang mnyam
pa'i de bzhin gshags pa de dag thams cad gsang ba'i gzung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'a khor chen po dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du byas pa/

ma lus la lus pa med pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ phyi nang gi pho nya dang po nyamo rab tu rgyas pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ dgyes shing spyan na
rgyas pa yis// bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yis// brjod pa'i phyag gis ba/ra mdzad cing// thal mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid du// bzhag pa yis ni 'dud par byed// khaskul ba yin dbyangs 'di

tsha gas// de dag gtsolamanyes par byed// kye ma'o chos ni ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o sbyor ba ngomatshar che// kye ma'o smras b ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o bde ba yang dag 'byung// kye ma'o kun tu bzang po'i don/

kyi ma'o rab dgyes yang dgu 'grogs// kye ma'o pad ba sa po dag che// kye ma'o phad pa pad mchog ste// kye ma'o sngags kyi yang dag sbyor// kye ma'o snying po yang dag bsdus// kye ma'o phyag rgya mnyam par bzhug//

kyama'o sgrub pa rmad byung ba'o// kye ma'o pha rol phyin ma yin/ kakyi ma'o tshe ltar ma b+hur ril/ma/ kya ma'o sna tshogs dgas pa che// kye ma'o dal la gsum sbyar la// kye ma'i rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba'i// kye ma'o ]
par rnam phye pas// kyama'o skabang po gnyis sbyor ba'o// kye ma'o acha la dang mnyam pa/ kye ma'o gar ni dag pa cho// kye ma'o glu rab dri ma med// kye ma'o sil snyan rnam par 'brel// kye ma'o brdab
dar mun pa sol// kye ma'o dpag byed ma dol 'am// kye ma'o pog stson ka la// kyi ma'o ar ma mun pasal// kye ma'o blo ni shin tu bsil// kye ma'i rnal 'byor mnyam par sbyor/ kye ma'o skur ba
nam mapa' 'dra// kye ma'i sa rgyus rdo rje mchog ma'o 'chas pa ra ko sna tshogs/ sa chog na/ kye mo sna tshogs sbya na yod// kye ma'o ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang//
kyi ma'o ngo mtshar dpa' bo rnams/ kye ma'o ngo mtshar sems dpa' rnams// kye ma'o ri mtshar lha ya rnams// shin tu dgyas che rdo rje la// rgyan pa kun gyis bstod byas te/ rdo sams dpa'i 'gyi nga/
kha yos// dga' dang bde spyod rgyas par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin thams cad 'khor dang gus pa dgyes gyur te// sems dpa' chol phyag byas nas// mchog gi dbyangs kyis bstod par
byed// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa// yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad do// phyag dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur// yid tsam 'dzum pa'i/
spyan zur gzigs// sha rgyas brlani nu mar mdud// rked pa'i dbyibasani rnam par yangs// snam gyi ngos kyang tshal mdzes// chags pa rung bar tshoms kyis gnon// tshoms kyi 'phreng ba kun da
zla// mi drag blos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing// rab tu dgyes byed dgyes par bsor// bde bas bad la langs song mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dgongs [”] pa'i dbang dang ldan
la/ pas 'gro ba ya mtshan chen po'i sgo nas 'dul mdzad cing// gsang ba'i thag la 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gtso bstan te// 'jig rten gsum po sbyar bar bya ba'i chos de bder gshegs
don du mdzad// ngo mtshar yon tan ldan pa dam tshigakhade las 'byung// bde mdzod bde spyod dga' la rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// thams cad dga' ba'i ngang nyid thig le'i dkyil du skyod mdzod de// byang

chub snying po 'gro ba'i lam 'di bde bar skur la snyan par mdzod// ngo mtshar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rigs pa che la dgyes shing bzhugs// bdag cag 'du shes rnams dang bral ba nyid kyang bzhugs/
spyod 'dzin bcas pas// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang ldan pas kyang ni de la ragalus so// a la la ho/ yangs pa'i spyan can drangs shing bcug ste rol la tshul bzhin mdzod// rnam dag ye shesachudas

'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus// khyams ma'i gzung ma bdag nyid cha dang rab tu rtson mdzod la// thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin dag pa'i chu de'i bdag skur cig/ mi yi mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ye shes/

thob 'dod phyir// dam tshe kachen po gsum po la sum po 'di la pa nas nas ni// klu ba/sang thig le'i dbyings su sad ka cag dogs mda' gro pa bgyi// raphyang/ kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni//shin tu srid pa'i sgo

ba yis// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'dod pa bzhin// glu blangs myur tu bskul sar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bstod pas shin tu dbyes te/de bzhin gsheg pa dang/ byang chub sems

ya' bcas pa dang/ rdo ts+tshenang/ rin po che dang/ pad+mo dang/ las kyi rabs kyi btsun mo de dag thams cad la rdo rtishan tu dgyes pa'i bad pa chen pos mnyes par mdzad do/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rnal
'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams dang/ phying chus sam dar bcas pa dang/ nam mkha' la 'a gro ba dang/ rnam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs su bcas pa'i rnams dang/ phyi nang gi rdo rigs las

skyes pa'i rnams las shin tu dgyas pa datsas pachen po'i mgar dong/ ngabyangs dang/ rdung ba dang/ zhi ba'i thalamo la sogs pa rnam par mdzad pachen pos rab tu mdzad nas/ dmatshigachen po rna cha shin tu dgyas pa

'dod pa'i dbang mo dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhus/sa nas bde khar cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de dag kun dgyes nas/[0f7c]'u tu dgyes pa nyid byas te/ ma5 mo sbyar nas sa steng
du/ dpus mo'i lha nga btsugs mdzad de// chos kyi phyir ni gsol ba 'debs// dkyil 'khor dmatshig bdag nyid la// bcom ldan dgyes pas bshad du gsol// gang gi sems

can bde nyid kyi// bde bas dkyil 'khor sgrub par bgyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig 'dod pa zhe bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i tare nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te dkyil 'khor mdzad do/
phyag gnyis gar dang bcas pa yis// mdun du thal mo bkan par bya// sor mo kun gyi rtse mo la// la mol phyin pa'i tshogs rnams sam// de dag mang gi brla yisan// le yo thamAtsad partag par bya//sngom
kho phan tshun bsnol byas te/ shes rab mchodarten dun brtag/ dol chod sman sbyar byas te// lhag ma'o na bzhin spro bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyus thams cad kyi/ shes apal rol khyon ma dge gang gis

bcangs pa tsam gyis kyang// sangs rgyas byang chub khyen klob de//phyag rgya 'di yi rgyas btab pas// rtag pa'i pho brang 'gro 'ong byed// sangs rgyas snang maN+Did dpal dang ldan// btso ma'i gser gyi kha dog 'dzin/
shes rab ldan pas sbyor byas na//'di yis myur du dngos grub bo// sal ldan 'phrul gyi bu mo la//'ad yis byin brlabs gur byas te// rtogs dpal mo gzhag byas nas sam sazhi bzhugs pas bsgrub byas la//

danas sems de blang bya lha//blo ldan de yis btung byas te// grub pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yang dag dngos grub 'gro bar byed// shes rab dang 'phrul rtsi 'am// de bzhin gshegs pa lasal rtag 'thilaM//sangs

rgyas rdo rje blo ldan gyis// kun tu 'phrog par yong mi nus// shin tu dbye sa pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o// thal mo de nyid khro skyes pa// sbom mo skyil krung bzhag byas/

te sna tshogs 'khyer ba 'bar byed pa// rnal 'byor gyi na lpagam sgo// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin m gsal// phyag rgya'adi yis rgyas btab pas// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// 'di yis myur du thob

par 'gyur// phyag rgya'adi yis rgyas btab pas// 'di ni bcings patsam gyis kyang// ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed// tshe dang dpal dang ye bshes skal// rdoNa'adzin gyis thob par 'gyur// 'di'i dbang bskur tsam

gyis kyang// rdo rjer dzinaNer de 'gyur te/ rdo rje dkyil gyi mtshan btab pas// sa chen 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed// 'di ni dga' khyed rdo rigs// rje tshe bud mar 'grogs pa dang// rdo rje gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/

roT+Thas mas nyid 'thob par 'a gyur// ji ltar dngos sgrub 'dug pa dang// sangs rgyus rdo rje dpa' bo rnams// skad cig gcig gis 'dren par byed// bsgral dar mnyes par bya ba dang// rgyas btab de bzhis rmongs

pa dang/ gsol bar byed dang tha ba dor// panatshun du mi skyod par khyed la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdocha chen po'i dbang bskur brdo 'phreng ba zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa bde ba thob par byed pa dang med/

pa'i ldeN+Nar byed pa'i phyag rgyu'o/// jo rdzothal mo de nyid las// khro mo rgyabani bskum byas te// sor mo lhag ma snga ma bzhin// phyag rgya 'di ni dbang bskur ba'o// mas dang la/don dang dug la sogs//
de ma thag tu 'phrog par byed/ 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// sangs rgyas kyis ni dgyes pa thob// 'di nyid kyis ni dbang bskur dang// 'di nyid kyis ni bde nam pa// 'di nyid/
kyis ni rgyal po che// 'di nyid kyis ni dpal dam pa// 'di yis rtson pa byas pa las// rang dga' 'gugs pa dngos grub bo// mi la 'di yis byin brlabs te// nyi ma phyed nas sbyar byas nas// 'di ni de ma

kyi khrag tu pa dang// dpal ldan rdo rje gakhri brjid 'dzin// nam bcu gnyis 'od 'drar 'a gyur// zhag bdun gyis myur gzhan gyis min/ sangs rgyas kun gyis 'dul ba dang// dge ba thams cad dbang du byed//

grol 'don rnams kyi mun pa sel// blo ldan phyag rgya mchog tu 'gyur// de bzhin gsher sa la thams cad kyi bde ba chen po gzi baN+Did deb med pa dang ldan pa'i 'phrang pa zhes bya kha/ ba dan gsum pa'i 'jig
rten gsum du bad ba chan po spel ca pa'i dmatshig gi phyag rgya chen po 'o////pha rol phyin pa'i phyag rgya nyid// dag pa'i khro mo dang bral ba// pha rol phyin pa'i chos yan tu// tshig dang tshig/
rnams pa ba'i/ shug rgyu yod na gtsas pa yis// chos kyi dbyings nas zla ru 'phyur// sangs rgyas kun la lta dpang bskur bas// dpang phyug rnam par de 'gyur te/ thams cad dag nga sus pa yis//
A bdo dmar po mchog 'dzin 'gyur// pad+mo sgyu ma rnams mdzad pas// sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed// sems can kun la thams cad sbyin// 'dod chags chen po nas

ngas te// de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni myur du gal byas pa// sgrub par mi byed cung zad med// 'di ni pad+mo sbyor ba yis// de bde mchog rtag thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen pos mos par
byed pa'i dpa la pado 'phreng ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi don dpal shin tu dgyasaM par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ ka'adi nyid gzhis pa'i spyi latsug tu// khasgyur nas bzhag par byas pani// ma lus drim

'phrog byed la// sna tshogs chen por de mar gyur ro// 'di yis dpang na bsku ram thal// khams pa/sum sna tshog byed par 'gyur// sna tshogs dbang ro rgyal po tsho// sna tshogs gzugs dang sna tshogs bdag/
sgrub pa thams cad bde dam pa// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// thams cad 'di yis dngos grub bo// bud med 'di yis byin brlabs nas// sngo bsangs mkhur
tshos dkar mo dang// de dang lhan cig gur byas pas// sna tshogs bdag pochan por 'gyur// skyo bsangs zhing ma 'drer ma dag/ byin gyis brlabs nas dus gsum du// mtshon gyi mthar ni bsnyan byas nas//

las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// ragis ngan can dang sA ma dang//gar mkhan de bzhin gar byed dag/ phyag rgyas shes byin brlabs te// bsnyen dang dngos grub thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa sna tshogs med pa
sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba 'dod par byed pa thamasacad kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya lo// phyag rgya da dag bstan pa'i rnams// gar gyi tshul gyis rang gsi gnas// dmatshig mchog gi
dmatshig gses// dngos grub chen ro'i mthur 'gyur ro// khal mo de nyid sbyar byas te// rdo rje bcang bas bcing bar bya// de nas dga' byed dbang bskyed do// mda' yi tshul gyis gzung bar bya//

'di ni rab dbyas gtso bo ya// khatshol phyin mchog sdug pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis myos byed pa// dpa' bo rnams kyang rmongs par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// mi shes byed pa 'jig par
byed// las kyi don ni pa kar bzhin du// dga' nas bran bzhin khyed par 'gyur// dga' dang lhan cig gar byed cing// 'di dbang sar ni 'gro bar byed// dpal rdo sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa kun tu bzang
mo'i dgyes pachen mo'i bde ba gnyis su med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba sbyor ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o/// snying khar bzung ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'di yi las kun byed 'gyur te// bdud rnams

gyithamA cad 'a babs par byed// rgyal pa 'dod chags zal spyod pa// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das kun dang// thams cad 'di yis song bar byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas nas/ myur du las la sbyor bar byed
dbang po nyidabang dbangan gyi//gdug pa thams cad 'joms byed de// 'jigs byed drag po chen po yas// gdug pa thams cad gdung bar byed// rdo rje panor bcug pa las//mche bas mamachu bzung byas te//sor mo

phan tshun bsnol ba yis//dpung pa brkyang ste gar du bya// sna tsheg sa chen po rab rgyas pas// bde chen po'i bde 'thob bo// 'dod na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'dod dang thar par grub byed de//phyag rgya 'di yA
[rgyas btab na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'a phur bar byed/rab dgyes 'brel pas gar byas shing// nam mkha' gzung ma'i thabs nyid kyi// phan tshun bcu pa'i gnon pa yis// bcings na 'di yis dngos grub bo//

de ni de ma thag tu yang// lha dang lha min mchod byed de// dpang po na dbang dbanga chen ng/ zhi zla gshin rje chu dbang rnams// spyan po yis ni phyag byas nas// rang gi dpal mchog stobs byed de// rdo rje'adzin
pa thams cad kyang// nad kyi dpal can stobs pa yin// brtan pa de la mgu byed cing// sangs rgyus dgos pa rab sgrub byed// 'di yis las kyi tshul gyi rnams// las dang rjes su mthun 'gyur te//
rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnam mdzad pas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor te// gzung dang gnyis mad sbyor ba yis// yid la 'dod pa'i las kun byed// 'dzam dang gnas dang sbas pa dang// spyod pas

gar gyis byas pas so// gzhan dag kyang dngos grub cha/[7]pad+mo'i 'dab ma rnams che bas// byang chub sems ni rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa pos ni paro sgrub// de bzhin gshegags pa thams cad kyi bde ba gzhes
sumad pa'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa'i dpal mo 'dabam zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pachan po'i bde ba 'thob par bya'o////thal mo de nyid bcings pa yis// bcings pa gyen du bzung byas te//

mthe'u chung gnyis ni bslang byas te// de bzhin sbom po gnyis sbyang bya/phyag rgya 'di'i chu srin zhes// rgyalamtshan ldan par bshad pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa ste// 'dod srol chags par sgrub pa yin// phyag/
0 @#// rgya 'di yis bde ldan gyi// pho brang chen por 'gro bar byed// de phyin chos kyi 'khor lo da// blamar lam na sgol par byed// sangs rgyas pa rol phyin mas bskor// sdig sbyangs rnams zhi bkug

nas kyang// spyod pa drag po'i tshul gyisan// bskal pa bye bar snyan par byed// yang dag byang chub gnas pa yaM// sangs rgyas 'di pas mnyes par byed// de nas dgyas te sna tshogs che// sna tshogs ya shas skya pa ya1

wA rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yi// sams dpa' chen po sgrub par byed// bu mad dngos grub thams cad kyang// tshar sa yums cad grub par byed// sbyor dang ldan pas byin brlabs te// snying khar zhu bar bsam

[© ]byas na// las kyi nge ba tshul 'di yas/ thams cad lasan byed du gzhug/ gar dung dbyangs kyi ro dga' dang// sil snyan brdung ba rnams byed dang// pi wang gling du rdza rje yis// phyag rgya 'di yis bsgrub par pa
dpal rdo rjeshan tu dgyes pa chen po'i thugs kyi dbya sa pa dpa med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzung nas// 'gyings shing 'gying bas gar byas ta// cing
chen pos bcings byas nas// sbyor ba chen po gnyis su bya// khu tshur gnyis po dku nyid du// g.yon du 'gying pas bstan par byas// phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal la sogs// bad ba dam pas mchod byas te//
kya 'gying ba'i sbyor bas gar byas na// dngos grub thams cad grub par byed// 'gying ba tsam gyi sbyor pa yis// 'gying ba thams cad 'phrog par byed// lha dang lha man rige ma yis// 'bum phrag bskyayas
mchod par byed// rab tu dgyes pa bde mchog ma/ kun tu gar byas gnas par 'gyur/ klu mo lha dang lha min dang// de bzhin mi'am bdag por 'gyur// namamakhar 'gro ma'i khyo 'gyur te/ rnal 'byor
ma kun bde ba che// gzung ma rnams kyi dag pa 'dag/ gsang ba pa la phyin pa'i cha// las kyi sbyor la 'di yis ni// thams cad las ni byed par bshad/// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// gsang
chen sbyor bas dngos grub po// dpal shan tu dgyes pa bde brganamo sems can thams cad sgrol bar sbas pa zhes bya pa'i phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa'o/// phyag rgyud nyid mnyam bzung ste//
lag pa'i 'dabam gar dang bcas// myur bar stong du dor ba las/ mgyogs su 'gro ba dngos grub bo/ 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad byung dam pa mchod byas pa/ sbyor ba gar gyis mchod
byas na// thams cad las byed dngos grul bo// gang dag dngos grub med pa dang// gang dag bde lamad pa'i rnams// de dag rtsa ga rgya 'dis brtakhan// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur// de yis

thams cad las rnams ni// rmad byung dam pa 'grub par bud// btsun mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs// 'ad yas don 'grub par byed// gzhan yang mchog tu rgya che ba// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings// btsun
mo dam pa de bzhin gshegs// phyag rgya'i spyor bas dngos gyur po// ltar la lade bachen po rje tshe rab tu dgyes pa'i ma teg 'og 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgyu/// de nyid 'og gi ngos su dor//
stang du cung zad bsgrub par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde mchog yid ni tshim byed pa// 'dis ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// bdud rnams shin tu ring bar 'gyur/ ]
phyag rgya bcings skabasdigs pa yis// sgra gnas dngos grub sbyin par byed// sangs rgyas dam tshig gsum gnas pa'i// 'di yis mchod pa byas par 'gyur// de nas gtso ba 'dis mnyes nas//mcho ga
gi thabs n stobs par byed// phyag rgya bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis//'di ni thams cad khyad par 'gyur/ rgyun du byas na rnal 'byor pa// dngos po thams cad byed par 'gyur// sdig nga las ka [0f7a ] da de//

bad ba pad 'thob byed cing// tsha'adi dnganil rol tu// phyag rgya'i gnas su de 'gro 'o// rang la shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bad ba tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya// drim thams cad sbyang ba dpa' an tu dgyas
ma'o// thalam de nyid sbom po bsgang// lhagam gsal pa'i nyi ma bzhin// 'dani sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ya shes mchog tu snang byed pa'o// thog ma mdanas bskor ba yi// 'di yis gti mug

'phrog byed de// mnyam par gzha gnas bcings ma thag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// mnyam nyid ye shes dri med dang// pad+mo dra ba dga' ba che// sna tshogs dra ba dang la chen ngo// bde phyod chen po 'thob par
'gyur// rdo rje dgyes pachen mo'i dpe med pa'i dpal dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lag pa yis// brjid pa'i gar gyis gar bya zhing// thal mo de nyidamanyam sbyar te//

07/ g.yon gyi khu tshur spyi bor bzhag/ rgyal b rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di// mchod pa thams cad grub byed do// thams cad don rnams grub pa dang// bkra shis rgyal ba 'thob par byed// gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis kyang///

mchod pa'i sprinanyid rgyal chen po// mtha' yas dri med gzwa brjod dang// sangs rgyas zhing ni dngos grub bo// phyag rgya sbyor bas sgyur byas te// skad cig gcig gi gar bas// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sras
mchog kyang// 'di yis thams cad 'bab par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni sbyor ba yis//snatshogs gar gyi gar byas na// dpa' bo thams cad kun tu 'gro// phun sum tshogs pa 'dis 'grub bo// dpalashin

tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i sems 'a phal bar byed ma zhes pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po shani tu dgyes pa chen po bad pi'

bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthas klas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig lo mcho ga tu pha rol tu phyin pa/ lags ng bachan po dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i
ya shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dgyes pa/ rdo rje gdon mi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskal pa'i mtha' klas pa zhes bya ba gsum pardzogs so////de nas bcom ldan 'das kun
tu bzang po'i gsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dmatshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas/ slar yang bde bar cang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
cad ngo mtshar dang/ pha rol tu phyin ma rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs thams cad dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mam+mor du gyur
nas/ phyi nang gi rdo rje rigs su gtogs pa 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs thams cad la sar dbugs phyung ste/ de las bzhengs nas gar maN+Did cing rab tu dbyas pa'i sbyin rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das

rtsa la yang dang yang du lta zhang dbyangs kyi mchog pad kha 'das glu blangs te dgyes par byed do// rnam mang bang ba'i rol pas bdag 'dachan po yos/ skya dang mi skyo'i chos nyid yamtshan rmad dag dpal bstan pa//
shin tu bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten 'dir phyug ste// rang bzhin dag pa'i gzung ma'i dkyilanas skud ra ra mdzod/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung bas bde bas rol mdzad cing// bdud rtsi'i rang nan 'dus
pa rnams la dbugs 'byin cing// gsang ba'i thig le dngos nyid nam mkha' 'dra ba rnams spyad de// bde ba phun sumatshogs pa'i longs spyod rgyu la dbang mdzad pas// byang chub mchog gi lam 'di nyon

mongs mtha' dang rnam bral zhing// bde ba'i 'khyung gnas skye shi med pa'i sgo mor pad+mo rnam dag nga// nyon mongs mi go sbrumar gnas pa chu lci'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// ama'o kun tu bzang po ragi pa rgya chen
bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dngos 'di mad pa'i chos la dga' ba'i rol pas gzungs su 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi de mchog bdud rtsi ra sa yan// jiltar bde la rten cing kun tu snang bar mdzad kyi
mam bde mchog bde bas rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// sdug bsngal 'gro ba'i las can bde bas tshim par mdzod// myams pa 'i spyan can thugs rje nyi mas 'gro ba kun la shar mdzad nas// gtamug thabs
po'i mun nag byang chub sems kyis gsal bar ston// don 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde sbyin lol pa'i rgyal pos gsungs// byang chub mchog gi sems des snying mo dbang skur cig/ dbyangs kyi phyag rgya
'di yis ni// skad cig skad cig bskul byas na// rab tu dbye rgyas pa'i bdag nyid kyis// mdun du b gnas de dngos grub sbyin// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po kun

tu bzang po rdo rje zla gsang thig le chen po la// rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba gsang ba chen po tshad med pa dang/ mchog tu pa rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen mo de rnams kyis bstod

cing bskul ba byas pa dang/ gsang ba thabs kyi bde ba chen po g+hAn tu dgyes pa longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'od la snyoms par zhugs nas/ shan tu dgyes pa chen po gdon
mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dirang gi sku dang/ gsung dang/ rtsigs rdo rje las phyung ngo// myu pa'i pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan//
dar dang dril bu'i chun po dang// kimazla bas rnam par brgyan// nichen mu tilaM 'bras bus spras do shal gdu bu rnams kyis brgyan/ sna tshogs gdugs ni rnam bres pa// su tshogs 'phrang ba
@#// gos kyas brgyan// srad zhu ba dang ldan pa ste// ka ba brgya mchog yang dang gnas// dbus kyi jags byed snyan ni// dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs pad+ma ltar gyis g.yogs/

thams cad stan do dag ces bya// dbusasu rdo rje shan tu gyes/ dpan de la ni gzhug par bya// tshad med pad+mo ngar 'dra la'i// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// yid nga'a'i no ngang rgyu tu la/ ma'i chen gtsus

gis rnam par mdzes// tshad mdu dar na dbyangs pa yis// ra la sa chun pos mdzes par bya// sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas// chu skyes spyanan yid tsamakyis// dag 'khyong yong/

ka tsam g.yon du 'dud// g.yas pa'i phyag gas rdo rje che// sku ngal ragasangal shin tu brtson// de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag/ slob ma 'a ma yang na gzhan yang rung/ la tshur kun gyisan rnam

k+Sha brgyan pa// tshul bzhin khyen gyis kha ba bya ste// dbus kyi dkyil du gzhug par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste// de la sogs pa yon tan gtso// dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa na// bdag ni rab dgyes zhes

su sa// des ni slob ma byin brlabs te// thams cad las skyed phun sum tshogs// rdo rje pad+mo las 'byung ba'i// pags pa yis kyang dbang bskur ro// rab dgyes la sogs yo ba ltan// yid 'ongs bu mo datsaka

byas te// mgrin pa dpral ba snying spyi bor// lA la sogs pa'i 'khru bsgoms te// mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bad pa// rdo rje pad+mor mnyam sbyor ba'i// rangal 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// tshul bzhin thams cad gzha

[0]par bya// mdun du lha mo skye byed ma/ ma mchu'adzan pa'i ro la dgyes// dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yis// thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan// lo na bicu drug 'an pa'i mchog/ shes rab can gyis mdun du gzhag/

g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma// mtshon cha'i mnga' ni 'dren par brtson// do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste// gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra// chu skyes sbyan na yod tsam sngo// sems dpa'/

che la dgyes mdzad de// 'di ne tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// rgyab tulha mo chos byed ma// pad+mongamar po mdog gi 'od// chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes ma 'o// sku tshe'i tshad ni nyi shu gcig// dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro

la dgyes// sna tshog san bza'ayang dag gsol// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs// gar gyi bya ba rab bslabs gzhug/ g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste// sna tshogs dgos pa'i

rjes bslabs pa// sku tshe'i tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan// rnal 'byor pa la shin tu brtson// lha dang lha min mi yi rnams// 'gro ba thams cad myos 'gyur ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs dar gyi

na bza' gsol// grwa rnams kyi ni thams cad du// gzugs sgra dri ro rig gi rnams// bdug pa me tog bsung ldan pa// gzi brjid chen po 'od ldan pa// ci rigs par ni gzhag par bya// sgo yi phyogasa rnams thams cad

du// rang gi las kyi phyag rgya ldan// skal ldan dga' l rnam mos pa// sgo srangs bzhi ni gzhag par bya// gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// piwang gling bu brdab pa dang/ rdza ra rnga chen mu ku dang// mu ra dza dang
ra dang// gos dang dbyangs dang bzhud ba che/ rmob mo'i yo byad sna tshogs rnams// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do// dkyil 'khor 'de yi

phyi rol du// rdo rje nam mkha' 'gro ma gzhag/ yi dwags rgyal po yang dag zhon// dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzan te// skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan// gdug pa'i sa mas kyis bsdigs byed cing// sha khrag

dang ni rgyu ma dang// rkang dang tshil bu lha skyong pa// dkyil 'khor gas te radug pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khabor gzhag par bya// dang/ na par byed dang 'dren par byed// gsod par byed dang skye bar byed// rdo rje
mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams// shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya// kazi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma// 'jigs byed bong pa'i lo ma ste// gtsug lag mthong ba rgyu yis ni// mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhika
par bya// chos chen mo ba sa pa sa dang// 'khor lo mo dang rgyu sa 'debs so// rab tu sbyor dang so byas te/ gsan pa kAr Na ra bya// sna tshogs lus ka yag pa/ pa ka dpal
'phrog/ sngags dang phyag rgyus byin brlabs te// sngags mkhan ci rigs byang dug sdug/ shar gyi grwa ru ba/zhalag pa ni klu rog gdong ste mig 'dra zhing// 'jigs pa'i lag dam 'dza pa dang// dza ltar
rjes su uthun byas te// yi dgas ston la yang dag 'dug/ sna tshogs mchog gi mdog 'dzin te// lagapa dri dang 'khar gzhong thogs/ mchog tusha dang khrag za ba'o// chung tshams ka ka

[$12 ]pa bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong rang ma// khros pa'i khyi dang phag gi gdong// gsus pa phye la lto 'phyangs ma// nub byang gi na mtshams dag tu// jamo bong bu'i gdong 'dzan dang// khros pa'i ra dang bya la'i
gdong// rgya ma'i mgo nas za byed rnams// shar dang byang ga mtshams dag tu// keng rus kar po 'dzin pa ste// khros pa rus pa'i 'phreng bas klubs// lta 'tshangs mo la bum pa'i dzani// phan tshun 'theb
par brtson pa yis// ce spyang gi na 'khor gyi rnams// 'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'byin// rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o// sgo srungs kyi u0f7a ni phyogs kun tu// sgo bzhi rnams su gzheg bya
ba byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'grogs te// bum pa snanishar nyid du// nub tu rnam par 'jigs pa'o// lhongan gshin rje rgyal po gzhag/ de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog/ nam mkhar 'gro bas kun tu bskol
bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs te// gser dang dngul las byas pa la// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa// sman lnga dang ni yang dag
ldan// chen lnga dang ldan byas pa// 'bru rnam lnga yis brgyan byas pa'i// bum pa bcu drug gzhag byas te// bcuganyis brgyang ma yang na phyed// khanachung du gcig tsam yang// ji ltar rim bzhin bzhag

byas te// dbus su bum pa ro yi mchog/ dam tshig chus na gang byas pa// gser ram dngul lam zangs kyang rung// lcags sam sa las byas ba la// rlab nyi ma dri chu dang// btung ba rtsub por ldan pa yi// dbang po
kun las 'byung ba rnams// shasrang pa/ cib/gas pasres ti[' -]3 dang pa nga ya/ sa pa sa su bas sa te// pa[G ]Na ngas pa
blo ldan bskal par gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o ba'i zas// nga rgyal ba dang na yang ngas mno/ zla 'ong pa lta ba'i las zla ba// tshad cher bkol dpon pa [：]lam bor[：]ga/
cig skad cig mchod par byas// sngagasama'an tshu yapan 34palag ste/ dkyu ngau0f38 sa sa pa sa sa sa sa sa mas rgyal/ 06/ bsam pas pa 7 nas
po spyan drangs gtsang sbrus byas pa dbul// gzungs kyi tshogs ni de rnams la// mnyes pa byas nas slar 'gas so// rnal nA ma ra ma chen dkyel ngakhor du// slob ma'i rang lo 13 pa la/ mtshuT
spyod pa rab madzes ma// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// lag pa g.yon gyis gdung byas te// sras dgyes longs spyod phyag bya yis// bcug nas sgo yi grwa 'di du// blo ldan ma nga ba da pa la ka/
las mi bya cung zad med// thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis// rtag tu dogs pa med byas te// 'angod pa lnga yi yon tan sbyong/ gzhan yang dam tshagi nyams pa dang// skye bo ga las/ byA ya na kan
zhugs khyod kyis de drangs te// khrag chen po ni btung bar bya// gang dag slob dpon smod byed dang// gang ngag bka' rnams ma byed// de dag khros nas khrag chen po// blo ldan sang kyang na nga/ nga

gsum la gnod byed dang// slob dpon la yang gnod byed pa// rdo rje khro be'i bsdus pa yis// dam tshig bsgoms te bsgral bar bya// de nas dam tshig blang byas te// rdo rje bdung rtsa rdo ya mchog/ dung chen por gzhag

par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu shud ro// kye dmyal ba yi ni chu khang ste// khyod kyi snying la kun tu mo nas// dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub ster// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung// oM badzra u da ka hU~M na// dam tshig

lan brgyar bzlas pa'i// byin gyisabarlabs te 'thung du gzhug/ gzhan du dam tshig 'gyur te/ dngos grub nyid du'ang 'di 'gyur ro// bdag ni dam tshig skal dga' zhes// slob ma sngags ni brjod du gzhug/ sgo/

grwar gnas nas dri ba bya// kye khyod dga' ba ci la dang// 'jug pa yis kyang smra bya ba// bdag ni skal ldan bde mchog la// rab dgyas u0f8bphrul la brtag dag 'a ste// mchog tu dga' la bdag dga' lo// de nas rnal

'byor ma mchog gis// dkyil du me tog bor byas te// me tog gang la ltung ba yi/ la 'ong ngu ni dngos grub bo// dbang bskur ba yi phyag rgya yis// de nas spyi bor dbang bskur bya// bum pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang
mnyam par bzhag ste lnga po yis// pad+mo dkyil 'khor zhugs byas te// de nas yang na dpang bskur bya// ci rigs pa ni gzung ma'i rnams// bdag ni skal ldan zhes su smra// gang dag 'go bar gyur

pa yi// lha de nyid ni bstan par bya// dga' bar byed pa'i gzung ma de'i// khyod kyis rtag tu sgrub par gyis// de nas rgyal dbang slob ma nge// nang gi sbas pa bsdus pa yi// gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yis/
[S]// sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// jo rje pad+mo lA drangs pa// sbom po dang ni dbang gis blang// rdo rje dun du bzhag ngas nas// rtag ba dge ba bde ba che// kye ma'o dam tshag bad brjod

cung// kye ma bde ba blang bar bya// 'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ste// dbang bskur ba yi thabs mchog go/ rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che'i// rang gi khar ni rdo rje gzhag/ sems dpal chen po drangs ba na/ sem//

kyi byang chub bde ba 'thob// de ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// dbang bskur bo yi bde pa'o// slob ma mi shes pa rnams la// 'di dag thar nad cad bsnagam bya// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba// yang nas ngang pa
brtag par bya// 'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/ slob ma tshogs kyi bdog por 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur// gzung ma rnams kyi dga' ba'i bdag ma

rgyus rnams kyi rjer bshad do// mkha' la 'gro ba'i khyor 'gyur te// ridang 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ de nas shes rab ye shes dbang// slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya// gzung ma de ni dadag nyid la// bla ma nyid kyis

byin brlabs te// dngos grub 'bras bu myur 'thob phyir// slob ma la ni sbyin par bya// dbang bskur shan tusdus pa yis// rdo rje slob dpon tshul ji bzhin// blo ldan the tsom med pa'i phyir// rnam pa bzhi po 'di sbyin no//

de tshun chad ni slob ma la// rgyud kun las ni gang cung zad// yage'i tshul gyis sbas pa rnams// gsong pa mchog ni bstan par bya// de nas de nyid langs byas te// slob dpon rkang par gtugs byas nas// rgyal po dbang phyug

dbangadam pa// thams cad yon ni dbul bar bya// gardung de ngag ni thams cad la// ci dgar ba ni yon dang 'bul// slob dpon cung zad gang 'dod pa// steng la bsam pa'i yon yang rung// dam tshig 'angs pas 'jig

pa yis// de dag thams cad dbul bar bya// slob ngapon la na yon gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyad par dbul byas te// seng ge 'i gangan la 'di kyi ma// sangs rgyas byin na yon mchog yin// glang po rin chen gser dag dang// sring

mo bla ma'i yon mchog yani// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yan te// yon de mchog gi yon yin no/ rin chen padro'i chung ma dang// shing rta rta ni shin tu brgyan// sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag pa// mu tig 'phreng bas na

tu mdzes// bu mo rin chen dra ba yis// brgyan de sna tshogs rdo rje la'o// rgyal po yis ni dbang phyug dang// chung ma bla ar dbul bar bya// 'phrul gyi bzhon pa rnam sna tshogs// glang po rta ni shin tu brgyan// de bzhin

gshegs pa kun gyi rje// nan tan bla mar dngul bar bya// bla ma'i yon gyi phyag rgyu 'di// rdo rje blo ldan slong ma yis// ci ste bde byeng kun 'dod na// dga' dang mos pa'i sems kyis bya// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba

yis// rab dgyes gdon mi za ba'i bde// gang gis myur du thob 'gyur te// slob dpon gtso mchoging du 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje blo ldan mchog tu 'gyur// rin chen kun gyi rigs/
kyirgyal// de bzhin sna tshogs rigs kun tu// padro'i rigs kun dpal dang ldan// rdo rje rigs kun bdag por de// sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs kun dang// rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gyi
ni 'khor lo'i gar// nyid dang slob ma'i tshogs gyur pas// rdo rjesams dpa' bde ba che// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// phan tshun la sogs tshul gyis ni// shes rab

mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje che yi thabs gnas te// mkha' 'gro kun la mchod par bya// phyi yi sdus pa gsang la sogs// nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba tshul gnas te// tshul bzhanargyas

ts+tsha par dbul bar bya// lus dang ngag sems bde byed kyis// mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod par bya// 'dod pa'i rol ba myong ba yi// myangs na mchod pa 'thob par 'gyur// mchod pa kun gyi co ka pes// rang rig khyad
par shes byas te// sgrub pa thams cad bsgrubs byas na// dngos grub thams cad myur du 'thob// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas// dga' mgur rangs pa'i yid kyisan// rdo rje sems la phyag byed cing//
rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs/ bde byed chen po'i skyil mo brgya// rigs kyi khyad par gyis na lnga// lha rnams kyang na re re yang// sems kyi khyad par mchog mtha' yas// 'das pa'i dus na mabyung
ba mtha' yas chos ni yangs pa bstan// 'dod chags rnams kyis bkris pa yis// sdug bsngal gzir ba'i mtha' nas 'gro// 'dod pa'i mchog gi longs spyod rnams// mos pa'i rjes su zhugs shing spyod//
kun tu chags par ma 'gyur zhing// bde bas los pa'i yid dang ldan// byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni// dam bcas rnams dang sems kyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag

po kun tu bzang bo chen po rab tu bzhi d cing// sbyan zur gyis gzigs pa'i thugs kyis shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i skyil mo krung gi dpal zhes bya ba'i tange nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// skyil mo

krung chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba rang gi phyag rgya' ya shes nyid kyi sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis na// rkang pa ga3sa ka btag byas te// bdag nyid brlu nam

snang bzhin (rtsa bskyol mo bcang bar bya// sbyor ba gar mkhan tshul gyis ni// gar gyi sbyor bas gar bya 'o// rdo dza gdan gyi bde ba che/ 'di yis bdud las rgyu la ngar 'gyu // gdug pa dang ni de gra thams cad

skad cag gis kyang smos ci dgos// rab tu dgyes pa'i stan 'di yis// yang dag byang chub myur du thob// mi phyed pa ni thi sig ler bcas// 'og gi phyogs su yi ge drug/ shes rang can gyis bskor cing bzlas// 'byung ba'i

tshe na phaT ces bshad// parom phyed 'dren pa dang// thig ler bcas pa sbyor bar bya// mi phyed lo dang yang dag ldan// tshog drag chas pa bde 'byung cha'o// kud mngal mi zhag bdun du// 'a yis rtsen par byas pa na//

nam mkha' thams cad gang ba yi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byorachen po mthong/ dorab dgye sa longs spyod gnas pa yi// sems dpa' che la slong mdzad do// gzungs kyi pad+mo las byung ba// ngade byed mchog dbang bskur ro// de nas

rab dga' bde thob pa// sems dpa' deng ni dngos grub bo// thog ma dang ni mtha' med par// 'dod pa thams cad de longs spyod// tshongang rasal dang phun sum ldan// gdon dang ngug dang tshaba'i nad// mkha' 'gro 'u bar gtsas pa
[– ]@#/ dang// sdig can 'khor ba las 'grol te// sa rnams kun la rnam par rgyu// gzi brjidi ma shar dang 'dra// sna tshogs 'du ba ra bar byed pas// sna tshogs thams cad snang byed cing// sa yi semA

can thams cad kyi// nad dang mya ngan 'jigs chen 'phrog/ phyag rgya 'di yi sbyor ba yis// ye shes lnga ni bsten par bya// rtsa ba'i skyil mo zhes bya ba// phyag rgya chen po'i las kyi don// thams cad sgrub par byed pa 'o// bdag gi

skye rkang pa dbus su bsdu// de yi rkang pas bcings byas te// sems dpa' stsol mo bzhin du 'bral// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// khams gsum sgrub bzhed pa yin// yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin// rang gi lhar ni sbyor

brtson pas// bsgoms sam yang na bskyod kyang rung// sngags pa'i yis dngos grub ste// sngags kyi sems 'dzin gtsang ma yi// zhag bdun sgom byas nas// yang dag dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste//

sbyor ba shin tu bstan byas nas// gdon mi za bar rgyal po thob// yid bzhin dgod pa thams cad phyed// rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo// gzugs ma ste bcang ba ni// rin po che ltar sbyar byas te// rang gi rkang lami snang bya// rin chen kun gyi

stsalemo krung// 'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi// dbul zhing 'phongs pa 'joms byed de// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma// gnod pa'i dug kun 'phrog par byed// gdug pa thams cad rmongs byed de// dag rnams thams cad

'joms par byed// khro bo thams cad 'dzum byed de// gdug pa rnams kyis rgyas 'debs na// mi g.yang zla ba gcig gis ni// 'di yis rgyal po dngos grub bo// yid bzhin las rnams thams cad khyed// ci ste bdag

nyid rgyal bo ru/ mchog tu rmad byung sgrub 'dod na// bde chen sems kyi rin chen mtshan/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnon pa// rgyal po khams gsum rgyal byed pa// zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rin po che yi skul

mo go/ de bzhin rkang pa gnyis bzhag la// pad+mo'adra ba sbyarabyas te// bdag bam de bzhin gzhan yang rung// blo ldan pad+mo bde bsgrub bya// 'di yis sems can thams cad dang// mdor na sangs rgyas rnams dag dang//

rdo rje nyim ma lus kyang// dbang du'agyur ba gdon mi za// bde ldan pho brang chen po yi// bde byed 'di yis 'thob par byed// sems can khams rnams thams cad du// sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'ong byed// pad+mo'i

skyel mo 'o// de bzhin skyil mo rgyas byas te// sna tshogs tshul gyis sbyor ba bya// sngags mkhan chen po'i sbyor ba yi// sngags mkhan yi ge shin tu brtson// zlos pa byed cing rnam bsgoms na// dngos grub rtag pa thob

para'agyur// mi g.yang sngon gyi gdug pa yis// las rnams thams cad 'phrog par byed// sna tshogs stsal du gnas pa yis// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi na skyil mo 'o// de nas/mkha' 'gro

ma yi skyil mo rgyas// thams cad khrag ni 'phrog byas te// gzung ma yi ni rkang pa gnyis/ (yid kyis gnyis bar rkang pa 'deg/ rdo rje ma ba'i 'gro'o sbyor ba yis// bsnyen pa khrag rnams 'phrog par byed// mnyam par
bzhag nas gzung ma yi// rkang pa gcig ni mgul nying du// sbyor dang ldan pas bteg byas nas// rngas rnams thams cang 'phrog byed de// btung dang bza' ba bca' ba dang// gos kyi rgyan gyis pa yis//
de bzhin zhag bdun nyid kyis kyang// thams cad las byed gdon mi za tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang po yi// dbal chen mchog ni 'phrog par byed// lag pa bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis ni//
[A ]khams gsum rim par rgyal bar byed// mig ni btsum par byed 'gyur ba// 'gro ba gsum po rnam par 'jig/ rus sbal bzhin du mnyam bzhag ste// ma ga yang skad cig bcings byas na// gdug pa srog chags
thams cad dang// dgra dang spyod bcas mi myong 'phrog/ sbal pa bzhin du mnyam bzhag ste// dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bskor bar bya'o// ma lus rnams kyang rmongs byed do// khams gsum rnams kyang rgal bar
byed/ gtogs 'dod kyin mnyam bzhag ste// sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas gdab pya/ gar dbang ga ni mnyam bzhag ste// sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas gdab bya// garadabang gin mnyam bzhag ste// sa gsum

shrI rnams ni gar byed gzhug/ dril bu yi namanyam bzhag ste// sa gsum rnams na ba gdab par bya// gzhon nu'i skyil mo bcings pa yis/ sangs rgyas bde chen 'thob par byed// skyel mo phyed na mnyam bzhag nas// gnyis

pa yis na mnan byas na// khams gsum thams cad gnon 'gyur zhing// 'dod byed thams cad dngos grub bo/ dga' byer ma yimanyam bzhag pas// rgyal mo rab tu dga' thob ste// dga' byed ma yi yid 'ong ma// khams
gsum thams cad dngos grub bo// rigs 'dzan rnam par bzhag byas te// khams gsum skad cig mnan par bya// dpal khams gsum rnam bar rgyal ba yi// mdora'adus gzung ba'i bcings pa yis// 'jig rten

[2]]gsum narnatshargyal to// skad cig mas gsum bdag khom gyur// rtog par yan tshun 'brel ba yis// dpung pa gnyis nibaskum cus te// thams cad sgron 'gebs pa yis// che ba sbom po rab tu sbyar// g.yas kyi/

brkyang bskum tshul gyis na// gnon kha'i mnan khas bsdigs byas te// mi phyed sbyor bas bskul bya ba// khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya// g.yonapa'i brkyang bskum sbyar bar bya// myur du mnan pas ba tag

bya zhing// ma'achung bo ba'i lcags kyu yis// mdzub mo rtse la reg byas te// sa bon tshig drag hri ldan pa'i// thig le'i spyi bor brgyan byas pas// bdud rtsi 'am ni reg ma drang bar bya// lce yi thog mar spo byas te//

'dren pa'i tshul gyis drang bar bya/ rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam bzhag ste/ kha yi phyogs su mche ba yis// sbom po rtse dang 'dra byas te/ khros la mche ba skyor ba yis// so mo thos pa bzhin byas nas// khrag mang po ni

'dung bar ng// yi ge dang po so dang ldan// skye bor thig le ldan byas te// 'og gi phyogs su ra yis gdags// u'adren nga so brgyan par bya/ 'din khro bo'i snying bo ste// mchog tu thams cad las byas pa'o//
gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun// dbang dang dbang rnams byed la sogs// de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang// tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed bar 'gyur// shi ba bzhin du mig btsums nas// rang gi lus n bskum

gte/ khum bu lnga many+dza'i rgyu ba yis// dgra rnams thams cad bsad par bya// nga ro dang po yang dag ldan// kha dag 'di ngo bo thams cad bya// sasargyas chen po bsgom byas te// zhi bce'ong zer sngon phung spro// ro
yis lus na zhi bar 'gyur// de yis sems can thams cad kyi// 'tshob gdon dang dug la sogs// sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro'i mchab dang/ 'jigs ba thams cad bral bar byed//
shes rab pha rol phyin manyam gzhag/ bdag nyid kyi ni tshul bzhin du// 'di yis thams cad nang gi rnams// sdug bsngal dogs pa 'phrog par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// nam mkha' sa steng
las kyi rnams// snying khar rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag/ yid bzhin thams cad byed bar 'gyur// myur du rdo rje slob dpon la// sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas// gus kha zhe sar bcas pa yis/ shin

tu lhag par phyogs par bya// nam yang dorje slob dbon gyi// sems na dkrug par mi bya ste// ci ste shes rab 'chal pas byed// myur du na rag lhung bar 'gyur// nad dang 'tshob dgra dag dang// gdon dang tsha
ba dug nyid kyis// slob dpon zhabs la spyod byed pa// gtilug chen po de 'chi'o// bla ma las dngos grub thob// bla ma mtho ris blo ma bde/ debs nan tan thams cad kyis// bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi

bya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tubazang po dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpar shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdon mi

za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje mchog gsang ba sbas pa chen po zla gsang thig le'i kyi rgyal po shAn tu
dgyes pa chen po' rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'a9lorate bzhi pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang//

rnal 'byor ma dang/ rnam 'byoragyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang/ rdo rjenam mkha la 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro'i tshogs kyi g.yog rnams mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ ca co'abyin cing dbyangs chen po brjod

par gyur to// kye ma'o rdo rjes mas dpa' yi// rdo rje shin tudagyes pa che// sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che// sa tshigs ma shes bde ba che// kye ma kun tu bzang po ya// dge ba'i sa gas bde ba che// gang bde phyir
ni log miyi// pad+molas ni gnas pa mdzad// kye ma'o rag pa shin tu zab// shes rab pha rol phyin pa bde// sems can kun la shes rab kyis// mun pa'i thibs po sel bar mdzad// kye ma'o thams cad ngo
mtshar che// mkha' 'gro'i dra bas gar mdzad cing// kham par mdzad dang myong ba dang// gto ba ni 'brog pa'i tshog g/ e ma'o shIn tu rab tu gyes// skal ldan skal la spyod pa dang// sna tshogs skal bas

bde byed che// sna tshogs rdo rjeshin tumadzes// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tulongs spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po la gnas pa la/ rnal

'byor ma thams cad dang mchog gi pha rol phyin m la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen o thams cad rang gi gdan las bzhengs te// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i 'gying ba'i 'dud pas phyag byas te/ gni dgyes
pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes par mdzad do// sgyu ma'i bde bas nam mkhar kun tu gang ba yin// sprul pa'i rang bzhin skye ba mchog gi bde bstan te

rjes su chags pa'i pad+ma dga' bas kun khyab cing// chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu btang snyoms mdzad// e ma'o 'di lta'i gzhung ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan ma/ khyamasama'i phyogs su mi gtong ye shes nyid kyis 'jus/

'dod pa'i yon tan 'di rnams chos nyidi rnam par dag/ dug gsum dbang du mdzad cing mos ba rnams mi bskyod// ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang chub snying por bgrod// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po

'dzul pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas 'khor de dag thams cad la yud tsam kun tu gzigs te// rdo rje pad+mo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te// cang mi gsung
par mnyam par zhugs te dbugs mi rngub// dbugs mi 'dzin/ dbugs rab tu gtong bar ma mdzad// kun tum gzigs/ kun tu rnam par ma gzigs/ bzhengs par mi mdzad/ bzhugs mar me mdzad/ gshags par

mi mdzad/ gsung bar ang mdzad/ rnam par rtog pa'i ng mi mdzad bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen pos nam mkha'i dbying thams cad shin du khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i 'du ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad pas//
deng de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad drangs bcug bcings dbang du byas te/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis mnyes par byas te bzhugs par gyurato// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheka ya thams cad nga da

yang du 'du ba mdzad nas/ yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te/ bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang gnyis su med par longs sbyong pa dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bskul/
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs te byang chub kyi sems chen po la'ang tham pa na/ khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang 'jug par byed/ bstan pa la gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang mad/ sangs

rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun 'jug par byed pa'i ng med/ khros pa dang/ gtum po chen po dang/ rngam pa dang/ rab tu gdug pa chen porasams pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtimug gi mun pas bsgribs/

pa dang/ gtum 'khrug chen po dang/ gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dang/ gzhan gyi sems 'phrog pa dang/ gzhan gyi bud med kyis 'chums pa dang/ tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pas

gzhan la gtses pa dang/ gcig gi sha gcig za ba dang/ thabs med pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyis/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam las kyi stobs la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs

pa rnams kyis gzigs se/ thabs dang shes rab kyi blugs rje'i smon lam chen po nalamakha'i dbyings kun tuyang dag par gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin/

gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba yang dag par zhugs pa kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul ba mdzad do// ho rang bzhin dag pa dag pa pad+ma bde
ba'i mchog mnga' ba// thugs kyi yid bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgos nas bzhengs mdzad de// bskal pa mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i byams pas gzugs kyis brjid pa dang// byang chub swAng
po'i chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus// a la la la ho/ pa'i 'byung gnas bde gshegs kun gyi mchog dang ldan// sngag bsngal kun sel ba yi thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la gzigs// dga' ba'i rol

pas gar dang bcas te bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod// a la la la ho/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bsgrags// gsang ba 'gro ba kun gyi yid dang 'thadapa'i gsang chen 'di byung ste// rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyi
mi 'phrog nam mkha' la// dngos med rol mo'i gzhan las 'a phangs pa bzhes shing mdzad du gsol// a la la la ho/ skad cig ma yi spyod yul 'das// mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir// gzhan la thugs rjes

dgongs nas su// bying ba'i lha rnams bsrung du gsol// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// dgyes mchog dam pa bskul byas nas// pad+mo dra ba rdo rje dang// bde bar sbyor bar bzhengs su gsol// bde ba chen po bde
gnas pa// gtso la 'di yis bskul ba yis// sems can kun don bzhengs 'gyur te// rgyal ba thams cad gdon bar mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chon po kun tubazang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang
dag pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba bde ba chen pos brgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinal snyoms par zhugs te bzhengs nas/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas rab 'byams mtha' klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kun gzigs nas ngo mtshar du gyur te// kye ma'okhams gsum 'di stongs so// de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyi 'di dag 'o bar gtsos//

gnod sbyin dang// srin po thams cad dang/ nad dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ gnod pa chen po dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos zhes dgongs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu

bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje

dang pad+mo las byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdu bar bya ste/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// thog mar o na thig ler bsam byas pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// mi phyeda'adren pa

yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa ste// 'dini ston pa'i mchog ste rdo rje'i rigs nyid do// phyung nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du gang ba'i so bas snang bar byas te// slar yang 'dus nas rdo rje lta bur gnas so// yang spro ba dang bsdu babyas

nas slar 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi sku dang// gsung dang// thugs rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur gyur nas/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs par gyur pa na// hU~MhUM hUMzhes bzhed pa chen porab zhang

cing a zhes brjod nas bzhugs te// rang gi sems dpa'i skyil mos g.yon du yid tsam 'gying bos 'dus pa g.yas kyis rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum dang bcas shing spyan rgyas pa che ba'i chen po dbulnga pa/ phyag ni bcu drug
rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs sku ni mchog 'dzan pa// dpa' bo thams cad 'dus byed pa// kha dog rnam lnga gzi brjid che// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzani// rdo rje rgyu mar rab tu gnas//

mkhas pa gang gi sAng kha nyid// mnyam par gzhag ste 'dzin byas na// rdo rje pad+mobade che yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bde myur thob// de nas bcom ldan 'dasanam mkhar 'gro ma kun las spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya/
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ grub sa rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin geshegs pa thams cad kyi zla gsang thig le las// nam mkha' shin tudagyes pa

thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di byung ngo// e yi gtsug tu thig le ste// mi phyed thig le ra bcas pa yi// 'og tu gzi brjid yang dag b.rus/ ]mthar ni dra

ste tsheg drag bcas// 'dir ni rin chen thams cad kyi// snying po mchog turmad byung ba'o// phyung ba yis ni nam mkha' dang// sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu// 'od zer sngon phung rgyus byas te// slar yang de nyid/
bzhugs par 'gyur// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas kyang// lnga yis tshul gyis bzhugs par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas// sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni// kha drog rnam lnga yangs

par spyan// chu skyes bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas// ma'i gzi brjid mdzes pa che// phyag rgya la sogs snatshogs rgyan// skyil mo 'gying ba g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi snying khar rin chen 'dzim/ brgyad gnyis

phyag rgya ngo po yis// dri ma gsum spyas brgyan pa ste// rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas// sna tshogs lho ru gnas par 'gyur// rnam pa kun mkhyen mngon rig pa'i// nad kyis slongasapa 'jigs par 'gyur/

'di nIsangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gzi brjod chen mo mdangs che ba// dbul dang nad dang gnong chen po// sems can kun gyi 'phrog par byed// khyim 'char ba'i dus nyid dang// khyim phyed pa'i dus nyid du//

nyid kyi snying khar 'di byas te// nor bu rin chen bsgom byas na// zhagadun gyis ni nges par yang// dngos grub don mang sbyin mdzad de// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bde bas dbang bskur byas//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu dgyes pa'i 'dod pa'i dbang gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// pad+mo

chen po kun tu gzigs pa'i longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po nyid kyi sku dang// gsung ngang/ thugs kyi ya ngegs mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le las 'di phyung ngo// dang por o dang ldan
byas te// mi phyed ra btags 'dren par bcas// tsheg drag pa ni sngags an te// bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskor/ sngags mkhan gang gis mnyam bzhag ste// snyapi khar 'di ni sbyar byas nas//

bdag ni 'dod chags zhen sems shang// pad+mo sbyor bas bsgom par bya// mtshams kyi mtha' ma dus dag tu// dam tshig 'di ni sbyar byas na// zla ba phyed kyi nang logs su// dbang phyug mo ni dngos grub 'thob
pad+mo che las byung nas kyang// thams cad du ni rgyas 'gyur te// 'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas// pad+mo'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur/ kun tu snang bas khyab byas nas// sems dpa'i
tshul gyis sprul pa ni// de nas 'dod chags zhabs nas kyang// pado'i dbus su bzhugs par gyur// dkyil 'khor du gang ba yis// rgyab nas rjes su mnyes mdzad cing// 'dzum bcas pad+mo phye ba yis//

thugs kyi dbus su yade tsam 'dud// dpal dang ldan pa zhal lta 'dzazhi// phyag nyishur bzhis ma bstam// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs rgyan gyis klubs pa yis// zla ba bzhin du rnam grol ba/
brjid pa'i gar ni mdzad de bzhugs// 'di yas pad+mo'i gnas nyid du// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// dpal ldan gar dbang thob 'gyur te// 'dod chags kun gyi thabs gnas pas// 'jam pa'i
[“ ]phyag ni stong rnams kyi// garadu mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul// de nas bcom lags pas gau tud byed pa chen po'i bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen po kun tulongs spyod pa'i rnam par

'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i ya shes mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le'ichen po las phyung ngo// sna tshogs chen po o chen po// steng

du thag ler yang dag ldan// 'di'i dbus te lta log kho// sngags kyi mchog ni gzhig par bya/ sna tshogs 'dini thugs kar grags// sna tshogs phyung nas kun snang bas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kun mnyes byas//
de 'di slar 'khor bar bzhugs te// sbatshogs rdo rje gzugs mchog gnas// skad cig sems dpa' sku gnas pa// rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad pas brgyan// 'gying bcas thugs kar sna tshogs 'dzin// sna tshogs/

gzi brjid 'bar bar gtong// phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis kyis phyogs// la byed sna tshogs mtshon glu gtong// zhal lnga sna tshogs angs che ba// bgegasastong thams cad dngos grub mdzad// dkyil 'khor gar bar

gzhan nas byang du gnas// sna tshogs rdo rje pad mor rdo rje yang dag gis// thugs kar mdzad nas bde bar yang dag gnas// sngags mkhan zhag bdun nyid du bsgom byas na// sna tshogs gyur te sna tshogs de la bab// sna tshog

las ni sna tshogs byed pa ra'agyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te// dbyangs chen po len cang dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das la mnyesapa

mdzad do// gtso bo byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir// ye shes lnga yi dngos po dge/ rgyalab nyid kyis ba shad par mdzod// sangs rgyas sku la bstod phyag 'tshal// sngags rigs phyag rgyayan lag bcas// lha yi

de nyid pha rol phyin// bdag ni de nyid sna tshogs che// sna tshogs ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal// gzungs kyi pad+mo yang dag ldan// 'dod byed thugs kyi mchog yin te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// spyod pa 'i ye shes

bstod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi don gnyis med tshul// stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa/ yangs pa'i spyan ni so sor gzigs// me long la shes yang dag 'byung// bya ba nan tan sems can dono// rang gi yon tan mi
mnyamashod// de nyid rig pas sems can kun// rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs pa// gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ sangs rgyas gsum n dbang du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan

[+/ ]'das dpal kun tu bzang po gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rjes shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyus byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'bru 'di nyid kyi sku

dang gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o/ stor ba chen po'i snying bo'o// u0f00 badz+dzatsati hU~M// oM badzra kA ya saM// so badzra bAka lA/oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa twaM/oM badzra sa ma ya ho/de nas de bzhin gshegs po/

thams cad gzhi dumagu/ rab tu dgyes ba'i yid skyo ba com ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhi zhi gshegs pa thams cad kyang rang rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo// de nas

! bcom ldan 'das kun tubazang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dgo'o// zhes bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu spro bar mdzad do// dge'od ge 'o rgyal ba kun// dge 'o dge 'o rgyal ba mchog/ dge 'o dge 'o

legs pa'i las// dge 'o dge 'o sngon 'grob// dge'o dge 'o sna tshogs che// nyid kyi snying khar drangs byas te// rang gi gsang ba bshad par mdzod// gung gi ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba'i yid ni rgud par 'gyur//

denas bcom ldan 'das stong panyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snyari bo nyid kyi sku dang// gsung dang/thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo/ o sats+tshata thA ga ta ma hAkU n+ya tAdzAn badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma konyahaM/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das me long gi lo shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying bo nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje las phyung ngo/ oM sany+dza ta thA ga ta a ti ri yAn badzraswa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa so sor kun tu gzigs pa'i shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo/ oM sam+batathA ga tAmamAphra pak+Sha dzAn badzraswa b+hA ba At+ma koTahaM/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi a shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de rang gi snying po de kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// oM sam+batathA ga ta mahAs maM tAdzAn badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko'/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das bya banan tan gyi e shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rdzolas byung do oM sam+ba ta thA ga tAkr-i ta a nus de dzAn badzrasu b+hA ba At+mako'ahaM/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos yang dge ba'i tshul sbyin par mdzad do/ o dge 'o dge 'o stod pa che/ o dag 'o dge 'o thugs chen po/ o dge 'o dge 'o skachen po sa dge 'o dge lo gsung chen po// so dge
'o dge 'o rin po che'o// dge kho dge kho sna tshogs che// de nas bcom ldan 'das de btsan gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas// bcom ldan 'das lo rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debu
te dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rdo rdzoyi// dga' byed bcom ldan nyid kyis shod// gang gis sems can bde nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes
dbagyi ba// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gsang ba gsungs// gang gso dkyil 'khor myur bris nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bde ba'i bzhi nyid ni// gsang ba'i
dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi 'o// dkyil 'khor rgyan pa'i bdag nyid de// gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs// dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor sAng po zhes bya ba// dkyil
tshu 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par/ gtso bo chen po nyid kyis shod/ dkyil 'khor mamanyam ya shesan// dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+mo ste// dkyil 'khor rab dgyes 'thob byed pa'i// tshad med dkyil 'khor

bshad par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil

'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa ya/ bu mo mig yangs gzung bya ste// shes rab can gyis byan brlabs 'bras// mnyam par bzhag ste byin

babs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs kyi btsunamo gzhag/ gnyis po mdun du bzhag byas pa// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo ste// thugs ni dgyes

par byed pa pin// gsum pa lho ru bsam bya ba// dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag nyid gzhag/ rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mo che// dbang bskur yon tan 'thob byed pa'o// bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste// de nyid chos don yang dag gan

rdo rjechos kyi btsun mo ste// de sbyin dga' byed ma mno// bzod pa chen mo byung du ste// gsod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin// btsun mo rdo rje gdon ma wa// dam tshig gnas ni skyong byed ma'i// grwa dag tun thams cad du//

snga ma bzhin du mchod la sogs// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// sgo sungs rnams ni rnam pa bzhi// ci 'dod par ni mchod bya ste// slob ma mchog ni gzhug par bya// phyag rgyas lag pa brgyan byas te// 'dzum dang

bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig/ rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs// spro ba che bas gar bya zhing// lha yi 'gyur pa'i 'dun pa yis// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// mgan dar gyi chos nyid kyis// g.yogs te

lag pas bzung nas kyang// sgo yi grwar angagazhag bya ste// smon lam mchog ni smaru gzhug// rdo rjechen mo bdag ces bgyi// rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste// rang gi dgyes nas las byung ba'i// bde byed chen mo'i

mnyes par bgyi// ji ltar bzhan du mnyam nyid thob// me tog 'phreng bdor byas te/ lha mo chen mo bzhes su gsol// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor bdag 'tshal lo// lha mo gang la ltung ba yis// de yi lag nas bskor ba bya//

lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun/ sems che khyod kyis 'dod par gyis// de nas slob ma de yis ni// bdag gi rab dgyes sgyu bya zhing// de la 'dod pa spyad par mdzod// khro bo rnams kyi mi phyed phaT// mtha' na ho zhes sbyar

bar bya// 'byung ba'i dus su bya ba ni// a ho su kha bde zhes smra// de nas rdo rje byung ba la// mkhas pas de na blang byas te// bde ba chen po dngos grub rdzas// bla ma la ni dang por dbul// de nas de nyid kun la yang//
ci bde bar na dbul ba bya// spyi bos zhabs la gtugs byas te/bla ma la ni dbang bslang bya// shin tu smras pa'i 'phags pa'i dbang// bcom ldan bdag la stsal bar mdzod// de nas sbyor

ba chen po yi// snyoms par zhugs te de bde ba// slob dpon rdo rje phyud byas te// spyi bor rab tugazhag par bya// lag pa yisan ma rig par// kha la rab tu sbyin bar bya// khyad par du ni drang byas te// ci bde bar ni

btung bar bya// gzung ma de dag thams cad la// rdo rje sa ni spyan par bya// de nas slob ma mchog nyid kyis// bla ma la ni yon dadul ba// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang// chung ma dang ni rang gi bu// bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srung

dang de bzhin longs spyod dbang phyug dang// rdzas dang nor dang gte ra rnams dang// glang po rta dang shing rta dag/ bla ma la ni son mchog ste// dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya// phyi ni sdos nga gsang ba dang// de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad dang// rdo rje dang ni gzung ma'i rnams// 'dod pa'idangos grub dra bar bya// snying po ang ngagashis gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni ngasgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang

tsha kha yin dkyil 'khor 'di// ci ste rmongs pas sma byas na/ slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams// myur du drwa phyed tshun chad du// bstan pas rnam par 'jig pare'agyur// dang por dam tshag gshag byas te// phyi nas dkyil

'khor bstan par bya// gzhan du byas na dpa' bo rnams// dmyal bar ngaka' bar grangs med smin // de ngas blo ldan rdo rje yis// nan tan dam tshig bsgrags mi bya// sngags kyi dngos grub tshe nga pas// dam tshig srung la

brtson par bya// gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi/ sngagasal sogs pa'i don ma 'grub// lha rnams kyang ni dam tshig gi/ gsol yang bzhes su cha genang ste// 'jig rten 'di ru sdug bsngal che// 'jig rten pa/
