ngol dmyal ba'i rnams// dam tshig spyod pa 'das pas so// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid des 'thob bo// slob ma de yang de bzhin du// blo zhan sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te// de na sngags kyi don mi smin // lha rnams kyin

mchog tu bde// dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la/ nams kyang sbyin par mi 'gyur ro// de bas dam tshig gtso yin te// thog mar dam tshig sbyin par bya// sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya ang// de bzhin thabs dang shes

rab rnams// dam tshag de rnams thams cad kyang// sngags pas gsang ba sbyor pa yis// dmyal ba n gnas ong ba zlog pa'i phyir// bu dang slob ma sbyin par byed// sngags kyi dngos grub bsod nams byed// gtsang sbra dogs

pa med par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dal// dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bAsi byas te// gzhon nu'i tshang na bcu drug la// dam tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bzhu gnas cho ga 'dis gzhug bya// dam

tshig rnams ni 'di yin te// sbrang rtsi shu dang dra chen po// nyi ma zla ba'i dro chen dang// rdo rje las byung chu b+hA bas rnams// dkyil 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag/ dam tshig yi ge bzhag pa yis// myur du dam

tshag bsgrub byas na// dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub ste// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// dumo tshig 'di na sna tshogs te// 'dzin pa yis ni mthu ru 'gyur// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas chen po dang// rdo rje/
0 @#// sems dpa' bdag po cher// blo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yis// dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'thob 'gyur te// ngabang bskur ba yi yid du 'gyur//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor te lnga pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad mchog tu dgyes pa chen po yod bde bar gyur te// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// gdug pa thams cad rnam 'dul ba// 'jigs pa'i byed pa chen po 'di/ rdo rje khro bo chen po yi//dkyil 'khor chen

pa rnams bshad phyir// 'jigs byed chen po rnams 'dul pa// dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyi// khro bo'i dem tshig ded dpon gyis// gsang ba chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan 'dasabade pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems

rdzo/ dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dem tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje ye she las 'di phyung ngo/ oM badzra mahA tsaN sat+'a puTaM ta ka ha na da da pa tsa

shuphaT/'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khro de chen po'i mthus rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tugayos/lha dang klu dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang//

lho 'phye chen po dang// gnod sbyin dang/ srin po thams cad 'khrug pa chen por gyur to// de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas de dag brgya byin gyi thad du lhags nas// brgya byin bdag nyid kyang skyabs med par mthong nas tshangs pa'i thad du/

0phyin tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du phyin te/ gtogs 'dod kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thad du phyin te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyi ma 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag tham

cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus kun tu snang bar byas te/ lha rnams ma'ajigs shig/ klu rnams ma 'jigs shage/ gnod smyana rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lham yin rnams ma 'jigs shage/ dri za rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha dang 'jig

rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs shage/ pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par 'di lta bu gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi nus sam/ khyed rnams ci dgar skyed pas gnos shog ces dbugasuphyung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de

bzhanegshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo khro gnyer chen po zhes bya ba// khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/

thugs rdo rje ye shes las phyungango/ o badzra b+haM ku Tim mA kro d+ha ha na ha/gricu gri/mA ra mAr/d+haM dza b+haM dza/da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsahUM/ b+haM/bcu ya 'asgyuya/bloku rgyun saN+Da mA rAnas dum ta ma ta/ mi ta mo tahUM hUM/ hUMt+taM/ tra Ta tu Ta/

zlatshutra/b+hUtuM tra 3/ bdi se rjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du skraganam dbang phyug chen po'i thad dun bar lhags so// de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi che ba la bar ston cing gtogs 'dod la smras pa// khyod kyang mthu che ba'i

lha chen po ste gtug kha thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yin/rang gi semathu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug pa de rnams dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig/ de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed/
kyi gzugs 'khor lo'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas/ rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i bgad pa'i gdangs 'dzin pas 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das/

[+ ]kun tu bzang po chen po yang khro bo chen po'i paro'abyung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sems par zhugs ma thag tu pad+mo'i dra ba 'char ba'i khro bo thams cing slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs

kar zhugs so// zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i kha nas phyung ngo// so pad+ma mahAdzA la ma hA bo d+ha ba ta ba mu kha kha kha/ sam+badu

khA hikA hisany+dza dut+taM pra dunaM/da ma da ma/ badzraraM khA ta ka Ta ma ta ma ta ko Ta klo Ta/ badzrakha ra/ tsa pa la durga be ge// trA sa tras/ ma hA 'adzra ba Da ba mu kha/ pa ma ta phra ma ta hU~M phaT/ hri hahahahi/ tsa tur su kha/ be shu pA Na sha na/

shuhU~MhU~MhU~M d+hats+tseha/ de nas 'di gsung ma thag tutshangs ris chen po 'dar phad phad cing kha lcab tu 'gyel te rnapa 'chol lo// de nas tshangs pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po la dris pa/ lha 'di ni shani tu ngo/

mtshar du snang ngo/ de nas dbang phyug chen pos tshas pa la bskul ba/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi gtso bo/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po/ khyod ni 'jig rten gsum na stong pa dang byed pa'o/ rdzu 'phrul chen po dad ldan

pa de'i phyir khyod kyi gdug pa'i soms can dang/ gdug pa'i lus can thams cad rlag par gyis shagi/ de nas tshangs pas rang nyid kyi mthu dang/ tshangs pa chen po'i srin po'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ 'jigs byed

chen po lta bur gdong bzhi pa/ mele stong ga gzi brjid can gyi lus 'gul ba dang bcas pas bgad pa chen po 'phyin pas lha'i tshogs kyi gdug pa thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kun tu bzang po chen po yang lha thams cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'asnying po 'di nyad kyi sku

dang gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// o 'adzran+ti rab/ ma hA kro d+ha sam+ba du na sa ma b+hak+Sha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badzrayak+Sha han han hU~M phaT/ de nas 'du byung ma thag tu brgya byin gyi khang pa 'di

thams cad dum bu brgyar rnam par bshig ste/ riral kyi rtse mo'ang 'gul zhing kun tu 'byor nas gnas par 'gyur/ brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa'i ng kha sprub tsam du 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur to//de nas langs te dbang

phyug chen po la bltas pa dang/ dbang phyug chen pos kyang bskul ba/ khyod niwa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po ste/ mthu che ba yin la/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lho gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang khyod la mnyes par

byed pa yanin/ de ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul kyi mthu la bar ston cig/ de nas lha'i rgyal po chen po brgya byin de rang nyid kyi mthu gnod sbyin dang/ srin po chen po'i gzugs nye bar rten cing gdug pa'i tshogs thams

cad la gdug pa dag ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong na sus kyang zil gyis gnon mi nus so zhes dbugs 'byin par byed de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang sngags kyi
[j]ka@#// lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ lha de dag thams cad nyade kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i a shes la 'jug par mdzad de//

bcug nas kyang khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen por mngon par bsgyur nas/ bdag nyid kyang khro bo thams cad 'byin pa'i khro bo chen po'i gzugs su dmigs te mchab chen po 'byin pa/ zhalami sdug pa/ spyan

stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi gzi brjid can/ rab tu mi bzang par byed po'i ma rlung gis bdas pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ dur khrod chen po'i depal chen gyi phyag rgya mi'i keng rus dang/ khrag dang/ sha dang/ klad pa dang//

rkang dang/ li rnams zas su gsol ba/ mi'i pags pas snyam g.yogs te bsdams pa/ mi'i mgo bo'i 'phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang/ glang po che dang/ bong bu dang/ rdza mo dung ma dang nga/ phag dang/ ce spyang dar

ra dang/ khyi dang/ khug pa dang/bya rog dang/ bzhad dang/ byi la dang/ gzage dang/ stag la sogs pa'i khro be byol song gi gdong brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas phyung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen pa'i tshul gyis shar

phyogs na 'jigs byed chen po 'dul ba rnam par gnyer ba'i 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang/ zhal rdo rje'i mche ba chen po gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gi g.yog dang/ shar phyogs kyi dkyil

'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// lho'i dkyil 'khor du'ang rdo rje khro gnyer can khro bo brgya stong mang bo'i g.yog dang/ 'khyal bar gyur te gnas so/ nub kyi dkyil 'khor du'ang pad+ma chen po rta mdor khro bobargya stong mang po'i

cag chog dang/ nub kyi dkyil 'khor du'akhyil par gyur te gnas so/ byang gi dkyil 'khor du'ang rdo rje 'ur 'ur chen po'i khro bo brgya stongamang po'igi yog dang/ 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tudagyes

pa khro bo chen po'i tshogs rgya stong mang bos bskoranas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs te/khro bo chen po'i tshogs de dag dang shin tudagyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos kun tu spyod cing/ khro bo chen po'i rnam par brgya stong mang po'i

ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa snyed byung nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byamathams cad du gang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gang bar byas so/ de nas gdug pa'i tshogs

thams cad kyis de dag mthong nas 'jigs sngangs skyabs ma mthong nas/ rang rang gi bdag po'i thod du song ste/ rje tsag rje cig nyid kyis bdag la skyobs shig/ de nas dpang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po de dag bdag

nyid kyi mthu sprul nas slar yang bslang ste/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yongs su bskor du bcu gnas / 'jigs bye dgadungs pa nga la skyabs su song zhes sgo yang skyabs su 'gro ba ma len tsang/ slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal

bskyed de/ 'jigs byed chen po brgyad bzhes bya ba byung nas ri rab kyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar ston cing/ bgad pa chen po'i nga ro 'byin pa gyur to/ e ma hAb+hi ra kheTaM thaM/ zla ta Ta ta/ haha i ti/ 'on kyang ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse'u chung/

tshad tsam yang ma'agul to// de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des ha ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bor mnan nas bsnan te// he ru kas bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin/
[©]/ cang rgyu ma'i sbub tu rungs nas/ khrag dang/ dus pa dang/ rkang rnams za zhing chem chem mdzad pas/de'a 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad de/ u ma dang 'gal 'ga'i ang rnam par bcom mo/ a

mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgron mor byas te sma phab nas/ khro bo bdag nyid kyi mthu nye bar spel tsange 'khor thams cad kyang btul/ skyabs lenadu'ang banug/ dam tshig la'ang gnas par byas te yang dag par zhugs so//

de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po drag po bzhad pas bzhad cing rdorje'i khro gnyer khro bo chen po'i zhal nas ma 'jigs shig/ ces dbugs 'byin par byed do/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo

rjeshin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs kun la bka' stsal pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hAtsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hAyak+Sha se nA pa ta ya/ tat+ya thA/ oM bo d+ha bo d+ha/ mahA b+her kha da ra ba pa nA ra ha ra ha ra/thaM/grosgyu/

mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/'i glu ma hA'adzra/ tsaN+Dasany+dza dut+taMta ka ha na han/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha hUM phaT 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'dul bar byed pas rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad du bskyed

do khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par bser ba'i zhal mche ba gtsags te/ 'khyil zhing bsgyur ba/ phyag brgya stong mang po la mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ zhal sna tshogs mang po brgya stong mo lce bzhin du rab tu 'bar ba'i/

sku brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po ga na ba der song ste/ rdorjodrag po'i gad mo chera'abyin pas bshad tsari mdun na gnas so// oM ma hA badzra he ru ka badzra ab+hA bswA sa ha sa ra ha han hahU~Mha/ i te/ de nas dbang

phyug chen pos rdo rje drag ro bzhi dab chen bo thos nas g.yog dang bcas par kha sbug tu 'gyel te brgyalakhar gyuranas/ mgo zhabs kyis bstan te gtong ba ra mdzad do// oM badzra ku han ha/gro/ ma ta ma ta

ki nA ya si/ sur+ya sa hadra haste reka bsur dzul la rtsi lnga tsAl ti/ tshanAmun+ti Aka kAkab+hU abya wa a bya wa ma/ gyi na ba tsakra b+hi ra ba srid yaMcu/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po'i khro bo chen po sa bzhad pas bzhad

cing 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugamasu mngon par sprul nas 'khor lo can gyi mdun du ston to// de nas 'khor btsan gyi 'khora'ajigs pa chen pos nyen te/ kha sbub tu 'gyel te rab tu brgyal zhang rje tsag bdag cag

la skyobs shig ces smra zhing/ skyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nasa 'khor lo can la skyabs su song ngo// de nas bas kyang bdag nyid kyi mthumang bo rad tun bar ston cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mdun du gnas

te rgyab la zhugs so// kA ya kA la gdug pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyis sang dral tre ji srid ma 'thungs kyi bar du de mid rang gi gnas su song zhig/ de nas khro gnyer chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ de drangs te/

gdams nas snyade dral te/ de'i khrag la nyi ma'i khro gnyer chen po gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par tsami bar mdzad do// oM badzub sUr+ya blo ku kro d+ha h+phagra ha har pa su d+he/ ra ma sa med med rje

na o bla cha d+hi/ de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab tu rlag par gyur te gnas so// de'i chung ma rug ma ni dang/ ma hA shrI dang/ lag skyi yang g.yog dang bcas par rnam par bcom ste/ sna tshogs rnams rnam par/
ratshul nas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rta gdong chen po'i rgyab tug cig bsnan nas gtong bar mdzad do// oM badzrab lta ba mu kha kha kha khA hItA sI/ tsa tur mu kA/ pa ba po nga//

nA s+ya ru d+hi raM/ akasgyu AkaT+Tha/ dr-i da liM ta na/ ha ma he/ badzab+ha ga pa chu ka/ hi hikha ma hA/ shA shwa shwa ra swAhA/ de nas rdo rje rta go dong chen po rta skad chen po mdzad cing tshangs pa'i mdun du gnas par gyur to// de nas tshad/

pa tshangs pa'i srin po bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' bkang nas rgyabar byed de/ de nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor kha spub tu 'gyel nas/ rje cig skyebs shig ces smras so// kwa ye ku la gdug pa 'i gdong myur dusong song//

khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon te ma dul re zhes sbas so// de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum par gyur nas/ tshangs pa chen po de'i mgor brdzus te/ snying drangs nas khrag btung ba la zhugs tra/ sha dang/

klad pa dang/ tshal bu dang/ rus pa rnams skyangs nas phyogs kha cur gtor ro// de'i chung ma shi ri ma dang/ sur sa ti dang/ shAn+ti rnams kyang rnam par bcos/ de'i tshogs kyang btul nas/ dam tshig gi sdom pa/

la gnas par byas te bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen pos khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lha bas gzigs te gtong bar mdzad do// lo du la gu lu khadzam hA kro d+ha/ A kar/

ya sA kar ya sha ku hri da yaM/ ma hA badzradaM ya/ hUM b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'i sku chen pos nam mkha'i ngos kun bkang ste/ brgya byin gyi mdun du bzhugs par gyur to// denA brgya byin

'gyide ba chen pos bskyengs te/ mi bzad pa khros gnod sbyin chen po khyod su'i bran yin zhes de la smras so// de nas rdo rjeganod sbyin chen po khros 'khros rdum par gyur te/ snying nas gtsug gi nor du phyung snying yang

dral te/ de'i sha dang/ khrag dang/ klad pa dang/ nal bu dang/ rus pa pa dang/ bza' ba rnams bza' bar zhugs so// de nas de'i khor rnams 'jigs shing sngangs pa'i yid du gyur te skyabs su nye bar gyur te/

de'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang bcom nas da'i gnas na gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shani tudagyes pa chen po khro bo chen po rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang rolo cad shin tu dgyes pa'i kun
tu longs spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdzad do// oM ma hA su ra ta badzam

nA d+ha saM ha ro pa saM ha ra satra kro d+ha ma/ sha ma sha ma/ pA sha ma phru sha ma/ saN+Dakro d+ha ut+ta sa kro d+ha/ swa sa ma ya ma hA maN+Da le/sbra pa a sku pa ya/ sarba kro d+ha ma du pra dub ba ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya sha kra bas ba ra ma he shA

ra ma ho b+ha ga paM/ sur tu so khya kro d+ha/ sazla ta b+hA ga ta sany+tse na sa ma yo tsa ho/su ra ta sa ma ya a ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen pos kho bo thams cad 'dren pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcade

ba dang/ dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// u0f00 dzAny+tsahU~M baM ho/ Tak+ki hUM dz+dza Tak+ki dz+dza hUM tsak+ki hUM dz+dza/ A kar a A kar a/ khaM d+ha a ba shi ku ru/ sarba kro d+ha/ sa ma yaM/ dzahU~MhaM
ho Tak+ki hUM dza hU~M Tak+ki hUM/ de nas khro bo chen po'adem tshig de dag thams cad 'ongs nas/ rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lor 'khyil bar gyur te/ kye bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du

gsol zhes smra zhing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bka' 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam tshi kA ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo chen po phyud

ngo/ a su b+ha naM suM b+ha ma hA kro d+ha sha hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag la khyed kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems can chen po rnams gsos shig ces bka' stsal to// de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rab

tu gdug pa'i rnams gsos zhes gsol nas/ de nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pas khro bos phyag bsnol te btsarinas rdo rje bdud rtsa khro bo'i dbang mo chen mo khyung

ngo oM badzra a mr-i ta/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ra ud shI dza uNashA dza/badzra a mr-i te hUM A/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsa chen mo de dag kun tu khros te smin ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs pa'i zhal bzhad pa/ ru lu ru lu zhes

btapa'i sgra 'byin cang rang gi pad+mo la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud pe yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i rig ma 'di byung ngo// oM a mr-i ta saM dz+wa pa ni sa pA mr-i ta mu khe/ bra be sha ya phra be sha ya/ sang+g+haMbadzra pad+ma sad yo

gem chu bo d+hi tsit+taM/ pa tha pa tha/ mAn+ti a/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs ba gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te/ sems dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo thams

cad mthong nas ngo mtshar bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shan dudagyes pa khro be la skyabs su dong nas/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo'i 'khor rnams gnas par gyur to// de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i

yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod par byed de/ khyod na sems can kun gyi yab/ phan byed de bzhin yum yin te/ gtso bo 'dus pas bdag cag rnams/ 'jigs pa che las skyob pa ste/ rje bo sdug bsngal thams cad

sel khyod ni 'gro ba'i dbang po rje// khams gsum 'di ni byed dang gtong// che pa che khyod skye bo skyong// thog ma med khyod nga ro thags// nga ro'i steng na cha yang med// gtso bo yig med bdud rtsi yi// rang dgyes bde byed

gtong ba yis// 'gro ba kun la phan bya'i phyir// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnams// rab dgyes 'gro la bde pa'i phyir// mgon po khyod kyis gtong ba mdzod// sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing// bla na med pa byung

chub lam// sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa// sems can skom pa ngoms mdzad cing// 'khor ba dba' klong grol mdzad do// myur du bde la dgongs pa mdzad// dngos po kun gyis thams cad du// rgyal ba kun gyi
mi dpogs te// zhi ba'i rnam par zhir 'gyur ba// rdul dang bral ba'ajug pa spangs// nam mkha' sgom las rnam 'das pa// rnam rtog dri mas ma gos te// sgyu ma kun las yang dag 'das// 'dod pa kun la rgyab

phyogs pa// gtso bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// dregs pa med pa 'jigs byed la// byang chub mchog ni thob kyi bar// bdag cag skyabs su rab tu mchi// ji srid 'tshob mchis pa dang// dmyal ba tshu ba lo'i 'jig rten
du ltung bar gyur pa ji srid sa// khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// byang chub mchog tu bdag cag kyang// dri med skal bar gyur pa yi// gtso bo bdag cag dbang bskur ba// bder chen

pos stsal dugasol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos de dag gis gsol ba'i tshig nye bar gsan nas mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//

zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang yid bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs mang postod kyi sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ste/ bde ba chen po'i sde ba'i cho 'phrul chen po'i lha'i 'khor thams cad

ma dbang bskur te// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag bde ba chen po'i skye ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur bas yid bde bar gyur te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang yang du
gtugs nas bskor ba byas te// ji lta ba bzhin du kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pas// yang rdo rje gzung ma shun tu dgyes

pa bde ba chen mo'i dam tshig dang sbyor ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ de ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro mo dbang mo chen mo

zhes bya pa nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// lo sadz+dzA ta thA ga ta ma hA badzra kro d+hi shwa ri sam+b+ha du ShAn ru dra Ni/mahA pa la yA na lashAshA na b+hi Sha Ne badzra ma hA kro d+ha daMka rA la kr-i ta ba da ste sa

hU~M/ pA sha ma ni/ hUM hUMm b+hukro d+he shA ra hUM phaT phaT/ 'dis ji lta bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste/ dpung pa bcu drug la phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum

pa mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'barang 'dra ba/ rdo rjedang/ bod pa'i 'khar ba dang/ bod pa dang/ mdung dang/ sta gri dang/ zhags pa dang/ rtsa gsum pa dang/ be con dang/ mu su ra dang/ 'khor lo dang/ kan ya dang/

to ma pa dang/ gzhu dang/ mda' dang/ shag ti dang/ mi rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa/ nyi ma brgya dang me'i 'od 'dra ba'o// de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i

gzugs dang chalugs 'dzin pa rag pa 'dis gzhag par bya'o// o ma rlu badza?d+hamakho d+hi hAr ma cha bshAn b+hi Sha Ne na lA dzul sa ha sa pra dzA li ta mAn+ti h+phe re ka pA la mA lA/ b+hA ta ma gu te/ nA ra ru ti ra ra tra/ pa ra

pu ri/ ta ka pa la/ aste kha hUM ga/ badzra tIshA la gcu ma d+ma kro d+hin/ hU~MhUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ he horulta mun+ta pra yo hU~M phaT/de nas bcom ldan 'das shan tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po'i gzi brjid chen po'i mchog dang ldan

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rdo rje 'aa khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo'ud kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// oM hUM traM ma mAsAr+ya badzrakro d+ha shu ra bi d+ha ma/ ma bu ma tha/

grwa sa grwa sa/ sam+b+ha du/ pra tut+taM hUM phaT/ oM hUM traM tra/tA tra tra/ khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ste/ gzi brjid chen por gtor zhing/ shin tu'ajigs pa ma bzhin 'bar/
dpung pa bcu drugano ba ste/ dbu rgyan thod pas brda gas par bya/ spyanani rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog/ mtshon cha'i tshogs ni bsnams par brtson// gdug pa thams cad 'cha'akhyed cing//

yi dgas chen po'i stan la zhon// rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das padro 'byung gnas bkod pa'i 'od kyi 'phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// padra'i dra ba/

khro mo'i dbang mo nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// so habadzra pad+ma ma sU ban+d+ha mu khe// kha kha/khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma ho/d+ha ra pa ko le hUM ha hUM hUM ha ha hUM hUM hUM/ hisha hi sha/ ma hA badzra ba rwa ba chu la kaM hato

te/hiMt+taM/ hihi hU~MhU~MT+ThitaM// dkyil 'khor nang gi dbusazhadi du// 'di ni rgyab tu gzhag par bya// rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa// rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste// khro mo chen mo dpung bcu drug/ rnam par bsgyur pa'i mi sdug gdong/

mi ro'i rta la ang dag zhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pas brtse gas// 'od zer rnon po gtong byed tsang// g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor brgyan to pa nas//

denas ngacom ldan 'das yang gdon mi za ba'i e shes khro mo gnyis su med par 'du ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs te// gdon mi za ba'i drag po dang ldan ma zhes bya ba khros pa'i dbang ma

chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// oM sam+b+ha a mo g+ha ma d+hA ba shI shwa rI hUM hUM hUM/ haMhaM haM/ ma h+pha kro d+he gu mu khe/ ma rku ba ngeshwa ba da ra Ni/ sany+dza dut+ta pra sha ma ni hUM hUM phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni ci

jigs par// rdo rje gdon mi za ba yi// dkyil 'khor g.yog bcas rnams pa bzhi// sna tshogs dam tshig bzhag byas te// sna tshogs gzugs dang khyad par ldan// kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas// bsnyer pa dang

ni btsums pa'i gdong// rab tu drag la ro myang zhing// gdong gnyer thod pa'i rtse mor byas// dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i// khro me chen mo gdong gsum pa// za byed me bzhin lta ba yi// de yi ngo bo thams cad kyi//

gaog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// bskor bar shes rab can gyis gzhag/ rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan// dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa ya// de na cho ga ji bzhin du// 'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang dag chon// dur khrod bzhin
du'ajigs byed pa// phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams// de dag kun tu yongs su bskor// bzhag gam dra bar bya ang rung// de na de lta'i stan la gnas// bzhin mi sdug pa dpung ba'i lo// gdug pa'i khro

rnam [“]bsgyur bcas// de la sogs pa'i rim par ldan// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag bcom ldan 'dras la phyag 'tshal te/ yang drang yang rang rang gis
mngon par gang byas pas mngon par mchod nas gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor ma yi sngags tshogs dang// phyag rgya ma ni ci rigs par// gsang ba'i gar ni bde chen mo// bcom ldan de nyid kyis gsungs/

de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya sbas pa dang/ de kho na nyid dang// gsang

bya// ba rnams nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo///oM sam+b+ha ra dza d+ha rasatwa anurwa gi ni ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM saN+Da badzra d+ha ra sA kar Nim hA kro d+hishAri hUM hUM/ dzAdzA['']so//

san+d+ha badzra d+har ku la a nu rAg ni ma hAko d+hi shwa ri hU~M ha ha paT/o sa badza?d+ha ro gra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hU~Mswa swA hUM phaT/ o saN+Da badzra d+ha ra ma hA dzo a b+hi She ke ItaM hUM/ oMsam+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hAsur+ya b+hi ku De ka re ke tA te Ta ta

hU~M phaT/ oM sam+b+ha badza?d+ha ra ma hA ki tu kro d+hi shwa ri sa cha de dza ya pa hUM hUM tuM tAyaT paT// oM sam+b+ha badzra d+ha ra sa mAbadzra kro d+ha AtA A si hUM hUMtI ni gri da ya hUM phaT/oM sam+b+ha badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro hAbakyi Ni hU~MhU~M b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hUM hUM/

la o saN+Da badzra d+ha ra a wAtiSh+Tha kro d+hi shwa ri Nin+da ts+tshin+da hUM hUM badzra tik+Sha ha ste tsod ya hU~M hU~M ma snga ma rnga// oM saN+Da padzra d+ha ra tsakrad+ha ri Ni ma ho gro du pa ni hUM hUM pa ta a pa ta ya/ ma sAngadzra tsakr-i Na/ tsaN a tsaN 5 hU~MhU~M phaT/ saM/

san+d+ha badzra d+ha ra ma A shA ga pra b+ha Na hU~MhU~Mm ta ma tA pa'i// sa san+d+ha badza tshu ram hA bi shwa mu khi hUM hUMphaT// oM sam+b+ha badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzrapA Ni hU~M/hi hi phaT phaT/ oM sam+b+ha badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra yaM klaNihU~Mkha kha khA hi khA

a ba b+ha a'i b+ha hU~M phaT// so saN+Da badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra b+han d+ha ni ma hA ke d+he/ ban+taya ban+d+hA yaM/ pi ta a pa ta ya hUM phaT/ oM sam+b+ha badzra d+ha ra yAl da na ma nAkro d+ha shwa ri hUM hUM/ oM sam+b+ha badzra d+ha ra naM hA kro d+ha mA le

hUM hUM hUM hUM// so saN+Da badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he gar ba hi hUM ga gri/ oM san+nA badzra d+ha rI ma hA kro d+hi shu ra ma sAlo ka d+ha ra/ dA pa yaM dI pa yaM hUM hUM// so saN+Da badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri la ha lA s+ya siM// so san+nA badzra

d+ha ra ma ma h+pha kro d+he ma le d+har Ni hUM/ so sam+b+habadzra d+har ma pA gI ti ni hUM he he/ oM sam+b+ha badzrad+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha nir ke hU~MhUM/ oM sam+b+ha badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha A kar ya dz+dza= hU~MhU~M// oM sam+b+ha badzra d+ha ram sA

d+ha bi d+ha bai rU paM/ o saN+Dapodzra d+ha re sa hA kro d+he ma hA badzab shi ni hUMt+taM/ osarlungadzra d+ha rAm hAko rgyu hU~Mso/ si d+hu tAdzA A/ de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag mgu rangs dga' bar gyur te/ yang
dbyangs 'dis gsol ba 'debs so// bde ba mchog gi rgyu chen dgongs su gsol// bsam gyis mi khyab bde mchog dbyings dad ldan/ mi g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas// bzung la rol

ba'i bde ba bzhes su gsol// ngo mtshar chen po cho 'phrul snang mdzad cing/ snying po byang chub bgrod pa rnams kyi lam ston te// rgyud rnams yang dag gang la'ang mi rton pa// bde ba mchog gi gzungs kyis grol/

bar mdzod// ru mu ma hAs hu jo hi ni dzA la su shu pA mU / ma hAsu hu rdo in/ tshul su sU pa b+haM dzA/ ma hA su tu/ inI dzA la su sU u dze/ u ma hA su pU dzo/ dza i ni dza sa hu/ a la la la ho/ ma sAsumyur ma ra ma ha/

su hu// a la la la ho/ ma sbasu tra Na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nam mkha' lo'agro mo chen mo dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ta/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying po 'di

nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o saN+Dita thA ga ta ma hA badzra d+ha ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha gi ni hUM phaT s+saM/ oM badzra wAk+ki nI ma hAhe ma ba tihUMT/ o badzra d+hA ki nI ku mA ra pra ye hUM phaT/ ob/

(kanA dri bye mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ o 'dzake mahA'adzra mu tan/ b+hi ta a b+hi ta ya/ saM b+ha ni suM b+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra pAki ni ma hA badzra kro d+ha a d+ha ra la li hUM phaT/ oM badzrat+tA ki nI ma hA kaud+ha

tsakri NItsan+dats+tshin+d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA kInIm tshwa mi tota pa ta ki hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA kInI a pAso mo kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzraTA ki ni ma hA badzratan+ti hU~MphaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma wAmA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA mi te ka pa la

sA so hU~M phaT/ o badzaTA ka nA ma lA so mya kro d+he kA ra hU~M phaT/o 'dzam+buki nI ma hA a mi ta pu danan+d+ha ri hU~M phaT/[0f00] badzra ka ka nI badzra yang ga li hU~M phaT/[0f00] dza t+ta ki nI paM ba pa kA ru d+hiraM ma hA badzra ba la hUM phaT// so 'adzra DA ki

ma hru'adzra/ni b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badzraTA kiMnAm badzrab ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra pA she hUM phaT// oM badzra TA ki ni A na ya A na ya hUM phaT/ oM badzrat+taki nI ma hA badzra be b+hi ni gu gu ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ oMb

(nu ma hA badzra dz+wa la a b+hasaku ru hU~M phaT/ oM badzra TA ki nI ma hA dza ba ga ta hUM phaT/ oM badzra wA ka nAm hA badzad Ni hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki'am pAbadzra ki li dra ba sha dra ba sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra TA ki ni sa sku dumaM sA

shani hUM phaT/ o badzad ki nI ma hA ka ra badzra d+hA ra NihUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI akar Ni ma hA pat+tA rA li mu ku hU~M dz+dzadz+dzahU~M phaT/ oM badzra TA ki rgya sa ba ga na hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra TA ki nI ma hA b+hAn hU~M hU~M khaM khaM hU~M// o badzra//

nAm he to ShA Ne sa ma ya hU~M hU~M A A// o brjem sta reka saraM sa ru d+hi ra ma da pra ya/ ma hA kyi t+ta karma daM AyA sIk+ka/ o badzra ma hA rAk+Sha sa A ka khra be sha ya/ sam+b+ha badzra kA la shi ni ban d+he hU~MhU~MhU~MhU~M phaT phaT/ oM badzra rak+Sha

sa yaM d+hA khaM d+ha ya/ bi sha la bi sha Na san+nAn hUM hUM phaT/ o 'dzam hA rAkya sa/ bon ya khan a saN+Tan ma hA ba kri tA nan/ ha ya kI ba hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag thams cad/

rab tu mgu nas yid dga' bar 'gyur te/ dbyangs chen mo 'di 'byon khar gyur to// kyi ma rdo rje sems dpa 'a yi// rdo rje sbyor ba rab ba stan pas// mkha' la 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid/ cu re de bsan sgrub par byed// de nas

bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos yang rdo rjenam mkha' la 'gro ma de dag kun mgu dga' bar bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// o DA ki nI A kor a pra be sha ya/

lan d+ha ya to Shaya/A/san+d+ran badz+dza nA hri da yaH hUM dz+dzadza hUM baM hoTak+ki hUM= o he ru kam hA badzA/ A kazla sAkaSh+Tha/pra be sha yaM pra be sha ya/ dzaM b+ha ya khaM d+ha ya/ to ya to Shaya/ hU~MhU~M phaT/ oM badzrapad+ma ma rgyu ba

'kha lu kha/ A kaT+Tha/pra be sha ya/ ban d+hA ya/ mo ha ya/ toShaya/ hahahi/ kho bo'i sngags kyi tshogs 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang/ mkha' la 'gro ma dang/ mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ rdo rje'aphrog par byed ma de dag la sogs

pa de dag dgag pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las bya ste/ gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang/ Tak+ki rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang/ rtamagrin gyi phyag rgya sbyani te/ las

thams cad la sbyar ro// rdo rje'i thal mo ji lta ba bzhin bcangs te/ khro bo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bya/ sbom po gnyis phan tshun rtse sbyar zhing/ zhi ba gnyis kyang rab tu bsgreng/ lhag ma gnyis brkyang ste 'od zer ltar
btang pa 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchog yin no/ phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che// lha dang lha min phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// bsngags shing mchod pa byas pa yin//
bcings pa de nyid 'bebs pa dang// thams cad tshogs ni 'dzud par byed// gdug pa thams cad gsod byed ma// srin mo thams cad za bar byed// rnal 'byor dam pa gnas pa yis// 'di yis las
rnams thams cad byed// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// mi ldan dngos grub ma 'gyur te// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtimus rnams// bsen pas dngos grub myur du 'thob/ rdo rje bcangs pa gnyis su

wA byas te// mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste phan tshun bsnol// khros pa gnyis gyen du smAslong ste stang khar bstan nas// brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas pa 'di las thams cad byed pa'o// 'di yis thams
(cad las kyi rnams// jitsam yid 'dod byed par 'gyur// tshe 'dir sdig pa gang byas pa// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed// de dag thams cad myur 'gyur te// dngos grub yid bzhani rin chen no//
ji snyed nam mkha'i lam dag tu// rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phrul bar byed// rigs 'dzin mchog ni mtshon par yang// cho ga phyung pa slar yang 'ong// thal mo sbyar te sbom po gnyis dbus su sbyar// lhag ma

'dab ma kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni pad+mar gdan no// sbom po gnyis rtse mo thur du bstan pa ni rta gdong gi'o// gang gi sbyor byas skad cig tu// de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur// bcangs ma thag tu 'phur 'gyur
kha 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro// sa la sogs dngos 'dod pa bzhin// myur du slar yang ldog par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya 'di'i sbyor ba dge/ nga ni bstan de rgyal ba'i rnams//

rnal 'byor pa yi drang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyang// phyag rgya'i yan lag mchog des sbyar// de nas mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo de dag 'dod pas gzir ba rnams rangs te// rang gi gzugasan/

pa sgyur ba yis// bzhengs te gar na rab mdzad kyang// dur khrod kyi nus chen du// mgu ba chen po'i brtag par byed// phyag na thod pa gri ngag dang// rdo rje kha To rnam par 'dzin// skal ldan rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// dbu

dmug rnam par snyer ba'i zhal// bde ba'i cha lugs sbyor ba yis// bde ba dam pa longs spyod mong// rab tu rmongs pas bsnyen byed cing// rab dgyes khro la gsol ba 'debs// zla ba dri med stong pas shin tu rdzo gas pa'i

spyan mnga' bas// thugs rje'i dbyings rum nyid du bdag cag bskyed// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa yi/ byang chub nges ni kun tu tshim par mdzod// a la la la ho// mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgo 'byed

cing// byang chub mchog gi lam 'di snying po nyid kyi ston// gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde ngas zal mnan te// rmongs shing byang ba'i rnams la thugs rjes sgrol// a la la la ho// che ba'i e shes lhun gyisamangar ldan pa//

phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par dgongs// bde ba mchog gi gsang ba'i gnas nyid du// mya ngan 'da' ba'ang longs spyod bsnyen pas 'grub// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir dngos bstan kyang// rmugs pa'i 'go
khas bdud rtsi'i nges ma mthong// kye ma'o ma skyes chos te sAng po las 'byung ba// bsam gyisami khyab nam mkha' dang mnyam pa// rab tu dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'barab 'i gtso// ran
chen sna tshogs kun 'dus 'di la gzigs// sngon medal mo 'de la rol mdzad tsang// dur khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal bar mdzod// thugs rjes pad+ma'i dbyangs las skyed par mdzod// a la la la ho//
ji ltar pad+ma 'di la chags med bzhin// sdug pa'i bcangs pas mtshan rnams grol te// 'jig rten gsum po 'di la ga jags nas rol mo mdzod// bdag cag dam tshagi 'di la 'dus shig snang ba rnams// mnyes/
mdzod shin tu bde ba bzhengs su gsol// 'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la// nam mkha' ji bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas// khams kyi rang bzhin mnabs shing rnams khro yang// byams pa'i thugs

rjes kun gnas khyab par mdzod// e ma'o bde bas bde sbyin phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin grub pa'i bde ba dngos grub gsol// chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis// dam tshig skyon med brtag cag rol

pa mdzod// thugasarje gsal ba'i byang chub sems chen des// 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par skyongs// rgyu dang rkyen la ma brten rang bzhin grub// ma chags dri med yongs su gsal ba zla ba bzhin// 'jig rten
gsum po 'dir ni mnga' mdzad de// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu bde bas rtsen// 'od kyis gtso la bskul byas na// dkyil 'khor nyid du dngos grub bo// yid gdungs gshen pa'il tsAs/

[r/ ]dpyid kyi rgyal po gru blangs te// mkha' 'gro dra ba dri med pa'i// dgongs pa thams cad bstan byas te/ rdo rje pad+mo yade 'ongs pa'i// dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar bya// bde byed chen po 'di yis ni// bskul

ngas dgyes pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje can gyi yi ger ldan// dus gsum rab tu sbyar bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa'i dos spyod dpal gyi bde

ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de dag thams cad la rjes su mgu bar mdzad do// g.yon gyi lag pas bzung byas te// gsang skyes pad+mo che ba las// rdo rje chen po g.yas nyid kyis// bcug

na mchod pa 'thob 'gyur te// mkha' la 'gro ba dra ba 'dis// mnyes pas 'di nas dngos grub thob// so dang so dang mi phyed rdo rje bde// mtha' ru phaTakyis stobs rab sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bde ba mkha'
'gro dra ba che// rab dgyes dbang mo bde byed bde stabs mdzod// rnal 'byor ma tshogs gsal rnams la// 'di yis rten pa rnams byas na// bde chen bde ba dgyes pa las// rab dgyes dngos grub 'grub par
'gyur// rnal 'byor ma'i che ba rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i yo shes kyi phyag rgya la shas so////mgo la thang mo phyed spyan te// chu skyes lan yongs su rdzo gas// rdo rje btsangs pa yang dag
ldan// pad+mo'od kyil mo bcing bar bya// 'di yis brtson par byas na ni// bud med mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur bde ba chen po'i gar byed cing// rab dgyes bde byed gnod byed dang// kun tu 'khyud dang/
spo byed dang// sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas te// thams cad zas dang ros dngos grub// mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bdung byas te// sangs rgyas spyi ka
bde chen po// myur ba'i thal mos bsgrub par bya/ gsum gyis mtshams su rab t+ya zhing// mkhur tshos so yis btab byas te// ma mchu yang nas yang du gzung/ 'o ma 'dzin pa phyis 'o tan+te/ g.yo//

khyed pad+mo rnam bzhi bya// padro phyi phyir rob malta zhing// ze ba mtshon pas rab tu sbyar// sen mos mchan khung sum mdo dang// rna ba gnyis su rab tu gzugs// dal nas rdo rje gzhug pa zhing/ khro bo'i rgyu la so

bsrung bar bya// g.yas kyis shin tu bskyod byas nas// g.yon pa yis ni gtang bar bya// sbyor ba 'di yis rtsen pa yis// mkha' 'gro'i 'khoralo mchod par bya// kye ma'o bde zhes rang brjod do// 'dong chen podabyangs

kyis bskul// yang dang yang du 'dzin pa na// blo ldan sgrub pas bsgrub bar bya// rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i spro ba la shesaso// de dag thams cad mgu nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba 'debs//

lta ba'i zas ni thams cad dang// de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad rnams// bde ba bsgrubs pas sgrub pa po// sna tshogs chen po bsgo bar gsol// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas// gdonami za dkar cha lag pa ri pas/gang

gamyur dumanyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab tu rnam bsgyur bgyi// de nas datsim ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa// [”]yo byad phye yi thams cad dang// gos dang rgyan la sob/

pa 'o// nya pa'i kha zas rnams lan// sha dang khrag las yang dag sgrub// 'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do// mchog tu bde ba yid tsham pa// 'di yis mchod pa byas pa na// mkha'ago ma ni dngos grub 'gyur// dus/
pa'i sha las rab sgrub pa'i// 'o ma dam pas bod pa dgang// mkha'o 'gro ma kun dbul byas na// dkyil 'khor bdar na dngos grub 'gyur// gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi yi shes so//
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang// rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs te phyag 'tshal nas yang gcig tu stag por 'du ba mdzad de// 'chom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor kun gyi ya shes
mtshan// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// thams cad brda rnams dran 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'dasan tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro myoju ba dang 'brel ba'i dpal zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang// 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// ka ni 'dod pa byed 'dod phyir// bdag ni 'dod can skyes yin te// gtimug

mdongs pas ma byin na// myur du dam tshig de nyams so// dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// des kyang gzhon pa bskyang ba a// rang gi num rab bsdamasan// mgo des g.yon
du 'dud byas nas// phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin// lag pa g.yon pa kur brten na// de yis phyag na byas par 'gyur// g.yon pa ma go ru bzhag pa yi/ g.yon du 'dud pas phyag lan no// g.yon gyi sman ma
bskyod pa yis// myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur// sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yis// g.yas kyi snyan mas phyag lan bya// g.yas kyi lag pas snying kha ru// sbyor dang ldan pas mnyes

byas na// 'di ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ de yi mtshan mar shes par bya// g.yon gyi khro mo bsgrung ba yi// nam zhig de ltar bstan byas na// lus che de ni khros 'gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yi rtags zhes bya// g.yon

zla du 'gying ba'i bsgyings pa yis// lag pa sbang khar bskyod bya ste// dbang mo gyen du rnam bstanan// de tshe mdza' bar rab tu brtag/ chung du rtse mor byas pa yi// nam zhig bskyod pa mthong ba na// de tshe rig ma rnala'abyor

dbang// rdo rje pad+mo can par 'dod// sbyom po nam zhig mthong 'gyur na// de la ston mo sbyin par bya// gang tshe shAn tu mthor ston// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag/ khro mo lugs kyu 'dra byas te// gang tshe sngags

mkhan gyis khastan na// de tshe nges par 'o byas te// gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung// de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar// sngags mkhan gyis ni ma bstan na// de tsho myur du 'gro byas te// gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams//

gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam bskul na// las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis// las de dag ni brtsam par bya// brda yi phyag rgya'i ma shes so// 'dren pa med pa'i nges sheshas kun// rnal khyor

pa yis rab tu brtag/ rtag tu tsheg drag rnam bral ba// 'dren tshule rnal 'byor ma yi lo// o ni thog ler bcas pa'i brda// sbyor ba sngags 'dzani rnal 'byor brtag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sbyor ba'i
[rv]dkyil du brtag par bya// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam par sbyor ba'i rjes su mnyes par byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i a shes so////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thamA

cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po yang kun tu rgyas 'debs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rdo rjepha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang pa rnal 'byor ma chen mo thams cad kyi

phyag rgya'i yu shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang// gsung dang// thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag ste// sbom po skyil mo btsadri bar bya// khro mo gnyis n sbyar bya ste// lhag ma'od bzhin gtang
bar bya// snying khar phyag rgya 'di dzazha gnas // thams cad las ni rab sbyor te// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// gdon mi za ba'i dngos grub byed// thal mo de gnyidimanyam sbyar te//
mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du sbyar// chud du gnyis kyang gdong sprad de// gang khar de bzhani sbom po sbyar// 'de yis rdo rje thams cad rnams// dam tshig 'jog byed rab mdzad cing// sems can thams

cad lama mdzad ma// de ni dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid lasani rdo rje dang// mchog nyid sbyong ba'i tshul byas te// rdo rje thal mo gnas pa yis// drang ba'i tshul gyis drangs byas na// mi g.yang

de nas dngos grub bo// gnon byed yang dag ldan pa 'dis// rgyal ba mchog kyang 'dren 'gyuran// lha dang ma yi bu mo dag/ lhamin la sogs smos na dgos// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin// 'di nyid kyis ni dngos
grub ste// sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam sbyor bas// mchog tu myur du 'dren par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid las byung khro// rtse mo yid tsam bkug byas te// lhag ma'od zer rtse mo bzhin// des na myos
byed thob pa yin// 'di ni btsangs ma thag tu yang// bde bar gashogs kyang dbang sgyur na// yid las skyes pa 'dod chags can// gti mug chos gnas smos ci dgos// ci dgar 'dod chags sbyor ba yis// de yis

las rnams byed 'gyur te// yang dag sbyor ba thams cad 'grub// sbyor dang mi ldan dngos grub med// snying khar 'di nyid kyi byas te// mgu ba'i sbyor ba bde chen pos// rgyal ba mchog na mnyes par 'gyur// mchog

gi bcing ba 'di kun dang// 'di yis las rnams thams cad dang// yid la bsam pa thams cad 'thob// phan tshun du ni mgu byed cing// mgu bar dngos grub myur du 'thob// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar to// rdo rje bkug

nas sbom por sbyar// lhag ma'od kyi tshul du gtong// dga' byed mchog ni phyag rgya'adi// sangs rgyas 'bras bu dngos grub 'thob// rgyal srid nor dang 'bru yi rnams// de bzhaninor bu 'di dngos grub// de nidi ma thag

tu yang//lha dang lha min mchod par 'gyur// bdag nyid kyis ni 'di bcings te// mkhas pa yis ni dus 'tshams phyar// gnas lngar rab tu sbyor ba yis// spyi bor dbang ni bskur byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi

dbang// de nas de na nges par 'gyur// lo gcig tsam du mnyam sbyor bas// phan tshun du ni dbang bskur bas// khams gsum rab dgyes bdag po ru// blo ldan rdo rje mi g.yang 'gyur// de nyid 'khor lo bskor byas te/

sang khar 'khor lobazhin du skor// zla ba gcig tsam mnyam sbyar bas// 'khor lo bskor ba rab tu sgrub// de nyid g.yon par rab sbyar te// rgyal mtshan tshul du yang dag spro// zhag bdun du ni mnyam bzhag pas//

'jigarten du ni rgyal bar 'gyur// de nyide kha nas bgad par sbyor/ mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis// las rnams thams cad rab grub pa// pa/da pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag
ste rtsomo kha phyed rnam bsgyur bas// sbom po ze bar rnam byas te// lo ma lhag ma rgyus par bya// rnal 'byor 'di bcings pa yis// sdig pa kun las rab tu grol// bsod nams chen pos rgyun slob ste// bde

byed thams cad grub par 'gyur// zal mo de nyid snying khar sbyar// mchog dang khro mo gnyis sbyar te// de gnyis tshigs gsum rab tu dgug/ sbom po skyil mo tsam du bya// rnal 'byor dag tu sbyor ba yis// 'di yis

zla ba gcig byas na// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal rjer// dpa' bo chen por de 'gyur ro// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi snying khar bskor bar bya// de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par// ma ga yang sem

kyis de 'gyur ro// sbom po lce ya tshul bzhag pas// de nyid khar ni rnam bzhagan// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag/ mdor na zhag bdun tsamagyis kyang// dbyig dang gser dang gos la sogs// bdud rtsi btung/

ba mchog gi rnams// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog byed de// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// thal mo de 'di mnyam sbyar te// mchog rab gnyis 'og tu gzhug/ chung ngu gnyis dad sbom po gnyis// sbyar te snying khar
rab tu gzhug/ yid la dga' ba'i las rnams thams cad byed// skyama'i mchu dang srid pa mthar byed pa// rtag tu blo ldan la ni phyed gnyis kyis// khams gsum rgyal srid mthu chen/

thob par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi ma mchu dadus nyid nas// sbom po ro 'brob tshul gyis ni// khro mo 'khor lo yang dag spro// zhag bdun du na bsgoms pa yis// 'di yis khrag 'dren dngos

grub ste// shazas bza' ba las kun byed// thal mo nyid ni bcings byas na// rdo rjeganyis ni dror skor// sbom po'i zur na sbrel nas kyang// chung du gnyis kyang de bzhin te// mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brkyang// thams/
cad las ni sbyar byas te// 'di yis gcug pa thams cad dag/ rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag nas// bcing ba dam pos bcing bar bya// sbom po gnyis ni nang du gzhug/
khro mo gnyis kyang bskul bar bya// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ 'jums par rab tu byas khar 'gyur// skad cig tu na gnon byed de// de bzhin bsdus dang btsar bar 'gyur// phyag rgya'adi yis rgyas
btab pas// de ni dengos grub thams cad kyi// dngos grub chen po bdag po dang// thams cad las don 'grub bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yas rgyas btab pas// rim par myur du 'gro 'ong byed// lo gcig gi ni
sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad skrag par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi las thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya'o////denas rnal 'byor mi de dag thams cad rab tu mgunas ngo

0 mtshar du gyur te// rnam par 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing// ha hazhes pas glu ru len// ha ha zhes pas rab tu mgu// ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// he hazhes pas 'bod par byed// hUM hUM zhes pas gang bar byed//

sAhA zhes pas skyong bar byed// phoT pa ces pas gsod par byed// rtswatshu zhes pas phur bus 'debs// dza dzA zhes pas 'dren par byed// sa sa zhes pas dam par byed// dug la dbang nga ro mchog/ hU~M blo zhes mA

gsod par byed// hUM hUM hUM tuM/ hUMhUM/zhes pas 'bar bar byeng// hUM hri zhes pas gzi brjid khyed// tAM tAM zhes pas 'dren par byed// tAM tra zhes pas mchod par byed// dngos grub thams cad 'bras bu smin//

hwa h+phazhes pas rmongs par byed// d+d+haMhU~M zhes bas 'dzums par byed// hU~M hrazhis pas 'dren par byed// hUM hUM zhes par 'phyan par byed// hU~M hrazhes pas rmongs par byed// hAhuM zhes pas gnon par
byed ho ho zhes pas mnyes pas byed// haM haM zhes pas srung por byed// hUM hUM zhes pas gsod par byed// hu hu zhes pas mgu bar byed// hUM hUMzhes pas 'phreng par byed// go gi zhes pas tI ru byed//

ra ri zhes pas rgyal bar byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'okhor le'i tshogs ngo mtshar cher gyur// rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te// rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas// yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba 'debs so// gnyis med
mchog tu rmad byung ba// bcom ldan de nyid bshad du gsol// gang gis sems can grub pa 'di// gsang ba sbas pa grub par 'gyur// gar dang glu dang bzhad pa che// skrag mo rol pa bde ba

mchog/ sil snyan gling du rnam sna tshogs// brdabadang rgyud rnams rab 'byor pa// gsang rgyud cho ga'i rim pa rnams// rdzu 'phrul blo yi che ba che// dngos grub thams cad grub pa yis// sngags rgyal khyod kyis bshad/

du gsol// de nas bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad bdag po rgyal po che// thog ma med nas spyod rmad byung// snatshogs chen po rnam mi rtog/ sna tshogs ye shos yon tan che// bla med chos kun dbar

po ste// rig dar sngags kyi bdag po che// de nyid chen po snying po mchog/ blo rmongs phyag rgya rgyas 'debs te// rgyas 'debs rmongs byed za ba po// gtong dang byed pa khyab pa che// skyong ba sdug pa 'phrog par byed// sdig

waM pa'i chos rnams sel bar byed// dus ngan 'dod byed khros pa lo// gti mug chos rjes 'debs par byed// sa dang bar snang de bzhin bde// de bzhin rnal 'byor pa la sbyin// chos dang gtogs 'dod dbang chen phro//

de la phyag dang 'chod par byed// de 'di skyod byed skyob pa po// gsang ba'i gsang ba bde ba che// zla gsang thig le las byung ba'i// sbas ba chen po gsang ba sten// 'di kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje// bde ba chen po byin

mdzad de// skal ldan bar longs spyod kun// bud mad thams cang dbangadu byed// rang 'byung mtshan du thig le ste// bcu gsum dra ba dbu ru ltan// 'di yis bud med bskyed byas te// sa bon gyisan rgyal po 'du//

[z]'od zer gzi brjid 'bar ba can// rang las myu gur 'dra ba yis// 'og gi phyogs su bzhag pa na// hU~Mbyas myur du drang bar bya// dang po drang ba gnyis drang bas// tsheg drag des na lcags kyu byas// lha dang lha min

mchog gi bdag/ khams gsum thams cad drang bar byed// 'di yaM u0f7a tshul gyis sbyor ba yi// phan tshun du ni bsgrub byas nas// rmad byung rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// dngos grub byed pa sbyin par byed// bdag nyidi

rar bzhin mthong bar bya// sbyor ldan zla ba'i gzugs nyid du// de ste sa bon gzhag par bya// de nyid de nyid thabs kyis gnas// sngags kyi sbyor ba rab sbyor bas// de nas sngags mkhan der 'grub bo// de nyid

sngags dang snyang po dang// phyag rgya rig dang mi ldan pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sams dpa' yang// 'grub pa nyid du yong mi 'gyur// de nyid nang du sbyar byas na// snying po snying khar sbyorab yis// phyag rgya phyag rgyas

sbyar bar byas// sngags dang sngags kyi 'bru bsgoms te// rag ma rages nyid du sbyar// 'di yis myur du dngos grub ste// mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyis chen por// 'byung dang 'byung
las 'gyur ba ste// rnal 'byor 'byor don sgrub pa po// dpa' bo chen po 'gro 'od byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab mgu rangs par gyur to// rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di sgrigs so// kye mi'o kun tu

bzang po yi// rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med// bshad pa gsang ba zhes bgyid pa// de nyid don du sgrub pa ste// sAng po phyag rgya dam tshag ni// sngags rig rang gi lha nyid de// bdag gi de nyid ji bzhin pa// gsang
[©]// ba rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs// dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang// gsang ba smras pa de nyed de// 'jig rten gsum gyis 'dud pa'i me// dpa' bo chen pos rab tu sgrogs// rdo rje

pad+mo rnam mdzad pas// rig ma dang ni lhan cag rtsen// gdug pa thams cad mnye bya dang// dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang// slob dpon skyod la bsngal ba dang// gzung ma'i bdag por sgrub pa dang// sangs rgyas

lce thams cad bskyed bu dang// rab dgyes bdag nyid bskul pa dang// sdig pa thams cad sbyang pa dang// bud med thams cad 'dod bya dang// bdud rnams thams cad drang bya dang// rdo rje kun tu gzhug bya dang// pad+mo'i/

tsha gnas ni gang bya dang// sgrub dang nye bar sgrub ba dang// shin tu sbyor dang sbyor che ba// sbyor ba rab sbyor skye ba// de rnams de nyid mkhyen pa po// bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs// sgrub pa yi ni sbyor me ba// sbyor dang sbyor
mar yang dag sbyor// de 'od gsal b.re sams dpa' che// phan pa dgongs pa nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i mdo rjes su dris pa rang gajug

la bzhag ste// nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rdzolas phyung ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// kun tu sbyor ba mnyam par ldan// de nyar phyag rgya chen po ste// ye shes lnga yis rjes su bskyed// dkyil 'khor

phyag rgya bzhi pa ste// phyag rgya chen pos rjes su bsgrubs// rdo rjesems dpa' skyed mdzad de// kye ma'o bde ngo rnam par 'byung// snying po ye shes zhes bya ste// a shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya ye shes phyag rgya che//

0dam tshig mchog ni rig ma 'o// sngags kyi yi ge tshul 'dra ba// yi ge'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin// 'di yis sgrub pa byas pa'i gzung// bdag gi de nyid lha de 'di// de dag de nyid ji bzhin par// nga yis gsang ba rab tu

bsgrags// dam tshag ma yin mi shes la// sngags rig pas na bstan ma bya// phyag rgya thams cad gang bya ste// dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba yin// de 'di lha ya sbyor ba ni// gsang ba gsang ba rab tu sgrub//

rdo rje pad+mo rnams mdzad pas// thol pa phyi nang sbyor ba yis// rig dang lhan cig phan bya ba// spyod pa dang ni 'khyud pa dang// de bzhin mchu ni so yis gzung// rdo rje brtan pa gzhug par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul
gyisan// bskyod cing rnam par gar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad mnye bya ste// num mchan khung mkhur tshos gnyis// 'gram pa dang ni brla gnyis rgyab// rkang pa lag pa 'jam po gnyis// mnye ba'i sbyor ba

'di yis ni// mdza' ba chen po de 'grub bo// 'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod dang// dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang// zhe sdang can gyis zos 'gyur ba// khyad par gzhan dang gzhan yang bza'// rtag par mo phyogs

skya ba dang// bla ma skyod rnams bsgral bya ba// sha dung khrag dang klad pa'i rnams// drangs te chogasakyis mchod par bya// 'di ni gsad pa drag po ste// rdo rje slob dpon spyod pa dang// bla ma skyor byed brtson pa

la// dam tshig phyir nibasgrub par bya// gti mug de ni 'grub ma 'gyur// sdug bsngal ba yang 'thob 'gyur te// thams cad nad dang khros chen dang// 'jigs byed nye bar 'tsho ba yis// bskal pa grangs med bye b.ru/
sdug bsngal chen po sten byed cing// 'o dod 'bod par sbrulagyi bdag/ ba snyir mdachen po brlag par 'gro// lus ngag sems ni bde dam pa// rig ma kun la bskyod byas te// byang chub chen

po bde ba yi// tshul bzhin du ni bsngags par bya// bskul ba'i snying po 'di snas te// dza zhes skad cig skad cig tu// rang gi gnas na gnas pa yis// de nyid las ni bskyod par bya// bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan//

zla ba gsang ba'i thig le la// me tog dang 'dra ba 'di// chung gis phul ba bskyod par bya// de ni bskyod pas 'grub pa ste// de bzhin du yang bskul bar bya// rgyun gyi 'phrang ni 'od gsal bzhin// blo ldan rtag tu

bsgrub par bya// bdud rnams thams cad 'dren pa ni// lha mo rnams ni snying por bshad// zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug pa dang// de bzhin dog/nga ba bcing bo 'o// sgrub pa lha yi sbyor ba ste// rjes su sgrub pa lha mo'i

don/sgrub pa chen po gnyis ka'i rgya// mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje'i mchog/ zhabar sgrub pa gnyis ka gnas// nyani tu sgrub pa bde rngam pa// so yi rtsa mosaachu bzung ste// ma mchu mchog ni bsdam par bya// sbyor ba

rab sbyor skal ldan pa'i// rab dgyes ro myang bde dam pa// lha dang lha nyid yang dag sbyor// 'di ni gnyis su med ces bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis// nyid kyi gzugasan bsgrub bya ste// bdag ni sems
yara'o zhes bsams na// 'di miganyis med myur du 'gyur// gzugs dang dgra la sogs pa'i lha'i// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sbyor dang rab sbyor sbyor che ba// rgyal bo kun gyi mchog gis

gsungs// bcom ldan rdo rje sbyor ba ste//rang tu sbyor ba mkha' la 'gro// phyag rgya de dag rab sbyor ba// sbyor ba chen po bsgrags pa yin// 'di yis dpa' bo thams cad dang// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//

sbyor ba'i dbang po bde ba che// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rdo rje'i bdag po chen por 'gyur// mnyam par sbyor ba sbyar ba yis// 'jig rten gsum po myur du rgyal// yang

dag sbyor ba sbyar tshul gyis// drangs te rab tu bcug nas kyang// rdo rje brtan pos bskul byas te// shin tu 'dod pas 'dod pa skyed// mkha' 'gro thams cad thabs mkhas ldan// rgyas dang de bzhin thag bar bya//

'di ni yang dag sbyor ba smras// sbas pa rnal 'byor ma dkyil lo// 'di yis yang dag dngos grub blang// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'bras bu 'thob// sangs rgyas byang chub bde che dang// byang chub mchog rab yang dag

'thob// gsang ba chen po rmad byung ba// de dag de nyid slas pa che// sangs rgyus rnams kyis dris pa'i rgyu// nga yis yang dag rab tu bstan// gang gis yang dag ldan mthong dang// badrag po chen po mchod byed ma//

de yis ston pa kun mthong ste// rgyal ba mchog la mchod par 'gyur// srid pa gcod pa por 'gyur te// 'gro ba'i ston pa mchog tu 'gyur// de la lha kun mchod byed cing// skad cig skad cing phyagakyang byed//
ji ltar ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// phan byed 'jig rten skyes gyur pa// sna tshogs ye shes rjes bsdus pas// rnal 'byor chen por de bzhin 'gyur// rang gis dmatshig bsrungs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa'/
bde skye ba// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ldan pas// dngos grub chen po des 'thob bo// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan btang la// cung zad mi 'grub yod med de// phyag rgya kun gyi bde ba che// bdag

nyid so sor rjes su 'grub// rab dgyesamtshan dang mdza' chen mo// ro dang reg pa'i che ba'i tshe// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dpyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu 'gyur te/ rdo rje

ma sems dpa' bdecha pa// sbyor ba 'dod pa'i gzare ba yis// sbyor ba chen pos mnyes par mdzod// ra ma ra ma sa ma ho ma hA satA// rab dgyes gdon mi za la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// zla

gsang thig ler yang ngag lda// bdag cag kun kyang dam tshig ste// skal ldan dri mer rab dgyes kyi// rnal 'byor ma seng mchoganyid du// sbyor chen nyid kyis rol pa mdzod// theg pa chen po bde che yi// pado ro
rje'i rinachen gyis// rnal 'byor ma kun dkyil 'khor du// rab dgyes longs spyod gnyis sten mdzod// bdag cag thams cad nyes bral te// gnong ma de ni gsar dang 'dra// de nyid thams cad grub chen po//

rab dgyes bdag nyid nyad sten mdzod// spros pa 'khyud pa sbas ba dang// gzhug pa dang ni gtong ba'i mchog/ 'di ni sgyu ma'i brtan ba yis// der dpon rab tu brtag par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba

chen po kun tu bzang pos 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'id pal zhes bya ba chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sbas pa chen po'i tong nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rnal

'byor ma thams cad shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i kun tu'akhyud pa dang// spros pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ 'dren pa dang/ rab tu bskul ba dang/mnye ba dang/ thigs pa dang/ tshor bar bya ba dang/ bskyod pa dang/ kun
tu bskyod pa dang/ bcang ba'i rdo rje dang/ pad+ma chen mo mnyam du sbyor ba la yang dag par zhugs te/ shan tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos bde bas kun tu rgyas par mdzad cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad dang gzung ma'i tshogs thams cad la bskyod pa dang/ rab tu rgyas pa dang/ rab tu rnam par 'byon cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i mnyam pa nyid kyi tshogs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad/

kun tu rgyas par byas te gnas so// de nas rnal 'byor ma chen mo shin tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid chen po de dag nyid mgu zhing bde bar gyur te// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// rdzogs sangs rgyas n mgu ba che//

bde ba chen po rabs par 'gyur// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// bde ba nyid kyis phyag byed de// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po// mgu ba chen po'i bde dang lda// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// 'jigs shing skrag

bas sdud par byed// khros pa chen po mkhar 'gro ma// rab tu mi bzad dug dang 'dra// bde byed chen po'i rol pa yis// bde byed che la mchod par byed// skal ba chen po sring mo dang/ bde byed bde bas rang
rmongs po// mchod pa'i sprin phung bde ldan pa'i// rgyache mchog gis mchod par byed// drag mo chen mom lta bu// rab tu gtum pa ma 'dra ba// 'ongasanas bde byed chen mo yis// gtso bo mchog la mchod
par byed// lha dang lha mo thams cad kyang// klu mo dang ni rta gdong yang// 'ongs nas bde ba sbyor ba yis// yid du 'ong bas mchod par byed// de nas dbang po lha chen po// bdag nyid chen/

bo lha yi lha// kye ma'o bde ba sna tshogs nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba bde ba che// mgu zhing rab tu 'dus pa yas// lha yas lha ni sngon du 'gro// dupa' bo bde la phyag byas te// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// rang ga bde bas

mngon mchod cing// 'jigs shing skrag pas mnyes par byed// tshad mar rangs ba bzhad pa che// glu gar mchog tuldan pa dang// bza' dang bca'ob shachen dang// sal stan 'phreng ba ro chen dang// gling bu rgyud

dang rdza rnga dang// pi wa da pal kag ha la le// steg drang dpa' bo 'jigs pa dang// zhi dang rgyud byung 'jagis byed dang// bdag dang khros dang spyan rgyas pas// skad cage skad cig mchod byed cing// byed pa dang ni

bzlog pa dang// 'phrog pa dang ni gzhug pa dang// sId ces pa dang hU~M hU~M dang// ha ha zhes pas mnyes byed tsang// rab dgye sa bdag nyid bde ba yis// rang gi chung mas mnyes par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kun tu bzang bo chen po rab tu dgyes pa bde ba chen pos nam mkha'i dang nam mkha'i skabs thams cad la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa' dang// rang rgyal dang/ nyan thos
dang rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa dang/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes la gnas pa rnams shAn tu dgyes pa chen pa'i bde ba'i thabs dang shes rab kyi bde bas bkug ste dbang bskur nas// shin tu

[ni]dgyesal chen po'i bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par 'jog pa dang// nyan tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i chos nyid kyi rgyal po rjes su skyong zhing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa// namamakhar dang mnyam pa'i
'jig rten gyi khams chen po ma lus pa'isems can gyi khamasa rnams su rab tu gzigs gzig nas 'jig rten dang lhar bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ sems can dang/ rigs thams

cad dang/ gnas thams cad dang/ spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa dang/ 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa dang/ sa'i 'og dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ bsags pa'i dbang po lnga dang//

rnam par shes pa dang/ shes bya dang/ bdag dang/ bdag gi dang/ sna tshogs dang/ sna tshogs ma yin pa dang/ bus pa dang/ rgan po dang/ gzhon nu dang/ bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ skyes pa ma yin pa dang/ srog dang/

rang du zad pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid dang/ shes pa dang/ mishes pa dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ khyab pa dang/ khyad byed dang/ zla ba dang//

dbang chen dang/ nyi ma dang/ ma dang/ gshin rje dang/ rlabadagadong/ lus srul po dang/ tshangs pa dang/ gartogs 'dod dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ lha mo dang/ skal ba dang ldan pa dang/ skal ba dang mi ldan pa dang/ dngos po

dang dngos po med pa dang/ mtshan dang/ rdo rje dang/ pad+mo dang/ rin po che dang/ ral gri dang/ tho ba dang/ dbyig pa dang/ rtse gsum pa dang/ 'khor lo dang/ sbyor ba dang/ rab tu sbyor ba dang/ stong pa dang/ stong pa chen po dang//

sha/ mchog tu stong pa dang/ shin tu stong ba dang/ stong pa rab tu stong pa dang/ byang chub dang/ byang chub kyi sems dang/ yi ge dar/ yi ge med pa dang/ dra ba dang/ lcagam dang/ chu dang/ cha med pa/

dang thage le rar/ ro dang/ ro lo nga/ yid la byed pa mad pa dang/ rtag pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ ma zad pa dang/ thar pa dang/ thar byed dang/ grol ba dang/ rigs pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ nam mkha' dang/

skabs dang/ skabs med pa rnams lagacig tu smyug khoragyur te/ rnam par phye nas mi snang ba'i tshul du gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang/ thathA

kyi pha rol tu phyin m dang/ smon lamagyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang/ rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin m rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shan tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen

pa gsang ba chen po'i dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa chen po la phyag mdzod de/ mngon sum du yang dag par bskul nas dris pa/ sur ta ste sta ma sa ha/ gang phyir 'dod pa bde brje gang gas 'dod las byang chub

'gyur// 'dod chags bralab ji ltar bde// gang gis zhe sdang rdo rje che// gang gis gti mug rgyal ba che// gang gis 'dodachags pador 'gyur// gang gis nga rgyal nam mkha'i bdag/ gang gis phrag dog gdonami
za byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde// gang gis bde byed mchod par 'gyur// mchod pa yisan ji ltar 'grub// ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyor bas// yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// je ltar 'dod pa'i

[z/]yon tan lnga// bsnyams pa yis na myur du 'grub// ji ltar gasang ba mnyam sbyor bas// rmad du byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur// ji ltar pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab tu zhugs par 'gyur// ji ltar

dri chu byang chub dang// dmar dang snang mdzad chen po yis// dmatshig nyid du ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shan tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen pA//

rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la rang gi bde dras mnyes par byas te// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shan tu sbas pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi

sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du// sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas// de phyirang ni rdo rje che// zhe sdang zhes n bsgrags pa yin// ngan song 'jigs pa
chen po ru// sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas// de phyir 'di ni gti mug ste// rtag pa thub pa mchog yin no// thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid kyis// 'gro ba thams cad dga' byed rung// padro tshul du

rab rtogs phyir// de phyir 'dod chags zhes bya 'o// bde chen sbyin pa'i sngon gyis ni// sems can thams cad nga rgyal skyed// nam mkha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir// de phyir mkha' chen nga rgyal yin// rol
sogs pa'i mnyam sbyor bas// phrag dog rdo rje gdon ma tha// sna tshogs pad+mo rab 'jug phyir// de i phyir ni sna tshogs cho// 'dod chags bral ba dga' med phyir// bdag ni rab dgyes sbas pa che// 'dod
pa ma gtogs bde byed med// bde phye 'dod pa nga yin no// 'dod chags med par byang chub med// byang chub med na'ang 'dod chags med// sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te////
sangs rgyas bde mchog mnyes byed pas// 'dodrachags 'dod las khade byed kyi// bde ba mchog tu rmad byung 'gyur// byang chub sems med bde byed gzhon// 'jage rten gsum ngo padir mong do//

thams cad byang chub sems ngo de// bde ba kun gyis tshim par 'agyur// bo zhes pa ni rdo rjer bshar// d+hi zhes pa ni gzung ma'i mchog/ tsa zhes pa ni zag pa la shar// tazhes pa ni bde ba che// mchod pa

! med pas bde byed med// bde ba med pas mgu ba med// mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// grub na bde byed rtag pa yi// phyag na rdo rje bde ba che// 'dod pa'i bde bsamachod byed rung// tshe 'di nyid la thob

snyapar 'gyur// bde nga kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i// chos kyi dbyings na rnam par 'dzin// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzung ma yin// sdezhes pan pad+mo 'dzin// 'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yis// yi ge myur du 'grub par 'gyur/

'dod pa lnga yi yon tan kun// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzani// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i lengs spyod de// de phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// de yis bsnyen na grung par 'gyur// sngags kyi

sku'adzin dpal dang ldan// dbang phyug mchog gi sngags rgya 'o// rdo rje sems kyi thugs las skyes// mtshan can mchog tu sbas par bshad// de dang mnyam du sbyor ba yis// mchog gi dbang ni bskur bar 'gyu pa/ pad+mo'i

dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed// bloldan de ru zhugs gyur na'o// dam tshig sbas pa rtogs kyi rnams// drinu byang chub dmar po'i mchog/ sha ched sbrang rtsi mar nyid kyis// lus

la kun tu khyab gnas te// de yi phyir ni dam tshig tshe// dmatshig 'di yis dngos grub ste// dam tshig yi ger ldan pa yis// sbyor ces sbyang dang bskyed byas na// bza' ba dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// de nas pha
rolaphun ma kun// pad+mo'i gzages pa rgyas pa yi// 'dzum bcas g.yonanas gar mdzad cing// rtag pa lan yang gsol ba// rigs ni rnam pa du ru bstan// ji ltar sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi// sna tshogs chen
po de dag kun// bde la gnas pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms/

par zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tugasang ba pha rol tu phyin ma'i de khonanyid rab tu phyung ngo// nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das
rdo rje sems dpa' don chen sbyin// rigs kyi khyab par lta rnams kyis// spyod bcas mi spyod rnams la rol// rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen mchog/ 'jigs dbang gdon mi za grub rnams// rigs ni rnam pa brgyar
bstan te// mdor bsdusana rnam pa lnga// lus dang ngag dang yod rnams kyis// khyad par thog pa rnam pa gsum// de nyid gsum po rdo rdzomanga'o// bde ba'i gnas la rol ba mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te// rang gi sdom pa gsol ba 'debs so// sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin pa// brtul zhugs dka' thub sdugs mkhan/
gyi dam tsheg mchog tu srung ba'i rnams// bcom ldan 'das gsang pa nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po mchog tu dgyes pa'i bde ba la mngon par chags pas de nga zhin
gshags pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen te// zhal rab tu bzhud pas rgyas nas nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung drang/ thugs rdo rdzolas 'di phyung ngo// sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pas// nan tan

'a du ni bsrung bar bya// bsrungs pa yis ni bsod nams che// dngos grub shin tu skyo bar 'gyur// de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'i// yid kyis kha dog dbyings chen gyi// phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas btab// sbas

pa'i sku ni rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje gsung du rab sbyor bas// chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgyu brjod// ngag spyas gsang ba brjod pa na// nga ro spangs pa rdo rje'i gsung// rang sems rab tu 'bigs pa yis// zla ba rdo rje rnam par
sgom// rang bzhin gsum po gcig tu sgom// 'di na yid skyas chen po yin//'di ni de nyid rgya chen mchog/ rgyun du sgom pa rnams byas te// gsum bsgoms pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan min rdo rje
'dzin gyis gsungs//sbas gsum la sogs tshog yis// phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// sbas gsum rnam par sba bar bya// rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po dang/
gtso bo chen pos byin gyis rlob// blun po gang gis 'das byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa skad cig 'jig/ sems dpa' che dang bral gyur na// ngan song gsum du yang dang yang// ji tsamanam mkha'i dkyil
'khor ba// shAn tu mi bzad smin par 'gyur// de nas dmatshig de drag kun// rdo rje 'dzin la mgu gyur te// 'jam po'i phyag gis gar mdzad tsang g.yon gyis phyag byas slar gsol pa// gar dbang
rnam par gnon par gar mdzad cing// mtha' yas phyag ni bcapa'i bsgyings pa yis// pad+ma'il mo 'jam po brgyad phye nas// gnyis min bde bar rdo rje 'jog mdzad de// sbas pa de 'di mi mnyam
sad par gyur// rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dag 'du// thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa bde byed sogs// bde gshegs rnams kyi sbas pa khyed kyis shod// sbyor dang sbyor ma yang dag sbyor// zhi ba'i
thal mo ma chog tu bde// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// de nyid sbas pa bskul ba laM//
sbas pa ma lus 'chad par mdzad// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// cho gar ldan pas gang dbang bskur// bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis// de nyid 'di ni de las bstan// 'dil khrus med nges/
pa med// dka' thub med de dka' ba'ang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// nga nyid sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rdo rjesams dpa' nyid du 'gyur// rdo
rje dwabab pa skyes 'gyur na// ji tsam 'dod par nam mkhar 'phur//snying khar rdo rje khu tshur bcings// rdo rje lta bas rnam bsdus te// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bstan byas n
rdo rje sems dpa'i skad cig 'gyur// rnam sgrig dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas// rab dgyes sar ne'agro byed de// sangs rgyas bde ba chen po dang// grub pa yis kyang mchod byed cing// rdo rje sems
dpa'i rgya che mchog/ 'gying ba'i longs pas gar byed pas// bde byed zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing// las kyi khyab par la sogs gnon// sbas pa'i gar gyis gar byas pas// sbyas pa sbyor ba'i badrag nyid

'tsha 'grub// sna tshogs dkyil 'khong gar byed cing// lag pa mang po rnamabasgyur dang// phyir brkyang dbyings su ldan pa dang// khro bar dri med lta ba yis// gdul dka'aganong pa 'jigs byed pa'i// 'jig rten

gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur// ma 'bar nyi ma'i dbus nyid du// khro bo hU~M modzad bsgom byas na// myur du 'jig rtenadon sgrub phyir// 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor bas//

tsha su ra ta so zhes smazhing// ha ra thag le tshul sbyar na// rab dgyes de ma thog tu 'gyur// rab dgyes mchog tu brtag pa yi// sachen rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te// lha mo bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// sems can
rnams kyi don kun byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol pa// thal mo yang dag sbyar byas te// phyag rgya de nyid nyid kyis shod// rdo rje mchog
la gsol ba 'debs// bde ba'i bdag nyid mchod pa shod// gzugs dang sgra dang dri che dang// re dang dreg pa yid 'ong ba// thugs rje chen pos bsgrubs pa yis// dpa' bo chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas//

bcom ldan bde byed che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che// phyag rgya bcing ba bde ba che// de nyid mchog ni bshad par mdzad// dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste// gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin// gsum pa phyag rgya

chen po ste// bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad// de nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje// ji ltar 'gying bzhin bsgom bya ba// sna tshogs ye shes rjes su dag/ snatshogs chen pos 'chad par mdzad// rtag pa'i sku ni

ser lo ste// mi bskyod rdo rje dkar po yin//nam mkha'i snying po mthing khache// tshe dpag medwapa pad+mo dmar// sna tshogs kha dog rgya che mchog/ 'od zer 'phreng ba rmad byung ba// gdon mi za ba rdo rje che// don chen byed

pa bsam par bya// bar rang rigs kyi gnas nyid du// myur du nam mkha' 'gro byed cing// rigs kyi lha mo bzhi rnams kyis// rol pa dang ni mchod par byed// sna tshogs sbyor ba bde che ba'i/ lha mo bzhi dang
mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sbyor bdag bsgoms byas na// rdo rjesams dpa' bdag nyid 'gyur// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i mchog/ rdo rje la sogs gdan bzhugs par// rang gi 'khor lo mchog
gi brgyan// rang gi phyag rgyar gnas par bsam// pad+mo'i gdan gyi tshulagyis ni// brtse dang ldan pas bsgom byas te// sAng po sbas don gar byas pas// sbas pa che la bde byed na// 'gying ba'i bde bar
ldan pa yi// rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor rab nye ba// sna tshogs chen po 'gro bar 'gyur// bde ba chen po thams cad 'grub pa'i sbyor ba chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i lug
rgya rab tu rgyus pa'o////de nas phyag rgya btsang bshad de// rtag la sogs pa'i de kho na// gang gis myur du btsangs pa yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub bde cher 'gro// thabs ni g.yas kyi logs su

bya// de bzhin shes rab g.yon par te// zhiba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyis// sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar bya// sor mo thams cad bar bar du// mnyam du sbyor bas khyad par sbyin rje yi ni rtsal sogs sams//
sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du sgrub// 'di no btsangs pa tsam gyis kyang//nam mkha'i snying bo'i gnas su 'gro// 'di nyidashen tu btsangs pa yis// gsum du sbyor bas mchod pa bya// nga da las ni ser

mo kun// kun tu bskum ste bcing bar bya rdo rje'icing ba bsdus pa ni// bcang nga ldan par rnam bsgyur te// de nyir sbom po rab btsug nas// khro mo'i rtse mo rab tu dgug/ 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi ngacing// rdo rje sams dpal

nyid 'grub byed// de dazhi patsang ba rnam gzhag ste// sdom bo khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar//'di ni bcing ba bcade ba che// namamakhar 'gro ba nye bar sgrub// de nyid bcing ba bcang byas te// khro mo gnyis po mtshan bzhin du// rtse

mo sprad de do gu bya ba// bcing ba 'di yis pad+mosgrub// bcang ba de nyid rab tu sbom// bde ba bcug nas bsdam byas te//las kyi bcing ba sbyor ba yis// don yod mchog gi rogs su 'gro// bcing ba de 'di banaMng byas te

sbom dang khro ba'i rtse mo sbyar// g.yas pa'i sbom po rdo rje yus// de yi dbus su banug bya ba// de 'dri bcang ba chen po ste// rab dgyes ro na sgrub byed pa// gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis ni//rab tu dgyes pa nyid/
'thob bo// dngos grub thams cad bde ba che// de yis 'di tsho'athob 'gyur to// phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu gnas// phyag rgya bcing ba'i e shes rnam par rgyas pa'o//
btsang ba lnga yi cho ga yis// gcig gis rnal 'byor bsgrub mi@#// drug ni sbyor bas sbyor byas na// de ma thag tu rab dgyes 'gyur// bcang ba lnga yi phyag rgya 'o// de bzhin bcong ba gzhi

byas te// g.yon gyi snying khar bcing bar bya// g.yas kyi rtse mo bsgreng byas te// rdo rje'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni byang chub bde// sangs rgyas thams cade gcig tu sgrub// gdon mi za bar tshor
la/ rtag pa 'dra ba thob par byed// gzhon pa de nyid sIng khar gzhag/ g.yas pa sa la reg byas pa// sa la bde ba rol pa yis// 'di yis ma zadu 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin sAng khang g.yon pa//
gzhag/ rtag pa g.yas pa rab sbyin bya// 'di yis rin chen skal ldan sogs// nam mkha' nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar gzhag/ g.yas kyang bzhag ste tang 'dzin
gnas// 'di yis tsho dpag med ba nyid// 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar sbyar// lag pa gasna pa mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jigs pa ma lus rab sgrol ba// sngog la gdug pa 'jig
pache// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed// gdon mi za ba'i nges pa yi// de ni chen po chen por 'gyur// de nyid bcing pa gnyis byas te// g.yon pa g.yon du sbyar bar bya// g.yas/

na snying khar bzung byas te// brjod pas rab tu bzhad tsang gnas// bde ba chen po thabs gnas pas// 'di yis rab dgyes nyid 'gyur te// bde mchog nyid du sgrub pa po// tshe 'di nyid la the tshom med// de
bzhan bcang pa bcang byas te// sbyor dang ldan pas bstan par bya//sbom po'i rtse mo pad+mo'i gnas// g.yon gyi khro mo'i rtse mor sbyar// g.yas pa yi ni sbom po yis// mngon sum rdo rjer byas pa yis//

bcug nas bde ba spyod bya zhing// skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya// de 'di sangs rgyas thamasacad kyis// dgyes par gyes mchog sgrub pa po// 'di ni bcanges pa tsam gyis kyang// yang dag rdo rje dgyes pa/

'thob// rab dgyes bde mchog longs spyod kyi// btsun mo dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// g.yas na mtshan mas drang byas te// lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag par bya// rdo rje 'a dod ma lcags kyu ste// rdo rje 'dod byed

tsha3 btsun mo yi// dang bor 'dren pa de nyid gzhab// thamar ha ra thig ler bya// rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed// mer na dbus su grwa bar bya// 'di yis snying khar byas pa yis// de bzhin gshags pa bde mchog
'gro phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// lus 'dis tsho 'di 'grub par 'gyur// rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag ldan// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing// rdo rje'agying la sogs spyod pas//
