rnal 'byor 'di na bcings pa yis// rab dgyes la sogs ma lus pa// rab dgyes ro la bsgyings ma yis// skad cig nyid du 'dren par 'gyur// de bzhin sbom po'i rtse mor sbyar// snying rje chen po der/

bzhag pa// skalakhachen po rdo rje spyan// de nyid don kun bstan byed ma// 'di ni yang dag bcangs pa yis// rdo rje rtag pa'i spyan du 'gyur// yod dang med pa rnam spangs pa// dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur//

rdo rje'i thal mo bstan bya ste// khro mo rtse mo rlum po yis// mthon por mtshan dang 'dra byas te// sbom por rdo rje bstan pa che// de 'di bcom ldan 'das ma mchog/ rdo rje pad+mo'i bde 'thob byed// rnal 'byor
'di ni bcings pa yis// sdus pa chen po'i dgyes pa 'thob// de nas lha mo chen mo dag/ spros pa che bas gar mdzad tsang// rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la// 'dud dang bcas pas phyag byas te// chos kyi ye
ga thabs gnas nas// de nyid chos kyi gsol ba 'debs// chos kyi phyag rgya ba de bache// rdo rje bcom ldan bshad du gsol// sgrub pa pos nor ba bsgrims na// gang gis lhan 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis
myur du byin brlabs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub ste// bde byed gnyis kyi spyi che ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas 'jug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha mo thams cad kyis gsol
ba btab pa mkhyen nas// nyid kyi sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs sbas pa las chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshod 'ang phyung ngo////bcu gsum bdag 'di 'dren pa ste// thig le lhar na yang dag
ldan tha mar ha ra thig ler gnas// rab tu dgyes pa rdo rje dbyes// sAng khar phyag rgya 'di byas nas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byed cing// spyod dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur te// rnal

'byor bde pa chen por 'gro// de bzhin 'dren pa thog mar bya// rdo rje 'dod pa kyo ba mchog/ ha ra thig le yang dag ldan// chaganyis gsum pa sbyar byas pa/ 'di ni snying khar bzhag byas na// bde bar nam

mkhar 'gro 'gyur te// bde ba shin tu rtag pa yi// 'di yis mchog tu dngos grub bo// 'dren pa de nyid thog maragazhag/ ltos ltos zhes pa hUM dang ldan// skal ba chen po rdo rje can// dbus su bskul bas 'grub

par 'gyur// 'phrul gyi spyan lnga nor che pa// 'di yis rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te//rdo rje byang chub dgyes pa che// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// dang por 'dren pa de nyid gzhag/ tha mar ha ra thig

ler bya//rdor gyis ba de 'thob byed// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// 'di yis snying khar byas pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa 'di mchog 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// lus 'dir 'ad tsho 'grub par

ba 'gyur rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag zhon// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing// rdo rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas// bcom ldan 'dod ma 'grub par 'gyur// chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi ngon gyi ye shes kyi
phyag rgyu'o////de nas bcom ldan sbyor ba che// thog ma tha ma med pa mchog/ gdug pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// rdo rje khro bor de 'gyur ro/ mdun du thog ma'i lha nyid du// rdo rje hU~M mdzad
nyim 'bar// khyim bcu gnyis gzi brjid che// me 'bar rab tu 'bar bar ldan// 'khor gyi 'khor lo de dag kun// dur khrod kyi ni rgyan mchog gis// brgyan te gdug pa'i tshogs rnams la// de ni yang dag
rol ba mdzad// lo chen mchog 'dul phyag rgya 'di// sngagasani rang gi sang khar bsgom// khro mo'i bu mos mdun du bskor// khro mo chen mo de 'grub bo// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad rnams/ tshwa byas

myur du brgyab par 'gyur// de dag gdug pa gdug pa che// 'jigs shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jig/ skyobs shig skyobs shage nyes smra zhing// rdzordzogatso la dran par byed// phyag rgya 'di ni mnyam par gzhag/
'gro ba thams cad dpong bya ste// las mchog thams cad sgrub pa pos// dgra yi rnams na gzhig par bya// sbyor dang ldan pas 'bum bzlas te// lasa rnams thams cad byed pa na// gdon mi za bar kun
'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' ng sgrub par nus// zhes pa com ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// de nas sangs rgyas tshe de
dag/ sangs rgyas nyid skyes thams cad mchog/ gzugs ma rnal 'byor ma thams cad// rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo' tshogs// phan tshun bde ba ldan pa yi// dga' bas 'khor rnams la phag
'gyur te// rang gi bde byed rgyas par 'brel// skal ba chen mo rtson par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams la yang
dang yang du gzigs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig ma'i snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do// oM badzra ang sha/ du ru du ru/ a h+phe hika bik+kAny+tsa san+nAmArAd/

tsakra sany+tsaya// badzra angaH sha hUM phaT// 'di yi phyag rgya rdo rje yi// bcing ba gnyis na dam byas te// rdo rje khro mo dgrol bar bya// rdo rje gro ba rab sbyar ba// rdo rje'i kyo ba zhis bya 'o// 'grodang ri de sams tsan rnams//

ka phyag rgya 'di yis kun bkug ste// 'dod pas 'gying ba'i yade rtag rnams// mi yi bu mo smos ci dgos// rdo rje bcangs pa mnyam bzhag ste// g.yon gyi steng du de bzhin gzhag// dbus su sbom mo gzhag par

@# bya/ rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che// rdo rje bcang ba bsdam byas te// rdo rje spom mo rtse mo sang// bdag ni rdo rje zhes bsgom zhache// bcing pa de ni dgrol bar bya// de nyid bcang ba dam byas te// dbang dang chung ngu'i rtsa ba'i

mtshams// rdo rje spomamo nus byas te// rab dgyes bdag nyid bskyod par s+ya// de las rdo rje mchog ya 'asabaskyang// mdung pa'i tshul du sbyar bar bya// bzhugs pa dang ni 'dren pa'i mchog/ 'di yis thams cad dngos grub

tsa pas rnal 'byo ra phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// dwangs te bcug nas bcing byas te// dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya// de nas de dag thams cad drangs bshug bcings ngal 'a pa bskyed na rang gi rab tu dgyes pa'i

bde ba chen pos rang gi rgyal srid rjes su skyong zhing rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul chen po// dga' byed zla gsang thag le yi// rab dgyes bdag nyang gsang pa 'di// sams dpa' chen po[h]

khyod kyis zung// de nas gdan las myur bzhengs te// thal mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas// chos kyi ngo bor tshig smras pa// bde ba chen po bdag gis blangs// rang bde longs spyod gar byas te// rdo rje tshe yis 'di

skad smras// rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che// sna tshogs pad+mo gar rang byed// de nas pha rol phyin de kun// rab dgyesalos spyod gar byed cing// bde byed chen po'i bdag de che// legs pa zhes pa spyan byed de//
lags so legs so bde ba che// legs so legs so ye shes che// legs so legs so sna tshogs che// leb so legs so dgyes pa che// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i thugs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
nas pha rol tu phyin ma'i 'khor chen mo de dag mngon par dga' bar gyur to// zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so//
tsa ba rin chen bzang bos bsgyur ba'o// gsung rab don rtogs slob dpon gyis// lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la// carigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis// sems can sems bde thob par smon//
rgya gar skad du/sarba ta thA ga ta ta tAsaM gra ha nAmam pAyAn sU tra/bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re khon nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
bam po dang po////sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi rdo rje byin gyi rlabs dang/ a tshag gi yo shas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad dang ldan par 5[% ]na// ba/si pa mas da kyi ran pa che'i dbu rgyan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal
po'i dbang bskur ba mngar b.res pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes/ rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam
pa nyid thugs su chud cing thams cad kyi dgos pa mdzad pa nyid kyis sems tsa kyi lam la 'dusang lus pa sad pa smras cad kyi re pa thams cad dang bas su skom ni 'aprin las mdzad pa/ thugs
rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag par dus gsum du bzhugs shing sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs thams cad rdo rje lta bur gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhug

shing bsngags bstod pa// nor bu dang nor bu rin po che chen pos smras pa/ kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu btab/sa pa/ dAr dang/ 'phan dang/ me tog gi'aphreng ba dang/ rnga ma dang/ du ba dang/ dra ba phyed pa dang//
zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i 'og man gyi lha'i rgyal bo'i gnas na bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' byed ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang/ kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang/ nam mkha'i sIr podang/ rdo rje khu tshur dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'o khor lo bskor ba dang/ nam mkha'i
mdzod dang/ bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa la sogs pa byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang/ gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'ang 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med pa de dag gi skus kyang til gyi gang bu bzhin du kun tu gang bar snang ngo/ de
bzhinagshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'di tshad med grangs med pa rnams snang ngo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na'ang chos kyi tshul 'di nyid 'chad do// de nas
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas rdo rje'i dbyangs thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ya shes sems rapal/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs las byung
ba'i ya shas kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyis thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dbang du gyur pa/ nam mkha'i dbya[G]
thams cad du smos pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi yi shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas byang chub par gyur cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasaM cad kyi ngo bo nyid ngag par nyid kyis chos thams cad
// kyi rang bzhin dug par thugs su chud pa/nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad du yang drag par ston pa/ mkhyen pa sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus ba med pa'i/

khams rnams 'arul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'anod cing don yod par mdzad pa nyid kyis thamA car drang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i 'phrin las sna tshogs
mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamu cad kyis byang chub chen porasems dpa'i brtan pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i

a shes kyi dbang phyug dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi leg so zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbang chen por bskur ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyima'i

dkyil 'khor dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i dpal dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhan pa chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

kyi dag pa'i tshes chen po dang/ de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chad pa dang/de bzhin/

gshegs pa thamA cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamAcad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin tu brtan po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing bskyang ba'i ro[}]

[n]rje gnod sbyin dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pas shes rnams so// kun bzang rab tu gdon mi za// khadud dang rab dgyes gtso bo dang/ mkha' skyes shin tu/

gzachen dang//rin chen dbal dang 'dzum ba che// kun tu gzigs pa'i dbang chen dang//'jam dpal dkyil 'khor thams cad dang// mi gsung ba dang thams cad las// brtson 'grus ma rungs dam du bzung//rdo rje lcags kyu mnga' ba zhu/

dang//rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum// pad+maral gri 'khor lo gsung//las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcas// thog ma tha ma med cing zhing// ma rungs khro ba bzod pa che// gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan// gzi chen dpa' bo khyab
bdag che// u ma'i bdag po skyed dgu'amagon// gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che// 'jig rten skyon dang mkha' dang sa// 'jigerten gsum dang khams gsum dang// 'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad//

thams cad gu lang tshangs pa dang// 'khor dang mya ngan 'da' dang rtag/ yang dag 'tsho dang mchod pa che// sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che// srid gsum rtag pa'i ng de bzhin no// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bde sbyong dang//
ba de dmagon po rab 'dul mdzad// rdo rje gtso dang sa rab mchog/ ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam thar dang// spyod dang de bzhin gshegs pa kun// sangs rgya sa don dang

sangs rgyas thugs// byang chub kun dang bla na med// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal dang mgon// rang 'byung gzungs dang dran pa dang// sems dpa' che dang phyag rgya che// ting 'dzin sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad//
yang dag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// sems can rtag ngon rtogs mdzad pa// sdong po chen po nag po che// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// thabs chen dang na mchog chen mchog/ kun gyi mchog
[+ ]dang gnas dbang po// bcom ldan 'das byang chub chen po'i phyogs byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tubazang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa/
thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dpar na til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpal na po don

tsha thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa gang na ba der gshegs te// byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu/

khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nga kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing// ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam/ de nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul bas ma g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhed
te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas 'ang yang ces gso to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi bka' stsal par/
[nz]/gsol de skad ces gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtogs cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin/
gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar blos gang sgrub par gyis shig/ o tsate pra ti lo tshu ka ro mo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying kha na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gad ri nga bdag gis rtogs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/
rigs kyi bu sems 'di na rang bzhan gyis 'od gsal bas nade ni ji ltar sbyangs pa de lta bur 'gyur te/ dparan ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang
bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ oM bo d+hi tsit+te ut+ta da ya mi/ zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis yang byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen bo de
byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas byang chub sams dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' byang chub kyi sems bskyong nas 'di skad ces gsol to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta
bur mthong ba gang lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po
[sg ]/khyod kyis mngon du gyur kyis/ de legs par sgrubs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'dis rang gi snying

[A]kha'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyings su soms shig/ oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ byang chub sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje bdag
wA gis mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis brtan par gyis shig//so badzra At+ma koT haM/
de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par bzhugs pa'i de 'azhani gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thamA

cad kyi ban gyi rlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dbang chen po don thams cad grub pa de la rdo rje'i dbyangs zhes

bya ba'i ri rje ming gi dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku na bdag lags par mthong lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa mas dpa' chen po de lta bas na sems dpa' rdo rje de rnam pa thams cad kyi

mchog dang ldan pa'i sems sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis dudakar zlos la sgom shag/ ma ya wA sam+b+ha ta thA gasta zla a haM/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang///
byung chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i dbyings kyis bdag nyid de bzhani gshegs par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyagakhyas te bos nas 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis rlobs pa mngon du phyogs par byang sma[']rtan par mdzod cig// de nas de skad ces gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gsheg

pa thams cad de khazhani gshegs pa rdo rjer byings kyi sems da pa'i rdo rje der bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyangs kyis skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshon de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzo gas par sangs rgyas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi la shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi yo shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis dag go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ya shos kyi 'byung
gnas su gyur pa'i de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems
dpa'i rdo rje las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ya shas bsgyur/ nam mkha'i snying po'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur/ kun/

chu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po chos kyi ye shes na bskyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas ri rab kyi rtse mo gang na ba dang/ khang bu rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu'i
rin po che'i las byas pa gang na ba de zla kanags te byon rnams/ de bzhin gshegaja patsho che nga'angs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadra
kyi seng ge 'i gdan la zhal kun tu bstan te bzhag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ren chen 'byung ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzig
kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag nyid kyis rgyun gyis b+hArabs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas mnyam pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhugs so// de nas bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring bo ma lon pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin
[c]/gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi debang po'i chos kyi ye shes
dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad nyid kyis gdonami za zhin thogs pa med par ston pa/ dgongs pa rdzogs pa/ yid la re ba yongs su
rdzogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang kho zhes bya ba'i dmatshig las

byung ba sems dpa'i phyin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshags la thams

cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byur po// o'adzrasatwA/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams rud kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de nyid do// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur

nas khyung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogs su 'khor ro// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snar mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su zhugs so// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin na shin tu brten pa nyid dang/ de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba can rtse mo lnga pa/ de bzhin gshegs/

pazams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rjede las rdo rje lta bu'i 'od

zer gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed pa rnams byung ngo// rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shani puphru

mo snyedakyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ chos kyi dpunges kun tu khyad pa thams cad dang/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byamA rgya mtsho'i sprin

tsha thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshog
ga grub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang/ bdud thams cad 'dul kha dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa
nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ sride sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus l med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing thams cad la phan pa

ta ]dang bde bar mdzad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang/ mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub thob pa la sogs pade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdza 'phrul dang cho 'phrul/
rnams kyi bar du bstan nas/ rdo rje sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin na kun tu bzang po yin pa dang/ shin tu brtan pa ngon pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod ngo/ (e ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i/ kun tu bzang po sems dpa' brtan/ de
ni brtan phyir lus min yang//sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang bo'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi spyan sngan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshag rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca da kyi tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
ba dang/ sems can gyi don bya ba dang/ thabs chen po dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ ye shes chen po'i dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang
thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang/ thams cad kyi bde pa dang yid bde ba myong ba bya ba nas/ ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ mngon par shes pa/

rnams bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs par 'grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de de bzhin gshegs pa thamA

cang kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang dar dpyangs kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje de de'i lag par

byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lag na rdo rje lag na rdo rje zhes ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pa rdo

rje bsgyungs par bzhugs/ phyag g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar gsor zhang 'phan pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi// rdo rje bla na med pa 'di/ bdag lte

tshag+ha bdag gi lag tu byin// rdo rje la na rdo rje gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpal chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las 'byung pa'i sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sAng po 'di rang gi bas ka nas phyung

ngo badzrarA dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyidi re/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyilcags kyu chen por gyur te gyur nas/
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/ de nas rdo tsho lcags

kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs/

rgyas thams cad kyi rje 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzan ni shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po nyid yin pa dang/ shin tu brten pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i

chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a ma'i rdo rje las byung ba'i// lcags kyu nges pa'i rgyal po dag/ gang

phyir kun tu sangs rgyas khyab//thub phyir kun nas sbyan 'drenano// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhani/
gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod tsare bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad stan 'dren pa'i de/
rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad na'adren pa'i dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa/

thams cad dgug pa dang/ thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba'i bya nigyi rlabs rim pa'i dngos grub kyis bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje lcags kyu de byang chub

sems dpa'i gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po de'i lag par de bzhin du byon no// de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo/

rdza 'gugs pa rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yis// ye shes bla na med pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi den

grub phyir// kun nas spyan drangs dam pa 'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig las 'byung ba'i samasadapa'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cang mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra rA
ga/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'din pecom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi mdar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i mda' chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje mda'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas thoms

cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin na shin tu bdud byed pa nyid dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyire gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud
ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'ang ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag gi rang bzhin dag/ rang byung ba dag dgyes byed na// 'dod
chags bral rnams dag bya'i phyi/'dod chags kyis nu'adul bar byed// de nas byang chub sams dpa' chen po bdud kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste// de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas ya nga bka'anod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i byin gyi
rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdung kyi rdo rje' dim tshag dang// sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mgu ]
par bya ba dang// thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras 'u de/
[+ ]dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu rdo rje'i gzhu
[>zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed par
ched du brjod pa 'ang ched du brjod ngo// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// ye shes 'di ni dra ma med/'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom// bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo// badzra sA d+hu/ de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni recom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyadi de legs so zhes bya bar gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snanga mdzad kyi thugs
su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyangs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams sbams cad kyijul
shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang mo

'phrul rnams byas nas// rdo rjesams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i lus su gyur
te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa'id ched du brjod do// e ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyi/ legs sbyin nang na bdag mchog pas// rnam
rtog bral pa de dag gi/ nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste// de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i de rje zhes bya ba'i ting
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tudagyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang// sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can thams
car mgu bar bya ba dang/ thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i ro bla na med pa grub pa dam pa thob pa'i bar du 'gras du de
dag gi phyir/ rdo rje dgyes pa de byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya
ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgyes pas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par

byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi legs sbyin pa// 'di ni rab tu 'jug byed pas// rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed// lha rdzas dgyes pa spel ba go/ byang chub kyi sams chen po
dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'idam tshig dang de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes dang// dgyes pa chen po dang// 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi dmachig chen po'i sems dpa' 'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i de

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'dirang gi blugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra ratwA/

de nas de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi shugs las byung ma thag pa 'di na rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi yi shes shan tu rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir bcom ldan
'das rdo rje 'dzan pa de nyid de/ nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ngo// nam mkhar thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas thams
cad nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi nam mkha'i dbyangs de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhug
nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nishani tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir/ yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam
gyi rdo rjerin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas de bzhun gshegs pa'i phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas 'o rjerin po cher dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shan tu phra mo dang/
mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyuranas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrulagu tsho 'phrula rnams
'jig rten gyi khamasathams cad du byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shin tu byung ba dang rab tu brten pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te//
byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i skur gyuranas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o/
chags med rgyal ba yang// khams gsum bdag por dgongs pas na// rdo rje rin chen dam ba yi// dbang ga mchog ni bdag yin no// de nas byang chub sams dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom
ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang dag pa'i bka' nod tsang bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
'tsho kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tor nge 'dzinol goms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya pa'i
dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i don thams cad yongs su grub par bya ba dang/ thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi don phun sum tshogs pa grub pa thob 'ar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po rdo rjerin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar rdo rje ran po che'i myu gu'i dbang gis

dbang bskur nas lag turdo rje nor bu de byon no// de nas de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying bo zhes bya ba'i rdo rjeange gi dbang gse rab ng bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'

chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo rje'i nor bu de rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi sems dpa'i dbyangs// dbang bskur de ni khedag yin te/
bdag gi lag tu phyin pas na// rin chen la na rAnechen gzhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sams dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po

che'i byin gyi rlangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi

thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra te ja/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni recom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ nyi ma'i dekyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bcom ldan

'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugasasu zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyabs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las 'jig

rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer dgyes pa la sogs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cang kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gzi brjid che ba nyid dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid/
chen po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sems can khams kun// snang byengagazi brjid de
medu bdag/ gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa i/'dren pa rnams dang sbyor byed pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste// de bzhin
gshegs bathams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil
'khor gyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams

kyi gzi 'dzad mtshungs pa med pa dang/ thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi 'od 'thob cing dngos grub ram pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/

rdo rje nyi ma de byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i 'od rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur

ro// de nas khyang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba rdo rje nyi ma des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi sar ba 'di//
ba mi shes mun nag 'dzoms byed pas// shin tu phra rdul ji snyed pa'i/ nyi ma'i 'od bas shin tulcag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dbal gyi dam tshig las

byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dam tshag ces bya ba'i de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra ke tu/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rgyal

mtshan kha dog dang/ gzugs dang/ rgyan dang/ dbyibs sna tshogs par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'dasa rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyuranas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbya2

su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhani gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sbyang ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rin po che chen po'i dbal
nyide dar shan tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyuranas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dbal gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la
gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o don kun grub pa dang/ dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi/ don rnams thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// 'dra mad dpal ni
bdag yan no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i debal kyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnA
nas yang bka'anod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin rlabs rdo rjezhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas/de

khabazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan slong ba'i dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa mong pa rnams kyi re ba thams tsang yongs su bskang bar

khya ba dang/ thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don chen po'i dngos grub dam pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan de byang chub

ba sems dpa' chen po rin Do che'i dbal re'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas ng bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i mar gi dbang gis dbang bskuraro// de

nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis rdo rje rgyal mtshan des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor du bcug nas ched du brjod pa 'di chod
du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan 'di// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu bar byed pa'i dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba rane po che'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i dam tshig ces khya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra has/ de nas de bzhin gshegs po thams
cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzan pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi 'dzum par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar
zhugs te gtsug tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul gan tu phra mo
dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshags pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhAn gshegs pa zims cad kyi rmad du byung ba la sogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smyu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas

rdo rje sems dpa 'iting nge 'dzin ni rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gtsug tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu
mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'diched du brjod do// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag rnams kyi
sangs rgyas don la rab sbyor phyir// e ma'o 'angag ni kun mchog gi/ bzhad ched rmad du byung chen yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang bo'i lus bcom
wA ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka'anod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi

khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang po blan med pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes dang

mngon par shes pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de lag tu rdo rje 'dzum pa de de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thamA

cad kyis rdo rje dga' ba rdo rje dga' ba zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dga' bas rdo rje 'dzum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes

par byed tsare ched du brjod pa 'dached du brjod do// 'di de sas rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad du byung sbyong ston pa po// dgyes chen byed pa'i ye shes te// gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus// dbang bskur ba
chen po dang/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba dang/ sems dpa' chen po'i don dang/ dgyes pa chen po dang/ 'di bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba chen po'i sems dpa' 'o// de

nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu sbyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzani la snyoms par zhugs na//

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po de rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra d+harma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs lA

khyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzazhi pa de nyid de/ ro rjesams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni reng bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer

de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gyur to// chos kyi dbyings re dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su

zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshod tsam gyi rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje pad+ma'i dbyibs de
las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rkyal shan tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ashes
dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas/ rdo rje sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shanitu kun
tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yin pa nyade dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sa ma'o rang byung gdod nas dag/ dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te// gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos
rnams l// rnam par dag pa dmigasaM par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyugs las byung ste// de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cir bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzan mnyam pa nyid kyi
ye shes dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i dam tshag dang/ sems can gyi khamA ma lus shing lus la
mad pa rnams kyis bdag dang gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba dang/ thams cad kyis yid bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes dang mngon par shA
pa drug thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dram pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

chos kyi sku'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu rdo rje pad+mo de byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i spyan rdo rje'i spyan zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang

chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyi rdo rje'i pad+mo'i 'dab ma kha 'byeng pas 'dod chags rnam par dag cing ma chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du gzigs shang ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod ngo// sangs rgyas
kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// de kho na nyidi rtogs pa 'di// bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// chos la chos ni gnas par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po
'jam dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i dam
tshig ces bya ba re bzhin bshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra tI lta/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ]
ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzan pa de nyid de/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyi ral grir gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres pa
gyur nas/ rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thamA cad kyi rdul gne tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i

bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la sogs pa rang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smra 'phrula rnams byas te/ rdo rje sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin
tu'ajam pa'i dpal yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la
gnas nas cher du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'jam dbyangs bdag na yin par dgongs// gang phyir shes rab gzugs med kyang// dbyangs nyid du dmigs pa

ka yani// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogasakyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka'

nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad gcad pa dang/ thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde

ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i ral gri de byang chub sems

dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lngams cad kyis rdo rje'i blo rdo rje'i blo zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'

chen po rdo rje'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ral gri des 'debs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// dgra
rnams thams cad gcod byed cing// sdig pa thams cad 'dzoms pa'i mchog/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor

lo skor ba'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dmatshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying

po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo// badzra he tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byur ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje 'khor lor gyur te byung nas/
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/

de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtsal shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku rnams byung ste/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/
ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin na sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
ba yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sams bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par

snang mdzad kyi phugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// rdo rjedum pa chos can gyi// e ma'o rdo rje 'khor lo bdag/gang phyir sems bskyang tsam gyis kyang// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tuchos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sku de bcom ldan 'dasakyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par 'jug pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang/ tham
cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dam pa grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje 'khor lo de byang

chub sems dpa' chen po sams bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhun gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes rdo rje'amang gi
dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sams dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo rje 'khor lo des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog cing ched du brjod
pa bde ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos rnams thams cad rnam par sbyong// phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang// byang chub snying po yin par dgongs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma gsung ba'i dam tshig las byung ba chos kyi phyon gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzlas
pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra ts+tsha pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni
bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi yi ger gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/
gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje bzlas pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rdzobazlas pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang
mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams su byar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshes nyang la sogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul la sogs pa byas
nas/ rdo rje sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzan ni shin tu tshogo ma yin pa dang gni tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu'adres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i skur gyur nas bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a ma'o rang byung rnams kyi gsang// ldem po ngag tu bdag ngagongs te// gang phyir dam pa'i chos
'chad pa// chig tu sas las rnam par bral// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cang bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsung ga rdo rje dmatshag las byung ba zhes bya
pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang/ yang

thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba nyir thob pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje bzlas pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig

ma yin pa de lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig rdo rje'i tshig ces rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdorje'i tshig gis de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i bzlas pa des yang dag par smra zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams capahUM// rdo rje'i bzlas par brjod pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams/

cad kyi// sngags 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ya shes dang// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i ye shes dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldog pa' sa shos dang/ 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sams dpa' chen po'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'awan las thams cad pazhes bya ba'i dmatshagi las byung ba las kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gsheg/
pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzrakarmade nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lasaThamU//

rtsad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shan du rtogs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de 'di nga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin lA

t+tA kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'dzeg rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi
dbyibs lta bur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs ma lus pa de'ang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad mnyam pa'i

tshad tsam du gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs de lasakyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gzhes su gnas so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i dbazhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rjesams dpa'i ting nge 'dzanani de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las mtha' yas pa yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa/ rten pa'i phyir gtsag tu
'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas cher/

du brjod pa 'ang ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges// 'phrin las mang po kun bdag yin// sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub phyir// rdo rje lasan 'jug par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa'/
chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya pa'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas

nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i dematshigalas byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya ba la sogs pa gangon maza bar tshang med pa dang/ las kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing
lus pa med pa rnams kyi las thams cad grub pa dang/ thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'phrin las nyid dang/ ye shes dang/ mngon par

shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las zhes bya ba 'phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de'i lag tu las kyi rdo rje de de bzhin du byon no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje sna tshogs rdo tshe/

sna tshogs nas rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshog sazhes bya bas rdo rje de rang gi snying khar bzhag ste/ de bzhi ne gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las
la sbyor zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// las rnams thams cad byed du bcug/
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di ring gi shugs kanas phyung ngo// badzra raka/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ go cha brtan par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par song mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu'adres pa gyur
nas/ rdo rtego che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje gema'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la srung ba'i tshig rgyas pa la sogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i/
ting nge 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub dkar pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gtsug tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'ilus su gyur nas/ bcom

ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ e ma'o brtson 'grus gocha 'do// brtan pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag/ de ni brtan phyir lus man yang// rdo rje'i lus

su byed pa'i mchog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po thub bka' ba'i lus de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogasan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na gnas nias yang bka' nod cing bzhugs

par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegrwa pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam

tshig dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyang ba dang/ thams cad kyi bde ba dang yang bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku 'thob pa'i mchog

grub par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i go mde byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grub thub bka' ba'i lag tu de bzhin dubyin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisajo rje'i grogs po rdo rje'i
grogs po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i grogs po des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go chab skon zhing

ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byams pa'i go chadam pa ste// brtson 'grus brtan pas srung ba che// grogs po chen por brjod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de pazhin gshegs pa thamA

cad kyi thabs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// 'adzra yak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di/

ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de dang/ rdo rje ma ba'i mtshon cha chen por gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbugs su zhugs te gcig tu'adres par gyur nas rdo rje mche ba'i

dbyibs su gyur te byung nas phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung
ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni btung thams cad rab tu
'joms pa yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'drebs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rang tu'ajoms pa'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
kyi phugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o ba'agan sangs rgyas rnams// thugs rje can gyi thabs chen te// zhi yang sems can don du na// ma rungs par ni ston par 'gyur//
re nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus su bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil
'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs pa pagyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thamos cad kyi rab tu gtum pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs ba 'dul ba'i dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang/ thams cad kyi bde ba

dang yade bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po 'i ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnams thob cing/ dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje mche nga'i

mtshon cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'dzoms pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khro bo zhes rdo rje tshang gi dbang gis
@#// dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bo rdo rje mar pa'i mtshon cha de rang gi khar gzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsdigs shing ched du brjod pa 'di

ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rnon te// thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi bun gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku

dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bcing ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo// badzra san+ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma

thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin ga shugs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'angs rnam par snang mdzad kyi phrugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres

par gyuranas/ rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnamAkyi

subyung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes la sogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge

[4]0 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin tu btsangs pa dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya

pa'i skur gyur nas/ pacom ldan 'dasa rnam par snang mdzad kyi phugs su zhugs te ched dubarjod pa 'di ched du brjod ngo// e ma'o rab tu brtanabacings pa'i// dam tshig badrag ste brtan bdag nyid// bsam pa thams

cad bo grub phyir// grol ba rnams kyang 'ching bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshal/sa pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yar bkar nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'tshe ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya btsangs pa'i dam tshig dang/ sems can gyi khamA ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa tham

cad dang/ lha rnams kyi dgongs pa brtags pa dang/ grub pa thams cad dang/ thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang phyag rgya'i

dbang dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje btsanges pa de byang chung sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byon no// de nas de ngazhin gshegs pa

thu@#// khams cad kyis rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'chang zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya bcings pa chen ng bstan// sangs rgyas kun gyi myur grub phyir// dam tshig shin tu

k+Sha 'dang bar dka'// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang// brtson 'grus chen po'i ge mabartan pa dang// de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhani gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bgyi thabs chen po dang/ phyag rgya thams cad bcangs pa'i ya shes dang/ 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pathams cad kyi 'phrin las chen po sems dapa' bo////bam po gnyis pa/
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shas bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs/

tshal pa thams cad kyi yi shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// satA badzra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rdo rje'i 'od

zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyide do// 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shang tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdordzi'i debyibs

chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa

bdag/ gang phyir brtan pas lus med kyang// rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yani// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi yo she sa la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs bar bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshagi las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzin la snyom par

zhugs nas/ rdorje rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di mang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo//rat+na nga d+d+haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che'i 'od

zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnamA kyi
0na@#// skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shas la phyag rgyas btab nas cher yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rim+marin po

che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'ang ched 'arjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//rdo rje rin
chen bdag nyid grags// gang phyir phyag rgya thams cad kyi//dbang gi tshul ni brtan po yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal bosade bzhin gshegs pa

rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen las la shes la phyag rgyas btab par bya ba'i phyir// chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i khyen gyi

rlabs kyi ting nge 'a dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dam tshig ces bya bar rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo// d+hAmabadzra/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung

mthug tu paro'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// par 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshog
pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yi shes la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi roNi pado chen po'i
dbyibs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'diched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams kyi// chos kyi rdo rje gtsang
ma ngag/ gang phyir rang bzhina rnam dag pas// 'dod chags yin yang dri ma med// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das

kyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab par bya ba'i phyir/ las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi dam tshag las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dmatshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// karmub/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thamA

cad kyi shugs las 'di byung ma thag tulas thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyuranas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// las thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad kyi rdul gin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shosa rnams laphyag rgyas btab ste yang gcig tu 'dres nas/ 'jig rten gyi

khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshod tsam gyi thams cad du rtse mo bltas pa'i rdo rje chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched
dubarjod pa 'ang cheng du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las kyi rdo rje mang po dag/ gang phyiragacig kyang sems can khams// ma lus par ni las bzang byed// de bzhin gsheg

pa thams cad kyi nges shes kyi dam tshig dang/ dbang bskur ba chen po dang/ rdo rje chos nyid dang/ mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rnams so// de nas yang bcom ldan
T+Tha 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo 'di rang gi tshugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra lA s+ya/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyur gyuran byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa

de nyid do// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i rtse mo de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje'adzin
ma'i lus thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang/ gzugs dang/ mtshan ma dang/ spyod lam sna tshogs brgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thamA cad

bsdus bar gyur pa rje rje mas dpa'i lha mor gyuranas/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te chod dubarjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rang byung
0 rnams kyi ni// mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med de// gang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas// mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin

po che'i 'phrang ba'i dbang gi dmachig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra mA

le de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'du byung ma thag tu rin po che chen po'i phyag rgyur gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rinapo che'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten/

gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lham chen mo rdo rje 'phrang bar de bzhin du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rinachen byung

ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nias ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a ma'o rAni chen mchod pa zhes// bdag dang 'dra bar ma drags pa med// gang phyir khams gsum rgyal

mchog kyang// rab tu mchod pa byeng bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu'i mchog gi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra gI taM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thal/

a cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje gyur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo'i

g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni kun garig pa'i/ rgyu mchog tshul gyis mchod pa yaMn// gang phyir sgra snyan 'dra ba yaM// mchod pa rnams

kyis mnyes par byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyomA par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gsheg

pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzranaMtra/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchong pa'i

cho ga rgyas par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de dag thams cad las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul

shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu'adres te/ rdo rje lha mo chen mo rdo rje gar gyi skur gyuranas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub parikyil

'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o mchod kun ngon mdzad pa'i mchod pa rgya chen bdag yin te// gang phyir rdo rje gar tshogs// sangs rgyas

marjod pa rab tu byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa'i dam tshig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrang ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu dang/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyir las bla na med pa rnams na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas

de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu chem pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog mo'i gretso mo 'di rang gi thub/sa ka nas phyung ngo// badzra d+hU pe/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'dra na bcom ldan

'das rdo radzan pa de nyid de/ bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sman gyi bkod pa rnam pa du mas rdo rje'i dbyangs thams cad du khyab par gyur te byung nas/ bdug pa'i mchod pa rgya mtsho de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas byung ste yang gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje bdug pa'i lha mo'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs
su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po che las byas pa'i grwar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//e ma bdag ni mchod pa che/
