rab tu sam ldan dage ba yi// gang phyir sems can dbab ldan pas// myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang

mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slang mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che'i rgyan gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge'adzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol

ma 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra puSh+Tha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ ma tog yams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas

jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyad par byed par gyur nas byung ngo/ me tog thams cad kyi mchod pas yan gyi bkod pa de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi chul shin tu phu mo dang mnyam pa'i de

bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje me tog gi lha mo'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang du brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang/ nor bu ngang/ rin po che las byas

ba'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'ang ched du brjod do// e ma'o me tog 'chong pa dag/ thams cad kyi ni rgyan byed de// gang phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs// rin chen nyid du myur du
'grub de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal pos pacom ldan 'das rnam pa snang mdzad kyaachod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams rung

la snang ra mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la so bcas par zhugs nas/ de pazhane ba/ sheka sa pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di deng gi spu gas ka nas byung ngo// badzra A lo ke/ de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka las 'ad byung ma thag tuthatsalas rung du snang la mchod pa thams khyod kyi bkod nas chos kyi da phyings thams cad khyab par byed pa gyuDa nas phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das
rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// thams cad du snyang ba'i mchod pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi sa yums cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu

'dres te/ lha mo rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su mang du brtsegs pa rtse mo jo tshong/ nor bu dang/ re pa tshe las byas pa bla na rgyu ba'i dkyil 'a khor la gnas nas ched du

brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o mchod pa'i mar me ni// rgya chen dge ba bdag yin te// gang phyir snang bas myur dunaM// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang thob/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa gdonami za bar grub pas bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegasas pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du sa snatshol pa'i dbar/ de bzhin ka gas pa thams khyad kyi rgyas mchod pa'i dam tshig las/
byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra gan+d+he/ de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thalag tu dri thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// dri thams

zhacad kyi mchod pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtul shan tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nasayang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i skur

tsha gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjor ngo// a

ny+nyo ma'o dri yi rang bzhin gyi// mchod pa'i lha rdzas yid 'ong bdag/ gang phyir de bzhani gshegs pa'i dro//lus rnams kun la 'byon par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa dang/ byang

tshagu chung chen po'i yan lag bsags pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kun tu snang ba dang/ tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam pa grol ba dang/ rnam pa grol batra ye shes
mthong ba'i dri rnams ni de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcagAkyu'i
zhigatsacar
phyung ngo// badzra aM ku shu/ de nas de bzhani ga yul [- ''' '' ]kha yug rgyu'i tshogs mang po thams cad du gyur nas phyung ste/ bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa pas chung kyi spus rgyung tshomakas de dag khas pa jil// ra spyod ma'i tha chas chung kyi tshul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhan gshegs pa'i
sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dAs te/ khyang chub sems daya chen po ro lcal kya zhes bya ba'i skur pa ra [$ ]ra ma na khong chu brtsigs pa rtse mo ro dza dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po che la

dus pa'i rdo rje sgo khang kenangan zla ba'i dkyil jakhor la gnas nas/ de pazhane la nasags pa las byang khyi de me gi da na chung tshe dbu tshong khang ched du pad+mod byed// nad ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang

dag spyan 'dren brtan pa bdag// gang phyir nga dag gis skyon blangs pa// dkyil 'khor kun la rten ra lu gyur// de nas rang s+sa rom ltaa 'das kyis de bzhin ba/ 1/ thas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa sems

dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'a dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jub pa'i gsol ka pa 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo/ dngadzra
pA sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byur ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan

'dus rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang bo de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnamA

byun gnas yang la cig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje rini yo

tsho'i sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i da kyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jug cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sa ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje zhags pa dam po bdag/ rdul phran/

zlo zhugs pa thams cad kyang// bdag gi slar yang drang bar bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo

tsha/ rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje lo ta 'ang rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo// badzra mo Ta/ de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byungam zag chu de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang bor gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de btsan

gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las bsdoms pa'i phyag rgyu mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tuphra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas gcig tu 'dres/

te byang chub sems dpa' chen po jo zla lcags sgrog ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtsa/ nor bu dang/ rin po che las byas pa'i dzaNi chos kyi sgo khang gi nang na zlakha'i dkyil 'kho

la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'chang zhing chen tshe brjod pa 'di che nga du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams car gyi// rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po bdag/ 'ching ba kun las grol ba rnams// sems

na don du 'ching bar 'dod// de nas su yang bcos ldan la dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dag pa ba zhes byas sa dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cang kyi phyal/ rgya thams cad kyi phran rang gang gi shugs ka nas byung ngo// dza A be 1/ de nas re ba zhin gshegs pa thamasarung kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das yo 'dzing nge nyid do// de bzhin kho/ shegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'itshogs thams cad las

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sku rgyu las byung ste ba pe/[“]du ra nas/ phying chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbab pa'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi'ang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi sgo khang gi nang na zla pa'i dkyil 'khoral gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'be ba shing

ched du brjod pa 'di nyid du brjod do// e ma'osangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje'abab pa brtan pa bdag/ kun gyi ngag tu gyur nasakyang// bran duyang na gyur pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba
dang/ gzhug pa dang/ 'chi ba dang/ dbang du bya ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'abazhin byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar byin gyis brlab/

tsha[& ]pa'i phyir jo rdzo'i sa gol gyi mtshan ma mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khas ba'i byin rlabs 'di gsungs so// badzra sa mA dza/de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de'i tshe de bzhin gshegA

ba thams cad sa gol gyi mtshan mas bskul ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byamA sAn gyi rgya cho'i thems cad nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa

tsha[= ]byang chub sams dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te 'dus nas khang bu brtse gas pa'i rtse mo rdoN+Dadang/ nor bu dang/ rin po che las byas pa gang na ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg sa ba

rnam par snang mdzod gang na ba der gshegs nas kyang ched du/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA de ban+d+hanaM ka ro ma/ zhes brjod do// rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci gar zlos shing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/

nabs la phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a ma'i byang chub sems dpa' yi// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ de bzhin gshegasala'i 'khor lo yi// dbus na de bzhin bzhugs la mdze//
de nas de skad ces gsungs ba dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang
bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phugs su zhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las rang rang

gi khyang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtse ba sa pa rtswa mo rdo rje dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po che las byas pa'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du

gyur nas snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs nas ched du brjor ba 'di nyid du brjod do// a ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rgya chen 'dod nas skyob mang// rdul phran thams cang dzanyid pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams
ni gcig tu gyur/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang/ thams cad la phan pa dang bde

kha brtan nas/ de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi yashes dang/ mngon par shes ba dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir/ rdorje dbyings kyi
dkyil 'khor chen po 'di byon gyisabarlabs par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rang gi rdo rje sems dpa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje chen po 'dzin pa la

ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ rdo rjesams dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang/ phyag 'tshal phyagan rdo rje la'o// jo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog/

rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegag/ don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la// rdo rje chags pa bde chen po// rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa// bdud kyi 'dong pa rdo rje che// phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhukhyod la'o//

rdo rje legs pa sems dpa'i mchog/ rdo rje mgu ba dga' ba che// rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod la// rdo rje rin chen rdo rje don// rdo rje nam mkha'i nor bu che// nam mkha' snying po rdo rje phyag/ phyag 'tshal

rdo rje snying khyod la// rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba// rorje nyim rgyal ba'i 'or/ tsho rje'i 'od zer gza brjid che// phyag 'tshal rdo rdzo'od lad la// samasacan don rab rdo rje'i dbal// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// rdo rje chen po

rin chen dga'// phyag 'tshalardo rje dbal khyod la// jo rje bzhad mo bzhad pa che// jorja 'dzus pa ngo mtshar che// dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la// rdo rje chos rab de nyid don// rdo rje khamyorab dga' byed/rdo rje

dbang rab rdo rje'i spyan// phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la// rdo rje rno ba theg pa che// rdo rje ral gri mtshon chan po// 'jam dpal rdo rje rab chub zab// phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo khyed la// rdo rje rgyu dang snying po med// rdo rje 'khor le tshul chen mo/

rab bskor rdo rje las byung ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying po la// rdo rje gsung ba rang rig mchog/ rdo rje zlas pa rab sbyar sbyan// mi gsung rdo rje mchog grub pa// phyag 'a tshul rdo rje gsung khyod la// rdo rje las rab rdo rje'i dka'//

las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro// rdo rje nges pa'i rgya che ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la// rdo rje srungs pa brtan pa che// u0f7a rdo rje go cha sra ba che// brtson 'grus mchog ni thub par dka'// phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la// rdo rje gnong

sbyin thabs chen po// rdo rje mche ba 'jig pa che// bdud 'joms rdo rje mi bzad ma// phyag 'tshalardo rje drag po la// rdo tsho mtshams sbyor rab sdung nyid// rdo rje 'chang ngar rab grol byed// rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog/ phyag 'tshal/

rdo rje khu tshur la// su zhig ming rnams 'chang ba ni// zhi ba rgyal po rtsa brgyad 'di// rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sogs// mchog rnams kun gyi ri dbang bskur// gang zhig yon tan ming rnams kyis//rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la

rtag tu dbyangs kyis bstod pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis// bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yin// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// tshul chen pa ni rgyas par mdzod// mgon/

po khyod la gsol bzhi// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yaM// cho ga mchog ni bshad par gsol//de nas bcos ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i

chig thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin kyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di shar ro// de nas yang/
dgag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyangs dang 'dra bsan// rdoljadabyangs zhes bgyi bar grags// sems dpa' che ba'i phyag rgya cher// sgom zhing byin gyisaslob

bgyid cing// dkyil 'khor gyi na rebus nyid du// ci rigs par ni mchis nas kyang// phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs// kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni// rdorje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas// bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor/

T+Tha gsar pa legs par bkal nas kyang// tshad dang mthun par mdzes pa yi// thig gis mkhas pas ci nus kyis// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab cing// gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang// rta babs bzhis mdzes bgyis la//

thog bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// gru yi phyogs ni thams cad drang// sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen spras par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo// de yi rim pa'i

nang zhugs la// 'khor lo 'dra ba'i rdo rje yi// thog gis yongs su bskor bar bya// ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa// rdo rje ka pa'i nang logs su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan pa// dbus su dkyil 'khor dbus su

ni sangs rgyas kyi na gzugs gzhag cing// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbusa rnams su// rin bzhin du nadam tshig mchog/ bzhi po legs par gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag
tu/ rdo rje gom pas song nas ni// mi g.yo ba la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag/ mi g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'dzan sogs mnyam par gzhag/ rin chen 'byung ba'i dkyil

'khor du/ rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par gzhag// tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje spyan sogasadag bar gzhag/ gdon mi za grub dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje rgya gram la sogs gzhag/ 'khor lo yin gyi rnamA

su// rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol grwa rnams su// sangs rgyas machod pa rnams kyang gzhug/ sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni// sgo srungs bzhi yang/ zhag par bgyi// dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs

su ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni// cho ga bzhin b.rungs bzhugs nas kyang// spo Ta'i phyag rgyas dbang par bgyi// de la Thams cad dpal

pa'i snying po 'di lags so// a bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs// ji lta bar na bka' nod do// de ltar bgyis na bdag ming brjod// de nas rdo rje bsgrub bgyi ba// rdo rje slob dpon sams dpa' yaM// rdo rje lcag
gyur cings nas ni// sa gol mang po brdab bgyis la// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi// de tshe sang sargyas thams cad ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la ya sogs bcas// dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams//

dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus gyur te// de nas rdo rjesams dpa' yi// phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// cung zad bar du brjod par bgyi// de nas 'dus pa dgyes pas na// de bzhin gshegs

rnams bstan par gyur// rdo rje sams dpa' rang sgrub pa//grogs po nyar du nye bar gnas// de nas sgo rnams thams cad du// lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas// las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis// dam tshig rnams
na gzhag par bgyi// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang// sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pa// de ltar sems dpa' chen po sgyur// dzawan+taM laM ho/zhes brjod cing// de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa/

sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar// spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bcug/ bcings nas de yi dbang du gyur// de nas bdag 'di chen po rnams// gsang po'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la// thams cad don kun grub pa'i phyir/

wA thams cad mdzod ces gsol bar bgyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bzhin du las bgyi'o// de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir ni rdo rje slob ma dkyil 'khor du bzhug pa la sol

pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mchis so// de la dang por ni gzhug pa lags te// sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba thams cad dngos grub mchog gi rgyu dang

wI/ 'bras bu nyid kyi slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhugs pa la stod du gyur pa dang snod du ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams som

can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa'i ng mchis te/ de dag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor dang/ bza' ba dang/

btung ba dang/ 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang/ dam tshig la ma dga' ba dang/ sngar spyad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du

bgyid cang zhugs pa rnams kyis bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang/ glu dang/ gad mo dang/ rtsed mo dang/ kha zas kyi spyod pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhani/

gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa la gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi/ de bzhunu gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du ra ba tham

cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ yang dag par bsdus par gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ rangs pa rnams 'byung bar byed pa de ni bslab pa'i gzhis 'jigs shing skra gnas ma 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ de

dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug pa kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba dam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba dang ying bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang/ ngan song gi rgyu thams cad du 'jug par kha

bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug tu rung ngo// bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin

dang shes rab kyi dngos grub dam pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tshol ba na/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa rnams kyis 'badacing nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang mchis te/ dag kyang

rdo rje dbyings kyi rakyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'i ng rnyed par dka' ba ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de la dang po kho nar zhig de bzhin gsheg

pa thams cad la phyag bzhi bgyi'o// de ni 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis rdo rje thal mo brkyang ste phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sam+ba ta thA ga ta pU dzo la sgyun ya At+manaM nir+ya ta yA mi/ sa=

tathA ga ta badzra satA ad+hi ti swA maM/ zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo snying khar bzhag ste dpral bas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM saN+Di ta thA ga ta pu dzal a b+hi kA ya At+tha naM nir+ya ta yA mi

saN+Di ta thA ga ta badzra rata a b+hi Shiny+tsamaM/ zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo skye bar sbyar te khas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ o saN+Datasku ga ta pU dza pra ban+tanA ya At+tanaM nir+ya ta yA mi sad+d+hA ta b+hA

ga ta badzrad+ham+ma pra ban+ta ya maM/ zhes barjod do// de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab so snying khar bzhag nas spyi bos phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sam+b+ha tathA gtu dzakarma Ne Ata naM nir+ya ta yA mi/

sadz+dza ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru hU~M/ zhes brjod do// de nas stod g.yogs gos dmar po gyon la gdong dmar pos dkris nas/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do// sa ma ya hUM/ de nas gung mo

gnyis kyis me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin du 'jug/ bcug la drang zhing snying po 'di brjod do// sa ma yA hUM/ de nas bcug ma thag tu 'di skad du sgo zhig/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/

ngas khyod la ye shes gang gas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa'i ng thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ dalta bu'i rdo rdzo'i yu shes bskyed par bya yis/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnamA

la ma zhig/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyisasems dapa'i rdo rje'iphyag kha nang du bstanapa dang phyir bstan pabacings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// 'di

ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshigayin gyis/ gal te 'ga'azhig la sbas naklad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang mna'i chu'i snying pos bsngags la slob ma de 'thung du gzhugago/ de la mna'i snying po

'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid na ring// khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs// gal te tshul de sku nani// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ o brjod ka tha/ de nas slob ma la 'di skad du sgo zhig/ deng phyin chad khyod kyi

phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di byosashig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so// khyod kyis nga kharas pa ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma sangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la/

'di skad dude bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces sos shig par bsgo'o// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa' rdo rjema'i phyag rgya

bcings la 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go/ 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste// rdo rje sams dpa' yin par grags// rdo rje ye shes bla mang ni// de ring nyid du 'bab par shog/ oM badzra A be sha so/ de nas khro bo'i phyag rgyabacings

la= sems dpa' rdo rjema'i phyag rgya mdud cing drangs la/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje tshig ci dga' bar brjod du gzhug go/ de bas babs te babs ma thag tulha'i ye shes skyes par 'gyur te/
bya// ye shes des pha rol gyi sems shes pa 'gyur ro// 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa
khams ca da la 'di'i sems brtan par 'gyur ro// de'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas gnod pa med par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' thams cad dang de bzhin/

gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byan gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad ni 'di'i mngon sum du gyur ro// rgyu med par sngon 'byung ba'i dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ rangs par byed pa'i bde ba thams

cad 'di la skyes bar 'gyur ro// bde ba de dag kha cig gis na ting nge 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur ro// kha cig gsan gzungs/ kha cig gis ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa nas/ kha cig gisan de bzhin gsheg

pa thams cad grub pa'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgyu de bcings la rang gi snying khar 'grol zhing snying po 'di'ang brjod du gzhug go/ tilAbadzrarIts+tshe ma b+ha ba/ shA shAto ma b+ha ba traM da yaM ma//a ritasin+d+ra

sa skya pra yatsa hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ de nas me tog gi 'phrang bde dkyil 'khor chen par dor zhing snying po 'di brjod du gzhug go/ pra tI badzra ho/ de nas gang la bab pa de 'a dis 'grub bo// de nas 'bring ba 'di
blangs te/ snying po 'dis de nyid kyi mgo bor bcings la 'di brjod du gzhug go/ o su ti grahasA maM satwA man+tA pa la/ do bcings pas sems dpa' chen po des bdag gir byas par gyur pas 'di myur du

'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas de ltar babs bzhin dug dong g.yogs bkrol te snying po 'di'ang brjod du gzhug go o badzrasatA sa yan+te/ skya tsagyur ga tan tadeb ra ud ga Na ya ti saNAk+ko/ badzra tsa a nutu ra nye

ba drilA ny+tsa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po rig bzhin du bstan to// dkyil 'khor chen bo mthong ma thag tu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyuralo rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'di'i

snying kha na gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyisabarlabs pa'i phyir 'od zer sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la sogs pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams kyang mthong

bar 'gyur ro// gal te na bcom ldan 'das rdo rjer dzin pa chen po nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig ston par 'gyur ro// de phyin chad don thams cad dang/ yid kyi 'dod pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang/ dngos grub/

thams cad nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dakyil 'khor chen po mthong ba'i 'og tu rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nangagi dro'i chudang snying po 'dis dbang

bskur bar bya'o// oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ de nas phyag rgya dang 'phreng ba gang yang rung ba zhig bcings la/ rang gi mtshan ma lag par bzhag pa 'di skad du rjod par byed/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbang// de ring khyed

nga bar bya// sangs rgyas kun [”]gyis ra ba grub phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long// oM badzra a d+hi pa ti swA a b+hi Shiny+tsami/ ti ba dzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas snying bo 'di rdo rje ming gi dbang gyi dbang bskur bdabyer/ o badzra satA

twaM a b+hi Shany+tsal/ badzra nA ma a b+ha nga ki ta/ kye rdo rje zhes gang gi ming gang brjod pa der kye zhes brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i chog rgyas pa'o// de nas ci khyod don/

'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dengos grub 'grub pa'i yashos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog grub pa'i la shes

ts+tshA kyi bar du gang 'dod ces smras la/ de nas gang gis gang 'dod pa de de la brjod par bya'o// de nas don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grul pa'i phyag rgya'i ya shas bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje'i dbyings na gter nusan// snying khar/

yongs su bsgom par bya// bsgoms nas la gnas pa yi// gter na de yis mthong bar 'gyur// rdorje'i dbyibs gcig bris nas kyang// nam mkha'i ngos su bsgom par bya// gang du ltung ba mthong ba dang// gter yod

par ni rnam par bshad// blo ldan mi yis rdo rje'i dbyibs// lce yi steng du bsgoms nas ni// 'di na yod ces bdag nyid kyis// bden pa nyid kyis spyabar 'gyur// bdag gi lus na thams cad la// rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgomA

nas ni// khabs par gyur nas gar gnas pa// gter na de na yod par bshad// de ngag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// o badzAn d+hi/ o rat+tAn d+haM/o rAmuni d+hi/ o karmani d+hi/ de nas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub

ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje da bab pa byas nas ni// tshul rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar// bsgoms na chuya steng na 'phar// 'gro ba'i dngos grub myur du thob// de ltar 'bab pa byas nas kyang// gang gi ga zug

su bdag gi lus// bsgoms par gyur na bdal nying na// sangs rgyas kyi na skur yong 'gyur// de ltar b dag la phab nas kyang// bdag nyid kyis ni nam mkhar// bsgoms par gyur na ji srid du// 'dod pa de srid che/

snang 'gyur// rdo rje dbab par bdag 'gyur nas// rdo rje yin par bdag bsgoms nas// gnas nas jasride ldang 'dod pa// de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag gi sAng po ni 'di dag yin no// badzra dz+wa la/ badzra rAya/ badzra

A kAkaM/ badzra ma hUM/ de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ zla ba'i dbyibs gcig bris nas na// steng gi mkha' la 'phags byas te// lag par rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje rig

pa 'dzin par 'gyur// zla ba'i dbyibs steng 'dug nas/ rdo rjerin chen rab bsgoms na// bdag nyid dag pa ji srid 'dod// de srid skad cig sngong bar 'gyur// cha ba'i de byibs kyi steng 'dug nas// rdo rje bdo lag gnas par//

bsgoms nas rdo rje'i snyan gyis// rig 'dzin go 'phang sbyin par byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas// las kyi rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin pa las// rig 'dzinakun tu myur bar 'gyur// de dag gi

snying po 'di dag yin no// badzad+ma ra/ra d+har/ d+hamajur/ kacha d+ha ra/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rjekun gyi ting nge 'dzin// nam mkha'i

dbyibs su bsams nas ni/ rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'bo/ de srid bar du ldang bar 'gyur// kun la dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bsgoms na bla mar de bzhin du// ye shes bsgrubs pas myur du na// mngon shes ldan thob/
khar 'gyur// rdo rje sams dpa'i 'dra bar ni// nam mkha' thams cad dran byas na/ bdag nyid dran pa brtan ldan zhing// rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur/ nam mkha'i dbyibs na thams cad du// sangs rgyas

gzugs su bsams nas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin las// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badzra badza/ shud+d+ha shuT+Ta/ satA satu/ bud+d+ha bud+d+haM/ thams cad kyi de ngos grub

T+ThA kyi yi shes 'grub pa rnams so// de nas gsang ba thub pa yin pas de la dang por mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste// oM sarba sa yan+te/ hri da las ma bste tan Shati ta ta kAt+taM/ A yAng ya ti pra yad i daM na yaM/ de nas 'di skad du

khyod kyis mna'i snying po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ khyod kyis gnod pa ma spangs pas dus ma yin par 'achi bar 'gyur ta lo/ lus 'di nyid kyis dmyal ba 'gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i

yashes bslab par bya'o// rdo rjadabab pa bskyod nas ni// mnyam par bzhag pas rdo rje yi// thal mo'i ngos kyis dal brdabs nas// ri bo yang ni dngang du 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo'i phyagargya ro/ rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo

rje bsdams pa'i dngos gnyis ni// dal gyi brdabs par sbyor ba yis// ri bor yang ni kun nas 'gugs// de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas ni// sor mo'i rtse mo mnyam bsdams na// rigs rgya yung hUM

rlag par 'gyur// phra mo dbab pa'i chog byas// sor mo thams cad mnyam gzhag cing// rdo rje bsdams la bkol ba ni// gnod pa kun las bsal ba'i mchog/ des na de dag gis gsang ba sgrub pa yis ke bud med dam ni

[ro/]sdus pa yi// bu ga'i nang du 'jug par bya// yid kyis de ltar zhugs nas kyang// de yi lus kun khyab par bsam// de la rdo rje thal mo'i snying bo ni 'di dag yin no// badzrapA sha/ badzra A be sha khadz+dzahan/ badzra har/ de nas/

gang po 'di byin la rang gi rigs kyi lha'i phyag rgya bzhis ye shes bslab par bya'o// chog 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste// khyod kyis phyag rgya la mi mkhas pa gzhan su'ang rung la// phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bstan par m byed

cagi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis phyag rgya bcing ba byas pan de'i tshe de de ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de dag the tshom du gyur te/ gnod pa

ma spangs pas myur ba nyid du dus byas nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa zhes bya bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// khyod nyid kyang ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sams napa' sgrub pa'i

phyagargya chen po'i yo shes bshad do// sems rtogs pa nas brtsams nas ni// rdo rje dbyings zhes rjod byed cing// sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgyur la// rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya'o// grub ma thag tu 'di yis ni// yi ge

tshe stobs natshod dang// kun tu 'gro ba nyir rnams 'thob// sangs rgyas 'grub par dka' ba min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i phyag rgya ro// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' chen bo sgrub

pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba yin te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// rdo rje bsgyunges par sams bskyed de// bsgyungs bcas rdo rje gsor byed na// rdo rje sams dpar bdag nyid 'gyur// 'dis ni kun tu 'gro ba dang// 'dod
pa kun bdag bde chen dang// rdzu 'phrul tsho stobs gzugs mchog rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// sku kasung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ji ltar ri mo'i rjes mthun zhing// mtshan ma'i/

phyag rgya rnams ldan par// sems dpa' chen po bsgrub par bya// de nas 'disan rtog kun gyi// sgrub pa dang ni dngos grub dang// grub pa rnams kyi las chen rnams// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// dang po na

re dus bzhin du// rang la byin gyis brlab la sogs// byas nas thams cad chasgrub bya ste// de yi 'og tu ci dgar bya// de la phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i che ga rgyas pa ni'adi pan te/ rdo rje babs pa byas nas ni//
phyag rgya chen po tshog bzhin// bcings nas de yi mdun phyogs su// sems dpa' chen po de sgom mo// ye shes sems dpa' da mthong nas// rang gi lus su bsgom par bya// bkug cing bcug pa gtsang ba ngang

dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badzrasatA a/ rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po'o// badzrasatA dri sh+ya ho// sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ba'i snying po'o// dza dzaM ho/

sems dpa' chen po spyan drang ba dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya ba rnams kyi snying po'o// sa ma ya hU~M zhes brjod pas// rgyab tu zla ba grubanas ni// der bdag sems dpa'i lus su sgom// sa

ma ya hUM a haM brjod// sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang// de ni bdag tu bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje'i bzlas pas sgrub par bya// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'o// gzhan yang sgrub pa chen po ni// dzats+tshA bi ho zhes brjong

la legs ba'i cho ga yar kyis// lus la sangs rgyus kun gzhug go/ de nas bla med rdo rje las// de dag ga na las bshad do// sangs rgyas rjes su dran grub na// sangs rgyas nyid du myur du 'gyur// sems dpa'i/

rdo rje ma gruban// phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje ma phyag rgyas// de ni rin chen kun dbang 'gyur// chos kyi rdo rdzogs ma grub na// sangs rgyas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// las kyi rdo rdzom phyag rgyas// rdo rje las

ni byed par 'gyur// sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dren pa'i chog yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan 'dren 'gyur// rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ches// sangs rgyas thamA

cad mnyes par byed// rdo rje legs pa'i chog yis// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/ sangs rgyas dbang bskur sbyin par byed// jo rdzogatswa brjidi cho ga yis// rdo rje gzi radzod

myur du gyur// rdo rje dpal 'dzin bsten pa yi// re ba rnams ni yongs su skong// rdordzo bzhi d pa'i tsho ga yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du bzhad// rdo rje chos kyi cho ga yis// rdo rje chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje rnon

po'i chog yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsten pas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor par 'gyur// rdo rje gsung ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas gsung gi grub ba thob// rdo rje las mchog

bsgrubs pas na// rdo rje'i las skyes myur du 'gyur// rdo rje'i go cha bskon pas// rdo rje sku ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgrub pas na// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam par 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs bsan// phyag rgya

thams cang 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin ma grub pas na// rdo rje chen po dga' ba thob// rdo rje 'phrang nga bcings pa na// sangs rgya kun gyi dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje glu yi cho ga yis// rdo rje glu ni

len par 'gyur// jo rdzogar ni bskyar ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis de mchod ro// rdo rje bdug pa'i cho ga yis// 'gro ba thams cad tshims pa nga byed// rdo rje'i ma tog sbyong byed pas// de ni 'gro ba dbang du byed// rdo rje snang ba'i

phyag rgya ches// rab mchog mig na sbyin par byed// rdo rje dri yi cho gas ni// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje lcags kyu drangs pas na// 'dren pa ku[A]gyi mchopa tu 'gyur// rdo tshe chags pa'i tshogs che// thamA

cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags sgrog sbyor bas ni// thams cad btsong bar nus par tshugyur// rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis/ ltams cad dbang por rab tu 'phyu pa// de nas de bzhin gshags pa glo ma sa ya kyi rdo rje'i

ngam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ya shos bshad de// thal mo dam du sbyar ba las// sor mo thams cang bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mor bka' stsang te// rab tu bstams phyir rdo rje bsdams// dam tshig phyag rgya thams da ra/ jo rdzi bsnga/

las byung bas na// de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yi// bsdams pa bla mar ngashad par bya// rdo rje bsdams pa ram byas la// gung mo myu gu ltar maTham sgrung/ dgung mo nang du gzhibs pa na// sangs rgyas pa kaM pa yin par

ka bshad// gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang// gung mo bdod+ma'adrab dgug/ sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni// de bzhin mdzub mo dbug pa lo// de nas de bzhin gshags pa ya/ rigs kyi dam tshig 'dzin yi/ phyag rgya ba tsangs

dang dngos grub dang// las rnams yang dag bshad par bya// zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyis// gung ma btang bar gyur pa yi// mthe bong mthe'u chung so sos sgrung// sems dpa'i rje rje bsgrung rdo rje// mdzub mo'i lcags

kyis mdzub mo sbyar// legs so sbyin pa 'dra ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa la bzhi po yi// phyag rgya mang po dngos grub 'di// mthe bong gzhubasal mdzub gnyis brtag/ rtsa sprad rdo rje rin chen yin// de nyid gung mo srin lag

dang mthe'u chung rnams ni nge snol brkyang ba'o// de la srin lag mthe'u chung gnyas// mnyam pa'i gshibs pa rgyal mtshan no// de nyid las ni bskor nas kyang// de me phyogs su gtag pa'o// mtha ngengaganyis ka

mnyam par ga shabs// mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug pa dang// de nyid gung mo sgang rtse mo// bkug pa rdo rje ral gra lo// de las srin lag mthe'u chung gshabs// 'khor pa yun nga ra ngashad pa yin// bsdams pas

mthe bong gnyis bkrol nga// bkan te kha phyogs gzhag pa'o// mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse sprublad bkyed// las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad// nge las mdzub mo gnyis gshabs pas// snying khar rkyang ste gzhag
pa 'o// mdzub mo rtse bcug che ba la// mthe'u chung gshangs pa brkyang ba lo// mthe'u chung gnyis par mthe bong gnyis// mdzang mo gnyis kyis btsir ba 'o// snying khar mthe bong bsnyams la gzhug/

rab tu brgya ba 'phrang ba 'o// thal mo sbyar te kha nas dbyung// gar las thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag/ rdo rje bcing ba thur du klugs// rang gi thal sbyar gun du gtor// mthe bong bsams te rab tu bsdams// rab tu
bya@#// brkyang nas byug pa 'o// mdzung mo gcig du bkag pa yang// mthe bong ga'is ni mdud pa por// ma bang mdzung mo gdu bur ngacing// rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mo bstsams// de nas 'di rnams/

sgrub ba shad de// rdo rje sgrub ba dam pa 'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi phyag rgya snying khar gzhag/ de nas kAng rnams las bshad pa// rdo rje'i lasan bla na med// rdo rje dbyings sogs phyag rgya no//

ngobazhin gshegs rnamos 'dus pa yin// dkyil 'khor skyong da na slob ma sum/ de ma thag tu phyin gyis rlog// se nga ge rdo rdzobacings pa na// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje lcags kyu bcings

pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad kun nas 'gugs// 'dod pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyang mnyes par byeng// jo ji dgar pas rgyal ba kun// legs so bsan skyod par byed// rin chen rdo rje bcu

pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyis de dbang bskur/ rdo rje nyi ma ngatsangs pas ni/ sa sa rgyus ku'u 'od/ pa gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtsham9 sam+bu gu ra bas// de la kun ya nga rdzogs par byed// rdo rdzong nang pa'i tshul byas na//

sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig bzhad// chos kyi rdo rje bcings pas na// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ rdo rje'i ral gri shogs pas ni/ nyon mongs thams cang des gcod do// rdo rje 'khor la brtan byas pas// dkyil

'khor gyi dpang por 'gyur// jo rje skya ba'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje'i ngang mchog 'grub par 'gyur/ las kyi rdo rje bcings pas ni// rdo rje'i las dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje go cha brtan byas pas// lus n rdo rje 'adra bar

'gyur// rdo rjemache ba'i mchog phyag rgyas// ma rungs bdud ni res 'joms so// rdo rje khu tshur ngamangacings pas// phyag rgya kun kyang dbang du 'gyur// 'dzul pas lha yi dga' ba rnams// 'phreng ba yis ni rgyan gyis/
rnams// gru yis rtag tu skad gsal ba// gor gyis mchod pa b.res par 'gyur// brtug pas 'jig rten tshim par byed// me tog gis ni mdzes pa'i gzugs/ mar mes snang ba dgo pa nying// dri yis lha rdzas 'dri

can du'o// rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste// jo rje zhags pas 'jug par byed// rdo rje lcags sgrog bcing pa ste// rdo rje dril bus lab pa bo// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/ badzra dzAnas nigs rgyas rnams//

rdo rje dbyings na brtan par byed// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// chos kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin// sa ma ya sto zhes brjod na// phyag rgya kun gyi dbang por 'gyur// A na ya su zhes brjod na// gdon ma sbra bar sangs rgyas

'gugs// a ho su khaM zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur// d+hu su rgyu zhes snas na// legs pa'i tshig gis de dga' byed/ su ma hata ta zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur thob/

rU ba byota zhes smras na// chos kyi gzi brjide nyid du 'gyur// arba pA lho zhes smras na// ro bkun kyang rdzogs par byang// ha ha hUM he zhes bgong na// sangs rgyas bzhad pa red par 'gyur// sarba ka ri zhes san// mi bya nga

yin Mms kyang sbyong// du kha ts+tshe da zhes smras na// des ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// but+tA bod+d+haMzhes sasan/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi brtab por 'gyur// pra tig d+ha zhes sam// sangs rgyas rnams ngang lhan cig sa/

[r/ ]@#/ su b+ha Shi tAzhes smras na// kun gyi dbang dang ldan par 'gyur// nar g+ha ya hU~M zhes smras na// de ma thag tu 'jigs med 'gyur// sha tra b+hak+Sha zhes smras// dgra rnams thams cad za bar 'agyur//

sarba sid+d+hi zhes smAsan// thams cad grub pa nyid du 'gyur// ma sA ra ti lha yi ngag// ru pa sho d+his gzugs bzang nyidi// go tA so so khya bde ba sbyin// saja pU dzamachod par byed// pra klu ngan yod bder 'gyur//

wApha lA ga mi 'bras buthob// su te dzA gri gzi brjid che// sugaN+Dagi dramachod can// skuya hadza 'gugs par byed// sA ya d+hIhUM 'jug par byed// ha skyo Na khaM 'tshang ba che// gyun a sa rab bskyod pa// de nas de rnam

kyi chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa dge ba bshad do// lce la rdo rje dge u0f8bpasgoms na// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bshad do// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te// mnyam

bar bzhag pas gnyis su bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// de nas bcings pa rab tu ngashang// g.yon pa rdo mdzub mo ni// g.yas pa'i nang du bslang bar bya// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste// sangs

rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o// mi g.yo ba yi sa reg pa// de bzhin rin chen sbyin pa lo// tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams// mdor bsdus
! rab tu bshang par bya// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i rnams// rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste// bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis// lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang// mda' 'phang ba yi tshul

gyis ni// legs so zhes pa snying khar gzhag/ dbang bskur ba na rdo rje gnyis// sAng khar te ma brtan par bya// g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya// g.yas pa yis ni g.yon pa

dbye// snying khar g.yon pa ral gri mdung/ mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang// rdo rdzogat+taMs ka khazhas dbyung// rdo rje gar bskor dkrol ba yis// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag/ go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang//

khu tshur la/nyisan mnan pa 'o// rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis su// bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par bya// 'phreng ba btsang dang kha nas dbyung// rdo rje ba/ra na bskor ba yin// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis// bdug pa/

la sogs de bzhin sbyin// sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi// phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa yi// mdzub mo lcags kyu ba tsang ba ni// mthe'u chung la ste lcags kyu che// mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub//

rgyab gnyis kyang ni bskams te mnan// nga nas 'di rnams sgrug bshad pa// rdo rjelas ni byed dang mnyam// rdo rje kun gyi rdo rjen// rang gi snying khar goms par bya// de nas 'di rnams las phyag rgya// rjoNi'i las
ni rnam pa mang// ye shes khu tshur bcings pas na// sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// mi g.yo ba yi bcings pas ni// yid ni g.yo ba med par 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yi// gzhan la

phan byed ldan pa 'gyur// dam chos 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// mi 'jigs mchog gis myur ba ni// sems can kun la ma 'jigasasbyin// rdo rje bsgying ba brtan byas la// rdzogs
rje sems dpa'i bde b.rer// rdo rje lcags kyu skad cig tu// de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang 'gugs// rdo rje mda' yis rdo rje yi// lha mo mnyes par bdag nyid byed// rdo rdzongaga' bas rgyal

ba kun// legs so zhes pas tshig kyang sbyin// rdo rje chen po nor bu sbyin// ston pa rnams kyis de dbang bskur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas ni// rdo rje nyi ma 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtshan sgreng bas na// des na rin

chen char 'babs// rdo rdzo'adzum pa bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas 'dra ba myur bzhad 'gyur// rdo rje ma tog bcanges pas ni// jo rje'i chos nyid de yis mthong// rdo rje ral gri brtan bcings na// des ni sdug

bsngal thams cad gcod// rdo rje khong la btsangam pas ni// chos kyi 'khong lo bskor bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi glog rnams na// rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis//

sangs rgyas kyang na dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje'i goms lus ngatsangs pas// rdo rje snying po sbyong par 'gyur// rdo rje'i mche ba btsungs pas ni// rdo rje nyid kyang bdag gis choms// ngo rje khu tshur kun 'phrog cing//

phyag rgya grub pa kun tu snyan// rdo rje 'dzin pas dga' ba sbyin// rdo rje 'phrang bas gzugs barmang ba// jordza glu yis glu snyan cing/ jo rje gar gyis ngabang du byed// ngadug pa yis ni ying tshim pa/ ]me tog gse ni rgyan rnam

ta mar mo yis ni ga=chen po/ rdo rje'i dris ni dri bar ldan// rdo rje lcags kyus 'gus pa ste// rdo rje zhags pas 'jug pa 'o// rdo rje lcags sgrog gis ni bcing// rdo rje dril dus bskyong pa 'o// de nas phyag rgya

thams cad kyi snga'i phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad de// de la thog ma nyid du rdo rje bcing ba'i sor mo snying khar brdab par bya ste snying po ni 'di brjod do// badzra d+hAn traT/ de nas phyag rgya bcings pa kun rang gi lus

rang ngag dang/ sams rdo rje'i dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig ga phyag rgya bcings la snying po brjod ngo// de nas yang dag par babs nas grogs po nyung du 'bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas

phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ste snying po 'di brjod do// ma hA sa ma ya satwA haM// 'dis phyag rgya thams cad 'grung ste// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i chog rgyas pa'o// de nas skya'i sgrub pa'i/

chog rgyas pa bshad de/ de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya bcings nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sams dpar bdag gi snying po 'dis sgom mo// sa ma yo hU~M// de nas rang phyag rgya'i samasaM dpar bdag bsgoms nas// sngags 'dis

byin gyis brlab bo// sa ma ya satA a d+hi ti su aM/ de nas bsgrub par bya'o// sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa bshad de// de la thog mar re zhig nor grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no/

an+d+ra sid+d+haM/ 'dis phyag rgya gru na nor rin po skyo bar 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje grub pora'adong na snying po 'di yin no// badzra sid+d+haM/ 'dis ci 'dod pa bzhin du rdo rje grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rig 'dzin gyi grub pa 'a dod

nasnying po 'di yin no// badzrab cu gsan+ti/ 'jis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rig 'dzin 'grub bo// de bzhin du dam pa grub par 'dong na rang gi phyag rgya'i snang bos sgrub bo// dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'o/ de nas
phyag rgya thams cad kyi sku rang gi lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems rdo rjer bya ba'i phyir cho ga rgyas pa ba shad de/ nam phyag rgyal byan gyis brlabs lhod par gyur tam/ bdag rang gtongabar 'dong

na de nas snying po 'di brtan par bya'o// oM badzra satwasamaya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tipadr-i Dom b+ha wa/ su to ma/ a nu rak+ta me b+hawa/ su po skyo ma zla wa/ sarba sid+d+hasu pra yats+tsha/ sats+tshak+khum

wAsu tsa me/ tsit+taM shwa ya/ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ sarbo ta b+hA ba/ ta badzra mA memuny+tsayadzra pA wa ma ha sa ma ya satwa A// 'dis ni mtshams me da byas pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus paM

tsa dang/ dam pa'i chos skyod pa dang/ nyes pa thams cad byas pa'i ng de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos rdo rje mas dpa' brtan par gyur pas tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub
thams cad dam/ dngos grung dom pa 'am/ rdo rje dngos grub bam/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bam/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi dngos grub kyi bar du myur du thob bo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad de// de la thog ma nyid du phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dngadzanyid

la nas snying po 'dis dgrol lo// o badz+dzasu/ de nas snying kha nas byung ba rin chen rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pas dbang bskur te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis bskor tshu bcings nas/

de bzhin du go cha'ang snying po 'dis btsang ngo// oM badzra rata a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sarba tu rA ma tri d+hi ku ru pa ra ka ca co nasaM/ de nas yang go cha'i mthar 'phreng ba bcings pa gtad la/ thal mo mnyam par brdabs to

snying po 'dis mnyes par bya'o// badzra tu ho/ cho ga 'dis phyag rgya rnams dgrol ba dang/ btsade ba dang/ mnyes par byas nas rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro// yang na rdo rje sems dpas kyang bya'o// rdo rjes su
dpa' lan cig bzlos// ji ltar 'dod pa bdag bde bar// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// rdo rje
sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// sgrub pa dang na las kun la// 'dir ni ci dgar brdzus na ni// rtog pa kun las dngos grub thob// snying po phyag rgya sngags ragasa rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul

gyis ni/ rtog pa las bshad rang byas pa'os// sgrub pa 'dar na thams cad do// de nas gsang ba'i mchod brjod cing// rdo rje'i bstod pa 'dis glu blangs te// gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhabu bo// oM rdo rje sem

dpar bsdus pas na// rdo rje rani chin bla na med// rdo rje chos ni glu blangs pas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i garalag pa gnyis
gshibs pa gsang babya'o// bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste// mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su gzhag go/ de nas
thams cad la ci nus par mchod cig ces bsgo nas// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la stsol te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byed du
bcug la// jiltar bzhugs pa rnams ci 'byor pa'i ro dang/ kha zas la sogs pa thams cad dang/ dkyil 'khor chen por phul pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis mgu bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamA

cang kyi dngos grub rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin no// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rjesams dpa'i lag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang// phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs bstan// oM sarba ta

khA ga ta sid+d+he badzras ma ya// ti a kha tAM d+hA ra yA ma ]badzrasatwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ de nas thams cad du su la'ang ma bzla zhage ces bsgo lamana'i snying po'ang bstan to// de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams slar
bkye ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab cing sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcangs nas kha gyen du bstan te/ snying po 'di bzlas shang dkrol nas/ oM khyed kyis sems can don
kun mdzad// chos su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du bzhud par mdzod// slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol// badzra satA mu/ de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya'o//
dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya rnams kyang dgrol bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams rung kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
po'i tsho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so///bam po gsum pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs dam tshig las byung

ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzanil snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma brag tu yang de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zer de rdo rje

'dzin pa'i gzungs 'dzin pa kun tu 'bar ba'i snang po rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kun kyi de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'igazungs kyi ya shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dkyil
'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod de ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod ngo// e ma'o gang phyir byang chub sems// sems can kun la phan bzhed pa// 'dul ba'i dbang
gis dpa' bo gang// bud med gzugs su'ang mdzad par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yashes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyi
rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so// oM badzra d+ha tIshA ri hUMbadz+ha Ni de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs/
nga thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la sems par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di//

smras pa/ oM badzra dzA NihUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtsordza rin po che'i dam tshig gi yashes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya

ba'i teng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di stsas pa/ so rat+na badzra ts+tshahUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi rnam

tshig gi ya shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyin gyi rlabasazhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'dod smras pa/ o d+harmabadzra Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa/

gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'ad

smras pa/ oM karma badzra Nid+d+haM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs chen po'i dmatshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do// oM badzrasatA gu rgyas ma

yo hUM/ oM gu bya rat+tA laM ku kaM hUM/ oM gu rgya mAgir gA lahUM/o rAdza gu bya badzrasAd+hi shwa ri hU~M/ kun tu bzang mo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu ma dang/ dga' ba la chags ma dang/ legs ldan ma ste rdo

rdzogazungasachen mo rnams so// oM badzra gu bya rat+ta sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra gu bya pra b+he hUM/ oM badzra d+ha dza a gra bu byahUM/ oM badzra hA sa badzra hU~M/ ban po che'i gtso mo dang/ rin po che'i sgron ma dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi

rtswa mo'i dpung rgyan ma dang/ 'khor lo thams cad ma dang/ stong du zlos ma ste chos rnams so// oM badzra d+hamagu bya sa ma ya hU~M/ oM badzra ko Sha gu rgya sa ma ye hU~M/ oM badzrag rgya maN+Da le/ o badzra gu h+ya dza

tsa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje pado dang/ kun 'dzin ma dang/ 'khor lo thams cad ma dang/ steng du zlos ma ste chos kyi gzungs ma rnams so// gso badzra gu rgya karmas ma ya hUM/ o badzra gu bya ka ba tshe hU~M/ oM badzra

gu cu dil+lA d+hA ri Ni hUM/ oM badzra gu mut+tid+d+hanaM/ dngos grub kun gyi gtso mo dang/ thams cad srung ba ma dang/ mdangs slar 'phrog ma dang/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya ma ste thams cad kyi gzungs rnams so//

de nas yang phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po rnams bshang do// oM badzra gu rgya satA badzI Ni hUM/ oM badzragu

byarat+ta badz+dzA Ni hUM/ oM badzragu h+ya dz+hamang+gadzA NihUM/ oM badzra gu rgya karma badz+dzA Ni hUM/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa de dag nyid la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
rnams/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyag medakyil 'khor chen por 'bar ba dang bcas pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug par bzhag go/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

[B]// @#// rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa'i ngam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do// oM badzra gu rgya ra ti pU dza sa ma ye sa pU dzA pra brtanA ya hUM/ oM badzra gu rgya a b+hi She ka pU dza sa ma ya sarba pU dzapra ba/

nA ya hUM/ oM badzragu phyagI tipU dzA sa ma ya sarbapA dza dra brtanAyahUM/ o badzra gu rgyanaM tu pA dzA sa ma ya sarba pA dza phra brtanAyahUM/ rdo rje 'dzinam la sogs pa de dag nyid de 'bar ba dang bcas pa rang gi maMtshan ma'i

phyag rgya rnams 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor kyi grwa rnams su dgod de// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdzogasang ba zhes bya ba'i rje zla'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad

bya ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bsan// rdo rdzogasang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri ba bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus

su ni// sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bar bya// mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad// khra yi steng du rdo rje brtsegs// rdo rje sems shes bshad pa 'o// rdo rje rin chen khri yi steng

rang gi debang ni bskur bar bshad// rdo rje pad khri yi steng// mtshon cha zhes ni bya bar bshad// las kyi de rje khri yi steng// rdo rje kun zhes bya bar bshad// pa'i steng du bya bar ni// 'od kyi 'khor le brtan/

ba'o// khri yi steng du rdo rje bri// lcags kyu 'greng ba gnyis de bzhin// rdo rje rdo rje la stes par// legs par sbyin pa gnyis de bzhin// rin chen 'od zer 'bar bar bya// nyi ma'i phyag rgya'ang de bzhin/
no/ phyag mtshan rtse mo 'bar bar bcas// rdo rje gnyas par sa yi 'phreng// rdo rje dbus su pad+ma bri// ral gri 'bar cas de bzhin ni// rdo rje 'khor la rdo rje rtse bas// 'bar ba'i 'od zer can gyi
lce/ rdo rje kun tu rtse mo dang// go cha rdo rjeyang dag ldan// rdo rjemachub yang dag bri// lag gnyis khu tshur phyag rgya bya// sems ma rdo rjel sogs ni// dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du//

mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dri bar ni// rdo rje 'dzin sogs dkyil 'khor du// phyi rol du yang ci rigs bya/ rang gi mtshan ma rnams kyang bri// byams pa la sogs rang gi mtshan// ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du gyi//
de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ de la thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya rang gi rigs bcings te 'jug par bya'o//

zhugs nas lan cig bskor te phyagargya de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phulanas/ rang gi snying khar tshul bzhin du bkrol te/ sgo bzhir rdo rje lcags kyu la grogs pas ji lta ba'i las rnams byas te phyir byung

ngo/ phyir byung nas kyang rdo rje slob ma rnamu rdo rje dbyin kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gzung ba'i tshul du gzud do// de nas btsud nas dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'chang bas g.yogs la byin te// ji

rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ya shes bslab bo// de la dang po'i re zhig rdo rje gsang ba'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i yo shes bslab bo// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rkang lag thal mo sbyar nas kha// glang tsang rdo rje bsgom
byas na// rdo rje ma yang chags par bye// dpung pa bskamapa'i lcags kyu dang// mgo la rdo rje bsgom par bya// lag pa yis ni 'bod byed rung// lcags kyu sa yang 'gugs par byed//

mdala'aphan ba yi tshul gyis ni// sprul zhing snying khar 'phangasanas nii// nyid kyis rdo rje dga' ma yang// 'dud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed// bdag gi lus kyi snying khar/ rdo rje go cha'i tshul gyis//

wA dbung pa bsnol ba bcings nas nii// sangs rgyas nyid kyang srung bar byed// de la de dag gi snying bo ni 'di yin no// badzra rA ga ma ho/ badzra aM ku sha dza/ badzramA ra ya mAr pa/ badzra ban d+ha rak+Sha hUM/

kha de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i lta ba'i phyag rgyar yo shes bslab bo// rdo rje lta ba chags pas ni// dga' bas mig nu rab tu bgrad// de yis bung med bltas pas ni// rtag tu dbang ngu'agyur ba yin// rab tu
myur bar mig basprul zhing// mag gi rdzo ma 'gugs byed pa// lta ba gzi can yin par bshad// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa'o/khro gnyeganyer ma rab bsdus pa// khro bo ri mog ni btsums pa
sto khro bo'i lta bas byas nas ni/ khams gsum yang n 'jigs par byed// ri rab ri yi brag 'dra ba// brtan par 'dzums pa med pa'i mig/ byams pa'i ltob yin par bshad// nad dang gdon

dang dug sel to// de nas 'di rnams kyi snying bo ni 'di dag yin no// badzra dr-it+timaT dIt+tarAlaM ku shi dzakro d+ha drowitits+tshadri NA tidi phab/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//

ba[ho ho ho ho zhes sas na// sgra dang bral bas de ma thag/ sems can kun ni mgu bar byed// den rdo rje tshag gsal ba'o/ dza dza dza dza zhes brjod na// khro ba'i tshog n gsal ba ste// rdorje'adzan pa 'dra ba/

ste skye bo kun kyang 'gugs par byed// hU~MhU~Mhu hU~M zhes brjod na// tshig tu brjod pa gsal ba yis// ri rab dang ni 'dra ba yis// sems can kun la bdung byed do// haMha ha ha zhes smras na// phra ba'i

tshig ni gsal ba ste// 'jig rten 'di kun srung byed pa// rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyal ba'ang srung// de la snying po 'di rnams yin no// badzrahobadz+dzabadzahUM/ badzra haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag
rgya'i ya shes bslab po// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyisana'i sgom byas la// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog
ldan pa// rdo rje snying po bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas na// phyag na rdo rje 'gugs par byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/ rdo rje'i spyan ni bdag nyad la// bdag nyid kyis
ni bsgom byas na// chos rnams thams cad des btud byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje thams cad bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas na// rdo rje thams cad des srung

ngo/ de la snying po ni'ed rnams yin no// badzrapA Nisacha sham na ya sarba bud+d+ha ho/ badzra gan+d+ha badzra pA ni hUM g+ho A kar ya hU~M dza/ badzA na tra sarba d+harmAn mA ra ya hUM phaT/ badzra bi shwa rak+Sha sar na hUM/ de nas rdo rje
rgya@#// gsang ba 'i phyag rgya'i yo shes bslab bo// bdag gis bdag gi snying khar ni// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcang byas la// rdo rje lta bas bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad 'bab par byed//
bdag gis bdag gi snying khar ni// rin chen rdo rje bcang byas la// 'bar ba'i lta bas bltas na// thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur// bdag gis bdag gi snying khar ni// chos kyi rdo rje btsang byas
la khro bo'i lta bas bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad des sdud byed// bdag gis bdag gi snying khar na// las kyi rdo rdzobacing byas la// byams pa'i lta bas bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad

srung bar byed// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i la shes kyi phyag rgya de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badzra gu rgyas maya ho/ badzra gu rgyas ma ya dza/ badzragu rgyu sa ma ya hU~M/ badzragu stsasam ya haM/ de nas rdo rje

tshe/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcang ba bslab bo// rdo rje thal mo las byung ba// gsang ba chen po rab tu bshad// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus pa// de dag gi ni btsang ba bshar// mthe bong gnyis ni bstsol byas
la/ mdzub mo rtse mo bkug pas na// gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang por bshad// de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya// gung mo gnyis ni nor bur byas// pad+ma srin lag mthe'u
chung gung// lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang// mdzub mo rdo rje mdzub gnyis rtso/ de nyid mthe bong gnyis kyis smras// legs pa sbyin dang mdzub rin chen// mdzub mo rin chen can 'od 'bar//

07/ srin lag gzhibs mthe'u chung rAn chen// de nyid kyang ni bskor ba 'o// kun gyi rtse mo rab tu 'gying// mthe bong mthe'u chung rab tu gzhug/ sor mo bar du 'khor lo brkyang// de nyid kyang ni kha nas
dbyung// mthe bong brkyang ste rdo rjes dga'// mdzub mo bsams nas nang du gzhug/ mtheb gnyis dbye ba de nyid las// ro nas nang du ro tshor bya// rdo rje gsang bde rnams ni// jo rdzobacings las
byung ba yin// chos kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams ni// thal mo nang du bkug pas so// las kyi gsang ba nang gnas pa'i/ mtshan ma lus su bstan pa 'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa'o//
tshis kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa// a// ho/ sa///oM// ha/ hU~M/ hU~M/ maM/ raM/ kaM/ haM// gsang ba'i phyag rgyu gnyis byas nas// las kyi phyag rgya rnams su bya// dmag
mchog ni ji snyed pa// gnyis su phral nas de bzhin no// de nas 'di rnams sgrub pa bshad// sa mal sti zhes smras shing// bdag gis bcings pas 'grub pani// 'dod la chags pa bde ba'i
bdug/ 'di rnams lhag par gsaMgakyang ni// dus kun tu na bcang mi bya// gsang ba 'am don chen la// mkhas pa yos na sbyar bar bya// 'di rnams kun l bdag nyid gnas// rab byung rnams

kyi lha mo brtan// sgrub pa rnams la rab chags na// rang gi bdag po btangang re// de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams btsang ba la sogs pa'i las rnams yin no// bdag gam 'on te ba gzhan yang rung/ rdo rje dbab/
pa byas nas ni// snying por bcas pa 'di yis na// btsang ngam 'ching du gzhug kyang rung// badzra hU~M bcu/ de nas dgrol ba yin no// mdor na phyag rgyu thams cad ni// mAng por bya

ba 'di nyid kyis// gang dang gang nas byung ba yi// de dang de nas dgrol bar bya/ oM badzra muny+tsa/ de nas brtan par bya ba yin te/ rin chen rdo rje brtan byas te// snying kha nas ni sbyongor dgrol/ mdzub mo

yis ni go cha btsang// snying por bya ba 'di nyid do///so driD+ha badzraka ba tsa drib+ha/ de nas bcing ba'i dam tshig yin no// ji ltar gnas pa rnams su dgrol// go cha yis ni brtan par byas// thal mo brdabu
pa'i kun sbyar la// snying por bya ba 'di nyid do// o gu rgyas ma ya tra/ rdo rje sems dpa' ci dgar bzlas// dkyil 'khor dang ni las kun la// dus 'dra nyod du sbyar bar bya// thams cad 'grub par
byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las// rdo rje gasang ba'i phyag rgyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so////
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ya shes kyi phyag rgya'i ngam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byon gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas// rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di snas pa// o sAlta badzratshun sa ma ya hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes phra mo'i dem

tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di sbas pa// so satA sA k+Sha badzra dzA nas ma la hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen

'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo snarin po che'i ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog ste/

myusaM pa// o rat+tha sU klu badza?dz+ha nas ma la hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi ya shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di sus pa/ o d+hums klu badzra dza na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gsheg

pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi ye shes phra mo'i dem tshig gi dekyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya khri'i ting ngo 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang ga reg pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM karma sU kA

badzradza na sa ma ya hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ya shas phra mo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa'i
zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshon de bzhani gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams/
thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad la re bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i yashes phra mo'i teng nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa brtan par byas te/ yang gcig
tu gyur nas ting nge 'dzin gyi yo shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas bcom

ldan 'dasaphyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shes kyi thugs su zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i dmatshig chen po'i rdo rje 'di smras pa/ sUk+Sha badzra/ de nas de

'a rgyas ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas pacom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shes phra mo'i rdo rje'idabyibs su bdag tshod byin gyis

brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs su gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e mahosangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje phra mo'i bdag ste che// gang phyir phra yang che ba'i

phyir// khams gsum yang ni rgyas par byed// de nas de skad ces smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngeshangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs na rab tu

pa phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba'i sbyor bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la khyab par byas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par bya ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyinges thams cad du rab tu sba

ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyis khyab par byas so// nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabu

de 'dug go/ de nas de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa h+phams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yi shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje'i chos nyid du dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rje

rje'iye shes phra mo'i khyon gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yi shes kyi rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge

'dzin gyi yi shes kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo// badzran d+hi ta b+hA ga ta hUM/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur zhugs

nas thugs kar rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur te gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las ye shes chen po 'di bzhi phyung ngo// badzra Atukaji lha badzra aM ku sha tipArA ga badzra

pra be sha traM da yaM/ a ho badzra dumI/ rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i phyin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par

byed pa'i sa shes kyi phyag rgya dang/ dga' ba chen po ya shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamA cad kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stang po phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor
'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi thugs su zhugs te snying kha'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su de las snying po 'ang bzhi byung ngo//

badzra tA Ad+ma ka hri da ya/ badzra sAru No/badzra d+ha dzA gra ba srid ya/ badzra mAs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi derdza'idabang bskur ba'i yo shes kyi phyag rgya dang/ 'od kyi dekyil 'khor chon po bkod pa'i rgyan ye she

kyi phyag rgya dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pachen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kya rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje yashes phra mo 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi snying khardo rje'i snying por zhugs nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs nas bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje'i

dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo// badzra pad+mapA ka hri da ya badzra ko Sha/ tib+hA badzra tsakra hrang yaM pra be sha/badzra dzihA gra hri da ya/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyu dang/ dengazhin gshegs

pa thams cad shes rab kyi yashes kyi phyag rgya dang/ 'khor lo chen por 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig gi skyes pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po thugs ka'i rdo rdzolas byung nas ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i thugs der zhugs nas/ yang rdo rje shin tu phra

mo'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo// sarba badzra Ata ka huM nga badzra ka pa tsa/ tiSh+Tha badzra 'a kA hri da ya/ badzramu h+phad ya/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa'i ya shes kyi phyag rgya dang/ thub par dka' pa'i brtson 'grus kyi yashas kyi phyag rgya dang/ bdud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi 'chang ba'i yi shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rab tu phra ba'i ya shes kyi mtshan ms khyab pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gsheg/

pa thams cad kyi shugs las byung ste/ byang chub sams dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas/ de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skur gyur te/ rang rang ga/

mtshan nyid kyi thugs kar ba'a gnas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas rang rang ga sAng po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste bzhugs so// de

nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'a dzin gyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa sgrub pa'i phyir ro rje phra mo'i ya shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad ngo// de nas rab tu bshang bya ba// chos

dkyil 'khoradas pa ste// rdo rje dbyangs dang 'dra bas// rdo rje phra mo zhes bshang de// dkyil 'khor chen po tshuledu ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ rdo rje dbus su sangs rgyas bri// sangs rgyas
[6 ]@#// dkyil 'khor rnams su yang// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing// de bzhin thugasakar nyid phyag rgya// ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang// phyag gnyis rdo rje bcing bar bcings// de nas

rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs pa la sogs pa'i chog rgyas par byas nas// ye shes kyi mtshan ma lag tu byani

nas rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i yo shes bslab bo// lce nudakan la sbyar bya zhing// sna yi rtse mor bsam bya ba// rdo rje phra mo bad reg pas// sams na mnyam par bzhag par

'gyur// rdo rje phra mo bde reg pa// mtshan ma gal te byung ba na// mtshan ma de ni khyab bya ba// sems de kun tu khyab par bya// ji tsam 'dod pas sems khyab nas// khams gsum du yang khyab par 'gyur// de nas

de yang bsdu ba ni/ sna yi rtse mo'i bar du gnas// de nas shin tu mnyam par gzhag/ gang yang rung ste bsgom bya ba// de dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin ya shes kyis brtag pa'o// de nas ng rnams

kyi sAng po 'di yin no// sAkA badz+dzas ra Na/ saM ha Na badzra/ badzra hrid ti/ sems dpa' gang gi byams pa ni// mnyam 'gyur brtan pa chen po yis// sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul gyis na// sems can kun la des khyab

bya byams pas khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni// snying rje can ni gang yin pa// sems can kun don ldan pa yin// sgrub pa yis na khyab par bya// kun kyang rang bzhin 'ong gsal ba// gdod nas dag pas nam mkha' bzhin//

[d]chos sam yang na chos ma yin// bsam pas khyab cing dga' bar 'gyur/ gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sor ma yon/ de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// btang snyoms chen po gom

par bya// de'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// ma ma ji skya ra Na/ma hA kA ru Na myur Na/ saT bud+d+ha phra mo has ra Na/ sats+tsha satwaM saM bo d+ha ya/ de nas de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa'i ya shes

bslab bo// nam mkhar yan phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis na// 'greng yang na 'dug kyang rung// roDa'ir byibs ni goms par bya// de bzhin ru yang gnas kun tu// rdo rje phra mo sbyor ba yis//

mnyam par bzhag pas snying khar ni// rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sgom// ji lta baya rim bzhin du/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// phyag na rdo rjod byibs chen po// gnas rnams kun tu bsgom par bya// rnam pa thams

cang mchog ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dus kun du// ji lta ba yi go rims bzhin// mnyam par bzhag pas bskom par bya// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badzra mu khaM b+ha ba/ ma hA bo d+hi satA A be sha/

badzra pA Ni d+ha ra sha ya sra ru bo/ bud+d+ha a nu smra ti A be sha/ rdo rje phra mo'atshul gyis na// goms par bya babadag nyid kyis// zla ba'i dbyibs su bdag nyid ni// byang chub sems kyis sgom pa'o// zla ba'i dkyil

'khor dbus su ni// bdag nyang rdo rje'i dbyibs gyur par// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya pa// sems dpa'i rdo rje sgom pa'o// rdo rje phu mo'i tshul sbyor la// bdag nyid snying khar rdo rje sems// bdag nyid kyis
[rth ]@#// na bsgom bya ba// rdo rje sams dpa' sgom la 'o// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag nyid ni// bdag nyid kyisan bsgom bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub

sgom pa'o// de la snying po ni 'di rnams so// sa man d+ha dra sA be sha/ badzrasatA badzramU pe sha/ badzrasatA sa mA d+hidza na A be sha/ ta thA ga to haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos nyid gsal/

ba'i phyag rgya'i ya shas bsub bo// bad gzhi de bzhin gshigs dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan rug brjod// dbang po gnyis mnyam sbyar bas// sems can thams car chagags par byed// pangaganang rje chen
por mnyam// rdo rob tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// gdon mi za bar 'jig rten 'gugs// bdagan dzachos dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis mnyam

! sbyor bas// de yis 'jig rkyen thams cad 'jig/ bdag ni sna tshogs pas dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshag tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis mnyam sbyar bas// las rnams thams cad nges sgrub bo// de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shas kyi rorje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i shes bamang bo/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom bya ba// bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku 'di du/ des naM

sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// de nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzan gyi phyag rgya'i la shes bslab bo// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// snying khar rdo rje la sogs par// bsgoms na rdo rje la sogs pas// rang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed// de

[z/]nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab go/ rdo rje bcings las legs byung bar// bcu drug rnams su bshad pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin nadim tshig mchog/
de rnams kyi napecings pa bshad// skyil mo krung 'dug gan rgyal du// g.yas b.rus de bzhin sar bcus pa// snying khar gnas pa bzhi pa ste// rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor po// dbral bar bzhag dang ltag

pa dang// phrag pa dang ni de god par sbyar// khar bzhag snying khar ral gri dang// snying khar rgyas dang kha nas dbyung// spyi bo thong ka khar ba nag pa// mdzub mo gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin// de nas gzhan yang chos kyi phyag

rgya bslab par bya'o// 'ak+ka/ gra gra/ ma za// a gra/ twaM hUM/ oM saM yaM khaM/ dri// b+hi Ta/ kra sha/ ha ha/ ba ba/ saM bo/ phaT/ gra sa/ de nas chos kyi las kyi mchog/ phra mo'i rdo rjecan rnams ba glab// ye shes khu tshur

dam tshig las// gat+tas su byas nas sbyar bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thig pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog rgyas pa rdzogs
[”]de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi mchog gi bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas bas khyab pa'i las kyi dmatshig gi ye shes byan

gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di sdus pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+hA tu a nut+ta ra pU dza ka su ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi

lum b+hAnang gnyis rgyu/g.yo bas de bzhin ba/ shegs pa phra mas cad kyi sde sams dpa'imachod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pasakhyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinal

snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di / sa pa// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzras a nut+ta ra pU dza karma pa ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa
