thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas bas khyab pa'ilas kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di

smras pa// so sarba ta thA ga ta badzrarat+ta a nut+tarapA dzakarma sa ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa phams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga/

rgyas pa'i khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di lcasapa/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma a nut+ta ra pU dza ka/
ra Nas ma la hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i chog rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rje'i

byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog bde smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ka a nut+ta ra pU dzakasmra ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan

'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms khor
zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de khyed kyi tshe de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyangs kun

tu rgyas pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rab 'dramA sbyin gyi rgyu mtsho'i lha mo rnams su gyur te byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams sngan rgya mtsho
rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems M chen bo bskyed pa dang/ de ngazhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi rigs mnyes par bya ba dang/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang/ byang chub chen po'i snying por nye bar 'agro ba dang/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam
pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang/ de bzhino gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed pa dang/ khams gsum thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba dang/ das
pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyus kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul thams cad bstan nas
bzhugs so// mchod ba'i sngon rgya mcho'i lha mo de dag kyang rang rang ga phyag rgya pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chog bzhin du yang dag par

mchod de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas mchod pa bdag/ mad pa kun n byed pa yin/ gang phyir

sangs rgyas 'de chen du// sangs rgyas kun gyis grub par mdzad// de nas yang phyag najo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdo rje'i bya ba zhes bya ba'i las

kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba ut+ta nir+ya ta na pU dza ra Na ka badriNi hU~MA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+manir+ya ta na pU dza s+yA ra NakamakhaM dza/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+manir+ya ta na anur ga pu

dza spur Na karma pU Ne hU~M ho// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+manir+ya ta nasA d+hA ka ra pU dza sa ra Na karma tu Ti o/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi reb tu dga' zhing bde ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma
dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa mo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed pa mo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po rnams so// on mas

ta thA ga ta kA ya a b+hi She ka rak+Sha b+ho badzram NioM/[0f00]namasawata thA ga ta spurtse blo badz+dza te dzo ni dzA la hUM/ oM namasarba ta thA ga tA sha pa ri pU ra Ni tsan+tim Ning+ha dza a gre g+hu badzra d+ha dza a gri hUM/ oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta ma

0 h+pha pI ti pramo bya ka re rgyu badzra hA s+ye ho/ dbang mo chen mo dang/ snang ba chen mo dang/ rinapo che chen po cher 'bebs ma dang/ rab tu dga' zhing mgu ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i

mchod pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+hamatA sa mA d+hi b+hicu no mi ma NA d+hamagrwa hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA nariharo/ sku no mig ha g+ho ShAnu ga d+haM/ oM sarba tathA ga ta tsakra ak+Sha raM ba ri baNA di sarma su

rnyan+tanastuno mi sarba man+tA le hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA san+to b+haT bud+d+hA saM gI ti b+han yaM/ myu no ma badzabA tsathaM/ ya shes chen mo'i glu dang/ dbyangs chen mo'i rjes su 'brang ma dang/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug

ma dang/ sngags kyi spyod ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mchod pa'o// oM sarba ta b+hA ga ta d+hu pa me g+ha sa ra Na pU dza ka ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu pra sa ra pa ra Na pU dza karmakaM pa kaM

ri oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke dzu la spur Na pU dzakam ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta b+hu ga tu gan+tas mu dra sla ra NapU dza karma kiru ku ru/ sems can ma dang/ byang chub chen po'i yan lag can ma dang/ mig ldan ma dang/
dri ldan ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o// de nas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i las kyi dkyil

'khor rdo rje zhes bya ba bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyangs dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje bya ba zhes kyang grags// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// sangs rgyas
@#/// skun ms gzhag bar bya// rdo rje sems la sogs tshul du// lha mo phyag rgya bcas pa bri// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dar gzhug ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad
de/ de la dang po rdo rjed byings kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gzhug par bya ba bcug nas kyang// 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i des rig yin gyis/ mchod pa
bcu drug po 'di rnams khyod kyis nyin re zhing ci nus su gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas gdong g.yogs dkrol te las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan la thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su sbyin no//
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mchodan gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas byang chub chen po'i sems sgrub pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems
ni brtan bskyod pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing// dga' bas bdag ni mchod byed na// sangs rgyas kyi ni bde ba'ang 'thob// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyang pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam
zhing 'phrong bal sogs rab mchod pas// mchod na de ni debang yang bskur// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag nisangs rgyas yin bsam zhing// skom pa'i glu yis rab mchod pas// mchod
na bdag de mgu bar 'gyur// byang chub sams ni brtan bskyod pas// bdagan sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing// gar gyi mchod pas bdag mchod na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang di mchod 'gyur// de la snying po

/ni 'di rnams yin no// bud+d+hA sAt+ma koT haM/ bud+d+ha a ye/ bud+d+hasu tu ka ro mi duN+Da lu dzaka ro ma/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ya shes bslab par bya'o// lus dang ngag sems rdoN+Di/
ya/ mchog gi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal zhing// de bzhin sangs rgyas rtag mchod na// rtag tu phyag byar 'os par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes// rjes
su mirang bsamachod na// myur du sangs rgyas 'thob par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// lha rdzas kyi na bdag dbul ba'i// mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas rnams// mchod na de yang mchod
para'agyur// lus dang ngag soms rdo rje yi// dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni// yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod pa yi// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de la snying pon 'di rnams yin no//

phra cha minutu mo de bud+d+hapU dza pa rinam/ de nas chos kyi nges shes kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// ngo bo nyid kyis gzod nas dag/ chos 'di dag gis mchod pas//
dga' ba'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur// chos rnams kun n 'dus pa yi/ a zhes bya ba sgo zhes brjod// chos kyi phyag rgyu 'di yis ni// de yi sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// 'dir ni chos rnams tham
cad kyi// rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste// dam chos 'khor lo'i mchod pa yis// mchod pas chos ni 'dzan par 'gyur// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// sgyu brnyan dag dang 'drar bshad de/
chos kyi mchod pa 'di dag gis// mchod na sangs rgyas gsung yang 'thab// de la de dag gi sAng po na 'di rnams yanan// arma shud+has man g+ha nga/ tsakra ni rak+Sha/ de

nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i yo shes bslab par bya'o// lus dang ngag soms rdo rje yi// rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams// rdo rje'i dbyings su bsgomasan ni// do rdza'i bangs/ nyid myur du thob//
lus dang ngag sams rdo rje yi// rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams// sangs rgyas kun tu bsgoms na ni// chos kyi skur na myur du 'gyur/ lus dang ngag soms rdo rje yi// rang gi lus ni dra ma rnams//
rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms na ni// rdo rje sems dpar ma'am par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi lus ni phra mo rnams// sangs rgyas kyi ni skur bsgoms na/ ba sa pa

sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// de la de dag gi sAng po na 'di rnams yin no// badzra kA ya/ d+harmakA ya// satwA kA ya/ bud+d+hakA ya/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyob/ rgyal yashes pa sla ba pa ra ste ]
rang byung la ni las kun gyis// 'khyung pa'i bde ba'i mchod pa ni// phul na rdo rje sems dpa' dang// 'dra bar de na myur du 'gyur// shin tu chags par sbyor ba yis// dam du bzung ba'i bang ba ni//
sangs rgyas rnams la phul gyur na ngo rje rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur// shin tu dga' zhing bde chags pas// brtan par gyur pa'i mchod bde bas// sangs rgyas rnams la pu na no// rdo rje chos dang 'dra

bar 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor pa'i// kun du sbyor ba'i bde ba ni// mchod pa'i phyir ni phul bas na// rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag gi gsang ba'i snying po na 'di dag yin no// ra ti badzra/ rA

ga badzra/ pra ti badzra/ karma badzra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'phrin las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab par bya ste// snying kha rtsib logs rgyab sbyor ba// dpral ba la sogs de bzhin

du la dang rna ba mgo ltag pa// spyi bo phrag pa kha skad gzhag/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i ngam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis na// rdo rdzobacangs
pa dam byas la// snying kha la sogs gnas tshul du// bzhag nas rgyal ba rnams mchod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ya shes bslab par bya'o// o kra sa phya

sA khri re kr-inalaM shano hUM hUM/ las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las// rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje
las zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so////de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin/
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa chen po'i chog rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsduba'idon du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag

bla@#// rgya'i snying po 'di smas pa// oM sarba ta thA ga ta mut+taM thaM/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad

kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i tshog rgyas pa 'di'adangos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir nga banyin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyu'i snying po 'di
smas pa// saM badzrasatA muShis ra/ de nas de bzhin g.yugs pa rin chen 'byung bas de gshegs pa sa cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bsang ras nga bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'angal dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di sbas pa/ oM badzra ratwA mut+taMtra/
nga nas nga nganyinug gas nga tsho tshad med pas de ngatsa ka pa 13 pa tsaa rud kyi bu lus kyis nga bkagegs pa thams cad kyi rigs ngaskyed nas/ dengadon ga shubs pa ma sa nga nga la la

po chen por chog rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyalaM snying po dang sAs pa// oM badzra d+harma mut+taM khaM/ de nas de bzhin ga shags pa 9 ya ma
grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams rud kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhAnagshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyang nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas nga 'di'i

dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'api mas ba// so badzra karma mu b+hihaM/ nga nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rang gi byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan
'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i tshig rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad

bsdu ba'i phyir rngarje'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i phyag rgya zhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di ba shang ngo// de nas rab tu ba shang bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// jorje dbyings dang 'dra bas// rdo rje dngos grub ces kyang

grags// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// mkhas pas rab tu bri bar bya// thog mar sangs rgyas gazugs bzhag ste// de nas phyag rgya bzhi yang// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje'i phyag rgya la//

sogs bri// de nas jo rdzo'idangos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa 'a cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ nga bzhin du btsud de 'di skad sla bar bya'o// khyod kyis gsang ba'i le'ang su

'du'ang ma bstan rgyag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ log par lta ba dang sdug pa'i las byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang yod do// brtson 'grus chung ba dang/ sbyor ba mang pa dang/ ri mo ma shes pa re ngag rdo rje'i dbyar
la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams su brtson 'grus chung bas mi 'jug ste/ de dag gi don du rdo rje dngosagrub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig tu gyur pa 'di ma lus shing lus pa mad pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang/ phan pa dang/ bde nga
dang yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du byin gyis brlabs so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
kyi dam tshig ga phyag rgyu gsang ba 'di rnams la yid mi ches shing ma dang par ma byed cig/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song dang/ yi dgasakyi khams su lhung bar gyur pa 'am/ ma bde nga
ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la/ gdong g.yogs bkrol te dkyil 'khor bstan to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thog rgya'i dam tshig sos shog/
bdag nyid chen pogang gang gi/ phyag rgya gang dang gang bangs pa// brdzus pa'i snying po'i don du na// der nabadag nyid bsgom par bya// ye shes 'du yitshul gyis mi/ phyag na rdo rje gsung ba bzhin//
bdag nyid chen po phyog rgyu kun// de dag kun gyis grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bya'o// rang gi dbang pogashibs nas ni// rdo rje bcings pas gzung bar

bya/ de yis phyag rgya gang reg pa// de ma thag tu de dbang bskur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi chos nyid brjod par bya'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyor la// ya shes phyag rgya bcing bar bya/cho ga 'di yaM
tshul gyis ni// ye shes phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya kun gyi las brjod par bya'o// glu dang gar dur zas dang bro// spyod pa la sogs bde ba rnams// sangs rgyas rnams la phulan ni//
las kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgyu'i ya shes bslab par bya lo// mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur nas// drakar por gyur pa'i sa
la gnas/ mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs te// bdag nyid rdo rje dbyed s su sgom/ jo rdzobacings pa dam byas te// gung mo myu gu bzhin du gshibs// mtho'u chung dang ni mdzub rtsa sgrung// dam

tshiga mchog gi dam tshig go/ rdo rje bu mo'i tshul du ni// rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor de// ting 'dzin dbang du 'gyur ba'i tshul// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la//

pe ga'i spro skye ram ra ga zung// mtshab Do 'a mtha'u chung bsnol ba ni// jo rdzodagos mchog dkyil 'khor lo// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bslabA/

nasardo rje dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o// rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyagargya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du ma g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor

thamasacud phyag rgyang ha'i te kyil 'khor gyi tshul du rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams su bris na dngos grubazams cad kyang 'grub bo// de ltar ras dang/ tshage pa dang/ nam mkha' dang/ gnas thams cad du brisan dngos grub
[pg ]/thams cad 'grub bo// dkyil 'khor brtag pa nasabartsams te la lan dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa nyid kyi tsho ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grug/ la la ni de nas brtsams nas nyin zhag
gcig gis// la la na nyim bzhis/ la la ni zhag bcu drug gas/ la la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i ng tshaltar 'dod pa bde blag tu don thams cad byed cing thams cad rjes su dga' ba dang/ ro dang/
zas dang/ spyod pa thams cad kyi bde ba rnams myong bar byed bzhin du yang lo gcig gis mchog 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungasaso// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thebag pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa
zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// badzra satA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sam/
can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ yid bde ba thams cad myong bar byab nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa

k+Sha 'grub par bya ba'i bar du theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// dodzad byangs dang 'drab san// rdo rjesems
dpang zhes kyang bzhad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyila 'khor phyirami thig gdab bo// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzhag par bya// de nas dgug pa dang gzhug pa la

sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes rnams bskyang par bya'o// de la thog mar 'di skad du khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang khong rumachung pa

su la'ang gsang ba 'dim smra zhig/ khyor ngan song thams cad du ltung ba'amam bde ba ma stangs pas dusam yin par kaM bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa sgrug
pa'il shes bslab bo// zla rgyas dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste/ phyag rgya chen po yongs bzung bas// bdag nyang rdo rje sems dpar ni// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor thams
cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig ye shes bsgrub bo// 'dong chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu// khams gsum na yang gzhan mang de// de bas 'dongal chags bral bar// khyong na nam yang ma byed cig// ma
sam ya ha na phaT/ ces mna'i snying po sbyin no// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rnams su dam tshig gi sdom pa sbyin par bya'o// de nas rdo rje sams dpa'i
phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bzhi bcang ba bslab par bya'o// dngos grub kyang de bzhinano// ri mo la sogs pa dang lugs ma'i sku gzugs thams cad la'ang ji ltar 'dod par cho ga bzhin du byas na dngos
grub thams cad de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// jo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du'ang bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshags ba thams
cad kyang gacig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rjesams dpa' phyag na rdo rje chen po la rdo rje dgyes pa'i stong po
'dis legs par gsol to// o legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rjechos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje lasan khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de
bzhanagshegs pa kun gyi gsang// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// rdo rjesems dpa'i mtshan gyis kyang// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// dag par
byas nas bsgrubs na ni// sangs rgyus nyid kyang bde bar 'grub// rdo rje chos kyi sbyor bas ni// 'dod pa kun gyi bde bas bde// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub pas ni// bde ba mi thang med mas ba// de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po zhas bya ba
rdzogs so///bem po bzhi pa// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus par gyur te/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor lo chen po bskor ba la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa 'dis gsol ba btab go/ rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che// rdo rje mgon bo rab sgrub mdzad//

rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od// rdo rje dbal khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po// rdo rje ral gri mchog chen po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyal po mchog/ sngos med khyod la phyag 'tshol lo//

rdo rje las dang sbyang ba che// gnod sbyin gtum pa gdon chen po// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che/ phyug rgya kun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang byang chub che// sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin
gshegs// rdo rje'i la shes yang shasacha// theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// don kun gyi ni de nyid don// sems can don chen kun rig pa// kun mkhyen kun byas thams cad de// kun gzigs khyod la

phyag 'chol lo// rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang// dam tshigachen po de nyid don// sems chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa che// rab tu dga' ba 'od chen po//

rdo rje 'od dang 'od snang ba// sangs rgyas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje mchog/ rig mchog mchog dang ma yi mchog/ rdo rje dam pa mchod chen mchog/ raM ga mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal
la// rdo rje dbyings dang gsang ba che// rdorje gsang ba rab gsang 'o chang// rdo rje phra ba bsam gtan che// rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mchog sangs rdo rje mchog/ sangs
kru'u// rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che// sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pache// sams dpa'/
mchod pa rab mchod pa// thabs chen dngani dngos grub cho// rdo rje sgrub khyed phyag tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skachen po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs te// da zhin gshags

pa'i san sa chen po// rdo rje rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan// sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog skyes// rnam sa par snang mdzad de dang khyab// ston zhu khre la phyag/

'tshal lo// de zhin ba/ shapa/sa pa de nyid tshe// yang dag mtha' dang che pa'i tshul// pa re la phyin pa kun mkhyen pa// don dam khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang dang spyod pa mchog/ bdud dang bdud
narab 'dul pa// kun gyi mchog dang mnyam na skakhyen// kun tu 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas hU~M zhes hU~M zhes pa// rdo rje zhes 'dul ba po// rdo rje thamAcad rdo dzaM chog/ lag ni

rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshul// phyag rgya mchod cing sdud pa dang// mi grorar bzhin gshegs pas bya// gang phyir rdo rje sems brtan pas// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes khyed bya/ rdzogs pa da nga 'a pa pa rgyu khyed ra ga lus
ka kun gza gis yab na khyod yin te// byung ba dang na 'byung 'gyur ba'/de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs// paspyod pa'i rgyal po 'di 5sa// rab tu mos ngas bstod glud cing/ rlangs gang
zhig mchod byed pa// da ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'/mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sems can kun don mdzad pa' phyir// rang gi rigs na skyid par mdzod/
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bgatso bo phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i tshig thos nas rdo rje ni bdaganyakyi snying khar zhag ste// de bzhin gshegs pa de
dag thams cad pos nas 'di skad gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de ngazhin gshegs pa ma 'tshal te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa// pa'i phyir/ rdo rje 'dzin pas smras pa/
bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa' sems nan dag kyang mchas te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zha bas gdul bar mi spyod pa de dag 'du bdag gis ji ltar

bsgrub par gyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshang/ sa pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po 'a ya shas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
nga 'dzan la snyoms pa ra zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rngams cad nam mkha'i dbyanges thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam par sres pa nyid kyi/ra rab
ra'i rtsa mo rdo rje dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po chalas byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par yang gcig tu 'dus te dad bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
[zi]na// par snang mdzad kyi phyags ka'i de sa la debur zhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa dra snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
kyi thugs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshagapa thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi gnas yongs su bskyab pa dang/ phan dang/
bdeba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang ma rungs pa thams cad gdul pa'i phyir du bzhin gshegs pa nas cad kyi snying rje chen po la thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yishas la ran gas te dad

bzhin bshegs pa thams cad kyi skade rjechen po 'a thabs khro bo'aran tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin la snyoms par gzhugs so// snyom par zhugs ma thag tu de tsho de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje s dam tshig chus bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di byung ngo/ hu de nas de phyung ma thag tuphyoganardo'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las pa tsam/

ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po khro gtor can/ snyan ma nganusangashangadapral ba bsnyer ba/mtsho ba lha gar byung zhing gtsigs pa/ rdo rje dang/ lcags kyu dang/ ral gri dang/ zhags pa

la song/ sa pa rdo rje me lce 'bar ba'i mtshonatshalag na thogs pa/ rnam pa du ma 'kha dog dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi chalugs can phyag na rdo ba skyo byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu ma rungs pa thams/

cad gdul ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snangan dzad kyi phyogs kun tu rdo rjed du ngas dkyel la bora chen ngo 'a tshul du zla ba'i dekyil 'khor la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ amathahA

kyis 'dul ba ya ]jabs chen ldan pa dar ba yin ta// bo nga phyir sems can 'dul thangs phyir/ dar sa med pa'i khro la/rtar rab// de nas de bcom ldan 'das ra pazhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin/

gshegs pa thams cad kyi spros pa med pa' chos nyid la dmigs nas// rtogs pa ni gshog pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te/ de

bzhinagshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rags pa'i chab 'dasnyas pa/ oM su b+han suM b+ha hU~M/ grasmyug hU~M/ gcu pa sa grosgyu pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho/b+ha ga bAn badzra

hUM phaT/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thub sa ka nas byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo gyur tabyung nas/ 'jag rten gyi khams rab 'bum gyi mtsho'i sman thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa bung
chub sems dpa' khar gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad pyan gyis rlabs te smyan drangs na///dzidau tshabag dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste dam tshig gis bcings nas ang gcig tu 'dus

de rda rdza khro po chen po'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'dasa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar 'dug ste ched du parjod pa bde ched du brjod do// a ma'i byang chub sems 'di ni/ kun tu thang zhing sdug/
med de gang phyir sems can 'dul don du khro bo yang na yid 'ong gyur// de nas rdo rje khro bo chen po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas babs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ yang bka'adzacing bzhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gas dgug pa'i derdzazhes bya ba'i ting nga/

'dzan la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi dam[%]nga dag lcag das kyu zhes bya pa ra pazhin gshags pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thusagasaka nas phyung ngo// hU~MTakI dza/de nas de byung ma

thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams smanegyi tsho thams cad na/ 'jartan lagasum gyi dpang po da bang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten thams cad n gnas pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba
ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yatshagi gi rdo rje'i sprul sa bkug nas ra rang re gang nab dang/ rtsa mo rdo rjedang/ nor bu dang/ rin po chalas byas pa'i khang pa

btsugs pa gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang du pardzogs pa rtsa mo rdo rje dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po chalas byas pa thams cad du bskor nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas phyagan rdo rje rang
gso thulo ka nas rdo rje de blangs te gsor zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i khams gsum ji srid pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo la bltas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnamA/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la zhugs la nga'i paka' yang nyon cig// dze nas lta dpag gis bad poskad ces gsol to// padag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
phyag na rdo rje gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// skyabs su 'gro ba grub par byos// kun mkhyen ye shes thob pa'i phyir// grogs po rnams kyis sgrub par byos// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams/

'ad u0f7ana 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bangag ngo lha chen po 'jig rten la gsum po tham cad kyi bdag por gyur pas drags tachar los pas ston cing 'di skad cas sbas so// kyi gnod sbyin ngan 'jig rten

gsum po mtha' dag gi gtso de// dbang phyug chen po// byed pa po/ 'jigs pa po/ 'byur po thams cad kyi dbang po/ lha' lha chen po yin na/ gnod sbyin khyod kyi geci'i phyir nyan/ de nas yang phyag na rdongs
rdo rje gsor zhing bka' stsal pa/ kya sems can ma rungs pa dkyil 'khor du myur du zhugs la la'i dam tshig la gnas par gyis shig/ de nas lha chen pos// bcom ldan 'o das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das 'dilta bu'i sems can dbang phyug chen po la de skad bka' stsal ba 'dasu zhi'i// danas pa com ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rtan gsum gyi tshogs thams
cad dang ldan pa la bos te 'di skad gsungs so/// grogs po rnams dkon mam 'a/sum la bsku bas su 'gro ba dang/ dam tshig dang/ sdom pa lo sgrub par gyis shig/ phyag na rdo rje 'ad gnod sbyin khro bo ma
t+tA ku'u// rungs pa gtum pa 'a byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste/ rdo rje 'bar bas khyed khams gsum pa 'di dag thams cad brlag par byas sar/ de nas dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten gsum/

po mtha' dag gi dbang por gyur pa dang rang mdazhes pa'i debang gis 'khor mang po dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs pa bstanang 'a phyir khro zhing gtum pachen po rab tu 'jigs pa'i

gzu ba zhes 'bar ba chen po gtong 'ang ma rungs pa chan pos Na ga tu dgor pa rnams bstan nas 'di skad snyas/ kya ngani 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gas bdag po ngas khyod kyis nga la ci'i phyir dka' stsal/

de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rjed snyems pa dang bcas pas gsor zhing 'dzum sta 'ang de skad ces smas sa do// kyis lus srul po ma'isha tha pa/ bris su ro nga srags pa'i thal ba za zhing/ kha zas dang/ mal dang/
gos kyang de las byed pa nga'i bka' bzhin du byos shig/ de nas chen pa dbang phyug chen pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag dang nam mkha' rnams khro bo chen po chen pos non par byin gyis brlabs te 'di

skad ces smras so// khyod kyang nga' bkag nyogal dam tshig kyang 'khor zhig/ de nas phyag nar rdza khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lca chen po zhwa
bya ba'il 'od ni rang gis 'tshal ba'i stobs kyis dregs pa dang dngang phyag chen po'i ded nga gas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la 'dud par ma btub na/ de la ji ltar bgyi ba'i rigs/

[@]/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi thugs ka nas byung pa'i rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig dran par byas so// oM suM b+ha badzra hUM phaT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje

rdo'i snying po 'di brjod do// hU~M de nas de brjod ma thag tu khams gsum pa thams cad nas 'dus pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rtenagasum po'i dbang po thams cad kha sbyab tu 'gyel te nyam thag pa'i

tshig 'byin cing/ bam ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo// lcachen po zhes bya ba'i lha de ni sa la 'gyel te dran pa mad par gyur te shi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ byang

chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje l 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje 'a jape rten gsum po'i lekhor lo 'di thams cad la skyabs sbyin pa byas te ma bsad cig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i
rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas/ lha thams cad ngos 'dzasud ces gsungs so// gal te khyed rang gi srog 'dod na sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dgen 'dun la skyabs
su dang la pa'i bka' yang nyon cig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol te// sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dgen 'dun phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa la skyabs su mchi'o// khyed kyis bstan pa'i/
paka' na bdag cag gas ma 'tshal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas de dag bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kyelha rnams 'don nged de bzhin gshegs/
bya// pa thams cad kyi bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa
kyi thu bo bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po kun tu brad pa ste/ sems cad thams cad gdul ba'i don bya ba'i phyir khro bo'i rgyal po chen por dbang bkur ba'o// de ci'i phyir
( zhe na khyed kyi nang na bang lha chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can yod de/ de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bar mdzad pas sdig pa las zlogapar ma sadapa' sdug
pa'i sems cand rnams tshar can pa'i phyir byan gyis brlabs so// de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dmag la gnas par byosangashag par bka' stsalato// de dag gis 'daskades gsol u0f7cto// bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag srog yal pa las bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag kyang bka' stsal pa bzhin du bgyid cingams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kya grog po rnams 'di nyide la skyabs su dong dang/
danyid kyis kun du skyob kyis/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/ de nas khams gsum kun nas 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po de rnams/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag ga la ba de logs su bltas nas nyams
thag pa chen po'i sgra mgrin gcig tu byung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun tu skyab par gsol/de bar gshegs pa kun tu bskyabs par gsol//

5/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sam sa dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams ngos rta'ang skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma rungs pa rnams nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba'anges gcig tu 'bar/
ra dus nas khyed thams cad kyang thal bar byas sar/ de dag gis 'di skad sa gsol to/ khyodanabcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pod bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa/ zhi ba/ dul ba/ sems

can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cagasreg par 'gyur/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos de/

dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag ga gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa de'i phyirangan kun tu bzang po ste/ khyad lta bu'i sems can ma rungs pa'i ngang tshul can sdug

pa' sems rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir gal tre pa'i dam tshig la ma gnas na chud bzan par bya 'o// gsolang/ de bzhin du 'gyi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sa dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa'i lha de

dag gzhan dabugs dbyung zhing bslang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rdo dza bslang ba zhes bya ba 'di smras so// oM badzod tiyaM/ de nas de skad smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs par khams/

gsum pa 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kun bargyal ba las sems dbugase byung ste/ lha'i bde ba myong zhing 'jigs shing bag tshab dang ba spu lang ba med pa gyur nas/
bcom ldan 'das thub/na ro rdzol lta zhing langs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po lha' dpang po glu

chen po 'di ma bsrung na 'di'i srog de chud gzan par gyur te ru rung/ gsos nan de'ang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas ci gso ba'i snying po 'di skyas sa// badzra/
yu/ de nas 'dasmos ma thag tu lhachen po lha'i bdag po sha ba las sos te ldang 'dod na ldang na ma nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdage 'de lta bu'i
kha 'dul lam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod skyes bu chen po 'di'i bka' nyan par ma 'jugan khyod la 'dul ba 'di nyid yan gyi/ ngam yin no// dbang phyug chen pas gsol pa/ ca bcom
ldan 'das khyod kyis ma rungs pa 'isoms can 'di las skyabs mdzad par mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa 'di bskyapa ma nus so// gsol pa/ ci'i slad du/ bka' stsal pa/
dbazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gas ma 'tshal to/ ji ltar zhe na/ khams gsum gyi dag
po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i bdag po mchis pa ram 'tshalan 'di su lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ yang lha chen po
la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma rungs pa'i sems nang 'a pe[”]ka'amanyan tam/denas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig thos nas 'khrugs shing khros par gyur to// de ltar 'gyel bzhin

du'ang 'jigeg pa chen po'i gzugs bstan te 'di skad ces smras so// ngasha bar bzod kyi/ khyod kyi ngag mnato// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyagan rdo rje rab du khres par ston nga rang ga rkang

pa' na zil nas rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa 'ad phyung ngo// u0f00 po taka ra nabadzra hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasamathal nas kun tu 'barab ' rdo rje'i snying pa khrogatar byas pa/ mtshab lhag ger phung

ba gdong chen po' rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rdzong spyan sngar bka' nyan cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas phyagan rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po sbyang ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs

so o pa taka ra Na badzra/ o pa ta ka ri te/ sarba badzrad+ha ra a nu ra ka ta badzra hU~Mdza/ de skad gsungs pa dang/ lha chen po dang lha mo u mar bcas te rkang pa nyen khar bstan nas gcer bur byung ste/ skya bo thamu

cad kyis gad mos btapa cang rkang pas 'gugs pa rdo rjes rjes su spyod pas bkug ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar zhangs kyi drung du bzhag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
la phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can ma rungs pa mas bring dang bcas pa 'di ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
o badzra ku ma ho/ da nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan po phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g.yon pas mnan/ zhabs g.yas pas u

tsama'i numa'i steng du mnan nas rang gi snying po 'dasmras pa/ oM badzra A be shahan pa taMtaTaNanas de skyas ma thag tu lha chen po la babasanas rang la lag pa stong gas rang gi gdong stongal 'tshog go/ de nas rdo rje'anor

bu ni perma'i rtsa mo rdo rje dang/ nor bu dang/ rin po chalas byas pa'i khang bu btsugs pa'i phyi rol na srid pa gsum po thams cad e nged kyi dbang po de pad gnyade chen po des btul le zhes sgra chen po phyung

ngo= de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis wu chen pe la thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byams pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM bud+d+ha ma tribadzrarakAhaM/ de nas de skad gsungs ma thag tu lha

chen po la babs pa'i sdugabasngal de kun zhi bar gyur te/ du'ang phyir na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthal gyis rig pas de ba bla na med pa 'grub pa'i dbang dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par thar par dang/ gzungs dang/
chag me shes dang/ mngon par shes pa thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyin du 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to/ de nas wa chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs dang/ rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong ste/ lha chen po'i lus phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phul nas 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis/
kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ thal bas khebs pa zhes bya pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba dbang po'i debyangs zhes bya ba'i/
de bzhin gshegs par skyes so// de nas lha chen po' las de las ched du brjod pa 'di byung ngo// a ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sangs rgyas ye shes ldan med// ya ga'i tshig gis mnan nas su// myu/
danalas na 'das par bzhag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de las gzhan pa mthu chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad la 'ad skad cas bka'

stsal te// grogs po rnams da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ga da kyil 'khor chen po 'dare zhugs shig/ zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsungs shig/ de dag
gas 'ad skad ces gsol to// bdag cag ji skad bkab sul pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyagan rdo rjes srid pa gsum 'dus pa de rnams nges te 'di skad ces gsung
so grogs po rnams yang gsum la skyabs su 'dong ba dang/ bslab pa dang/ dam tshig dang/ sdom pa gzung la nga'i dam tshig la'ang gnas par gyis shig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ de bzhin du 'tshal na/

bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang dam tshig glo bar ma chud do//de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshige 'ad byon no// byang chub sems na rim bzhin du/ bskyed nas de yi 'og tun//byang chub chen por
nga// tsanus par// shani tu mnyam gzhag 'bad par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams 'jug pa'i dom tshab chen pe

phyag rgya bde ba byas nas/dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i stong pa 'dis 'ching du gzhug go/ oM badzra sa ma ya shrIts+tshan+taM ban d+ha sa ma ya/ badzrasatA sa ma yaM/ a nu su ra/ sarbata thA ga ta sa ma ya hU~M/ dra[0f7c] mo

b+ha ba sbya rom phyu ba/ A hApyo me lha ba/ a pra tape'o me b+ha ba/ sarba kamasu tsa me tsit+taMshri yaM/ ku ru hUM/ hahahahaho/ de nas 'di smos ma thag tu khams gsum gyi srid pa gsum gyi skye bo 'dus pa thams cad rdo rje dro/

bo ti rin ti ra 'i phyag rgya lag tu babs nas dam du 'ching bar gyur to// de nas phyagan rdo rjes tshul bzhin du btsud nas dkyil khor chen po thams cad go rams pazhin du bstan ta rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas

N+NaM dbang bskur nas/ rdo rje'i mtshan ma'ang lag tu bya nas rtsordzaming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la bkod do// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thamA

a cad kyi miraM rnams yin ste/ 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po na khro bo'i rdo rje'o//na thu bo chen sgyu ma'adzin+da'o// sgra gzhon nu naro dul bu'o// tshangs pa na thub pa ba rdo rje'o// dbang po ni rdo rje tshon cha ste/ ngag pi rgyal pa

rnams su dbang skar re/da nas bar snang laspyod pa'i bdag pa rnams la rjes su phyin pa na/'di lta ste/ nyi ma na rdo rje'akhyil ba'o// zla ba na rdo rje'od do// dbyig pa chen po'i gtso bon dbyig pa'o// sarasnyag

na rjes go ste/ de la sogs pa rdo rje khro bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i lcab dbang po thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ sbrang rtsis skyes pa na rdo rje gling pa'i sne'o// sbrang rtsir byed pa/

ni rdo rje 'phreng po'o// rgyab na rdo rje dbang po'o// rgyal bar byed pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyagatso bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// donas sa ba'i dbang po thams cad la phyin pa 'di lta ste/ mdzad

steng na rdo rje tho ba pa'o// me cha derdza ma'o// rar na derdzarlung ngo// ku ba ra na rdo rje 'jagegs pa'o// de la sogs pa na rje rje pho nyar dbang bskur ro//de nas sa 'og gi dbang po lha thams cad la byan pa 'ang lta ste/ pag na rdo rje lcagakya'o

ga na rjen rdo rje dus so// gtsug phud sa ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'o// b.ru Na na klu'i rdo rje ste da la sogs pa'i rdo rje bran zhes bya pa'i dbang bskur ro// danas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rin

po ma'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ rang gi mtshan ma la rdo rjer byin gyis rlabs nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ta/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la rab tu bskodado//

'ang lta ste/ u man khro bo rdorje ma'o// rug mi rkya na rdo rje ser ro// thAn rdo rje gzhon numa'o// tshangs ma na rdo rje'i ba ma'o// dbang mon rdo rje khu tshur te/ de la sogs pan rdo rjergyal mor dbang bskur ro// ranas ngarasnang

la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pan/ 'di lta ste/ma 'chi ba na rdo rjem 'chi ba'o// ro hin na dzordzamadangs so// dbyig pa 'dzanam na rdo rje dbyag mchog ma'o// sku pa 'phrog ma na rje rdza skyinga'i chang ma ste/ de la
pan khro mo zhes bya par dbang bskur ro// de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la de pa 'dalta ste/ gsod ma na de rje 'ju na 'o// za ba mnarje za ba me'o// ngag pa na rdo rje bsgo ba

mo'o dga' ba ni rdo rje dbang ngo// de la sogs pan tshogs kyi gtso bor dbang bskur ro// da nas sa la spyod pa'i bud mad thams cad la phyin pa 'di lta ste/ zhi pa mon rdo rje pho nya mo 'o// rlung ni mgyogs ma' rdo rjema'o// man rje/

rje 'bar ba ma'o// ku pa ra ma na rnarje 'bar ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nyamor dbang skur ro// de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la dun pa na/ 'di lta ste/ phag mo ni rdo rdzob khabo// tsamun tu na ro rdzab dus

sa/ sna chad ma ni rdo rje rul pa mo'o// ba ru na man rdo rje chu srin ma ste/ rdo rje pan mor dbang bskur ro// nga nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnams

bsdad nas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad bslabs te/ rdo rje dam tshig mna'i snying po 'di byin no// rdo rje 'dren rdo rjeche/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs dam tshig 'di las 'das nani// rigs rnams myur du

( thalabar byed// oM nyanas ma ya hU~M phaT/ de nas snying po gzung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'ad byon no// rordzi phyag rgyaganyis bcings te/ mdzub mo lcags kyar btsas nas na// gcu zhing re yang gnu bar bya//
dgos pa'i don sems gang yanapa// de yi mdun du khyed rnams na// dgos pa 'grub phyir 'dug par byos// khyod kyi srog na ma rung bar// dam tshig 'das na gyur ta ra/ rdo rje bcang ba dam byas te/
mdzub mo 'gug nas rab tu mnan// mtho pong gnyis ka mtshams sbyor bas// gung mo gas ka rab tu mnan// rdo rje drag pa 'dzan pa yi// dam tshig phyag rgya pa ring ba las// gal te 'ga' yas
badzes gyur na// dam tshig 'das na khyed gsod do// rtsordzaphya rgya gnyis ka mas// mthe'u chung sor mo bcangs nas ni/ mdzub mo sor rgyab nas na red/ bzlog ste mgo bor gzhag par bya// bdag nyid

che ba'i dam tshig 'di// rdo rje rag 'dzan bting nas ni// khros te gang la bltas pa yi// de yi mdun du de bzhin 'dug// rdo rje bsdams pa'i ngo rje yi// srung ba dam bcings mnan pa ni// de ni gsang ba'i dam

tshig ste// sems can thams cad srung ba'o// gang zhig gangal bskyabs pa'i phyir// khro bar ldan pas bcings na ni// sems can gang la srung ba pa// de yi rgyab tu 'dug pa ra skyes/ rdo rje'i phyag rgyu gnyis

bcings te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la// mtho'u chung gis ni dam par byas// gnu zhing saragacu drug bkrol nas// spyi boramanyam zhugs gang yin pa'i// dam tshig 'di ya nga sbyar byas na// khyed kyi da

yi mdun du na// dngos grub kun gyi mchog phyir bod// rdo rjebacang ba sprul banamadzub mo gnyis ka dom por bya// mthe bong gung mo'i rtse mo gnyis// rtsordzo'i phyogargyur bcanges nas kyang// bzlog ste dpral bar gzhags

par bya// gal te gsod par 'dod nani/ gug pa bya ba gang yin pa// de yi mdun du rtag tu 'dug// de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag bag snying po 'dzin pa'i dmag gi phyag rgyab dam tshag 'dzin pa'i snying po bad yi/
oM ba la da ba la ta badzra Akiraya hU~M dza// rdo= gnu ba'i phyag rgya lha dgug pa'i snying po'o/ hUMbadzra sa gra nA pa yasam ye hU~M/ bar snang nas skyed pa rnams kya'o// oM badzramA la agra daM/

'phreng bana rnams kyi'o// u0f00 badzra ban/ sa la spyod pa rnams kyi'o// oM badzra pA tAl b+hany+dza b+hany+dzahU~MyaDa/ sa'i 'ogan gnas pa rnams kyi'o//oM har ka badzra sa ma ya sar dus ma ya mu dro b+hany+dzaka hU~M
phaT/ bud med thams cad kyi//don bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ btsam ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs parul pa po//
dbang bskur na bcas pa'i dkyil bar ma rungs pa de dag thams cad ji ltar posgrub par bgyib 'degs par bka' stsal par gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsan nas de skad ces bka' stsal to//

! o badzra sid+d+ha nisiMt+ta hU~MphaT/ da nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thug na rdo rjes sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gul gas pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badzra sa ma ya A

ka yasajamaN+Da lam badzrab+ha ra sad tu A ti kra ma hUM phaT/ rdo rjelcags kyu nyas bcas te// snying khar yos su bskor bar bya// mdzub gnyis lcag kyu'i phyi rol gyi// dkyil 'khor 'gugs pa mchog yin no// de nas

ni bshad ma thag tu dkyil 'khor thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol kun tu bskor ta 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so//

kyagrogs po dag sro gcod pa dag srung zhing dam tshig gzung ba la sgrub par gyis shig/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi sems can de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshol ba na dungs pa'i sems can lag pas mdangs 'a sdig pa la srog ltos na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ja ltar 'tsho bar bgyi ba de bka' stsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem

dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ma rungs pa' rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so// oM duShAbadzra kyi rgyu ratan da hapatshu ba d+manas ya bi ka ra sarba duShA sa ma ya mu du mats+tsha la/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mar da mar da khA da khA da/ pa raman brdzus ma ma

hU~Mpa Ta/ rdo rje khro mdzub legs par na/ sen mo sprad de da lAs nas kyang/ rtsa lo gnyis na dam sbyar ba/ phyag rgya 'dan ma rungs 'joms/ da nas 'di snyas ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor bad thams cad gcig

tu 'dus pa rnam pa du mas gtse zhing dbul pa dang/ dam tshig gi phyugargya bcanges pa'i ng dral to/ ma rungs pa'i dem tshag khagasems can de rnams yaM bsregs shun tu btsos pas 'o dodachar 'bod cing 'phongs pa'i sgra

cher phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ga la ba der thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag srog dang mi dpral bar skyabs mdzad du gsol/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes
yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/

oM na su b+hu na da ha pa tsa gany+tsa b+han+d+ha hU~M phaT/de nas byang chub sems dpag phuganardo rje s rdordza 'o bo ma bcad pa bad gsungs so/// oM mahAbadzra khur kro d+ha pa ta ye sacha dut+ta maN+Da laM/bsha ya
sarbadusal yaMb+hi k+ka ra ban sa ya yab+hany+dzaya sa rus mtshudwab+hA grostsahan da ha pa tsa sarbadus ma ya satwaM badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ de nas gsungs ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dam tshig dang

phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang gca tugyur nas rgya mtsho chen por lhung ngo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
la ma rungs pa thams cad thul cig ces bka' stsal na/ 'phra mnam dang gdon la sogs pa gnod pa de dag thams cad la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad a bka'
stsal to// oM han han badzrahU~MphaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyagan rdo rjes yang 'phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs pa' snying po 'di gsungs so//

o badzra A kar ya shA hU~M sarba duSh+Tha grwa haM/ badzrapAr satAn hU~Mdza/ de nas de smras ma thog tu 'phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad rarab ra'i rtse mo'i phyi rol bskor ta'akhod do// de nas byang chub
thog/ sa mas dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ 'phra men ma la sogs pa gdonam rungs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// klu bzod ldan rnams srog gcod pa sar ba'i bslabapa dang/ dam
nag sdom pa gzung bar byos shig/ rdo rje 'od 'phro ba dang/ rab tu 'bar dang/ gcig pu 'bar bar gyur pas khyed kyi rigs rnams ma lus par bsregs sa re/ da nas 'phra men ma la sogs pa gdon
ma rungs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshol ba na ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol ma// de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'ang skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje sems can bde dag rnams la snyang rje chen po skyed la thabs sbyin pa sgrub par gyis shig/ danas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs

chen pos sems can thams cad 'chi bab tshanamangashes pa' ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snying po bar gsungs so// oM badzra pra dgosnasrid ya mAkaraya/ yadaNi yaM A mad+ha ra d+ha na mi ya ti/ ta skya hrid yaM ni skyo

ma dus ma ya hU~M dza/ de nas deb rgya bcing ba bshad do// sAng khar rdordza lag ngar gnyis// shin tu dam por bcangs nas ni// rdo rje badzub mo'i rtse mo yis// rang gi chan khung drud par bya// khyed rnams
kyis phyag rgya 'od sems can zams cad kyi snyang rus la tho zhig/ de nas 'phra mnamal sogs pa ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad dga' ba'i sgra phyung nas mchong rgal te rang gi gnas su dong ngo// de nas
kacom las phyag na rdo rjes btsom ldan 'das la yang 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhan gshegs pa thams rang ka se ngas 'dul ba lags par de dag la bkal/
stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rims la sogs pa'i nad de rnams la ji ltar bgyi bdag la bka' stsol cige// donas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM hU~M phaT/

de nas byang chub sems dar 'a chen pa phyag na rdo rjes rimasal gsogs pa'i nad 'gug pa'i phyag rgya'adi gsungs pa// oM badzrasam ma/ An ya sarba duShA dzArAd+hanasha ma hU~M pha'/ de nas 'di gsungs ma/
thag tu rims la sogs pa'i snod thams cad ra ral pa'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskor tu 'khod do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ rims la sogs pa'i nad 'di rnams la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal ta/
kya bzod ldan rnams sems can gsod pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa zungaba'i sem pa lang shog/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ga na sems can gyi mdangs phrogs te 'tshor par gyis
na= da bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar bgyi/ legs par bka' stsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las rnam par dag par gyur pa'i pe shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po'

gsungs so// oM badzra karma bsho d+ha ya sarba a ba ra Na na bud+d+hA sa t+yA na sa ma ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bse ba bshad do// rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas kyang// mthe bong bsnyams

sbyar nas ni// mnan pa 'di ni sdig 'phrog pa// phyag rgya 'di rams la sogs pa'i med thams cad kyis gang btab pal las byas la bston n de khyed rnams kyis thong zhig/ khyad dag srog dang bral la ro/de nas/
[e]di rnams de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol te sar dong ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyaganardo rje s/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag

sgra'i pa thams cad pas la ba dang las kyi sgrung pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du nyad kyi thugs ka nas phyung na/ de la bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba la gsogs pa ngan song de rnams thams cad ji

ltar bgyi bo bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ o kA pa ya badzra swAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ngu 'bod la sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba'i 'khyer

lathams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM sarba a pa ya A kar Na bi sho d+ha na badzras ma ya hU~M phaT/ de nas ba da chesungs ma thag tu du 'bod chen po la sogs pa ngan song na gnas pa rnams ri rab kyi ri

rtse mo'i phyi rol du bskor te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ ngan song bde sar ltung ba'i sems can de dag thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kya bzod ldan rnams

dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ dam tshig dang/ sdom pa dang/ ngan song thams cad las thar pa'i phyag rgya dang snying po zung zhag/ de nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das bdag cag stag bsngal gyis gzer ba 'di las skyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ khyod la skyabs su mchi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rjes ngon
song thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badzra pA Na bo sbe Ta ya sarba a pa ya bskrunan phra mo kA ya/ sarba pA ya ga ta sarba satwaM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra/
sa ma ya tu Ta/ de nas da' phyi rgya btsang pa bshad do// rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te// gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas su// tha ma bzhin rtsa mor sbyar// sdig pa 'joms par grag pa yin// de nas ngan

song gsum gyi kher lo na gnasapa' sems can thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di mthong nas ngan song thams cad nas sha 'phesanas// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes so//

ngan song de rnams kyang rgya mtshochen por bor ro// danas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsasol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus

pa med pa'i skabs dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba thams cad myong bgyi ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de khon nyid kyi grub pa ma par 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i bar du tshol cig par bdag la bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal na/ ma 'di rnams ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM badzra pA Ni ma hAatsAlaM pra be sha ya sarba duShA ro trasnyi ba ra ya pra bo bya pra mo sha ma trar dro par+ya paM aM/ bshed+ma yanA
sha ma bane shAya/ hahahahahU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa'i tshig de thos nasasems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par bskyab pa dang/ phan pa dang/ bad ba/

thams cad dang/ dngos grub dam pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yi shes dang mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar dud bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje chan pos dam tshig las

byung ba 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bde bshad do// de nas rab tu bshang bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rjod byas dang 'dra ba yi// dngos grub thams

cad byed pa'i chog/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya// rdo rje dam tshig las byung ba// sangs rgyas byang chub 'byin byed pa'i/ mdung thams cad rnam par 'jug/ de la sngags 'dus srad bu bri bar bya'o// o

badzra sa ma ya sU twaM/ mA ti kra ma ho/ grubazhing bya zhir sgo bzhi'i gdod// rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu brgyan// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// dar dang 'phreng bas shin tu brgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa rnams su//

sgo khyud kyi na mtshamA rnams su// rdo rin chen brgyan par na// dkyil 'khor phyi rim srad bu dra// shes rab can gyis de nang du// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan te// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// ka ba brgyad dang rta babs

bcas rdo rje ka ba'i gnas chog tu// dkyil 'kher lnga yis brgyan byas te// de ltar dkyil 'khor srad bu bri// srid bu bres par tshonams dgang// de latshonal bzlas pa ni 'di'o//oM btsa ta sa ma ya hU~M/danas dbus su
klu// 'dug nas ni// rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag pas// rdornga sgonam bzhi pa// yid kyis sun dbye bar bya// de la sgo rnams dbye ba'i sngags na gda'// oM badzod gyuT ya sa ma

prany+tsa sha ya hU~M/ bogasar ram dngul las byas pa 'am// sa yang rung ste legs bris pa'i// pha ga gru bzhir byas pa la// sangs rgyas gzugasan gzhag par bya// de la de bzhin ga shags pa tham sa cad sngan drang

ba' snyad pa no 'ad yin no// oM badzra dz+wa la ak+Sha pa sku ukar ya sarba ta thA ga tAnaM/ ma hAbadzras ma ma hUMdza/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rjen// 'bar bas bskor bas gzhug par bya// de bzhin rinachan

'or bskor ba// padroro kun da bzhin// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dgod pa'i snying po 'di yin no// spusatwa padzra dzu la mA lA hU~MphaT// o rat+tabadzra dz+wa la mA lA hUM tuM daoM d+ham ngadzradzul ma lA hU~Mdza/

karma badzra dz+wa lam lAhU~M a/ rdo rje shugs kyis bcal nas ni// sangs rgyas spyan sngar da bzhin du// shes pas chog bzhin drwa ba// rdo rje hU~Mzhes dkyil 'khor ro// de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying ra naM'ad [”]

oM badzra be ga kra ma hU~M// 'ad bzhin du rdo rje dpyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad la'ang srad bu la brgal te thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o// de nas de'i phyag rgyu bshad do// yid kyis ri mo pa bag

nas ni// rdo rje srad bu 'am gzhan yang rung// phyir phyung nang du zhugs kyang na/ dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// phyag na rdo rje bri bani// u t+pal cher sngo 'tsher ba'i mdog/ rje tsit+taM

zhes bya bar 'dus// mche ba cung zad byung ba' zhal// khro dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i zhal// g.yon brkyang tshul du zhugs pa ste// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i da/ gson pa'i zhabs kyi mthul gyisan/

dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya// g.yos pa'i zhabs kyis u ma pa// nama'i steng du gnonapa bA// de yi snyang po ni 'di yin no// hU~M de ya phyogs thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo gzhags pan// khros pa mang po

byung ba na// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa 'a 'od// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badzra sata kro d+ha hU~M phaT/oM badzra kro d+ha A be sha ya hU~MphaT/ oM karma kro d+harA ga ya shu oM badzaduTA kro d+ha sa

hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par na// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang// der na rdo rjer dbang bskur bas// rdo rje khro bas bskor bar bri// de nas de rnams kyi sAng pa 'ad bshad do// taM oM badzra b+hi ku Ti kro rgyu ha

ra ha ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra sUr+ya ma hA dz+wa lamA lA kro d+ha dz+wa la ya satwaM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ke tu de he hU~M phaT/ o badzra dAs kro dra ha ha ha hahU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par na// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang// rong

snga na bro bya ba// khro bo bdag nyid chen pos bskor// de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do// hi/ oM badzra d+ham kro rgyu pa nangasha ya sho d+ha ya hUM phaT/ o badzra tIka kyi rtsa ba sku phyogs pa/ oM badzra ha tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Da le

sarba hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha b+ha khab ta ba tahU~M phaT da dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par na// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang/ rdo rje dbab pa bras pa na// rdo rje khros M bo tshogs kyis bskor// de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad

do a hU~M badzrakarlu hU~MphaT/ oM badzra ka pa tsa kro d+ha rakA hUM phaT/ oM badzra yakA kro d+ha kha ra kha da hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha muny+tsisA d+ha ya sa ma ya hU~MphaT/ dkyil 'khor gyin rnams su// rdo rje dbyangs

kyis tshul bzhin du/ ji ltar go rims bzhin du na// gsang ba'i mchod pa kun pra bo/de nas de dag ga snying po'i phyogargya ba da lanano// oM badzra sa yer ga ya hUM phaT/ oM badzramU la a byAny+tsa hU~M 9 pa oM badzra
dug ga ta yaM23// oM badz+dzi ba'i ku ru hU~M phaT// dkyil 'khor rnam pa'i spyi [', ] rdordza shugs kyis nga rgal nas kyang// de yi gro rnams nyid dun// mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams gzhag de nas do

rnams kyi sIr pa ni lang pa nan// oM badzra d+hu pa pu dza sar Na sa ma ma hUM phaT// oM badzra puShA pU dza ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phalnga/ o badzra A lekopU dzA spa ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ oM badzra gan+d+ra pU dza pU ra Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ sgo rnamA
pa'i dbus sa ni/ lug sa kya la so bas gzhag par bya/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol rna mas su rnal rdo rje'i rigs rnams sa// de nas dedag gi snying po rnams shad de/ daoM badzra A na na yAkye d+ma ka

[' ]ya san+t+ra sa ma[& ]66 daoM badzra pA ma hA kro d+ha pra pa/ yasam+b+has ma yaM hU~M/ oM pad+ma skye Ta[']kyi d+ha bcu pany+tsasad+d+hA sa ma yaM hU~Mb/ oM badzra A be sha ma hAkro d+ha a be sha ya sad+ma sam aM hUM/ de nas 5 pa 'di'ang

chen gsum las rnam par rgyal ba' dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad do// du la ngang pa nyor nga rdo rje slo dpon bdag nying kyis rdo rje khro po ti ran te ri'i phyag rgya bcings te zhugs shing// zhugs nas da bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab ste// bcom ldan 'das brtag na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khri lo' de bang du mas rta tshar gcad par ris sa pa rnams n tshar gcad do// bsdu ba'i rigs pa rnams

pasdu na de ni ji ltar bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas nas/ rdo rje khro bo ti ren ti ro'i phyag rgya rang gi snying kharaja lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste/ rdo rje lcag kyu la sogs pas las byas nas/

yang dom tshag ba sa phyag rgya thams cad datsas shing de nas thams cad byon par gyur ro// de nas yang gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi byas nas bajug pa la sogs pa'i ng de bzhin no// de nas cho ga 'as rdo rje slob ma chucig/

rongoslob dpon de rang gis khro bo rdo rje te ran ti ro'i phyag rgya bcings ta/ slob ma la'angasAng po 'dadeng 'chung du na gcig/ o grar badzra sa ma ya hAthaM/ da nas gos sngon po bgos la/ mgo la gtsug tor sngon pas bcings

ti/ dar sngon pos gdong dkris la sngags 'dis chug pa// o badzra sa ma yaM ma pra bshum/ de nas btsug te rdo rje dbang pa'i dem tshig ga phyag rgya dang snying po'ang de la dbab par gyis shig/ oM badzra A be sha A/ n gnas
babs nas de ltar babs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so// 'das pa dang/ ma 'ong pa dang/ nga ltar byung ba thams cad kyang skad cig gis shes so// gnod pa'i ng med par

gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis ma tshugs phar 'gyur ro// hU~M zhes bya bas kyang sems can thams cad la tshar gcad pa dang phan gdags pa byed nus par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'ang rtag tu de'i ngagos pa
thams cad sgrub bo/ de nas mama'i snying po ni rug/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa pa krol te dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du ston cig/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba tsam gyis sngag pa
thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum pa mtha' dag las rnam ra ra rgyal bar nus par 'gyur ro// hU~M zhes byas pas lhachen po la sogs pa lha thams cad dgag pa dang/ gzhag pa dang/

ngarung ba dang/ yapa kha du mya pa dang/ mnan par nus par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang

shing rang gi dngos grub sbyin pa mdzad do//de nas de la rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro//rang gis tshanas rdo rje rtsod de ji b+ha ban du sngags 'di lag pa gnyis susbyin no/ oM badzra pA Nibadra ma ka'o bde nas sngag 'di rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ro//oM badzra kro d+ha

d+ha Shiny+tsami badzram a b+hi ka taha dza sAya/ de nas gang la mang btags pa de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas yoshas rnams bskyed da rdo rje khro bo mnyam bzhag nas/ 'bar ba mang pa 'od
can gyi/ rdo rje dpyades na sA lar bsam// skye bo kun la 'babs par byed// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas// dpral bar rdo rjerina chen yong// de bzhin 'du na bsam byas nas// sems can tham
cad dbang du byed// dordza khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mang po'i 'od// rdo rje padomagul du bsam// sems can thams cad g par byed// rdo rje khro bo mnyam bzhag nas// 'bar

bab 'phreng ba mang po'i 'od// rdo rje thams cad skya bor gzhas/// skye bo 'di dag thams cad bsungs// de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi snying po na 'od dag yin no// hU~Msan+d+ha badzra kro d+ha A bi sha a/

horar badzra kro d+ha b+hu Sham nA ya hU~M/ badzra d+hamA kro d+ha nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ hUM karma badzra kro d+harakA/ de nas lha thams cad dgug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab so/ cu zhes bya ba bcings nas ni// lag pa rdo rje lcags kyu sam/
khros nas mdzub mo bskul nas ni// lha rnams 'gugs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// rang gzheng mthil dbus su ni// rdo rje lcags kya bris nas su// de nyid kyis ni rtag mnanan// lha rnams nges par du 'gags//
rdo rje'i lcags kyud phyag rgyu// legs par phye ste bzhugs nas su// bskalan um la sogs la// bud med thams cad 'gug par 'gyur// rdo rje lcags kyu bzhag pa na// mjug ngo nyid du de bzhin te// des

man lha mgang yin// de ni de la gnas pa'i dam pa 'o// dedag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badzra kro d+ha A kar ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzrakarma aM ku sha kro d+ha a kar ma hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha daMShA A kar ya hU~M phaT/ o badzakro d+ha

saM gats+tsaakar ya mata badzra sa ma ya ma nu smar hUM phaT// de nas phyag rgya rnams bzhib ye shes bslab bo// brkyang zhing bskam pas gnas nas su// rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyisan// hU~M tsam gyis kyang skad cig gis//

skye bo thams cad 'bebs par byed// rdo rje ngagan le ga par s+yas// hU~M zhes bya ba bzhi ldan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying pa yis// thams cad kyang na nges par 'gugs// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/
rdo rje khro bo lha mchog gis// skye bo kun gyi bdud byed de// rdo rje hU~Mgi rnal 'byor to// yid kyis lus la go bgo ba// bdag gam pha rol rnams la ste// go cha chen po'i sbyor bas na// skye bo
nyo drug

ya hU~M ka re Na pA ta ya badzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ oM ma mo dri rgyu badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rakA hUM phaT/ de nas sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgyab ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje khro por mnyam bzhag nas// badzra hU~Mzhes

bskrus pa yis// gang dang gang la kun zhugs pa// phyag rgyas btab par de 'gyur ro// sgra chen du na brjod bya ba// Tak+kahUM phaT khros nas su// lan cag gang la smras pa na// rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon bkug/

rdzoN+Di khro po' tang 'dzin cing// rdo rje lta bas bltas pa yi// sems can gang dang gang yin pa// da nas de ni dran nyams 'gyur// yid la bsad ces bsams nas su// snying khar rdo rje sgom par byed/ dahU~Mzhas/
bya pa' nyid kyis kun// rang ga rgyas ni btub par dgongs// sems can gang dang gang dag la// yid kyi rgyas na 'debs pa gang// phyag rgya 'dis na ngeshan tu yang// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya//

sku de nas de dag gi snying po 'di dag go/ ki hU~M phaT/ Tak+ka a/ Tak+ka dzra/ Tak+ki hUM/ Tak+ki haM/ phyi rgya re res kyang las bzhi rnams la phyag rgya'i snying po bzhis sbyar ro// de nas gsang ba bro bo ye shes kyi phyag rgya ra slab ngo

yan lag kun gyis 'khyud nas nas// hU~M zhes gang la sbyor bya ba// dbang po gnyis na srang byas na// de yi srogan ma rungs 'gyur// hU~M zhes bya bar ldan pa yis// ma sbyang sos na mchu bzung nas// dbang

po gzhes nir ba sdud pa// gang yin de ni mngon sum 'gyur// hU~Mzhes sbyor ba gang yin pa// de na bde ba myong bar 'gyur// dbang po gnyis na spyad gyur na// gang yin de ni sdug bsngal 'thob// hU~Mzhes bya ba

rab sbyor zhing// dbang pa gnyis ni sprad nas kyang// yan lag kun gyis btsor gyur na// de yi lus na bsrung bar 'gyur// nganus de dag gi snying pon 'ang dag go// hU~M a hUM dza/ hUhe/ hUMyaM/ ha/ de nas/

'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal khab dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig ga de khon nyid phyag rgyan ye shes bslab bo// gang gi sems can la phan phyi'i// rdo rje dbyangs kyi tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas rjes

su dran byas na// de ni sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// dbang phyug dang na u ma ang// sa la brase ta de ltar mnan// ji ltar bras pa'i go rims bzhin// ut+pal che sngo 'tshor ba'i mdo/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya

khacango bar bya// 'di ni bcas pa tsam gyis kyang// da ni 'jag rton gsum rgyal ba// rdo rje hU~M dang 'dra ba yi// dngos grub rdza 'phrul myur du 'grub// ji ltar ri mo bris ba bzhin// 'bar ba'i bskor ba'i dbus
bzhug pa// sku gsungs thugs ni rdo rje yas// sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing ba bya// de nas de rnams las shad de// rdo rje lasan bla na mer// sangs rgyas rjes su dran grub pas// myur du sangs rgyas nyid
'a thob po// 'jig rten dag las rgyal bcanges na// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal 'gyur// rdo rje tshe dang kun tu 'gro// rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba 'dra// rdo rje dbang ga rgyal por
'gyur// chos bzang ldan pas 'jig rten dbang/ las kyi rdo rje khro bo chad da rdo rje las na byed par 'gyur// sems dpa' khro bo rab tu brtan// khro bo lcags kyu yang dag 'gugs// khro bo
chags pas tshogs par byed// khre bo 'al sa pas da ga' ba ster// khro gnyer gyis kun ma rung byed/ khro bo nyi mas gzi brjidi mchog/ dbal gyi khro bo don rnams sdud/ daha rgod pas
bdud du byed// chos kyi khre bo chos rnams sdud// rdo rje ral gri mchod par byed// rgyu ya khrib sdug bsngal 'phrog/ khro po skyas pa'i tshig 'phrog go/ las kyi khro be lasar da da da srung
ba yis na srung bar byed// khro po gnon sbyin dag/yang za// khre bo khu rgyu dngos grub ster// de nas de rjes tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad de// rdo rje gnyis su gyur pa na// dam rigs/
mchog tu grags pa yin/ de dag pacing ba bshad par bya// khro bo gtsang pa bla na med// lag ngar rdo rjer byas nas su// mthe'u chung lcags kyun bcang par bya// mdzub mo gnyis kyis
bsdigs pa na// 'jig rten ba/sum las rgyal zhis cu du/ dbazhin mdzub mo ngesasbyar tu// nor bu'adra khar rab tu dbadugs/ dgung mo mnyam bsgreng pad+mor bya// gung mo mdzub mo gnyis
kas bsngags// mdzub mo gnyis ka rdo sngon pya du/ g.yas pa lcags kyas dgag par bya/ de nyid hUM zhes bya bas 'dud// legs pa sbyin pa de yin te/ mdzub gnyis dpA la pa'i gteramar/
gzhag snying khar mdzub mnyi mas bskor// lag pa brkyang stes par gzhag/ mdzub me kha nas dgong ltar bya// mdzub mo sen mo sbyar ba ste da/ g.yas pa la grwa khacings pa'o// gung
mdzub mnyam bsgreng 'khor ya// kha yanan gnas dbyungab dang// mdzub mo gung mo rdo rjer sbyar// mdzub mo yas na mgul pas bskor// mdzub mo gnyis namatsheg che// mdzub mo bkug pas

de rje btsas// rje rje spyi la sogs pa// sams ma'i phyag rgya de nyid hU~M// zhes bya chos kyi phyag rgya ste// hU~Mzhus bya bar lhan cig go/ danas rdo rjedam tshig ga chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/

na sangs rgyas rdo rje ya/traHnIrodza snying po la// rban re rjesna la 'o// a nu dordza thams cad kyi// tshuhi/ rtswa / hU~M/ pe d+ha ra/ d+ha ka rI hU~M/ gro/kri waM/ rta u0f7a/ rdo rje khro bo mang po yi de/ chos kyi phyag rgya rab

'grubapa'o// da nas rdo rjeramatshig gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad de// doN+Darags na chen pa yi// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdusan// rdordza 'gyang la sogs tshul gyis// khro bo khu tshur gnyis su bshad/

gang dang gang gse phyag rgya rnams// las kyi phyogs na gong du bya// de dang deran besgyur nas kyang// phyag rgya de na sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga'o// de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam
par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po thun mong ba'i phyag rgya bcang ba bshad do// 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgyan// rdo rje mdzub mo dam tshig ga de rdo rje hU~M zhes sngags kyi ste// dngos
grub thams cad yudakyis 'thob// mthe'uchung gnyis ka lcags kyur dpangs// rdo rjeganyis ka steng 'og tu// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni// skad cig gis ni thams bcad 'gugs// rig pa dam
pa thams cad kyi// 'jig rtemasum las rgyal zhes pashad// thams cad kyang na ge/non pa ste// de bzhin las rnams thams cad byed/ dardo rjeudzub sar gnyis legs pa// rab mnyam gzhag
ya mnyamanas na// shA ra ba pasu[–] ba ste// rdo rje slong ra zhes myu 'o// tshe ba gnyis legs par nade/ rdo rje bcang bas bcings nas su// bsgyur te gtsug phugazhag pa na// tshe dang nad med
'phel ba bo// rdo rje parung pa ya byas te// 'ab+bapong bsnyams nas nang du[// ]lu mo ra dpor kug nas su// gnus pas zhabs su 'gugs pa 'o// 'jig rten gsum rgyal pacing nas su gang
ga gzugs la skad 'gayon pas// legs par mnan pa' sa sa ma de// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phyag rgya gas gtsanges te/ gtsag la gcig gis brdabs pa sa na/ sems can gang gis lus/

lan/ babs nas de yang rje pa par byed// rdordzaphyag rgya gnyis bcings te// bdag gam pharal go char bya// mdzub mo gnyis kyis bcas byas na// sa pa nyis du srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje mjal du bcas nas su//

yad kyas khros nas dgab bya ba// mthe bong de rje dam pa ste// rdo rje ni chen 'grub par b gyur// sems dpa' rdo rje dam byas te// mthe bong gnyis kas gung mo mnan// mthe'u chung rdo rje rtsa me na de/ rnon po/
dam tshig 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje thugargya gnyis bcas te// mdzub mo gnyis bkug bcings nas su// gcu zhing phyir gcu byas pa na// lca 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin// rdo rje bcangs ba dam byas te//mdzub
mganyis bkug rad tu mnan// mthe bong gnyis ka sbyar ba yis// dbus su btsar ba bar snang gi 'o// rdo rje phyag rgyaganyis ka las// mthe'u chung gnyis ka pa'i ng nas kyang// rgyab sbyar mdzub
mo gnyis sbrel te// bsgyur pa mkha' la spyod pa'o// rdo rje btsangs pa bsdams nas su// rdo rje srung ba b.rung bar bya// 'di nase ya dam tshig ste// thams cad byed pas 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje'i phyag
rgya gnyis bcings te// sgo yon pa'i rdo rjemadzub mo la// mdze'u chung mdud dpung drag tu gtog/ 'di na sa 'og 'gags pa 'o// rdo rje bcing ba spel ba ni// mdzub mo gnyis ka dam bor te/

gung ma na tha pong rdo rjen/ dgadug pa'i phyi rgya 'dzoms pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis dmanges te// mnyam gzhag sten stong lar gzhag/ khre pokhu tshur patsar pa na// phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'jig pa'o/
g.yon pa'i rdo rjemadzub mo la// g.yas pab mdzub mo bkug pas bzung// rab tu khros nas drag gtog na// ri rab kyang na lhang bar byed// g.yon pa'i mdzug mo rdo rdzol// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo
lcags kyus bzung// rab tu khro zhing bkug pa yA// gdon rnams kun la dbang du byed// rdo rje bcing ba byas nas su// lag ngar snying khar shin tu bsdam// rdo rje mdzub me
gnyis mchan khung// drud pa yis na sAng 'byin to// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo las// mthe bong gnyis ka'i drung du ni// yid kyis khros nas par bya pa// ramis la sogs 'gugs dam pa kho//
dorjethal mo dam sbyar ti// mdzub mo gnyae ka nga kug nas su// mtho po rab tumanyam sbyar ba// mnan pa dan sdog 'o phrog pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du// 'dzub mo gnyis nasdus nas kyang//

legs par spyan du 'phangs pa na// skyel ba slong ba'i dam pa 'o// rdo rje bcang ba dam byas te// gung mo gnyis ni ngos sbyar nas// mtha' ma bzha yi ngos spyad pa/ daskad cig tu na stag 'dral to// de nas
da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje'i phyagargyas bzung nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang po srad bus bri// srad bus bris la phyi nas ni//
srad bu ji bzhin bri bar bshad// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka yasi// mdzub mo rtsa mo rab sbyar ba// byas nas tshon rnams thams cad la// 'bar nga 'a lta bas dgug par bya// rdo rje mdzub mo legs
par no// sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su// rab tu khros nas dbye ba na// sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin nod/ de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrib pa bshad do// brkyang bskum bya ni tshul
byas ta// khre le ya ni skad 'byin cing// khro zhing khro bo'i lta pas na// las rnams thams cad bslab par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dedzodam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/
jig rten gsum las rnamapar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so///bam po lnga pa// ra nas yang bcom ldan 'das

da pazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung brdo rje'i byin gyi rlobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba badzran//

badzramA to an ya san+d+ha badzra sa tAn hUM dza/ dranas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' thugs kanas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid phyag na rdo rje 'dra ba kun nas 'bar bas
bskor nas/ rdo rje khro bo gsang ba'i dam chog gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs nas/ bcom ldan
'das rdo rje sems dpa' setsun mo gsang ba'i phyir sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgyab gzugs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor chen pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i ye shes bla na med// do bzhon
gshegs pa de ba'i phyir// btsun mo nyid du gyur pa yin// hi de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'kher rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba 'di

gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyange dang 'dra bas na// khro bo'i gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu
bra dkyil 'kher lngayi gnas rnams su// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bshad par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus sun// sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya//sangs rgyas khro bo'i dam tshig kyang// ja bzhin par

na mkhas pas bri// rdo rje shugs kyis brgyal nas kyang// phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dre'i/ dbus su mdung rtse zhang bras la// rdo rjerab tu gnas bya zhing// 'od 'bar dbus su bri ban// de yi go rims ji

bzhin tu// rdo rje rdo rje'alcags kyu dang// mda' dang dga' ba de bzhin no// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par yang// 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chan bri bar bya/
