khe gnyer dbus su rdorja bu// da dazhan rdo rje gnyis rgyal mtshan// de bzhin so yi 'phreng ba de'/ngos su rdo rje'i bri bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas na// dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par na//padrub debus su

gnapa yi// rdo rje pad+mob lha rdzas bris// 'bar ba'i dbus supad+mo ba ]/ral gra'i khor la de bzhin no// rdo rje lce yang tshul bzhin du// rtag tu de ya phyogs su gzhag/jorje shugakyi brgal nas na/dkyil 'khor bzhi pa

00/dam par yang// rdo rje dmyal la rdo rje bu// rdo rje 'dan chen por bskor// de ya phyogasan thems can du/ 'bar ba kun gyis dkrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje thams cad go chab mchog/ rdo rjamar pa khu tshur achog/ grwa dang

phya ya gnas rnams su// tshul bzhin du'i brab r bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya' ragi pa mdor bsdus na// dza= oM badzra kro d+has ma ye dza da daoM badzra kro rgyur kha aM ku sha A na a sam+b+ha o badzrare kaM kA ma

badzra Ni be kaM ma A na ya ha dzaM/ oM badzra dut+takro rUtoShaya sat+thaM dzi// rdo rje ji zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// ji oM badzra b+hU ku shu kro rgyu shar sa awa/ oM badzra dz+wa la mA lA pra be sha ma ha kro d+ha a dzAl a

sawaMr ba ro 'dza// o badzra d+hAdzA ga ke smra ra ma hA kro d+ha hame sarba stany+dza/ oM badzra ak+Sha hA sa na hA sa ha sa t+taM Ta hA se nAmA ra ya dza/ rdo rjedza zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// oM badzra shud d+ha kro d+hA na hanamA ra la du

da/oM badzratIkodats+tshin+da/ ka shan saMhran h+pha/ oM badzra he du ma hA d+he pra de tsakaM/ pra be sha ya sat+pan+naM/ oM badzra dza hA ma d+hA kornya ba sha ba tsamuny+tsad haM/ rdorjed zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// oM badzra

sarba mu khe gar badzra Nam ko d+ha ku ru kur sazhAn hi/ oM badzra kro d+ha ramits+tsaM oM badzra tsan+d+ha kro d+hi ma hA ya Ni badzra daM k+Sha a kA la bsha ne ba ya hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha mu khaM d+ha haM/ rdo rje tshigs zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//

de nas dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnams surdordzagar la sogs pa bu se gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rig pa'i snying po rnams gsus pa/ oM badzra hU~M khaM/ badzra hUM hUM/ badzra hUM taM/ badzra hUtaM/ phyi'il gyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i
sAng pa rnams brjod par bya'o// oM badzra ta te/ badzan/ badzra d+hAtu/ badzra Do ta de nas sgo bzhi'i mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sung pa rnams gsus so// badzra dzadza/ padzra/

da laM/ badz+dza a/ dan sa 'di'i rdorje rigesakyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jugs pa kha tshog rgyas pa 'ad bshad do// de nas de la thog ma nyid du re zhag 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil

'khor chen po'i 'jug pa 'tshog bzhin du bcug ste/ rdo rje thogs te rdo rje rigs kyi dmag gi phyag rgya dang/ 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang lan gyi phyag rgyu dang/ nyar pa 'phugargya dang/ ya shas kyi phyagargya rnams

kyis rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa'i phyir gar gyis mchod par bya'o// de la gar dang/ lanargya gar dang/ 'thab gar dang/ ma shes kyi gar rnams kyis mchod pa 'a phyag rgyab ye shes kyis gar rnams na 'di mnano/

da 'a dang de nyid dudorngadabyangs su bsdus pa'i snying pos rdo dzaglu len cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pas mchod pa byas nas/ rdo rje slob dang don gyas sams dpa' rdardab phyagargya drag tu g.yo

par bya'o/ de nas ji snyed zhugs ra rnams phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par dpag par bya'o// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje khro de'i mdzub mo gnyis// rdordzahU~M mdzad phyag rgyar na// sAr khar shin tu btsas

bar bya// de nas gar gyi tshe phog ya// rdo tsabo lcag yase//sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ngo// rdo rje mdaban ba phang bar bya// rdo rje da' na 'phang pas kyang// rdorjo dga' bas bslab par bya// phyag
rgya'atshog bzhin ba krol te// thal mo brdab gnying bcang bar bya// mtshon pa'i tshig bad yin/ phyag rgya rdorje mnyes par bya// mnyes nas dgos pa thams ru dran//'don pazhin skad cig zhus kyis 'grub/

do la gar gyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di rnams mkhyeno// sa d+d+he badzra/ A nA ya badzra/ rAgA ya badzra/ sA d+hu badzra/ drab 'og tu badra bab ge ra gyis mchod pa bya ste// da pazhan gar gyi g.yon pa na// khu tshur g.yas pas

zung nas ni// bsgyur zhing mdzub me'i sa kyis ni// dpral kho nyas la gzhag par bya// de bzhin gar byang nyim yang// paskor nas yang dag dgag par bya// rdordzargyalatshan bsran gnas ni// rdo rje ha zhes dgod
cung mchod pa 'od yatshe g.yas/ rgyal pa la sogs ma kun kyang// dbang dang rapakyi gzabarjod dang// sbyin dang dpe da pas mnyes par byed// de la 'ad rnams na'adra ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po bad nems

yanano// A ha badzra/ dzAlam badzra/ de ledzra has padzra/ de bzhin gar yang bkrol nas ni// pad+ma khad dus sbyar ba ma// mdzub mo'i rtse mo snying khar gzhag// bsam pa g.yos par gdud par bya// de bzhin

gar byang rnardza ya/[】]ral gris ba/gas na gcod ltar bya// mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba yas// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor// rdordzab tshig tu glu len ltar// phyagan rdo rje chod par bya// mchod

pa 'ad yi cho ga yis// thams cad mnyes pa nyid du 'gyur// de la 'bad nems nata ba'aphyogargyabasnyang po rnams yin no// ga mA ma padzra/ ts+tshin ya badzra/ bats+tshaya badzra/ phru hi badzra/ rdo rje khro po'i mdzub yang dag/
bkananas rtsa masgyur nas kyang// bsgyur tad nas gtsug tor du// mdzub mo dmu ma gzhag par bya// rdolas kyi tshul gyis na//lus kun mchog ga de kyil 'khor du// gar gyi cho gas brtan par bya/

snyang bar rab tu gzhag par bya// de bzhin gar gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje srung ba bcang bar bya// rdo rje mche ba bcings nas nadi/rdordzi bar nges pas mnan par bya// mchod pa 'ad pa tsho ga ya/// las rnams kun kyang nus par 'gyur/

mchod pa rnams bzhi byas nas ni/ cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya dgrol// de dag gi snying po ni bda rnams 5na no/nAr+ya badzra/ rak+ta badzra/ lA da badzra/ ban+d+ha badzra/ de nas khro po gnang bab phyag rgyab ye shes bslab po// rdo rje gsang

bab la ga gnyis kyis// khros pa'i yid kyis drag gtog bya// skye bo gang gi mang skyes pas// de yi steng na 'gas par 'gyur/ ma ma rlu se yas bzung nas na/ gang gi ming gyis gzer ba ni// de yi mgo yang myur 'gas/

te/ gang gi bka' las 'da' ba 'o// khro bo chen po 'di lta pa'i// mag kyang 'dzums par byed pa na// gang gi mang ni smos bltas pa// de ya ma ga na rdel bar 'gyur// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag la// bdag rang gi

snyang bar yang// rdo rje bcangs pas btsur nas ni de/ de yi sems na 'jig par 'gyur// de la de dag ga snying po ni 'di yin no/ hU~Mb+hAdza/ spyi Tatha hU~M badzra mu ka badzatha da hUM badzra nit+tatha da hU~M badzra mno tha/ de nas rdo man

pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i phugargyab lo shas bslab po// de la dang por re zhig phyag rgya chen po 'di bcing ba bshad do// mthe'u chung lcag gyur bcing nas ni/ rdo rje khro bor gzhag par bya// g.yon pa rtsa gsum rgya pa na// 'jagon/

gsum las rgyal gyis bshad// g.yon pa ba mdzug mo thad kar brkyang// de bzhin bkan pa paro'o// de bzhin duyang bskyar nas ni// g.yon pa'i rirdza gzhag par bya// rdo rje mthil du bcing bya lta/ khros r yad kyis

dgab pan// mthe bor rdza dam bso// khro ba ta rin tu ra bshar//mdzub mo lcags kyus bkugapa nyid//mdzub mo ngos na sbyarab bo// de bzhin mdzub gnyis legs sbyar ba/ mdzub mo sbyar de dpral bar gzhug/ snying

gar nyam rab tu bstan//mdzub mo bsnyams nas spyi lor gzhalo/ bsgyur nas dgod par gzhag par bya// mdzub bsnyams pad+mo kha 'bus bzhin// gnyis ka ral grwa tshang par 'dzin// mdzub mo 'khor lor nga cangs pa'o//

mdzub mo bsnyams takha nas 'byung// mdzub mo legs par bskyang ba dang// mdzub mos mgul du bcang bar bya// de gnyis la 'gram mche bar gzhug/ khu tshur dam du bcings pa na// phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad/

de nas rdo rje gis kyi gsang ba'i dmatshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// gsang bab khu tshur las byung ba// dam tshig mchog tu rab tu grags// de rnams bcing ba nga shad par bya// rdo rje bcing ba bla named// snying khar/

bzhag nas rtsa bas lag gcu// mangs dras pan g.yon pa nas// snying kha nas na dbyang bar bya// khro gnyid dun bsgyur nas te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang// spyi bor lag pa brkyang ba dang// bsgyur
nas dgod par gzhag par bya// kha yi dbus su rab gzhag pa/ mdzub mo ral gri 'bebs par bya// 'khor lo'oskor bar ston pa dang// kha nas rab tu 'byin pa ste// spyi bo las mchog dkyil 'khor
[s]t+taM na[©]// ro/ dpung pa snying kha rtsibs logs rnams// rdordzagasung ba de bzhin bya// mche ba'i gnas su bzhag pa dang// khu tshur dam du bsdams pa bo// phyi rel dkyil 'khor phyag rgya na//

mtshan n ba gorims bzhin du bcas// dam tshig rdo rje gtsanges pa la// de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur gzhag/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// phaT Sha sha ta Ta/ ma ta ta/ sa ta ta/ ra 'a

ta tu Ta tu/ thaM ta ta/ hata ta/ pa ta ta/ rba tata/ ka ta ta/ rgyu ta ta/ ku ta ta/ra ta ta/ kha ta ta/ ba ta ta/ de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya pa cang ba bshad do// mdor na las kyi phyag

rgya na// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te// gnas gang yan par gzhag par bya// khro po'o lta ba khro dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal ra las// khro bo gsang ba'i
phyagargyatshan de'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnyog rgyas pa rdzogs so////de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjer gas kyi tang da 'dzin gyis ye shes kyi phyag rgyu

bya'i parlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// o sad+ma ta thA ga ta Ak+Sha badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'jig rten

gas ma 'alas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// so sut+taM badzra kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i nordzisnying pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal brdo rje phra mo'i rig

pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// o su badzrar rta ko b+hi kra ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sngan gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba' de dza phra mo'i rig pa dam pa bad gsungasas// oM badzraswA

zla pad+ma kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dang brdo rje sna tshog sakyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje phra mo' rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM su badzra karma kro d+ha lta bu m+b+ha hU~M phaT// donas yang byang

chub sems dpa'i sa nas dpa' na pa phyaganarje rjes rang gi rigs bskyed pa' phyirade rjidabyangs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po tshul du bkod do// de rnams kyi nang gsang pagasus pa/oM suk+ku badzra satA su dz+wan kre ru hU~M phaT/

o su k+Sha badzra aM ku sha A karA ya ma hA kro d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra sU rA ga kro rgyu a nu ra ga ya ta kra ma hUM phaT/ oM badzrasu badzra pahU~M kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM su kU badza?hUM ku Ta kro d+ha hor har hU~MpaT

cu su ru dz+wa la hU~MphaT/oMswAkA badzra tsakra kro d+hasarba an+danA ma pra yatsakra mahU~M phaT/ oM badzra sU kU tAs kre ma hA Ta Ta hAs ha ha hahU~M phaT/[0f00 ]sU ny+tsa badzra d+harma badzra krod+ha ya hU~M phaT/ o sku k+Sha badzran+naM d+ha kud+hats+tshan+da badzra hU~M phaT/

o su klu badzra kro ma hAkats+tshanA pa ta ya shA pra be sha ya hur yaM g+han+d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM su badzra hU~M kAr han ta ya dzAka ten+na hU~M phad/ o nAklu badzrakUm kye rgyu/ sa u0f97kartsakarod rgyu ba/ sarba kAr ya sA d+hiya hUM phaT/ oM badzrasuka pa tsa

kro d+har 7rak+Sha hU~M phaT daoM sAklu badzra ra kA kro d+ha tan byu yasab+baM duShAny+tsat+tamA te badzra dza'u hU~M paT/ oM badzra su klu muTIkr-i d+ha b+hAn b+hA paN de nas yang phyag na rdo rje s rdo rje rigs kyi yi shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
gsungs pa// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyangs dang 'dra bas na/ khro bo' e shas zhes kyang bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du nadi/ dkyel

'khor thams cad srad bus bri// de yi dbus su sangs rgyas bu// ye shes rdordzob de phus na 'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// phyag rgya de nyade kun rage shag/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas na// dkyil ba ler bzhi

pe rnams su yang// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// de rnams kyan phyogs kun du// rdorje khro bo'i tshog bshan// danas 'dir rdo rje rags kyi ye shes phra mo'i dekyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim/

pa rgyas par bshad de// de la dang po nyid du re zhig btsug nas bsgo ba na// de ring khyed la dra bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro der bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur gyis// de la legs par nan

[& ]tan gyis shig// sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa' thar nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phan pa dang// bde ba dang/ grub pa dam pa 'thibs pa'i 'bras bu'i bar gyi

phyir derje khro bos sems can thams cad yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir dud byed na ma rungs pa thams cad lta zhig skyes kyang ci dgos/ de skad bsgonas gdong g.yogs bkrol to// de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor chen po

thams cad bstan nas rdorje ra lta ba bzhin du lag pa gnyis su sbyin no// de nas rdo rje khro bo'i yi shes phra mo rnams slobs shig/ rdo rje hU~M gi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje phra mo brtanabyas la ]/hU~Mzhes bya bas gar/

sbyarabs// de yi srogan ba jig par 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo brtan byas te// tshig bzhin du mchod pan// ji srid bar du mchod pa des// de srid kyin dgra de 'jag/ rdo rje hU~Mg rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje phra ma tshul sbyar

sa khre bor ldan pa ji srid mchod// de steng sanas can ma rungs byed// de ltar de bzhin gsol ba yang// rnal 'byor can gyis 'don na na// ma lus pa na thams cad kyang// de dag phyir zhing 'chor bar 'gyur/

de la de dag gi steng pa ni 'di dag yin no// hU~MhU~M nangasha ya badzra/ hU~Mb na sha ya san+d+ra sAkA badzra pra t+yanA ya shAhU~MhU~M/ sems can gang gis dgra la ni// lhan cig gyur pa cher bstan pas// byams pa mchod pa 'a rnal

'byor gyis// rdorje'aphro bas 'jig par 'gyur// derdzi 'phro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sAngordzacan gyis sugang la// snying rje rnal 'byor de yis ni// gdug pa thams cad de 'jig la/ chos sam yang na chos min pa/
rang bzhin gyis na 'od gsal ba// de ltar bsgoms nas sems can la// hU~Mzhas khyos bas 'jig par byed// gdul bar dka' ba' sems can gang// sangs rgyas byang chu bsnod min ngo// de rnams yang

dgaspyang ba'i phyir// my-i zhes bya bas 'jig par byed// de la de rnams kyi snying pan 'di dag yin no// phyir badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ gar Na ra dzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT// hU~M bishud+d+ha badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT// o ri sho d+ha na badzra kred+ha hU~M phaT/

rdordza'o dbyibs na bris nas kyang// yid kyis kyang n gang su yi// khyim gyis da dus su lhung bsams nas// de yi rigs de 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhin rdo rje ba phra tshul gyiso// sAng khar dorje bsgoms nas kyang//
byang chub sems dpa' chen pa'i gzugs// lhung nar gsan brdzag par 'gyur/ phyag na rdo rje b gzugs chen po// bsgoms nas gang du lhung ba de ba// snang sridenyes pa sna tshogs kyis

btsunamor bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur// rnam pakun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas gzugasan bsgoms nas na// snang ba gang la lhung ba na// de ya snang srado nges par 'jagi// de la de dag gi snying po rnamA

rgyu na 'di dag yanano// hU~M badzra pra ba tu/ hU~M bo d+hi satu phra ba ta/ hUM badzra d+hu ra pra ba te/ hUMbcu dra ba ta/rnga rtsa mo rab sbyor bas// zla bab gzugs la bdag rang nyid// bsgoms nas su na bdag rang yang// gang du
lhung ba deltung gyur/zla par rje bdag rang gis// bsgoms nas su na bdag rang yang// rab tu bres nas gar phyung ba// da yi rigs ni med la lhung// padag rang phyag na rdo rjen// bsgoms nas su ni
bdag rang yong// gang dulcang ba dra yi yul// rang par mi thegs 'jig par 'gyur// pag rang sangs rgyas gzugs nyis du// bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid dkyang// gang du lhung ba de yan/snang srid ring po ma

thogs 'jig/ de la de dag gi snying pa rnams na 'di dag yin no//brlu gu pra ba ta ya hU~M/ satA badzrasu ba hal hA/ badzra sa ta pA ba ta ya hU~M/ d+ha d+ha d+ha pra ba da ya hUM/de nas rdodza rigs kyi chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i

yengashas bslab po// rdorje khro bong sems zhugs la// rang gi lus kyis yongs bskor ba/ doji shu byas 'khyur nas ni// gang goming smos de 'cha'o// rdo rje khre der snyems par zhugs// snanas phra mo thang cig tu// dbug

btang tsunas bya tshul gyis// 'jig rten gsum yang lhung bar 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo tshul spu ra la// khros nasardo rje lta ba yan// bltas pa yasan nun par 'gyur/ yang na 'chi bdun 'gyur// bu gunas ni zhugs nas

su yid kyis gang yang rung ba na// snying nas drang pa de yasen// rang nga da na debang du 'gyur// de la de dag ga sAng po rnams gsungs pa// hU~M badzra pA la ta kro d+has ra ya hU~MpaT/ oM suk+ka madzra shwas bdeshwa ba tA ya hU~M

Ta oM badzra prany+dzab sha ba nAsha ya hU~M phaT/ hUM gyid yaka ca kro d+ha pAtu bsha ka yaM khaM da ya tsanA b+ban ka ta ka ta phaT phaT/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya' yongs bslabs bo// de la re zhig phyag rgyu bcing ba bshad

dordordzayashes sbyor ba las// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje khro bor bdag rang nyid/ dbasgoms nas de ma thog tu 'grub// de nas rdo pha rogs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyal ye shes bslab bo/ ]

ting 'dzan ye shes dam tshig las/ hU~Mzhes bya dang ldan 'gyur pa// ci rigs gnas su bzhagasan na// grub pa thams cad ster ba'i mchog/ de nas rdo rje lags gyi chos kyi dam tshag gi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po//

sha Ta/ ma Ta/ sa Ta/ ra Ta/ taT/ hri haT pra Da/ tAT/ daT/ b+ha Ta/ ku Ta/ ra Ta/ la Ta ]ba Da/ zhes bya ba na tshosakyi phyag rgya mdor bshad pa'o// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag

rgya'i tshashes bsab bo// chos kyi khu tshur gnyis byas te ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas su sbyar// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// cho ga bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rirje chen me'o dematshab ]
gtsug pa chen po'i rgyal po las// rdo rje rigs kyi tshos kya ye shes kyi dam tshig ga dekyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlobs zhes bya bab ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sadz+dzata thA ga takarma shA ra hU~M//

denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang ga reg pa dam pa 'di gsus so// oM sam+ba tathAgatA d+harmA d+ha tu spur Nam hA pU dza kacha ba d+hi bsdur sa ma ya to lakya dza ya gar sa u0f97dut+ta sa ma ya badzra Ni

hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snyang pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sam+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya sha dus ma ya sngar khamadzApu dza kacha ba d+ha bsdur sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas byang chub saA

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang ga rag pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sam+batathA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu sa ra Nam hA pu ya dzakarma pa rlobs ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ da nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

partsordzo snatshogs kyis rang gi rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sadz+dzA a ba lo ki d+hatu ma ba ma hA pU dzakarma ba d+hu bstaras ma yi hU~M phaT/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rang gi

rig pa chen po 'tshog rgyas pa'i lha mo rnams rang gi snying kha nas bskyed/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du da gzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ mnyes par bya ba dang//

[rz/]las thams cad grub pa'i dgos pa byed banyis du yang dag nga 'i sbyor ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rje bal dang rnam par 'phrul par byas ta/ slar ya drakhacom ldan 'dus/

rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdorjedabyangs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rdzolas kyi dmatshar gacho ga rgyas/
pa' 'osakyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba las kya de ka'i 'khor dam pa ste// de rje dbying dang 'dra bsan// las kyi rdo rje zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni//
dkyil 'kher thams cad srad bu khre// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas ni na// sangs rgyas sku zugs gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi gas kun tu// dam tshig mchoga rnams gzhag par bya// dordzi shugs kyis
brgal nas na// dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su nadi/ doji ba tsho sogs bzhi po rnams// ji ltar rim bzhin gzhag par du// de rnams kyi na phyogs kun tu// mchod pa na pa rnams gzhag go/ de nas las kyis

dkyil bakhor 'ad// derje las kyi phyag rgya bshad do// oM badzrasatu sad d+ha dz+hanakaras ye hU~M dza/ oM badzra A karA Nakan dzAn sa ma ya hU~Mdza/ oM badzrar tir ga kamadzAn sa ma ya hU~Mdza oM badzra sA d+hu kamadzA na sa

ma ye shudza o badzra b+hi TA ba shAku ru hU~M/o badzrasur+ya maNA le pa ni ku ru hU~M/ o badzra d+ha dz+wa gra ka sdur reb kaM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra da ta has kha shA su ru hUM/ oM badzra pad+ma rA ga rA ga a hU~M/ o 'dzA tI reg

u// ra la hU~M/ oM badzra naN+Dal rwa se rwa ga ya hU~M/ oM badzra ba go rAgarA ga a hU~M da oM badzrakarmasam yatshu a hU~M/ oM badzra ka ba tse bi d+ha kA rakA hUM / o badzra akA Na mA ra ya b+hAdza dzAka5/

b+han d+hin+damu gsuhUMphaT oM badzak+kA rnamashA sits+tsha hU~MphaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'ding tshe ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin byas te/ rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi pha shasa rnams skyed do/ de la dang pa nyid du zhi ba/
( la sogs pab phyag rgya' gas bslab po/ yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me rab myur rdo rje khri ba yis// mnyam par gzhag pas sAms zhugs la// til sregs par ni sngags bsregs shing//

yam shing de dag nyidakyisan// byin phra rab tu sbar nas kyang// rtagatu'i bras nasbyin sregan/ gdon maza bar khyim rgyas 'gyur// yam shing mongar pa rnams kyis kyang// 'khas pas rab tu me sbar te// dur
ba' yal ga mar bcas pas// sreg pa byas n tshe 'phel le da yam shing de dag nyid kyis nadi/ byin zo rab tu sbyar byas la/ dku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis// bsreg pa byas na nges par srung// de la de

dag ga snying pon 'di rnams yin no// oM sam+b+ha pA paM da han badzra ya swAhA/ oM badzra puShA ye swAhA/oM badzra a yu She swAhA/ oM badzra pra ta ha ta badzra ya swAhA/ am shing tsha bas dang por ni// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin

gyis/ mo sbar nas kyang se ba yi// tshor man gyis 'gugs par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis mi/ khro dang ldan pas ma sbyar na// me tog dmar ram 'bras bu'ang rung// sbyin sreg byas na skye bo rangs da/

la 'byor can gyis khres nas kyang// yam shing des na mi sbyar te// lugs kyi phye ma bsregs na na// derdza bcing ba nyid du'agyur// yam shang de nyid kyis su na// mnyam par gzhag ste me dus la// 'bras bu

kha ba khres bzhin bsreg/ skad cig tu ni 'chi bar 'gyur// re te pa rus mo b+ha glu la gnas mkhris// dzu nyid tig ta pa lA tomaro puta pa ta yata// dal de dag gis spung po ni de de deg yin no// hU~M badzrakAkar

sAhA/ hU~M badzra rA ga ya sAhA/ hU~M badzra b+hAn+tA ya swAhA hUM badzramA ra ya swahA/ mkhas pas yongashade skyaralo yas/ khros nas bun za sar nas ni// 'bra bu lo ma skyar bsregasan// dbang du bya ba dam pa'o/yam shangad
dag nyid kyis kyang/mnyam par bzhaganyi ma sbrar la// bdod ra 'i 'bras bu khres bsregasan// 'a dod pa bzhin gyi gzugasared do// da'adra ba yis yam shing gis// bya zerab tu sbyar nas kyang//masnang
me tog sdong bu yis// btsugs na 'dod bzhin ma snapa'i gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// mnyam par bzhag stached sbyar la// nam mkha' lcag tsha ba me tog gis// sbyin sreg byas na mkha' la

'gro da la de dag gi snying le'adi dag go// oM badzrab kaM ka ra ye swAhA/ oM badzrakA ra ra badzra ya swAhA/ oM A r+ya badzra ya swAhA/ oM badzra kha pa tsa ra Ni swAhA/ khro bor mnyam bzhag mam shang nashing

tu kha pos me sbar la// badzra me tog bsreg byas na// rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// am shing de dag nyid kyis na// khro dang ldan la me sbar la// lha yi 'phreng ba gang bsregs pa// de yang bka' bzhin
nyan par 'gyur// khro ba nyid du mnyam bzhag ste// yam shing des na mi sar te// phyag na rje'i 'phreng ba bsags// de yang bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyi

na rab tu khros ta ma sbyar la// chos gos bsngags pas sangs rgyas kyang// skad tsami/tun bka' bzhin mdzad// de la de dag gi snying pan 'di dag yin// hU~M patshwa ba haM ka ra ya sAn/ hU~Mso ra ngangahaM kA ra badzra

yab+hAhA/ hU~M badzra pA Ni pa kaMka ra ya swAhA/ hU~M bud+d+ha shrIka ra badzra ya swAhA/ de nas gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya' yang shas bslab bo// yang rong bud med dang lhan cig/ gnas shing bu gar oM dzanar// bcug nas
bskul ba byas nas kyang// de yas chag bskus da bar du'agyur// ldong ros bu gar gnug/nas na/rdo rje bsdams pas de g.yogs te// mtshan ma rnam pa bzhu yasen// dngos grub rnam pa bzhar bgyur ro// go ro

na bu bar bcug/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis btsar nas// bzhagan ren 'bar 'gyur na// rdo rje 'dzani dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gur kum bu garadatsu gnas na// bugar sems dpa' rdo rje yas/ bkab nas 'bar bar gyur nas

nA'i rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra par 'gyur// de la ri dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go/ oM gu sbyar ti badzra ba kaM ka raM sadi r+ya shu/ o badzra gu rgya sade rgya hUM/ oM gu rgyabadzra sad cu hUM/ oM badzra d+ha ra gu rgyas ng rgya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje

rigs kyi lasakyi phyag rgya chen pa'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje bgos pa'i tshul gyisan// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus na// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis na// rdo rje khro bor mnyam par bzhag/ hU~M zhes mdzub mo tshul gyis

[： ]dam tshig mchog na dar de bzhin// oM zhes rang la yi ge as// chos kyi phyag rgya ba dar de bzhin// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis byas nas// thams cad grub byad dag pa ste/
rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi do dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal bzhin palas/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi la sa kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshe gargyas par rdzogs so//
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgyakhan gyi rlabs zhes bya rab dngangs 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rigs pa dam pa

'di gsungs so// oM sam+ba ta thA ga ta badzras ma ye hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bdu gsungs so// hU~M badzra ma tha/da nas byang chub sems dpa'

chen po rdo rje snyad pas rang gi rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// hUM h+phu ku Ta badzra ra ta/ de nas byang chub sems dar 'chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang ga chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs

so/ tsum hApad+ma badzra dz+wa b+ha/ da nas byung chub sems dpa' chen pa rdo rjesna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi den tshagag phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badzrachu a gra kri ta/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po phyagazha rdo rjes brngag rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bde bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyangs dang
'dra bas na// ngordzab/'dra bas ni// rdo rje khro lozhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen re'i tshul du ni// rakyil 'khor thams cad srad bu ru// sangs rgyas kyi na phyogs kun tu// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la
sogs bri// 'jarten gsun 'as rgyal la sogs// sangs rgyas phyogs kun tu bri 'o// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dgug pa la sogs pa'i chog rgyas par byas tabcu gnas

shu phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// dang ga phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bras nas chos nyas ngag brjed la// bud med lhan cig ba nas ni/ grub pa yang na theb par

'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos dag rab brjod la// chags pas bud med la bltas na// grub pa yang n thob par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// dIs nas chos nyid dag

brjod la// bud med mdzes la spus pas 'grub// rang gi phyag rgyu bsha dkyil 'khor// phyis nas chos nyide dag brjod la// lhan cig 'khyudan kun 'grub thob// de la chos nyid dgapa'i phyag rgyan 'di dag yin no//

oM saN+Da ta thA ga ta bshud+ha d+harA te ho// oM badzab 'ad+ma dr-it+tiM dza/ oM sam+b+hA ba shud+d+ha chu ka hU~M/ oM sam+b+ha bi hud+d+hakA yA khaM mnakarma badzra hU~M/ danas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba sbas pa'i phyag rgya paslab bo//

dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs Mnas kyang// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yasan// bud med mchog ni mgu byas na// shin tu grub pa thob par 'gyur// de nas de'i snying po brjod do// hobadzra kA ma// de nas ji lta ba bzhin

du rdo rje mnan pa'i rtsa gsum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa dam tshig ga phyag rgya bzhi rnams cho ga dang bcas par rgyas par bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul 'dir rdo rje sel snyan dang// rnga dang/ brdung ba dang

brdabs nas rdordzasams dpa' yang 'das pa'i snying po'i gru blangs te/ de phul nas phyag rgya dang// 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang/ dbye ba'i phyag rgya dang// ye shesakyi phyag rgya dang// gar gyi mchod ra samachod par bya'o// dal

gar gyi mchod pas na mchod pa 'di yin no// jorje gar gyi sbyorar yi// rdo rje khro bo'i sor mo yis// rdo rje shugs phyag rgyan// snying kha nyid du bcang bar bya// de bzhin gar byas g.yon pa na// g.yas pa'i chad pas
gzung bar bya// bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid dun// mdzub mo'i ngos kyis gzhag par bya// de bzhin gar yang bskor nas ni// mnyam par pad+mo kha dbus sbyar// mdzub mo sA khar bzhag nas ni// bsam po g.yos/

pas gdud par bya// rdo rje khroromadzub bsams te// bkan nas rtse mo sprad bya zhing// de las bsgyur zhing gtsug tor du// mdzub mo rtsa mo sbyar ba 'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes

rang gi ro dzi ma tshig gi khro nga gsungs pa// hU~M da nas de'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i bkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rjed byang dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje shuzhes bya ba ste// dkyil

'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// de yi dbus su lags bris ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje shun phyag rgya cha// lag par 'dzin pa rdo rjer bcas// brkyang bskum tshul du/
gnas pa dang// kha dog gzugs na ji bzhin bya// de nas 'dir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad bya ste/ dedza hU~M zhes bya ba'i gsang bab rdzabad rgya'i yashes paslab bo//
dkyil 'khor 'dorenazhu gnas kyang// 'jig rten gsum rgyal mdzub mo yis// bu gar bcu gnas ri sgrubs nan// las kun rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// de nas skal pa 'i snyang po 'di bshad do// shubadzra sa ma

ma kr-i ta dwanas rdo rje hU~M zhes bya pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i yingashas bslab po// dkyil 'khor zhugs nas legs par na// phyag rgya chen po mchog gnas pa// gnas nas rdo rjehU~M zhes bya// las rnams kun na/

byed par 'gyur// de la 'di sgrub pa'i stong pa gsungs pa// hUM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bonge ba ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs te/ de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba de
bzhin du ras la gsogs pa la bra ba dang/ lugs ma la sog pa gzugs thams cad kyi dngos grub na thun mong ngo// phyag rgya gcig pa'idakyi la 'khor ro// do nas phyag na rdo rje s/ de bzhin gshegs rtswa
thams cad la bsanas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi rigs 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar/
dga' ba bzhad gyis kyang dngos grub thams cad theb par bgyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam

par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'irgyal po la byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legasas// rdodzarin chen khyod kyang legs// rdo rjechos kyang khyod legs pa// rdo rje las
khyod rab tu lags// mdo sde 'dano legs bshadung// rdorje theg pa bla named// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ste// theg pa chen po mngon 'adus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
dam tshig gi rtog pa brgyal pachen pa las/ rdo rje chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so///ri nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus
tu mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyagan rdadza la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'anyon la dbang phyug chen po
lus 'di khyod kyi rkang pa'i bol nas gtang bar byos/ de nas bam ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdagan khecom ldan 'das kyis ma rungs pa thamA
cad b dul ba' khro bo dbang bskuras de bdag gis bkum lags na/ ji ltar de bdag gis gtang bar bgyi/da nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dgag bdag pa dbang phyug

chen pa'i 'usakyi srog gso ba'i phyiri sha ba'i rnam par shes pa dgug pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs las phyung ngo// oM badzra satwa hUMdza/ de nas de'i phyag rgyabacing ba bshad do// gsang ba'i lcags kyug bsdam bya/
ste// tha ma mnyam du bcar nas kyang// shi ba'i mgo bo bzhag na na// srog na phyir yang 'thob par 'gyur// de nas de thos ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa phul/

ba'adebad pa'i dbyang de// thal bas khebs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams danas slar phyin ted bad phyag gi lus der zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'dached du brjod do// e ma'osangs rgyas thamasacad kyi// sangs rgyus ya

blun med// gang phyir shi ba'i lus 'ad yang// 'tsho ba'i khams su gyur pa yani// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan po phyag na rdo rjes rkang pa 'degs pa zhes bya ba'isrung pa 'di gsungs so// oM badzra mu/

denas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdorje khro bo mdzub legs par// zur sprad bsdams te bzhag na ni/ rdodzade dag bskyar byas shing// 'o na de dag 'byin par byed// de nas de dag gsungam thag tu rdo rjab dzan pa chen

po'i zhabs kyi 'og nas lha chen po thar par dang gse shes par gyur to// de nas dbang phyug chen polus de de bzhin gshegs pa des sos par byan gyis brlabs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyi

don dang ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir nyid kyi rgyal tshab tu bcug go/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyan thal de nas zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag

rgya byung ngo// o tsAtsit+tA ra sa man+ta b+ha dra ka ra Nam hAbadzra Na hA/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad de// rdo rjabacing bo dam byas te/ mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam par na/ ]mnyamanas legs par brkyang n na// rdo rje'i

zhes kyang grags// de nas de byung ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthal de las zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas dbang phyug chen po da' me go la phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'i rjes su zla ba phyed pa gan

par gyur te g.yon logs na 'dug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje'i grogs su lag na rdo rje'i mdung rtsa byin nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa rdordza' rag pa dam pa zhes rdo rje'i ming gas dbang bskur

bas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo rje'i rige pa dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mdung rtse des mgal che ba ba por lo ltar ra skor zhing gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa byas nas ched du brjod pa 'ang ched du

brjod do/ daama'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems na bla na med// zhabs mchog gis ni gor rig pa// sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa 'thob// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje khro

pa'i ting nge 'dzin da las nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyis bdag gi sug pa rdo rje stsal te/ phyag na rdo rje nyid du dbang bskur bas lha/
la sogs ta lol gyi rdo rje rigs de rnams 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'adekyil 'khor chen po 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa bgyis nas/ gang gis khron mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
sems can de rnams phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi gtsug tor 'dagasus so// oMbadzrasatA su kha hU~M phaT/ de nas 'a dar shar ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnams las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i

kha dog du ma'i 'od bar du gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snyang bar byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi tshul

du 'dus nas 'khod do// de nas gza brjid kyi phung pa de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'ad phyung ngo// oM saN+Da tuphru ga ta tiT+Thi ta a na a ba lo ki te ud+d+han ta dzorasha/ oM hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la/

na ka d+ha ka d+ha ka/da ra da ra/ ba ren bdi'/ tsun ts+tshan/ snyane b+hin+ti/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swAhAu0f10 de nas byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po gan rdordzarang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsud so// oM na su b+habadzahU~M phaT/

de nas yang phyag na rdodzad nyid kyi thugs las snyang pa 'di byung ngo// u0f00 Tak+ki dza/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sAng pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ oM badzra ratA ut+ta ma dz+wa la A hU~MphaT/

da nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi seg pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha/ badzra pa sho d+ha ya sadz+dzob tseta ta ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snatshogs

kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'ad gsungs so// oM badzra kA ut+ta ma badzran+tA ras ma ya ma nu sma ra sumyun su g+ho A karA ya/ pra be sha ya A be sha ya/ d+hAnaa/ sa ma ya/ gu haya san+d+ha N+NaN ma kurum

hA satwa hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rag pa'i dam pas rang ga snyang pa bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir phul ba/ o samu na sum badzra

po byot+ta ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byung chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo'i regs pa'i rgyal pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi snyape de 'ar gsungs so// oM badzashul/ danasaM rdo rje sgyu ma'i

rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa ba snying po dam pa bad gsungs so// oM badzra sa ma ya du rake ya san+naM hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje dril bu'i reg pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ oM badzra g+ha

par Na ra Na hU~M phaT/ de nas rdordza thub pas rang gi snang po phul ba// o badzra mon ma hA pAdzA hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje mtshon nas rang gi snying po 'di phul la/ oM padzra sU r+ya dA ma ka hU~M phaT/ rig pa rgyal po rnams so//

de nas rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje khro bas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rang gsung pa 'di zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas pul lo// oM badzra ku la ma hA badzra kro d+ha grawA/can na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa ba rnyanas ya badzra

Nanu da naM pa la ra ta b+hU ta sa hri da ya badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'od rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying pe ra phulab/ oM badzra pra b+hamAr ya skyom khro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug pa rdo rje khro bo rang ga snying po 'di phul lo//

o badza dz+haN ya sarlu dut+taa kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje tre khe rdo rjesar pos rang gi snying pa'i di phul lo// oM badzra pad+mo la bden yaM sar duk+kamu ma hAko d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khro bo rnams so// de nas rdo rje glang sna tshogs kyi bdag pas

[! ]/bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdorjel snying po 'ad phul la// oM badzre rgyu ma rag na pa tAr kA sadz+dzad d+mo/ badzra d+ha ra AdzA pa ya hU~M phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje'aphreng bas rang gi snying pa kharilul

la// om 'a ga Na pa ta na la ya A kar ya pra bsha ya ba haM ru ra ya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje dbang gse rang gi snying po phul ba/ o badzra dbaA hAg Na pa ti bshaM ku ru hU~M phaT danas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje tsho

kyi bdag pos rang gi sAng po 'ad phul la/ oM badzub dza ya bi dza ya ma hA ga Na pa ti hUMphaT/ tshogs kyi bdag po rnams so// de nas rdo rje tho ba rdo rje pho nyas rang gi snying po bad phyag na rdo rje la phul lo/ dao badzra mu

sa la ku ru sam+ba duShA yaM phaT/ de nas rdo rjerlung ga phortas rangag snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badzun la na hAb ga ga Na pa ti sa rgyu duT+Ta hUM Ta/ de nas rdo rje mab pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ o badzra a na la ma hAdut+tA

dzA la ya sat+'ats+tshaku rusats+tsha dum+b+ha hU~M phaT rdo rje'ajags pa'i phonyisachen pos rang gi mAng po 'di phul ba oM badzra b+hu ra ba badzra hU~Md pa sha sa sa/ du ma hA yak+Sha hU~M phaT/ ro nya rnams so/ de nas rdo rje lcag kya rdo rje bran gyis rang

gi snying po 'di datsam ldan 'das phyagan rdo rje la phul lo// oM badzra a sha AkarAya/ saN+Dam hAtsAt+ta hU~M phaT/ dgas rdo rjedus kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra kI la ma tAmu khyu mut+ta ra hUM phaT ri nas rdo rje na

khridi kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ obadzra ba nA ya ka sa skya bats+tsaM ku ru hU~MpaT de de nas rdo rje klu'i rdorje rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyaganajo rdzab zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo// oM badzra na ga badzra An yasaN+Dad

na da na hi ra Na na muk+ta a lang+kar b+han sajo pa kA ra Nan padzra d+har sa la pa ma nu sma ra ka ta/ b+hin+da b+hin ha ra ha ra pA tshom hA da hU~M phaT bana rnams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo

rdo rje b rigs thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badzra a sha ya dza A ra ya hulaT/ de nas de gzhug pa'i dmag 'di gsungs so// oM badzra pA sha kan+nAhUM/ de nas thams cad bcing ba gsungs pa/

tshu padza Da 6 de nas las kyi snying po gsungs la/ oM badzra karmas ma ya kra ta/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rags thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'ad bshad do/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor

chen po dam ra ste// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba ra na//dkyale ga ler thams cad srad bus bre// del 'dan srad bu khre ba'i snying po yin no// oM san+d+ha badzrasu taM A kar ya san+d+hamats+tshal hU~M/ dkyil 'khor gyi da dus su yang// sang ldad

phur bu nga tab nas nade/ da nas khrod du nyis rim du// byas nas de mang srad busabre// de la 'du ni phur bu'i snying po yanino// oM badzrakA le ya kA la ye/ san+d+ha big+ha ban shul/ srad bu pa zhi dang ldan pa dang// dkyil 'khor zlum po srid

bu lnga// de yi phyi rol byung nas nade/ nyis 'gyur du na de bzhin no// de yi rim pa gsum du na// phyi rol da kyil 'khor srad du bye// phyogs mtshams 'khor le'i rtsi bas tshul du// grwa ya ri mor srad bu khre// srad bu dri ba'i tshig 'o//

denas slad du bres pa dor// dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang bar bya// g.yon pardo rje khu tshur gyis// cho ga bzhin du gzung bar bya// dang ra dras nas phyis capengar da/ ra la 'donatshon gyi snying po'o// u0f00 badzra rang ga sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje
slob dpon yang// mnyam par bzhag la dbus ' gnas // rdo rje yan sgo bzhi rnams// yade kyis kyang n dbye bar bya// de la sgo dbye ba' sId pan 'da'o// oM badzra ung+ga ta sa ma ya pra bsha

gshA g+ho smar nga dzra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ gsar ram yang na dngul yang rung// sa la rab tu bris pa 'am// phag gru bzhi'i steng dun ]/sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya// de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ni

'di'i daoM sam+b+ha rad/ sangs rgyas na phyogs kun tu// sems dpa' chen po bzhi gzhag go/ mdun du phyag na rdordzun// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya// da bsams dpa' chen po' sAng pa na bad rnams yin/

no o sumyun sumyud+d+haM/ bo d+hagaM hUM/ gaM pa a grosgyu pa ya hU~M/ an ya ho/ b+ha ga bI badzrasuM paN/ oM badzra b+huku TI kro d+ha An ya sadz+dzoran+tahi hU~M phaT/ oM badzra pra kro d+ha daMShAmA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ba sha kro d+ha ku ru

sadzra rid+d+hishArI pa ta sid+d+he ye hU~M phaT/ 'jug gam phyir byung ba na// sra dpu'i 'og 'jug yod bsams nas// rdo rje shugs su brjod pa ste// de yis ra mo brgal bar bya//ra la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di'o// oM/

padzra bgrwa kra ma hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang por de bzhin du// lta khog ga go rims ji bzhin du// rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs bri// ra la dam tshig gi snying po na 'di rnams yin no// oM badzra tsakra hU~M/

oM badzra g+hahU~M o badzra dkasha hU~M/ oM badzra a yu d+ha hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin tu// rdo rje'akhyil ba la sogs pa// rdo rje khro bogazhag par bya//de la de dag gi snying

pa na 'di rnams yin no// oM pra dzA la ta pA badzra/ oM badzrasom shu/ oM badzra ts+tshAhU~M/ oM badzra pa kr-i ta hU~M rdo rje lags kyis ra rgal nas nade/ mo ni bzhi po rnams su yang// rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa// thams

cad ras pa bzhin du bya// de dag gi don tshig gi sAng pen 'od rnams yin no// oM badzra d+ha mahU~M/ oM badzramU latu/ o badzra arba hUM/ oM badzra a sa hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyage brgalanas na// dkyil 'khor gsum par/

bri ba na// lta 'ogam pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje tho ba la sogs pa'o// de dag gisAng po ni bod rnams yin nod daoM badzamu sa 'ahUM/ oM badzrapA ta hU~M/ oM badzadzA la hU~M// oM badzra gra hahU~M/ rdo rjeshugs kyis brgal

nas ni// dkyil 'khor pan par 'bri ba ni// rdorje lcags kyu la sogasadran// lta 'og a pa bzhin du 'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badzra diwAlaM// oM badzramAr NahUM/ oM badzra ba gahU~M/

o badzra ha ra Na hU~M/ dordzishugs kyis 'jal nas na// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bzhag pa na/ lta 'og ma pa ji bzhin du// ma mo thams cad bri par bya// de nas rdo rje sgo bzhi'i yang// sgo kha rnams kyang de bzhin no/

de nas rab tu bshad bya ni// chog rgyas pa ji bzhin pa bo// de nas 'jare rten gsum pa'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'a khor chen po 'dir dgug pa la sogs pab las kun byas te/ rdo rje slob dpon nyid de rdza khro'i te

rinati ri'i phyag rgya bzhis te 'ad skad sgo zhig/ ngas khyod la rdo rje dmatshag ba ye shes bskyed par byas/ da khyed kyis su lab de ma sa zhig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyodadus byas te dmyal bar lhung nga rad
zhes bsgo ste mna' snyang pa 'ad sbyin no// rdo rje dIb ta ni ti ni'i phyag rgya bar ston cig/ gal te dam tshig las 'das na// jordzakhrobasmin pa yis// dam tshig khyed kyi rigs
pasregs pas// klad panas ni brtsams nas kyang// lus rnams mtshungs par yang byed// dam tshig bcing ba'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i snying po la des bcung ngo// o sazla tu

tha ga ta badzra d+ha ra/ grosgyupaM d+hu sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas 'da' phyag rgya bcing ba dngashad do// lag lags bla za 'og tugatang// mthe bong mthe'u chung sbrel ra dang// las kyi phyag rgya dam tshig 'di// rdo rje dacing
pa zhes kyang bshad// de nas rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur te// sAng pon 'ar yanano// oM badzra a b+ha Sha kaa b+hoTi'u badzracu ra ti sa ma gri gro/ de nas g.yogs pas gdong g.yogs te/ snying po'asi/

gzhug go/ oM badzra pra be sha ya/ badzra pra be sha ya/ badzra a ba sha a risha ad+hu tiSh+Tha badzrahU~M/ da nas da gnas snying po 'dis ma tog gtor ro// oM pra tits+tsaMa d+hi ti badzra ha// de nas de dag gir lhung
ba 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas dkyil 'khor go rams bzhin du pa stan te/ lha gang yin pa de na rel ma bstan to// datsa'i phyir zhe na/ sems can log par lta ba
dag yod de/ gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bam ldan 'das rnams kyi yi shes gdon ma za ba ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rigs su phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam zhes

dad par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa na dam tshig go/ gzhan du na lha gang la dad pa de dag lamana' skang pa bar byin nas bstan par bya'o// de nas rdo rje b rin po che'i mtshan ca 'a 'phreng bas dbang bskur nas las kyi rje

rje lag pa gnyis su phyin la/ rdordzamang btags te ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig ga dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po btang ba ngoslab do// jo rdzabacing ba dam byas te// mtha bongonang du spu ra nas ni/

mdzub mo bkug nas gnyis kas bkab/ sams dpa'i gtsug tor zhes bya'o// rdorje bcing ba byas nas ni// mje bong gung mo mde'u chung ra sgreng// gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ste// gzi brjid chen po'i btsun pa 'o/

dordza phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mthe bong mthe'u chung sbrel ba na/ dam du lcags kyubapadis pa ste/// rag pa chen po dam pa'i 'o// rig pa chen po dam pa yi// phyag rgya bcings pa rab dpar ba/ sAng khar mtho
bo'i ngos kyis so// sams dpa'i yan snying por bshad// de nyid las gungam srin lag/ sor mo rab tu bsdams nas na// rdorje rin chen tshul dun/bsgyur nas gdong du gzhag par bya// de nyid bskyod da pa'/

nas na snying khar yang na bskyar bar bya// me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste// pad+ma'i rig pa dam pa 'o// de nyes spyi ba nas brtsams te// lus kyi dkyil 'khore bskor bar bya// sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bad// rdo rjelas

ni ra bsgrub pa'o// sems mo'i rdo rje dam byas taM// mthe'u chung rdo rje sgrung bani// thams cad rig pa'i snying po ked// phyag rgya bad ni thams cad sgrub// mthe bong mthe'u chung bcas nas ni// g.yon pa 'i ser mo dbus
dam gsum// rtse gsum pa ni dbus ma'i rtse// rdo rje phyag rgya bzung bas// rdordza ge pa dam pa 'di// rdo rje mdung zhes bya ba 'o// de nas rab tu bshad pa na// rgyu ma rdo rjel sogs

brtags/ rdo rje bcing ba dam byas taM// g.yon pa'i rdo rje bde bar bya// dorje khu tshur zhes bshad do// rdordza'i rigasan kun gyi 'da'o// rdodzaden gnyis byas te/ mtshan ma kun kyang sa gzhag go/ rdo rje'i rigs ni

thams cad kyi// phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba ste// sor brkyang steng du gzhag pa dang// mdzub mos na thang stan sbyang ba dang// o zhes bya ba spyir bzhag nas// rdo rje snyad dugazhag pa'o// rig pa'irgyal po'i phyag rgya chen

pos tshogs rnams so// rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa// lag pa'i rgyab tu de bzhin te// khu tshur bcangs bzhag lag ngar bskum/ kha yi phyogs su bskor bar bya// rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// g.yon ma'i

mtha bong stang du gzhag/ 'phreng pa ra mang pa'i thabs su sbyar// nor sbyin par na g.yas pa ste// ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog/ 'dus pa 'a dod nga po'i phyag rgya chen po 'dus pa'o// g.yas pa mdun du gtun rings

ma 'dzan/ lag pa brkyang ba'ang de bzhin te// g.yas pa'i 'od na 'bar bar bstan// rdo rje khu tshur bskyod pa bya// pho nya' phyag rgya chen po'i tshigs so// bsgyings pas mdzub mo' bar mchab// dbyug pa snyan cing/

gnas pa dang// dpung pa bskam zhing sbyang ba dang// g.yas pa g.yon gyis 'dren pa 'o// bran gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs chen pa'i// dkyil 'khor kun tu du ban// g.yon pa 'a rdo rje zur nas so// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/

ka grub pa dngan las nyid dam// sanas dar ba gang ga phyag rgya gang// dan bdag nyid nyid kyis kyang// bdag nyade goms par gyur na ni// phyag rgya dam par 'grub par 'gyur// gtsug tor chen po srung ba che// gzi brjid

phung po rab grub ster// rdo rje hU~M zhes bya kun byed/snying khar bzhag pa thams cad 'gugs// sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams so// thams cad rag pa thamu can grub// rdo rje rig pa dam pa'o// rdo rjegadung na phyag rgya cha/

grub pa chen po sbyin par byed// rgyana'i rdo rje rab bgrub pa/ dadral bu yason yang dag 'babs// dbyug pa rishing gis mu na'i da'// rdo rje'i rdo rje gsod par byed// rag pab rgyal po rnamAso// 'bar ba'i mgan ma

rungs 'dul// zha ba'i mchog ni thams cad gsod// dbyug pa ba mechog na gsod pa ste// 'jigs pa'i mig na skrag par byed// rdo rje khro ba'i phyag rgya rnams so// myos pas rab tu myos par byed// 'a phreng ba nan/

byed par bshad/ 'dod byed dga' bar byed pa ste// gsod pa thams cad gsod pa'o// tshogs kyi phyag rgya rnams so// tho ba gdug pa 'joms pa ste// ras kyi rgyuras de bzhin te// 'bar ba'i mchog na gdug pa sreg/

gnod spyin man gdon spyod do// pholta'i phyag rgya rnams so// rdorje'i nache ba bza' ba ste// gsod pa thams cad gsodam 'o/ drug sa byed man re ra tu bag gos// 'phrogam yang na thams cad 'phrog/ zan gyi phyag
rgya rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa
rdzogs so///de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi derje gzugs kyi dmatshig las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i

ting ngas 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi ragi pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badzra da si tusAhA/ danas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjesarang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs

so// oM badzra d+ha ra hUM/ oM badzrang kreme hU~M phaT/ yang byang chub sems dang ba sams da pa'i chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gareg pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ dao badzrarat+ta kyi sde swAhA/ de nas yang drang chub sems dpa'

chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang ga rag pa dam pa 'ad gsungs so// oM badzra par na duswAhA// nga nas yang byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'ad gsungs so//
o badzrakarma ko re swAhA// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rags pa dam pas rad garag pa dam pa 'dagasungs so// oM badzrau la gro sAhA/ de nas rdo rjelar ba'i rig pa'i

rgyal pos stong gcig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badzra tsa kre hU~M/ rdor dril bus smras pa// oMbadzra g+haN+Dake hU~M/ thub pa'i rdo rjes snyas pa// oMbadzrang+ganakA hUM/ radzamachon chas stsas pa/ oM badzra

shu rags pa'i rgyal po'i dam tshig ga phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ad smras so// oM badzra dz+wa la shu/ de nas rdo rje 'od kyis smas pa oM badzra/

0saM ma hU~M/ de nas rdo rje dbyag pas smras pa/ oM badzra dan+te hU~M/ rdo rje sar smug gas smras pa/ oM badzra baTen hU~M/ rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig ga phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje glang snas rang gi dem tshig gi phyag

rgya smras pa/ o badz+dzas de hU~M/ rdo rje 'phrang bas smras pa/ oM badzramA le hU~M/ rdo rje dbang gis smras pa// o badzra a b+hi li hU~M/ rnam par rgyal pa'i rdo rjes smras pa/ o badzra a pa rA dzi tahU~M/ rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag

po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo chu gtun rings kyis rang gi dmatshig gi phyag rgya rnams smras pa/ o badzra mu sal gra hehU~M/ de nas rdo rje rlung gis smras pa/ oM badzra pA tAhU~M/ rdo rje mas smras pa/ o

oM badzra dzule hU~M/ ro'ajigs pas smras pa/ oM badzra gra ha/ rdo rje pho nya'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje lcags kyus smras pa/ oM badzradaMt+tahU~M/ rdo rje dus kyis smras pa/ oM badzub nges hU~M/ rdo rje

ngan khrid kyis smyos pa/ o badzrab sgyuhU~M/ rdo rje klus smras pa/ oM badzraha ri NihU~M/ rdornga bran gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi sdordzi'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs/

so de nas rab tu bshad bya ba 'dordza dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// gru bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo// phyi rel dkyil 'khor srad bus sde// de yi nang du dur yang ni// de bzhin sgo ni shar phyogs gdod// de yi dbus
su ci rigs par// sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya// 'ag rten gsum rgyal la sogs pa// bzhi po de ya phyogs kun gzhag/ dkyil 'khor de bzhinagatso bor yang// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// de yi
nga'// phyogs rnams thams cad du// rigs kyi phyag rgya bu bar bya// jorje glang sna la sogs pa// pan pa rnams ni sgo srungs so// 'jigs ma dpal dang sgra dbang dang// dur ga g.yon pa'i glu//

rnams nas// phyi yi grwa rnams phyag rgyan// do rnams nyidin bri bar bya// phyi yo rekyil 'khor rnams sun// lha mo rnams kyang bri bar bya// nga nas chog rgyas pa rnams// ji bzhin pa na bshad par bya// de nas rdo rje/

dkyil 'khor 'dir ji ltar 'dod pa pahan du byas te/ re rdo lcags kyu la sogs pas dam tshig gi las byas nas/ rdorje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin du bcas la// khyed kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba su'i mdun du'ang

dam tshag gi phyag rgya da nams ma su zhig/ gsang ba 'a phal bar mi byed cig ces sgo zhig/ de nas las kyi rdo rje da rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhag su chog bzhin du chug cig/ zhugs nas rdo rjod de bzhin du

khor chug/ gang la bab pa de de'i dam tshig ga phyag rgya'i dbang du 'gyur te/ des las thams cad byed do// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'a khor rim bzhin snyan ni/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba smos mi

dam tshig phyag rgya 'ad khyed kyi// rtag tu las kun byed pa ste// ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni// chung ma du mo 'dra ba 'o// de la de'i snying po na red de dag yin no// oM sarba ga ma ni sarba bklu sA d+ha ya gusbyabadzra ni hUMphaT

'di lan cig bzlas pas bud med thams cad dbang du byas te saran chos ma yin par ma 'gyur ro// rtsa dga' bar thams cad spyad nas sgrub par bya ste/ de nas mams can thams cad dag par phyag rgya thams cad yid kyi

shes nas las dam pa thams cad khyad pyad de zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang las gsungs so// donas dgu tshig ga phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// dan tshagi khre bomadzub bcug dang// snyade khar yang na re snyam par bya/

ngos kyi mdzod snga ba nas drang/spyi bor bzhag nasags su bya// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo yis// mdung rtsa rtse gsum mnan par bya'o// 'ad bdes pas na yang dag par// rig pa dam pa bde 'grub par 'gyur/

rdo rje'i rigasazhithams cad kyi// g.yon ra ba rdo rje gtso bor 'dus// dam tshag chog ja pa'i n par// phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya// thams cad 'khor lo mdzub rtse bcum// dril bu phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no// de bzhin

a gyi phyag rgya dang// seng ge 'i rnam par bya ba ste// rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnams so// 'bar ba kun tu 'dzin pa dang// 'od ni yang dag 'dus pa nyid// dbyug pa'i khu tshur 'dzin pa dang// kha 'gram phyag rgya bskor ba'o// khro

pa'i dam tshig rnams so// gtum pa'i phyag rgya 'phreng ba dang// rdoN+Dimanananas mdud pa yin// spyi bor bzhag pa tshogs kyis// dkyil 'khor gyi ni srung ba'o// tshogs rnams kyi dmatshig go/ lag pa bskums pa khar bzhag

sta rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya// 'bar ba chestag gtong ba ste// phya nas khar yang gnas par bya// pho nya mo'i dam tshig rnams so// mthar ma gnyis nikhar bcug dang// btsar cing rab tuganonapa 'o// dpung pas

bsnol bas bsnol ba dang// myur du 'phrog pa'i ng de bzhin no// bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal bo las/ rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil
'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so//da/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca kyi cho kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting

pa'i dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badzra bidi/ de nas yang phyag na rdorjes rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ha na ha na badzrahU~M phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje snying pos rang

gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ de nas yang deng spyan gyis rang gichos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM mA ramA ra hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rjesna tshogs kyis rang gi chos kyadem tshaga'adi

gsungs so// o ku ru ku ru hU~MpaT/ de nas rdo tsharig pa dam pas rang gi chos kyi dmatshig 'di gsus so// oM hU~MhU~M phaT/ de nas rje rje sgyu mas smras pa// o ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+d+ra hUM phaT/ o A bi ngesha A bi sha hUM phaT/ oM

@# lhur lhur ba swA hUM phaT/ o b+hin+da b+hin+dahU~MphaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o// o dam da ma hUM phaT/ oMmar yamA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM g+ha ta ak+Sha ta ya hUM phaT/ o d+ha ya lha ya hU~M phaT/ khro bo rnams kyi'o// u0f00d+ha ma d+ha/

ma hUMphaT/ oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M baT/ o ba shI b+ha ba hU~M phaT/ oM dza ya dza ya hUMphaT/ tshogs rnams kyi'o// o blo rgyu hUMphaT/ o glu h+phu wiT/[0f00] dz+wa la dzul hUMphaT/ o bA da khA da hU~M phaT/ pho nya rnams kyi'o//

mo khin kha na hUMphaT/ [” ]so ma ra ma ra hUM phaT/ o glu[@]t+tahUM phaT/ o pa lha pa lha hU~M phaT/ bran mo rnams kyi'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo lnga'irigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so//
de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po 'i dekyi la 'khor du// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo ba na// dkyil la bor thams cad bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje'adzan la sogs// thams cad snyoms

par zhugs pa'o// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul lta bu// snying khar mtshan ma yang dag gzhag de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di'i cho ga bzhin du las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu bcas

pa btsongs tu 'di skad smos pa// khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba don lha' rogs ma mthong ba su la'ang ma sna zhig ces pa sgo la dril bu dkrol du chug cig/ 'di skad bsgos nas kyang mna' snying po byan

la ji ltar dral bu 'di dkrol ba'i// de'i sgra ji ltar na rtog pa// de bzhin las kyi rdo rje khyod// ma rtag paren ma rungs byed// rdo rje slob dpon bas stong med// rdo rje grogs dang ma mdzu'u dar// gdug

la byams drang skye bar naM// gal ta khyed kyis byas na 'o// dranas gdong g.yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan ta chos kyi dam tshag gi phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje'adzan la sogs//
sa kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no// thams cad mnyam pa nyidi bsams pa//rdo rje ge pa dam pa sku// 'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin// de bzhin sdug bsngal dril bu 'dra// sdug bsngal thams cad mya ngan 'da'/
rdo rje 'dzoms pa byan med// rig pa'irgyal po'i tir nge 'dzan rnams so// sems can gdul phyir khre bo mchog/ zhi ba san nges par gsod/ dbyug pa 'dra la 'tshog pa med// log par lta pa 'jigs
[g ]/par byed// khre bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so// ra ro 'dra bor dpa' ba med// 'phreng nga 'dra bar 'chang ba med// bud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang byed// brtan pa tsamargyase gzhan phan mo//

tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzana rnamaso// 'tshog pa'i chad pa'i mchog yin te// rig pa rnams n rlung ga 'o// gzi brjid can byon zamatsho// zas rnams kyi nang khrag dam pa// ro nya'i ting 'dzin rnams so// mche ba dag par
zhugs ba ste// 'chi bdag thams cad gnas ni 'dug/ 'jags las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med// chu las lhag pa'i ro gzhan med// khran gi ting nge 'dzin rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las// rdo rje'i ri'i sa thams cad kyachos kyi dmag gi dkyil 'khor ga tsho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig las 'byung ba rdordza' phyin gyi rlubs zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ oM badzra ka pra brtan sa ma ya hU~M/

da nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dar 'chun po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ oM badzra ra la sa pU dzA ya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje snying po sa rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM a h+phu ka

a b+hu Shiny+tsahU~M de nas rdo rje sngon gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ oM badzra gA te ga hi hU~M/ da nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi rig pa dam pa 'digasungs pa// oM badzra chatu

Na kyihUM/ de nas rdordzalag pa dam pas rang gi las kyi dam tshag bad gsungs so// oM badzra ba khyod ta ma ni tu bkur ba ba kur ba hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro bo rdorje ma'i lha mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smyos pa// oM badzra

gro d+ha badzra ak+ta dz+wa la tri shu lan la na sded a mr-i Ni hUMwaT/ de nas rdo rje gsar lha chen mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di sus so// oM badzra hi ma ts+li tsakre Na badzra hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje gzhon nu mas rar ga las

kyi dam tshig 'di smos so// oM badzra ku mA ra hU~M hU~M ab sha sa gnaArda na badzra pA Ni pra ya badzra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra Na hU~M phaT/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje zhi bas rang gi las kyi dam mi 'di smras so// oM badzrangashu

tidza pa dza pa a g+ha ma la ya san mA ra ya hUM ta ti yuhU~M phaT/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di sbas so// oM badzra musun ha na badzra b+han snyan pA Di ya pa Dam/ sad+ma dut+tagyur

yani oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+hAn hUM gaTi/ rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams kyi'o// de nas rdo rjem 'chi ba khro pos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badzra a A ti badzradut+taM gyi ban han san+d+ha ra d+hu sa ya/ ba nA sha ya ts+tshin

kha ba ku ru sut+ta naM ta yaM badzra Na ya e tsita ma ma uka ra ba na yu ka tan+ta ma dwastakro d+ha badzra hUM saN/ renas rdo rje madangs can gyis rang gi las kyidam tshig 'di smos so// o dadzra kAn+timA ra ya so ma' pa pra ti ba

tar ga na shi g+ho spyiT ya radzra d+har nam hA rdzo snakA ra lehAta ris+saM badzra Ni hU~M phaT// de nas rdo rjerabyug pa' mchog mas rang gi lasakyi snyade po bar smras pa/ oM badzra daN krag+ha ta ya hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje

kabyed/ tsong rong khro bo chen mo rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di snas so// oM badzra mU la me kha la kha na kha na sha pa da na de shu ku ru hU~M dmA ra ya 'ag+hAn hU~M phaT/ khro bo' rig pa rnams so//

de nas rdo rje 'dzums rang gi las kyi dam tshig cas la/ oM badzra pa la yaMmaNin san g+han+ti badzra NimA ra ya ku mu da a pa nga pa ba hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje zas kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshagastsas pa/ oM badzra a sha

napa kA pa sadz+dza dut+taM badzrad shan sha ga ta d+ha ra Na a nu ga ma na se a ha ra Nar ratis shuta tsa pa ya ma dza ba sA nu le ba na ba la pa tra gra tu a na ya sarba dan+tan ya har d+ma su pa a da ni gra ma ya de ba rakA Ni hU~M phaT/

de nas rdo rje bgo bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra pA sa ne A na ya sasgra sra an+d+ha ba Nar rgyu da ka ra Na nAhUM hUM hUM ku ru hU~M pa ra mo pra yats+tshaa b+hasha sad+ya ka ta ya badzra kro ba d+ha Na hUMphaT/ de nas rdo rje

dbang gis rang gi 'dus kyi dam tshig sbas so// oM badzra ba shI A na ya pa ni ku ru san+d+ha pA ya sam+b+ha pa ngu kha nar sa ku ru kud daM pra sa de ya saja/ bahar b+ho d+ha ra ya btsa ra ya ka ra badzrapa ka d+ha ra Ni hU~M phaT/

rdo rje tshogs kyi'o// de nas rdo rje pho nya mis rang gi las kyi ma tshig smras so// oM badzra duAr ya sacha maN+DalAm dra be sha ya/ A ro sha ya bats+tshA ya san+d+ha kAm Ni ma ku ru hU~M hU~MhU~M la gu tras ya mA ra

ya dbya ba re b+ho d+ha ra ya ba dza yaM ka ra badzra pa ta ka d+hA ra Ni hU~M phaT/ ra mos rdo rje shug gas kyis rang gi las dar tshag skyas pa/ o pa gabadzra Na sgyu sgyu rgyu glusha ba da Ar ya pa gyur ri d+his ya badzra pAha d+har Na gyis

[z/]/de nas rdo rje 'bar bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di snyas pa/ oM badzra dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya san+d+ha badzra dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya da ha na hasmiM ku ru hU~MphaT/ ra nas rdo rje 'jigs mas rang gi las kyi mtshis pa/oM badzra ba/

ga ta pA ba ka daM ka rA la ka la la ba sha sha na dAka tA nIts+tsaM kA hU~M A bsha ya b+hu ya rud+ma raM pa po ma hA yak+Shi Ni badzra pA la d+ha ra Ni hU~M phaT/ rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyi'o// de nas rdo rje'i bzhin rdordza bran mos rang ma

las kyi dam tshagi snyas so// oM badzra muny+tsa A na ya badzra do ba ya ni kakho tA la ni ba sa'i kha na kha na/ khA hi khA his mu khe phro ba sha ya spo Ta ya mA ra mA ra Na sazhwa dut+tanA badzra ts+tshasha ta si d+ha ra Na hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje

dus mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra kAli ma hA pra ta du pa na ma nu kha tshwa sa ru d+hir pra ya emyaha go gan+d+ha badzra DA ki ni badzra[q] kha le sadz+dzA de ba ga NamA tu h+phu to/ par har pa NaM/ a nu ka su ka pA/

lA ma la kr-i tasan+d+ha ka yo ny+tsa ra ya si badzra la TaM ga d+hA ra Ni pra ta man kha shar ri shu d+d+haM a pa sha yu pra desha ya/ d+hatsa ya mA ra ya badzrarakAs hU~M hU~M hU~MhU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje bskul mas rang ga las kyi dam

tshig 'distsas so/ oM badzra pA ta ma ma num ma na san+nAru sgyur mu tra pu ra shengasha li sa shA g+hon re ka togaN+Dahir rgyaya hishAg+ho sa ta ma mu ka sa ku ru badzubornya/ naka d+hA ra na sam+bakarmuN ma ku ru swAhAhU~M/

denas rdorjom ka ras rang gi les kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzram kar gra sa gra sa hAhU~M pra be sha ya pA tA laM b+hak+Sha ya badzra mo ka ra d+hA ra Ni hU~M phaT/ rdo rje bran mo rnams kyi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang
ta// rdo rje'i gas thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdorjes dkyil 'khor tshul gyisan///
dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bres// dkyil 'khor mchog na thams cad du// sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya// de dgaphyogasasu rim par yang// sems dpa' n po rnams gzhag go/ de yi
dbus su chungamar bcas/ rdo rje ri'i bu dam pa nyid// rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs gsang// gar gyi mchod laM sogs pas mchod// de la lha mob go ramis bzhin// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhi/

du 'dra ga phyag rgya phyag rgyu 'dra// kha gar byed par yang bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod phyir// rdo rtsa bar gyi tshul gyis so// grwa dang sgo yi phyogs rnams su// bdug pa la sogs rim pa bzhin// danas

las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i dal bag pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi dam tshig ga phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin bcings ta 'ang skad smos shig/ khyod kyis lca'i rim pa ma mthong pa dang las mashes pa

su la'ang gsang pa 'a las 'di sa skya gog/ khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhas smyos shig/ rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig ga phyag rgya bcanges te khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing 'di skad brjod do

tshal/ oM badzra satA r+ya A be sha ya be sha ya nu tu ba ya san+d+ha kArUsid+d+himA dra lats+tsha hUMs/ hU~M a la la la la badzra/ de nas yang bdag la babs nas bdag nyid kyis 'jug ste phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rnams gar gyi mchod

la00 pas mchod par bya'o// de phyin chad lus ng/ dag dang/ lta ba dang/ yid dang/ rdo rjes phyag rgya rnams kyi las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin byed pa'o// de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te/ garagyi mchod pa'i

phyag rgya'i yi dgas slobs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzad sogs kyi// dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te// rdo rje rag pa dam pa la// rdorjelA gyi lasogs mchod// rig pa 'di rnams thams cad kyang// lta 'og go/
rams Na bzhin du// gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// dordza garagyi tshul gyis na/phyag rgya chen po mdor sdus so// dam tshig mchog na le nyis byas nas// las kyi

phyag rgya dgrol bar bya// gar gyi kha chod pa 'dra yis ni// gtso bo thams cad mchod na ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa cha sogs kya/las grub par yang ris par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje b ma
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i ragis da rag
thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du bskos nas phyir ma ldog pa'i sa la rab tu ra ga ste/ mkhyen bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyis bdag gsang ba thams cad 'dzan par dbang bskur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba de gang lags bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang
bab rdo rje zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba kha du gsungs so// sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// ji lta ji ltar 'phul
myur ba// de lta de ltar sems can don// 'dod chags la sogs gtsang bas bya/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can thams cad phan phyir dang// sangs rgyas rnams/
kyis bstan pa'i phyir// sems can thams cad gsad kyang na// sdig gis gos par ma 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sAng pos rang gi nor bu gsang bo 'di gsungs so// sems can thams cad/

phan phyir dang// sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis// pha rol nor rnams 'phrog kyang na// sdig pas gos par ma 'gyur re// da nas rung nub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi gsang ba'i pad+mo'ad gsungs so// 'dod

chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med// rgyal ba lan da phul ba// gzhan gyi chung ma sems can phyir// bstan pas bsod nams thobs par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sams dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gis las kyi gsang ba
'di gsungs so// sems can thams cad phan phyir dang// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa yi// las rnams thams cad byas pa yis// bsod nams shani tu mang po rAd// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang

mdzad de bzhin gshags pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba lags so zhes bstan pa// lags so rdo rje sems da pa' khyod// rdo rje rin chan khyod legs so// rdo rje chos spyod legs pa ste//

rdo rje las na khyod legs so// mdo 'di legs par smras pa ste// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang// thag pachan po mngon 'dus pa'o// dang zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de khon nyid
bsdus pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshaci/ ces r+ya ba'i rtog pa 'argyal po chen po rdzogs so///bam po drug pa// de nas yang

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi bdag po spyan ras gzigs kyi debang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btang pa/

paNo sams dpa'i pad+mo cha/ da'ajig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug ca// spyan ras gzigs dbang brtan pa' tshog/ rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi rgyal po dag pa che// sams dpa'i rgyal po blo gros cha

nga d+ma'abadag nyid pad+macho/pad+mob mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pad+mo'os byung pad+mo'i 'od// pad+mo dag pa rarang dga' byed// rdo rje pad+mo pad ma chog lus// pad+mo rablo khyod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs chen po

snang ba rma/ dgos pa chen po che dang mtshud// brtan pachen dpa' pa cha// dpa' chen khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can bsam pa theg pa che// rnal 'byor chen po mes pacha// bdo za bad byed dag pa'i don

sangs rgyas pad+mo khyed phyag 'tshal// tshes de nyid don dam pa'i chos// dam pa'i tshes naMtshos rab 'dzani// chos chen nyani tu chos mchog pa// chos kyi 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas sems dpa'
sa @#// sam sa mchog gtso// chos kyisams dpa' chos mchog 'dzani/sams dpa' dam pa sems mchog 'dzani// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// spyan ras gzig
dpang mtshon pa ba mchog/ mgon po chen po rnam gzigs gtso// 'jig rten snang ba 'jig rtan don// 'jig rten mgon po khyod phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten yig yig che// yaM ga mchogan ga 'dra// yi ge yi

! gathams cad gzigs// 'khor lo'i yi ge khyod phyag 'tshul// phyag na pad+mod dachen po/ dmugs 'dun pa na sbyin pa po// sangs rgyas chos nas nigs rgyas cho/sangs rgyas pa dganyid khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgya

gzugs na gzugs chen po// rdo rje'i gzugs ni gzugs bzang ldan// chos kyi snang ba bza brjod chog/ 'jig rten snang khyod phyag 'tshal lo//padapal na mgon po gtse// chos dpal mgon po mgon ldan pa// tshangs

pa'i na gon ngo tshangs chen ngo/ tshangs sras khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// snang ba snang na chog snang pa'i gtso// snang gsal bin du snang ba 'o// snang ba'i mgon po mgon po// sangs rgyas snang khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas/

ay+Ya/ dbang bskur sangs rgyas ratsheg sangs rgyas sras po mkhas chen po// sangs rgyas dbang bskur gtsug gi mchog/ sangs rgyas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyan na spyan chen po// chos spyan gzigs pa chen po

tang 'dzin yi gas thor cad la// rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nyid kun gyi yon tan 'di// khyod kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyar rnam// ra stod nas goms par byed pa na// 'jig rten dbang po thob par 'gyur//
dpa' bo khyod la gsol gdab pa// rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas kyang// chos kyi 'khor le dam pa na// thub pan pos bshad par gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
gzigs kyi dbang pos de baban gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshagi thos nas/ dacom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa ga lab dar mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas rdo rje pad+mod

rang gi thugs kar btags lta ched du brjod pa 'dached du brjod do// a ma'o rab tu dag pa na//bdag gi rdo rje pad+mo khang/ pa yin 'di na bdag gi bu// rigs 'di byin gyis brlab par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das

rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ro ches kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i khyi'i gurlabs ra do zhes bya bab ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ches kyi dam tshag

ces bya ba dang nyin gshegs thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo// hU~M/ de nas da byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas parolta bu'i 'od zer kha dog dang/ gzugs dang

rtag gas dang/ spyod lam dang/ 'od rnam pa du ma byung ste// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag pa dang/ chos nyidakyi ya chos yang dag par sbyangs nas yang slar ga sku 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs kyi dbang po' thugs kar zhugs so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badzra pad+mot+tam hI
de nas byang chub sams dad ba sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa rim pa 'di gsungs so// oM badzra bid hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang

garig pa dam pa 'ad gsungs sa/ obadzra ra tot+tamatra/ de nas byang chub sems dar la sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badzrab dut+tam hI/ de nas byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang ga rag pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ oM badzra ba dut+ta ma// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs kyis dbang pos gzug

thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzani la snyom par zhugs te/ dag thams cad 'dul bab dam tshig ces bya bab rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badzra hU~Mgyiho/ ra nas de smras ma thag tu 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'as rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs kyi dbang po'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad+mo la zhugs te/ phyag rgya'ainam pad+mo 'dzan pa'i kha dog dang dkathug/
dang/ cha lugs dang/ rgyan sna tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sos das pa sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa'i lus su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
sems can thams cad rdza ltar 'dul bar so so'i gzugs su bstan nas ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul bar byas te/ yang slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du

tha 0 bcom ldan 'das ri bzhin gshegs pa shakya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi zla ba'adakyil 'khor rnams la 'khod nas chadadu brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de/ thabs na snyam
rje'i bdag nyid de// gang du thabs kyis 'dul mdzad na// lha rnams su yang 'gyur ba de// de nas yang brjom ldan 'das khyad chub sems dpa' sams rara'achen po 'phags pa spyan ras gziges dbang pos rang
ga ga pa bskyed nas/ des shan gshegs pa thams cad la sems nAthams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang/ don dang/ grub pa dam pa dang/ rdorjechos nyid dang/ ya shas dang/ mngon par shes pa'i 'gran

brgyad ren phyir phul nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya pa'i dkyi[“ ]'khor chen po 'di bshad do// da nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rje dadadas dang 'dra bas na// 'gro la 'bul//

pa las bu ste// gru bzhi pa la sgo pa'i pa/ rta bab bzhes na brgyan pa dang// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// dar dang 'phrang bas brgyan pa dang// dkyil 'khor gun thams cad dang// sgo dang sgo khyudatsanu rnams

su= rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan par// phurel dkyil 'khor srad bu bya// de yind du srad bu naM/ gru bzhi par ni bri bar bya// gnyis pa'i grang ni sgo gdod da// pa 'dra bas bya ba yin// ka pa brgyad kyi tshulan/

paro 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// de yi ga sar dbus su na// sangs rgyas kyin sku gzugs gzhag/ de la sangs rgyas gzhag pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no/ (bud d+ha hU~M/ sangs rgyas phug kun dra ba ni/ pad+mo'i dbus su
(gnas pa ya ]/jorje ran chen podang/ sna tshogs padod pano// de la de rnams kyi skud po na 'ang yanano// oM hUMha kaM/ 'bre spro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyi
brgal nas ni// der na spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ gzugs rnams thams cad 'byin pa ste// da ya phyogs ni brems cad du// rdo rje 'gyed la sogs tshul du// sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' che//

mtshan ma pad+mo 'char ba bri// dadag ga snying po na 'di reg yin no// = o ta ga ta rnamasuM/ oM badzra pad+ma u0f00 kyang sha ko Sha d+hu ra badzrasatwahU~MpaT/ oM mA ra ya mAraya/ dang ku su ma a yud+hargyur a mo g+ha shaho/

oM pad+ma saM b+ha ba pad+ma halta sA d+hu hU~M/ rdo rdzogs kyi brgya las ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhinate// dayi dbus su bri ba na// thor tshugs dbusanA'ang de bzhin gshegs// de yi phyogs na thams cad du//

khro gnyer la sogs tshul du na// mtshan mar pad+mo'am khri ro// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de la de dag gisAng po ni 'di rnams 5neno// hU~M o pad+ma blo ku TaDi Na Da/ oM pad+masu ra ya dz+wa la hU~M/ oM pad+ma sa na lo

d+ha ra tsan+d+ha pAha da la a ba le ka toshor de halo sarba at+ta hU~M hU~M sa ma ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma atA hAs o ka dang sha chu ka ha ha ha ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i ng de bzhin te// sems

dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs par// pad+mo stod du bzhag par bro// de la phyogs na thams cad du// lta 'bag go reses rna bzhan bya// pad+mo la sogs tshul du/sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ de la de dag gi

snying po na da rnams yin no// hi oMtA ra pad+ma a ba leka yamA ma sa ma ya satwa hUM/ oM bad+ma kumAr pad+mashAsti d+ha ra Na Ta gnats+tshan tsan hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma nAl kaNasha ra ka tsakra ga ta pad+ma pA Ni bu rgyu ha

Na pa san kr-i ta yadz+nyAbA ta a dza nam pa tshu tsanod/ rta da en ra yan du ba dare trenau kha aT ThAhAsan pra le sha ya sa ma yan/ da hache sad+he a pa le tishAr hU~M/ oM ba pasaM b+ha ba dza pa ja pa pad+ma

bya sha hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas na// dkyil 'khor bzhi de 'ad de bzhin te// der ni pad+mazhi la bzhi pa// paNomadud tshe thogs par bra// de ya phyogs na thams cad du// rdo rje gar la sogs tshul du//

mtshan ma pa tsho'adzin grwa red/ sems dang 'a chen po tshe ga bzhin// de rnams kyi snying pon 'di rnam zhino/ oM pad+monato shar nAtha pu dza ya sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karmas ma ya/ A kar yab sha ya da ya

A be sha sarba karmasad+d+him pra yatsua ba lo ki te shwa ra hU~M/ oM ba yan d+ha tad a b.lakyi toshwa rar ka b+hA ya ka pa tses ma ya hU~M o mahA pra tsaNi ba shA rU pa tsaka/ pad+ma daMt+taA ka ra la bshAn badzra pud yaM

pad+ma ak+ta khA da khA da d+hi glo smra glu/ oM pad+ma muSh+Thas ma ya hU~M b+han+d+ha hU~M taT/ rdo rje shugs kyis bca'anas niaM// grwa rnams kun tu pra ban//rdordza sgrog tsho la rogs tshul/ pad+ma sgog mo la sogs lha// de dag gin

phyag rgya 'di rnams so// o pad+ma lA s+ya rA ga pa mahAtAri rA ga ma hA pU dza sa ma ya hU~M/ oMparamA le a b+hiShiny+tsa/ a b+hi Ti ka pU dza sa ma ye hU~M/ oM pad+ma gAte gA pU dza sa ma ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma mni wati sarba pU dza
sra brtan sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// pa'i mchod pa la sogs bzhi// mchod pa'i lha mo rnams bra 'o// de la de dag gi phyogs
