rgyan 'di rnams yonano// oM pad+ma d+hu pa pu dza sa ma ye pa phyi de la pad+ma ku la da ya tam hA ga Ni pad+mar ta hUM/ oM rar pu'i pu dza sa ma ye par u0fb1ba sa ma hAdAr pad+ma gu la pra ra har sarba aNA sAd+ha yahU~M o pad+ma dA pA pa/

'tshe dza sa ma yaM pad+ma ku la sunA ra ma hAtu dra a lo ka brjod pa tsan ya smad sa ra sU ta hUM/ oM pad+ma gan pU dza sa ma ye ma hA par ku latsa ri ku ru kaman me pad+ma sid+hi hUM/ de nas pad+masgo bzha lo// kun dutshogs sogs ji

bzhin du// ji lta ba bzhin legs pa po// de dag snying po'i don gyis ni// ji bzhin par na bro bar bya// u0f00das grwa ba ma hApad+maoM ku sha A kar yahU~M sarba pad+ma gu la sa ma yan pad+ma oM sha rlur daM// oM a

mo g+ha pA sha ked+ha A ka ya pra be sham ma hA pa shu patao na ba ru Na ku re ra pra be sha d+huradat+takhu la sa ma ye hUM hUM/ oM pad+ma we Na Tab+hAn sarba pad ku la sa ma maMshA hUM hUM thaM/o TaM su kha sanata ku mA ra ba Thargyu ra

rarag+haNaA be shal sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yaM sarba mu dru ma ban+d+ra ya sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha pa a bi sha a a/ de nas 'gro ba thams cod 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad do//

dal dang bor pad+mob slob dpon nyid rdo rje pad+mo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du zhu'o gas te/ rdo rje dpyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du snying po 'dis las rnams bya'o// oMm hApad+ma so Ta
so ba a d+hu tiSh+Tha a/ de nas de b.lan du bka' mnos nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ paNo'i dbyibs brlabs nas rang ga btob ming brjod la paro'i lcags kyul sogs ngos las

rnams bya'o// de nas tshes kyi phyag rgya do dag nyid kyis sems dpa' chen po rnams bsgrub par bya'o// da nas dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas pad+mo'i slob ma Nanas gzhug par btaM/ de nas dang

por pad+mo'i slob ma rnams la mna' snying po can la'ang skad du rasgo bar bya'o// dang na khyod kyi snying kha na// pad+mo sams da pa'i nyidi nga zhugs te// cha sta tshul 'di smos nan//dem thag tu dral ta gshegs// de nas

yang 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste// gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la'ang ma smra zhig/ khyod kyisami bde ba ma spar pas dus byas nas san sa na dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas snying po 'dis dam

ge ga lag gyi bcing bar bya'o// oM badzra par sa ma ya sto da res gos dkar po bgos la dar dkar pos gdong g.yogs nas gzhug par du snya dasnying po 'di yin no// oM pad+mas ma la ste/desan sazhag 3tshaji lta

ba bzhin du sanas paro'i dbyangs lag tu sbyin no/ oM pa ra hasta d+harmaran pa lA ya sAn/ de nas 'daskad du pad+mo'i tshes nyid ji lta bu lags zhes dri bar bya'od dad la yang 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// ji ltar

rablo dkar po 'di de da'adod pa'i nyes pas mi chags bzhin// thams cad dag par bsgoms na nadi/ de bzhin sdug pas rtags mi 'gyur// delachos nyid na 'di pan no//da nas pad+mo'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i pishA
bsub par bya ste/ sAde la pad+mo byas nas kyang// pad+mo pasoms na Are la yade/ da dpal yang dbang 'gyur na// dad med pa la lasmosacu dregos// dpral bar sangs rgyas dmi
bris te// rtag tu bsgoms par byas na ni// bsgoms pa desan myur du yang// dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// kha yi nad dartse stod du// sangs rgyas dbyibs na rab bsgoms na// sku dbang sgyu ma bdag

tshu nyid kyi/ rtagatu kha na gnas par 'gyur// gtsug tor dbus su pad+mo no/ snyoms par zhugs te bzhag nas kyang// gtsug tor pad+mo bsgoms nan// mkha' la 'gro pa'i ng de dbang 'acu ra// de dag gi snying pon/

'da rnams yin no// oM pad+ma shrI yaM shu kha ma de/ o rad+ma a shu ka pra yats+tsha yaM/ oM pad+mas ra smra ba sho d+ha ya hU~M oM pad+ma u rgya gro pa nyiku ru dza/ rtsa ga pa'i m yang na mkha' la' da dung// pad+modam pa bsgoms nan//

'di na sems can thams cad kyang// dbang du byed pa dam pa'o// mkha' 'am yang n phyogs gzhan du// pad+ma dam pa bsnyomasanas kyang// gang tshe thong ba de tsho blas/ ta dga' bar na mi snang 'gyur// rtsig pa

'am yang nam mkha' la// pad+margyaga'akhris na na gang tshe mthong nas blangs ba ya/ ritshosna tshogs gzugs de 'gyur// mkha' 'am yang na phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje pad+mo bsgomasanas kyang// de blangs skad mi

nyis kyisan// basmob rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// de dag gi sAri po na 'di rnams yin no// oM badzradza gad pasIka dzAn pad+ma a ba shaa oM/ oM rnyan pad+matiSh+Thaasha na ba kun thaM// oM sa mAd+ha ri shwa pad+matiru paM

nad+mar ngug ma b+ha ga daM daM/ oM sa mA d+hib pad+moT+Thaa d+hi tiSh+Thagi rgyu hi/dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du// spyan ras gzigs dang ra bas nas ni// de ya mdun du mgrinagyi// phyag rgya mchog gis 'dren par bya// dkyal
'khor la sogs thams cad du// spyan ras gzigs dbang bra bar bya// ngas pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// 'gro ba thams cad pos dbang byed// dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du// sbyan ras gzigs dbang
gir bya// de ya na dun du pad+mom// lcags sgrogs mchog ga phyag rgya bzhis// dkyil 'khor la sogasazams cad du// spyan ras gzages dbang bro bde a/mdun du pad+mo drul bu yis// thams cad 'bebs pa'i

dam pa'o// de la de dag gi snying pon 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+mosU karAl sacha ma hA satan cu dza/ oM a mo g+ha pAshakro d+ha hUM ho ha/ o pad+ma skye Ta daM/ o pad+ma g+halta a pa sha ya sarba a/ bdag nyid kyis na bdag nyid nyid//

pad+mo zhal bzha ni mas da par yang// bsgom ta ra nas grub nas na// skad ga gse na gzugs mar 'gyur// de ltar bdag nyid dag nyid kyis// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzan gnas// mtsho pad+mobasgoms nan// brad mi shes pat+taM
go 'phang 'thob// spyan ras gzigs dbang gtsug tor dbus// bdag gsang sa rgyas gzugs su ni// bdag nyis kyis na bsgoms bsgyur na// tshe dpag med pa'i ng mnyam par 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyis ter

'dzan gnas// sna tshogs gzugs kyis tang 'dzin du// bdag nyid kyis na bsgoms na ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur// de la do dag gi snying po rnams na 'di yin no// pad+mo ba shwa/ d+harmakA ya pa
bud+d+ha a t+ta ka a/ 'do ki shar/de nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyaphagargya'i yid zhis nga nad da do// de la re zhig dang bor na phyag rgya chen po' bshas pan ta ja ster rimad+hA

dun/ zla ba'i dkyil 'kher dadus gnas shing// pad+mo la gnas sogs dpar na//bdaganyid kyas na bodaganyid sgom// de nas de dag gi las na 'di dag yin no// sangs rgyas phyag rgya chang rings na// tshod la nor tshang

mnyamar ra 'gyur// rdo rje pad+me btsades na na// spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam por 'gyur// sangs rgyas dbang gas bcingasan ni// bde bar gshegs pas de dbang bskur// pa[$]pad+mo'i ting 'dzin 'thor/ sna lcogs kyis/ sne/

tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba dang// sangs rgyas yin na dbang bskur 'gyur// pad+mo sems dpa'i ting 'dzan gyis!/ pa to khro bo dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis pa 'dod pa'i

dngos grub mchog/ sangs rgyas dbang gse sangs rgyas nyid/ rdo rje pad+mo grub mchog bzhi// 'dod pa'i pad+mor ba 'dod ldan// dag3 la pas na le gas ra snyan// khro gnyer gyisan khri zhir 'gyur// pad+mo'i nyi ma ba

brjod mchog/ pad+mo zla bas mdzes pa cha// bzhad pas rab bzhad grub pa 'thob// grol ras dngos grub mchog 'thod po// ra ral gri sa la ngas spyod 'akh+dzong//mgrin sngon gyis na 'gugs ra cho// gos dkar gyi

dngos grub 'thob// pad+mo gar dngang gis 'grub ste// ma 'jagis rtag tu'ajags pa med// rang gtum gyisan ma rungs 'dul/ pany+tse khu tshur rab tu sgrub// sgeg mo dka' zhing 'phreng ba banor// glu blangs rta dardo/
tsa bdug pas tshar// ma tog mdzes shing me tog lta/ dris na mdog ga drar yang 'gyur// rta mgrin gyis rang dga' lags [}]gdon mi zur dbang du byed// pad+mo lcags sgrog b.rung pa rnga dus kuman/ 3sa

byed do// de nas pad+mor legs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ba yo ga 'ad yin te// rdo rje da sngam pa bsrings nas ni//mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam par bskur// mya gargya 'ar na tshes da tshog/ sangs rgyas chos rta ra 'tho

byed// rdo rje bstan pa bcas nas na//mdzub mo gung mo sun 'ag mnyam// sangs rgyas rags mchog phyag rgya da// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par byed// rdo rjedam pa dngas nas ni// ga nga mo rdo rje pad mnyen

pa 'di ni rdo rje rigs dam pa'i// phyag rgya 5na te rdo rje 'grub// de las gung mo rin chen badra// rdo rje rin narab 'grub byed// gung tsho pad+mo'i tshul du dus// pad+mo'i dngos grub 'theb par byung// rje tshad la mo bal

nas na// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// chos kyi rdo rje pa des na ni// skad cig gin dam tshig 'gyur// rdorje bsdams la mdzub bsnyams pas// sa ngas rgyas dngos grub thob par byang/ de nas rab ra byang ]

sams da pa'i phyag rgya khyad par du// rje thal mo bsdams nas kyang/ dgung mo mnyan par bsdams nas ni// mthe bong mtha'u chung phu ban// sna tshogs la dror rashad [']a'i// da lasamah+phegonga'anyes pa/
ra dzub gnyis rtse mo sdad la dgag/ dbus kyi rdo rje gtsug phud// gtsug phud sa ngas rgyas pa'i par bshad/ dirje bsdams pa dam cus la// mtha bong mnyal nas btung nas ni/ na ju mo gnyis na rtsi spyab
dgug bkananas tang nge 'dzin du da nug/ thal mo dad+mo mnyam sgyur la// mdzub mo dedzar bsnyams na na/ mtha bod das la sbyar da 'ad// nges pa'i dpa phyug pa gaskya'o// rdo rje [w]ma

pa bsdamasanas ni// lag par bkan te bcings nas kyang// mthe bong gnyis na pad+mor skung// sangs rgyas pa smyon par ngo shad// mthe bong gnyis na rdo rjer mnyam// mdzub mo lcags kyu ral gar bya mthe'arlung
tsha gnyis n so sor dbye// gung mo sun lag paskyor bya// pad+mor mnyam par bsgyur la marda bos mtha' bzung dgug pas// ka pon pa'i mdzub mo dazud ngan// pad+mob brdas na 'gug par byed// tha la mo la/
par gyur nas ni// bkan 'gas phyag rgya dang des nan// legs sog zhes bya sbyin par byed// pad+mo'i legs pa na par grags thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la// mdzub mo rtse mo bsnyams da ga

mtha'ang phunas mdzod pur gzhag/ pad+mo khromanyis zhes bya 'o// rdo rje bsdams padan byas 2 3/ sor mo thams cad dkyil 'khor du// snying khar rab tu brkyangob na// pad+mo' ma 3na par bshad// thal mo rab
dudam sbyar la// mdzub gnyis rin chen 'dra bar bya// dpung pa'i spyi bor rab brgyan pa//pad+morAn nargyal pan tshud/ rje tshe bsams pa spapir gzhag/ kha dar bas ra ra rab brkyang nas/ nyid kyi gnas

ga dgod pa dang// kha na decu gag nyid du 'gyur// ting 'dzani pado'i bcings nas ni/ mthahong gnyis na so so dgod/ pad+mo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya la[N! ]/mdzubaganyis pad+mo'i tshul du dgug dpaNesgo la da 'phul//

rgya dang// dngos grub thams cad grub pa ru byed// ral gri'i tshul dbus nga na// pad+mo'i ral gri'i phyag rgya la// mtha'u chung pa chen por bya// mthe bong gnyis na dpag ltar bsgrung// mdzub ma rtsa medung[51 ]/

gung mo srin lag 'khor lor du// rdo rje thal mong dan byas la// g.yas pa o du nang du gzhag/ g.yon pa 'a na dzub mtheb bzlas pa bya// sor kun chu skyes la khye 'dra// rdo rje rjel so mnyam sbyar 2// gon dang

gang sa nas de bzhin du// 'gying bcas gar byed bskor nas ni de sngarer pan na pa da can// rdo rje thal mo dam byas la/ dartse mo thams cad 'dug// ngaskor ta palce'-i sang rangan lA/sa bstan par byad pa/

po rdo rje thal mo dam byas la// gsar ba'i gnod spyin tshul du ni// thal mo brkyang stangasas nas na// khar ra zhag pad+mo'aganod spyin ma// rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas kyang// gangamo san phur bkugs//
rang ga mthe po'i rgyab mnan pa// pad+ma'i khu tshur zhes kyang ngashad// dodzad byangs kyi tshul gyis ni// rdarjethal mo las byung nga/ na ched pa'i lo thams cad kyi/ mi ra ang ga'o// de rdza dpalas
pa dam phyis la// mdzub mo gnyis mnyam sbyar nas// ra dzu mo gnyis na par bkug la// rta mgrin gyi3ts+tshan par M yaM ra da/ pad+mo'i ja no ut+ta myul/ ba ba 7[… ] tshe da ra rab
pa'i phyag rgya yin// mtheb mdzub lcags sgrog 'dra bar bya/ rdordza dbab pa'itshul gyis na/nga smyobul mo mnyan myur la// srin la ba ra 23chung nyis bar du ma pog 4 ra shad du de byA pa rtse
ragis spyi tshes kyi phyag rgya'i yi shes na 'ad yin te/ b+higyi kra ma 1 h+phag rgyu / grwa ta pa/ bar a/ pad+mo khu tshur gnyis dus la// las kyi phugargya bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshag
phams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las// 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so///de nas yang dacom ldan 'das des

spyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i dun gu rangs zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harmas ma
e hU~M/ re nas cung nubasams dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rag pa 'byung pa'i rig pa dam pa 'gasungs so/ oM radzras ma ye hU~M/ donas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rdo

snying posar ngag rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//oM mni ran+tas ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sams dpabatsan po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad+ma sa ma ya hU~M/ de kas byang chub sems dpa

chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'dagasungs so// oM karmas ma ye hUM/ da nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang garab gsal/

kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'adakyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// donas rab tu bshad bya ga/ phyag rgya'i da kyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyar dang 'dra ba la// badro'i gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du nad kyis

'khor thams cad srad bus bye// de dbus pad+mo'i steng du ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo pri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// dam tshag mchog rnams lcam bzhin// rang gareg pa rnam ldan par// chos kyi rdo rje la sogs

bro de la de dag gi snying pon 'di rnams yin no// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma shwa ra hUM/ oM d+harma sa ma ya badzra pad+man hUM/ oM bud+d+ha a d+hi Shi ka rat+na sa ma pa/ dao tAras ma ya hU~M/ oM bshamu khe hU~M/ sna tshogs gzugs

mchogs dkyil 'khor du// derdzi bzhugs kyis brgal nas ni// de yi dbus su pad+mo yis// bskor ba'apad+mobu bar bya// de yi phyogasa rnams thams cad du// pad+mo'i phyag rgya gnyis gnas pa/ pad+mo'i na tshan ma bri bar bya

bde gshegs nyin kyi nyid phyag rgya// de la de dag gi phyag rgyan 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+ma ta thA ga to/ oM sa man+ta b+ha tre pad+ma badzra aM ku sha ko Sha d+hA raM NahU~M/ oM pad+ma ra ti/ oM pad+ma du/ da panyin dkyil 'khor

gnyis par yang// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// gtsug phud chu skyes che gnas pa 'a// sangs rgyas dbang bskur dra bar bya// da pa phyogs rnams thams cad du// lta 'og ma pa ji bzhin du// pad+moT mtshan m

ldan pa ya ]/dam ga mchog rnams gzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po na red rnams min no//shI/ oM hUM ku TI pe ta h+pha pad+mehUM/ oM pany+tsedzA le/oM so ma na pany+tsen oM partsom san a ka da sha shAka/

tu da ri da ri a alce btsa le pra tsa le ku su ma d+ha re a le pra bsha sid+d+him+me pra ts+tshAts+tshahU~M/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gsum dang yang// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang// de yi dbus su d+ha rnyomadzas// pad+meT phyag rgya
gzhag par bya// de bzhin phyogs rnams thams cad du// lta 'og go rims ji bzhan par// paNemtshan mar ldan pa yi// pany+tse lan gnas par bra// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams

yan no// d+hi dzI o tA re tut+tA ra hUM/ o d+hahU~M/ oM pad+ma kaM/kha d+ha ra Ni/ ni la kaNi sid sgyu sid smyo hU~M/ oM pAn+tar pA son pad+masaM b+ha ba bcu ba rgya hU~M/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor ba'i par na// rdorja shugs kyis rgyal

ts+tshi nas kyang// ratsho'i debus su pad+mo wi// 'bar ba'ab phrang bas bskor 'od bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin par// pad+mo'i dbus na gnas pa yi// pad+mo'i mtshan ma ldan r/

de la de dag gi snyade po na'odi rnams yin no// ste oparon/ Ar pU dza ya sarba tathA ga tAnAn tan ta hU~M/ oM A be sha ya pad+ma ka pa tsa ban d+har kra mnahU~M/ haM/ oM ma hA pra tsatsA paNA yakAn bisha rung d+hu raNi

ts+tso d+hishA pa ya sarba du tA da khA da hU~M/oM paNomu a nu/ rdo rdzogugs kyis brgal nas ni// sangs rgyas mchod pa nams bri ba// pad+ma lcags kyu la sol sargyu// mdor na pad+mo'i na tshanam can// danas dadagos

phyag rgyan 'di rnams so// oM pad+mar ta pu rdoho/ o pad+maa shu ka pA dzo ra ti/ oM pad+ma shI ti pu dzo ga/ oM pad+ma ni wi t+yA pU dza ho/ o d+hu pa pad+man hU~M/ oM pad+ma duny+tsa hU~M/ oM pad+ma ku la sun d+har/ d+harmaA loke

pudza ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma gan d+ha hU~M/ mtshon pa rnams so/ oM pad+ma aM ku sha Ar ya mahA pad+ma ku la na/ 15 lha ba sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM a mo g+ha pa shakro d+has ma yi pra bo sha ya sarba satwa sa ma yaM hU~M/ oM pany+tsa

[4 ]hU~M ka le thaM/ oM pad+ma gan d+hA ra hU~M hU~M A be sha ya/ sa ma yaM sha na mu kan/ de nas phyag rgya 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa 'tshog rgyas par byas nas/ pad+mo'i slob ma rnams ji lta ba/

bzhazhi btsud de/ 'di skad du khyod kyis gsang pa 'di gsulabang ma smra zhig/ khyod sems can dmyal bar lhad nga re/ tsha ba/chag tu sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ danas phab nas 'di skad du khyod kyi de mig lam
du tsa zhig snang zhes dris nas/ des ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ des gal te nam mkha'i dkar sar mthoran na de'i tshe de'i dngos grub dam nga ra bya'o// yang nasar po/

mthong nani danor grub 'i ye shes bslab bo// ci sta dmar po ma thod na ni rjes su dag par 'gyur ba'i ya shas bslab bo// tsa ston g po ma thong nan mngon spyod kyi se ra rlu ngo// mu sta sna tshogs nad ngan ni/

dngos grub thams cad kyis shes bslab par shes nas/ ja lta ba bzhin du gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes brgyud do// phyag rgyab pas bslab par bya'o// de ltar rdo rje dbyangs la sogs

pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang snod ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ya shas bslab pa na 'dapazhin du brtag par bya'o// de nas dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i sa shasan 'ad yin te/ spyan ras gzig dbang sems

dpa' che/ sna tshogs gzugs su bdag nyid kyis/ bsgoms na phyag rgya chen po yi// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dbang gis dem tshagazhi/ mnyam par bzhag pas brtan zum taM/ bdag nyid kyis
na bsgoms nan// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// pad+mo paNosams dang ba che// bdag nyid mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms// bdag nyid kyis na dam pa yi// dngos grub thob pa nyid

du 'gyur// rang byung ba/don mi za ba yi// dbang phyug las kyi phyag rgyan dache bsdu bzhin lasgrubs rgyu ra der yang/ ma tshod 2 dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dunas de dag gisnying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM ra satAhaM/

saMd ts+tsha ho/ oM bud+d+haM a bi Ta ka ko d+ho hasad+ha rU ho/ oM d+harma sa mA d+hir haMsid+d+hiho/ o tsho lho'i bsang ts+tsa raM/ de nas nor sgrub pa' yongachos n 'di yin te/ kha yi nang du dbya'i pag ste// sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag/

rgya che// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgom na ni// gci'i tu gyur las stong du bsgyur// gsar srung brgyad cha blangs nas ni// dam tshig mchog ni rab brtan par// bdag nyid kyisan bsgoms nan// gcig tu gyur las stong

du 'gyur// mu tag 'brum bu khar bcug la// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phug tu// bdag nyid kyisanabasgoms nan// gajug tu gyur las stong du 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya lag nyis kyis// rin chen thams cad blang na

ni bdag nyidi gyisan bsgoms na yang// gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur// de la de dag 'di snying re rna'adi rnams mi no// oM pad+mam Aratu pra d+ha hU~M dzaM/ oM pad+ma su ban+d+hadra d+ha hU~M// oM pad+ma nu kuT pra d+ha hU~Mdza/ oM

pad+ma sarapa cu hUMdza/ de nas rjes su dag lta ba'i ye shes ni 'di yan/ sna tshogs dang nga ro ngo ga rgya che// bdag nyid kyis na bskums nan// ra [$]blangs te mdun gnas pa// gang yin des na nga mgur phud/

dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis// padrodamar por dam bzung ste/ bdag nyid kyisan bsgomasan na// bud med thams cad dga' dar 'gyur// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas kyang// pado blad tor lta ba// rdorje/
lta bas de ltar bltas// 'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul byas na// chog bzhin du pod+ha bzung// lag pa gnyis kyis bskor na ni// bud med thams cad de mgur 'gyur//

ral de dag gi snying po ni bod rnams so// oM ba sha shAr mahA pad+ma ho/ o pan+tas ma a pad+ma ho/ oM mo ga pad+ma ho/ o karmapad+ma ho/ de nas mngon spyod kyi yi shes bslab bo// sna tshogs pa shes dbang phyag che//

bdag nyid mdun du pad+mod na// phyag rgya pad+modi nyid kyis// de ya'i mib skad cig go/ pad+mobazung nas brtan du ra// cho ga legs pa rje bzhin du// dmo nyag dam pa de nyid kyis/ nan tan kho nar ba zhig par bya// gang

ga ming smos 'jig pan// ting 'dzin phyag rgya sbyar nas su// ji ltar de ltar pad+mo thogs// las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur// gang gi bzhag par khros na na/las kyi phyab rgya sbyar nas su// bskor zhing brtag pa byas

nan// de yi 'tsho ba rdol bar 'gyur// de la de dag gasnying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oMmahApad+mad mA ra ya hopaT/ oM sa ma ma pad+ma spyoTan na yar ta pas[0f00] d+hacha pad+matsad ban sha ya pra ta ya phaT/[0f00]karma pad+ma/

sbe Na mA dzA paM tam cu kr-itaphaT/ de nas chos kyi dam tshig gsang pa'i phyagargya'i ya shasan bed yin no// bud mad dunapad+mobasam// de stang bdag nyidi rdo dzar bsgyur// pad+mo pada mchogatsacad cing// mnyamakhar
khazhag na dngos grub thob// bud med dunapad+mo bsam// de steng bad po nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur// na dbu rgyan sangs rgyas na dbasgoms na des na de 'grubabo// bud med dun pa ts+tsaM

bsam de steng pad+mor ba dag bsgyur te// rtse zhing pad+mo paNomartog// dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dbud mid dun pad+me lasam// de steng sna tshogs bdag bsgyur te// rtsa zhing sna tshogs pad+mo mchog/ snag

tsho dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de dag snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badzra pad+masaM yo ga sA d+ha ya shri/ oM pur+Na ma kuT saM so ga sAts+tsha ya sha/ o pa/pad+ma saM yo ga su rgyu a glu/ o bshA pa d+masaM yo ga sA d+ha ya hUM/

de nas pad+mo rigs kyi gsod pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du bslab bo// sor mo rtse spyad pa skyor bya/ rdo rje khro de ba mdzub gnyis spyad// rtsa gnyis norabu'i pad+mo ltar// rdo rje bsdam pa 'ang de ba

rdo rje dpyis khasdam nas kyang// gung mo gnyis na myu gur sgreng// mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i// phyagargyashAkya thub pa' brten// chos kyi rdo rje snying khar gzhag// bskyar ta dpAl bar gzhag/

pa dang// ting nge 'dzin tshul pang du gzhag/ bsgyur nas spyi bor bzhag par bya// rdo rje dpyings kya de bang ra cings la// mchon rten pa tsho'i tshul dun/ dgung mo'i gnyis na bcings gyur na// sangs rgyas pad+mo

yin par r shad// de las mang bong rdo rje dang/ mdzub gnyis ral grwa pe lcags kyur bya// pad+mo rdo rje'adzin pa dang// gsang ba'i phyag rgya yan par bshad// de las mtha bong bsnol nas kyang// mdzub mos
mdzub mo rab bzung la// drangs na rab dga' yin par bshad// legs so zhes pa'i ng de bzhin te// rdo rje bsam pa dam byas las// mthe bong gnyis mnyam banug nas kyang// mdzub gnyis rtsa/

bkugartse mon/ dpral bzhag gung mo pador bya// de nyid las ni snying khar yang// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang// de nyid lasanargyal mtshan bcing// lhag par rab tu brkyang bar bya// rdo rje bsdams

pa dam byas la// mdzub gnyis rtso mo pad+mor dgug/ de bzhin pad+moral gra ste// mdzub mo pad+mor byas pas sbyar// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mtha bong g.yon pa nang du gzhug/ dung sta mtha bor rje

bar bslong// sor mo bskum brkyang dpad mtha'u chung// de las thams cad bdun nas kyang// mtha'achung pad+mo lta bur bya// mtha dong g.yas la sbyar ba yi// mdzub mor nor bu 'grang bar bya// rdo rje bsdusu

pa dam dus la// mthe'u chung pado lta bur bya// mdzub mo pas nag stagarapyad pa// pado spyan gyi yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdanas pa dam byas la// mthe'u chung rdo lta bur bya// dmadu mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste//

mthe'u chung gnyis na gachar bya// de las mthe'u gnyis mchi bar bya// mthob gnyis nang du gzhug par bya// de nas rab tu bshad cu pa/ dam tshig mchogan bla med do// rdo rjenang du bsdams nas kyang// mdzub gnyis

ngado 'du byas la// mthe bong phan tshun bsnol bani// gsang ba'i sna tshogs dbang du bshad// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe'u chung gu mo mnyam bsgrengal// mtheb mos rdo rje sbyar ba na// gtsug phud dang/
ga'// na de bzhin gshags// ra bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe bong du do bdur byas la// kha nas dbyang ltar byas nas kyang// pang du ting nge 'dzin ltar bzhag/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa

las// sor mo kun gyi ngos rnams naM// mnyam par dam du bsdams nas kyang// mdzub gnyis rdo rjer mnyam pa 'o// dbazhin rdo rje bsdam pa las// mdzub gnyis nga ro 'drar byas la// mthe bong gnyis kyang bsnol

nas ni/ gung mo gnyis ni rtsa sbyar bkug/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mjab gnyis rdo rjerab sdur la// mdzub mo ral gri lcags kyur[S]//mthabu chud pa 'drar byas la// de bzhin du na bsgyur nas kyang//

mdzub mo g.yon pa bsgrung ba la// mdzub mo mtha dong rtse sbyar la// dam du bzung ste dgag ltar bya// de la mdzub mo gnyis bkug la// mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan panaM// nga ro dgyes pa bdag gnyis cho// legs so zhes

bya sbyin byed kyi// da bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// sor mo kun gyi ngos sdur la// mar pong gnyis kyis mnan nas ni// mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o// de nyid snying khar nyi mar bya// spyi bor patorgyal mtshan bya// phab ste kha

yi 'gram bzhag pa// pad tshar dgod dgod pa yin// dordzanang du bsdams byas la// chos kyis rdo rje tshul gyis na// mthe'u chung na tha bong rab bsdams pa// 'di ni sgrol ma'i dam tshig yin// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las

mdzub gung pad+mo ral gir tu// de bzhin nad du 'kher ler bya// zos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mtheb mdzub sprad de gnyis su bya// de nas snying khar sbyar ba na/gsang ba'i srung ba

[Rso]yin par bshad de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe'u chung pad+me 'drar byas la/ dmadzung gnyis shin tu bkug nas kyang/ mthapa ga phyir bskyed mche ba can// de ltas khu tshur tshul gyis ni// mtha' gnyis nges

kyis btsar pa yi// pad+mo gsang ba'i khu tshur che// dam tshag na chol turapa brtag pa'o// patu lA sI la sogs pa// de dag tshan rnams kun bya ni// rdo rje nang du nga sngams byas la// de 'dra bar n g+ha sa bar lta// nga nas pad+mo

gsang rab chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yin te// A pA hA/ AsA d+hA hA/ tA AtsA/ pUrwas/ las kyi phyag rgya ma dor bsdun khu tshur gnyis su bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyiram tshul brtag pa'i rgyal po chan
po las// tshes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i da spyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/// danas yang pom ldan 'das kyi de pa cin gsheg pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ya shas kyi rim tshu byin gyis

'dab pa'i pad+mo nas bya ba'i tid de 'dzin la snyom par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM rnyams ma d+hi dzAn ta thA ga ta hUM/ de nas byang chub sa nas dar chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig kyi tshos

'byung ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badzra d+hamu hUM/ de nas byang chubs mas da pa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ra mAhU~M/ de nas byang chud sams dpa'

se mos dang ba chen pa rdo rje can gyis rang garag pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma d+hamAhU~M// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshosna tshogs kyis rang ga reg pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM kAn
[Asi ]@#// d+harmahU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpat+tas nas dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun tu sngan des gzigs kyi dbang posanyid kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor bdu gsungs so// de nas rab tu shad bya ba/

ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyangs dang 'dra ra ra na// chos kyi yi shes zhes brjod do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bye// de yi dbus su dri ba na// stengashes rdo rje/
de bzhin la/shegs// de yi phyag rnams thams cad du// sems dpa' cha rnams cho gu pa zhen// sAtshogs dbang pal la sogs pa// ting 'dzan lasom zhugs bri// de la de dag gi snyang po 'di rnams so// oM dA

na bud+ha hUM// o dz+nyAn bdeye shA ra hU~M/ o dz+hAn bud+ha mu ku Ta hU~M/ oM dz+hAn d+harmashA ra hUM/ oM na a mo g+hAhwa ri hU~M/ oM dz+nyAn pod+ma pad+ma hU~M/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma badzra d+ha ra hUM/ oM tsun pad+ma mA ra hU~M/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma tu'u hUM/oM dz+nyA na rA ts+tshaku

Ni hU~M o dz+hAn pad+masU r+ya hU~M/ oM dz+nyAn pa tsan+dahU~M odzAn pad+ma daMs hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tA rahU~M oM dz+hAn par kumA ri hU~M/ o dzAn pad+ma na ri ya hU~M/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma hAsAhU~M/ o dzAn pad+ma narta ra hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pa ri hU~M/ o dzA

na ra dkAhU~M oM dz+nyA na ra rgya mu hU~M/ oM dzAn pad+ma ma lA s+ye hU~M daoM dz+nyA na pad+ma mA la hU~M/ oM dz+nyA nar/ g+ho tahU~M oMtsAn pad+man shu/ oM dzAn d+had+hu patshu/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma puSh+ThahU~M/ oM dz+nyAn pad+ma d+ha pe hU~M oM dz+nyAn pats+tshagats+tshehU~M/ o tsA/

namadam kuAhU~M o tsA na pad+maa mo g+ha pA shahU~M/ o tsAn pad+ma spo Ni hU~M/ o tsA na pad+ma A lisha hUM/ de nas chos kyi dkyil 'kher 'diraM dgug pa la sogs pachogargyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas 'di
skad du khyed kyis gzhan su'a'ang ma rjed sa// khyed sems cun dmyal bar lhung nas sdug da ba par gyur tur/ de nas dar ba/ shan pasku ra bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug snyoms zhugs la// snying khar
pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang/ dang po'i ting nge 'dzin thob na na// de ma thag tu myur bar ldang// 'a jig rten dbang por snyems zhugs la// dpral bar pad+mopasnyoms byas tagoms nas shin tu brtan gyur na//
nga ma thag tumakha' la lding// 'jig rten dbang ga ting 'dzanagis// lce 'a ya spromA rakyang/ sar par gyur na mngarar lam nam mkha' la na de ga 'o// 'jig rten dbang ba ta'adzan gyis// gdug

tu ra ngo bsdoms nas kyang// grub par gyur namur dun// skad cig gis na snyad du lhung// de dag bde sAng po na 'di rnams so// oM pad+ma dzA na srid la sku ngasha/ oM pad+matsAn a b+hu Ti kaA nga// oM pad+madzA na ba tu
ma sU pe sha/ o pa tAdzAn uts+tshiShabyAsU re// nam mala' 'aman phyogs gzhan du// pa rtsa' dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang // ro ga 'od ni grub 'gyur na// skad cig gis ni mi snang 'gyur da nam mkha'am
na phyogs gzhan du[}]pad+mo'i de byos shig pasgoms nas kyang / de la stod du da ga dug ngar da/ bsgoms par gyungan ma snang tugyur// nam mkha'a'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pasmyu'i d+hApas ga sgomu

byas la// gong tsha mthong ba de tsho blangs// ma snang par ni mur du gyur// nam mkha' 'aman nge gas gzhan du// pad+mo 'od pyangs nabasgoms dus la// na thong nga'i pad+mod zasan// da ma thag pa 'gyur//
de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pad+ma A kar/ oM dats+tshar tha/ oM nA gra hAn/ o ramyur sa an hU~M phaT// phyag rgya che bangs pad+mon/ 'a dag dbyibs rnams sna tshogs
pa'i// dbyibs da lag pas bzunganani// gzugasa rnams thams cad 'chad bar 'gyur// pad+ma'i kha dog dpyabs rnams na// sna tshogs pad+mo'i dbyibs bris la// nga nyid bsgom pa byas nan// gzugs mang 'chang/

'tsho bar de 'gyur ro// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+mo'i kha dopo/dbyings rnams na// snatshogs dbyings su bsgoms na yang// sgra yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro// pad+mo'i kha dog dbyibasa rnams na// snatshogs dbyangs su

byas kyang ni// de la zhon nas mkha' 'gro zhing// cad ga' gzugs su des par 'gyur// de la de dag ba/ snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pad+ma d+ha ri bi sharu ra pra brtaya u bshA/ o bi shwa pad+mapa partayamaM/ o sa ma d+hi/

bgrwa pad+ma a de sha/ oM shapad+ma ma no ta kA ra A kA shab sha ru paM a d+hanaM/ gang yang rung ba rtseg rgya che// ting nge 'dzin gyis lags bcas la// pad+morlangs te rab byanan// gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur//

gang yang rung ba'i dam tshog l// phyag rgya zhes bya bcings nani/desan paro bsanas kyam/ ban bar gyuran dbang du 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin skyes dag pa yi// phyag rgya gang yang rungs dmangs la// ye shes pagadabyin/

tshapa den de yis myur da dang 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i de mtshami ldan// las kyi phyag rgya bcas nas ni// dadokhyen pa gang yin pa// de ma thag tud dbang 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// omahAdzAn

pad+ma po/ oMsam a pad+ma ho/ oM tsun par ho/ oM karmapad+maho/ de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis phyag rgya chen po' ye shes nga slab bo// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du na/ phyagargya chen pokhaslab par bya// da nas rab

pa gtad du pa// dam tshig mchog ni ba rgyud du swA// chos kyidakyil dkor tshul ldan// dpa' le ro gzhag par bya// chos kyi khu tshur brten byas la/ las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
kyi tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyitshes kyi las

kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis darlabs pa 'apad+mozhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyom par zhugs sa nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta karmakA hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi las

'byung ba rang gi rig sa pa dam pa gsungs so/ oM hUM d+haM de nas byang chub sams narab rdo rje snying pos rang gi rtag pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje/
spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad+ma karma/ da nas byang chub sems da pa' rdo rjesna tshogs kyi reng pa rig pa don pa 'ad gsungs so/ / oM pa shwa karma/ don dung nub sems dpa'

'pha ba/sa pa spyan ras gaphrags kyi dbang pos nyid kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyed dang 'dra pa na// pad+ma' las zhes
bya ba ste// dkyil 'khor chen po' tshul du na// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus nge// sangs rgyas phyogs kun pad+mo ya ]/mtshan ma 'dzin pa thams cad bri// de la da du//

gi reg pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so// o bur nihU~M/ bshwa karmashA ra hU~M/ oM ta thu ga teshwar a b+hU khaM ka karma batre hUM/ oM d+harmakarmashAr tsA na pu dzas ma ya hU~M/ oM a mo g+ha karma shwa rihU~M/ oM pad+ma karma

bud+hehU~M/ oM pad+makarlabadzra NahU~M/ oM pad+ma kamaNi mA ra Na pu dzakams ma ye hU~M/ oM pad+ma kAn dut+ti hU~M/ oM parma kamany+tsi ku tsut+tA/ oM pad+ma karmasuts+tsaM hU~M/ oM pad+ma kamad+hu dza hU~M/ oM pad+ma karmahAs hU~M/

a pa u0fa9karma tAr shu oM pad+ma karma ku ma ra tshudao paN+Nakarma nor ya na hU~M/ oM pad+ma kamakhra smi/ oM pad+ma kamanartah+pha re hU~M/ oM pad+marakA ra kAka sa ma ye hU~M/oM ma hA pra tsaNA gI ti ni paN+Na dzA kamakarahU~M/

oM pad+ma karma muT+Thisoka tu yahUM/ oM ra ti pU dzashu ji/ oM a byA ka pu dzi shudza/ oM gA te pu dzi nyicud oM ni wa bya pu ji shu d+d+haM/ oM d+hu pa pu dza hU~M a/ oM puSh+Tha pu tshe hU~M tu/[0f00] A lo ka pU dze shu rgyu/ oM

ga'o pu dzi bod oM ha ya grwa ba a na ya hUM dza/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha ko d+hi po zla ya hUM phaT/ oM pad+mahU~M ka la ban d+hi hU~MphaT/ oM pats+tshagats+tshe a bo sha ye hU~MphaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgag

nga la sogs pa'i tshog rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du dacug ste/ 'daskad du rigs kyi bu khyed kyis tshul 'di su la'ang ma smra zhig// sems can dmyal bar lhung por gyur ta re nas sgo zhig/ de nas
[o]ye shes bskyed par bya'o// de nas sdig pa bshags pa 'a ya shas bsub par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag rgya cha/ shAn tu mnyam pazhag bsgoms nas kyang// sdig rnams bshags pas myur bar na//
sdugeg pa kun las de 'dag 'gyur 'jig rtan raka da ba dza/ tshad// mtshu'i na mtsho bskyangs// stag ris cad la gsanan// nams rer lha sa las dgag/ 'jig rten
dbang phyug tung 'dzin du// nyan ma3sku par nga(lha la slo1 yig 753 21 tsa na na/ / 1363Na khyu tshoms mar nag dang rud pa/ dpa[;]'a sa pad+ma
ba los rnams thams can rta shags na3/ khas rnam pa gsa rnam pa/ la da drag gi snying la na 'di rnams so// oM sarba pA paM saMshong chu ska ba pa/// an tu sho d+han sa

sa la pad+ma/ oM sarba pA paM pra Na8shaNad+harmapad+ma/ oM sarba pany+tsa a ma ra Na bod+d+ha ka karma pad+ma da rinas sgrib pa thams cad yongs su brad par 'gyur ba'i yi shes bslab po// 'jabartanadabadra pa phyag rgya cher/
tumanyam bzhag bsgoms byas la// shud ts+tshashud rgya zhi ga brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/ 'jig rten dar nga gi tAdi 'dzin gyis// las kyidam tshig bcings nan// bud d+h+ya bud rgyu
zhe [']brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dpang por snyon sa zhugs la// chos kyi phyag rgyar bsgoms nas ni// d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi zhes brjod na// las rnams can las dag par
'gyur/ 'jage rten du da po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcades nas kyang// hAhAhA hA zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// de la da dag gi snying

pon 'di rnams so/ dao pA dzA kA ya pad+ma/ oM a bA ra Na ya pa d+ha/ oM ni dA ra Na ka ya pad+ma/ oM karma kA ma pad+ma/ donas dbazhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i mingashes bslab bo// 'jig rten/
tsha dbang gyis phyag rgya cher// rad tu mnyam par bzhag bcas la// o o oms brjod na// mchod pa thams cad rab tubyed// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig mchog ni bcas

nas kyang// b+hu b+hu b+hu b+hu zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad de mchod 'gyur// 'jing/ na dbang po sogs bzhugs la// chos kyi pad+mobasgoms nas kyang// ha hahahazhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams

cad nges mchod 'gyur// pad+mo'i las kyi phyag rgyan// shan tu mnyam par bzhag bcas la// d+hadz+ha d+ha b+he zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mtshon 'gyur// da la de dag gi snying pon 'di rnams so//

tsapa oM kar pad+ma/ o hUM kar pad+ma/ o nyakA ra pad+ma/ o d+ha kA ra pad+ma/ de nas dngos grub kyi ya shas bslab po// 'jig rten dbang bo phyag rgya cher// mnyam par bzhag pas bcings nas kyang// hi hri hri hri zhes
ngadzodon// 'jig rten dbang por grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig ces bu bcangs nas kyang// kirAhU~M zhes brjod na// dngos grugadam pa 'thob par 'gyur// 'jig
rtan dbang po'i mnyam gzhag par// mnyam par bzhag pas sgoms nas kyang// d+hag b+hag d+hig drug ces brjod na/ pad+ma khro bor 'grub par 'gyur// pad+mo chen po dag ba yi// las kyi phyag rgya bcangs

nas kyang// skye sI sA skye zhes brjod na// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// de la de dag ga snying pon 'di rnams so// oM sid rgyu/ oM shu nyid rgyu/ o d+hag sid rgya/ oM sa gad rgyu/ de nas las
gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i yengasan 'do na to// 'jig rten dbang por snyom bzhugs la// bud med kun dad rtso byad cing// o ho su kha zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// 'jig rten/
dbang por soms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtsa byed ng// pri ya pa la yas brjod na// sangs rgyas bam ldan 'das dgas so// 'jig rten dbang po snyomasazhugs la// bud med kun dang rtsa byed cing/
a hor ti zhes brjod na// da ni rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtsa byed cing// su kha su kha zhes brjod na// da yi bde ba mnyam mi 'gyur// dal de dag

ga sId pona'i da rnams so// oM sarba bud+d+ha pA dza pa brtan par/ o pAti kar pad+ma/ oM ra ti pa brtan pad+ma/ oM ma hAsu kho pad+ma dA De hU~M/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bya ste// nga nas/

patsho thal sbyar// dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje dgongs// mas kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis na// gnas rnams kun tu gzhag par bya// danas partsoragis kyi chos kyi phyag rgyan// bu zhes bya ba brjod par bya// las kyi phyag
rgyaganyis byas la// las kyi phyogargya das sgrub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dmatshami brtag pab rgyal po chen po las/ las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi che ga rgyas pa//
rdzogs so///de nas yang bcom ldan 'aakyis rdo rje chos kyadematshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis bab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyagargya'i snying po 'di gsungs

tsho so/ oMbadzra d+harmapad+mahUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badzra hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badzraratAhU~M da de nas byang chur

( sams dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM d+hamapad+ma d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di be gsungs so// oM sarngamu kha hU~M/ n gnas byang chub sems

rdzo/dang 'asems dpa' chon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi radang pos phyag bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bzhud bya ba// phyag rgya pa' mchog dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje dbyangs dang 'dra/

ba dang dkyil 'khor chen por 'dra bar bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbus sun// sangs rgyas gzugan bzhag par bya// da ya phugasa rnams thams cad du// rdo rje pad+mo la sopa des pra de dad nas dkyil 'khor

'dir dgug pa la sogs pa 'a mo ga rgyas par byas nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste 'di skad du 'di khyod kyis su la'angam rjod cig/ khyod rtag tu sdug bsngal par 'gyur ba dang mi de ba ma sngangs pas dus byas/
nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes sgo zhig/ de nas de yi ye shes laskyad par bya ste/ lag pas pad+mobazung nas kyang// bsgribs te legs par bsdam par bya// dra nges sangs rgyas rnams mchod na//
myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// mnyam par bzhag par gtsug phudadabus// sangs rgyas gzugs ni reb bzhag la// 'gro zhing rdo rje 'gying stanan// 'jing/ rtanathams cad dbang du byed// da 'opat+taM
waM po'i gzugs// ting nge 'dzin 'dug ja lta bzhin// yid kyis kun de bsad do// gang du phog pa de rgyas pa'i// sa sogs pa su las bud de// pad+mopachan po'i gzugs// ngato brgyagangs nyid du na de da

byas te lag pas bzung nas kyang/ bskor nas dbab la sogs de byad// de nas de dag gi snyid po ni 'di rnams so// oM badzrarat+tahU~M/ oM sam+b+ha tathAgata Ashapar du ra Na ma hAran+na/ oM badzra hUM tu/ og+hAn du dzA

gra sA d+ha ya o pa ts+tshamu ku Ta ta thA ga ta bshaM ku ru sarban lo ke shwar a h+phi Tika sa ma ya ho// oM pad+mapad+mamA ra ya sarba pra tuN+Dikan sa mA d+hadz+han u0fa9/ o ba shwa pad+ma sarba karmakAro bru ba la la lu la la laM hU~M phaT/
de nas phyag rgya gsar pa'i yushes bslab bo// chags nas dgopa thams cad na/ bsgrub par bya ste dam tshig 'ad/ sgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgyu yang// rnal 'byor gyis na myur du 'grub// del 'di'i
dam tshig gyis snying pon 'di rna pas yin no/ daoM sAts+tsha ya pad+marag sa ma ya ado da nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po thams cad bslab par bya'o// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil
'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so////denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad/

'dul bzhus bya khab snying po 'di ge sudas so// oM sarAdza ba da ba nI yam hAsatus/ A gtsAd+hahAhU~Mb shA ru san d+hu ra ya ma ma tsasarngasade d+d+ha ya pra yatsan+ti/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan sa
gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rang lu bshad bya ba// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khorata// dkyil 'khor chen pob tshul du na/ spyi

ya dkyil 'khor ba par bya// de yi nang du pad+mo yang// de bzhin du na bri bar bya// dar na 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i// sna tshogs gzugasan bri bar bya// des da kyil 'khor 'dir chogargyas pa ji lte ba zhin
du btsud nas// de bzhin du bsgo sta 'gro ba thams cad 'dul pa'i yi shes bslab bo// 'gro ba 'dul bzhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khoralags par bsams kyang// phyag chen po bsgomasan no// sna
tshogs 'chang rar 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgyab la shas bsgruba'o// sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgomasanas kyang// dbang po gnyis

kha na sbyar bar bya// dkyil 'khord na de grub bo// de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya bcang ba rnams bslab par bya'o// dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de bzhin du ras la sogs pa la'ar bya'o/
dkyil 'khor gcig pa'itshul du phyag rgya la sogs pa'i ng de bzhin du 'grub par gyur ro// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs
kyi dbang po la legs so zhes bya babyon pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang// thug pa chen po mngon 'dus pa/ rdorje theg pa bla med kyi// mdo snga'adano legs bshad pa// rdo rje sems dpo'akhyod lags
bar/ rdo rjerinachen khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyodalegasaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de khon nyid bsdus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dmatshig las rtog pa'i rgyal
po chen po rdzogs so////bam po bdun pa// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang

bskur ba'i rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ byang chub sems dapa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la ming rgya ma brgyad pa'i dngos gsol ba btab bo// nam mkha'i snying po sems can don// sems dpa'

po ga chen po// zhen che ba'i don chen mchog/ rdordza rinichen khyod phyag 'tshal// dbang bskurara'i chen chen po ni// dag pa che zhing dag pache// sangs rgyas ra chen rnams dag sku// ni chen rin chen khyod

phyag 'tshal// nam mkha' nam mkha' las byung ba// nam mkha' kun gyi 'od cha pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kun gyi// ra kun mchog na khyod phyag 'tshal//rin chen mdzod spu rin chen 'phyang// sangs rgyas
mdzod spyad bzhin gshegs// rin chen thams cad nas gna mchog/ ni chagos pakhyod phyag 'tshal// rani rman chen gzhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nason// nitshan/
pad+ma nam mkha' che// mkha' mnyam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ rgyag yanaras nags pa che// mdzes par snang zhing rab mdzes mdzad// don kun dag cing dag pa'i don// spyan mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//

@#chos rin chen rnam dag mchog/ dge 'dun rin chen dabazhin gshegs// dbang bskur chen po'ajig rten don// don sbyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin par b sbyin sbyin pa'i mchog/ gtong zhing gtong mchog sbyin
mdzad pa// sems can kun don de nyid don// don chen don ni khyod phyag 'tshalaM// bsam pa'i rgyal po gzi brjodiNo// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad che// sangs
rgyas kun takhyod phyag 'tshal/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen che// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od cheste// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po// gzhan chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dbazhin gshegs pa

tsha dbang gi mchog/ dbang chen khyab pa chen po ste// 'jig rten gtso bo 'jig mchog/ 'jig rtan nyam khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chan phul bas rab kyi mchog/ zhimanargyanata rin chen 'dzani// rin chen snang
bas snang ba che// rin chen grags pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rinamen phung po yin na don// nor bu rdo rje nor bu yi// ni 'byung ba sku rab 'bar// chen sku ste khyod phyag 'tshal// cho nyid ji lta
ca00 ran chen dbang// re ba thams cad skyong mdzad pa// bsam pa thams cad legs par mnyes// rin chen phung po khyod phyag 'tshal// srid rtsa khyab par bdag nyid kun// mchog par skrun nang
mchogachen po// phun sum thams cad 'byor pa'o// dodzesnyid po bdag phyag 'tshal// ming brgya rtsa brgyad zhu ba bad/su yang rung ba 'chad byedun// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba// skad
cag tu na sdig med 'thob// drin chen khyod la gsol pa ni/ nor 'dus pa ni bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog/ nges pa'i rogisazhaskyed par mdzod//dmas byang chub sems dpa' nam/
mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi debang ga dem tshig ces bya ba rang gsAng po 'di gsungs so// oM badzar ts+tshahU~M/ dekhan/

gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis de nga zhane gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i dran tshig ces bya ba'i rig pa dam pa'i di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta usha pa ri pU ra Nam hArad+ma hU~M/ da nas byang
chub sems dpa' n po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rogs 'apyad bab reg pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ o badza?hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpachen po dzisade pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
so/oM ma NihU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rtogs 'byung ba'i rtag pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad+ma d+hu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs
cang @#// kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM bshA ra t+ta hUM/ de nas byang chub sams dpa' chan po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs la
thams cad kyi dbang gi rin pochen sa skya pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs so// da sa snyoms par zhugs ma thag dud bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kanas rdo rje nor bu rin poche'abu
'od zer rnams byung nas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshab/sa pa thams cad kyidabang gis dbang bskur nas/ yang dag tu gyur

tabcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' chen po nam mkha' snyade po'i thugs kar zhag gas so// de nas namanakha'i snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjed nyid kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying

po rdo rje dang/ nor bu dang/ rin pochasnatshogs kyi dbang la sogs pa bkod pa dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku rdo rdzong nor bu rin po ma'aphyag rgya'i mtshan ma phyagan bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po
rnams su gyur te gyur nas// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che chen po'i char 'bab pa la sogs par bskyod pa rnams kyis sems can rnams mgu bar byas s/ ang sgyur byon nas bcom ldan 'dasaM

rnams par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo dbyangs kyi re le 'khor chen po ba tshul du sgrub rikyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du do ba dad du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ chen tsan nad cad bsdus
0 pa na rdorje ni chen rigs nyid du// 'gro ba'i don du'adi gyur to// de nas khyod nubasams dpa' na po nam mkha'i snying pos rang ga'i gas bskyod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsams nas de bzhin/
gshegs bzums cad bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di la to/ na thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad cu ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa/
dra ba la// thams cad grub pa zhes bshad pa// grub zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa ste// srud bu bzhi dang ldan pa la// dar dang 'phred po lnga ldus brgyan// dkyil 'khor

chen po'i ga rnams dang// sgo khyud kyi nand rnams su// rdo rje neman spyas par na// phyi yi dkyil 'khor srad bus dre// de yi nang du rdo rje yi// rin chen las byung gnas bya zhing// ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni// rin chen

sna tshogs bod 'bar ba'i// dkyil 'khor ltar na brgyan gyur par// der na srad bu tre bar bya// rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba yi// der ni sangs rgyas gzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snyade pon 'di rnams so// oM bud+d+ha rat+ta hU~M/

o badzug Ni hUM / o ra dzarat+ta hU~M/ oM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra rat+na pad+ma hU~M/ oM badzrarat+ta bar hU~M/ ra ba kun grub dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgyal nas kyang// rdo rje snying po rir gnas shig/ ni chen gan

par dra// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin du// yichen phyag rgyar ldan pa ya// sems dpa' chen po rnams ba 'o// de la de pang gi snying po na 'di rnams so// oM sarba arbasid+d+haM pra

da hU~M oM badzra ma Natson+naA kA sha gan+d+ha b+ha ga bAn sid d+h+ya sadats+tsha hUM/ oMr/ kusha A rA ya sarba argan sa ma ya shAg+haM sarba tarda gtasatAm nasAranAM/ oM ta rwa ga ba nyiku ru sa na//

g+hAn hUM/ o ra tut+taM hUM/ rinachen 'phyang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje lags kyise brgal nas ni// nichen 'phreng ba 'dzan pa' mchog/ nges pa'i debus su legs par bu/ dor yaphyogasa rnams thams cad du//
lta 'og go rims ja rezhin du// nor bu' mtshan rnams lagathob pa' ]/sems dpa' chen po rnams bu 'o// de dag gi snying po na 'di rnams yin no// oM rat+na taShA tA/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta sa b+hagaratamA

lihUM/ orat+nam Ni suruhUM/ oM na ma Ni d+hA dza sarba sha pa ra pU ra A kA shagaN+Na hU~M/ orat+na TA hAs hA sa hU~M/ rani na pad+mab dkyil 'khor du// rdorje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// nichen pad+ma 'dzan khyab pa/
dbus gnas par bri bar bya// de ya phyogs rnams thams cad du// lta bog go rims ji bzhin par// nor bu mtshan ma 'char ba yi// sems dpa' chen po rnams bru 'o// ra dgag snying po ni 'di rnams so//

tsha orata btahU~M// oM ha ga samA d+ha snon gamahUM/ oM rat+na ko ShaguhUM/ oM ma tsakra pra brta ya hU~M/ o rata bshAhU~M/ rin chen char 'bebs dkyil 'khor du// rdorje shug kyis brgalanas na// rin chen char na
rab 'babs pa'i// sems dpa' no po der yang dra dadi ya phyogs rnams thams cad du// mdor na lagan phyag rgya yang// rin chanamtshan mar ldan pa yi// nams dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin// de dag gi snying

po ni'ar rnams so// o racu ba'i bar ya sang parta saM b+had+hi b+ha ga bAn Na da tohU~M oMm NipU dza sa ma ya hU~M/ oM ma Ni ban d+hA ka ra tsa hU~M/ om ni daMShakarwa lam hA yaklu ra ha ra sarban+dan tisha ya hU~M/ oM ma red

bcu sam a hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas na// gru ya phyogasa rnams thams cad du/ lto 'og go rakyis rdza bzhin par/ zhichen lA su la sogs bri// de la de dag gi snying pon 'di rnams so// orawA ra ti
shu oratwAmA le hUM/ oM rat+tagati hU~M/ oM rata na tsa hU~M/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor dam pan/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ phyi ya rakyil 'khor grwa rnams su// bdug pa'i mchod pa la sogs bri// de la
do dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// o ratad+hu po rat+te/ o pum Na oM rata A leka/ om NaM ga/ sgo rnams bzhi dbus sun// sgo ba rnams na gzhag par bya// de la de dag ga snying don ra rnams

so// oM sarba rata A kacha ru Nam has tung+ga ga bAn ta A karA dza// oM sarba ra pra bangasha ya/ sa ma ya pra pan la sa mahA mnarA dzaku la rat+tarAka hUM/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha ar+ya shu paM/ oM ma NarataAle sha ya a
de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nor bu nipomaTi slob dpon 'di ji lta ba bzhin zhugs tatsho ba/rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la/ donas rin masacan gyis bar bas pa'i bum pa gang ba'i nor bu'i slob ma

dbang bkar te/ rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyogargya bcings la snying po yod de rjod do// u0f00 badzramaNas ma ma khaM/ de nas kha dog ji lta burnyed pa'i thos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ de dang 'dra bas
bya@#// mig g.yogs la snying po 'di berjod du gcug sta gzhugs par bya'o// oM ma Ni rA dza ku lAn/ de nas da ltar bcug nas 'di skad du khyed kyis 'di su la'ang ma brjod cig/
khyod tshe rabs thams cad du dbul por gyur cig/ sdug bsngal las ma thar par gyur tar/ sems can dmyal bar yun ring por gnas par gyur ta ra zhes bsgo la dam tshig gnyis su bya'o// thag

pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'i ng brjod par bya'o// donas babs pa dang gter chen po gang na yod/ ji ltar thob par 'gyur chos rdo rje'i tshig gis dri bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'/
sams dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thams cad snar stsol cig ces skyas ma thag tu gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig kyang bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor man po bstan par bya'o// de nas ci 'byor par mchod pa byas nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas yang gs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin ta/ rdordzasnying
ga ngo 'a phyag rgya che/ shin tumanyam par bzhag pas bcings// gtar brkos nas ni gang dag na// gtor yon pan de thong 'gyur// dam tshig gsana mchog bcangs la// gang nagator rnams yod 'gyur pa//
der na phyag rgya bar na// do tsho bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du// shan tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms nan// gang na gtor rnams yod pa yang// yod kyis shes pa nyid du 'gyur//

[n ]rdordza gang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas na// gdadu phyag rgya babs gyur na// da nas gtor yod shes par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni khyed rnams so// oM ma hA ma Ni ret+ta A ba/

shu/ oM ma Ni pa TaM pa ra sha ya hU~M/ oM ratas ma d+ha bru hi/ oM rat+na A ba shar sha ya hU~M/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na na// gang du lus 'khor gyur pa// den rin chen gtar yod par// dam tshig nyidakyis
shes par bya// dmatshig mchog ni bcingasanas kyang// gang du babs nas gnyase gyur pa// de nas zhe chen chen po yi// gtar yod par n shes par bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcingsanas na// gang la babs
pa bdag nyid kyis// rin chen chon pa bdag nyid kyis// gter na gang na yod par sna// las kyi phyag rgya bcas nas kyang// gang tshe lag gnyis phan tshun du// babs nas dam tshag bcings gyur pa// dan

gtaman yod par bshad// de la dadag gi snying po na 'di rnams so// oM ma ratekA ya dar sha yarany+dza/ oM A kA sha gan+d+ha ma Narit+ta/ o sbe Ta so Ta yin d+ho/ om ma Narita dzAn sA yaM khru hi/oMmun sa ma ya
ban d+hadang sha ya sAhA/ phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// de bzhin gang du dogs gyur pa// de nas ni chon 'byud ba ya// gtar yod mi shes shes par bya// gang du dogs yod ra yang ni// dam tshig ma gan
mchog bcas la// gang tshanyidan grel gyur pa// den gtor n yod par shad// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcangs nas na/gangadu nges par dogs gyur pa// den nges par gtor yod par// ye shes bskyed de shes
par bya// gang na yang dang yang dogs par// las kyi phyag rgya chog bzhan// dar bas de na gnyis gyur pa// gter yod par nangeshes par bya// de la de dag gi snying pon 'di

rnams so// oMn d+hi dzAn A ba/ orartan sa ma yumuny+tsan d+ha ban d+haM// oM d+harma rit+tabu in d+d+hanaM/ oM sarba karmaNi spyi Na ya daraM sha ya d+hi ro dAkI pa/ phugargya chen po bsgomasanas ni// gtor rnams kun tu
btsal nas kyang// gang na gnas pa der babs na// ngan yod par rnams par bshad// dmatshigamagan bcings nas kyang// gtar rnams kun tu btsal nas ni// gang na gnas pa brtagagyur pa// don
gtar na yod par bshad// tang 'dzan phugargya bcings nas ni// gtar rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang// gang na yod par rtag tu shes// dan gtor na yod par bshad// las kyi phyagargya bcings nas
ni/ gtor rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang// gang na yod par las phyag rgya// bskor ba dan yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'ad rnams so// oM ma hAr pA rIkA a bsha/ o rat+tas ma ya nyid
dar sha ya/ oM rat+na par kA dzAn A ba risha/ oM ma Nakarma bram/ de nas gsang pa'i phyagargya' ya shas bslab par bya'o// dbang po gnyis n mnyam sbyar la// gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing//
phyag rgya chen po bsgomanan// babs par gyur/gtararAd do// dam tshig mchogan bcas nas kyang// bud med dang na rtsa byed cing// gang du phyag rgya dam gyur tam// den gtor n yod par bshad//
dbang po gnyis na mnyamasbyar na// gtar rnams kun tu tshol byed sud// ya shas phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni// gtaragyi yo shes 'jug par 'gyur// dbang po gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi
phyag rgyu bcings nas nii/ gang du phyag rgya gnyis gyur pa// dan gtar na yod par bshad// de la de dag gisAng pon 'di rnams so// oM ma hAm Ni saM yo ga ba sha/ oM sa ma ya saM yo ga rdzu ma bya ba/

o don don A ba ngeshas yo ga/ oM sarba karmasaM spyi Ta saM yo ga/ de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po 'a reg rgyab yo shes thams cad bslab bo// de nas phyag rgya chen po bad yon ta// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
gnas pa'o// ji lta ba yarim bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nan// don gyi mchogakun 'grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las na 'di rnams yin no// sangs rgyas phyag rgyas sangs
rgyas nyid// rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab 'grub// rin chen lcag kyus kun spyan 'dren// nor bu dga' bar rjes dgar byed// nor bu mgu bas dgyes par byed// nor du lta bas nor thob bo// nor du
'phrang bas dbang bskur bzhin// nor bu nyi mas gzi brjidi mchog/ yid bzhin nor bus ci dgar sbyin/rin chen bzhad pas nor thob 'gyur// rin chen chos kyis chos kyang 'thob// gtong ba'i
dpal gyis dam pa rAd// rin chanarol grwas mtshon chen po// rin chen 'khor lasadabad por 'gyur// skyabs btsal ba'i dngos grub 'thob// rane chen char gyase nor chen po// nor bu'i mchodapas
[5 ]@#// rab mchod nyidi// rin chen chos kyis brtan par byed// ban chen mche bas nor thob bo// khu tshur nor bu'adi ngos grub thob// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i dam tshig gi

phyagargyab yi shes na 'di yin no// rdo rje ran chan phyag rgyas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'thob// rdo rjenor bu cha bcings nas// rdo rje rin chon grub par 'gyur// rdo rdzoganyis las nor bur byas// rdoN
'dzin las nor 'thob bo// de nyidamatha bod rdo rje yis// nor bu sbyar te snyangekhar gzhag mdzub gnyis pad+mo'i nor bur bcings// 'jig rten dbang gsanor byin 'gyur// rdorjes lasanor sna tshogs kyi//

nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sprin// rdo rje dbyings mdzub nor bu yis// sangs rgyas rin chen nyid 'thob bo// mdzub mo mnyam ta phyir bkug la// mthe bong rdo rjer ngatsangs pa yis// rdordzastang po'i phyag las

khyud 'angan rdo rje'i nor bur gsungs// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang// rdo rje nor bu chen po 'thob// mdzub gnyis rin chen 'phrar datsanges la// gung mo myu gur bsgrung ba ste// 'di ni dengam thag tu yang// rang

gidabang bskur 'thob par 'gyur// de nas gung mo srin lag dang// mthebu chung rnams na pad+mod bya// 'di ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs/ mtshan 'dzin pas naAr sbyin 'gyur// mdzubasomathe bong mthe'u chung rnams// rdo rje

[” ]rin chen tshulaMdapya/ dgung mo gnyis kyi sen mo sbyar// srin lag smyu gu 'dra bar bsgreng// rdo rje bsdams padam byos la// mdzung gnyis nor bur byas nas kyang// mthobaganyis brkyang ba'i ngos snyang kha// don kun

[5 ]grub pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas kyang/ dgung mo gnyis n nor bur bya// nor bu mtshan gyi phyag rgya 'ad// nor bu chen po rab sbyin no// danyid las ni mdzub mo gnyis// lcags kyu tshul du byas/
pan don kun 'gugs pa'i phyogargyalta// nor bu ranechen lcag gyurab shad// de nyid lasan bsgyur nas kyang// mdzub mosamadzub mo bzung nas ni// mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul byas la// drangs nas 'gong
dga' bar byed// de nyid las ni mdzub mtheb gnyis// sbyar ba legs so zhes bya'o// de nas tshethib gnyis sbyar ba yis// mdzub gat+tisartsamo sbyar ba dang// mtha bong gsan dadus sbyar la/ mdzu gnyis

ngos dad sbyar ba na// nor bu lta bas bshad pa ste// lta ba'i don rnams 'phrog byed pa'o// don kun grub pa'i 'phrang ba na// rang ga dbang naripa sbyin 'gyur/ da nyid snying khar mtha dengaganyiso// bsgrang stangos kyis

sngar bani// nor bunyim snying khar gzhag/ gzi brjid chen por rab spyan 'gyur// srin lag mnyam ta bslangs nas ni/phya ste spyi bor gzhag par bya// rdo rje nor bu chen po gtso// ra ba thams cad rdo gas pa'o//
danyidi las ni 'gyed byed bcing// kha 'gram dgod par bskor bsta// ne chen char dgod ces bya ba// band pas don rnams thams cad 'grub// tader dzin du sor mo sgom// nor bu pad+ma nor 'chung pa'i//
de nas matha'anas grol ba na// sbyin pa chen po rab spyanabyed// mthe bong gnyis nanang du dgug/ mdzub gnyis nor bur byas pan// nor bur ral gra yon tamathus// 'gro rnams kyi nor 'phrog pa'o// ro
bsdoms las 'khor lor bya// mthab gnyis nang du btsug nas kyang// mdzung gnyis nor bur 'drar byas pa// 'kher ler sgyur pa 'thob par byed// de nyid thalamol^atshul du byas//

kha nas 'dren par byas pan// da bcings nas ni ngag gis kyang// rang gi bkas ni nor 'phrog 'gyur// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// rin chen char na rab 'babs te// sor mo thams cad ngasgong pa ni// phyogs
bzhinas ni ner char 'babs// rdo rje nor bu chen bcings la// gar byas gtsug phud dbus pa gnas// kun la cho ga bzhin mdan// nan kun gyi dmachod 'gyur// don kun grub pa'i phyag rgyas ni//

mgrin pa'i phyogs su 'khyar par bya da danor du bcings pa zhes bya sta// srung ba yin tsho gar grugs// don kun grub pa de nyid las// gnod sbyin tshul du khar bzhag pa// nor bu mchad las bya sta// 'jigs
byed don kun 'jug pa yi// rdorje bsdams pa dam byas la// mdzub bkul mtha bed gnyis kyis ni// legs par mnan ta pir nga na// nor bu'i khu tshur dngos grub thob// dam tshig rnams kyi mchod
mchog rnams// rdo rje dbus kyi tshul dun// ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa la// 'dren dam tshig mchog tu btags// gung mo nor bu'i tshul du khya da/ de dag nyid la rnams par btags// lcags kyugartag sogs

tshul gyisan ]dalas rnams thams cad rab grub byed// de nas nor bu chen po ba rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgyab yi shes na 'di yin no// tra gra ti hi/ shwa sa ri rgyud grwa ba ra Na ya sa/ nan phugargya gnyis byas
[la las kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya// de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya pa'i dkyil bakhor chen po'acho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so////
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po che'i byan gyi sa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs nas/ rad gyi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badzra rat+na d+hu pe hU~M/ de nas byang nub som dang 'chan po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'khyud ba'aphyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badzra a h+phaTekamA le a h+phany+tsa

sa ma ya hU~M/ donas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM rat+na a h+phi Ti kAhUM/ de nas byang chung sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang

ga phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM d+hamaa b+hungeg [”']hU~M/ da nas byang chub sams dar 'a sems dpa' chen po rdordzasnatshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga taab+haTaM ka pU dza sa ma ya// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa mamakha'i sAng pos rang rogs kyi dam tshag ga phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu shad bya ba// dugargya'adakyil 'khor dam pa ste//

rdo ts+tshadabyangs dang 'dra ba la// nachen gsang ba zhaa bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul dun// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus khwa// ra yi dbusas tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas phyag rgya ba ba sa// khri la
klubya/ gnas pa'i nor bu'i rtsod/ rdorje dbyangs kyi mdun du ni// nor bu 'phreng ba ra smo'i nor// nor bus bskor ba'i nor bu'i rnams// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM tra

A oM ma Na sa ma ye hU~M// oM ma Na rata a b+ha te ka mA li hU~M/ oM ma Na rit+na pad+mahUM/ oMm Ni ran+ta pra tA sa ma ye hU~M/ thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// rdorje rin chen/

dbus su na// rdo rjenor bu chen po bris// de yi phyogasani thams cad du// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin par// rang gi phyag rgya nor bu ldan// rin chen slob dpon nyid kyis bri// de la da dgag phyag rgya ni 'di nas

so DaoM sarba Acha sats+tshapra ba ma hA badzra rat+ta sa ma ya ma Ni sarba arnyan mosAts+tsha ya d+har Na hU~M/ oM ma Nirat+ta a karA ya swA hA// oM ma Ni ran+tas ma ya aM ku sha ma NaM ku la rjaoM ma Ni rA gas ma ya hU~M/ oM ma Ni/
d+hu t+taM de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang// rdo rje shugs kyis brgalanas ni// spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yi// nor bu da ya dbus su bris// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lta 'og goramis ji

bzhin par// nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// rang gi phyag rgya rnams bri 'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgyan 'di dag go/ oM ma Nirat+tane tra A na la kha shaM ku rus arba saM b+harnyanA sha g+ho tia kusha/ oMmaNir/

ran+tanA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hU~M/ oM ma Na ra NA sAr+ya dzA la ya sarba ma hArA dzani hUM/ oM ma Natsin+d+ra d+hAdza grihUM/ oM ma Na sa ha hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// nor bu pad+ma bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams mA

cad du[：]lta 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de la de dag ga sAng po 'ad rnams so// oM ma Na sa mAts+tsha pardzun hUM / oM ma Nirata bya rgyu sa ma ya hU~M/ oM ma Nas ma ya ko ka hU~M/ a ma Ni sa ma ya tsakra hU~M/ oM ma Ni

pAr grwahU~M dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par na// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang/ rdo rje rin chen ldan pa yi// rin chen char 'babs der gnas shing// las kyi phyag rgya ji bzhin pas// yongs su du ra skor bar daM/

bar bya'o// nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa rnams// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de nas de dag gi phyag rgyan 'di rnams so// oM rat+na bris d+ha ya ma hA maNihU~M/ oM ma hA pU dzA sa ma yin ta kA/ oM ma hA pU dza sa man

sa ma ya rakA/ oM badzra ma Ni ran+tadaMt+taka rA la ha ra ha ra hU~M/ oM ma Na sa ma ya mum+bihU~M/ de nas nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas rang gi slob ma rnams btsud de 'di skad du bsko bar

bya'o// khyod kyis tshul 'dra su la'ang ma smra zhig/ khyod rab tu dbul ba dang dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung dar zhes bsgo la/ rang gnor bu'i dam tshig g.yo shes bskyed par bya'o// rdojarin chen tang 'dzin gyis//

mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri// bdag nyid kyini dpral bar yang// bzhaganargyal por nges par 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje bdes nas ni// rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri// rang gi gnas su bzhag na ni// nges par rgyal po

nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzan gyis// rdo rje rin chen mkha'al bre// ye shes rdo rje de bzhag na// nyid kyis grub pa brgyal por 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya bcas nas ni// mkha' la rdo rjerin chen pa/rang gi

dang kharanaM/gnas su de bzhag na// nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por gyur// de la de dag gi snying po na'adanems so// ma hA badzrarataa b+ha riny+tsa maM/ sa ma ya rata a b+hi Shiny+tsamaM/ d+harma rAta a b+hi Shiny+tsan+taM/

ga karma rata a b+hi Tiny+tsamaM/ phyag rgya chen po'i snying kharani// rdo rje ni chen bsgom par bya// bsgom nas mngon par dbang du bskur// mchog tu rmad du byung ba 'thob// mnyam par bzhag pas rdo rje yi// ne chen dapral bar/

'tsha bsgoms nas ni// nichen dordzabacings gyuran// thams cad kyini rgyal bor 'gyur// don+darane chen tang 'dzan gyis// rtsi la rdo rje rin chen bsgoms// chos kyi rgyal po nyid du ni// dbang bskur ba 'thob par 'gyur//

rab mnyam bzhag pas rdo rje yi// ran chen gtsur tor bsgomasanas kyang// las kyi phyag rgyu datsanges nas na// las leg byed pa'i rgyal bor 'gyur// de la de dag gi snyid po ni 'di rnams so// oM badzrarad+ma tshad ma

u0fc4 a b+hi Shany+tsa ho/ oM badzrarataa b+hU Di ka dra/ orat+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsi paM/ oM badzrarat+na u a d+hiShanas na/ phyagargya chen po bdag nyid kyis// dasoms na rdo rje chen yang// ras la sogs par bris nas ni// rgyal po/
chu chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rjerin chen named// ras la sogs par bris nas kyang// sems dpa' rdor bsgoms nan// dam tshig rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// chadordzobadag nyid kyis// ras la sogs
! la bris nas kyang/ bsam gtan phyag rgya bsgoms na ni// nges par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur// las la sogs la rdo rje// ni chen dras nas las rnams kyi// phyag rgya bsgoms par gyur na ni// bdag nyidi las
kyis bdag por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying bon 'di rnams so// badzrarata ba d+ha a d+ha tiSh+Tha/ oM badzraratu ba ma ba a ba/ brjorata ba la ba kuru/ gser ram yang na dngul yang rung//

rdorje rin chen pa des gyur tam// yang na rinichen po zhig kyang rung// snying par bsgoms nas dbang bskur 'gyur// rdorje ni chen bla na med// gsor ram rin chen gzhan las byas// rtag tu dpral bar gzhag
nani nor cha da yi rgyal por 'gyur/ gsar ram rin chen gzhan dag go/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms nas kyang// rang gi khar yang bcug nan/tshig la dbang bar de 'gyur ro// gsar ram rin chen gzhan dag

gi rdo rje rin chen bsgoms na ni// gtsug tor du na yang bsoms na// las rnams kun gyis bdag por 'gyur// ra la ra dag ga snyad po ni 'di rnams so// oM badzaya n+tahrid ya A ba ra Na hU~M/ oMbadzra cu a blo

bkatshahA arma pA da/ oM badzra ra pa tsapA da/ o bar t+na mahA karma pa ra/ de nas nor bub rigs kyi dam tshig rgya phyag rgya gsanga' yashas bslab khro// phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje nor bu cha ba/
la nor bu bud med bu gar du sdug/ de ltar dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// dam tshig mchog gi nor bu ni// bud med bu gar bcug nas kyang// dmatshaga mchog bcings thams cad kyi// dbang bskur ba mi dngos

grub 'gyur// jodzinor bu cha dgis la// chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nor bu// de ni bud med bu gar bcug/ khan chad pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya nor bu bcas// bud med bu gar las phyag rgya//
btsas bar gyur na las kun// dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur// del de dag gsung po nab rnams so// oM ma hAsid d+hi/ oM sa ma ya a b+hu Tika sad rgyu/ o d+hamasad d+hi/ oM
karma sid[$]/ danas dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyag rgya chen po bcangs pa bshad de/ rin chen rojomya gar bcings/gung mo srin lag mthe'u chung rnams/sor mo bskyang ba byas nas// spyi bor bzhag pa grung

'tsho mchog 'thob// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang// mdzub mo gnyae mdud mthob gnyis dang// srin lag rdo rje bsgyuranas ni// mdzod sngar bzhagab dbang 'thob bo// rdo rje'i chen tshul khyas 5// mdzung

sgraganyis dngos dang mthob ngos spud// de nyid bsgyur nas do dbang 'thob// de nyid mthob gnyis mdzub gnyis n// chos kyi rdoji tshul du na// khacings nas dpral bar bzhag pa na// chos chen gyi na dbang bskur

'gyur las kyi rdo rje bacangasanas kyang// dbying rnams kun gyi 'phrang ba ste// 'gyur nas dpral ba nyid du yang/ bzhag na da bang ni bskur bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgyan// rdo rje dbyangs skyes
dam tshig kyang// btsaji nas rin chen dpral bar ni// bzhagan dbang na bskur bar 'gyur// mtheb gnyis yan tshun bsnol nas na/ mdzub gsakyan rtse mo yang// nor bu 'dra bar bkug pa ni// rje

nod bu chen po 'thong// rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang// dordza khur tshur gung mtsho gnyis// nor bu 'dra bar byas nas ni/ nor bu 'phrad pa'i dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// gungamo nor
bu 'drar byas la// mdzub mo sun lag gnyis pad+mo// kha bya 'dra bar byas pas 'grub// gung mo gnyis na nor bur btsangs// sor mo thams cad bsgreng b rnams// nor du nyid du bsgoms nan// 'khor

rnams mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ gung momathe bong rdo rje// rinachen tshul du byas nas kyang// srin lag mthe'u chung mnyam pa yi// khar bzhag rtsa stanor bu sbyin// de la mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bya// de ltar da gti

lcags kyur bya// mdzub mosamadzub mo dra ba dang// de nyid dga' khar rab spyan pa 'o// gung mo gnyis nanor bu bcing// mdzub gnyis ngos la dgag pa ste// srin lag nges gnyis 'dud pa la// mthe bong gnyis kyis

bkab pa ste// de nyid rdo rje nyimar bskor// dpung pa'i spyi bor brkyang bar bya// nor bu'argyalatshan spyi bo'i rgyan// bzhad pa'i tshul du byas pa 'o// rdo rje bsdams pa byas na ni// mdzub mo srin lag gyen du bsgreng/ de

bdag pad+mo 'dra bar bya// gung mogasen nor bur bya// da lasamathab mar rab sbyin bya// jorje ral gri sbyar ba dang/ rdo rje 'khor la'atshel du bya// de nyidi kha nas dbyung bar bya// mdzug gnyis rin chen magur bya//

sor mo thams cad brkyang ba dang// de dag spyi bor bzhag pa na// rin chen char gyis char 'bebs so// de nyidi go ma'i tshul dun// snying khar ran chen gnyis byas pa// mdzub gnyis nor bu 'dzan che ba// dbus

su bstams pa khu tshur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya' ye shes bslab bo// phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid// snyim pa spar ba bcangs na ni// mdor na gsang ba gsang ba yi// dngos grub ban 'gyur sbyin par byed/
ji ltar rdordab gsang ba'i sbyin// dus rnams kun tu btsanges ma bya// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'amedon bshad pa bya'o// tra/ gu/ tra/ sa gra kha/ hU~M// bdadi dkra dbad kra/ra/

ma/gsang ba bsad pa'i khu tshur mchog/ gnyis su byas na las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dmatshag brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rin chen drugargyab gsang pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
chog rgyas pa rdzogs so///de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba mkhyen pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nga

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gi rog pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ oM sarba ta phru ga ta a sgyu ka dzAnota tam hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dang 'asams dang 'a na po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rogs pa ngam

ba 'di gsungs so// oM badzra dzAn a b+hi Sheka sam ya hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rogs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ oM ma Ni rat+na a g+ha Ti ka dzAn hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje phyin gyis rang gi rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// o d+harma a b+hu Tika dzA nahUM/ de nas byang chub sams dang ba sams dpa' chen po rdodzra sna tshogs kyis rang gi rigs pa dam pa 'di
gsungs so// oM sarba a b+hi Tikadz+hAn hU~M/ donas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi yongashas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu shad bya ba//
ba ya shas dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyangs dang 'dra ba la// rin chen ye shes zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor rnams cad srad bus bre// chos kyi dkyil 'khor

tshul du na// snying kha'i mtshan ma bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'di yi shos kyi snying po 'di rnams gsungs so// oM dzAn sarbasid d+ha dzAnahU~M/ om Ni dz+hAn hU~M/ oM ma Ni dzA na aM ku sha dza/ oM ma Ni dzAn

dwag/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na dut+taM/ oM ma NadzIn du[R]ma NihU~M/ o dzAn a h+phu Tika/ om NidzAn sUr/ oM ma Ni dzIn d+hAdza/ a/ / hA sa ma Ni dzI nor rma hU~M/ oM mtsho ga/ om NidzaM kaM/ o dzA na ma Na tsakra/

oM dz+nyA na ma Ni b+ha naM/ o dzA na ma Ni ri rit+tab+b+har hU~M/ oM ma Ni dzI na Na ni tsapu dza sa ma ye hU~M oM ma Ni dzAn rakA/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na ut+taM/ de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas

slob na la 'di skad bsgo bor bya 'o// khyod kyis chos ma mthong ba su la'ang ma rjod cig/ khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur bar shi bar gyur ta ra zhes bsgo la/ nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi da shes bskyed par

bya'o// ting nga 'dzin gyis ras sogs la// rdordza snying po bris nas ni// bsgoms nas rin chen don 'byin ces// skya zhing gsol ja gdab par ng// ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la// rdo rje snyid po bris nas
ni bsgoms nas rin chen byin cig ces// tshig tu smra zhing gsol ba gdab// rdo rje snying po ras sogs la// bris te mnyam par nga zhag nas kyang// rnams par bsgoms te ye shes la// dam chos spen/
zhes gsol ba gdab// rdo rje snying poras sogs la mnyam par bzhag pas bris nas kyang// bsgoms nas dam pa'i las bya zhes// las la gsol ba gdab par bya// da dgo/

nas da dag gi sgyur pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM dA sarba arma b+ha ga bI badzragan+d+ho/ oM da hisarbarat+na b+hu ga hU~M badzra ga/ oM de hi sa d+ha d+harman b+ha ga hUM badzra gan+d+ha satwA/ o ra gis rnyakarmab+ha ga daM badzra gan+d+hA
ma mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// namamakhabasnyad po lags sams pa// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas su// phun sum tshogs don gsol bar bya//nam mkha'i
sAng po lags sams pa// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang// nor bsags pan gsol par bya// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po lags sanas pa'i// mnyam
par bzhag pas sgoms nas kyang// phun sum tshogs na gsol ba gdal// nam na ba'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying polags sems pa// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang

las sogs pa na gsol ba gdab// ra la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM dzAn garlu de hi sadzaarnyan/ o dz+han gcud hi sarbaran+ta/ o dz+han gcud hi sa chad+harma/ o dzAn gang+gA da hi sarbakarma mI/ rdo rje snying

po bris nas kyang// snying khar yongs su bsgoms byas la// gang gi tshon snying 'phar ba// de tshe grub pas nor ster ro// rdo rje snying po dpral bar ni// khris ta rnams par sgoms nas kyang// gang tshamago bo 'dar

mtshan gyur pa// des na mngon par dbang thob po// derdzasnying ngo khar bcug la// de nyid du ni bsgoms nas kyang// gang tshe don byed gyur pa// de tshe ngas ni nges 'grub bo// rdo rje snying po bar g spyi bor// rab tu

ba zhapa sta bsgoms nas kyang// gang tsha de ni bdar gyur pa// de tsho 'phang du lding par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'od rnams so// oM hri da ya gargyud sid+ha nas/ oM rat+ta a b+hi Ti ka gasgyu a lha liny+tsam/o lha ga ga

sang+g+ha/ oM rat+na gan+to Sha A kA shA gats+tsha/ rdordza snying po phyag rgya che// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// bdag la grub stsol zhes gsol la// i larat+tazhes brjod 'phung/ nam mkha' snying po'i
dam tshag na// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang// dbang bskur ba ni gsol btang la// ma larat+na zhes brjod thob// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas/
chos bdag stsol zhes gsol btab la// rtsilar rta zhes brjod thob// nam mkha' snang de las kyi mchog/ rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas ni// rin chen thams cad gsol btab la/ dkyi la rat+tazhes
brjod thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'od rnams so// oM a la o ma la/ oM 6lo/ oM ka la/ de nas nor bu ye shes gsang ba'i phugargya'i ye shes bslab po// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhin du//

rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dpang po gnyis na mnyam sdud la// dngos grub mchog na thob par 'gyur// gzhi la ri mo bris pa bzhin// dorje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la//
de bang bskur pa yang thob par 'gyur// rdordza snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// sdug pa de dag gar rtsis pa// 'jig rten kun gyis da dag byed// nam
mkha' kun gyi rdul dbyibs kyis// rdorje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor la// thams cad 'grub par ngas par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snyade ponA bedi rnams so// A kA sha gu

dzAnas ma ya hU~M/ tsAt+tagu dzAn a b+hu TAny+tsahU~M/ pra yA nu smitaM dzAn gsarba le ko rA ga yahU~M/ saju gu rgya dzAnasarbasad+d+him+ma pra yatsAhU~M// da nas phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin bcings bar bya'o// dngos grub

kyang de dang 'dra'o// de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// derda nor bu ni de rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du gzhag par bya'o// de nas chos kyi phyagargya na 'di yin no// sA bAr sa ra taka

ha dom ta hi ba ka na ya sa/ da nas 'doran las kyi phyag rgyan gan jabazhin par gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmatshig gi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ gshes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tsho
ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// spyad nas rtsaka a t+tamAdas kyis dpar bkalas[“]thams cad kyidabang bskur pa'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba 'a tade nga 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs so// sarba ta thA ga ta karma a b+hi She ka hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phugan rdo rjes rang gi las 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs

sa/ oM badzra hU~MkAr a b+ha bu ka/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pordo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta a kaM hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems

dang 'a sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rogo pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba d+harma a b+ha te ka rat+taM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rjesna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
gsungs so// oM bdeshwa a b+hi Ti ka/ de nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phab nas panamamapa'i snyad pos dad ga rag kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad pa pa// las kyi dkyir
'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyas dang 'drab la// rin chen dgos pa zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po tshul du na// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad pus bri// de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas sku

gzugs gzhag par bya// sams dpa' chen po tshul gyis nu// rin chen mchod pa rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya na 'di rnams so// oM ma Nirat+ta rU dza gra/ oM sarba arba sad+d+ha badzra rat+na a h+phu ka hU~M/ oM ma
