Na ratAhU~M/ oM ma Niratu A a kar karmas ma ye hU~M/ oMm Na ret+ta rA ga ra ti ka ma pu dzi bra bar+Na/ oMm Na rat+tas d+ha ka ra pu dza sa ma ya hU~M/ oM ma hAm Ni rat+na teSh+Tha ka ra Sha/ oM ma Ni rit+tamar pa dza// so ma cher/

sAr+ya lokaM pU dza/ om charat+na d+hAdza kang+ka pA dza/ oMm Na retaaT+ThAtsA has pU dze/ oM bid+mam Ni samA d+hu sa ma ya hU~M/ oM sarba tu gAn sgra tisaM ma d+hakarma kar hU~M/ oMm NaretA ti sa ma ya ts+tsha na hU~M/ oM ma NaM ran+natsakra

sa ma ya hU~M/ oM ma Narit+tarma pA da b+ha da hU~M/ oM ma charat+nakarmiNi hU~M/ oMm Nirat+ta ka ba tserakA nAM/ o ma cha ret+tadaM khA da khA da hU~M o ma khakarma muk+tahU~M/ oMm Ni pAlA su pU dz+waya
ho oM ma Ni mA la a b+hi Tika pU dzA ya/ oM ma NaregAtapu dzA ya/ oMm Nirat+ta Nan kyi pU dzAya/ oM maNi ra d+hu pa pu dzA ya/ oM ma Ni ratapaN+DirU dzA ya/ oM ma Nir tu A lo ka pAdzAya/ oM ma Nir

gan+d+he pU dzAya/ oMmaNir saM kun a kar ya dza// oMmaNar [']shegaM / o tsa'i lcaspo Ta po/ o paN ret+ta A bi sha a// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir chog pa lta ba bzhin du ba rgyas par byas bcug ste

smra'adi skad du bsgo bar bya'o// 'di khyed kyis su yang ma smra zhig khyed las sgrib san nas da bar gyur ta ra zhes sgo la// las kyi rigs bslab par bya'o// rdo rje snying po phyag rgya cha// rab mnyam bzhag pa

bsgoms nas kyang/ mchod pa kun gyis mchod na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgyagang yang rung bangs la// sangs rgyas thams cad machodAnan// dbang
bskur ba ni des thob bo// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgomasanas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchodan// 'gro ba'i dam pa 'dul bar 'gyur/ rdordzosnyade bting 'dzan gyis//

las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas nii// sangs rgyas thams cad mchodagyuran// skad cig tu na don kun mthob// del de dag la snying po ni 'dims so// oMrat+ta pu dzab kyi ru/ oratapudzas ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oMr/

pAdzA ya d+hamanAshA da/ oM rat+na pU dza karma sarba arba me sA da/ de nas ba/sang ba'i phyogaspyab yi shes ni'i da yon ta/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzan gyis/// nga bang po gnyis n mnyam sbyar nas// sangs rgyas thams cad

mchod na na// 'jagaten thams cad dus mgur 'gyur// danas phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub dam pa grub par 'gyur ro// danas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje rin chen banges

nas nii gnas rnams kun tu gzhag par bya// rdordza dgos pa'i tshul dun// lta 'og go rams ji bzhan bya// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ tu rdzug duN dza sarba rakA arma kU kri te/ rdo rjeranin/
gnyis pas la// las kyi ru ga rgya ri sgrub po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pardzogs so//

ri nas yang bcom ldan 'das de pazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyom par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badzra rat+titaM/ de nas byang chub

sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdordzas rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badzramAle/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po derdzasnying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM ma rat+taM/ de nas

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nyen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badzrad+harmarat+taM/ danas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snyatshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM ba
[】 ]@# dra/denas byang nub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i sAde pos rang gi nor bu'i rig kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag

rgyab dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// phyag rgya bzhi pa 'tshul na/ dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag par bya/ des ji lta ba bzhin du b gnas bslab par bya ste// khyod kyis tshul 'ang ma bskya zhig cas bsgo bar bya'o/ den

ye sa bskyed par bya ste// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje riningan bcangs nas ni// dpral bar rab tu bzhag nan// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/de nas de dag gi snying po na'i da yin no// oM badzrarati

bsho ka/ sarba side pra yatsahUM tra/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab par bya ste/ khyo'am yang na sdug pa 'am// bud med dang na skyes pa 'ang rung// dpral ba gnyis n sbyadanas kyang// gdugs na dngos grub thob

par 'gyur// de la de sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di yin ta/ oM badzraras bab bdu d+hu ra ba'apra yats+tshanI g+haM b+haShiny+tsaya ha ha ha tu/ donas phyag rgya bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bangs pa dang rnam pa bzhi bzhin du bslab po//

zla ngos grub thams cad kyang da bzhinano// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chan po nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i snying bo 'di gsungs so// oM badzram Nid+har sarba arba sid+d+him+mepra yats+tshaho//

b+ha ga bAn badzra ratAhU~M/ da nas dkyil 'khor bad yine to/ danasar ba cu pa shad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// dngos grub kyi ni dkyil 'khor ni// ji bzhin pa ran dri bar bya// de nas 'dang yo shes
[z]/gsang ba phyag rgyab yongashas bslab par bya'o// gzugs la sogs pa'idod pa rnams// chags par gyur pa'i bde ba na// sangs rgyas la yang phul gyur na// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas

phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// ras la sogs pa la'ang sems dang 'a 'am phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris ta bsgrub par bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas// byang

rlub sems dang ba nam mkha'i snying po la legs su so zhes bya kun pa 'angs bstod do// legs so rdo rjesamasadapa'i khyod// dzarane ngan khyod lags so// rjechos khyod legs bsto// jo rdza lasanakhyod legs
so Da rdo rjetheg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyigasang// theg pachen po mngon 'dus pa// mdo snga'adi ni legs par bshadu// de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyade khon nyid bsdus pa las/
de bzhin gshab sa pa thams cad kyi las kyis dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog dra ba rgyal bo chen po rdo bas so// nya kham po brgyadapa////de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyar len nyid kyi tshog rgyas pa brgyud 'dagasungs so// del re zhig dngapon phyag rgyaman po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// de bzhin
gshegs pa phyag rgyam// bangs sam khab das masacad du// sangs rgyas sku gzugasanobarlabs la/ rang gi snyingadu bculo nas ni// ci sto'adod tsho' dal// zhi ba dam ba mchog gyur pa sangs rgyas
nyid thob pas 'di sgrub// castami 'dod dngos grub bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang// da nyid chen po tshig re rer// brjod nas kun dang ldan par yang// thams cad bganayanaso/

@# ci ste 'dod na bdag nyid des// da bya khog can bag la yi// go 'phang tshe'ang nyid la thob/ mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas dam tshig phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// ji ltar dzo rje

'dzan 'grub pa// de ltar bdag ces bsgomasan ni// sangs rgyas dang na gabratshan thob// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di ngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// chos rnams thams cad

rang bzhin gyis// ngag dus brjod na des par yang// sangs rgyus dang ni gzican 'gyur// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// n gnas las kyi phyagargya dam pa'i dengos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// thams cad kyin
kun dag par// las rnams thams cad sbyang sanani// sangs rgyas gzi can thob bya ste// ma 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// da pa zhin gshags pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnams so// nga nas rag rdo rjes

rig ngos grub kun gyi rgyad 'a dag sungs so// dngos grub kun sler sangs rgyas kyi/ bkas na sems can kun don du// tshu rgya chen por bslab nan// tshe 'da'ade la sangs rgyas bgrub// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam

ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad ro// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du na// dzaltar rdo rje 'dzin phru ba pa// de bzhin bdang ga ces bsgoms nan// skad cig gisan gzachon thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub

rtsa kyirgyud bshad do// yi ge med pa'i chos rnams la// rab tu spros pa yong man te// chos mchog 'di ni rjod byed cing// bsomasan gzan nyid du 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud

bshod do// dge ba'am yang na ma dag kha'i// gang gis las rnams byas pan// rgyal ba rnams la phul byas na// skad cig gsanagazican 'gyur// de nas byung chub sems dpa' chen po phyag nardo rjes raro'i rige

dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la dang por na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// 'dod chags ngo bo nyid kyid dang// mu stags can gyis smad gyur la// da la chags pa'i chos 'di ni//

theg pa che la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub na 'od yin/ ting 'dzin brtan pa'i tshul gyasen// byas pachen po bsgoms nas kyang// chog bzhinaldan khyab byas nas// nad/
cig gcig bas gcan thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dngos grub rgyud bshad do// 'dod chags ngo bo nyid dag ces// smra bar gyur patshula'adin// bdod chags la rol phyin rUd de// skad ga gis/

nagazican thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// bdag bsaltadang reg pa dang/ mnyanar dadrin rebang dang// sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal kun gyi mkhar

na 'gyur// danas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chan po phyag na rdordzasanor bub rogs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dengos grub kyirgyudan 'ad yon te//
jo ji snyid po ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas ram dang bdag spyang cas// bsgom par bya ba rnams wasgoms nas// skad cig gsan gcan thob// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i
dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// nam mkha'i snying po 'dra bar na// sems na kun gyi re ba kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed gyuracig/ skud cig gsanag can thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i

das grub kyisargyud bshad do// bdag nyid lasan phyung nas kyang/ nor dun rab tu dga' byed rung/ dngos byung phyag rgya smanani// gab+baM can tshibanganyidi la go/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'idangos grub/
kyirgyud bshad do// dbul po rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ nor sgrub pa la partsonaldan// gzi chun 'gyur ro ca so yang// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs

rgyusaM dang// byang chub sems dad la dam pa rnams kladangos grub thob pa'i chog rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po phugan rdo rje s de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam
tshig gi da ngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de pani[“-]gas pa thums cad kyi dam tshig ga dngos grub kyi rgyudan 'ad pan// ngagis 'dod la snyomasazhugs pa// dal 'dod pas sbyong bar byed//
mangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po ya/ yang shes dam tshig yin par bshad// de nas de bzhi gshegs pa rnams kyisaMm tshig ga dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// 'dod pa rnams 'chags bral min// dam
rtsa/ tshig mdzes pa chen po 'di// de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs dag pa// rgyal bas kyang n 'dab ma mdzad// de nas rdo rje rags kyi dmagag dengos grub kyi byed na du yin te/ sems can don du khro/
min yang// khro bo chen po rab tu ston// jordza'aragisan chen po yis// dmatshig 'di na 'da' dka' 'o// de la pad+mo'i rigs kyi dmagi gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'ad yin te// rang bzhin dag par shes

nas kyang// nga ya gos pa de byadad// pad+mo'i gsan tshanabo yi// dram tshag 'da' bar dka' ba 'o// da nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dmatshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyudon 'di yin no// nyung ngam yang nanang yang rung/

tsatsamanus pa nyid du ni// sbyin pas nyi ma stos par na// bya min dam tshig 'di yin no// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi tshig rgyas pa'irgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdordzas dbazhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyirags kyis kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'a digasungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud na 'dra yin no// sangs rgyas chos zhes grags/

so zhes// brjod na chos nyid yagan// sangs rgyas chos kyi phyag rgya che// yongashas mchog ga tshul yin no// de la de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudani bad yin no// 'dod chags lasan dag pa'i
chos bde bzams cad rab sbyin byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi// dngos grub khyad pa'i mchog 'di 'o// de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas bka'an slong ba
[rr} ]@#// dang/sems can drang bar bya ba'i phyir// de lakhro bar ma gyur kyang// mdungs bdud bus dngos grub thob// de la pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyadengos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//
pad+mo chu yisamachags pa// dbazhin 'dod pasam chagasazhes// sa zhing dgos min byed kyang na// sdig pas gos par ming gyur ro// de lar bu'i rigs chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyan 'ad yin no/

sbyin dang mnyam pa'i tshes med do// sgrub par byed cade skya ba nadi/ nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos// ma 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// ragis thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi tshe lo rgyas po'argyud de//

donas byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po phyagan rdordzasad nga nagshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshags pa'i las kyi nges grub kyi rgyudan 'dri
yin te/ sems can thams cad sAs rgyas dang// byang chub sems dpa' nyida rnams su// ji bzhin dun pe tulanas su// las kyaphyagargya'a mchog 'grub sbyin// de la de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi

las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyung na 'di yanen// dus bzhin yin tshul dag tu// chod pa rnam pa bzha yisan/ rtag tu ldan pa rnams bzhar yang// byas nas lasaM rnams bsgrub par bya// de la rdoN+Di'i rigs kyi las

kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudan 'odi 'dzino// ma rungs sems can gnod bya'i phyir// dgos pa gang dang gang byed da// las kyi rdo rje rigs kyi 'ad ]/dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed// de la pad+mo'i ra sa ku las kyi
mi/ dngos grub kyi rgyud na 'od yin no// 'jigs pas gzer la ma 'jigs sbyin/ ja bzhani par ni 'dul de bzhin// 'ad na pad+mo'arigs kyi las// sangs rgyas dngos grub sbyin pa'o// de la nor bu'i rigs

kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyudan 'di yin no// sangs rgyas dbang bskur de bzhin du// lus can rnams la sbyin pa dang/ ra ba thamasacad rdzo bas byed pa'i// lasakyadon du bsgrub pa'o// rigasathams cad kyi las

kyi dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sams dpa' sams drapa' chen po phyagan rdo rjes de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi tshes nyid kyi phyag rgya'i mngashis kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ de la de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ya shas kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin no// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtosanyid dgongs// 'di ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyasid// gzhan

la sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med// de la 'di ni di bzhin bdarashags pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi yi shes kyi dngos grub rgyud yin te// phyagargya chen po bsgoms nan// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// 'di ni de

bzhin gshagasarags kyis// chos nyid dngos grub dam pa thob// de la 'di'ajo rdzag rigs kyi chos nyid kyi yi shes gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// phyag rgya chen po'atshul gyis na// dmatshogi chogan bcis nas kyang//

las rnams thams cad bslab nan// dzad ngos grubathob par 'gyur// de la 'di na pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi yi shes kyi dngos grub kyirgyud do// chos kyi phyagargya'i tshul gyisani// chos kyi phyagargya rjod byed cing//
rdorda tshosan tshes rnams kyi// chos nyid dun 'das bslabs pa'o// de la 'dan nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid yang shasakyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// las kyi phyag rgyab tshul gyis ni// las

dodza snying khar gzhag/ chos nyid 'di dag bsgoms na ni// las kyi chos nyid thob par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ya ngashas kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen

kha po phyag na rdo rje ni gshags pa thams cad kyi ye shes rags kyi ya sakyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// da la 'don de bzhin gshags pa rnams kyi yishas kyi de ngos grub kyi rgyud yin te//
rgyudordzasams dpa' ting 'dzan gnas// bla ba'i rdo jatshul gyis na// ji ltar dganyis kha dog sa// de ltar 'jige rten kun shes te// dag la dag dang dkar 'od gsal// chags la dmar dang rimar sar bro//
gnas kha dog ji bzhin pa'i// de yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// de la 'dan de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od paces pa'i// phyag rgya chen po bcus nas ni//

rang gi lus la ji ltar shes// da ltar 'gro ba'i yid shes so// dal 'ang nardordzu rigs kyi ya shas kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'aman phyogs gzhan du// khros par gyur nas da kyil 'khor ni// ji lta bur

yang mthong 'gyur ba// de lta bur ni yid shes so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi ya shas kyi dengos grub rgyud do// nam mkha' 'am sa phyogs phra mo 'am// yi ge'aphreng ba thob 'gyur na// dor na kha dog ca 'dra
'cha/bar sa pa de 'drar der sems shas// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'jig rten kun la bltas nas kyang// ji lta buran snang gyur cing// mthong bar gyuran

da 'dra bar// 'gro ba'i sams na shes par bya// de nyid snyoms par zhugs nas ni// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang// byed pa dang ni 'chag pa'od dang// ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs// snyoms par zhugs nas
bsamasanan// sems can gang dang gang yin pa'i// de dang de ni dbazhin du// sems can thams cad rtogs par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdordza'adzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi

ya shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'irgyud do// de nas byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po phyag na rdordzas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa brgyud 'di gsungs so// sams dpa' na gyis
brlabs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgoms na// ya sakyin tshul de yis// sangs rgyas dngos grubathob par 'gyur// de la 'a ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi yi shes kyi/

rgyud do// nam mkha' 'aman phyogs gzhan du// dkyil 'khor 'di ni ser skya thong// sems dpa' nyidin phyabargya nyid// mngon gsum du ni mthong 'gyur na bo// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyadangos grub kyi ya shas kyi

byed de// de lta bu yi dbyangs gyur pa'i// dbus na sngo bsangs snanganan// rdo rje rigs mchog dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rolas kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes yin te/ nyid la ni mkha' 'dra ba'i/ paNo sngon po
rigs grub pa'i// dngos grub de ni legs par 'gyur// de la 'dananir bu'i rigs kyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'aman phyogs gzhan du// de nyid mkha' bzhin dri med
las/ 'od zer dkyil 'khor 'bro bar ni/ mthong na dngos grub myur du thob// rdo rjesams sog gsasams dpa' rnams// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od nus par// dngos grub dus su rang bzhin du// bdag nyid kyi

mduna mthong an 'o// rags thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ya shos kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyagan rdo rjes de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i

dngos grub kyi yi shes kyi phyag rgyabargyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi yi shesakyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// lus kun de bzhin
gshegs rnams dang// byang nubasaMms dpa' rnams bsgoms la// de bzhin lus las byung mthong na'o// de la 'dani de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rjesam

dpa' phyag rgya che// rab mnyam bzhags pas bcingasanan// sgrub pas cho ga 'di yisano// mngon shes ldan thob par 'agyur// de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi yang shes kyi rongos grub yin no// phyag rgya chen
por zhugs nas ni// mig gi rnam shes bskyedanas kyang// gang yang rung ba des bsams na// shin turang ba'ang mthong 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// phyag rgya chen por gzhugs
ma/ nas na// rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang// des ni dgos pa gang bsams kyang// in tu ring na gnas zes zhes// bcom ldan rdo rjesams dpas gsungs// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// yid
kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang// sems can gang la das brtags nas// de yi sems nadas shes 'gyur/ phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// dag ba ma sems can gang mngar// yod kyi bltasanas
gar rgyas pa// gzugs ni de yis shes par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnyog shes pa'i dngos gruban 'di yin no// phyagargyanan po bcings nas kyang//

rdzu 'phrul gang dang gang 'dod pa// de nas gang yang rung bar ni// ting 'dzin gyisan thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon par
shas pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tun// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang// chog 'don sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo/ khres nas dgos pa thams
cad na// lta 'og rim pa ji bzhin bya// rdzu 'phrul mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes kun bdag nyid du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di na pad+mob rigs kyi mngon

par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog/ rab mnyam bzhag pas bcingasanan// chog 'das na sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// lta bog go rims ji bzhin du/
[a ]byung bya/ dachog bzhin du 'don pas chags// 'phral gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes thams cad thob 'gyur nas// bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs// de la 'di

nAnor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i phyag rgyan// rab mnyam bzhag pas khacasanan// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga thob po// lta 'og
rim pa ji bzhin du// 'phrul gyi mig la sogasatshul gyis// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byas na// mngon shes ldan de thob bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs tha
cad kyi mngon da ra zhes pa'i ya shos kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes da bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden
pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'digasungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa A// tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed cing// bden pa

lu chen po bsusan na// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob bo// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// de la 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de bzhinagashag

pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i// dam tshig la ni mna' bor la// rdo rje'i bden pa bsungs na ni// dngos grub mchog na thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs
kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyad do// ci ste dngos grub mchog 'donan// shin tu 'di las 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje 'dzin la mna' 'dor cing// bden pa 'ad la bsungs bar bya// zhes sangs bcom ldan 'dus

rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'irogs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// tsa so dngos grub mchog 'dod na// pad+mo chen po rigs mchog gi/ pad+mo'i tshes la mna' 'dor zhing/ bden pa'i dam tshig

bsud bor bya// zhes bcom ldan 'dasardo rjechos kyis gsungs so// de la 'din nor bu'i rigs kyi bden pa'o dengos grubakyi rgyud do/ 'di las shin tu 'da' dka' bar// sangs rgyas chos la mna' 'dor zhing// bden pa

mchog 'di gsungs nan// dbang bskur ba na thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sas rgyas mchod pas gsungs so// rigegs thams cad kyi mna'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems

dpa' sams dpa' chen po phyag rdordzas de bzhin gags pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la dbazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rim tshig ga de khon nyid kyi dngos
grub kyi rgyudan 'di yin no// sa ma ya sti zhes brjod nas// de yi 'og tu ma bsgrubs pas// rigs kun gyon phyag rgya rnams// nyid kyis bcings nas dam par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po

nga bon nyid kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi di na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sur tatsA zhes brjod na// denyid bskul ba'i bdag nyid che// ma bsgrubs par yang phyag
rgya kun/ nyid kyis bcings na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de khon nyid kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi//

rgyud do// hU~M zhes bya ba gshi tsam gyis// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung// nyid bcangs 'ching du bcug kyang rung// dala'adzin pad+mo'i rigs kyi rim tshig gi de khon nyid kyi dngos

chub kyi rgyud do// sarba shud+d+hags brjod na// dag gam yang na gzhan dag gis// bud med chags la sogs ldan na// thams cad dun grol mi 'gyur// de la bad ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de khon nyid kyi dngos

grub kyi rgyud do// o zhes bya bas mdo bsdun// phyag rgyu thams cad 'grub 'gyur ta// 'jig rten kun gyi mchog nyid kyi// rang 'byung nyidalamachod par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig de khon nyid kyi dngos/

grub kyi phyog rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//ngos byang chub sems dpa' sems raM pa 'tshanango ga zhardordzas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i

rigs kyi dngos grub gyi rgyud na 'di yin// de bzhin gshegs pa dran khyad cing// sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcingasan ni// sangs rgyas byang nub brtan par yang// bsgrubonamyur du 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin

gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rjesams dang 'i phyag rgya che// khamisanas de yi don du yang/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsgomasanan// shin tu myur bar dngos grub 'gyur// de la bdini rdo rje'i rigasakyi

00/ dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdordzasems dang ba ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig ga ni mchog bcings na// rdodz+dzasaMms dpa' bsgomasanan// nyi rimadun dengos gruba'agyur// de la 'din pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub/

kyi rgyud do// 'jigartenadabang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang// 'jig rten mgon po bsomasanani// nyi rim du na dengos grub thob// de la 'din nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//

rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgyabatsangs nas ni// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nani// nyi rom dun des grub thob// rags thamasacad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'irgyud do// de nas byang chub sems

dang 'asems dang ba chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la bduni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams

cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// phyag rgya thams cad bcianas ni// bdag nyid dang ni mdun du yang// sangs rgyas rjes su 'dranapa sgom// de nas de ma thag tu 'grub// cas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung+ga/
so/dul 'don de bzhinagshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis na// 'dod pa bdag ces bsgoms nas kyang// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub nas/
grub pa'i mgan kun bslabs pa'o// nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// bdag nyidi nyid kyis rje'i dbyibs// rab
ma @#// mnyam bzhag pas sgom byed cing// phyagargya thams cad bcings nas ni// da ma thag du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad kyi rdo rjes gsungs

so de la 'dan pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ya sa kun 'byung dngos grub kyi// pad+mo man po'i rigs la gnas// bdag nyid kyin par gnyid nyid// pats+tshab dbyings su bsgoms par bya//

zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i rgyud do// nor bu rin chen 'od zer 'bar// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms
nani nor bu chen po'i rigs mad pa// kun las 'byang ba'i dngos grub thob// cas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i rtogargyas pa'i rgyud do//

de nas byung nub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po phuganodordzas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byanagyi rlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grab kyi rgyur 'jigasungasas// nga la 'angan de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi

rlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbyangs dbang phyugargya na/rab mnyam bzhag pas bcingasanas kyang// sAngang mdzod spyi mgrin spyi bor// bzha gnas nigs rgyas byin rlobs bo// zhes sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyerab kyi rgyud yin no// jo rje sams pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sems dpa' rdo rje dam byas la// sAng kha mdzod spu mgran pa dang

[8 ]spyi bor bzhaganabyin gyis rlob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'dan rdorje'i rigs kyi byin gyi rlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rjehU~M gi phyagargya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas

btsangs nas kyang// snying kha mdzod skya mgrin spyi bar// bzhagan nyid du byin gyis rlob// ces bcom ldan 'adas rdo rjegatso bos gsungs so// de la 'di no pa'i rigs kyi byin gyi brlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//

'jig rten dbang po'i tani 'dzin gyiso// rdo rje paslob dem byas la// snying khamadzod spyi mgrin spyi bor// byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzig kyi dbang po'o gsungs

so de la 'den nor bu'i rigs kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi rgyud do// rdordza snying po tange 'dzin gyis// rodza nor bu chen bcas la// snying khamadzod spu mgron spyi bor// byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya// zhes bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// ragis thams rtsod kyi bon gyi brlab pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// danas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyagan rdorjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos

grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i debang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyad do// rin chen rdo rje bcangs nas na// dpral bar rab tu bzhag byas na// rgyal ba rdo rjerin chan gyis// dad nga
bskur bar na de 'gyur ro// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ dorje dbyings dbang la sogs pa//

nga@#/ (sangs rgyas phyag rgyam dun nas ni// khartsam pa byas nas ngos bzha'i yang// 'phreng ba nyid kyis dbang skur 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje

dbang gyi 'phreng ba ni/ bcangs nas dpral bar bzhag na yang/ khaphreng ba' dengang na de no// rdo rjenamasan re dad pa bgyur//de la 'di ni ba d+mo'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chos kyi dordzi cis

'a nas kyang// mgo bor bzhag sta da dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kyis ni 'jab rten gyi// dbang phyug gin dbang bskur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'dra kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi de bang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni ner bu ba rigs

kyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud do// rdordza rin chen tshu gu brtsis// dpral bar bzhag ste de dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kyis ni mchod pa yi// dbang phyug tun dbang bskur 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos

gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyan rdo rjes de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//

de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rgyal ba kun gyi rnam par na// phyag rgya mnyam par bzhag pa btsadis// zlos shing sngags kyi gi pa ni// myur du

dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de'adi ni de bzhinagasheshags pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyudado// sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni// ting

tsa 'dzani rdo rje s kyis kyang// snying bo phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// zlos pas myur du grub par 'gyur// zhes bso ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nga 'dzan gyis gsungs so/ dal 'di ni rdzogs 'ogis spyi

ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags lasan khyod phyung ste// bdag ni khri 'dzin bsgoms nas// snying po phyag rgya sngags yig rnams// myur dudangos grub thob bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo

rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'ani lits+tshi'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dengosagrub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang pa'i rigi zlos ras// thums pas gangs ba'i tshul gyisin// snying po la sogs bsgoms na yang/

dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhes dam ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzizigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'dinanor bu'i rob sa kyi ting nge 'dzan gyi de sos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' kun gyi ting
'dzan ni// rab mnyam bzhag par bsgomasan yang// snying po phyag rgya sngags ragi rnams// bsgrubasan kun tu bgro bar 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad

kyi ring 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang nub nas dar ba sams dpa'i chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i de dos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//
del 'dani de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rab mnyam bzhag pas dang por ni// bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la// de nas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bsgrubs na dngos
grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ dad la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gsang ba'i mchod rnams
ban yis// gsang ba'i mchod rjod byed cing// bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yi// mchod pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sams dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni darje'i rigs kyi mchod

[@/ ]pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po// khro bo gsang ba rjod byed cing// khro kho'i khu tshur rab sbyar na// myur du bdag gis rigs 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de

la 'dan pad+mo'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mdo sde zabacang rgya che ba'i ]/tshul rnams legs par brjod nas kyang// yid dang ngag gis phulanas ni// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhes
bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'din nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gdug dang 'phan dang rgyal tshan gyis// rgyal pos mchod pas mchod

byed cing// spyan pa 'a thams cad byin na ni// nor bub regasan thob par 'agyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// nyid la byin gyis rlabs sogs ldan// rdo rje sems dang 'dra bar 'gyur//

cho 'phrulo rnam pa bzhi yas na// rdorje sna tshogs ting 'dzin gyi// dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dang sagasungs so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang//

dbang bskur ba dang// ting nge 'dzin dang// mchod pa rnams kyi chog rgyas pa'irgyud do// danas byang chub sems dar bsams dang ba chen po phyag na rdordzas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ri

shas kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'don de bzhin gshog sa bab mngon par shes pa 'a ya shas kyi dngos grub rgyud yin no// lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzanan// 'di ni bde gshegs nyid mngon
shes// danarab tu rtogs nas ni// sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub thob// ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'din de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i sakyi
dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'phrul gyi mgo sogs mngon shes ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang// mngon shes ldan des gyur na// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das

rdo rje sams dpas gsungs so// de la 'din rdo rdzob rogs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ya shos kyi dengos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo mngon shes bskyed nas ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na yang// mngon shes

ldani bdag gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'dan pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod
chags mngon shes bskyedanas kyang// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes ldan bdag gyur nas// dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'dasajorje spyan gyis gsungs so//
tu bya// de la 'din nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ya shas kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mchod pa bzhin shas bstud nas kyang// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nan// mngon sa lnga yang

bdagagyur nas// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tugyur// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mngon bar shes pa 'i yongs kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// danas byung

chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi yo shas kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi yi shes

kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rjes mas dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ bdag gis sangs rgyas don byed cing// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngosagrub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i mingashas kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// phyag rgya chen por sgom byed cing// byang nub chen

po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes dacom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigasakyi byang nub chen po'i yo shes kyi dngos grubakyi rgyud do//
khro bo'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas// lag pas dam tshig mchog bcangs la// byang chub chen po'i yashes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pasagasungs

so de la 'di ni rito'i rigs kyi byang nub chen po'i ye shas kyi dengos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang phyag ting 'dzin pa gnas// de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgyas zus// byang chub chen ngo ba yongashas 'ad///

bsgomasan dngos grub thob par 'gyur// nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di nonor bu'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i yang shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje
snying po'i ting 'dzin gnas// las kyi phyag rgya las 'a gas khyad// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so//

rigs thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi tshog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i
dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'din de bzhin gshags pa'i rogs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir// sems can don rnams rab byed cing//
sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// cas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang

pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ji ltar yul dang ldan gyur nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed ces// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms byed cing// de nyid bskur na myur bar nadi/ mnyes par 'gyur ba des 'grub po//
zhes bcom ldan 'adas rdo rjesams dpa' gsus so// de la 'di ni rje rigs kyi mnyes par byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas bka'an srung ba dang// sams na nan
sbyad pa'i phyir// jam pas naangon spyod byas rnams na/mnyes par 'gyur ba des grub bo// zhes dam ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so// de la 'don pa'i rigs kyi mnyes

bar bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chags pas kun tultab dang// byams dang snying rjes chos skya dang// ma 'jigs kun sbyin byed pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi mnyes par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das rdorje

spyan gyis gsungs so// de la 'ang na nor bu'i dbasamanyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dbang bskur ba ni re ba sbyin dang// nor bsags rab tu sbyin bud cing// da gang sas rgyas don dusbyor// 'di ni
sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// cas dacom ldan 'das 'phags panam mkha'i snying pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang ba
dpa bachen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos
grub kyi rgyud do// de ltar rnam dag de sbyin pa// 'dod chags lan mnyas mi bya// sems can kun gyi donod brtson// 'dani sangs rgyas dbang dpyad// ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsudA

so// de la kha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyidabang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'di ston pa de ba'i bdag nyid kyis// su ra ta ste zhes smra zhing// rdo sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni// de nyid
bskul n dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas bka' ni sems can rnams// dag bya lus

na skyabs sbyin dang// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// bsad na yang na dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi
rgyud do/ pa'i 'dab ma kha 'byed cing/ 'dod chag gas dag la kun rtog la// gdul ba'i phyir na chags byed cing// 'dod par byed pa dbang du 'gyur// zhas bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang

pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur phyir// rdo rje rin chen nyin rarar// spyi bor bzhag ste dbang bskuran// sangs

rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'dasanam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigasathams cad kyidabang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsad pa'i dengos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gsod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sams nan
bya/// donam mthong zhing// sangs rgyas de nyid ma sbyangs la// yid dang ngag dang lus kyis ni// gsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi gsad pa 'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dngos grub thams cad ma thob la// rigs rnams kyang ni mi brtson zhing// rdo rje kun tu

brtags nas ni// bsad na dngos grub myur du thob// ces bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di nirdo rjed rigs kyi gsad ngag dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ma rungs mi brtul khromed cing// de bzhin
sramasacan ma 'dul la// bdag nyid sdug bsngal thob byed na// sunas bu bas gsad par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdordza'adzan pas gsungasaso// dol 'donar to'arigs kyi gsod pa'i dngos grub kyirgyud do//
snying med rung byams med la// sems can ma rungs ma sbyong zhing// bdag nyid kyis ni de slas na yang// bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tuny+tsanaras
gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di na nor bu'i rogs kyi gsad pa'i dngos grubakyirgyud do// mi gtod bdagal nor med cing// nor stor ba dang gnod byed la// dbul por gyur la sems can nam/
bas da na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ nas bcom ldan 'das re ba thams cad yongs su skong bas gsungs so// kha ge gis na sangs rgyas kyang// rnal 'byor ma thob gsod bcug dan// de dag drang bar bya
ba'i phyir// bdag gi dngos grub sbyin par bya/ zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi gsadapa' dengos grab kyi chog rgyas pa brgyud do// de nas byang chub

sams dpa' chen po phyagan rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungasaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung 'a dengos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can
thams cad mi gtong zhing// rtag tusangs rgyas machod bdag nyid// rtag par sangs rgyas yid la byed// 'din srung barmad kyi mchog/ ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de
bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grubakyi rgyud do// rdordzasams dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig/ lan cig tsam yang brjod gyuran// 'di ni srung ba rtag chen po// skadag dngos grub thob par 'gyur//

zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje s rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rags dang rgyud kyis chogami shes// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyi// rdo rjehU~Ml mos

byed pa// 'di ni bdag dang gzhan la srung// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bsagasungs so// de lo 'di ni pad+mo'i rogs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub rgyud do// 'dod chags dag cing byas pache// thamA
cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jig rten dbang gis mtshan zlos pa// srung ba 'don rmad dutsho// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyisaM gsungs so// de lo 'di'i nor bu'irigs kyi sungaba'i dngos grub kyi
rgyud do// sangs rgyas sems can gtong byed par// canus par n spyor byed cing// nyi ma stongs par mi bya bar// srung ba 'di ni rmad kyi mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje srung
bas gsungs so// jigs thams cad kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rgyud 'di bzhengs des gsol/ gang gis sems can thams cad brtags pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu gyur nas rtogs par bgyi ste/

myur du bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu mngon pare'atshang bya ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'gas so zhes bya ba byin te/
phyag na rdo rje legs par bshad pas nged kyis drungasashing byin gyis brlabs kyis legs so legs so// de nas yang de bzhin gshags pa thams cad gcig tu 'dusanus/ byang chub sems dpa'
chen po phyag na rdo rjel legasaso zhes bya ba nate/ rdo rje thag pa bla na med// de banAn gshegs pa kun gyi gsang// theg pa chen po mngon dus pa'i// 'do sde 'di ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje sam
dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyed legs so// rdo rje lasan khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thamA cad kyi de khon nyid bsdus pa las/ brtag pathams
cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rogs kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyad do// sangs rgyas byang chub ting nga 'dzani// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na
ni// byang chub bde bas thob par 'gyur// bsams nas de ni rtogs par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungasas// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa/

thams cad kyi rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems dpa' rdo rje snying khar bcings// nga yi chung ma khyod sdug pa// brtan par gyur cig ces smras nas// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub tu
sta chog 'di yi tshul gyis ni// rang galas rnams ma grub kyang// gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na// shin tu dngos grub thob par bgyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sams dpa' rdo rjes gsungs/

so= de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rogs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ji lta ba bzhin bsgrub na yang// dngos grub thob par ma gyur na// hU~Mgi phyag rgyas bsadanani// skrag ste dngos kyang sbyin par byed/
cas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis hrunaso bya bsagasungs so// de bzhin 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud do// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas kyang/
[017 ]@#// rdordzabalta bas bltas nas kyang// bdag gi chung ma'am gzhan chung ma// sdig pa'i dngos grubathob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dod pas gsusaso// de la 'di/

[% ]ni nor bu de rigs dam pa'i dengos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dbang po gnyiso namanyam sbyar la// bde ba'i mchog ces smod cing// sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang pa/ dbul na myur du dngos grub 'gyur// zhes

bcom ldan 'dasanor bu bzhad pas gsungs so// rigs dam pa thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sams dang ba chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa tham/

cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dengos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gso dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// sa ma ya hUM zhes rjod cing// bud med kun la
chags byas la// sems can don gyis mi skyen// ngas par sangs rgyas des mnyis so// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'igs kyi dmatshig gi

dngos grub gsang ba'irgyud do// 'dod chags la ni bsnyes ma bya// bud med kun dang rtse byed pa// rdo rje rnams kyi gsang dam tshig/ 'di ni bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang/
mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'din rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// gsod pa 'jigarten thams cad gsod// lus dang ngag la dam dgas pa// 'jig rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni
dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum lasa rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dag pa'i bdag nyid
'dod chags dag/ mu stags rnal 'byor ma dag la// dag pa'i bdag nyid ngam tshig ni// bsrungs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tutsanaras gzigs kyidabang pos gsungs so//

de la 'din nor bu'i rigs kyi dematshagagi dngos grub gsang ba'irgyud do// rdo rje snying po dang 'dzin gyis// rdo rje nor bu sngar bcings la// ma rungs rnams kyi nor sregaso na// dam tshig dngos grub sbyin par
'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de// de nas pa nubasams dpang sams dpa' chen po phugan rdordzas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyuda'adi gsungs so// de la 'dzin de padan gshag pa 'a nyes kyi dngos grub ba/sang ba'i rgyud do// chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni// rab mnyam
bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang// dgos pa thams cad dus nas kyang/ sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub thob// ces pa com ldan 'dis rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i
ges kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// sems can kun la chags byed cing// yul la skyo bar ma gyur la/ bud meda dga' ba'i dag pa ni// gsang chos dngos grub rab spun no// zhes bcom
ldan 'das rdorje gsang bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni deb rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rna ba'i rnal 'byor hunas ba// phrag pa'i rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas//
mi 'gus rnal 'byor 'di bsad ces/ rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje s bskul// dam pa'i dngos grub spen pa 'od dazhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rnam pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni re po'i rigs kyi chos kyi

dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis na// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bud med kun dang rtsod byed cing// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras
gzigs kyidabang pos gsungs so// de la 'di nanor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dengos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dbang po gnyis namanyam sbyar la// re ba thams cad yongs bskangs nas// bud med dam ni
sdug pa yi// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjeran pa chos gsus so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'irgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'

chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud dgagadu so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sams dpa'i
[“]lha teng 'dzin gyis// sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms la// bud med lus kyi bu gar blugs// bud med rnams n dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsungs so// de la 'di
[na/]ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba brgyad do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// bu ga nas ni de bzhin zhugs// budamed lus su legs khyab byas// sems med
pa yang magu bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dgyes pas gos pas so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje hU~Mg phugabya ni// rab mnyam pa ga pas
bsrings nas kyang// khros nas bu gar zhugs na ni// yid kyis da ni dpag par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gas gsungs so// de la 'di nipasbob rogs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang
kha'i rgyud do// chos kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni// bcings nas pad+mo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ khu gar bcug na bud mAd rnams// thams cad kyang ni bsrungs bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'dasardo rje pad+mos
gsuso// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub ba sang ba' rgyud do// rdorje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis ]/las kunedzanor bur bcings// bugar bcug na bud med rnams// nyid du phab nas bu gang

byed 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches ba sungs so// rab saMthams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub da nga ba'i+i gargyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes da bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'kher dag pa'i dngos gra gsang ba'i rgyud 'di la/sungs so// nga 'kha 'di nyin gshags thams cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyad do// chos kyi 'khor
blad/ le badra bar ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing// phyag rgya bud med rnams kyis bskor// da na sangs rgyas gzhag par bya// gsang ba drar ni zhugs nas kyang// sangs rgyas

la na nyidad skya// du ru hota bdas ba ba po data su mAm sarba/ rigs rnams kun gyi phyag rgya ni// tshul rnams la yang da skad brjod// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam med pa'i// gsang ba'i dngos grub thob par
gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings na 'dra bar na/ dkyil
'khor legs par bri bar bya/ de bzhin gshags pa'i rabs rnams na// thams cad kyi ni mtsho gatshulate/ dadakyil 'khor du ni zhugs nas kyang// dngos grub 'dod pas myur bar ni// su ra ta sa ma ya/
tsa ho/ badzra satA aru sid+d+hanaM/ zhes brjod snying po 'di bzlas te// bsgrubasan thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nyidi bskul ba'i tshul gyisan// mgunas myur du 'grub paro'agyur// zhes bcom ldan

'das rdordza sams dpas gsungs so// dela'adi nardzo'i ri'i sa kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra bar ni// rdo rjerigs kun rnams kyi ni// dkyil la/
thams cad 'jug par yang// mkhas bsal gas par grwa bar bya// der zhugs nas myur bar yang// dngos grub 'debis pa gsol byed cing// rA ga tA si saMb+ha ta/ 'dodachas dag las ni khyod gyur ces// snyan
00 kun tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shugs gsungs so// de la 'di ni ba'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud ngo// pad+mo'arigesan thams cad kyis// 'gro

ba 'dul ba'i tshul du ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni brjod bya bar// rA ga d+harma ma hApad+ma pra sid d+ha la ga ma ba bo// de skad smrases dkyil 'khor ni// kun gyi don dngos grub bo/
tshes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di nanor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ nor bu chen pos rigs rnams ni// don kun 'grub pa'i

tshul du yang// dkyil 'khor 'gas par bris nas ni// zhugs nas 'di skad sa bar du// sarma pa ya sid+d+himaM/ rwabadagi sadz+dzInAM/ sid+ma sid+him pIs tA/ de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor kun// zhugs nas man/
gsang bla med pa'i// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// phyin chad dngos grub bdag nyid kyis// bsgrub na dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// gang myur du mi 'grub na// de nyid bskul na 'grub par 'gyur//
zhes com ldan 'das rdorda sams dang sa gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi 'a 'khor gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phugargya thams cad gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhi gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// tha ta thA ga ta ma hA
u@#// da bu bya// pa la sarba su kha pa ta/ bangan las byung ba'i tshigs bdunapas// skyabs kyang da na ba ma'o// de la 'di ni de nga yin la/shegs pa'i rigs kyi

phyag rgya chen ngo bo dngos kyi rgyud do// lta khog bog rims ji bzhin du// phyag rgya chen po bcus nas ni// 'odi ni de nyid gsang ba yi// rdorje tshul gyis 'di skyes shig/ padzra sa twa sa ma yahU~M/ tA ma ru
tataT/ sa ma ya tung/ badzra gan+d+hos u pa/ rdo 'gying ba'i lha mo cha!/ de nyid bskul bas tshugs 'gyur bas// lus kun la ni rtag gyur nas// ji bzhin myur du da ngos grub bo// zhes

bcom ldan 'das rdo rjer sprul ska'i dza drag ga re sa thagasungs so//de ya 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sad d+ha si d+hu sa ma ya/ sa ma mo dzatata pra ya mI/ zhes bskul myur du/

gyuran/ ga pa tu yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes brtsam ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la ba da na pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyad do// bud+d+ha bud+d+he ma hA sata ]
bar+ya ta ma a ti pra ya/ nas ni bskul na chung ba yang// rjes su chags nas 'grub par gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'din nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag gsong ba'i dngos

grub kyi rgyud do// sarbakarmam ra war+ya wa tA ma ma sid+d+hang+ga padzraNi/ rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar// rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/

[08]/ rigs pa thams cad kyi phyagargya'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chung sems dpa' chan po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bde/
gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmagi gsang ba'i dris grub kyi rgyud do// bu stags can rnams phan bdags phyir// ri mo'i phyag rgya'itshul dun// sangs rgyas btsun/
mo rab smra par// shes da du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmatshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig
gsang ba'i de ngos grub kyi rgyud do/ sems can kun ba yid l ba// sems can kun la bde sbyin zhing// sems can kun gyi yab nyid ni// dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin yashags pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// 'dod na sangs rgyas thuchung g.yong ba'i mtshog stacha dam bar// dang ldan shesanas dad byas nas// bsgrubs dka' ba yang 'grub par 'gyur/ da
zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de 'dan rnadz+dzas ris sa pa ra ga 2sang ba'i de ngos grub kyi rgya da do// chags pa'i dag pa'ichags bral gyi de/ sems can don ga yod phyung nas//

mu stegs lta bar byas pa ste/ lta ba ngan pa'i gtsang rong ltung// theg pa cha la dgod pa'i phyir// gsod pa'i rtsa tshig mchog yin te// de ltar shesan 'grub bo/ra 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'a
pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mu ste/ sa can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir// 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung///

mi gtsang nas niaci phyir brjod// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyudango// pud
rgyu mad chags phyir rin chen rnams// rtag tu labs par bsag par bya// bud smad bla ma rin chen nas// bsams nas don 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du mdzad pas
ba/sungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshid gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi tshog rgyas pa'irgyad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang brtan po phyag na rdo rje s de bzhin gnas pa thams cad kyi man
pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub lags ng ba'i rgyud do// bud mad chags rnams yongs bskor la// kun nas rtsis pa'i bar
banas nigs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang// mchod pa 'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'dzin de bzhin gshags pa'i rig sakyi mchod pa'i

tsha/ dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rapa dag ngal ta skyo ba na// rab dga' las byung bde ba de// phyag bzhi pos ni mchod pa'i phyir// phul na myur du 'grub par gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas

0 gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// hU~Mgis dam tshig bcings nas ni// sku bo bud med 'khyud nas ni// 'khyud par gyur pa'i bde ba da// phul na da ni/
'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po bdag bsgoms la// sdug pa'i gdong
du bltas nas ni// bltas par gyur pa'i bde ba de// phul na da yi 'grub par 'gyur/ nas rtsom ldan 'das pad+mo sbyar gyis gsungs so// de la 'di na ner bab rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i

rgyud do// lasakyi phyag rgya bcings gyur la// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyananas kyang// bud mad 'khyud pa'i lengs steng na// mchod phyir phulan 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen gyis

gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i che ba rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje s de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i
dngas grupa kyi rgyur 'di gsungs so// de la 'dan de bzhi gshags pa'i rogasakyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag bsgoms la// can s sus kyang mi tshor bar//
gzhan gis bud mad rtsi u0f7a byed na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rags kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i/
bla ]/rgyud do// rdo rje'adzem bus nas kyang// rdo rje 'phrang ba 'ching byed cing// de nas rdo rje gru blangs la// rdo rje gar gyis mchod dus// 'dod pa 'i dga' bas dbang bskur mchog/ glu dang
gar gyis bad ba las// bad ma gzhan gyis myong min te// da phur gsang mchol ga 'ad ba med// de la 'don derdzo rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten gsum lasa rnam rgyal
1 lasoms// chog/ji bzhin tshul du yang// gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob pa 'gyur// zhes/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi
mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar gnas/ gsang ba'i tshul ni ja pozhin par// las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na// mcher pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes
pacom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan rasaM gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'din nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// den kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ gsang
tshul ni ji bzhin par// las kyi phyag rgyas rab machod na// mchod pa'i dngos grubathob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mcho
pa'i rig rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/

'ad/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i de kho na nyid bskyang ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// mdor na ting 'dzin yang shas las// sems can rnams la chags tshul gyis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grung//
'gyur na// myur du bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshaMgs pas gsungs so// da la 'dan dbazhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi da khon nyare chen po bskyod pa'i ngos
grub gsang bdorgyud do// sems can thog ma tha ma med// nam mkha' 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// 'ded pa 'gro ba kun bdag po/// sems can kun gyi mas
gang ni// brtan phyir sams dpa' zhes bya 'o// rdo rjemanyam par mnyam bzhagan// nges pa rdo rje nyid gyur pa// sams dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje sams dpa' nyid du 'gyur// bcom ldan sam
dpa' de nyid de// rdo rje pazhad pa de bzhin gshags// nyid sams rab tu rtogs la sogs// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// ra nyid bcom ldan da bzhin gshags// thams cad kyi ni rigs su 'gyur
zhas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so// de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs nyidad// 8nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen pa// nga nyid pad+mo'i rigs dag pa// nga nyid nor bu'i rigs kyi
mchog/ cas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor las gsungs so// rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dngab
sams dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// da la 'di na de bton gshegs
pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa 'i dngos grub gsang ba'irgyud do// bcom ldan sems dang ba de nyid ni// rdorje sems dpa' thugs la gnas// mnyam par bzhag las tang 'dzan te/sad rgyas byang
rlung rab tu sgrub// ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni da batshan gshags pa'i rigs kyi mnaM ma'i mngon par brjod pa'i dengos grubagasang ba'irgyud de// rab tu rtogs
par rdo rje sto/gzung ba'i tshul gyis lcag kyang yin// phra mo rtogs par na dab na la// mgu bar gyur phyir 'a gas zhes bya// smras pa'i phyir yang rin chen gsungs/ gab+ba jido tshul gyis rim ste
rgyal mtshan lags par sgrung ba la gsungs// 'dzam phyir bzhang par grags pa la// 'dong gas dgaphyirapad+mo yan// ral grisanyon mongs dgra gcod yin// dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor lo sta// tshig
gas brjod pas skya zhes ba// rgya gramatshul du kun rdo rje// mi tshugs tshul gyis ge ma yin// 'jigs byung tshul gyis mang ba ste// phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsdams pa'o// ji ltar bcom ldan sams rtag
pa rdo rjesams dpa' kun 'gro ba// de bzhin rdo rjemtshan la sobs// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas gsungs//
['//]kaso rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing

nga skya ba'i dngos grubagasang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegasaM pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba skyo bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas//
rdo rje skul mo krung bcings la// log gnyis rdo rjer bsdams pa las// myar dusangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di na de bzhin gshag

pa'i rigs kyis phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'irgyud do// ji ltar rgyal po 'di phyag rgya// rgyal po khrims la bdebs pa ltar// bdag nyid chen po skye bo rnams// sku gsung thugs
ardo rje yi// gzugs brnyan gyi notshul du yang// nyid kyi phyag rgya btab nani// bdag nyid chab 'i phyag rgya cher// shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos gsudA

so rje la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya b+hacing bskya bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// ji ltar dmatshigadam pa 'di// skye bo 'gas na bcings gyur na// shin tu 'da' bar ma bya pa//
da ltar de bzhin gshags kun gyi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog bcisan// ma shi bar du mi 'dab bar// gnas nas dngos grubathob par 'gyur// zhes bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skyo bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'irgyud do// mdor na rgyal pos rdo rje ngag/ 'dab
bar bya ba ma yin te// 'di ni bcings par gsanas kyang// des ni tshes kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjechos kyi gsungs so// de la 'di ni jorje las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bang ba/
rgyu bar 'gyur pa'i dngos grub gsang pa'i rgyud do// rdo rje bka' dad lamang rnams// kan par bya ba ma yin zhing// bka' nyan pa yi las de ni// gas na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bam
ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing bskye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa gsang ba'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sams
dpa' chen po chag sa 'ang sar ran kaka [- / ]// kab shing pan gyis brlabs so// de nas yang du bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu
'dus nas// ba ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjel legs so zhus bya babyin no// rdo rje thag pa dran med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsung// thog pa
na po ston 'das pa'i// mdo 'di 'gas rang pa shang bsan rgyu gams pa'i khyod lags so// rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rjechos n khyod lags so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so//
de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las// rigs thams cad kyis brtag pa gsang ba'i mig rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so///da nas byang chub sems

dpa' sanas dang bachen po phyugan rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshesadam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyudado/
sangs rgyas rjes su dran tshul gyis// sangs rgyas chos kyi ting 'dzanan// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgomasan yang// bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pas
gsungs so// de la 'din de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi ches dam pa'i dngos grubakyirgyudado// chags pas rjes su dran tshul gyis// sems dang ba thams cad rung 'dzin gnas// rab mnyam bzhag pas
bsgoms na ni// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni sderdza'i rigs mchos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi
rgyud do// khams gsum rnamargyalacha lugs su// bsgoms nas 'dun dang de bzhin te// phyag na rdo rje b mthur gyur nas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur// gas bcom ldan 'das jorjesams
dpas gsungs so// de la 'din pad+mo'i rigasakyi chos dam ra'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul pa'i chos su ni// bsgomasanas mdun du de bzhin te// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan dar// 'dul bar den
bla// rab byed ces// bcom ldan 'das rdo rjechos kyis gsungs so// de la 'danonor bu'i rigs kyi sa dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub ba'i skor yang ni// bsgomasan/
mdun du da brten te// rnam pa 'i mtshes na kun ldan pa yaM/ phun tshogs na ni des thob bo/ nas bcom ldan 'dus rdo rje nor bus gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga
rgyas pa'i rgyud de// de nas byang chub mas dus rtson po phyatshe[' ]mkhan pa gsal paN kyi chos kyi rAm tshu gis dngos grubakyirgyud 'di gsungasaso// de la 'don de bzhin gshogs pa tham

cad kyi chos kyi dmag gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur la// rdorje phu mo tshulargyas ni// badzrab dzra nas brjod na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'dus kyis gsungs so// de la 'dirnyed pazhin gshegs pa rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gis dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dwapa'i ting 'dzan du// rdo rje phramo gom byed cing// badzra satA zhes
brjod na// rdo rje sams dpa' nyid 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sams dpas gsungs so// de la 'din rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khams gsum rnam rgyalacha lugs su//

dran byed mdun du da bzhin te// hUM hAhU~MhU~M zhes brjod na// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shugs gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mob rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos

ba grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gi gas gsan// rdordzophra mo sgom byed cing// 'dicu gdad+mazhes barjod na// dngos grub dam pa thob par gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjechos kyi gsungs so// da kha

baniro bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyiin// der phra mo bsoms nas kyang// sad rgyu sid rgyu zhes brjod na// don gyi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/

nas bcom ldan 'das nor bu chos kyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi tshis kyi mtshig ga dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'irgyud do// de nas byang chub samasadapa' phyag na rdo rjes dbazhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyaye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud 'jagasungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi yo shasakyi dngos grub rgyud do// dam pa'i chos n yi ga med/
ting 'dzin yags 'byung ba ste// a zhes bya bas chos rnams na// skya bad par dgongs pa ste// phyag rgya 'di yi tshul gyisan// shes pas bsgoms te de nas kyang// yi ga kun gyi ya shosan// bad
gshegs skad cig gis 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i deng la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos
kyi yashas kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de bzhin gags kun de nyid kyi// mdo sde 'din ded pa yis// dadanas bcangs sam bkrags gyuran// dngos grub bram d thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
[s/]u@#/// rdo rje sems dpas bdasungs so// de la 'a ni rdo rje b rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ya shas kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sdug pa'i sems can phan don du// sdig can sdig sbyor bzlog pa dang//

sangs rgyas bkab nasrung ba'i phyir// bsad pa dusan 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni parob rigs kyi dam pa'i tshes kyi yang shas kyi dengos grub kyi rgyud
do 'dod chags rang bzhin dag par shes// dam pa'i don du dgongs nas kyang// thog ma tha mar 'di bsgomasan// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras
gzugs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs tshos mkhyen pa'i dngos grubagyi rgyud do// sems can don phyir sbyin byed cing// bsams pa thams cad rdzogs byed cing// so bsgoms
'di na nor bu yi// rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das chos rin chen gyisaMgasungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi tshog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas
byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge
'dzan gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas kyis ni ting 'dzan las// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs po// 'di ni bsgoms par byas nas kyang// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes
[pd/ ]bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyangs kyis gsungs so// de la 'din de bzhin gshags ra ba rigs kyi tadeng 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdorjesams dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// blamad dang ni
las mang rnams// sems drang 'akun 'gyur thams cad dang// shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdordzasams dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje 'i rags kyi ting nge 'dzan gyi las
kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sdig pa dag pargyu yi phyir// mtshams med byed las mi zlog na// gsod pa'i las 'dad pa can// des ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sams dpas/
gsungs so// de la 'di na pad+mo'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sdigakun rnam par dag pa'i dag/ kun dag pas na da gos pa kun// des byed las 'di yin no bar/ shasan ang
ni grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo'i gsungs so// dal ba ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ srid ldan dbul po thams cad kyi// rtag tu bsam pa kun bskang la/
don kun grub pas kun bdag na// grub bgyur 'di la the tshom med// cus macom ldan 'das rin po che rgyal mtshan gyis gsungs so// rigs thams can kyi ting 'dzinagyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag rdordzas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra mo'i yang shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// del 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phramo/
shukla// mo'i ye shas kyi dngos grub kyi rlung do// rtag du jo tshe phra mo'i tshul// 'bad pa kun gyis sbyor nani// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de 'di nid bzhin ba ya pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i yingashos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyad do// slob dpon m yin gazhan dang ni// slob ma yin bu min pa yi/ mdun du

phug rgya mkharjod da// de dgagasang bas phyagad+ma 'grub cas ga lhanu'adas rdo rje 'dzinapas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rje'i rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kya ye shes kyi rgyud do// rdordzaphra mo'i tshul gyis/

snanas hU~M myud ldan gyur la// jo dzakhro bo' dang 'dzam gyi// da ko pa grags cang sprub par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shas kyi dengos
grub kyi rgyud do// pad+mo'an po'i ting 'dzan ba nas// rdordzapa lon+til gyi rong ltatshes bltasanani// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo bzhad pas gsungs so// del

'di ni rogs kyi phra mo ba rigs kyi yi tshes kyi dngos myu drub kyi rgyu/ ngan pa ra dza ga sa// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyisan// shin tu phra mo'i lta 'bar bas// donan thems cad 'dren par 'gyur// zhes bas
kha ldan 'dasardo rje nor bu'i gsungs so// rigasathams cad kyi 16 33/daM/ de wak+kam sa dpabasams dpa' chen po phyagan rdordzas de bzhinagshegs pa thams 4 mig gi yi

ngashas kyi dngos grub gyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sman gyis ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gang tshe phyag rgya 'am ting nge 'dzin// sgrub phyir stsol bar gyur pa na// gang tshe
mkha' la skar ma 'dra// dkar po rgyug par des mthong na// de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi// spyan ni bdag gis thob 'gyur zhes// phyin chadasangs rgyas rnams kyini// rtag pa kun las bsgrub par bya//
nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'din dbazhinagshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ya shas kyi dngos grub kyirgyud do// gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te// jisnyad dngos grub yod par 'gyur
da snyad kyi ni gzugs bar n rnams// mkha' rgyug 'gro ba' ma 'od yang rung// mthong nardordza spyanudag par// shes pas mchodanadangos grub ni// bla na med pa thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdor/
sams dpas gsungs so// de la 'di'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi mig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// g.yas pa'i m g.yon phyogs kyi// mkha' la nam mkha'i dbyangs 'di na// sprin 'drar myur du 'khor ba yang// mig

mthong bar gyur pas kyang// rdo rje las 'byung phyag rgya de// mthong nas 'jigs par ma 'gyur la// phyag rgya da na bsrung nan// rdo rjesmanani grub par 'gyur// zhas kacom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so//

de la 'di ni pad+mob rigs kyi spyan gyi ya shas kyi dngos grubakyi rgyud do// gang tsho skya 'am dmar ba dang// dkar ba'am sor pa'i m sna tshogs kyi// dkyil 'kher mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe// dgongs 'gyur 'khor
le'i spyan 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pados ba/sungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigasakyi sanagyi ya shasakyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mkha' 'a nichen 'dra ba
rang// gsar la sogs pa brlab ni// gang tshe mkha' mthong mkha' yi mig/ de ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi spyan gyi yas kyi dngos

ts+tsa grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di na de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub rgyud do// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul dun// 'dod chags bde ba rnam smin phyir// gtso bo thams cad mchod byas pa// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob
par 'gyur// zhes sangs klu su bcom ldan 'das kyis lo/sungs so// de la 'di na de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi rim pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags bdag rus snyoms byed cing// gsang ba'i
mchod pa rab byas na// rdo rje 'dod pa'i ga na mnyam/ rtag dang thong par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'adas rdo rje bzhad pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos
grub kyis rgyud do// khre ba padwag ka Amu khyad ci 3pa/rang la pa rab byas na/ 10cas sa la rnam rgyal pa kha ba'i// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag

rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di na chos kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nang du song ba'i yid kyis ni// 'dod pa dam par sgom byed cing// dbyangs dang ldan pa'i yi ga so// sangs rgyas mngon
par mchod nan// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das khophags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'din nor bu'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyung
do rdo rje snying por mnyam bzhag la// bsam pa g.yos pas gdudanani// phyag la rtag tu brtson byas la// dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbang rin po ches gsungs so/

rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi
rgyuda'adi gsungasaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun// rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas// e ma'o sems can
don rnams la// skyo bar 'gyur pa gang bshad rmad// 'di ni las kyi dam tshig ste// de bzhin gshags pa'i ting 'dzan du// bsgoms nas sangs rgyas mchodanani// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyudado// rdo rjesams dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// sems can kun
bya/ dal ba da sbyin pa'i// kun babrang 'dodapa bdag yin ta/ ]mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das bdod pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de tsho'i rigs kyi

las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dengos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can kun la phan byed pa'i// kun bazang dro po bdag yin te// rdordza hU~Mgi rnal 'byor gyis// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom
ldan bdas phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mob rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'i// kun bzad 'dod pa bdag yin te// bdag nyid
'gro 'dul skur gnas la// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhas bcom ldan 'das pa tsho chags pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dmatshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi
N+NaM rgyud ro// sems can kun la don chen spyan// kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te// don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub
pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
las kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyirgyad do// rang gi ting nge 'dzin pa yis// g.yas pa'i mdzub mos
mdun nas ni// go char bcingasata spyi bor bzhag/ shin tu yang na bsung bar 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i las kyis rigs kyi
