chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rtsig pa la nildan 'dra ba// ri mor bris nas mtshan bsgreng ste// mnyes na bud med gang bsams la// de 'di la debang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa

phyagan rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'din rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sa la gnod sprin gdong bris la// de yi mig gi phyogs sune// mdzub mo' sen mo btsugs na yang// bung med/
mchog ni 'dren par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpas gsungs so// de la 'din paskyob rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// lagapa gnyis su pad+mob blangs// 'dod/
chags dog pa lta byed nga// rdordzalta bas bud med de/ dbaltas na yang n dga' bar 'gyur// zhas bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dzan pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos

grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rjerin chen ting 'dzan ga[–]sa// lag[” ]gas kyis nor bu gzung// tshigs zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni// bud med kun la 'dud byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjehU~M gis gsungs so// rig
thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi tshog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sa 'cho phyogan rdo rjesad bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la
'di na de bzhinagshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mchod pa'i las kyi chogar sbyar// gang dang gang gi dgos bsams pa// de dang de na gsol
btab ste// mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya// zhes pacom ldan 'das las rdor dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la 'din de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje
sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsong ba'i mchos pa chogar sbyar// dgos pa gang zhig smras pa de// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di
na rdzorje'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang/ rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod chen byas// mkhas pas cung brad gang bsams pa// da namyur du dngos/
grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i tod 'dzin gyis// yid kyi mchod pa byas nas kyang/
mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa// da mas dngos grub thams cad thob// cis bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
do// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzarigyis// gdug pa la sogs mchod byas la// mkhas pas da gos pa gang bsams pa// de kun skad cig nyidi 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesnying pos gsung
[. ]so/ rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsnyoms pa'i dngos grub kyi
rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i byin gyis brlabs rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis na// sangs rgyas
phyag rgyu rab bsgrubs pas// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// rtas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa phyog na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'
byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// kun gyi bdag nyid sems dpa' ni dar dag gi lus la gnas pa ste// sems dpa' bdag ces byin brlabs la// bdag ces byaba'i nga rgyal
gyis bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ba gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dang sa gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs

kyirdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do// sems dpa' ji bzhin phyag rgya bzhin// phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de bzhin// chog 'di yi tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub par bya// zhes bcom/

ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'din pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do// chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la// ngag gi phyag
[4]// rgyas de dag kun// sems dpa' chan po'i ting nga dzan// cas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu sn gnas gabrigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// da' 'di ni nor bu'i rigs/
kyilas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas kun la dadang bskur dang// mchod dang dam tshig dngos grub rnams// bcom ldan 'das nas bsgoms nas kyang// rdo rje las rnams
b+hika bsgrub par bya//nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya som pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// n gnas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig
tu 'dus nas// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba phyag na rdo rjel lags so nas bya ba byin no// rdo rje thags pa byan[…]
lamedu de bzhin gshags pa kun gyi gsang// thag pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdordzasams dar ba khyod legs so// rdo rje'i chon khyod legaso//rdo rjechos khyod legs
rtsornalasan khyed lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de khon nyid bsdus pa las// brtag pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'achog rgyas pa rdzogs so//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho nyid bsdus pa kham po dgu pa// de nas khyadachub sems dpa' chen po byas na dorjesatshags su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// lta bangan cing chags
0 bral la// gsang ba 'dan mi rigs te// sems can kun la phan don du// de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya// dunas yang byang chub sems dar ba chen po phyagan rdo rjes da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang tshog rgyas pa'i rgyud ngo/ de la 'di ni snying po'i yo byad dang chog rgyas pa'i

rgyud yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthongonas bdug pa dang/ mar ma dang/ me tog dang/ dra'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod pa byas te/ de nas rdo rje tshug gis bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o// de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i
tshog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'dug ste/dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i

mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod de/ phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la sngags 'di bzhis bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga

ta pu dza basmra na ya/ Ats+tshanaM nir+ya tA ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzrasatA a d+hi tings aM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza a b+hi ka ya At+tanaM/ nir ta yA ma sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a h+phu 'any+tsa hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza dra

brtanA ya At+yA naM nir+ya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga tA badzra d+harmapa brtaya maM/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta pu dza karma Na At+manaM nir+ya ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra kam kuru hUM/ de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang
bya// mkhral lakhazas kun dad 'dodapa kun lan bar spyod cing/ bodaganyid snying bo'i don du sangs rgyas kyigazugs kharnyan gyi mdun du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la/ ci dga' bar byung/
ri rdo rje mig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na myur por dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// ci lta ba med pa'i dngos grub 'dong nyani/ de nas ras la bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs/ de'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul dukha dog dang rgyan rnams gyi reg ba bar bri zhing/ sems dpa' chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil

'khor la bzhugs la/ rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa rnams su khri'o// danas rimo'i sku gzug 'chod pa cachar dusala'adzab bya ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas mthar mchod

brgyu char byas la tshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi de khon nyidi la sogs pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

'dzan pas gsungs so// yang na phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sams rwapa' rdo rjema'i phyag rgya bcings la/ ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi phyag rgya'i spyan sngar ci dga' ba bzhin/

du ji lta ba bzhin bcanges shing dkrol te rdo rje'i tshig 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas mthar mtshan thog thag ngal mi bso bar cung zad tsam zhig phyag rgya bkrol to/ ji lta ba bzhin bcariso nas bzlas brjod bya'o/

[2/]de nas phyag rgya ba khar zhing 'bab la 'phar zhing ltung bar sa bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings bzhin du nam mkha' la ldang bar 'gyur ro// gzugasar dga' bo dang/ mi snang ba dang/ las thams cad kyang

byed par 'gyur ro// bcangs ma thag tu phyag rgya thams yod kyis kyang las thams cad ji lta ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// zhasabcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// yang na ting nga 'dzin sgrub par

'dodazhan des rdo dzathamo nas brtsams te/ ting 'dzin de gang la dga' ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog thag lamo krung mi zhig par snyoms par
zhugs te 'dug par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dengos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur ro/ chos bcom
ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpas gsungs so/ sku las sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du bzlasa'aji zla ba gcig g bar du bsgrubs la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las/
thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'dase rdorje'adzan pas gsungs so// so las shig bya bar 'dod na yang lanatsagakharjod patsam gyis bdag dang// gzhan dang// grong ra/ grongakhyer
rnams bon bting la chol gas pos bsrung bar 'gyur ro// dbal pa yang byung ste spyi rnam ngodos la don gyis zin pa dad gdod kyi e tsi'u dmado rjod ng/ lcags kyudang/ lag pa dang/ mda' thogs pa
dang rin po che dang/ nyi ma dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ so'i phrang po dang/ pado dang/ ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang/ lce dang/ rdo rje rgya gram dang/ go cha dang/ mar ba dang/ khu tshur dang//

phyag rgya la sogs pa dngos po thams cad lan ga brjod pas 'bebs par byed do// sgyu ma'i las kyang byed de/ rma bya'i mjug sgo'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste btsangs la danas bya'i mjug sgo nga sems dpa' sde/

a rdzoma'i phyag rgyas mnan la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi soms dang kha rdo rje ma'i phyogargya babs kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas mkhya'imajug sgo las gzugs sna tshogs la sogs par snang bar 'gyur te/
da phyin chad rma bya'i mjug sa rang gi lus latshog bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang ston to/ mjug sgro de nyid la lan cig bzlas tu bskor bas kyang/ bdag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro

mjug sgro de nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma'i rnams kyang ston/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi gzugs bar n yang ston/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
'khoragyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa la sogs pa mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas/ bdag nyid las rnam/

pa'i mchog thams can dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gi thugs kyang ston pa'i bar du'o// ci ste dbang du byed por 'dod na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi samasam rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings [']du rgya de
'bar bar gyur kyi bzlas par bya'o// de nas de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing dbang du byed n sems pa'i gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ casti/

'gi rten dang 'jigartan las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'dodan yang des dang bo kho nar de bzhin du zlos shing zla bgacig tu brgyad stong bzlas la/ donas mthar phyag rgya bcings tad bzhin du mtshan thog

thag phyag rgya ba bar gyi bar bzlas par bya'o// de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub gang yang rung ba gcig tu 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
dzin pas gsungs so//de bzhin gshags pa'i rabs kyi yo byad dang tshogs pa rdzogs so///denas rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang chogargyas M ba ni 'di yin te de la dang por ni sngar
bsnyan pa bya ste/ de ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de'i mthar mtshad thog thug dubazlas pa byos la/ de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang chad pas gcad par
nus par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// 'on te sgrub par 'dod na yang des ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la/ des de bzhin du mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig tu

'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing/ ci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du bzlas par dus bzhir rdo rje 'tshig gis zlos shing zla ba'i mthar phyin pa dang/ ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas nasajo rje
zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po la phyag rgya bcings pa de las zhes bya ba'i sgra byang gi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas ma sangs pa dang lha rnams kyi dpang po dang dbang phyug chen po/

la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mdun du gnas nas bka' nod par gyur to// de nas rig 'dzin gyis 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// gang gi tshe ngas khyod tshur shog 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba de 'i tshe na
khyod 'dir 'ongs la nga'i bka' bzhin byos shig da phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag por 'gyur te/ yud tsam gyis kyang sa gsum pa thams cad la ci dgar bka' stsol cing bskor te slar

'ongs nas kyang panag/dgas pa dang chad pas gcad pa rnams byed cing/ lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi longs spyod la nye bar spyod nas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du byed cing/ lha thams cad kyi dbang pob bud

mad la sogs pa bud med thams cad mgu bar byas nas nye bar spyod kyang de la su gang gis byas kyang gnod par byang nus pa yod de/ hU~M zhes bya bas lha la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad gnon cing/ de nas

bskal pa chung ngu'i stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom lhan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// calta phyogargyu sgrub par 'dod na yang ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzab byas la zla ba'i mthar rdo rje hUM las bya

ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ mtshan thog thag tu ba byas pa la bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas shugs bya ba dang ldan par ji lta ba'i cho ga bzhin phyi rgya bcingasan
mamakha' la 'gro bdang/ gzugasa rnams ston pa dang/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang/ skam rnams ston pa dang/ thams cad la dbab pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ dbang du bya ba dang/ thams cad kyi dgag pa
bskyed par bya ba dang/ rin po cha thams cad bsdu ba dang/ bod zer 'bar ba chen po bstan pa dang/ rin po cha'i char 'bebs par bstan pa dang/ gad mo char bgad pa dang/ sems can thams cad
srung ba dang/ gcad pa dang/ dbya ba dang/ dus kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ ji lta bzhin pa'i ri khon nyid brjod pa dang// las thams cad la 'jug pa dang/ dgag pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang//
gosad pa dang/ sems can thams cad phyag rgyas gang ba pa dang/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba la 'jug pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ dngos po thams cad glu len du gzhug pa dang/ gar byed du gzhug pa
dang dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbab pa la sogs pa las tham cad byed par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pasogasungs so// rtsa ste rdo rje phra mo sgrub par 'dod/

nayang sardo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du sgom zhing/ de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas mthar ting nge 'dzin nga nyid kyis mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o/
nga nas nam nangs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan dag pa dang tshar gcod panus par 'gyur ro/zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste las
sgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlos shing zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs la da nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya 'o// de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ zhes
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ldan pas gsungs so// de nas las thams cad khyad par 'dod na'ang lan cig brjod de yid kyis bsams pas srung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// rdo rje
rgyu'i rigs kyi yo byad dang chogargyas pa rdzogs so// di nas pad+mo'i rigs kyi yo byad dang chog rgyas pan 'di yin te/ dal dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/
ra nas bsgrub par bya stangs la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris la/ de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du soms dang kho pa'i bris la/ gra rnams su lcamo rnams/
bo de nas bzlas pa'i rtog da bzhin durgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gsu/thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon te dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i

sa 'khyad par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci sa phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du pad+ma rdordza ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stongs phrag brgyad tshang bar brjod pa'i

bar du dus bzhir bzlas par bya'o// da nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te bzlas pa byas lanam nangs pa dang dngos grub du 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba

0 thams cad 'dul bar byad do/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu sngan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// statingang 'dzin gyi tshul sgrub par 'dod na yang da bsan tu zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji

ltar dga' ba'i ting nga 'dzin gyis bzlas pa bya 'o// de nas nam nangos pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjechos kyis gsungs so// ma sta las sgrub par 'dod na

yang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/// pad+ma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga
rgyas pa rdzogs so//de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i skyo ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po ba nar de bzhin gshags pa thams nang la phag rnams btogs bas 'a 'bum
bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'kher buti'i tshul du bris la/ na 'tshan du mchod pa byas te de bzhin du bsgrubs la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig

thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam nangs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che byang chub sams dpa' nam mkha'i snying po kun nas dbang bskur ba sbyin pa

mdzad do// dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der rigs 'dzan gyi 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzan pas gsungs so// rtsis phagergya sgrub par
'dod na yang de bzhin du chos kyi de rdza ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs na bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin

pas gsungs so// ci sta nor bu ya shas sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du rin po che 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rim pa bzhin du bsgom par byas te/ dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' lasarin po che ji ltar 'byung b.rin

po cha las byang chub sams dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas zla ba'i mthar ting nga 'dzin da nyid kyi maMtshan/
gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam nangs pa dang de bzhin gshags pa thams cad byon nas ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so//
da nas las sgrub pa bshad du/ de bzhin du bzlas pa zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bablas par bya'o/ danas niam nas pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur
nas les thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// nor bu'i rigs kyi nyi bar zad pa'i tshog rgyas pardzogs so/// da nasarig

a thams cad kyi thun mong du sgrub pa'i yo byed dang chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo bad dang cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// snying po sgrub par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/

ba/ grub par gyur cig cas brjod la snying poru deb ba bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i reg bya'o// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang cho ga sku phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar 'gyur cigaces skyas la dmatshag

gi phyag rgya bcings taci dga' bar tsanas kyis bzlas par bya'o// de nas ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub du 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa sta/ spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur

cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras la sngags pa dag/'kharab zlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo// de la 'di ni rig pa'i lo byung dang chog rgyas pa ste/ dkyi
ma soms dun 'di dag thams cad nam rig pas mdongs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gags pa [︽]sa rud ni rig pa rtogs snying sdom par gur de nas sdus la/ rig pa ni ga la pa ra u0f8bkhrus shing bsgrub par bya'o

nas b.romaldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de nas snying po dang/ sngag dang/ phub rgyu dang/ rigs pa thams cad ji ltar sgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ samasangapal/

gang gi snying po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de na bdag gam sams dpar bsgoms na bsgrub pa ba ba bgrub par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
sems dpas gsungasaso// rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bzlas pa'i skyo gargyas pa rdzogs so// de nas rigs thamaMs cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i cho gargyas pa ni 'di lta ste/ rdul
dang po kho nas de bzhin gshags pa rnams kyi gos kyi dngos grub na/ 'di lta ste/ nor bgrub pa'i dngos grub dang/ rdzu 'phrulagyi dngos grub dang/ rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa 'i

[% ]dang dngos grub chen po rnams so// de la ma 'grub pa ni 'di yin te/ gang nagater yod par dogs pa der phyagargya bcings la rang giting 'dzin gyis gtor gyi gnas der rdorje blta bas lta ban ste rdo rje lta

lce bu yur bar mthong nadazhagator dang dgos par bya'o// den rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyabacas te sa brkos ladzaltar dga' ba bzhin du blangasan rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom

ldan 'dasardo rje sems dar sa gsungs so// de la 'di na rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyagargya gang sgrub par byed na badzrasid+d+hi nas brjod par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnams pa bzhi yod

lce de da ni 'di ltar chu'i stong nas par 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa dang/ ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang/ nam ma/

la gro ba dang/ dpag tshad stong gi steng du lding ba dang/ 'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang/ phyogs thams cad du dpagatshad stong du ru dga' larasong la bskor tasur 'ong ba dang/dpag tshad stong khor yug sems can

thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang/ dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang/ phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bud mdathams cad tsa dga' bar pang du blangs te/

'dug pa dang/ gsar dang/ nor bu dang/ chu du la sogs pa'i dbyig thams cad dang/ nor thams cadu phrogs nas kyang sus kyang rung zad kyang rgal mi nus te bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na/ gzhan

gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ skyes bu stong phrag bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang/ rtag tu ltad mang par ldan pa dang/ rtag pu la dod pa thamasarud longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ rtag tu dar la bab cing lha'i

gzugs dang ldan pa dang/ rdo rjesams dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshal/sa pa mas cad mthong nga rdo rje'i dngos grub blon med pas mchod pa byed cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ zhes bas

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rnga rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya slab pa na rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyis brjod la

'grub pa dang rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gis bskor te slar 'ongs shing pad ba thams

cad la yos su spyad pa dang/ lo bco brgyad pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang/ sku 'khyil ba ldan pa dang/ rdo rje chen pos rig 'dzin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sams dang/ ba thams cad

mthong zhing bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi rig 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la da ni dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin ti/bdag nyid phyag rgya'i
snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubasan sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtanagyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis/
byab sna tshogs byed pa dang/ de bzhin gshags pa rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa thams cad mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshags pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems

can ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi donabs nas slar 'ongs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang/ bad ba dang/ yid bad pa thams cad la

spyod cing rdordzasams dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tsheg tshod ma lus zhing lus pa mad pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa'i

thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdordzarigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar khams gsum las rnam par rgyal bab dngos grub dang/ dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub dang/ bde ba dang yid

bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang/ dngos grub dam pa rnams so// de la 'di ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen

po'i rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o// da nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang snyan s bya ba brjod par bya'o// hUMzhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad

thab/ kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro// da ni chad 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po don+da'adzin par 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten
gsum po 'khor la thams car kun tubaskor te slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs rang sems can thams cad hU~M zhes byas pas 'dul bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' stsol cing/ rdo rjesams da pa bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro//

bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes byed pas gsungs so/ de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ phyag rgya sgrub pan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur pa ni rin po ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por

bdag nyid dbang bskur la bslab par bya ste/ danas grub pa dang dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang dang/ rin po chapa de bang dang/ chos kyi dbang dang/ las kyi dbang rnams so// de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na re/

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rin po cha'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// las kyi dbang
gsen 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi de bang gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni bde ba dang yid
bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas la/ de bzhin gshags pa
thams cad kyi bad bu dang yu'i bde ba thams rud kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bad ba thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni

dngos grub dam pa ste/ de yang jaltar rdordzu 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di dag ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dngo gru ba rnamA te/ da ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang/ bang

du bya ba dang/ srung ba dang/ pad+mo'i dngos grub rnams so// de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub na 'di yin te/ ji ltar pad+mo'i 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams
cad mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid 'jigartan dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas nasems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro// byams pas 'gangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro ba

ba thams cad srung ba dang/ sba ba dang/ bskyab nus par 'gyur ro/ bdag nyid pad+mo'i ting 'dzin du zhugs la pado lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang/ rnam pa'i
mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pad+mob gsungs so// de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams/
[46/ ]du da yang 'di ltar rags thams cad kyi dbang ga dngos grub dang/ gzi brjid chen po dang/ bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang/ rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi dbang ga dngos grub na/ 'di lta ste/ nyid kyi dbang dbul ba dang/ mar me dbul bdang/ ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ rin po che sgrub pa'i dngos grub
'di dag gis de bzhin gshags pa thams cad mchod naring po ma thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das ra bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so// rogs thams cad
kyi thun mong ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so///de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med

pa'i sems dpas gsungs so// de la dang po kho naranasA po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta bar// de 'dra bar na dngos grub 'dod// de yi thabs na phyag rgya ste// dngos grub chen

pa kun yin no// de la 'di ni phyag rgyab thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rtan 'dul ba chags bral mni// phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las skyes// de yi thobs ni sgom pa ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog

du 'gyur// da' 'di na sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bdan las 'jig rten 'di nyams pas// sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog
pa @#/ tu 'gyur// dal 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ma rig mun chags 'di la ni// rig pa'i dngos grub yong min te// de yi thabs ni rgya che bas// dngos grubakun gyi
mchog thob bo// brtag pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grubakyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyis gsungs so// de la dang po bon ra na snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang sangs
rgyas mchod// bgrub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dam tshig gsang ba bsusanani// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams mad kyang
myur bar ni// dam tshig bsrungs na myur du 'grub// de la 'di ni sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur ta// bsod
nams mad kyang myur bar ni// chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog/ byas na bsod nams thob 'gyur te//

sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs na// myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// brtag pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bal
par bya'o/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar snying po shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// yi ga a wa bajug byed cing// yi ge thams cad
rnam bsgom la// rang gi kha nas gzhan zhal du// bsgoms na bsod nams thob par 'grub// cas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs so// dul 'di ni

phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// shes rab rjes 'bigs zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin ces grags pa ste// ngas ni phyag rgya myang 'grub par// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par bgyur// zhes bcom

ldan 'das shas rab mchog gisagasungs so// de la 'di ni sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// shes rab sku yi rdzas bgrang ba// ting 'dzin tshig ni rab smos pa// de bsgoms na ni mur pa yang/ sngag

kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje byos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rig dang sngags dang khyad par du// khyad par yod pa ma yin te/ shes
rab bsgoms na mur bar ni// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab yongs kyi gsungs so// brtag pa thamasacad kyi ya shas kyi dngos grub

kyi cho ga rgyag pa'i rgyud do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// dge ba yin chos rnams kyi// tshogs ni rnam par 'phel 'gyur to// de nas tshogs na 'grub par
[©]// 'gyur de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'khor lo mang por zhugs pa dang// dkyil 'khor mang po bris pa'i phyir// tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgyu
rnams dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sdugs kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rjes su yi rang la sogs tshul// de bzhin dam pa'i chos pa klubs dang/ bzlas pa mang po byas/
nas ni// nges par sngags na des 'grub 'gyur// de la 'di'i rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ma rig rab du spangs pa dang// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul las// tshogs ni yongs su
rdzogs nas kyang// myur du dngos grubathob par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so///de nas byang chub sems dpa' sums dpa' chen po phugan

rdo rje s rig thams cad kyi mtshan ma 'byung pa'i yang gs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung ba na/ da nyid bcom ldan sams dpa' sta// thams cad sems de nyid bdag po//

sku dang gsung thugs rdo rngani// sams dpa' brtan pa rang byung gi/ samasaM dpa' kun gyi marnyog sems dpa'// rdo rje snying khararab bsgoms na// rdordzasan dang 'a zhes grags sta// 'di lardo rje rab tu

gnas// da nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// ye shes tshul te maMnyamamed 'od// snying las sna tshogs byung nas/ sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur ta// khams gsum kun gyi rdul snyad du// da dganyid nargyal ba en
rnarje ska ni de rnams las// rordza sems dpar yang dag 'gyur// sems dpa' dang po de nyid las// mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung// mtshan ma lasani sems dpa' che/ de las tshul 'di thams/
cud 'byung// gang gis 'di'i thos gyur la// dad cing 'dzin byang snying khar yang// rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms na ni// da ni myur du grub ba thob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de

bzhinagongshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i yang shas kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// da nas bang chub sems dang ba chen po phyag na rdo rjes rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ya shas kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud

'di gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i yo shos kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtog med pa'i// ye shes rtag pa nyid gyur pasaM// mi rtog pa yi ya
shas las// brtags pas rtog pa zhas brjod do// da la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi brtag pa 'bung ngab yang shos kyi rgyud do// mi rtog gang la rtog bdag 'di// brtags pa rtog pa byung ba ni/

rdo rje sams dpa' sems dpa' che// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i la shas kyi rgyud do// cho ga bin du ngamo bris// rtog pa grub sprin shas rtog las// rtog

las bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis// de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungasaso// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi rtog pa byung ba'i yi shas kyi rgyud do// rtog pa las ni 'dod chags 'byung// pad+molo ni de gnas taM// de phyir
rtog la gnas pan// grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ya shas kyi rgyud do// rtog pa mad pa'i nor bu ni// mthu yis shin du mchog tu
'gyurd ltar rnam par mi rtog pas// lha rdzas dngos grub 'byang bar 'gyur/ zhas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sams dopas gsungasaso// rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thamaM/

cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i yongs kyi rgyud do// yid kyis 'dod pa'i rtog yis// yid kyi shes pa yod pa grung 'gyur te// tang 'dzan sgrub pa snying la gnas// de phyir sId po nas brjod do// da nas rtog pa thams cad

kyi phyag rgya babyung ba'i ya shas kyi rgyud do// ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog/ khrims na 'da' kha mi lud bzhin// bdag nyid chen po gzugs bar n gyis// mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags// de nas rtog

pa thams cad kyi sngags byung ba'i lo shas kyi rgyud do// 'dab bar bya pa mAyin zhing// pa ba nga kan sa tsa na nga ba nyid// gsang ba grub phyir brjod pas na// de yi phyir na sngags nas brjod// de nas rigs

pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// ma rig pani gzhom pa dang// ngag rig mchog 'grub pa'i phyir// rtogs shing rig pa'i dngos grubs// da phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// zhes btsem ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin

ka pas gosungs so// rtog pa thams rud kyi snying po la sogs pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi yang shas 'byung ba'i rgyud do// de la dang po kho nar snying pob yongashas skya pa'i rgyud yin/

snying bo bslus te bdag gam// gzhan yang rung ste byung ba dang// 'byung dang 'byung gyuragang gis ni// mthong zhing thos 'gyur shes par du// de la 'di ni phyag rgyab yu shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ bdag
gis chog ji bzhin du// gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcings// 'jigartan pa la bltas na ni// gong ma bzhin du kun shasaM 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi mngags 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ lan cig tsal
ang sngags brjod na// 'das dang 'byed dang byad gang yin// rang gi lce la snyas 'gyur ba// de dag thamanaNapa paden par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du sbyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs/
so de la 'di ni rig pa'i yabs skyo ba'i rgyud do// rig pa lan cig brjod na ni// byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams// ji ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// yid kyi ri ni shes pas 'gyur/ rtogs
pa thams cad kyi ya shos sku kha'i cho ga rgyas pa'irgyad rdzogs so//dang nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba sa dang/ pa
rgyud yin no// de la 'din de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi sku'i phyagargya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar da ltar 'dug nas kyang// skyal mong krung bas bslab bya ste// ji ltar ri mo'i tshul byas nas// sams

dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dang sa gosungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyagargya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni// brkyang bskum
tshul du gnas ga te// shin tu khros nas bsgrub byas na// tha tshomamed da ra bas par 'gyung// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i

rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin te/ rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la// lag gtis rdo ra bcings nas kyang// ting nge 'dzin gyi skur gyur la// pad+mo byung ba bsgrub par bya// zhes
bcom ldan 'das pad+me sams dpas gsungs so// de la 'di na nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku yug pa yin te/ ji ltar 'dug gam nyal ba 'am// bachag kyang rung sta de ltar ni// rdo rje rinachen
dbang bskur na// thetshon mad par 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so pa la 'di ni de bzhan gshags pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do//

lcanishin du mi bskul zhing// so dang mchuganyis sbyar nas ni// rtog pa thams cad bsgrub bya zhing// sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin no// zhusabcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsung gisagasungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i

rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// hU~Mzhes bya ba babrug sgra bsgragis// khro bo'i ngagan zab cing bstan// rdo rjechen po khro bo'ogasal// rdo rje khro bo'i gsung 'grub bo/ zhes bcom ldan

'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi ga sgrub pa'i rgyud do// dbus mi 'byin ltar dbulas khyen cing// phra ba'i tshig ni shin tu gsal// ting 'dzani
ya shes snying po yis// zlos pa po rnams grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi shos kyi snying bos gsungs so// de la 'danor bu'i rigs

kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgyasgrub pa'irgyud do// shin tu yongs su gsal tshig bas// rtag tu bdod la brtson byed cing// tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni// myur du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bam
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so// da la 'di ni de bzhin gshags pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya grub pa'i rgyud do// rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das//
sems can thams cad bad yin pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di'i rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i sams kyi

ngag smra ba pa'i rgyad do// snyams can kun la phan pa dang// ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang/ sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// khro bo dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshag

ba thams cad kyi rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'ang na parob rigs la spyi gsang pa'i sems kyi phyag rgya sprul pa'i rgyud do// jaltar pad+mor ba chags la// dgos pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa// da ltar bdag
gis chags skyon yang// srid na cham sa pad 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo bzhad pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// nam
zhig sems can thams cad kyi// dgos pa ba don ni kun sgrubs cing// rin chen char na bababs 'gyur bas// grub na myur bar de 'grub bo/ zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos

gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdorje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// ji ltar lang sam 'dug ba bam// khachag kyang rung ste de ltar na// lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya mchog/ tham

cad byang n 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// de lta
da ltar gsanas kyang// jolta ji ltar byed kyang rung// rdo rje khro bo mdzub mo bcings// gos kyis g.yogs ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa tham cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal pos

gsungs so// dal 'a di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'ardo rje phyag rgyu sgrub pa'i rgyud do// lag pa g.yon pas paro yi// khu tshur bcings te sus nas ni// ci dgar myur du pad+mo yi// dngos grub kyang n thob par 'gyur/

nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// da la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phugargya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// g.yon pa'i rin chen khu tshur ni// bcings te dam pa'i
lag g.yogs la// rtsi ga bar no rim gror byad// rin chen dngos grub thob 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungasaM so// de la 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba thams cad

kyi gsang ba'i thun mong gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// rang gi sams dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya chen pa'i tshul du na// rdo rje ngag dang rdo rdzob lta// ring por mi thogs mchog 'grub bo// zhes bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thoms cud kyi rdo rje sAms dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi gsang pa'i sku dang// gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//
n gnas bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'osanas 'di skad ces gsungasaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad rtog pa 'di byin gyis brlab/
par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// de nas yang de bzhin gshags pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas yang legs so zhes bya ba 'di bzhin// rdo rje'i theg pa blun mad// de bzhin gshags pa kun gyi sa
thag pa nan po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod lags so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod lags so// rdordzalas ni khyod legs
so/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nga kho nyid bsdus pa las/ rgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i rgyud rdzo gas so///nga nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdodzastan
las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshan rgya rtsa brgyung po 'di gsol btab bo// rdo rje dbyings kyis sams dpa' che// sems can don mchog pa nyid na/ shAka thub rgyal po ye shes che// rdo rje
[r]@#// bangaganyid khyod phyag tshul// sams dpab 'byung ba de nyid don// soms can rgya lta tshul chen po// sems can donachen dgos pa'i don// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag
'tshul/ sangs rgyas chos n chos chen po// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// skya pa chen po pa rig mchog/ sams dpa' chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// las chen srung ba chen po ste// las rnams thams cad
rab bslabs pa// bdag nyid chen po 'gro spyod mchog/ sams dang brgyad khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol phyin pa khyod kun b.rIs// kun mkhyen yang shas mkhyen pa 'o// sams dpa' kun te thabs chen po//

shes reb chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog/ thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// thams cad gtong ba byams pa chu/ dkun mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya sang gu shAkya
cha shAkya shAkya thubs pa cha// 'dul brtan po khyab pa po// 'gro don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mnyas pa// chos dbyings de bzhin gshags pa sta// rdo rje mgon/
po mgon chen po// sems can tshogs na khyod phyag 'tshal// 'od chen sna ba chen po sta// brtson 'grus chen po stobs chen po// dpa' bo chen po rab dpa' mchog/ bang spyod dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal//

a tshangs pa rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// shAkya dpa' bo thub pa che// kun bangag thub pa dag pa yi// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i sku ste sku yi mtshogi/ sku gsum sku min snyom pa po/
kun gyi sku ste skam pa// rdo rje sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gsung min gsung sta gsung gse mchog/ gsung gsung gsung min ston pa po// gsung kun shin tu gsungan ba// rdordza'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal
la samasamasams ta sems kyi mchog/ sams gsum sems min ston pa po// thams cad sems te sams che ba// rdo rje sams khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdor min rdo rje rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rje gsum pa rdor

min sbyong// rdo rje thams cad rdo rje cha// rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// kun khyang srid pa'i rtsa mo mchog/ bang gshags bdag po rgyal ba ni// khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che// sna mdzad khyod la phyag
'tshal lo// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyang 'di dag ni// gang gas skad cig nyin byang ngam// klog gam yang na sgom pa'i ng rung// kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// mgon po khyod gsol ba na//
sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po bskyang nas kyang// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bdag pos bka' stsal pab tshig gsan nas// da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang gtsug tu 'du bar mdzad par
gsol// de nas yang da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rtenathams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa 'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna
[59 ]// tshogs pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsung ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mdun du rdul phra

mo thams cad ji ltar snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par byas nas// bcom ldan 'das de nga zhir gshegs pa shAkya thub pA chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sams dpa' chen po phyag na

rdorjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la dar pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// da nas 'di gsung ma thag

tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cud kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyad pa'i dkyil 'khor 25 pa// rtsom ldan 'das de bzhin gsadas pardo rjadabyings kyi rdo rje dbyis pa sogru pa'i rdo rje b la kho pa tshe thanA cad rab
bskor bar gyur to// de nas byed rlabasams dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum las rnam pa rgyal bas de'i sadas su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jigan thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i

phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bso// de nas 'di gsung ma thal/ dud bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gags pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i lalor lo rab tu paskor bar gyur to// ngonas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phab sa pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs

[p/ ]kyi dbang pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i de/ pad+mo'i 'khor lo rab du bskor// de nas 'di gsung/

ma thag tu da bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo shin tu phra mo ji snyid pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa chos kyi rgyal pos pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur/
dod nas byang chub sams dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs

pa'i nor ba'i 'khor lo rab du bskor// de nas da'i tshosangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can phra ba 'am sgom pa yang rung// de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ra

rab ra'i rgyal po rtsa mo rdo rjadang/ nor bu dang/ rin po cha las byas pa'i 'dabu btsugs par de bzhin gshags patham cad kyi gdan la bzhugs nas rdo dzad byangs la sogs pa'i 'khor le thams cad rab tu bskor bar

phyogs kun nas mthong ngo// nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// mi yi nang du babs nas kyang// dgos phyir sems can kun gyi don// rdo rje'i 'khor lo mchogs
bskor zhing/ dmagon po rab tu sgrub par mdzod// de nas yang bcom ldan 'dasakyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang
ku// gcig tu 'du bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs//
so[：]da nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje bdag nyid gyur par mkhyenanas/ phyag na rdo
rdzal 'di skad ces gsungasaso// gas kyi bu khyod kyang nga'i thugs dang/ da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ rigs thams cad dang/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
kyi khrigs su zhugs shig/ de nas byang chub sams dpa' chen po phyag na rdordzas de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyis gnang nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// mdor nas nigs rgyas thams cad kyi//
sku gsung thug kyi rdodzani// zhugs nas sems can thams cad la// phan pa'i phyir na bsgrub par bya// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang
mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshags pa ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i
sku 'phro ba mdzad pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad dang/ gsung thams cad 'jug pa'i gnas dang/ sems kyi rgyud 'byung ba thams cad dang/ rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang/
gnas thams cad dang/ mtshan thams byung/ dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang/ ba snga'i khung bu thams cad dang/ rdul shin tu phra mo snyad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ thugs rnams su zhug
nas zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma len pa zhig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rjer

da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying po byang chub gang na ba der gshags nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drud du 'jig rtan pa
dang mthun par bya ba'i phying rtsi blangs nas tshad du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a ma'o sems can brtan pa yi// sems can don ni bdag don mchog/ gang phyir gdul bar dbang brtan rnams//
mu stags lta la gnas par mdzad// mdor na mi 'dul 'jig rten pa// lta ba ngan pasamadongs pa rnams// ye shes snang bas dag byas phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas 'dod

pan spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi de kho na nyid mi shes pas 'di skad du kyi dag sbyong cig byang chub kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing ma bzod pa la bzod par mdzad dam zhes gsol to//de nas bcom
'u/// ldan 'das kyis rtswa de bting sta stang du bzhugs nas lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams kho bos byang chub thob par sgrubs shig/ danas

'dod pan spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ma rtogs nas/ lha rnams kyi rab ng po brgya byin gang na ba der dong nas chad du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la da ltar gyur
pa 'di brjod do// de nas lha rnams kyidabang po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs kyis bskor ta/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pachen po la 'di nga
ltar gyur pa da 'di dag brjod do// de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang lhan cig tu 'dzogortanagasum po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po
la de ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do// de nas 'jig rten gsum po ma tha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos/ lha rnams kyi bdag po mthu bocha la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs
po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang mthun par mdzad cing yang bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston gyis/ 'di ltar
'jag rtanan do bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no snyam du shes par ma byed cing/ lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis/ lha de dag nyung du bsgrubs par bya'i/ de bzhin
0 gshags pa nyid du ma yin no// de legs kyis der mchod pa la 'dod par sgrub bo// de nas lha thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gang na ba
dang bcom ldan 'das dbazhin gshags pa'i snying bo byang chub par zhugs pa gang na ba der dong nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal to/ bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te ran gyi gdan 'di las ba'angs la/ lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te dran med pa yang dag par rdzog
pa' byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bdag po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams kho bo la bla na
mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par sgrubs shig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub stsol bar mi nus/ ci ste bdag
cag gis nus par gyur na bdag cag nyid yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dond nyid gsal bar mdzad cing yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di
gsungs so// de ni gzugs min gzugs man man// bdon min rdzun min gtsang ba yo// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// rtogasan rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po de
bya/ dag gas cung zad cig cang mi smra bar gas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rtsa'i gdan las bzhes te/ lha da rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
grogs po rnams sangs rgyas kyi lo shas 'di lta burtog par bya ba sgrubs shagi/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rngo mi thog go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan ng nyid la bzhugs
bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na// byang nubasams na brtan par byos// sams dpa' rdo rje brtan dus la// sangs rgyas su na bdag sgoms
shig/ de dag gis 'di skad du da lta bu legs so zhes bya ba thams cad kyis snus nas dong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo deb tho rangs 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir
bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas su mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa
thams cad la phan par mdzad pa 'phags la phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// rdo rje sams dpa'
sams dpa'i cho// thegs pa chen po'i bdag nyid tshe// snang btsazhing dag pa che// mgonan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje cho/
rdod bzhin gshegs pa kun// sams dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rgyu// thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che//
kun gyi bde ba bde ba che/ bde mchog thog ma tho ma mad// bzhid chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje legs pa dgyes pa che// legs pa zhes
bya rab mnyis pa// mnyes pa che zhing dgyes pa che/ rab dgyes khyodal phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rin chan rgyal po che// dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che//
rin chen thams cad mdzes pa tsho// rnam rgyan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid cha// 'od chen lham pa chen po ste// rgyal ba'i 'od de
'bar ba che// sangs rgyas bod khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal che ba// rgyal mtshan che bas nor bus gtong/ nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan
yu kha che// gtongs pa'i mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bzhud pa bzhad pa cho// dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa// dgyes pa'i shugs kyis rol
cis dgyes// chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ rdo rjechos ni chos che ba// sems dpa'i chos rab sbyor ba// sangs rgyas chos te chos rab
mchog/ 'dod chos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rnon po ral gi cha// shes rab ye shes blo gros che// sdigs ga cod ral
gri chen bo ste// sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyud de 'khor lo ma// sangs rgyas 'khor lo gtar chen po// dkyil 'khor kun tu chos kyis mchog/
chos kyi dkyil 'khor khyod phyag tshal// rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che// samad yi ge chen po ste// yi ga mad pa bzlus pa che// sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo/
rdo rje las ta las rab mchog/ las chen las rab byed pa ste// gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pache// sangs rgyas mchod khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje srung ba go cha cha//
go ma'i mchog ste brten pa che// srung ba che zhing snying po ma/ sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gnod sbyin khro botshe// ma rungs thams cad skrag byed/
pa sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// srung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bsdams pa phyag rgya che// dam tshig chen po bcings ba che// khu tshur chon
po phyag rgya che// rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshags pa phyag bya zhing// brjod de mchod de bsnying stang bya// gang phyir thog ma za ma med//
byang chub sems dpa' khyod yin te// khyod la brten nas sangs rgyas dang//dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun// byung zhing yang dag 'byang 'gyur bas//
sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu// rdo rje sams dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rjerin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshalalo// rdo rje las
ni khyod phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing// mtshan mchog gis na khyod bstod pa'i// bsod nams gang yin de kun kyang// sangs rgyas
byang chub thob par shog/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// rab dad pas ni lan cig tsam// gang gis legs par brjod pa ni// kun kyang sangs rgyas
nyid du 'gyur/ zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad gcig tu 'dus te gsungs gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba de byan no// rdo rje thog pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang//
thag pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'de legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so//
du// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// jo rdzalas na khyod kyang legs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang//
de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phags ba khyang chub sems dpar bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes shing mnyes nas/ bcom ldan
mkhal 'das rdo rjesams dpas gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes bar gyur to/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacud kyi da kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg
pa chen po' mdo rdzogs so////zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
rgyalnga bzhugs/ rgyud
